gsang ba chen po tshad med pa dang / mchog tu pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang / /rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs chen mo de rnams kyis bstod cing bskul ba byas pa dang / gsang
ba thams cad kyi bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di la snyoms par zhugs nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdon
mi za ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di rang gi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // //gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta
babs rnam pa bzhi yis brgyan/ /dar dang dril bu'i chun po dang / /nyi ma zla bas rnam par brgyan/ /rin chen mu tig 'bras bus spras/ /do shal gdu bu rnams kyis brgyan
sna tshogs gdugs ni rnam bres pa/ /sna tshogs phreng ba gos kyis brgyan/ /srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ /ka ba brgyad mchog yang dag gnas/ /dbus kyi dga' byed stan la
@#/ /ni| |dngul la sogs pas rnam par brgyan/ /sna tshogs pad+mo dar gyis g.yogs/ /thams cad stan te dag ces bya/ /dbus su rdo rje shin tu dgyes//
stan de la ni gzhag par bya/ /tshad med pad+mo dmar 'dra ba'i/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /yid bzhin nor bu dbu rgyan ldan/ /rin chen gtsug gis rnam par
mdzes/ /tshad med dar ni dpyangs pa yis/ /dbu la chun pos mdzes par bya/ /sna tshogs sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag /sna tshogs ye shes rab tu gnas/ /chu skyes spyan
ni yid tsam gyis/ /dga' byed yid tsam g.yon du 'dud/ /g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje che/ /snying gar gsor la shin tu brtson/ /de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan/ /thog
ma nyid du rnam par gzhag /slob ma'am yang na gzhan yang rung / /mtshan kun gyis ni rnam brgyan pa/ /tshul bzhin byin gyis brlab bya ste/ /dbus kyi dkyil du gzhag
par bya/ /bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam gzhag ste/ /de la sogs pa yon tan gtso/ /dbus kyi stan la 'dug pa na/ /bdag ni rab dgyes zhes su smra/ /des ni slob ma byin
brlabs te/ /thams cad las byed phun sum tshogs/ /rdo rje pad+mo las 'byung ba'i/ /gsang ba yis kyang dbang bskur ro/ /rab dgyes la sogs yon tan ldan/ /yid
'ong bu mo btsal byas te/ /mgrin pa dpral ba snying spyi bor/ /lha la sogs pa'i 'bru bsgoms te/ /mtshan ma phyag rgyar rab 'bar ba/ /rdo rje pad+mor mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rang la
'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /tshul bzhin thams cad gzhag par bya/ /mdun du lha mo smyos byed ma/ /ma mchu 'dzin pa'i ro la dgyes/ /dkar dmar kha dog 'dres pa yi/ /
thams cad rgyan dang yang dag ldan/ /lo ni bcu drug lon pa'i mchog/ shes rab can gyis mdun du gzhag /g.yas su lha mo gsod byed ma/ /mtshon cha'i mda' ni 'dren
par brtson/ /do shal rkang gdub dag gis brgyan/ /lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste/ /gser gyi ri bo zhu ba 'dra/ /chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam sngo/ /sems dpa' che la dgyes mdzad
cing / /'di ni tshul bzhin gzhag par bya/ /rgyab tu lha mo rmongs byed ma/ /pad+mo dmar po mdog gi 'od/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan mdzes ma'o/ /sku tshe'i tshad ni nyi shu gcig /dga'
byed 'dod pa'i ro la dgyes/ /sna tshogs na bza' yang dag gsol/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /sna tshogs pad+mo sbyor la sogs/ /gar gyi bya ba rab bslab
bzhag /g.yon du sna tshogs chen mo ste/ /sna tshogs dgos pa'i rjes bslabs pa/ /sku tshe'i tshad ni bcu gnyis ldan/ /rnal 'byor la ni shin tu brtson/ /lha dang lha min mi yi
@#/ /rnams/ /'gro ba thams cad myos 'gyur ma/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /sna tshogs dar gyi na bza' gsol/ /grwa rnams kyi ni thams
cad du/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg gi rnams/ /bdug pa me tog bsung ldan pa/ /gzi brjid chen po 'od dang ldan/ /ci rigs par ni gzhag par bya/ /sgo yi phyogs rnams
thams cad du/ /rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar ldan/ /skal ldan dga' la rnam mos pa/ /sgo srung bzhi ni gzhag par bya/ /gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /pi wang
gling bu brdab pa dang / /rdza rnga rnga chen mu ku dang / /mu ra dza dang da ra dang / /gar dang dbyangs dang bzhad pa che/ /rol mo'i yo byad sna tshogs rnams/ /dga' byed dkyil 'khor
bzhag par bya/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad do/ /dkyil 'khor 'di yi phyi rol du/ /rdo rje nam mkha' 'gro ma gzhag /yi dwags rgyal po yang dag zhon/ /dpa'
bo 'jigs byed gzugs 'dzin te/ /skal ldan rang gi lag char ldan/ /gdug pa'i sems kyis sdigs byed cing / /sha khrag dang ni rgyu ma dang / /rkang dang tshil bu za spyod
pa| |dkyil 'khor byas te 'dug pa ni/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya/ /dga' bar byed dang 'dren par byed/ /gsod par byed dang spro bar byed/ /rdo rje mkha'
'gro tshogs kyi rnams/ /shar gyi phyogs su gzhag par bya/ /gzi brjid che dang 'bar byed ma/ /'jigs byed bong bu'i lho ru ste/ /gtsug lag mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni/ /mkhas pas
tshul bzhin gzhag par bya/ /chags chen mo dang chags bral dang / /'khor lo mo dang rgyas 'debs mo/ /rab tu sbyor bas sbyor byas te/ /ci rigs nub tu gzhag par bya/ /
sna tshogs lus dang srung ba dang / /gnod sbyin ma dang yang dag 'phrog /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs te/ /sngags mkhan ci rigs byang du gzhag /shar gyi grwa ru
gzhag pa ni/ /bya rog gdong ste mig 'dra zhing / /'jigs pa'i mig dang 'jigs pa'i gdong / /ji ltar rjes su mthun byas te/ /yi dwags stan la yang dag 'dug /sna
tshogs mchog gi mdog 'dzin te/ /lag pa dri dang 'khar gzhong thogs/ /mchog tu sha dang khrag za ba'o/ /nub dang lho yi mtshams gzhag pa/ /bzhad dang 'ug pa'i gdong
ring ma/ /khros pa'i khyi dang phag gi gdong / /gsus po che la lto 'phyangs ma/ /nub byang gi ni mtshams dag tu/ /rnga mo bong bu'i gdong 'dzin dang / /khros pa'i ra dang byi la'i
gdong / /sgyu ma'i mgo nas za byed rnams/ /shar dang byang gi mtshams dag tu/ /keng rus dkar po 'dzin pa ste/ /khros pa rus pa'i phreng bas klubs/ /lto 'phyangs mo la bum
@#/ /pa 'dzin/ /phan tshun 'thab par brtson pa ye/ /ce spyang gi ni 'khor gyi rnams/ /'jigs byed gdong ni mche ba 'byin/ /rnam par 'gyur ba'i
gzugs 'dzin pa'o/ /sgo srung gi ni phyogs kun tu/ /sgo bzhi rnams su gzhag bya ba/ /byang gi phyogs su 'bod 'grogs te/ /bum pa'i rna ni shar nyid du/ /nub tu
rnam par 'jig pa'o/ /lhor ni gshin rje rgyal po gzhag /de dang gzhan yang rgyal po mchog /nam mkhar 'gro bas kun tu bskor/ /bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs
te| |gser dang dngul las byas pa la/ /sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris/ /me tog 'bras bu rnams kyis brgyan/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis gang byas pa/ /sman lnga
dang ni yang dag ldan/ /rin chen lnga dang ldan byas pa/ /'bru rnams lnga yis brgyan byas pa'i/ /bum pa bcu drug bzhag byas te/ /bcu gnyis brgyad dam yang na phyed/ /
tha na chung du gcig tsam yang / /ji ltar rim bzhin bzhag byas te/ /dbus su bum pa ro yi mchog /dam tshig chus ni gang byas pa/ /gser ram dngul lam zangs kyang
rung / /lcags sam sa las byas pa la/ /zla ba nyi ma dri chu dang / /btung bsnum por ldan pa yi/ /dbang po kun las 'byung ba rnams/ /sha srang gcig gis rab bsres
pa| |kun las 'phags pa ro yi mchog /tshogs kyi dbus su bsgrub byas te/ /btung ba bzhin du myangs pa yis/ /rdo rje blo ldan bskal par gnas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs nye ba'i
zas/ /bza' ba dang ni bca' bas mchod/ /mchod pa nye ba'i zas lnga dang / /tshad med 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas/ /tshad med rnal 'byor ma tshogs la/ /skad cig skad cig mchod
par bya/ /sngags mkhan tshul bzhin mnyam gzhag ste/ /'byung po rnams la gtor ma byin/ /lha rnams kyi ni thams cad la/ /he ru ka yi phyag rgya yis/ /nyid kyi gtor ma
byin brlabs te/ /spyan drangs gtsang sbra byas pa dbul/ /gzungs kyi tshogs ni de rnams la/ /mnyes pa byas nas slar gshegs so/ /rnal 'byor ma chen dkyil 'khor du/ /
slob ma'i mchog ni gzhugs par bya/ /mtshungs par spyod pa rab mdzes ma/ /sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris/ /lag pa g.yon gyis bzung byas te/ /rab dgyes longs spyod
phyag rgya yis/ /bcug nas sgo yis grwa nyid du/ /blo ldan dam tshig bsgrag par bya/ /'di las mi bya cung zad med/ /thabs dang shes rab sems nyid kyis/ /rtag tu dogs pa
med byas te/ /'dod pa lnga yi yon tan spyod/ /gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa dang / /skye bo gang dag dam la gnon/ /brtul zhugs khyod kyis de drangs te/ /khrag chen po ni btung
@#/ /par bya/ /gang dag slob dpon smod byed dang / /gang dag bka' rnams mi byed pa/ /de dag khros nas khrag chen po/ /blo ldan snying las btung bar bya/ /
dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang / /slob dpon la yang gnod byed pa/ /rdo rje khro bo'i bsdus pa yi/ /dam tshig bsgoms te bsgral bar bya/ /de nas dam tshig blud byas
te| |rdo rje bdud rtsi ro yi mchog /dung chen por ni bzhag par bya/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu blud do/ /kye| dmyal ba yi ni chu 'di skye/ /khyod kyi snying la kun tu gnas/ /dam tshig bsrungs
pas dngos grub ster/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'di 'thung / /oM badzra u da ka hUM Tha/ /dam tshig 'di ni brgyar bzlas pa'i/ /byin gyis brlabs te 'thung du gzhug /gzhan du dam
tshig mi 'gyur te/ /dngos grub nyid du'ang 'di 'gyur ro/ /bdag ni dam tshig skal dga' zhes/ /slob ma sngags ni brjod du gzhug /sgo grwar gnas nas bri bya ba/ /kye khyod dga'
ba ci la dang / /'jug pa yis kyang smra bya ba/ /bdag ni skal ldan bde mchog la/ /rab dgyes 'phrul la bdag dga' ste/ /mchog tu dga' la bdag dga'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor
ma mchog gis/ /dkyil du me tog bor byas te/ /me tog gang la lhung pa yi/ /lha nyid du ni dngos grub bo/ /dbang bskur ba yi phyag rgya yis/ /de nas spyi bor dbang bskur bya/ /bum
pa rnam pa bzhi yis kyang / /mnyam par gzhag ste lnga po yis/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor zhugs byas te/ /de nas yang ni dbang bskur bya/ /ci rigs par ni gzungs ma'i rnams//
bdag nyid skal ldan zhes su smra/ /gang dag 'gro bar gyur pa yi/ /lha de nyid ni bstan par bya/ /dga' bar byed pa'i gzungs ma de'i/ /khyod kyis rtag tu sgrub par gyis/ /de
nas rgyal dbang slob ma de/ /nang gi was ba bsdus pa yi/ /gsang ba mnyam par 'jug pa yis/ /sbyor dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya/ /rdo rje pad+mo las drangs pa/ /sbom po dang
ni dbang gis blangs/ /rdo rje dkan du bzhag byas nas/ /rtag pa dge ba bde ba che/ /kye ma'o dam tshig bde brjod cing / /kye ma bde ba blang bar bya/ /'di ni gsang ba zhes bya ste/ /dbang
bskur ba yi thabs mchog go /rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid che'i/ /rang gi khar ni rdo rje bzhag /sems dpa' chen po drangs byas na/ /sems kyis byang chub bde ba 'thob/ /'di ni
mchog tu gsang ba ste/ /dbang bskur ba yi bde ba'o/ /slob ma mi shes pa rnams la/ /'di dag thams cad bsgrag mi bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ba/ /yang nas yang du brtag
par bya/ /'di yis dbang ni bskur ma thag /slob ma tshogs kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /slob dpon nyid du bde bar 'gyur/ /gzungs ma rnams kyi dga'
@#/ /pa'i bdag /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjer bshad do/ /mkha' la 'gro ba'i khyor 'gyur te/ /ri dang 'gro ba kun gyi bdag /de nas shes rab ye
shes dbang / /slob ma mchog la sbyin par bya/ /gzungs ma de ni bdag nyid la/ /bla ma nyid kyis byin brlabs te/ /dngos grub 'bras bu myur 'thob phyir/ /slob ma la ni
sbyin par bya/ /dbang bskur shin tu sbas pa yis/ /rdo rje slob dpon tshul ji bzhin/ /blo ldan the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /rnam pa bzhi po 'di sbyin no/ /de tshun chad ni slob ma la//
rgyud kun las ni gang cung zad/ /yi ge'i tshul gyis sbas pa rnams/ /gsang ba mchog ni bstan par bya/ /de nas de nyid langs byas te/ /slob dpon rkang par gtugs
byas nas/ /rgyal po dbang phyug bde dam pa/ /thams cad yon ni dbul bar bya/ /gzungs de dag ni thams cad la/ /ci dga' bar ni yon yang 'bul/ /slob dpon cung
zad gang 'dod pa/ /yid la bsams pa'i yon yang rung / /dam tshig 'das pas 'jigs pa yis/ /de dag thams cad dbul bar bya/ /slob dpon la ni yon gyi mchog/
rigs kyi khyab par dbul byas te/ /seng ge'i gdan la nyid kyis ma/ /sangs rgyas byin ni yon mchog yin/ /glang po rin chen gser dag dang / /sring mo bla ma'i yon mchog
yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs yin te/ /yon de mchog gi yon yin no/ /rin chen pad+mo'i chung ma dang / /shing rta rta ni shin tu brgyan/ /sna tshogs rin chen rnam dag pa/ /mu tig phreng
bas shin tu mdzes/ /bu mo rin chen dra ba yis/ /brgyan te sna tshogs rdo rje la'o/ /rgyal po yi ni dbang phyug dang / /chung ma bla ma dbul bar bya/ /'phrul gyi bzhon pa sna tshogs pa/ /glang
po rta ni shin tu brgyan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rje/ /nan tan bla ma dbul bar bya/ /bla ma'i yon gyi phyag rgya 'di/ /rdo rje blo ldan slob ma yis/ /ci ste bde byed kun 'dod
na| |dga' dang mos pa'i sems kyis bya/ /de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rab dgyes gdon mi za ba'i bde/ /gang gis myur du 'thob 'gyur te/ /slob dpon gtso mchog
nyid du 'gyur/ /chos rnams kun gyis dbang phyug rgyal/ /rdo rje blo ldan mchog tu gyur/ /rin chen kun gyi rigs kyi rgyal/ /de bzhin sna tshogs rigs kun tu/ /pad+mo'i rigs
kun dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje rigs kun bdag por de/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rigs kun dang / /rgyal ba'i gtso bo mchog tu 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lo'i gar/ /nyid dang
slob ma'i tshogs gyur pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya/ /phan tshun la sogs tshul gyis ni/ /shes rab mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis//
@#/ /rdo rje che yi thabs gnas te/ /mkha' 'gro kun la mchod par bya/ /phyi yi sbas pa gsang la sogs/ /nang gi mchod pa mchog gi rnams/ /phyag rgya'i
sbyor ba tshul gnas te/ /tshul bzhin rgyas pa dbul bar bya/ /lus dang ngag sems bde byed kyis/ /mchod pa'i bdag nyid mchod par bya/ /'dod pa'i rol pa myong ba yi//
myangs na mchod pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /mchod pa kun gyi cho ga yis/ /rang rig khyad par shes byas te/ /sgrub pa thams cad bsgrubs byas nas/ /dngos grub thams cad myur
du 'thob/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'di mthong bas/ /dga' mgu rangs pa'i yid kyis ni/ /rdo rje sems la phyag byed cing / /rang gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba 'debs/ /bde byed
chen po'i dkyil mo brgya/ /rigs kyi khyad par gyis ni lnga/ /lha rnams kyang ni re re yang / /sems kyi khyad par mchog mtha' yas/ /'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba/ /mtha'
yas chos ni yangs pa bstan/ /'dod chags rnams kyis dkris pa yi/ /sdug bsngal gzir ba'i mtha' nas 'gro/ /'dod pa'i mchog gi longs spyod rnams/ /mos
pa'i rjes su zhugs shing spyod/ /kun tu chags par mi 'gyur zhing / /bde bas langs pa'i yid dang ldan/ /byang chub snying por bgrod pa ni/ /dam bcas rnams dang sems kyis
so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po/ rab tu bzhad cing spyan zur gyis gzigs pa'i thugs kyis shin tu dgyes pa
kun tu longs spyod pa'i skyil mo krung gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ skyil mo krung chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba rang gi phyag rgya'i ye shes
kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // //g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni/ /rkang pa gnyis ka bteg byas te/ /bdag nyid brla ni mi snang
bzhin/ /rtsa ba skyil mo bcing bar bya/ /sbyor ba gar mkhan tshul gyis ni/ /gar gyi sbyor bas gar bya'o/ /rdo rje gdan gyi bde ba chen/ /'di yis bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur//
gdug pa dang ni dgra thams cad/ /skad cig gis kyang smos ci dgos/ /rab tu dgyes pa'i stan 'di yis/ /yang dag byang chub myur du thob/ /mi phyed pa ni thig ler
bcas/ /'og gi phyogs su yi ge drug /shes rab can gyis bskyod cing bzlas/ /byung ba'i tshe na phaT ces bshad/ /pad+mo mi phyed 'dren pa dang / /thig ler bcas pa
sbyor bar bya/ /mi phyed oM dang yang dag ldan/ /tsheg drag bcas pa bde 'byung na'o/ /bud med la ni zhag bdun du/ /'di yis rtsen par byas pa na/ /nam mkha' thams
@#/ /cad gang ba yi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor chen po mthong / /rab dgyes longs spyod gnas pa yi/ /sems dpa' che la slong mdzad de/ /gzungs kyi
pad+mo las byung ba/ /bde byed mchog gi dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rab dga' bde thob pa/ /sems dpa' de ni dngos grub bo/ /thog ma dang ni mtha' med par/ /'dod pa thams
cad de longs spyod/ /tshe dang dpal dang phun sum ldan/ /gdon dang dug dang tsha ba'i nad/ /mkha' 'gros nye bar gtses pa dang / /sdig can 'khor ba las grol te/ /sa
rnams kun la rnam par rgyu/ /gzi brjid nyi ma shar dang 'dra/ /sna tshogs 'dra ba 'bar byed pas/ /sna tshogs thams cad snang byed cing / /de yi sems can thams cad
kyi| |nad dang mya ngan 'jigs chen 'phrog /phyag rgya 'di yis sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes lnga ni bsten par bya/ /rtse ba'i skyil mo krung zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen po'i las kyi don
thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// //bdag gi rkang pa dbus su bsdu/ /de yi rkang pas bcings byas te/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo bzhin du 'brel/ /'di ni
bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /khams gsum sgrub par bzhed pa yin/ /yi ge rnams ni snga ma bzhin/ /rang gi lhar ni sbyor brtson pas/ /bsgoms sam yang na bskyod
kyang rung / /sngags pa 'di yis dngos grub ste/ /sngags kyi sems 'dzin gtsang ma yi/ /zhag bdun sgom pa bsgoms byas nas/ /yang dag dngos grub nyid du 'gyur/ /phyag rgya
'di yis rgyas btab ste/ /sbyor ba shin tu bsten byas nas/ /gdon mi za bar rgyal po 'thob/ /yid bzhin dgos pa thams cad byed/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung ngo / /gzungs
ma bzung ste bcing ba ni/ /rin po che ltar sbyar byas te/ /rang gi rkang pa mi snang bya/ /rin chen kun gyi skyil mo krung / /'di ni rin chen thams cad kyi/ /dbul zhing phongs pa 'joms
byed de/ /sdig pa thams cad 'phrog byed ma/ /gnod pa'i dug kun 'phrog par byed/ /gdug pa thams cad rmongs byed de/ /dgra rnams thams cad 'joms par byed/ /khro bo
thams cad 'dzum byed de/ /gdug pa rnams kyi rgyas 'debs na/ /mi g.yeng zla ba gcig gis ni/ /'di yis rgyal po dngos grub bo/ /yid bzhin las rnams thams cad byed//
ci ste bdag nyid rgyal po ru/ /mchog tu rmad 'byung sgrub 'dod na/ /rin chen sems kyi rin chen mtshan/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya tshul gnon pa/ /rgyal po khams gsum rgyal
byed pa/ /zla phyed tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /rin po che yi skyil mo'o/ /de bzhin rkang pa gnyis bzhag pa/ /pad+mo 'dra bar sbyar byas te/ /bdag gam de bzhin gzhan yang
@#/ /rung / /blo ldan pad+mo bde bsgrub bya/ /'di yis sems can thams cad dang / /mdor na sangs rgyas rnams dag dang / /rdo rje nyi ma ma lus kyang / /dbang
du 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /bde ldan pho brang chen po yis/ /bde byed 'di yis 'thob par byed/ /sems can khams rnams thams cad du/ /sems dpa' chen po 'gro
'ong byed/ /pad+mo'i skyil mo'o/ /de bzhin skyil mo rgyas byas te/ /sna tshogs tshul gyis sbyor ba bya/ /sngags mkhan chen po'i sbyor ba yin/ /sngags mkhan yi ge shin
tu brtson/ /zlos pa byed cing rnam bsgoms na/ /dngos grub rtag pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /mi g.yeng sngon gyi gdug pa yi/ /las rnams thams cad 'phrog par byed//
sna tshogs skyil du gnas pa yis/ /bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /sna tshogs kyi ni skyil mo'o/ /de nas mkha' 'gro ma'i skyil mo rgyas/ /thams cad khrag ni 'phrog
byas te/ /gzungs ma yi ni rkang pa gnyis/ /yid kyi gnya' bar rkang pa bteg /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba yis/ /bsnyen pas khrag rnams 'phrog par byed/ /mnyam
par bzhag nas gzungs ma yi/ /rkang pa gcig ni mgul nyid du/ /sbyor dang ldan pas bteg byas na/ /zas rnams thams cad 'phrog byed de/ /btung dang bza' ba bca'
ba dang / /gos kyi rgyan gyis klubs pa yis/ /de bzhin zhag bdun nyid kyis kyang / /thams cad las byed gdon mi za/ /tshangs pa gtogs 'dod dbang po yi/ /dpal chen
mchog ni 'phrog par byed/ /lag pa sgreng ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /khams gsum rim pa rgal bar byed/ /mig ni btsums par byed 'gyur ba/ /'gro ba gsum po rnam par
'jig /rus sbal bzhin du mnyam gzhag ste/ /mi g.yeng skad cig bcing byas na/ /gdug pa'i srog chags thams cad dang / /dgra dang spyod bcas mi spyod phrog /sbal
pa bzhin du mnyam gzhag ste/ /dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bskor bar bya'o/ /ma lus rnams kyang rmongs byed de/ /khams gsum rnams kyang rgal bar byed/ /gtogs 'dod
kyi ni mnyam gzhag ste/ /sa gsum rnams kyi rgyas gdab bya/ /gar dbang gi ni mnyam gzhag ste/ /sa gsum rnams ni gar byed gzhug /dril bu yi ni mnyam gzhag
ste| |sa gsum rnams ni gdab par bya/ /gzhon nu'i skyil mo bcings pa yis/ /sangs rgyas bde chen 'thob par byed/ /skyil mo phyed na mnyam gzhag nas/ /gnyis pa
yis ni mnan byas na/ /khams gsum thams cad gnon 'gyur zhing / /'dod byed thams cad dngos grub bo/ /dga' byed ma yi mnyam gzhag pas/ /skyil mo rab tu
@#/ /dga' thob ste/ /dga' byed ma yi yid 'ong ma/ /khams gsum thams cad dngos grub bo/ /rig 'dzin rnam par gzhag byas te/ /khams gsum
skad cig mnan par bya// //khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /mdor 'dus gzungs ma'i bcings pa yis/ /'jig rten gsum ni rnam rgyal te/ /skad cig khams
gsum bdag por 'gyur/ /rtag par phan tshun 'brel ba yis/ /dpung pa gnyis ni bskum byas te/ /thams cad sgo ni 'gegs pa yis/ /mche ba sbom po rab tu sbyar//
g.yas kyi brkyang bskum tshul gyis ni/ /gnon pa'i mnan pas bsdigs byas te/ /mi phyed sbyor bas bskul bya ba/ /khros pa'i sems kyis myang bar bya/ /g.yon pa'i
brkyang bskum sbyar bar bya/ /myur du mnan pas bteg bya zhing / /mthe'u chung bde ba'i lcags kyu yis/ /mdzub mo lce la reg byas te/ /sa bon tsheg drag hrI ldan pa'i//
thig le'i spyi bor brgyan byas pas/ /bdud rtsi'am rig ma drang bar bya/ /lce yi thog mar spro byas te/ /'dren pa'i tshul gyis drang bar bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam gzhag
ste| |kha yi phyogs su mche ba yis/ /sbom po lce dang 'dra byas te/ /khros pa mche ba sbyor ba yis/ /sor mo thod pa bzhin byas nas/ /khrag mang po ni btung bar bya/ /yi ge dang
po oM dang ldan/ /spyi bor thig le ldan byas te/ /'og gi phyogs su ra yis gdags/ /u 'dren pa ros brgyan par bya/ /'di ni kho bo'i snying po ste/ /mchog tu thams cad las byed
pa'o| |gsod pa dang ni 'dren pa kun/ /dbang dang dbang rnams byed la sogs/ /de la sogs pa'i las gzhan yang / /tshul bzhin sbyar bas byed par 'gyur/ /shi ba bzhin du
mig btsums nas/ /rang gi lus ni bskum byas te/ /bum pa lnga mtha'i sbyor ba yi/ /dgra rnams thams cad gsad par bya/ /nga ro dang po yang dag ldan/ /bdag nyid ngo bo thams
cad bya/ /sangs rgyas chen po bsgoms byas te/ /zhi ba'i 'od zer sprin phung spro/ /de yi lus ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /de yi sems can thams cad kyi/ /tsha ba gdon dang dug la sogs//
sdug bsngal mkha' 'gro'i mche ba dang / /'jigs pa thams cad bral bar byed/ /shes rab pha rol phyin mnyam gzhag /bdag nyid kyis ni tshul bzhin du/ /'di yis
thams cad nang gi rnams/ /sdug bsngal dogs par 'phrog par byed/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa/ /nam mkha' sa steng las kyi rnams/ /snying gar rdo rje sems dpa'
bzhag /yid bzhin thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /myur du rdo rje slob dpon la/ /sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas/ /gus la zhes sar bcas pa yi/ /shin tu lhag pa
@#/ /phyogs par bya/ /nam yang rdo rje slob dpon gyi/ /sems ni dkrug par mi bya ste/ /ci ste shes rab 'chal phas byed/ /myur du na raka lhung bar 'gyur/ /
nad dang 'tshe ba dgra dag dang / /gdon dang tsha ba dug nyid kyis/ /slob dpon zhabs la smod byed pa/ /gti mug chen por de 'chi'o/ /bla ma las ni dngos grub 'thob/ /bla ma
mtho ris bla ma bde/ /de bas nan tan thams cad kyi/ /bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag
po kun tu bzang po chen po dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje dam tshig
dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje mchog gsang ba sbas pa chen po zla gsang
thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor te bzhi pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor pha dang / rnal 'byor ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs dang
rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi g.yog rnams mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes te/ ca co 'byin cing dbyangs chen po brjod par gyur
to| |kye ma'o rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che/ /sna tshogs thabs ni bde byed che/ /sna tshogs ye shes bde ba che/ /kye ma kun tu bzang po yi/ /dge ba'i ye
shes bde ba che/ /gang bde phyir ni rig ma yi/ /pad+mo las ni gnas pa mdzad/ /kye ma'o rig pa shin tu zab/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa bde/ /sems can kun la shes rab
kyi| |mun pa'i thibs po sel bar mdzad/ /kye ma'o thams cad ngo mtshar che/ /mkha' 'gro'i dra bas gar mdzad cing / /snom par mdzad dang myang ba dang / /mnye ba dang ni
'phrog pa'i mchog /e ma'o shin tu rab tu dgyes/ /skal ldan skal la sprod pa dang / /sna tshogs skal bas bde byed che/ /sna tshogs rdo rje shin tu mdzes/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun tu longs spyod pa'i 'dod pa'i lha shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po la gnas pa la rnal 'byor ma
thams cad dang / mchog gi pha rol phyin ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo thams cad rang gi gdan las bzhengs te/ shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen
@#/ /po'i 'gying ba'i 'dud pas phyag byas te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba 'thob par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya chen po 'dis mnyes
bar byed do/ /sgyu ma'i bde bas nam mkha' kun tu gang ba yi/ /sprul pa'i rang bzhin skye ba mchog gi bde bsten te/ /rjes su chags pa'i pad+ma dga' bas kun khyab
cing / /chos kyi bde ba nyid kyang kun tu btang snyoms mdzad/ /e ma'o/ /'di lta'i gzugs ma bde mchog dpal dang rnam ldan ma/ /byams ma'i phyogs su mi gtong ye shes
nyid kyis 'jug /'dod pa'i yon tan 'di rnams chos nyid rnam par dag /dug gsum dbang du mdzad cing mos pa rnams mi bskyod/ /ngo mtshar phyogs dang ma bral byang
chub snying por bgrod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan rgyas pas 'khor de dag thams cad la yud tsam kun tu gzigs te/ rdo rje
pad+mo dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dpal chen mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te cang mi gsung bar mnyam par zhugs te/ dbugs mi rdub/
dbugs mi byin/ dbugs rab tu gtong bar mi mdzad/ /kun tu mi gzigs/ kun tu rnam par mi gzigs/ bzhengs par mi mdzad/ bzhugs par mi mdzad/ gshegs
par mi mdzad/ gsung bar yang mi mdzad/ rnam par rtog pa'ang mi mdzad/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shin tu bde ba chen pos nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad shin tu
khyab par shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba las btsal te rgyas par mdzad pa na/ der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad drangs bcug bcings dbang du byas te/ 'dod pa lnga'i
yon tan gyis mnyes par byas te bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas/ yang nas yang bcom ldan 'das
la gzigs te/ bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa dang / gnyis su med par longs spyod pa dpal chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bskul nas bcom
ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems chen po la'ang thim par gyur pa na/ khams gsum 'dir dam pa'i chos ston pa dang / 'jug par byed/ bstan pa la
gnas par byed pa 'ga' yang med/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun 'jug par byed pa'ang med/ khros pa dang / gtum po chen po dang / rngam pa dang / rab tu gdug pa
chen por sems pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mun pas bsgribs pa dang / gtum 'khrug chen po dang / gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa dang / gzhan gyi sems
@#/ /'phrog pa dang / gzhan gyi bud med kyis 'chums pa dang / chig rtsub mo la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pas gzhan la gtses
pa dang / gcig gi sha gcig gis za ba dang / thabs med pa'i lam la gnas pa rnams kyis/ kye ma'o/ /'jig rten gsum po 'di brlag go /zhes sngon gyi smon lam las kyi
stobs la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gzigs so/ /thabs dang / shes rab kyi thugs rje'i smon lam chen po nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu yang dag par
gnas pa 'di lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu brlag par gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i
bde ba yang dag par zhugs pa kun tu bzang po chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis bskul ba mdzad do/ /hoHrang bzhin dag pa dag pa
pad+ma bde ba'i mchog mnga' ba/ /thugs kyi yid bzhin rin chen gzhan la dgongs nas bzhengs mdzad de/ /bskal pa mtha' nas bsgrubs pa'i byams pas gzugs
kyis brjid pa dang / /byang chub snying po'i chu des 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin khrus/ /a la la la ho/ pad+mo'i 'byung gnas bde gshegs kun gyi skal ba mchog dang ldan/ /sdug
bsngal nad kun sel ba'i thugs rjes 'jig rten gsum la gzigs/ /dga' ba'i rol pas gar dang bcas te bzhengs shing dbang du mdzod/ /a la la la ho/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams
kyis ma bsgrags gsang ba yi/ /'gro ba kun gyi yid dang 'thad pa'i gsang chen 'di phyung ste/ /rnam dag spyod yul gzhan gyi mi 'phrogs nam mkha' la/ /dngos med rol mo'i
gzhan las 'phang pa bzhengs shing mdzad du gsol/ /a la la la ho/ skad cig ma yi spyod yul 'dis/ /mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir/ /gzhan la thugs rjes
dgongs nas su/ /lha rnams byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /dgyes mchog dam pa bskul byas na/ /pad+mo dra ba rdo rje dang / /bde bar sbyor bar
bzhengs su gsol/ /bde ba chen po bde gnas pa/ /gtso la 'di yis bskul ba yis/ /sems can kun don bzhengs 'gyur te/ /rgyal ba thams cad gdon par mdzad/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje 'dzin yang dag pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba chen pos brgyan pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs te/ bzhengs nas phyogs bcu mtha' yas rab 'byams mthas klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun gzigs nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ kye ma'o khams gsum
@#/ /'di stongs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams dang bral bas gdug pa thams cad kyis 'di dag nye bar gtses/ /gnod
sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dang / nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gdon chen po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par zos zhes dgongs pa na/
bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gtong ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi bde ba chen po dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi
sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes bde ba chen po'i rang gi rdo rje dang / pad+mo las byang chub kyi sems nye bar bsdu bar bya ste/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las
phyung ngo // //thog mar oM ni thig ler bsam byas pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bcas pa 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa/ /mi phyed 'dren pa yang dag gnyis dang ldan pa
ste| |'di ni ston pa'i mchog ste rdo rje'i rigs nyid do/ /phyung nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du gang ba'i spro bas snang bar byas te/ slar yang 'dus nas rdo rje lta bur gnas
so| |yang spro ba dang / bsdu ba byas nas slar 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur gyur nas/ shar gyi
dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs par gyur pa na/ hUM hUM hUM zhes bzhad pa chen por bzhad cing a zhes brjod nas bzhugs te/ rang gi sems dpa'i skyil mos g.yon du yid tsam
'gying bas 'dud pa/ g.yas kyi rdo rje gsor zhing 'dzum dang bcas shing spyan rgyas pa/ che ba'i chen po dbu lnga pa/ /phyag ni bcu drug rnams dang ldan/ /sna tshogs sku ni mchog 'dzin
pa| |dpa' bo thams cad las byed pa/ /kha dog rnam lnga gzi brjid che/ /mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin/ /rdo rje sgyur mar rab tu gnas/ /mkhas pa gang gis snying ga nyid/ /
mnyam par bzhag ste 'dzin byas na/ /rdo rje pad+mo bde che yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde myur 'thob/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkhar 'gro ma kun longs spyod pa'i dpal
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zla gsang thig
le las/ nam mkha' shin tu dgyes pa 'thob par byed pa'i bde ba chen po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo // //oM yig gtsug
tu thig le ste/ /mi phyed thig ler bcas pa yi/ /'og tu gzi brjid yang dag bcas/ /mthar ni dral te chog drag bcas/ /'dir ni rin chen thams cad kyi/ /snying po mchog tu rmad byung
@#/ /ba'o/ /phyung ba yis ni nam mkha' dang / /sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun tu/ /'od zer sprin phung rgyas byas te/ /slar yang de nyid bzhugs par 'gyur/ /de yi thugs
kar zhugs nas kyang / /brda yi tshul gyis bzhugs par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur nas/ /sems dpa'i tshul gyis sprul pa ni/ /kha dog rnam lnga yangs pa'i
spyan/ /chu skyes bzhad pa 'dzum dang bcas/ /nyi ma'i gzi brjid mdzes pa che/ /phyag rgya la sogs sna tshogs brgyan/ /skyil mo 'gying ba g.yon du 'dud/ /g.yas kyi snying
gar rin chen 'dzin/ /brgyad gnyis phyag rgya ngo bo yis/ /dri ma gsum spangs brgyan pa ste/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor gang byas nas/ /sna tshogs lho ru gnas par 'gyur//
rnam pa kun mkhyen mngon rig pa'i/ /nad kyis glongs pa 'jigs par 'gyur/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gzi brjid chen mo mdangs che ba/ /dbul dang
nad dang gdon chen po/ /sems can kun gyi 'phrog par byed/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i dus nyid dang / /nyi ma phyed pa'i dus nyid du/ /nyid kyi snying gar 'di byas te/ /nor bu rin
chen bsgoms byas na/ /zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang / /dngos grub nor mang sbyin mdzad de/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /kye ma'o bde bas dbang bskur bya//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po mchog tu bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa'i 'dod ba'i dbang gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad+mo chen po kun tu gzigs pa'i longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i snying po chen po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi ye shes mchog tu gsang
bzla gsang thig le las 'di phyung ngo // //dang por oM dang ldan byas te/ /mi phyed rab btags 'dren pa bcas/ /tsheg drag pa ni sngags yin te/ /bsam pa thams
cad yongs su bskor/ /sngags mkhan gang gis mnyam gzhag ste/ /snying gar 'di ni sbyar byas nas/ /bdag ni 'dod chags zhen sems shing / /pad+mo sbyar bas bsgom par bya//
mtshams kyi mtha' ma dus dag tu/ /dam tshig 'di ni spyad byas na/ /zla ba phyed kyi nang logs su/ /dbang phyug mo ni dngos grub 'thob/ /pad+mo che las byung nas kyang / /thams cad du ni
rgyas 'gyur te/ /'di nyid du ni slar zhugs nas/ /pad+mo'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur/ /kun tu snang bas khyab byas nas/ /sems dpa'i tshul gyis sprul pa ni/ /de nas 'dod chags
babs nas kyang / /pad+mo'i dbus su zhugs par gyur/ /dkyil 'khor du ni gang ba yis/ /rgyab nas rjes su mnyes mdzad cing / /'dzum bcas pad+mo phye ba yis/ /thugs kyi dbus
@#/ /su yid tsam 'dud/ /dpal dang ldan pa zhal lnga 'dzin/ /phyag ni nyi shur bzhis ma gtams/ /mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs ldan/ /sna tshogs rgyan
gyis klubs pa yis/ /zla ba bzhin du rnam grol ba/ /brjid pas gar ni mdzad cing bzhugs/ /'di yis pad+mo'i gnas nyid du/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur/ /dpal
ldan gar dbang thob 'gyur te/ /'dod chags kun gyi thabs gnas pas/ /'jam pa'i phyag ni stong rnams kyis/ /gar du mdzad cing 'gro ba 'dul/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po kun tu bzang pos yang sna tshogs chen po kun tu longs spyod pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i ye shes mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le chen po las phyung ngo // //sna tshogs chen po
o chen po/ /steng du thig ler yang dag ldan/ /'di ni dbus te lta 'og khro/ /sngags kyi mchog ni gzhag par bya/ /sna tshogs 'di ni thugs kar grags/ /sna tshogs
phyung nas kun snang bas/ /sangs rgyas tshul bzhin kun mnyes byas/ /de nyid slar 'khor rab bzhugs te/ /sna tshogs rdo rje gzugs mchog gnas/ /skad cig sems
dpa' sku gnas pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bzhad pas brgyan/ /'gying bcas thugs kar sna tshogs 'dzin/ /sna tshogs gzi brjid 'bar ba gtong / /phyag ni brgyad gnyis gnyis
kyis phyogs/ /kha byed sna tshogs mtshon cha gtong / /zhal lnga sna tshogs yangs che ba/ /bgegs spong thams cad dngos grub mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor gang bar bzhag nas byang
du gnas/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bdag mor rdo rje yang dag gis/ /thugs kar mdzad nas bde bar yang dag gnas/ /sngags mkhan zhag bdun nyid du bsgom byas na/ /sna tshogs gyur
te sna tshogs de la bab/ /sna tshogs las ni sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dbyangs chen
po len cing dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das la mnyes pa mdzad do/ /gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ /ye shes lnga yi ngo bo dag /rgyal ba nyid kyis
bshad par mdzod/ /sangs rgyas sku la bstod phyag 'tshal/ /sngags rigs phyag rgya yan lag bcas/ /lha yi de nyid pha rol phyin/ /bdag ni de nyid sna tshogs che/ /sna tshogs
ye shes bstod phyag 'tshal/ /gzungs kyi pad+mo yang dag ldan/ /'dod byed thugs kyi mchog yin te/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba'i ye shes bstod phyag 'tshal/ /
@#/ /chos kyi don ni gnyis med tshul/ /stong pa nyid kyi lam rig pa/ /yangs pa'i spyan ni so sor gzigs/ /me long ye shes yang dag 'byung / /bya ba nan
tan sems can don/ /rang gi yon tan mi mnyam shod/ /de nyid rig pas sems can kun/ /rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlabs pa/ /gang gis byin gyis brlabs ma thag /sangs
rgyas gsum ni dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'bru 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo / /oM b+h+ruM/ stong pa
chen po'i snying po'o/ /oM badzra tsit+ta hUM/ oM badzra kA ya oM/ oM badzra wA ka AHoM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ oM badzra sa ma ya hoHde nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad shin tu mgu/ rab tu dgyes pa'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rang
rang gi snying po bcom ldan 'das la 'bul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dge'o zhes bde ba chen po'i
tshul gyis rab tu spro bar mdzad do/ /dge'o dge'o rgyal ba kun/ /dge'o dge'o rgyal ba mchog /dge'o dge'o legs pa'i las/ /dge'o dge'o sngon 'gro ba/ /dge'o dge'o sna
tshogs che/ /nyid kyi snying gar drangs byas te/ /rang gi gsang ba bshad par mdzod/ /gang gis ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams/ /bde ba'i yid ni chud par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje chen po de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na

badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das me long gi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba
ta thA ga ta a de ra Sha dz+nyA na badzra sa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa so sor kun tu gzigs pa'i ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku

dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta mahA pra t+ya pra pa k+Sha dz+nyA na badzra swA b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje de

bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA sa man+tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
@#/ /bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sarba ta thA ga kr-i t+ya
a nu Sh+Tha na dz+nyA na badzra swA b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos yang dge ba'i tshul sbyin par mdzad de/ oM| dge'o dge'o stong pa che/ /
oM| dge'o dge'o thugs chen po/ /oM| dge'o dge'o sku chen po/ /oM| dge'o dge'o gsung chen po/ /oM| dge'o dge'o rin po che'o/ /dge'o dge'o sna tshogs che/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das la rang gi dkyil 'khor bshad par gsol ba 'debs te/ dkyil 'khor
sangs rgyas rdo rje yi/ /dga' byed bcom ldan nyid kyis shod/ /gang gis sems can bde nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor rab tu thob par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes
bgyi ba/ /rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsang ba gsungs/ /gang gis dkyil 'khor myur bris nas/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyan du 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor bde ba'i gzhi nyid ni/ /gsang
ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor brgyan pa'i bdag nyid de/ /gsang ba bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ye shes ni/ /dkyil 'khor snying
po zhes bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni ci rigs par/ /gtso bo chen po nyid kyis shod/ /dkyil 'khor mi mnyam ye shes ni/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba pad+mo ste/ /dkyil 'khor rab
dgyes 'thob byed pa'i/ /tshad med dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i 'byung gnas
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung
ngo / /gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa yi/ /bu mo mig yangs bzung bya ste/ /shes rab can gyis byin rlabs 'brus/ /mnyam par gzhag ste byin brlabs nas/ /shes rab
pha rol phyin pa'i bdag /de bzhin gshegs kyi btsun mo bzhag /gnyis po mdun du bzhag byas pa/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i
btsun mo ste/ /thugs ni dgyes par byed pa yin/ /gsum pa lho ru bsam bya ba/ /dge ba sbyin pa'i bdag nyid bzhag /rin chen 'byung ldan btsun mo che/ /dbang
bskur yon tan 'thob byed pa'o/ /bzhi pa tshul khrims chen mo ste/ /de nyid chos don yang dag gnas/ /rdo rje chos kyi btsun mo ste/ /de sbyin dga' byed ma yin no/ /
@#/ /bzod pa chen mo byang du ste/ /bsod pa'i bdag nyid zad pa sbyin/ /btsun mo rdo rje gdon mi za/ /dam tshig gnas ni skyong byed ma'i/ /grwa dag
tu ni thams cad du/ /snga ma bzhin du mchod la sogs/ /sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /sgo srung rnams ni rnam par bzhi/ /ci 'dod par ni mchod bya ste/ /slob ma mchog ni
gzhug par bya/ /phyag rgyas lag pa brgyan byas te/ /'dzum dang bcas pa'i 'dod chags mig /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par klubs/ /spro ba che bas gar bya zhing / /lha yi 'gying
ba'i 'dun pa yis/ /dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya/ /mig ni dar gyi gos nyid kyis/ /g.yogs te lag pas bzung nas kyang / /sgo yi grwa ra yang gzhag
bya ste/ /smon lam mchog ni smra ru gzhug /rdo rje chen po bdag ces bgyi/ /rang gi lha rnams phyag bgyi ste/ /rang dgyes gnas las byung ba yi/ /bde byed
chen mos mnyes par bgyi/ /ji ltar bzhin du mnyam nyid 'thob/ /me tog phreng ba dor byas te/ /lha mo chen mo bzhes su gsol/ /khyod kyi dkyil 'khor bdag
'tshal lo/ /lha mo gang la lhung ba yi/ /de yi lag nas bskor ba bya/ /lha mo 'di ni khyod dang mthun/ /sems che khyod kyis 'dod par gyis/ /de nas slob ma de yis ni/ /bdag
rab dgyes smra bya zhing / /de la 'dod pa spyad par mdzod/ /khro bo rnams kyi mi phyed phaDa/ /mtha' ni hoHzhes sbyar bar bya/ /'byung ba'i dus su bya ba ni/ /a ho su kha bde zhes smra/ /
nas rdo rje phyung ba yi/ /mkhas pas de ni blang byas te/ /bde ba chen po dngos grub rdzas/ /bla ma la ni dang por dbul/ /de nas de nyid kun la yang / /ci bde bar ni dbul bar bya/ /spyi
lam zhabs la btugs byas te/ /bla ma la ni dbang blang bya/ /shin tu sbas pa'i 'phags pa'i dbang / /bcom ldan bdag la stsal bar mdzod/ /de nas sbyor ba chen po yi/ /snyoms par
zhugs te bde ba/ /slob dpon rdo rje phyung byas te/ /spyi bor rab tu gzhag par bya/ /lag pa yis ni ma reg par/ /kha la rab tu sbyin par bya/ /khyad par du ni drang byas te/ /ci bde bar ni btung
bar bya/ /gzungs ma de dag thams cad la/ /rdo rje yis ni sbyin par bya/ /de nas slob ma mchog nyid kyi/ /bla ma la ni yon dbul bya/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /chung ma dang ni rang
gi bu/ /bdag nyid dang ni rgyal srid dang / /de bzhin longs spyod dbang phyug dang / /rdzas dang nor dang gter rnams dang / /glang po rta dang shing rta dag /bla ma la ni yon
mchog ste/ /dga' ba'i yid 'gyur dbul bar bya/ /phyi yi sbas la gsang ba dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / /rdo rje dang ni gzungs ma'i rnams/ /'dod
@#/ /pa'i dngos grub dri bar bya/ /snying po yang dag shes gyur nas/ /dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/
gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor 'di/ /ci ste rmongs pas smra byas na/ /slob dpon gyi ni dam tshig nyams/ /myur du zla phyed tshun chad du/ /bstan pas rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/
dang por dam tshig gzhag byas te/ /phyi nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ /gzhan du byas na dpa' bo'i rnams/ /dmyal bar bskal bar grangs med smin/ /de bas blo ldan rdo rje
yis| |nan tan dam tshig bsgrag mi bya/ /sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas/ /dam tshig srung la brtson par bya/ /gzhan du byas na sngags mkhan gyi/ /sngags la sogs
pa'i don mi 'grub/ /lha rnams kyang ni dam tshig gi /gsol yang bzhes su mi gnang ste/ /'jig rten 'di ru sdug bsngal che/ /'jig rten pha rol dmyal ba'i rnams/ /
dam tshig spyod pa 'das pas so/ /rmongs pa'i bdag nyid des 'thob bo/ /slob ma de yang de bzhin du/ /blo zhan sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur te/ /des na sngags kyi don mi
smin| |lha rnams kyi ni mchog tu bde/ /dam tshig med pa'i slob ma la/ /nam yang sbyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas dam tshig gtso yin te/ /thog mar dam tshig sbyin
par bya/ /sngags rnams dang ni phyag rgya yang / /de bzhin thabs dang shes rab rnams/ /dam tshig de rnams thams cad kyang / /sngags pas gsang ba sbyor ba yis/ /dmyal ba ngan
song bzlog pa'i phyir/ /bu dang slob ma sbyin par bya/ /sngags kyi dngos grub bsod nams byed/ /gtsang sbra dogs pa med par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dal/ /dkyil
'khor tshul bzhin bri byas te/ /gzhon nu'i tshad ni bcu drug lon/ /dam tshig slob ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /bzhag nas cho ga 'dis gzhug bya/ /dam tshig rnams ni 'di yin te/ /
sbrang rtsi sha dang dri chen po/ /nyi ma zla ba'i blo chen dang / /rdo rje las byung chu bsgrubs rnams/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs tshul bzhin gzhag /dam tshig yi ge bzhag pa yis/ /
myur du dam tshig 'grub byas na/ /dga' byed dam tshig dngos grub ste/ /dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur/ /dam tshig 'di ni sna tshogs te/ /'dzin pa yis ni mthu ru
'gyur| |ma 'ongs sangs rgyas chen po dang / /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po che/ /blo ldan dbang bskur blangs pa yis/ /dbang bskur phun sum tshogs pa kun/ /sangs rgyas kun
gyis 'thob 'gyur te/ /dbang bskur ba yi yid du 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje ye shes chen po zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i dkyil
@#/ /'khor te lnga pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu dgyes pa chen po yid bde bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
la gsol ba 'debs so/ /gdug pa thams cad rnam 'dul ba/ /'jigs par byed pa chen po 'di/ /rdo rje khro bo chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor chen po rnam bshad phyir/ /'jigs
byed chen po rnam 'dul ba/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje thams cad kyi/ /khro bo'i dam tshig ded dpon gyi/ /gsang ba chen po nyid kyis shod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen
po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dren pa'i khro bo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
thugs rdo rje ye shes las 'di phyung ngo / /oM badzra mahA tsaN+DA sar+b+ba duSh+TaM ta ga ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaDa/ 'di phyung ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
'di thams cad khro bo chen po'i mthus rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ /kun tu g.yos/ lha dang / klu dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / mi'am ci
dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad 'khrugs pa chen por gyur to/ /de nas 'jigs pa chen pos nyen pas de dag brgya byin gyi thad du
lhags nas brgya byin bdag nyid kyang skyabs med par mthong nas changs pa'i thad du phyin/ /tshangs pa yang gtogs 'dod kyi gan du phyin/ /gtogs 'ded kyang dbang phyug chen
po'i thad du phyin te/ de nas dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid kyi mthu 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs su byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad rang gi rdzu 'phrul
gyi mthus kun tu snang bar byas te/ lha rnams ma 'jigs shig /klu rnams ma 'jigs shig /gnod sbyin rnams ma 'jigs shig /lha ma yin rnams ma 'jigs shig /
dri za rnams ma 'jigs shig /lha dang / 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams ma 'jigs shig /nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyis khyad par 'di lta bu gzhan 'gas kyang rab tu brdzi nus sam/
khyed rnams ci dgar spyod pas mnos shig ces dbugs phyung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid dpal zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i khro gnyer chen po zhes bya ba/ khro bo chen po'i snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang /

thugs rdo rje ye shes las phyung ngo / /oM badzra b+h+r-i ku Ti/ mahA kro d+ha ha na ha na/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/ mA ra mA ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM/ b+h+r-i b+h+r-i/ brah+ma ya brah+ma ya/ b+hi ku
@#/ /n+yan sar+b+ba mA rA na sar+b+ba du Sh+TAM/ ma Ta ma Ta/ mo Ta mo Ta/ hUM g+h+r-IM/ hUM trAM/ tra Ta tra Ta/ b+h+r-i hUM hr-i hUM traM traDa/ 'di brjod ma thag tu de dag snga ma bzhin du
skrag nas dbang phyug chen po'i thad du nye bar lhags so/ /de nas dbang phyug snga ma bzhin du bdag gi che ba nye bar ston cing gtogs 'dod la smras pa/ khyod kyang mthu che
ba'i lha chen po ste/ gdug pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi bdag po yin na/ rang gi mthu rgya chen po'i rdzu 'phrul nye bar ston pas gdug pa de rnams dbugs dbyung bar
mdzod cig /de nas gtogs 'dod de ma thag tu rang gi mthu 'jigs byed kyi gzugs 'khor lo'i nag po chen por bsgyur nas rdo rje'i skad drag po chen po'i bgang ba'i
gdangs 'byin pas 'jig rten thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po'ang khro bo chen po'i pad+mo 'byung ba
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu pad+mo'i dra ba 'char ba'i khro bo thams cad slar ldog ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
kar bzhugs so/ /zhugs nas khro bo chen po'i snying por bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i thugs ka nas

phyung ngo / /oM pad+ma mahA dz+wa la mahA kro d+ha ba ta ba mu kha kha kha/ sar+b+ba duSh+TaM/ khA hi khA hi sarba du Sh+TAM pra du Sh+TaM naM/ da ma da ma/ badzra daMSh+To da ka Ta mahA ma Ta ma Ta/ k+Sho TA k+Sho TA/ badzra kha ra/

tsa pa la du rga be ba/ tra sa tra sa/ mahA badzra ba Da ba mu kha pra ma tha pra ma tha hUM phaDa/ hrI ha ha hi hiM/ tsa turmu kha/ be sha prA Na sha na/ hUM hrIM hUM hUM d+hIHha/ de nas 'di gsungs ma
thag tu tshangs ris chen po 'dar ye yed zhing kha bub tu 'gyel te/ brdab 'chos so/ /de nas tshangs pa chen po ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dbang phyug chen po la dris pa/ lha|
'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar du snang ngo / /de nas dbang phyug chen pos tshangs pa la bskul ba/ khyod ni sems can kun gyi gtso bo/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po/ khyod ni
'jig rten gsum na gtong ba dang / byed pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de'i phyir/ khyod kyis gdug pa'i sems can dang / gdug pa'i lus can thams cad brlag
par gyis shig /de nas tshangs pas rang nyid kyi mthu dang / tshangs pa chen po'i srin po'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ 'jigs byed chen po lta bur gdong bzhi pa/ me
lce stong gis gzi brjid can gyi lus 'gul ba dang bcas pas bgad pa chen po 'byin pas lha'i tshogs kyi gdug pa thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas so/ /de nas
@#/ /bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po'ang lha thams cad rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par
snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i khro bo chen po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i ye shes kyi thugs ka nas phyung

ngo| |oM badzra b+hai ra ba/ mahA kro d+ha/ sar+b+ba duSh+TAM saM b+hak+Sha ya hUM hUM phaDa phaDa/ badzra yak+Sha ha na ha na hUM phaDa/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu brgya byin gyi khang pa 'di thams cad
dum bu brgyar rnam par bshig ste/ ri rab kyi rtse mo'ang 'gul zhing kun tu 'khor nas gnas par gyur/ brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa'ang kha bub tsam du 'gyel te
brgyal bar gyur to/ /de nas langs te dbang phyug chen po la bltas pa dang / dbang phyug chen pos kyang bskul ba/ khyod ni lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po ste/
mthu che ba yin la sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang khyod la mnyes par byed pa yin na/ de ltar bdag nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu nye bar
ston cig /de nas lha'i rgyal po chen po brgya byin de rang nyid kyi mthu gnod sbyin dang / srin po chen po'i gzugs nye bar ston cing gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad la gdug
pa dag ma 'jigs shig /nga'i rdzu 'phrul 'di lta bu dag mthong na sus kyang zil gyis gnon mi nus so zhes dbugs 'byin par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu
bzang po chen po yang sngags kyi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ lha de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
thugs rdo rje'i ye shes las 'jug par mdzad de/ bcug nas kyang khro bo chen po thams cad phyag rgya chen por mngon par bsgyur nas bdag nyid kyang khro bo thams cad
'byin pa'i khro bo chen po'i gzugs su dmigs te/ mche ba chen po 'byin pa/ zhal mi sdug pa/ spyan stong pa/ nyi ma chen po stong gis gzi brjid can/ rab tu mi
bzad par byed pa'i me rlung gis bdas pa'i mdog sngon po'i sku/ dur khrod chen po'i dpal chen gyis phyag rgya mi'i keng rus dang / khrag dang / sha dang / klad pa dang /
rkang dang / tshil rnams zas su gsol ba/ mi'i lpags pas snam logs rgyab la g.yogs te bsdams pa/ mi'i mgo bo'i phreng ba dbu la 'dzin pa/ seng ge dang / glang
po che dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ma he dang / phag dang / ce spyang dang / ra dang / khyi dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rog dang / bzhad dang / byi la dang / gzig dang /
@#/ /stag la sogs pa'i khro bo byol song gi gdong brgya stong mang po rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas phyung ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i chul gyis shar
phyogs na 'jigs byed chen po 'dul ba rnam par gnyer ba'i 'jigs pa lta bu'i spyan dang / zhal rdo rje'i mche ba chen po gtsigs pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i khro bo chen
po brgya stong gi g.yog dang / shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so/ /lho'i dkyil 'khor du 'ang rdo rje khro gnyer can khro bo brgya stong mang po'i
g.yog dang / 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so/ /nub kyi dkyil 'khor du'ang pad+ma chen po rta gdong khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang / nub kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil
bar gyur te gnas so/ /byang gi dkyil 'khor du 'ang rdo rje 'ur 'ur chen po'i khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang / 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das
rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen po'i tshogs brgya stong mang pos bskor nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs te/ khro bo chen po'i tshogs de dag dang / shin tu dgyes
pa chen po'i bde ba chen pos kun tu spyod cing khro bo chen po'i rnam pa brgya stong mang po'i ri rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa snyed phyung nas/ nam mkha'i dbyings rab
'byams thams cad du gang bar byas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang gang bar byas so/ /de nas gdug pa'i tshogs thams
cad kyis de dag mthong nas 'jigs dngangs skyabs ma mthong nas/ rang rang gi bdag po'i thad du song ste/ rje gcig /rje gcig /nyid kyis bdag la skyobs shig /de nas
dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bdag po de dag bdag nyid kyi mthu sprul nas slar yang bslang ste/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad yongs su bskor du bcug nas/
'jigs byed gdungs pa nga la skyabs su song zhes bsgo yang skyabs su 'gro ba mi len cing / slar yang rang gi rgyud kyi nga rgyal bskyed de/ 'jigs byed chen po brgyad pa
zhes bya ba phyung nas ri rab kyi bdag nyid chen po nye bar ston cing / dgad pa chen po'i nga ro 'byin par gyur to/ /oM mahA b+hai ra ba beSh+TiM Sh+TiM/ T+ra T+ra T+ra tra T+ra tra T+ra/ ha ha i ti/
'on kyang ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse'u chung tshad tsam yang ma 'gul to/ /de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro bo des he ru ka'i nga ro 'byin cing mgo bor
mnan nas bsnun te/ he ru kas bdag nyid kyi mthu chen pos 'jigs byed chen po'i nga ro 'byin cing sgyu ma'i spu gu drangs nas/ khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang rnams za
@#/ /zhing chem chem mdzad pas/ de'i 'khor la rab tu ston par mdzad de/ u mA dang / 'ga' 'ga' yang rnam par bcom mo/ /ma mo'i tshogs thams
cad kyang sgren mor byas te dma' phab nas/ khro bo bdag nyid kyi mthu nye bar spel cing 'khor thams cad kyang btul/ skyabs len du'ang bcug /dam tshig la'ang
gnas par byas te yang dag par zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen po drag po bzhad cing rdo rje'i khro gnyer khro bo chen po'i
zhal nas ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig ces dbugs 'byin par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen po khro bo'i tshogs kun
la bka' stsal pa/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ mahA tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM bo d+ha bo d+ha/ mahA b+hai ra ba da ra ba ba hA ri ha ra ha ra/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na

mA ra mA ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ shI g+h+raM mahA badzra/ tsaN+Da sar+b+ba duSh+TaM/ ta ka ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ hUM phaDa/ 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jigs byed chen po'i
'dul bar byed pas rang gi sku nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshad du bskyed do/ /khro bo brgya stong mang po rnam par bsnyer ba'i zhal mche ba gtsigs te/ 'khyil zhing bsgyur ba
phyag rgya stong mang po la mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa zhal sna tshogs mang po brgya stong me lce bzhin du rab tu 'bar ba'i sku brgya stong rnams 'jigs byed chen po ga na ba der
song ste/ rdo rje drag po'i gad mo cher 'byin pas bzhad cing mdun na gnas so/ /oM mahA badzra he ru ka badzra aT+TA T+TA hA sa hA sa ra ha ha ha ha hUM ha/ i ti/ de nas dbang phyug chen pos
rdo rje drag po bshad pa chen po thos nas g.yog dang bcas par khas bub tu 'gyel te brgyal bar 'gyur nas/ mgo la zhabs kyis bsnun te gtong bar mdzad do/ /oM badzra

b+h+r-i ku Ti/ han ha na/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ ma ta ma ta kiny+tsi rA ya si/ sUr+ya sa ha sra ha sti/ re ka ba su rA dza la la rtsi pra dzA li ta/ mahA rmurti A kaD+h+ya A kaD+h+ya a bya wa ma bya wa ma/ kri
na pa tsakra b+hai ra pa hri da yaM hUM b+h+riM/ de nas rdo rje khro gnyer chen po'i khro bo chen pos bzhad pas bzhad cing 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pa'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas
'khor lo can gyi mdun du ston to/ /de nas 'khor lo can gyi 'khor 'jigs pa chen pos nyen te/ khas bub tu 'gyel te rab tu brgyal zhing / rje gcig /bdag cag
la skyobs shig ces smra zhing / skyabs med par bdag nyid kyis mthong nas 'khor lo can la skyabs su song ngo / /de nas biSh+Nus kyang bdag nyid kyi mthu mang po
@#/ /rab tu nye bar ston cing shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i mdun du gnas te rgyab la zhugs so/ /kwa ye/ kwa ye/ gdug pa nye ba'i khro gnyer gyis snying dral te ji
srid ma 'thungs kyi bar du de srid rang gi gnas su song zhig /de nas khro gnyer chen po rab tu 'khrugs/ gtum por gyur nas de drangs te bsdams nas snying dral te/
de'i khrag la nyi ma'i khro gnyer chen po gnod sbyin chen po'i gdon gyi bdag nyid yang dag par chim par mdzad do/ /oM badzra ba sUr+ya b+h+ri ku Ti kro d+ha mahA gra ha ha ra pa ta ra pa
su su d+he/ ra ma sa mad mad dza na/ oM b+h+ra b+h+ra b+h+riM b+h+riM b+h+ra/ de nas 'khor lo can de sems rab tu brlag par gyur te gnas so/ /de'i chung ma ru ga mi ni dang / mahA shrI dang /
lak+Sha mI'ang g.yog dang bcas par rnam par bcom ste/ sna tshogs rnams rnam par btul nas bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rta gdong chen po'i rgyab
tu gcig bsnun nas gtong bar mdzad do/ /oM badzra ba Da ba mu kha kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tsa tur mu kha/ pi ba pi ba/ a s+ya ru d+hi raM/ A ka D+D+h+ya A ka D+D+h+ya/ hri da yAM trA na/ dam
he| badzra Da Da ba mA kha/ hi hi Sha mahA/ shwa shwe shwe ra hI hI/ de nas rdo rje rta gdong chen po rta skad chen po mdzad cing tshangs pa'i mdun du gnas par gyur to/ /de nas
changs ba tshangs ba'i srin po bdag nyid kyis nam mkha' bkang nas rgyu bar byed de/ de nas tshangs pa chen po'i 'khor khas bub tu 'gyel nas/ rje cig /skyobs shig /rje cig
skyobs shig ces smras so/ /kwa ye/ kwa ye/ gdug pa'i gdong myur du song song / khyod kyi rgyab tu zhon te ma btul re zhes smras so/ /de nas rdo rje rta gdong chen po rab tu 'khrugs/ gtum
por gyur nas/ tshangs pa chen po de'i mgor brdzis te/ snying drangs nas khrag btung ba la zhugs te/ sha dang / klad pa dang / tshil bu dang / rus pa rnams myangs nas phyogs
bcur gtor ro/ /de'i chung ma shi ri ma dang / swa ra sa ti dang / shAn+ti rnams kyang rnam par bcom/ de'i tshogs kyang btul nas/ dam tshig gi sdom pa la gnas par byas te
bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i khro bo chen pos khros pa dang bcas pa'i lta bas gzigs te gtong bar mdzad do/ /oM gu lu gu lu badzra
mahA kro d+ha/ A kaR+Sha ya/ A kaR+Sha ya sha kra hr-i da yaM/ mahA badzra daSh+TAM ya/ hUM b+hak+ShA ya b+hak+ShA ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po'i sku chen pos nam mkha'i ngos kun bkang
ste| brgya byin gyi mdun du bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas brgya byin 'gying ba chen pos 'gyings te/ mi bzad par khros par gnod sbyin chen po khyod su'i bran zhes de la
@#/ /smras so/ /de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/ snying nas gtsug gi nor bu phyang / snying yang dral te/ de'i sha dang
khrag dang / klad pa dang / tshil bu dang / rus pa dang / bza' pa rnams bza' bar zhugs so/ /de nas de'i 'khor rnams 'jigs shing dngangs pa'i yid du gyur te/ /
skyabs su nye bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyang bcom nas de'i gnas na gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo
chen po rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / rol cing shin tu dgyes pa'i kun tu longs spyod pa'i khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das la bskul bar mdzad do/ /oM mahA su ra ta badzra mahA kro d+ha saM ha ro pa saM ha ra sar+b+ba kro d+ha ma /

sha ma sha ma/ pra sha ma pra sha ma/ sar+b+ba kro d+ha/ ut+ti ma kro d+ha/ swa sa ma ya mahA maN+Da la/ s+thA pa ya s+thA pa ya/ sar+b+ba kro d+ha me duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta bi ba ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya sha

kra brah+ma biSh+Nu ra ma he shwa ra ma ho b+ha ga baM/ su ra Ta sau khya kro d+ha/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sat+t+ya na sa ma ye ny+tsa ho/ su ra ta sa ma ya i ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa
chen po khro bo chen pos khro bo thams cad 'dren pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba'i phyir nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /o

dzaHhUM baM hoHTak+ki hUM dz+dzaH/ Tak+ki hUM dz+dzaH/ hUM Tak+ki hUM dz+dzaH/ hUM Tak+ki hUM dz+dzaH/ A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ baM d+ha ya ba shaM ku ru/ sar+b+ba kro d+ha/ sa ma ya/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ Tak+ki hUM dz+dzaH/ hUM Tak+ki hUM/ de nas
khro bo chen po'i dam tshig de dag thams cad 'ongs nas/ rang gi dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lor 'khyil bar gyur te/ kye| bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal du
gsol zhes smra zhing gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo'i rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo chen po phyung ngo / /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha mahA kro d+ha sha hUM phaT/ de nas de dag la khyod kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa'i sems
can chen po rnams gsos shig ces bka' stsal to/ /de dag gis bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rab tu gdug pa rnams gsos zhes gsol nas/ de nas cang mi gsung
bar bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pas khro bos phyag bsnol te btsir nas rdo rje bdud rtsi khro bo'i dbang mo chen mo phyung ngo / /oM badzra
@#/ /a mr-i ta/ mahA kro d+he shwa ri uta shrI jaHuta shrI dzaHbadzra a mr-i ti hUM aHde nas bcom ldan 'das ma bdud rtsi chen po de dag kun tu khros te
smin ma bsgyur ba'i gzigs pa'i zhal bzhad pa/ ru lu ru lu zhes pa'i sgra 'byin cing rang gi pad+mo la bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje bcug nas bdud rtsi yang dag
par sgrub pa'i rig pa 'di phyung ngo / /oM a mr-i ta saM dzI ba ni mahA mr-i ta mu khe/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sar+b+baM badzra pad+ma sad yo ge /mahA bo d+hi tsit+ta/ bi Tha pi Tha/ mUrti
A| de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa/ gdug pa de dag thams cad snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid kyi lus sos par gyur te/ sems dran pas de bzhin gshegs
pa'i 'khor lo thams cad mthong nas ngo mtshar bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo la skyabs su dong nas/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba
bzhin du khro bo'i 'khor rnams gnas par gyur to/ /de nas de dag rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la stod par byed de/ khyod ni sems can kun gyi
yab| |phan byed de bzhin yum yin te/ /gtso bo 'dus pas bdag cag rnams/ /'jigs pa che las skyob pa ste/ /rje bo sdug bsngal thams cad sel/ /khyod ni 'gro
ba'i dbang po rje/ /khams gsum 'di ni byed dang gtong / /che ba che khyod skye bo skyong / /thog ma med khyod nga ro thigs/ /nga ro'i steng ni cha yang med/ /gtso bo yig med bdud rtsi
yi| |rab dgyes bde byed gtong ba yis/ /'gro ba kun la phan bya'i phyir/ /de ni sangs rgyas thams cad rnams/ /rab dgyes 'gro la bde ba'i phyir/ /mgon po khyod kyis
gtong ba mdzad/ /sems can 'dam gyis mi gos shing / /bla na med pa byang chub lam/ /sna tshogs sdug bsngal zhi mdzad ba/ /sems can sbom pa ngoms mdzad cing / /'khor
ba rba klong grol mdzad do/ /myur du bde la dgongs pa mdzad/ /dngos po kun gyis thams cad du/ /rgyal ba kun gyis mi dpogs te/ /zhi ba'i rnam pas zhir 'gyur ba/ /rdul dang
bral bas 'dzums pa spangs/ /nam mkha' sgom las rnam 'das pa/ /rnam rtog dri mas ma gos te/ /sgyu ma kun las yang dag 'das/ /'dod pa kun la rgyab phyogs pa/ /
gtso bo khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /dregs pa med pa 'jigs byed la/ /byang chub mchog ni thob kyi bar/ /bdag cag skyabs su rab tu mchi/ /ji srid 'tsho ba mchis
pa dang / /dmyal ba rtsub mo'i 'jig rten du/ /ltung bar gyur pa ji srid pa/ /khyod kyi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi/ /byang chub mchog tu bdag cag kyang / /dri med skal
@#/ /bar gyur pa yi/ /gtso bo bdag cag dbang bskur ba/ /bde ba chen pos stsal du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa
chen pos de dag gis gsol ba'i tshig nye bar gsan nas mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhugs ma thag
tu bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba dang / yid bde ba sgrub pa'i thabs mang po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ste/ bde ba chen po'i spro ba'i 'phrul chen
po'i lha'i 'khor thams cad dbang bskur te/ de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha chen po de dag bde ba chen po'i spro ba'i cho 'phrul gyis dbang bskur
bas yid bde bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang dang / yang du gtugs nas bskor ba byas te/ ji lta ba bzhin du kun du yongs su bskor nas gnas
so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pas yang rdo rje gzungs ma shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen mo'i dam tshig dang / sbyor
ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas/ de ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro mo

dbang mo chen mo zhes bya ba nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta mahA badzra kro d+he shwa ri sar+b+ba duSh+TA ni/ mu dra Ni/ mahA pa la yA na la sh+ma shA na b+hI Sha Ne /
badzra mahA kro d+ha daMSh+TA ka rA la kri ta pa da ne/ sar+b+ba shatruM/ pra sha ma ni/ hUM hUM mahA kro d+he shwa ri hUM phaT phaT/ 'dis ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas/ dbus kyi dkyil
'khor du bzhag ste/ dpung pa bcu drug la phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ zhal gsum pa/ mdog in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'bar ba 'dra ba/ rdo rje dang / thod
pa'i 'khor ba dang / thod pa dang / mdung dang / sta gri dang / zhags pa dang / rtse gsum pa dang / pe con dang / mu su ra dang / 'khor lo dang / ka na ya dang / to ma ya dang
gzhu dang / mda' dang / shak+ti dang / gri rnams phyag na 'dzin pa/ thod pa'i phreng bas dbu rgyan byas pa/ nyi ma brgya dang / me'i 'od 'dra ba'o/ /de'i mdun du rdo rje khrag 'thung

chen mo de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang / cha lugs 'dzin pa rig pa 'dis gzhag par bya'o/ /oM mahA badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+he shwa ri mahA sh+ma sha na b+hI Sha Ne ni lA dz+wA las ha sra pra dz+wa la ti

mU rti d+he re ka pA la mA lA/ b+hU Shi ta ma gu te/ nar du ti ra ra tra/ pa ri bu ri/ ta ka pA la/ aste kha T+wAM ga /badzra tri shu la gan+d+ha mahA kro d+he na/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ he he run+ta mun+ta/
@#/ /pri ye hUM phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen po'i gzi brjid chen po'i mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje nyi ma khro mo'i dbang mo chen mo nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM hUM traM mahA sUr+ya badzra kro d+ha shwa ri bi d+ha ma/ ma tha ma tha
grwa sa grwa sa/ sar+b+ba duSh+TAM/ pra duSh+TAM hUM phaT/ oM hUM traM traM/ tra tra tra/ khro mo chen mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya ste/ gzi brjid
chen por rab gtong zhing / /shin tu 'jigs pa me bzhin 'bar/ /dpung pa bcu drug rno ba ste/ /dbu rgyan thod pas brtseg par bya/ /spyan ni rab dmar sngo bsangs
mdog /mtshon cha'i tshogs na bsnams par brtson/ /gdug pa thams cad 'cha' byed cing / /yi dwags chen po'i stan la zhon/ /rang gi g.yog gis mdun du bskor//
de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'byung gnas bkod pa'i 'od kyi phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad+ma'i dra ba khro mo'i dbang mo nyid
kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM hrIHbadzra pad+ma mahA ban+d+ha mu khe/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ mahA ma ho/ d+ha ra bi ko pe hUM he hUM hUM ha ha/ hUM hUM hrIH/ hi sha
hi sha| mahA badzra ba da ba mu la mi ho t+yo t+ye/ hUM hUM/ hi hi hUM hrIHhUM/ dkyil 'khor nang gi dbus nyid du/ /'di ni rgyab tu gzhag par bya/ /rno ba chen po zhal gsum pa/ /rta
gdong gyen du sten pa ste/ /khro mo chen mo dpung bcu drug /rnam par bsgyur ba'i mi sdug gdong / /mi ro'i rta la yang dag zhon/ /khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa/ /mtshon cha sna
tshogs 'dzin pa ste/ /khros pa'i dbu rgyan thod pas brtsegs/ /'od zer rnon po gtong byed cing / /g.yog bcas dkyil 'khor brgyan te gnas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
yang gdon mi za ba'i ye shes khro mo gnyis su med par 'du ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gdon mi za ba'i drag po dang ldan ma chen mo zhes bya

ba khros pa'i dbang mo chen mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba a mo g+ha mahA bi shwa shwa ri hUM hUM hUM/ haM haM haM/ mahA kro d+he gu mu khe/ mahA bi shwe
ba da ri Ni/ sar+b+ba duSh+TA pra sha ma ni hUM hUM phaT/ 'di nyid kyis ni ci rigs par/ /rdo rje gdon mi za ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor g.yog bcas rnam pa bzhi/ /sna tshogs dam tshig
gzhag byas te/ /sna tshogs gzugs dang khyad par ldan/ /kun tu yongs su bskor nas gnas/ /bsnyer ba dang ni btsums pa'i gdong / /rab tu drag la ro myang zhing /
@#/ /gdong gnyer thod pa'i rtse mor byas/ /dpung pa bcu drug gis brgyan pa'i/ /khro mo chen mo gdong gsum pa/ /za byed me bzhin lta pa yi/ /de yi ngo bo
thams cad kyi/ /g.yog ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis/ /bskor bar shes rab can gyis gzhag /rang gi phyag rgya mtshan mar ldan/ /dpung pa brgyad dang ldan pa yi/ /de ni
cho ga ji bzhin du/ /'byung mo'i phyag rgya yang dag zhon/ /dur khrod bzhin du 'jigs byed pa/ /phyi yi rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams/ /de dag kun tu yongs su bskor
gzhag gam bri bar bya yang rung / /de ni da lta'i stan la gnas/ /bzhin mi sdug pa dpung bzhi mo/ /gdug pa'i khro mo rnam bsgyur bcas/ /de la sogs pa'i rim par
ldan| |mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de nas rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te/ yang dang / yang rang rang gis mngon
par gang bar byas pas mchod nas gsol ba 'debs so/ /rnal 'byor ma yi sngags tshogs dang / /phyag rgya ma ni ci rigs par/ /gsad pa'i gar ni bde chen mo//
bcom ldan de nyid nyid kyis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor ma thams cad rnam par spro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
te| rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / sbas pa dang / de kho na nyid dang / gsang ba rnams nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba badzra

d+ha ra satwa a nu rA gi ni mahA kro d+he hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra A kaR+Sha Ni mahA kro d+he shwa ri hUM hUM/ dzA dzA hUM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ku la a nu rA ga ni mahA kro d+he shwa ri hUM he he hUM phaT/ oM

sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ro gra mahA kro d+he shwa ri hUM swa swa hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA te dza a b+hi She ke hUM taM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA sur+ya b+h+ri kU Te ka ro ke tra ta Ta ta hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA ke tu

ke tu kro d+he shwa ri mahA bi dza yot+ta ye hUM hUM traM traM phaT phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA badzra kro d+ha AT+Ta A si hUM hUM triM triM To Ta ya tro Ta ya hri da ya hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+ha b+hak+Shi Ni hUM hUM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha hUM hrIH/

oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA tIk+Sh+Na kro d+he shwa ri ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM hUM badzra tik+Sh+Na haste ts+tshe da ya hUM hUM ma Ta ma Ta/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra tsa kra d+ha ri Ni ma ho gra du pi ni hUM hUM/ pa ta ya pa ta ya mahA badzra tsa kre Na/ tsUr+Na ya tsUr+Na ya/ hUM hUM

phaT| oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA shwa ga pra b+ha Ni hUM hUM ma ta ma ta phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA bI shwa mu khi hUM hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA badzra pA Ni hUM hUM haM haM phaT phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA badzra yak+Shi

Ni hUM hUM/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ A bi b+ha A bi b+ha hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA badzra b+ha ni d+ha ni mahA ke d+he/ b+han+d+ha ya b+han+d+ha ya/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+ha mahA badzra ba sh+ya pra we sha ni hUM hUM/ bi

@#/ /ta ya bi ta ya hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ha la da ni mahA kro d+he shwa ri hUM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+ha mA li ni hUM hUM g+huM g+huM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro

d+he gan+d+ha ba hi hUM ga gri/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha rI mahA kro d+he shwa ri mahA lo ka d+hA ri Ni/ dI pa yaM dI pa yaM hUM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+he shwa ri mahA lA s+ya hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+he

mA le d+hA ri Ni hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA gI ti ni hUM he he/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+ha narti ke hUM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya dz+dza dz+dza hUM hUM dz+dza/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA

kro d+ha b+haM d+ha b+haM d+ha baM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra mahA kro d+he mahA badzra ba shi ni hUM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha rA mahA kro d+he sh+ya sh+ye hUM ho/ oM hUM trAM hrIHAHde nas rnal 'byor ma de dag mgu rangs
dga' bar gyur te/ yang dbyangs 'dis gsol ba 'debs so/ /bde ba mchog gi rgya chen dgongs su gsol/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bde mchog dbyings dang ldan/ /mi
g.yo gsung dang bral ba'i dbyangs snyan pas/ /gzungs la rol ba'i bde ba bzhes su gsol/ /ngo mtshar chen po cho 'phrul snang mdzad cing / /snying po byang chub bgrod pa
rnams kyi lam ston te/ /rgyud rnams yang dag gang la'ang mi rten pa/ /bde ba mchog gi gzungs kyis grol bar mdzod/ /ra mu mahA su hU dzo hi ni dz+wA la su hUM pU mU/ mahA
su hU dzo i ni dz+wA la su hUM pa b+h+rUM dzU mahA su hU/ i ni dzrA la su hU u dzi/ u mahA su hU dzo/ dza i ni dz+wA su hU/ a la la la ho/ mahA su hU ra ma ra mahA su hU/ a l-i l-i l-i l-i/ mahA
su tre Na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma chen mo dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad

kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta mahA badzra d+ha ra hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha gi ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA he ma ba ti hUM phaT/

oM badzra DA ki nI ku mA ra bri ye hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki ni dri sh+ye mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki ni mahA badzra mu Sh+Ti ta na/ b+hI ta ya b+hI ta ya/ sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA kI nI

mahA badzra kro d+ha ya d+ha ra la li hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA kro d+ha tsa kre ni ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA mri to ta pa ta ki hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA kI nI mahA sau mA kro d+he hUM phaT/ oM

badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra tan+ti hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA mA ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA a mr-i te ka pa la hA se hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA sau mya kro d+he shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA

ki ni ma hA a mr-i te pu dan d+ha ri hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI badzra ping ga li hUM phaT/ badzra DA ki nI pi ba pi ka ru d+hi raM mahA badzra ba li hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA badzra sha ni b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha
@#/ /hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA badzra sha ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA badzra pA she hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI A na ya A na ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI

ma hA badzra be b+hi ni gu gu mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA badzra dz+wa la ya b+hasmi ku ru hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA badzra bi ga ta hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA badzra daMSh+Te
hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA badzra ki li pra bi sha pra bi sha hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA puSh+Ta mAM sA sha ni hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA ka ra ba badzra d+hA ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM

badzra DA ki nI A kaR+Sha Ni mahA ping+ga rA li mu ku hUM dz+dzaHdz+dzaH/ hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki n+ya A bi sha ne hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA ban+d+ha hUM hUM baM baM hUM/ oM badzra DA ki nI mahA to Sha Ni

sa ma ye hUM hUM A A/ oM badzra mahA rAk+Sha sa mA sa ru d+hi ra me da pri ya/ mahA kuM b+ha karna hUM hUM hUM hUM k+ShaH/ oM badzra mahA rAk+Sha sa A kaD+D+ya pra be sha ya/ sar+b+ba badzra kA la shi ni ban+d+he

hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM badzra rAk+Sha sa ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ya/ bi Sha ya bi bi Sha Na sar+b+bA na hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra mahA rAk+Sha sa/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ sar+b+bA na mahA bi kr-i tA na na/ ha ya gr-I ba hUM phaT/ de
nas rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo de dag thams cad rab tu mgu nas/ yid dga' ba'i 'gyur te/ dbyangs chen mo 'di 'byin par gyur
to| |kye ma rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /rdo rje sbyor ba rab bstan pas/ /mkha' la 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid/ /ci bde bas ni sgrub par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang
pos yang rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma de dag kun mgu dga' bar bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo / /oM DA ki nI A kaR+Sha ya pra

be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya to Sha ya A/ sar+b+bAn badzra DA ki nI hri da yaM hUM dz+dzaHdzaHhUM baM hoHTak+ki hUM dz+dzaH/ oM he ru ka mahA badzra/ A ka D+D+h+ya A ka D+D+h+ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/
to Sha ya to Sha ya/ hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra pad+ma mahA pa Da ba mu kha/ A ka D+D+h+ya/ pra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ to Sha ya/ ha ha hi/ khro bo'i sngags kyi tshogs 'dis rdo rje rnal
'byor ma dang / mkha' la 'gro ma dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / rdo rje 'phrog par byed ma de dag la sogs pa de dag dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbang du bya ba la
sogs pa'i las bya ste/ gtor ma'i mchod pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig he ru ka'i phyag rgya dang / Tak+ki rgyal po'i phyag rgya dang / rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya sbyin te/ las thams cad la
sbyor ro/ /rdo rje'i thal mo ji lta ba bzhin bcings te/ khro bo gnyis lcags kyu ltar bya/ sbom po gnyis phan tshun rtse sbyar zhing / zhi ba gnyis kyang rab tu sgreng / lhag ma gnyis brgyad
@#/ /ste 'od zer ltar btang ba 'di ni phyag rgya'i mchog yin no/ /phyag rgya 'di ni gzi brjid che/ /lha dang lha min phyag byas pa/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje
'dzin la sogs/ /bsngags shing mchod pa byas pa yin/ /bcings pa de nyid 'bebs pa dang / thams cad tshogs ni 'dzud par byed/ /gdug pa thams cad gsod
byed ma/ /srin mo thams cad za bar byed/ /rnal 'byor dam pa gnas pa yis/ /'di yis las rnams thams cad byed/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub pa po/ /mi ldan
dngos grub mi 'gyur te/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /bsnyen pas dngos grub myur du 'thob/ /rdo rje bcings pa gnyis su byas te/ /rgyab gnyis rgyab
sbyar te/ mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ste/ phan tshun bsnol/ khros pa gnyis gyen du bsgreng ste snying gar bstan nas/ brkyang bskum gyi tshul du gnas pa 'di las thams
cad byed pa'o/ /'di yis thams cad las kyi rnams/ /ji tsam yid 'dod byed par 'gyur/ /tshe 'dir sdig pa gang byas pa/ /'di yis thams cad 'phrog par byed/ /
de dag thams cad myur 'gyur te/ /dngos grub yid bzhin rin chen no/ /ji snyed nam mkha'i lam dag tu/ /rnal 'byor 'di yis 'phur bar byed/ /rig 'dzin mchog ni
mtshon par yang / /cho ga grub pa slar yang 'ong / /thal mo mnyam par sbyar te sbom po gnyis dbus su sbyar/ /lhag ma 'dab ma kha bye ba ltar byas pa ni pad+ma'i gdan no/ /spom
po gnyis rtse mo thur du bstan pa ni rtag gdong gi'o/ /gang gis sbyor byas skad cig tu/ /de yis dngos grub chen por 'gyur/ /bcings ma thag tu 'phur 'gyur ba/ /'dod pa
bzhin du nye bar 'gro/ /sa 'og dngos grub 'dod pa bzhin/ /myur du slar yang ldog par 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa/ /phyag rgya 'di ni sbyor ba dge /nga ni bstan te
rgyal ba'i rnams/ /rnal 'byor pa yis drang bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad kyang / /phyag rgya'i yan lag mchog des sbyar/ /de nas nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo de
dag sogs 'dod pas gzir ba rnams rangs te/ rang gi gzugs ni bsgyur ba yis/ /bzhengs te gar ni rab mdzad cing / /dur khrod kyi ni sa chen du/ /mgu ba chen pos
brtags par byed/ /phyag na thod pa gri dag dang / /rdo rje kha T+wAM rnam par 'dzin/ /skal ldan rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan/ /dbu smug rnam par bsnyer ba'i zhal/ /bde ba'i cha lugs
sbyar ba yis/ /bde ba dam pa longs spyod myong / /rab tu rmongs pas bsnyen byed cing / /rab dgyes khro la gsol ba 'debs/ /zla ba dri med stong rab rdzogs pa'i spyan mnga' bas/
@#/ /thugs rje'i dbyings rum nyid du bdag cag bskyed/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tsha bas gdungs pa yi/ /byang chub des ni kun du tshim par
mdzod/ /a la la la he/ mchog gi rol pas yang dag sgo 'byed cing / /byang chub mchog lam snying po nyid 'di ston/ /gsang ba'i bdag nyid bde bas zil mnan
te| |rmongs shing bying ba rnams la thugs rjes sgrol/ /a la la la ho/ che ba'i ye shes lhun gyis mngar ldan pa/ /phyogs kyi thugs rjes ma zin snyoms par
