dgongs/ /bde ba mchog gi gsang ba'i gnas nyid du/ /mya ngan 'da' ba'ang longs spyod bsten las 'grub/ /'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos bstan kyang / /
rmugs pa'i 'gro bas bdud rtsi'i dngos ma mthong / /kye ma ho/ ma skyes chos te snying po las byung ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/ /rab tu
dgyes pa'i bde mchog 'bar ba'i gtso/ /rin chen sna tshogs kun 'dus 'di la gzigs/ /sngon med rol mo 'di la rol mdzad cing / /dur khrod chen po'i dngos
grub stsal bar mdzod/ /'dul pa'i dbang gi grub pa'i cha lugs mi zad ma/ /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gros gzi brjid 'bar ba 'dis/ /sdug bsngal gsum pos 'thoms
shing rmongs pa la/ /bde ba'i spyod pas gnas nas spyod mdzad de/ /thugs rjes pad+ma'i dbyings las bskyed par mdzod/ /a la la la ho/ ji ltar pad+ma 'di la chags med
bzhin/ /sdug pa'i bcings pas ma zin rnams grol te/ /rol pas chub pa'i sa la gnas shing rnam mdzad pa/ /'jig rten gsum po 'di la gzigs nas rol mo mdzod/ /
bdag cag dam tshig 'di la 'dus shing snang ba rnams/ /mnyes mdzod shin tu bde ba bzhengs su gsol/ /'gal ba'i yid dang ma chags rdo rje la/ /nam mkha' ji
bzhin mi 'gyur tshul bzhin gnas/ /khams kyi rang bzhin mnabs shing rnam khro yang / /byams pa'i thugs rjes kun tu gnas khyab mdzad/ /e ma ho bde bas bde
sbyin phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang bzhin grub pa'i bde ba dngos grub gsol/ /chags med chags dang ldan pa'i longs spyod kyis/ /dam tshig skyon med bdag dag rol pa mdzad//
thugs rje gsal ba'i byang chub sems chen des/ /'gro ba kun gyi bag chags rnam par sbyongs/ /rgyu dang rkyen lam brten rang bzhin grub/ /ma chags dri med yongs su
gsal zla bzhin/ /'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni mnga' mdzad de/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu bde bas brtson/ /'di yis gtso la bskul byas na/ /dkyil 'khor
@#/ /nyid du dngos grub bo/ /yid gdung gnyen pa'i nga ro yis/ /dpyid kyi rgyal mo glu blangs te/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba dri med pa'i/ /dgongs pa thams
cad bstan byas te/ /rdo rje pad+mo yid 'ong ba'i/ /dngos grub thams cad sbyar bar bya/ /bde byed chen po 'di yis ni/ /bskul bas dgyes pa sbyin par byed/ /rdo rje can gyi
yi ger ldan/ /dus gsum rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi shin tu dgyes pa'i longs spyod dpal gyi
bde ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de dag thams cad la rjes su mgu bar mdzad do/ /g.yon gyi lag pas gzung byas te/ /gsang skyes pad+mo
phye ba las/ /rdo rje chen po g.yas nyid kyis/ /bcug na mchod pa 'thob 'gyur te/ /mkha' la 'gro ba dra ba 'dis/ /mnyes pas 'di nas dngos grub 'thob/ /oM dang
oM dang mi phyed rdo rje bde/ /mtha' ru phaT kyis stobs rab sbyor ba yis/ /kye ma'o bde ba mkha' 'gro dra ba che/ /rab dgyes dbang mo bde byed bde stabs mdzod/ /rnal
'byor ma tshogs gsal rnams la/ /'di yis rtsen pa rnam byas na/ /bde chen bde ba dgyes pa yi/ /rab dgyes dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma'i
cher rjes su mnyes bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ye shes so/ /mgo la thal mo phyed sbyin te/ /chu skyes la ni yongs su rdzogs/ /rdo rje bcings pa yang dag ldan/ /pad+mo'i
dkyil mo bcings par bya/ /'di yis rtsen par byas na ni/ /bud med mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /bde ba chen pos gar byed cing / /rab dgyes bde byed gnod byed
dang | |kun tu 'khyud dang sprod byed dang / /sna tshogs gar gyis gar byas te/ /thams cad zas dang ros dngos grub/ /mchog gi bde bas dngos grub 'gyur/ /rtsa ba'i phyag
rgya bcings byas te/ /sangs rgyas sbyor ba bde chen po/ /myur ba'i thal mos bsgrub par bya/ /gsum gyis mtshams su rab bya zhing / /mkhur tshos so yi sa btab byas te/ /
ma mchu yang nas yang du bzung / /'o ma 'dzin pa phyir zhing mnye/ /g.ya' byed pad+mo rnam bzhi bya/ /pad+mo phyi phyir rab mnye zhing / /ze ba mtshan pas rab tu sbyar/ /sen mos
mchan khung sum mdo dang / /rna ba gnyis su rab tu gzugs/ /dal nas rdo rje gzhug bya zhing / /khro bo'i rgyal pos bskyed par bya/ /g.yas kyis shin tu bskyod byas
nas| |g.yon pa yis ni gtang bar bya/ /sbyor ba 'di yis rtsen pa yis/ /mkha' 'gro'i 'khor lo mchod par bya/ /kye ma'o bde zhes rab brjod do/ /bde ba chen
@#/ /po dbyangs kyis bskul/ /yang dang yang du 'dzin pa na/ /blo ldan sgrub pas bsgrub par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i spro
ba ye shes so/ /de dag thams cad mgu nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin la gsol ba 'debs/ /nye ba'i zas ni thams cad dang / /de bzhin nye ba'i yo byad rnams/ /bde ba bsgrubs
pas sgrub pa po/ /sna tshogs chen po bsgom par gsol/ /sgrub pa thams cad sgrub byed pas/ /gdon mi za dka' rtag bgying pas/ /gang gis myur du mnyam sbyor bas//
dkyil 'khor rab tu rnam bsgyur bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye ba'i yo byad kha zas thams cad kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa/ yo byad phyi yi thams cad dang / /gos dang
rgyan la sogs pa'o/ /nye ba'i kha zas rnams la ni/ /sha dang khrag las yang dag sgrub/ /'bras bu rtsa ba tshad med do/ /mchog tu bde ba yid tshim pa/ /'di yis mchod
pa byas pa na/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /bus pa'i sha las rab sgrub pa'i/ /'o ma dam pas thod pa dgang / /mkha' 'gro ma kun dbul byas na/ /dkyil
'khor 'dir ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /gtor ma'i mchod pa'i yo byad kyi ye shes so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin thams cad bzhengs
te phyag bcal nas yang gcig tu stug por 'du ba mdzad de bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi ye shes mtshan/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams
kyi| |thams cad brda rnams dran 'gyur ba/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro myong ba dang 'brel ba'i
dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi brda'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /ka ni 'dod
pa byed 'dod phyir/ /bdag ni 'dod can smras yin te/ /gti mug ldongs pas me byin na/ /myur du dam tshig de nyams so/ /dam tshig dam tshig can mthong na/ /lag pa
g.yas pa brkyang byas te/ /des kyang g.yon pa brkyang ba yis/ /rang gi nu ma rab bsdams na/ /mgo bos g.yon du 'dud byas nas/ /phyag byed bde ba dris pa yin/ /lag
pa g.yon pa dkur brten na/ /de yis phyag ni byas par 'gyur/ /g.yon pa mgo ru bzhag pa yi/ /g.yon du 'dud pas phyag lan no/ /g.yon gyi smin ma bskyod pa yis/ /
myur du phyag ni byas par 'gyur/ /sbyor ba shin tu brtson pa yis/ /g.yas kyi smin mas phyag lan bya/ /g.yas kyi lag pas snying ga ru/ /sbyor dang ldan pas mnye byas na/ /'di
@#/ /ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog /de yi mtshan mar shes bar bya/ /g.yon gyi khro mo sgreng ba yi/ /nam zhig de ltar bstan byas na/ /lus che de ni khros
'gyur zhes/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rtags zhes bya/ /g.yon du 'gying ba bsgyings pa yis/ /lag par snying gar brkyang bya ste/ /dbang mo gyen du rnam bstan na/ /de tshe mdza'
bar rab tu brtag /chung du rtse mor byas pa yi/ /nam zhig bskyod pa mthong ba na/ /de tshe rig ma rnal 'byor dbang / /rdo rje pad+mo rtsen par 'dod/ /sbom po nam zhig mthong
'gyur na/ /de la ston mo sbyin par bya/ /gang tshe shin tu mthor ston na/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab tu brtag /khro mo lcags kyu 'dra byas te/ /gang tshe sngags mkhan gyis bstan
na| |de tshe nges par 'o byas te/ /gzhan du na ni dmyal bar ltung / /de nyid rnam par bzlog pa ltar/ /sngags mkhan gyis ni ma bstan na/ /de tshe myur du 'gro byas te/ /gzhan
du byas na dam tshig nyams/ /gzhan rnams kyi ni phyag rgya yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rnam bskul na/ /las kyi sbyor ba shes pa yis/ /las de dag ni brtsam par bya/ /brda
yi phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ /'dren pa med pa'i ye shes kun/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu brtag /rtag tu tsheg drag rnam bral ba/ /'dren tshul rnal 'byor ma yi'o/ /oM ni
thig ler bcas pa'i brda/ /sbyor bsngags 'dzin rnal 'byor brtag /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /sbyor ba'i dkyil du brtag par bya/ /rdo rje pad+mo mnyam bar sbyor
bas rjes su mnyes par byed pa dpal dam tshig ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang
po chen po yang kun tu rgyas 'debs pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo thams cad
kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag ste/ /sbom po skyil mo bcing bar bya/ /khro mo gnyis ni sbyar bya ste//
lhag ma 'od bzhin btang bar bya/ /snying gar phyag rgya 'di bzhag nas/ /thams cad las ni rab sbyar te/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du/ /gdon mi za ba'i
dngos grub byed/ /thal mo de gnyis mnyam sbyar te/ /mchog dang rdo rje mnyam du sbyar/ /chung ngu gnyis kyang gdong sprad de/ /snying gar de bzhin sbom po sbyar/ /'di yis rdo rje
thams cad rnams/ /dam tshig 'jigs byed rab mdzad cing / /sems can thams cad phan mdzad ma/ /de ni dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nyid las ni rdo rje dang / /
@#/ /mchog nyid sgreng ba'i tshul byas te/ /rdo rje thal mo gnas pa yis/ /drang ba'i tshul gyis drangs byas na/ /mi g.yeng de nas dngos grub bo/ /gnod
byed yang dag ldan pa 'dis/ /rgyal ba mchog kyang 'dren 'gyur na/ /lha dang mi yi bu mo dag /lha min la sogs smos ci dgos/ /ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin/ /
'di nyid kyis ni dngos grub ste/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa mnyam sbyor bas/ /mchog tu myur du 'dren par 'gyur/ /thal mo de nyid las byung khro/ /rtse mo yid tsam bkug
byas te/ /lhag ma 'od zer rtse mo bzhin/ /des ni myos byed thob pa yin/ /'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang / /bde bar gshegs kyang dbang bsgyur na/ /yid las skyes pa
'dod chags can/ /gti mug chos gnas smos ci dgos/ /ci dgar 'dod chags sbyor ba yis/ /de yis las rnams byed 'gyur te/ /yang dag sbyor ba thams cad
'grub/ /sbyor dang mi ldan dngos grub med/ /snying gar 'di nyid kyis byas te/ /mgu ba'i sbyor ba bde chen pos/ /rgyal ba mchog ni mnyes par 'gyur/ /mchog gi
bcing ba 'di kun dang / /'di yis las rnams thams cad dang / /yid la bsam pa thams cad 'thob/ /phan tshun du ni mgu byed cing / /mgu bas dngos grub
myur du thob/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te/ /rdo rje bkug nas sbom por sbyar/ /lhag ma 'od kyi tshul du gtong / /dga' byed mchog ni phyag rgya 'di/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu dngos
grub 'thob/ /rgyal srid nor dang 'bru yi rnams/ /de bzhin nor bu 'di dngos grub/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /lha dang lha min mchod par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid kyis ni 'di bcings
te| |mkhas pa yis ni dus mtshams phyir/ /gnas lngar rab tu sbyor ba yis/ /spyi bor dbang ni bskur byas na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi dbang / /de nas de ni nges par 'gyur/ /
lo gcig tsam du mnyam sbyar bas/ /phan tshun du ni dbang bskur bas/ /khams gsum rab dgyes bdag po ru/ /blo ldan rdo rje mi g.yeng 'gyur/ /de nyid 'khor lo bskor
byas te/ /snying gar 'khor lo bzhin du bskor/ /zla ba gcig tsam mnyam sbyor bas/ /'khor lo bskor ba rab tu bsgrub/ /de nyid g.yon par rab sbyar te/ /rgyal mtshan
tshul du yang dag spro/ /zhag bdun du na mnyam gzhag pas/ /'jig rten du ni rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de nyid kha nas bgad par sbyar/ /mnyam gzhag zla ba gcig tsam gyis//
las rnams thams cad rab grub pa/ /bgad pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur/ /thal mo de nyid mnyam bzhag ste/ /rtse mo kha phyed rnams bsgyur bas/ /sbom po ze bar rnam byas
@#/ /te| |lo ma lhag ma rgyas par bya/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las rab tu grol/ /bsod nams chen pos byin rlab
ste| |bde byed thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /thal mo de nyid snying gar sbyar/ /mchog dang khro mi gnyis sbyar te/ /de gnyis tshig gsum rab tu dgug /sbom po skyil
mo tsam du bya/ /rnal 'byor dag tu sbyor ba yis/ /'di yi zla ba gcig byas na/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal rjer/ /dpa' bo chen por de 'gyur ro/ /thal mo de
nyid mnyam sbyar te/ /rang gi snying gar bskor bar bya/ /de nas sngags mkhan chos ston par/ /mi g.yeng sems kyis de 'gyur ro/ /sdom po lce yi tshul bzhag pas//
de nyid khar ni rnam bzhag na/ /'jig rten kun gyi thams cad dag /mdor na zhag bdun tsam gyis kyang / /dbyig dang gser dang gos la sogs/ /bdud rtsi btung ba
mchog gi rnams/ /'di yis thams cad 'phrog byed de/ /'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te/ /mchog rab gnyis ni 'og tu gzhug /
chung ngu gnyis dang sbom po gnyis/ /sbyar te snying gar rab tu gzhug /yid la dga' ba'i las rnams thams cad byed/ /sgyu ma'i mthu dang srid pa mthar byed pa/ /rtag
tu blo ldan lo ni phyed gnyis kyis/ /khams gsum rgyal srid mthu chen thob par 'gyur/ /thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te/ /rang gi ma mchu dbus nyid nas/ /sbom po ro 'thob
tshul gyis ni/ /khro mo 'khor lo yang dag sbro/ /zhag bdun du ni bsgrims pa yis/ /'di yis khrag 'dren dngos grub ste/ /sha zas bza' ba las kun byed/ /thal mo
nyid ni bcings byas nas/ /rdo rje gnyis ni pad+mor sbyor/ /sbom por zur ni sbrel nas kyang / /chung ngu gnyis kyang de bzhin te/ /mgrin pa nas ni rtse mo brkyang / /thams cad las
ni sbyar byas te/ /'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag /rab tu sbyar bas 'jigs par 'gyur/ /thal mo de nyid mnyam gzhag nas/ /bcing ba dam pos bcing bar bya//
sbom po gnyis ni nang du gzhug /khro mo gnyis kyang bskul bar bya/ /'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag /'dzums par rab tu byas par 'gyur/ /skad cig tu ni gnon
byed de/ /de bzhin bsdus dang btsir bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas/ /de ni dngos grub thams cad kyi/ /dngos grub chen po bdag po dang / /thams cad
las don 'grub par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas/ /rim par myur du 'gro 'ong byed/ /lo gcig gi ni sbyor ba yis/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub par
@#/ /byed| |rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyi las thams cad byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma de dag thams cad rab tu mgu nas
ngo mtshar du gyur te/ rnam par 'gyur bas gar mdzad cing / /hi hi zhes pas glu ru len/ /ha ha zhes pas rab tu mgu/ /ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed/ /he he zhes
pas 'bod par byed/ /hUM hUM zhes pas gang bar byed/ /hA hA zhes pas skyong bar byed/ /phaT phaT zhes pas gsod par byed/ /hUM hUM zhes pas zur bus 'debs/ /dzA
dzA zhes pas 'dren par byed/ /sa sa zhes pas dam par byed/ /dge ba dbang phyug nga ro mchog /hUM hrUM zhes pas gsod par byed/ /hUM b+h+rUM hUM b+h+rUM/ hUM hUM zhes pas 'bar bar
byed| |truM truM zhes pas gzi brjid byed/ /triM triM zhes pas 'dren par byed/ /traM traM zhes pas mchod par byed/ /dngos grub thams cad 'bras bu smin/ /hraM hraM zhes pas rmongs
par byed/ /d+h+riM d+h+riM zhes pas 'dzums bar byed/ /hriM hriM zhes pas 'dren par byed/ /hUM hUM zhes pas 'phyan par byed/ /hroM hroM zhes pas rmongs par byed/ /hra hra zhes pas gnon
par byed/ /ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed/ /haM haM zhes pas srung bar byed/ /hUM hUM zhes pas gsod par byed/ /hu hu zhes pas mgu bar byed/ /traM traM zhes pas gdug par
byed| |g+huM g+huM zhes pas phreng bar byed/ /gaM gaM zhes pas dri ru byed/ /raM raM zhes pas rgyal bar byed/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i
tshogs rnams ngo mtshar cher gyur/ rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te/ rang gi sems mgu bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas yang bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po la phyag btsal te gsol ba 'debs so/ /gnyis med mchog tu rmad byung
ba| |bcom ldan de nyid bshad du gsol/ /gang gis sems can grub pa 'di/ /gsang ba sbas pa grub par 'gyur/ /gar dang glu dang bzhad pa che/ /sgeg mo rol pa
bde ba mchog /sil snyan gling bu rnams sna tshogs/ /brdab dang rgyud rnams rab 'byor pa/ /gsang rgyud cho ga'i rim pa rnams/ /rdzu 'phrul blo yi che ba che/ /dngos grub
thams cad grub pa yis/ /sngags rgyal khyod kyis bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan sangs rgyas rnams/ /thams cad bdag po rgyal po che/ /thog ma med nas spyod rmad
byung | |sna tshogs chen po rnams mi rtog /sna tshogs ye shes yon tan che/ /bla med chos kun dbang po ste/ /rig dang sngags kyi bdag po che/ /de nyid chen po snying po mchog
@#/ /blo rmongs phyag rgya rgyas 'debs te/ /rgyas 'debs rmongs byed za ba po/ /gtong dang byed pa khyab pa che/ /bskyod pa sdig pa 'phrog par byed//
sdig pa'i chos rnams sel bar byed/ /dus ngan 'dod byed khros pa po/ /gti mug chos rjes 'debs par byed/ /sa dang bar snang de bzhin bde/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor pa la
sbyin| |tshangs dang gtogs 'dod dbang chen pos/ /de la phyag dang mchod par byed/ /de nyid skyong byed skyob pa po/ /gsang ba'i gsang ba bde ba che/ /zla gsang thig le
las byung ba'i/ /sbas pa chen po gsang ba ston/ /nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje/ /bde ba chen po 'byin mdzad de/ /skal ldan nye bar longs spyod kun/ /bud med thams
cad dbang du byed/ /rang 'byung mtshan du thig le ste/ /bcu gsum dra ba dbu ru ldan/ /'di yis bud med bskyed byas te/ /sa bon gyis ni rgyal po 'du/ /'od zer gzi brjid
'bar ba can/ /rang las myu gur 'dra ba yi/ /'og gi phyogs su bzhag pa ni/ /traM byas myur du drang bar bya/ /dang po drang ba gnyis drang bas/ /tsheg drag des ni lcags
kyu byas/ /lha dang lha min mchog gi bdag /khams gsum thams cad drang bar byed/ /'di yi tshul gyis sbyor ba yi/ /phan tshun du ni bsgrubs byas nas/ /rmad byung rnam pa
sna tshogs kyis/ /dngos grub byed pa sbyin par byed/ /bdag nyid rang bzhin mthong bar bya/ /sbyor ldan zla ba'i gzugs nyid du/ /de ste sa bon gzhag par bya/ /de nyid de nyid
thabs kyis gnas/ /sngags kyi sbyor bar ba sbyor bas/ /de nas sngags mkhan der 'grub bo/ /de nyid sngags dang snying po dang / /phyag rgya rig dang mi ldan pas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje
sems dpa' yang / /'grub pa nyid du yong mi 'gyur/ /de nyid nang du sbyar byas na/ /snying po snying gar sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya phyag rgyas sbyar bar byas/ /sngags dang sngags kyi
'bru bsgoms te/ /rig ma rig ma nyid du sbyar/ /'di yis myur du dngos grub ste/ /mgyogs par 'gro ba rab tu 'grub/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis chen por/ /'byung dang 'byung
las 'gyur ba nye/ /rnal 'byor 'byor don sgrub pa po/ /dpa' bo chen po 'gro 'ong byed/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu mgu rangs par gyur te/ rdo rje'i
dbyangs 'di bsgrags so/ /kye ma'o kun tu bzang po yi/ /rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med/ /bshad pa gsang ba zhes bgyi ba/ /de nyid don du sgrub pa ste/ /snying po phyag rgya dam tshig
ni| |sngags rig rang gi lha nyid de/ /bdag gi de nyid ji bzhin pa/ /gsang ba rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni dam tshig dang / /gsang ba sbas pa
@#/ /de nyid de/ /'jig rten gsum gyis 'dud pa'i rim/ /dpa' bo chen pos rab tu bsgrags/ /rdo rje pad+mo rnam mdzad pas/ /rig ma dang ni lhan
cig rtse na/ /gdug pa thams cad mnye bya dang / /dam la zhe sdang bza' ba dang / /slob dpon smod la bsgral ba dang / /gzungs ma'i bdag por sgrub pa dang / /sangs rgyas
thams cad bskyed bya dang / /rab dgyes bdag nyid bskul ba dang / /sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang / /bud med thams cad 'dod bya dang / /bdud rnams thams cad
drang bya dang / /rdo rje kun tu gzhug bya dang / /pad+mo'i gnas ni dgang bya dang / /sgrub dang nye bar sgrub pa dang / /shin tu sbyor dang sbyor che ba/ /sbyor ba rab sbyor sbyor skye ba/ /
de rnams de nyid mkhyen pa'o/ /bde ba chen po nyid kyis gsungs/ /sgrub pa yi ni sbyor che ba/ /sbyor dang sbyor mar yang dag sbyor/ /de nyid gsal bar sems dpa' che/ /
phan par dgongs pa nyid kyis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i mdo rjes su dris pa rang gi thugs la gzhag
ste| nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ba/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni/ /kun tu sbyor ba mnyam par ldan/ /de nyid phyag rgya chen po ste/ /ye shes lnga yis
rjes su bskyed/ /dkyil 'khor phyag rgya bzhi pa ste/ /phyag rgya chen pos rjes su bsgrubs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed mdzad de/ /kye ma'o bde ba rnam par 'byung / /snying po ye shes
zhes bya ste/ /ye shes bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /phyag rgya ye shes phyag rgya che/ /dam tshig mchog ni rig ma'o/ /sngags kyi yi ge tshul 'dra ba/ /yi ge'i phyag rgya don chen sbyin//
'di yis sgrub pa byas pa'i gzungs/ /bdag gi de nyid lha de nyid/ /de dag de nyid ci bzhin par/ /nga yis gsang ba rab tu bsgrags/ /dam tshig ma yin mi shes la/ /sngags
rig pas ni bstan mi bya/ /phyag rgya thams cad gsang bya ste/ /dam tshig rgyas 'debs gsang ba yin/ /de nyid lha yi sbyor ba ni/ /gsang ba gsang ba rab tu bsgrub/ /rdo rje pad+mo
rnam mdzad pas/ /rol pa phyi nang sbyor ba yis/ /rig dang lhan cig rtsen bya ba/ /spyod pa dang ni 'khyud pa dang / /de bzhin mchu ni so yis bzung / /rdo rje brtan pa gzhug
par bya/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni/ /bskyod cing rnam par gar bya 'o/ /gdug pa thams cad mnye bya ste/ /nu ma mchan khung mkhur tshos gnyis/ /'gram pa dang ni
brla gnyis rgyab/ /rkang pa lag pa 'jam po gnyis/ /mnyes pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /mdza' ba chen po de 'grub bo/ /'dod pa'i don gyi bar gcod dang / /dam la zhe
@#/ /sdang bza' ba dang / /zhe sdang can gyis zos 'gyur ba/ /khyad par gzhan dang gzhan yang bza'/ /rtag par mi phyogs smra ba dang / /bla ma smod
rnams bsgral bya ba/ /sha dang khrag dang klad pa rnams/ /drangs te tshogs kyi mchod par bya/ /'di ni gsang ba drag po ste/ /rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang / /bla ma smod byed
brtson pa la/ /dam tshig phyir ni bsgrub par bya/ /gti mug de ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal ba yang 'thob 'gyur te/ /thams cad nad dang khros chen dang / /'jigs
byed nye bar 'tshe ba yis/ /bskal pa grangs med bye ba ru/ /sdug bsngal chen po sten byed cing / /'o dod 'bod par sprul gyi bdag /bstir med chen po brlag par
'gro| lus ngag sems ni bde dam pa/ /rig ma kun la bskyod byas te/ /byang chub chen po bde ba yi/ /tshul bzhin du ni bsngags par bya/ /bskul ba'i snying po 'di
smras te/ /dzaHzhes skad cig skad cig tu/ /rang gi gnas nas gnas pa yis/ /de nyid las ni bskyod bar bya/ /bcu drug cha dang yang dag ldan/ /zla ba gsang ba'i
thig le la/ /me tog dang ni 'dra ba nyid/ /rlung gis phul ba bskyod par bya/ /de ni bskyod pas 'grub pa ste/ /de bzhin du yang bskul bar bya/ /rgyun gyi phreng ni 'od gsal
bzhin/ /blo ldan rtag tu bsgrub par bya/ /bdud rnams thams cad 'dren pa ni/ /lha ma rnams ni snying por bshad/ /zhags pa'i tshul gyis gzhug pa dang / /de bzhin dgang ba
bcing pa'o/ /sgrub pa lha yi sbyor ba ste/ /rjes su sgrub pa lha mo'i don/ /sgrub pa chen po gnyi ga'i rgya/ /mnyam par sbyor ba rdo rje'i mchog /nye bar sgrub pa gnyi ga gnas/ /shin
tu sgrub pa bde dam pa/ /so yi rtse mos mchu bzung ste/ /ma mchu mchog ni bsdam par bya/ /sbyor ba rab sbyor skal ldan pa'i/ /rab dgyes ro myang bde dam pa/ /lha dang lha nyid
yang dag sbyor/ /'di ni gnyis su med ces bya/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis/ /nyid kyi gzugs ni bsgrub bya ste/ /bdag ni sems dpa'o zhes bsams na/ /'di ni
gnyis med myur du 'gyur/ /gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i lha'i/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /sbyor dang rab sbyor sbyor che ba/ /rgyal ba kun gyi mchog gi
gsungs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sbyor ba ste/ /rab tu sbyor ba mkha' la 'gro/ /phyag rgya de dag rab sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba chen po bsgrags pa yin/ /'di yis dpa' bo thams
cad dang / /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba'i dbang po bde ba che/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na/ /rdo rje'i bdag po
@#/ /chen por 'gyur/ /mnyam par sbyor ba sbyar ba yis/ /'jig rten gsum po myur du rgyal/ /yang dag sbyor ba sbyar tshul gyis/ /drangs te rab tu
bcug nas kyang / /rdo rje brtan pos bskul byas te/ /shin tu 'dod pas 'dod pa bskyed/ /mkha' 'gro thams cad thabs mkhas ldan/ /rgyas dang de bzhin zag
par bya/ /'di ni yang dag sbyor bas sbas/ /sbas pa rnal 'byor ma dkyil lo/ /'di yis yang dag dngos grub blang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'bras bu thob/ /sangs rgyas
byang chub bde che dang / /byang chub mchog rab yang dag 'thob/ /gsang ba chen po rmad byung ba/ /de dag de nyid sbas pa che/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dris pa'i rgya/ /
nga yis yang dag rab tu bstan/ /gang gis yang dag ldan mthong dang / /bdag po chen po mchod byed na/ /dre yis ston pa kun mthong ste/ /rgyal ba mchog la mchod
par 'gyur/ /srid pa gcod pa por 'gyur te/ /'gro ba'i ston pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /de la lha kun mchod byed cing / /skad cig skad cig phyag kyang byed/ /ji ltar
ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /phan byed 'jig rten skyes gyur pa/ /sna tshogs ye shes rjes bsdus pas/ /rnal 'byor chen por de bzhin 'gyur/ /rang gis dam tshig
bsrungs pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde skye ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ldan pas/ /dngos grub chen po des 'thob po/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan btab la/ /cung zad
mi 'grub yong med de/ /phyag rgya kun gyi bde ba che/ /bdag nyid so sor rjes su 'grub/ /rab dgyes mtshan dang mdza' chen mo/ /ro dang reg pa'i che ba'i che/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' sbyor ba yis/ /dpyad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas de dag mgu 'gyur te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde che ba/ /sbyor ba 'dod pa'i gzir pa yis/ /sbyor ba
chen pos mnyes par mdzad/ /ra ma ra ma sa ma ho mahA satwa/ /rab dgyes gdon mi za la bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /zla gsang thig ler yang dag
ldan| |bdag cag kun kyang dam tshig ste/ /skal ldan dri med rab dgyes kyi/ /rnal 'byor ma snying mchog nyid du/ /sbyor chen nyid kyis rol pa mdzod/ /theg pa chen po bde
che yi| |pad+mo rdo rje'i rin chen gyis/ /rnal 'byor ma kun dkyil 'khor du/ /rab dgyes longs spyod gnyis bsten mdzod/ /bdag cag thams cad nyes bral te/ /gnod
med de ni gser dang 'dra/ /de nyid thams cad grub chen po/ /rab dgyes bdag nyid nyid bsten mdzod/ /spros pa 'khyud ba sbas pa dang / /gzhug pa dang ni gtong ba'i
@#/ /mchog /'di ni sgyu ma'i brtan pa yis/ /ded dpon rab tu brtag par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang pos
'dod pa thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sbas pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
te/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i kun tu 'khyud pa dang / sprod pa dang / gzhug pa dang / 'dren pa dang / rab tu bskul ba dang / mnye ba dang / /
thigs pa dang / tshor bar bya ba dang / bskyod pa dang / kun tu bskyod pa dang / bcing ba'i rdo rje dang / pad+ma chen mo mnyam du sbyor ba la yang dag par zhugs te/ shin
tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos bde bas kun tu rgyas par mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gzungs ma'i tshogs thams cad la bskyod pa dang /
rab tu rgyas pa dang / rab tu rnam par 'byin cing shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i mnyam nyid kyi tshogs kyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kun tu rgyas par byas
te gnas so/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma chen mo shin tu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid chen po de dag nyid mgu zhing bde bar gyur te/ kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che/ /rdzogs sangs
rgyas ni mgu ba che/ /bde ba chen po rangs par 'gyur/ /kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che/ /bde ba nyid kyis phyag byed de/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po/ /mgu ba chen po'i
bde dang ldan/ /kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che/ /'jigs shing skrag pas sdud par byed/ /khros pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma/ /rab tu mi bzad dug dang 'dra/ /bde byed chen po'i rol
pa yis/ /bde byed che la mchod par byed/ /skal ba chen po srin mo dang / /bde byed bde bas rab mongs pa/ /mchod pa'i sprin phung bde ldan pa'i/ /rgya chen mchog gis mchod
par byed/ /drag mo chen mo ma lta bu/ /rab tu gtum pa me 'dra ba/ /'ongs nas bde byed chen mo yis/ /gtso bo mchog la mchod par byed/ /lha dang lha mo thams cad kyang / /
klu mo dang ni rta gdong yang / /'ongs nas bde ba sbyor ba yis/ /yid du 'ong bas mchod par byed/ /de nas dbang po lha chen po/ /bdag nyid chen po lha yi lha/ /kye ma'o bde
ba sna tshogs nyid/ /sna tshogs sbyor ba bde ba che/ /mgu zhing rab tu rangs pa yis/ /lha yi lha ni sngon du 'gro/ /dpa' bo bde la phyag byas te/ /kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che/ /rang
gi bde bas mngon mchod cing / /'jigs shing skrag pas mnyes par byed/ /tshad med rangs pa bzhad pa che/ /glu gar mchog tu ldan pa dang / /bza' dang bca' ba sha
@#/ /chen dang / /sil snyan phreng ba ro chen dang / /gling bu rgyud mang rdza rnga dang / /pi wang pa la kig hal le/ /stag dang dpa' bo 'jigs pa dang / /
zhi dang rmad 'byung 'jigs byed dang / /bdag dang khros dang spyan rgyas pas/ /skad cig skad cig mchod byed cing / /byed pa dang ni bzlog pa dang / /'phrog pa dang ni
gzhug pa dang / /sId ces pa dang hUM hUM dang / /ha ha zhes pas mnyes byed cing / /rab dgyes bdag nyid bde ba yi/ /rang gi chung mas mnyes par byed/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po rab tu dgyes pa bde ba chen pos nam mkha' dang nam mkha'i skabs thams cad la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang
chub sems dpa' dang / rang rgyal dang / nyan thos dang / rang bzhin gyis 'gag pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes la gnas pa rnams shin tu
dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i thabs dang / shes rab kyi bde bas bkug ste dbang bskur nas/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par
'jog pa dang / shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i chos nyid kyi rgyal po rjes su skyong zhing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi
khams chen po ma lus pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams su rab tu gzigs pas gzigs nas/ 'jig rten dang lhar bcas pa rnams la bde ba chen pos khyab par mdzad
de| sems can dang / rigs thams cad dang / gnas thams cad dang / spyod pa dang / mi spyod par bcas pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa dang / sa'i 'og dang
phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / bsags pa'i dbang po lnga dang / rnam par shes pa dang / shes bya dang / bdag dang / bdag gi dang / sna tshogs dang / sna
tshogs ma yin pa dang / bus pa dang / rgan po dang / gzhon nu dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / skyes pa ma yin pa dang / srog dang / rab tu zad pa dang / 'jigs pa dang /
mi 'jigs pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / shes pa dang / mi shes pa dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / khyab pa dang /
khyab byed dang / zla ba dang / dbang chen dang / nyi ma dang / me dang / gshin rje dang / chu bdag dang / lus srul po dang / tshangs pa dang / gtogs 'dod dang / dbang phyug
chen po dang / lha mo dang / skal pa dang ldan pa dang / skal ba dang mi ldan pa dang / dngos po dang / dngos po med pa dang / mtshan dang / rdo rje dang / pad+mo dang / rin po che
@#/ /dang | ral gri dang / tho ba dang / dbyig pa dang / rtse gsum pa dang / 'khor lo dang / sbyor ba dang / rab tu sbyor ba dang / stong pa dang / stong
chen po dang / mchog tu stong pa dang / shin tu stong pa dang / stong pa rab tu stong pa dang / byang chub dang / byang chub kyi sems dang / yi ge dang / yi ge med pa dang
dra ba dang / lcug ma dang / cha dang / cha med pa dang / thig le dang / ro dang / ro chen po dang / yid la byed pa med pa dang / rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang / mi zad pa dang /
thar pa dang / thar byed dang / grol ba dang / rigs pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / nam mkha' dang / skabs dang / skabs med pa rnams la gcig tu stug
por gyur te/ rnam par phye nas mi snang ba'i tshul du gnas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / thabs
kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin ma rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
po shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba chen po gsang ba chen po'i dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa chen po la phyag mdzad de/ mngon sum du yang dag par bskul
nas dris pa/ su ra ta staM ma si ho/ /gang phyir 'dod pa bde ba che/ /gang gis 'dod las byang chub 'gyur/ /'dod chags bral ba ji ltar bde/ /gang gis zhe sdang rdo rje che/ /gang
gis gti mug rgyal ba che/ /gang gis 'dod chags pad+mor 'gyur/ /gang gis nga rgyal nam mkha'i bdag /gang gis phrag dog gdon mi za/ /byang chub sems ni ji ltar bde/ /
gang gis bde byed mchod par 'gyur/ /mchod pa yis ni ji ltar 'grub/ /ji ltar gzungs dang mnyam sbyor bas// yi ge mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i
yon tan lnga/ /bsnyen pa yis ni myur du 'grub/ /ji ltar gsang ba mnyam sbyor bas/ /rmad du byung ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur/ /ji ltar pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas/ /dkyil 'khor
rab tu zhugs par 'gyur/ /ji ltar dri chu byang chub dang / /khrag dang snang mdzad chen po yis/ /dam tshig nyid du ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar btung ba rab tu brtag /de nas bcom
ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen pos rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba chen mo de dag thams cad la rang gi bde bas mnyes par byas
te| mi mnyam pa dang / /mnyam pa'i sbas pa chen po shin tu sbas pa mchog tu gsang ba'i dris lan chen po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /ngan song
@#/ /gsum gyi 'jigs byed du/ /sems can nyon mongs sdang byed pas/ /de phyir de ni rdo rje che/ /zhe sdang zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/ /ngan song
'jigs pa chen po ru/ /sems can thams cad rmongs byed pas/ /de phyir 'di ni gti mug ste/ /rtag pa thub pa mchog yin no/ /thabs dang shes rab tshul nyid
kyis| |'gro ba thams cad dga' byed cing / /pad+mo'i tshul tu rab rtogs phyir/ /de phyir 'dod chags zhes bya'o/ /bde chen sbyin pa'i sprin gyis ni/ /sems can thams
cad nga rgyal bskyed/ /nam mkha'i bde ba bsdus pa'i phyir/ /de phyir mkha' chen nga rgyal yin/ /ro la sogs pa'i mnyam sbyor bas/ /phrag dog rdo rje gdon mi za/ /
sna tshogs pad+mo rab 'jug phyir/ /de yi phyir ni sna tshogs che/ /'dod chags bral ba dga' med phyir/ /bdag ni dgyes sbas pa che/ /'dod pa ma gtogs bde
byed med/ /bde che 'dod pa nga yin no/ /'dod chags med par byang chub med/ /byang chub med na'ang 'dod chags med/ /sdig pa'i nang na chags bral te/ /sangs rgyas
bde mchog mnyes byed pas/ /'dod chags 'dod las bde byed kyi/ /bde ba mchog tu rmad byung 'gyur/ /byang chub sems med bde byed gzhan/ /'jig rten
gsum po 'dir med do/ /thams cad byang chub sems ngo bo/ /bde ba kun gyis tshim par 'gyur/ /bo zhes pa ni rdo rjer bshad/ /d+hi zhes pa ni gzungs ma'i mchog/ ci zhes
pa ni zag par bshad/ /ta zhes pa ni bde ba che/ /mchod pa med pas bde byed med/ /bde ba med pas mgu ba med/ /mgu bas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /grub na bde byed
rtag pa yi/ /phyag na rdo rje bde ba che/ /'dod pa'i bde bas mchod byed cing / /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /bde ba kun gyis gzhir gyur pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par
'dzin/ /rdo rje 'dzin phyir gzungs ma yin/ /hrI zhes pa ni pad+mo 'dzin/ /'di dang mnyam par sbyor ba yi/ /yi ge myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /'dod pa lnga yi yon tan kun/ /
rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ste/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i longs spyod de/ /de phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga/ /de yis bsnyen na grub par 'gyur//
sngags kyi sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan/ /dbang phyug mchog gis sngags rgyal lo/ /rdo rje sems kyi thugs las skyes/ /mtshan can mchog tu sbas par bshad/ /de dang mnyam du
sbyor ba yis/ /mchog gi dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur/ /pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub par byed/ /blo ldan de ru zhags gyur na'o/ /dam tshig
@#/ /spas pa chogs kyi rnams/ /dri chu byang chub dmar po'i mchog /sha chen sbrang rtsi mar nyid kyis/ /lus la kun tu khyab gnas te/ /de yi phyir ni
dam tshig che/ /dam tshig 'di yis dngos grub ste/ /dam tshig yi ger ldan pa yis/ /sbyor ces sbyang dang bskyed byas na/ /bza' ba dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/ /de nas
pha rol phyin ma kun/ /pad+mo'i gzigs pa rgyas pa yi/ /'dzum bcas g.yon nas gar mdzad cing / /rtag pa la ni yang gsol pa/ /rigs ni rnam pa du ru bstan/ /ji ltar
sbas pa gsum zhes bgyi/ /sna tshogs chen po de dag kun/ /bde la gnas pas bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba pha rol tu phyin ma'i de kho na nyid rab tu phyung ngo / /nga nyid sbyor ba bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' don chen sbyin/ /rigs kyi
khyad par lnga rnams kyis/ /sbyong bcas mi spyod rnams la rol/ /rtag pa mi bskyod rin chen mchog /'jig dbang gdon mi za grub rnams/ /rigs ni rnam pa brgyad
bstan te/ /mdo ru bsdus na rnam pa lnga/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis/ /khyad par theg pa rnam pa gsum/ /de nyid gsum po rdo rje mnga'/ /bde ba'i gnas la rol pa
mdzad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ rang gi sdom pa gsol ba 'debs so/ /sdom pa dngos grub kun sbyin
pa| |brtul zhugs dka' thub sngags mkhan gyi/ /dam tshig mchog tu srung ba rnams/ /bcom ldan gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang
po mchog tu shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba la mngon par chags pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen te/ zhal rab tu bzhad pas rgyas
nas nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / /thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /sku dang gsung dang thugs sbas pas/ /nan tan du ni bsrung bar bya/ /bsrungs pa yis ni bsod nams
che| |dngos grub shin tu skye bar 'gyur/ /de ni 'di yis rgya che ba'i/ /yid kyis kha dog dbyibs chen gyi/ /phyag rgya bcings la sogs pas btab/ /sbas pa'i sku ni
rab bsgrub bya/ /rdo rje gsung du rab sbyor bas/ /chos kyi ngo bo phyag rgyas brjod/ /ngag sbas gsang bar brjod pa ni/ /nga ro spangs pa rdo rje'i gsung / /rang sems rab tu
@#/ /'bigs pa yis/ /zla ba rdo rje rnam par sgom/ /rang bzhin gsum po gcig tu sgom/ /'di ni yid sbas chen po yin/ /'di ni de nyid rgya chen
mchog /rgyun du sgom pa rnams byas te/ /gsum bsgoms pas ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzhan min rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs/ /sbas gsum la sogs cho ga yis/ /
phyag rgya thams cad rgyas btab ste/ /de bas nan tan thams cad kyi/ /sbas gsum rnam par sba bar bya/ /rdo rje mchog 'dzin chen po dang / /gtso bo chen pos byin gyis
rlob| /blon po gang gis 'das byas na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa skad cig 'jig /sems dpa' che dang bral 'gyur na/ /ngan song gsum du yang dang yang / /ji tsam nam
mkha'i dkyil 'khor ba/ /shin tu mi bzad smin par 'gyur/ /de nas dam tshig de dag kun/ /rdo rje 'dzin la mgu gyur te/ /'jam po'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing //
g.yon gyis phyag byas slar gsol pa/ /gar dbang rnam gnon gnon par gar mdzad cing / /mtha' yas phyag ni bcu pa'i bsgyings pa yis/ /pad+ma'i lo ma 'jam po
brgyad phye nas/ /gnyis min bde bar rdo rje 'jog mdzad de/ /sbas pa de nyid mi mnyams sad par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dam skyes zla ba yang dag 'du/ /thabs dang shes
rab dgyes pa bde byed sogs/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi sbas pa nyid kyis shod/ /sbyor dang sbyor min yang dag sbyor/ /zhi ba'i thal mo mchog tu bde/ /'dod pa lnga yi yon
tan 'grub/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan dam tshig rgyal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /de nyid sbas pa bskul ba yis/ /sbas pa ma lus 'chad
par 'chad/ /rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas/ /cho gar ldan pas gang dbang bskur/ /bde bar 'dod pa'i slob dpon gyis/ /de nyid 'di ni de la bstan/ /'di la khrus med nges pa
med| |dka' thub med de dka' ba'ang med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /nga nyid sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje dbab pa skyes 'gyur na/ /ji tsam 'dod par nam mkhar 'phur/ /snying gar rdo rje khu tshur bcings/ /rdo rje lta bas rnam bltas te/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis
bsnyen byas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' skad cig 'gyur/ /rnam sgeg dgyes pa'i rnam gnon pas/ /rab dgyes sar ni 'gro byed de/ /sangs rgyas bde ba chen po dang / /grub pa yis
byang mchod byed cing / /rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya che mchog /'gying ba'i langs pas gar byed pas/ /bde byed zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing / /las kyi khyad par la sogs gnon/ /
@#/ /sbas pa'i gar gyis gar byas pas/ /sbas pa sbyor ba'i bdag nyid 'grub/ /sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gar byed cing / /lag pa mang po rnam bsgyur
dang | |phyir brkyang dbyings su ldan pa dang / /khro bar dri med lta ba yis/ /gdul dka' gnon pa 'jigs byed pa'i/ /'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur/ /me 'bar
nyi ma'i dbus nyid du/ /khro bo hUM mdzad bsgom byas na/ /myur du 'jig rten don sgrub phyir/ /'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur/ /lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor pas/ /
su ra ta s+t+waM zhes smra zhing / /ha ra thig le tshul sbyar na/ /rab dgyes de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /rab dgyes mchog tu brtag pa yi/ /sa chen rnal 'byor 'gro 'gyur te/ /lha mo
bzhi dang 'grogs pa yi/ /sems can rnams kyi don kun byed/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bde ba chen po la phyag bzhes nas gsol ba/ thal
mo yang dag sbyor byas te/ /phyag rgya de nyid kyis shod/ /rdo rje mchog la gsol ba 'debs/ /bde ba'i bdag nyid mchod par shod/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri che dang / /
ro dang reg pa yid 'ong ba'i/ thugs rje chen pos bsgrubs pa yis/ /dpa' bo chen po nyid kyis shod/ /de nas bcom ldan bde byed che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po
che| |phyag rgya bcings pa bde ba che/ /de nyid mchog ni bshad par mdzad/ /dang po chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ /gnyis pa dam tshig phyag rgya yin/ /gsum pa phyag rgya chen po ste/ /bzhi
pa las kyi phyag rgyar bshad/ /de nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje/ /ji ltar 'gying bzhin bsgom bya ba/ /sna tshogs ye shes rjes su dag /sna tshogs chen pos 'chad par mdzad//
rtag pa'i sku ni ser po ste/ /mi bskyod rdo rje dkar po yin/ /nam mkha'i snying po mthing ga che/ /tshe dpag med pa pad+mo dmar/ /sna tshogs kha dog rgya tsho mchog /'od zer phreng ba
rmad byung ba'i/ /gdon mi za ba rdo rje che/ /don chen byed pa bsam par bya/ /rang rang rigs kyi gnas nyid du/ /myur du nam mkhar 'gro byed cing / /rigs kyi lha mo bzhi rnams
kyis| |rol pa dang ni mchod par byed/ /sna tshogs sbyor ba bde che ba'i/ /lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje sbyor bdag bsgoms byas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid
'gyur/ /rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog /rdo rje la sogs gdan bzhugs par/ /rang gi 'khor lo mchog gi rgyan/ /rang gi phyag rgyar gnas par bsam/
pad+mo'i gdan gyi tshul gyis ni/ /brtse dang ldan pas bsgoms byas te/ /snying po sbas don gar byas pas/ /sbas pa che la bde byed na/ /'gying ba'i bde bar ldan pa yi/ /
@#/ /rdo rje chen po de 'grub ste/ /sna tshogs dkyil 'khor rab nye ba/ /sna tshogs chen po 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bde ba chen po thams cad 'grub pa'i
sbyor pa chen po'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya rab tu rgyas pa'o/ /de nas phyag rgya bcings bshad de/ /rtag la sogs pa'i de kho na/ /gang gis myur du bcings pa
yi| |sangs rgyas dngos grub bde cher 'gro/ /thabs ni g.yas kyi logs su bya/ /de bzhin shes rab g.yon par te/ /zhi ba'i thal mo gsum nyid kyi/ /sbyor
ba'i tshul gyis bsdu bar bya/ /sor mo thams cad bar bar du/ /mnyam du sbyor bas khyad par sbyin/ /rdo rje yi ni thal mo 'dis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad nyid du
bsgrub/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /nam mkha'i snying po'i gnas su 'gro/ /'di nyid shin tu bcings pa yi/ /gsum du sbyor bas mchod pa bya/ /de nyid
las ni sor mo kun/ /kun tu bskums te bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje'i bcing ba bsdus pas ni/ /bcing bar ldan par rnam bsgyur te/ /de nyid sbom po rab bcug nas/ /khro
mo'i rtse mo rab tu dgug /'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi bcing / /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'grub byed/ /de bzhin bcing ba rnam bzhag ste/ /sbom po khro mo'i rtse mo sbyar/ /'di
ni bcing ba bcing ba che/ /nam mkha' 'gro ba nye bar sgrub/ /de nyid bcing bas bcing byas te/ /khro mo gnyis po mtshan bzhin du/ /rtse mo sprad de dgug bya ba/ /bcing ba 'di
yis pad+mo sgrub/ /bcing ba de nyid rab tu sbom/ /bde ba bcug nas bsdam byas te/ /las kyi bcing ba sbyor ba yis/ /don yod mchog gi rigs su 'gro/ /bcing ba de nyid
bcing byas te/ /sbom dang khro bo'i rtse mo sbyar/ /g.yas pa'i sbom po rdo rje yis/ /de yi dbus su bcug bya ba/ /de 'di bcing ba chen po ste/ /rab dgyes ro ni sgrub byed pa/ /gang
gis bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /rab tu dgyes pa nyid 'thob bo/ /dngos grub thams cad bde ba che/ /de yis 'di tshe 'thob 'gyur te/ /phyag rgya bcing ba'i cho ga yis/ /sangs
rgyas thams cad rab tu gnas/ /phyag rgya bcing ba'i ye shes rnam par rgyas pa'o// //bcing ba lnga yi cho ga yis/ /gcig gis rnal 'byor bsgrub mi bya/ /drug ni
sbyor bas sbyor byas na/ /de ma thag tu rab dgyes 'gyur/ /bcing ba lnga yi phyag rgya'o/ /de bzhin bcing ba gnyis byas te/ /g.yon gyi snying gar bcing bar bya/ /g.yas kyi rtse mo
sgrang byas te/ /rdo rje'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni byang chub bde/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu sgrub/ /gdon mi za bar tshe 'di la/ /rtag pa 'dra ba thob
@#/ /par byed/ /g.yon pa de nyid snying gar bzhag /g.yas pa sa la reg byas pas/ /sa la bde bar rol pa yis/ /'di yis mi zad 'thob par
'gyur/ /de bzhin snying gar g.yon pa bzhag /lag pa g.yas pa rab sbyin bya/ /'di yis rin chen skal ldan sogs/ /nam mkha' nye bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /de
bzhin g.yon pa snying gar bzhag /g.yas kyang bzhag ste ting 'dzin gnas/ /'di yis tshe dpag med pa nyid/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin g.yon
pa snying gar sbyar/ /lag pa g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin/ /'jigs pa ma lus rab sgrol ba/ /sdig pa gdug pa 'jigs pa che/ /'di yis thams cad 'phrog par
byed| /gdon mi za ba'i nges pa yis/ /de ni chen po'i chen por 'gyur/ /de nyid bcing ba gnyis byas te/ /g.yon pa g.yon du sbyar bar bya/ /g.yas ni snying gar gzung
byas te/ /brjid pas rab tu bzhad cing gnas/ /bde ba chen po thabs gnas pas/ /'di yis rab dgyes nyid 'gyur te/ /bde mchog nyid du sgrub pa po/ /tshe 'di nyid
la the tshom med/ /de bzhin bcing ba bcing byas te/ /sbyor dang ldan pas bstan par bya/ /sbom po'i rtse mo pad+mo'i gnas/ /g.yon gyi khro mo'i rtse mor sbyar/ /g.yas
pa yi ni sbom po yi/ /mngon sum rdo rjer byas pa yis/ /bcug nas bde ba spyod bya zhing / /skad cig skad cig bsdam par bya/ /de 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /dgyes
pa dgyes mchog sgrub pa po/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /yang dag rdo rje dgyes pa 'thob/ /rab dgyes bde mchog longs spyod kyi/ /btsun mo dngos grub nyid du
'gyur/ /g.yas ni mtshan mas bgrang byas te/ /lcags kyu'i tshul du gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje 'dod ma lcags kyu ste/ /rdo rje 'dod byed btsun mo yi/ /dang por 'dren pa de nyid
bzhag /tha mar ha ra thig ler bya/ /rdo rje dgyes pa bde 'thob byed/ /ming ni dbus su bri bar bya/ /'di yis snying gar byas pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog
'gro/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis/ /lus 'dis tshe 'di 'grub par 'gyur/ /rab dgyes sbyor bar yang dag ldan/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'grogs shing / /rdo
rje 'gying la sogs sprod pas/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis/ /rab dgyes la sogs ma lus pa/ /rab dgyes ro la bsgyings ma yis/ /skad cig nyid du 'dren
par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sbom mo'i rtse mor sbyar/ /snying rje chen po der bzhag pa/ /sbal pa chen po rdo rje spyan/ /de nyid don kun ston byed ma/ /'di ni yang dag bcings pa
@#/ /yis| |rdo rje rtag pa'i spyan du 'gyur/ /yod dang med pa rnam spangs pa/ /dngos po thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i thal mo bstan bya ste//
khro mo rtse mo zlum po yis/ /mthon por mtshan dang 'dra byas te/ /sbom por rdo rje bstan pa'i tshe/ /de 'di bcom ldan 'das ma mchog /rdo rje pad+mo'i bde 'thob byed/ /rnal 'byor
'di ni bcings pa yis/ /sbas pa chen po'i dgyes pa 'thob/ /de nas lha mo chen mo dag /spros pa che bas gar mdzad cing / /rdo rje bde byed bdag nyid la/ /bdud dang
bcas pas phyag byas te/ /chos kyi yi ge thabs gnas nas/ /de nyid chos kyi gsol ba 'debs/ /chos kyi phyag rgya bde ba che/ /rdo rje bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /
sgrub pa pos ni rab bsgrims na/ /gang gis lha ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang gis myur du byin brlabs pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub ste/ /bde byed gnyis
kyis spro che ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas 'jug 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ nyid kyi sku dang /
gsung dang / thugs rdo rje sbas pa las chos kyi phyag rgya chen po'i tshig 'di phyung ngo / /bcu gsum bdag nyid 'dren pa ste/ /thig le lhar ni yang dag ldan/ /tha mar
ha ra thig ler gnas/ /rab tu dgyes pa rdo rje dgyes/ /snying gar phyag rgya 'di byas nas/ /dga' byed lhan cig rtsen byed cing / /spyod dang mi spyod 'grub 'gyur te/ /rnal 'byor
bde ba chen por 'gro/ /de bzhin 'dren pa thog mar bya/ /rdo rje 'dod pa kyo ba mchog /har thig le yang dag ldan/ /cha gnyis gsum pa sbyar byas pa/ /'di ni snying gar bzhag
byas na/ /bde bar nam mkhar 'gro 'gyur te/ /bde ba shin tu rtag pa yi/ /'di yis mchog tu dngos grub bo/ /'dren pa de nyid thog mar bzhag /ltos ltos zhes pa hUM
dang ldan/ /skal pa chen po rdo rje spyan/ /dbus su bskul bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /'phrul gyi spyan lnga nor che ba/ /'di yis rnal 'byor 'grub 'gyur te/ /rdo rje byang
chub dgyes pa che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ /dang por 'dren pa de nyid bzhag /tha mar ha ra thig ler bya/ /rdo rje dgyes pa bde 'thob byed/ /ming
ni dbus su bri bar bya/ /'di yis snying gar byas pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog 'gro /phyag rgya bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis/ /lus 'dis 'di che
'grub par 'gyur/ /rab dgyes sbyor bar yang dag zhon/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'grogs shing / /rdo rje 'gying la sogs sprod pas/ /bcom ldan 'dod ma
@#/ /'grub par 'gyur/ /chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o// //de nas bcom ldan sbyor ba che/ /thog ma tha ma
med pa mchog /gdug pa thams cad gdul ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje khro bor de 'gyur ro/ /mdun du thog ma'i lha nyid du/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad nyi ma 'bar/ /nyi ma bcu gnyis
gzi brjid che/ /me 'bar rab tu 'bar bar ldan/ /'khor gyi 'khor lo de dag kun/ /dur khrod kyi ni rgyan mchog gis/ /brgyan te gdug pa'i tshogs rnams la//
de ni yang dag rol pa mdzad/ /khro chen mchog 'dul phyag rgya 'di/ /sngags ni rang gi snying gar bsgom/ /khro mo'i bu mos mdun du bskor/ /khro mo chen mo de
'grub bo/ /'di yis gdug pa thams cad rnams/ /hUM byas myur du brgyab par 'gyur/ /de dag gdug pa gdug pa che/ /'jigs shing 'khrugs te rab tu 'jig /
skyobs shig skyobs shig ces smra zhing / /rdo rje gtsol dran par byed/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mnyam par gzhag /'gro ba thams cad dbab bya ste/ /las mchog thams
cad sgrub pa pos/ /dgra yi rnams ni gzhig par bya/ /sbyor dang ldan pas 'bum bzlas te/ /las rnams thams cad byed ba na/ /gdon mi za bar kun 'gyur te/ /rdo
sems dpa' bsgrub par nus/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /khro bo'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ /de nas sangs rgyas che de dag /sangs rgyas
nyid skyes thams cad mchog /gzugs ma rnal 'byor ma thams cad/ /rang gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs/ /phan tshun bde ba ldan pa yi/ /dga' bas 'khor rnams
'phags 'gyur te/ /rang gi bde byed skyes par 'brel/ /skal pa chen me rtsen par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen pos rang gi 'khor
gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs rnams la yang dang / yang du gzigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dren pa'i rig ma'i snying po 'dis sdud pa mdzad do/ /oM badzra

ang+ku sha /du ru du ru/ e h+ye hi kaD+D+h+ya bi kaD+D+h+ya sar+b+bAn+paR+Sha ta tsakra sany+tsa ya/ badzra ang+ku sha hUM phaT/ 'di yi phyag rgya rdo rje yi/ /bcings pa gnyis ni dam byas te/ /rdo rje khro mo dgrol
bar bya/ /rdo rje'i khro ba rab sbyar ba/ /rdo rje'i kyo ba zhes bya'o/ /'gro dang ri bo sems can rnams/ /phyag rgya 'di yis kun bkug ste/ /'dod pas 'gying ba'i yid rtag rnams//
mi yi bu mo smos ci dgos/ /rdo rje bcings pa mnyam gzhag ste/ /g.yon gyi steng du de bzhin bzhag /dbus su sbom mo gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje 'dren pa gzi brjid che//
@#/ /rdo rje bcing pa bsdam byas te/ /rdo rje sbom mo rtse mo sprad/ /bdag ni rdo rje zhes bsgom zhing / /bcing ba de ni dgrol bar bya/ /de nyid bcing ba dam
byas te/ /dbang dang chung ngu'i rtsa ba'i mtshams/ /rdo rje sbom mo nus byas te/ /rab dgyes bdag nyid bskyod par bya/ /de las rdo rje mchog gnyis bskyed/ /mdud pa'i
tshul du sbyar bar bya/ /gzhug pa dang ni 'dren pa'i mchog /'di yis thams cad dngos grub pas/ /rnal 'byor phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis/ /drangs te bcug nas bcing
byas te/ /dbang du byas nas bsgrub par bya/ /de nas de dag thams cad drangs bcug bcings dga' ba bskyed nas/ rang gi rab tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos/ /rang
gi rgyal srid rjes su skyong zhing rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi tshul chen po/ /dga' byed zla gsang thig le yi/ /rab dgyes bdag nyid gsang
ba 'di/ /sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis zungs/ /de nas gdan las myur bzhengs te/ /thal mo sbyar te phyag bzhes nas/ /chos kyi ngo bor chig smras pa/ /bde ba chen po
bdag gis blangs/ /rang bde longs spyod gar byas te/ /rdo rje tshe yis 'di skad smras/ /rdo rje chos ni sna tshogs che/ /sna tshogs pad+mo gar rab byed/ /de nas pha rol
phyin de kun/ /rab dgyes longs spyod gar byed cing / /bde byed chen po'i bdag nyid rje/ /legs pa zhes pa sbyin byed de/ /legs so legs so bde ba che/ /legs so legs so
ye shes che/ /legs so legs so sna tshogs che/ /legs so legs so dgyes pa che/ /bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa'i thugs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ pha rol tu phyin
ma'i 'khor chen mo de dag mngon par dga' bar gyur to/ /zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs so// //lo ts+tsha ba rin
chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o/ /gsung rab don rtogs slob dpon gyis/ /lhag par bkrol te bstan pa la/ /ci rigs bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis/ /sems can sems
bde thob par smon// //rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga tat+t+wa saM gra ha nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus
pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
na| bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad thugs rje chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje byin gyis brlabs dang / dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
@#/ /khyad par dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur
ba mnga' brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnal 'byor chen po'i dbang phyug /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag
rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud cing thams cad kyi dgos pa mdzad pa nyid kyis sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba thams
cad yongs su skong ba'i 'phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs rje che ba rnam par snang mdzad dus gsum du rtag par bzhugs shing sku dang / gsung dang / thugs thams cad rdo rje lta
bur gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs shing bsngags bstod pa/ nor bu dang / rin po che chen pos spras pa/ kha dog sna
tshogs shing dril bu btags pa/ dar dang / 'phan dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa dang / zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa rnams
kyis mdzes par byas pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na bzhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang / kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems bskyed
ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'ang 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na de
bzhin gshegs pa tshad med grangs med pa de dag gi skus kyang til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar snang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad
med grangs med pa rnams snang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na'ang chos kyi tshul 'di dag 'chad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po nam mkha'i dbyings
thams cad bzhin du rtag par bzhugs shing sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje lta bur gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pas rdo rje'i
dbyings thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa'/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs las byung ba'i ye shes
@#/ /kyi snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas ba nyid kyi rdo rje chen po'i ye shes rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i rin po che chen po/ nam mkha'i
dbyings thams cad du spros pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ngo bo nyid dag
pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dag par thugs su chud pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i gzugs thams cad du yang dag par ston
pa mkhyen pas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i khams rnams 'dul bar spyod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi bka' nod cing don yod par mdzad pa nyid kyi thams cad dang mnyam pa med cing bla na med pa'i 'phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyis byang chub chen por sems brtan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
mnyes par bya ba'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi rin po che'i dbang chen po bskur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam
pa'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi dag pa'i chos chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab chen po'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo dang /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'chad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za bar thams cad kyi dgongs pa mdzad pa dang /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha shin tu brtan po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis srung zhing bskyob pa'i rdo rje gnod
sbyin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i ye shes rnams so/ /kun bzang rab tu gdon mi za/ /bdud
dang rab dgyes gtso bo dang / /mkha' skyes shin tu gzi chen dang / rin chen dpal dang 'dzum pa che/ /kun tu gzigs pa'i dbang chen dang / /'jam dpal dkyil
@#/ /'khor thams cad dang / /mi gsung ba dang thams cad las/ /brtson 'grus ma rungs dam du bzung / /rdo rje lcags kyu mda' gzhu dang / /rin
chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan 'dzum/ /pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo gsung / /las dang go cha 'jigs byed bcas/ /thog ma tha ma med cing zhi/ /ma rungs khro bo bzod pa che/
gnod sbyin srin po dam pa brtan/ /gzi byin dpa' bo khyab bdag che/ /u mA'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon/ /gtogs 'dod rgyal 'dod thub pa che/ /'jig rten skyong dang
mkha' dang sa/ /'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum dang / /'byung chen sems can don rab mdzad/ /thams cad gu lang tshangs pa dang / /'khor dang mya ngan
'da' dang rtag /yang dag 'tsho dang mchod pa dang / sangs rgyas dag pa theg pa che/ /srid gsum rtag pa'ang de bzhin no/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal bde spyod dang //
bde spyod mgon po rab 'dul mdzad/ /rdo rje gco dang sa rab mchog/ ye shes pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam thar dang / /de bzhin gshegs
pa kun gyi spyod/ /sangs rgyas don dang sangs rgyas thugs/ /byang chub kun dang bla na med/ /rnam par snang mdzad rgyal dang mgon/ /rang 'byung gzugs dang dran
pa dang / /sems dpa' che dang phyag rgya che/ /ting 'dzin sangs rgyas 'phrin las mdzad/ /yang dag sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid/ /sems can rtag don rtogs mdzad pa/ /sdong
po chen po bde ba che/ /thabs chen dang ni mchog chen mchog /kun gyi mchog dang gnas dbang po/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems po'i thugs/ /byang chub sems dpa'
chen po kun tu bzang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di/ dper na/
til gyi gang bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams
cad grub pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa gang na ba der gshegs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i sku bstan
nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon par ma rtogs par dka' ba spyod pa thams
cad la spro ba bskyed cing ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya snyam/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
@#/ /don thams cad grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bskul bas mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ ji
ltar sgrub par bgyi bka' stsal par gsol/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ rang gi sems la so sor rtog cing mnyam par zhog la rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar zlos shing sgrub par gyis
shig |oM tsit+ta pra ti be d+haM ka ro mi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gi snying ga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba bdag gis rtogs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sems 'di ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na de ni ji ltar sbyangs pa de lta bur 'gyur te/ dper na/ ras dkar po
tshon gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems shes pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta
ut+pa da yA mi/ zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyis grub ba'i sngags 'dis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de byang chub kyi sems bskyed par gyur to/ /de nas
yang byang chub sems dpa' des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bkas byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta
bur mthong ba gang lags pa de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po khyod kyis mngon sum du gyur gyi/ de legs par sgrubs shig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed
pa kun tu bzang po de brtan par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'dis rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i dbyibs su soms shig /oM tiSh+Tha badzra/ byang chub sems
dpas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje 'dug par bdag gis mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa
@#/ /thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun tu bzang po'i sems rdo rje de sngags 'dis brtan par
gyis shig /oM badzra At+ma ko \u0f85haM/ de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung
dang / thugs rdo rje'i dbyings ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin brlabs kyis sems dpa'i rdo rje der bzhugs so/ /de nas de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa de la rdo rje'i dbyings/ rdo rje'i dbyings zhes bya ba'i
ming gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dbyings kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ni bdag lags par mthong lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po/ de lta bas na sems dpa'i rdo rje de rnam ba'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin
kyis grub pa'i sngags 'dis ci dgar zlos la sgoms shig /oM ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sta thA a haM/ de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
chen po rdo rje'i dbyings kyis bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te bos nas 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag byin gyis rlobs la mngon par byang chub pa de brtan par mdzod cig /de nas
de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje dar zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyis skad cig ma da nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che dbang bskur ba mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pa rang bzhin gyis dag go /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mnyam pa nyid rang
@#/ /bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su
gyur to/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid
kyi ye shes bskyed/ nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/ /kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes bskyed/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad la bzhag nas ri rab kyi rtse mo gang na ba dang / khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje nor bu dang / rin po che las byas ba gang
na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du byin gyis brlabs nas dbyer med par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i gdan la zhal kun tu bstan te bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan dang / de
bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du so so nas bdag
nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ phyogs thams cad mnyam
pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po
ma lon pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che chen
po'i dbang gis dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyis dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad gdon mi za bar ston pa/ thogs pa med pa/ dgongs pa rdzogs pa/ yid kyi bsam ba'o cog yongs su rdzogs pas de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i dam
tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon
@#/ /par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra satwa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de nyid/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur nas byung ste/ sems can thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems
chen po yang dag par sbyangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyogs phyogs su 'khod do/ /de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs su zhugs par gyur to/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu
brtan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gcig tu 'bres par gyur nas nam mkha'i khams thams cad du 'od zer rtse lnga pa'i phreng bas khyab
par zhugs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje lta bu'i dbyings su gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ste phyag
gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje de las rdo rje de lta bu'i 'od zer gzugs dang / kha dog sna tshogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bas khyab par byed pa rnams byung
bo| |rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer de dag gi rtse mo las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ chos kyi dbyings
kun tu khyab pa thams cad dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad du de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par byang chub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang / kun tu bzang
po'i spyod pa sna tshogs grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes bar mdzad pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po chen por gshegs pa dang / bdud thams cad
'dul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas/ ji srid sems
can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su skyob cing thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
dang | mngon par shes pa dam pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams kyi bar du bstan nas/ rdo rje sems
@#/ /dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni kun tu bzang po yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i
skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ 'di skad du ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma ho bdag ni rang byung ba'i/ /kun tu bzang po
sems dpa' brtan/ /de ni brtan phyir lus min yang / /sems dpa'i lus su gyur pa yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i sku bcom ldan 'das
kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / /ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / sems can
gyi don bya ba dang / thabs chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / ye shes chen po'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab
ba dang / thams cad kyi dbang por bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang
mngon par shes pa bla na med pa dang / theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs par grub pa'i mchog thob pa'i par du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
kun tu bzang po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur pa nyid du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang / cod pan gyi dbang gis dbang
bskur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje de de'i lag par byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ lag na rdo rje/ lag na rdo rje
zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje phyag g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings par bzhugs te/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje
thugs kar gsor zhing 'phen pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi grub pa yi/ /rdo rje bla na med pa 'di/ /bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin//
rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyis
@#/ /brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan drang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra rA dza/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ma thag pa 'di
ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lcags kyu chen por gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs
su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje lcags kyu chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i
dbyibs chen po de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad spyan drang ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu gdon ni za ba'i rgyal po
yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po shin tu gdon mi za ba'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das
rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rdo rje las byung ba'i/ /lcags kyu nges pa'i rgyal po bdag /gang phyir kun tu sangs rgyas
khyab| |grub phyir kun nas spyan 'dren to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung
ste| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam
tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad dgug pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad 'du ba'i byin gyis brlabs dam pa'i bar du bsgrub pa'i phyir rdo rje'i lcags kyu de byang chub sems dpa' gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po de'i lag par de bzhin du byin
no| |de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dgug pa rdo rje dgug pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
@#/ /dpa' chen po rdo rje dgug pa/ rdo rje lcags kyu des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas
kun gyi rdo rje yi/ /ye shes bla na med pa 'di/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi don grub phyir/ /kun nas spyan drangs dam pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen
po bdud ces bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra rA ga /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me tog gi dmar gyur nas byung ste/
bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje'i mda' chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas
rdo rje ma da'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bdud byed ba dang /
rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas
nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o bdag ni rang bzhin dag /rang byung ba dag dgyes byed pa/ /'dod chags bral rnams dag bya'i phyir/ /'dod chags kyis ni
'dul bar byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud de'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs
kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i byin
gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud rdo rje'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma
lus shing lus pa med pa rnams mgu bar bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud kyi mchog grub
@#/ /pa thong ba'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje'i mda' de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin
no| |de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i gzhu/ rdo rje'i gzhu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rdo rje'i gzhu zhes bya bas rdo rje'i mda' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdud byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi//
ye shes 'di ni dri ma med/ /'dod chags kyis ni chags bral bcom/ /bde ba thams cad sbyin bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra sA d+hu/ de
nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de legs so zhes bya bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das
rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres bar gyur nas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje dgyes ba'i dbyibs de
las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes
bya ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu dga' bar byed pa nyid dang / rab tu brtan
ba'i phyir gcig tu gyur par 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i lus su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o thams cad mkhyen kun gyi/ /legs sbyin nang na bdag mchog pas/ /rnam
rtog bral ba de dag gi/ /nges par dgyes pa bskyed pa yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka
nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
@#/ /gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab
tu dgyes pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can thams cad mgu bar bya ba dang / thams cad bde ba
dang | yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgyes pa'i ro bla na med pa grub pa dam pa thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje dgyes pa
de byang chub sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dgyes pa/ rdo rje dgyes pa
zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dgyes pas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
la legs so zhes bya bas rab tu dgyes par byed cing / /ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi legs sbyin pa/ /'di ni rab tu 'jug byed pas/ /rdo rje thams
cad dgyes par byed/ /lha rdzas dgyes pa spel ba'o/ /byang chub kyi sems chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs
ba thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes dang / dgyes pa chen po dang / 'di bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa'o/ /de nas yang bcom
ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig las byung ba rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas
phyung ngo / /badzra rat+na/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid
kyi ye shes shin tu gtogs pa yin pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin ba de nyid de nam mkha' thams cad kyi 'od zer su gyur nas byung ngo / /nam mkha' thams cad kyi
'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas pas thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings lta bur gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis
brlabs kyis nam mkha'i dbyings de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms par
@#/ /gyur pa'i phyir/ yang nam mkha'i khams thams cad las byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje
rin po che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul
shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad
kyi snying po las shin tu byung ba dang / rab tu bstan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan
