'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o chags med rgyal pa yang / /khams gsum dbang por dgos pas
na/ /rdo rje rin chen dam pa yi/ /dbang gi mchog ni bdag yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i lus de bcom ldan 'das
thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang dag pa'i bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu rin po che'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs
pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus ba med pa'i don thams cad yongs su grub par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde
ba dang / yid bde ba myong ba bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don dam pa phun sum tshogs pa grub pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor bar rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas lag tu rdo rje nor bu de byin no/ /de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rdo
rje'i nor bu de rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'jog cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sems dpa'i dbyibs/ /dbang bskur de ni bdag yin te//
@#/ /bdag gi lag tu byin bas na/ rin chen la ni rin chen bzhag de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra te dza/ de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen por gyur nas bcom ldan 'das
rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje nyi ma'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas
rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi 'od zer 'gyed pa la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
ni shin tu gzi brjid che pa nyid dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po'i skur gyur nas/
bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sems can khams kun tu/ /snang byed gzi brjid dpe med
bdag /gang phyir sangs rgyas dag pa yi/ /'dren pa rnams dang sbyor bar byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid de'i lus bcom
ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa dang thams
cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od 'thob cing dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje nyi ma
@#/ /de byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i 'od/ rdo rje'i
'od ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje nyi ma des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang bar
byed cing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snang ba 'di/ /mi shes mun nag 'joms byed pa/ /shin tu phra rdul ji snyed pa'i/ /nyi ma'i 'od bas
shin tu lhag /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs
pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin shegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra ke tu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di
ni| bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de rgyal mtshan kha dog dang / gzugs dang / rgyan dang / dbyibs sna tshogs par gyur ta byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par
snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs su gyur nas/ phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs
de las/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po
che'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rin po che'i dpal dang / shin tu
brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i dpal gyi skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la
gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o don kun grub pa dang / /dgongs pa thams cad rdzogs pa yi/ /don rnams thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i/ /'dra
med dpal ni bdag yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs
@#/ /pa thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad
yongs su bkang bar bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bdab dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don chen po'i dngos grub dam
pa thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje rgyal mtshan de byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan/ /rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor du bcug nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du
brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa kun/ /yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yi/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ni/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /de nas
yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i dam tshig las byung ba rin po che'i byin
gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra hA sa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de
nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dzum par gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/
rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs su gur te/ phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul
rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang
@#/ /chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /rtag tu mnyam par gzhag rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas don la rab sbyor phyir/ /e ma'o bdag ni kun
mchog gi /bzhad chen rmad du byung ba yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus bcom ldan
'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba bskyed pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi dbang po bla na med
pa bya ba dang / thams cad bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su sbyong ba'i ya shes mngon par thob pa'i
bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po de'i lag tu rdo rje 'dzum pa de de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dga' ba/ rdo rje dga' ba zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rdo rje'i dga' bas rdo rje 'dzum pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par byed cing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
rmad byung skyed pa ston pa po/ /dgyes chen byed pa'i ye shes te/ /gtsug lag gzhan gyis shes mi nus/ /dbang bskur ba chen po dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang
ba dang / sems dpa' chen po'i don dang / dgyes pa chen po dang / 'di bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang chen po'i sems dpa'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan
'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka
@#/ /nas phyung ngo / /badzra d+harma/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de
nyid de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer du gyur te byung
ngo| |dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun tu snang bar byas nas chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du gyur to/ /chos kyi dbyings
de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang mnyam par
'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje pad+ma chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje pad+ma'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul
shin tu phra mo dang mnyam ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa la
sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni
kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yin ba dang / shin tu brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs
kyi dbang po'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rang
byung gdod nas dag /dam pa'i don ni bdag yin te/ /gang phyir gzings 'dra'i chos rnams las/ /rnam par dag pa dmigs par gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi lus de bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngan
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
shes dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi
khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi bdag dang / gzhan rnam par dag par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs
@#/ /pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa drug thob par byed pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas/
de'i lag tu rdo rje pad+ma de byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i spyan/ rdo rje'i spyan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rdo rje'i pad+ma de'i 'dab ma kha phye bas/ 'dod chags rnam par dag cing ma chags pa'i ngo bo nyid du
gzigs pas gzigs shing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi/ /de kho na nyid rtogs pa 'di/ /bdag ste bdag gi lag tu
byin| |chos la chos ni gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin
gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang / ye shes chen po'i dam tshig ces bya ba de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra tI k+Sh+Na/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ shes rab dang / ye shes kyi ral gri rgyur te/ de byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres
par gyur nas/ rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang / ye shes la sogs pa dang /
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu 'jam pa'i dpal yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir
gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la
gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /'jam dbyangs bdag ni yin par dgongs/ /gang phyir shes rab gzugs
@#/ /med kyang / /dbyangs nyid du ni dmigs pa yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi sku de bcom ldan 'das
kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
nas| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad bcad pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi sdug
bsngal thams cad bcad pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba rnams myong bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brang
ba'i shes rab dam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bar du/ 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje'i ral gri de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal de'i
lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i blo/ rdo rje'i blo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i ral gri des 'debs shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di na
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /dgra rnams thams cad tshar gcod cing / /sdig pa thams cad 'jom pa'i mchog /de nas yang bcom ldan
'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i
rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra he tu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa
de nyid de/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas par gyur to/ /de nas rdo
@#/ /rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
sku rnams byung nas/ sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad du byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par
gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur te bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /rdo rje dam pa chos can gyi/ /e ma'o rdo rje 'khor lo bdag /gang phyir sems bskyed tsam gyis kyang / /chos
kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sku de bcom ldan 'das
kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par 'jug pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang /
yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dam pa grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje 'khor
lo de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyis rdo rje snying po/ rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'khor lo des de bzhin
gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'jog cing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /chos rnams thams cad rnam par sbyong / /phyir
mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo yang / /byang chub snying po yin par dgongs/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po mi gsung ba'i dam tshig las
@#/ /byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brjod
pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra b+hA Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi yi ger gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das
rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje brjod pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje brjod pa'i dbyibs
de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
nyid la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul la sogs pa byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu tshig ma yin pa dang / shin tu
brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas
nas| ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rang byung rnams kyi gsang / /ldem po dag tu bdag dgongs te/ /gang phyir dam pa'i chos 'chad pa/ /tshig tu spros las
rnam par bral/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla
ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi gsung ba'i gsung gi rdo
rje'i dam tshig las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams
ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi tshig grub pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi
gsang ba thob pa'i dngos grub dam pa'i bar gyi phyir rdo rje brjod pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i tshig /rdo rje'i tshig ces bya ba'i rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tshig gis de
@#/ /bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i brjod pas yang dag par smra zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi/ /rdo rje'i bzlas par brjod pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sngags ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje chos nyid kyi ye shes/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi spros pa rnam par ldog pa'i ye
shes dang 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sems dpa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems
dpa' chen po'i 'phrin las thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba/ las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra karma/ de nas
rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin las thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa
'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi 'od zer gyur te byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
'phrin las kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dbyibs lta bur gyur to/ /de
nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dbyibs de yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du
mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam du gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dbyibs de las/ las thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur nas phyag gnyis su gnas
so| |de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rnams byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems
dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las mtha' yas pa yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems
@#/ /dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
thugs la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyi nges/ /'phrin las mang po kun bdag yin/ /sangs rgyas don ni lhun grub
phyir| |rdo rje las ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i lus bcom ldan
'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par bya ba la sogs pa gdon mi za ba'i tshad med pa dang / las kyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang /
sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyis las thams cad grub pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 'phrin las nyid dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dam pa rnams 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas de'i lag tu
las kyi rdo rje de de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje thams cad/ rdo rje thams cad ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro//
de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje thams cad ces bya bas rdo rje de rang gi snying gar bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las la sbyor zhing ched du brjod pa
'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog /bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin/ /sna tshogs la ni sna tshogs gzhag /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka'i dam tshig las byung ba las thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung
@#/ /ngo| |badzra rak+Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ go cha
brtan par gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje go cha chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag
gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje go cha'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku
byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la srung ba'i go cha rgyas pa'i las la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/
rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni brtson 'grus dam pa thub dka' ba dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson
'grus thub dka' ba'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o brtson 'grus
go cha ni/ /brtan pa'i bdag nyid rab brtan bdag /de ni brtan phyir lus med kyang / /rdo rje'i lus su byed pa mchog /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson
'grus chen po thub dka' ba de'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par gyur
nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje brtan bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
nas| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyang
pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku 'thob pa'i mchog 'grub par bya ba'i bar du/ de dag gi phyir rdo rje go
cha de byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i grogs po/ rdo rje'i grogs
po zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje grogs pos rdo rje go cha des de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad la go cha bskon zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /byams pa'i go cha dam pa ste/ /brtson 'grus brtan pas bsrung ba che/ /grogs
@#/ /po chen por brjod pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i dam tshig
las byung ba/ las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dam tshig ces
bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra yak+Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag
pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha chen por gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs
te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje mche ba'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje mche ba'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bos gdul ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu
'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas
nas| ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams/ /thugs rje can gyi thabs chen te/ /zhi yang sems can don du ni/ /ma rungs par ni ston par
'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu khro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma rungs pa gdul ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa
rnams 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po dang / ye shes dang / mngon
par shes pa rnams thob cing dam pa 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha de byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa
@#/ /de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khro bo/ rdo rje khro bo zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur
ro| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khro bos rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha de rang gi thugs kar bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsngags shing
ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /ma rungs thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog /rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon rnon te/ /thabs dang snying rje'i
bdag nyid do/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba las
kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjes bcing ba'i
dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra san+d+hi/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las
phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcings par gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das
rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje bcings pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ /de nas rdo rje bcing ba'i dbyings
de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang / ye shes la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur shin tu bcings pa dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rab tu brtan
bcings pa'i/ /dam tshig bdag ste brtan pa'i bdag /bsam pa thams cad rab grub phyir/ /grol ba rnams kyang 'ching bar byed/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas
@#/ /yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams
la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / lha rnams kyi dgongs pa brtag pa dang / grub pa thams cad dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / phyag rgya'i dbang dam pa 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje bcing ba de byang chub sems dpa' chen po de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khu tshur/ rdo rje khu tshur zhes rdo
rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba des rdo rje bcings pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad la 'ching zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya bcing ba che zhing brtan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi myur du phyir/ /dam tshig
bzhin du 'da' bar dka'/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i las dang / brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha brtan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po dang phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa'i ye shes dang 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las chen po'i sems dpa'o// //
bam po gnyis pa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi ye shes bsgrubs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo
rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /satwa badzri/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag tu/ rdo rje'i 'od zer du gyur
nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs
@#/ /pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas yang
gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje'i dbyibs chen por gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan snga na zla
ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sems dpa'i rdo rje brtan pa'i bdag /gang phyir brtan pas
lus med kyang / /rdo rje'i lus su gyur pa yin/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs par bya ba'i phyir rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo
rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung
ngo| |rat+na badzrI/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu rin po che'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
pa de nyid do/ /rin po che'i 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur te/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas yang gcig tu 'dres nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi
rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas shing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod
do| |e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje rin chen bdag nyid grags/ /gang phyir phyag rgya thams cad kyi/ /dbang gi tshul ni dam pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba/ rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs nas/ chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /d+har+m+ma badzrI/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma
@#/ /thag tu pad+ma'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /pad+ma'i 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs
nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje pad+ma chen po'i dbyibs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
mdzad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /chos kyi rdo rje gtsang ma dag /gang phyir rang
bzhin rnam dag pas/ /'dod chags yin yang dri ma med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung
ngo| |kar+m+ma badzrI/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu las thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa
de nyid do/ /las thams cad kyi 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur
nas| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs te yang gcig tu 'dres nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i
tshad tsam gyi thams cad du rtse mo bltas pa'i las kyi rdo rje chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /las kyi rdo rje mang po bdag /gang phyir gcig kyang sems can khams/ /ma lus par
ni las bzang byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba chen po dang rdo rje'i chos nyid dang / mchod pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po rnams so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i mchod pa'i
@#/ /dam tshig las byung ba/ rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo
'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra lA s+ye/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu rdo rje'i phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i rtse mo de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo chen mo rdo rje 'dzin ma'i lus thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid dang 'dra zhing kha dog dang / gzugs dang /
mtshan dang / spyod lam sna tshogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad sdud par gyur pa rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mor gyur nas bcom
ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rang byung rnams kyi ni/ /
mchod pa bdag 'dra gzhan med de/ /gang phyir 'dod pa dga' mchod pas/ /mchod pa thams cad byas par 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i phreng ba'i dbang gi dam tshig las byung ba/ rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra mA le/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu rin po che chen po'i phyag
rgyar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /rin po che chen po'i phyag rgya de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam
pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ /lha mo chen mo rdo rje phreng bar de bzhin du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che 'byung ba'i
dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rin chen mchod pa bzhes/ /bdag dang 'dra bar
grags pa med/ /gang phyir khams gsum rgyal mchog kyang / /rab tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu'i
mchog gi dam tshig las byung ba/ rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs
@#/ /ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra gI ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
kyi phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo chen mo rdo rje glur gyur nas/ bcom ldan
'das 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o bdag ni kun
gzigs pa'i/ /glu mchog tshul gyis mchod pa yin/ /gang phyir sgra snyan 'dra ba yi/ /mchod pa rnams kyis mnyes par byed/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra nr-i ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag
tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas par gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa de dag thams cad las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ rdo rje lha mo chen mo rdo rje gar gyi skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa'i
dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o mchod kun don mdzad pa'i/ /mchod pa rgya
chen bdag yin te/ /gang phyir rdo rje gar cho gas/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba bla na med pa'i dam
tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i las bla na med
pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa
@#/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyis mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu tshim pa'i dam tshig las byung ba/
rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yog mo'i gtso mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra d+hu pe/ de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de bdug pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi bkod pa rnam pa du
mas rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad du khyab par gyur nas phyung ngo / /bdug pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu
phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas byung ste yang gcig tu 'dres nas/ rdo rje bdug pa'i lha mo'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i grwar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched
du brjod do/ /e ma'o bdag ni mchod pa che/ /rab tu sim ldan dge ba yi/ /gang phyir sems can dbab ldan pas/ /myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir rin po che'i rgyan gyi
mchod pa dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol ka ma 'di rang gi thugs ka nas
phyung ngo / /badzra puSh+pe/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ me tog thams cad kyi
mchod pa bkod pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ngo / /me tog thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te rdo rje'i me tog gi lha mo'i skur gyur nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i grwa na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du
brjod do/ /e ma'o me tog mchod pa bdag /thams cad kyi ni rgyan byed de/ /gang phyir mchod nas de bzhin gshegs/ /rin chen nyid du myur du 'grub/ /de nas bcom
@#/ /ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i
phyir| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang ba'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi pho nya mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra A lo ke /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu thams cad du snang
ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyi bkod pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /thams cad du
snang ba'i mchod pa'i bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ yang gcig
tu 'dres te/ lha mo rdo rje snang ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas
pa'i grwa na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o mchod pa'i mar me ni/ /rgya chen dge ba bdag yin te/ /gang phyir snang bcas
myur du yang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan yang thob/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dris mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bran mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra gan+d+he/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu dri thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan
'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /dri thams cad kyi mchod pa'i bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs
pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo rdo rje dri zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang /
nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i grwa na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o dri yi rang bzhin gyi/ /mchod pa'i lha rdzas
@#/ /yid 'ong bdag /gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri/ /lus rnams kun la 'byin par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
ye shes dbab pa dang / byang chub chen po'i yan lag bsags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kun tu snang ba dang / tshul khrims dang / ting
nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ston pa'i dri rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka'
bzhin byed pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu'i dam tshig las byung ba
sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po 'di rang gi thugs
ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra aM ku sha /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs
mang po thams cad du gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag las 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags
kyu zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje sgo gang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis spyan 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yang dag spyan 'dren
brtan pa bdag /gang phyir bdag gis spyan drangs pas/ /dkyil 'khor kun la brtan par 'gyur/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
dam tshig la 'jug pa/ sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag
rgya 'jug pa'i gsol ka pa 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra pA sha /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs su gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'dren
@#/ /pa'i phyag rgya mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas
yang gcig tu 'dres te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che
las byas pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i sgo khang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e
ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje zhags pa dam po dag /rdul phran bzhugs pa thams cad kyang / /bdag gis slar yang drang bar bya/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags sgrog sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba/ sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje pho nya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra s+pho
Ta| de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsngams pa'i phyag rgya mang por gyur nas
byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa'i phyag rgya mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bya ba'i skur
gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje chos kyi sgo khang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'ching zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog dam po bdag /bcing ba kun las grol ba
rnams/ /sems can don du 'ching bar 'dod/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbab pa zhes bya ba sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung
ba| sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi bran 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra
A be sha /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad du gyur nas byung ste/
@#/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad las 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste gcig tu 'dres nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dbab pa'i
skur gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje las kyi sgo khang gi nang na za ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'bebs shing ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje dbab pa brtan pa bdag /kun gyi bdag tu gyur nas
kyang | |bran du yang ni gyur pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir/ rdo rje se gol gyi
mtshan ma mdzad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa 'di gsungs so/ /badzra sa mA dzaH/ de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam
de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad se gol gyi mtshan mas bskul ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang bcas te 'dus nas khang bu brtsegs
pa'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa gang na ba dang / /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der gshegs nas ched du
brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA da ban+da naM ka ro mi zhes brjod do/ /rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dga' bar zlos shing / de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi/ /dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes/ /de nas de skad ces smras pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus
pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi
@#/ /byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las
rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las
byas pa'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor du gyur nas snyoms par zhugs te/ zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad
kyi| |rgya chen gdod nas skye ba med/ /rdul phran thams cad ji snyed pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad 'dus nas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / thams cad la phan pa dang / /bde ba bstabs pa nas/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam pa 'grub pa'i phyir rdo rje dbyings kyi
dkyil 'khor chen po 'di byin gyis brlabs par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' thog ma dang / tha ma med
rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab bo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /rdo rje dang po kun tu bzang //
phyag 'tshal phyag na rdo rje la'o/ /rdo rje rgyal po sangs rgyas mchog /rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin gshegs/ /don yod rgyal po rdo rje mchog /phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'gugs khyod la/ /
rdo rje chags pa bde chen po/ /rdo rje mda' ni dbang byed pa/ /bdud kyi 'dod pa rdo rje che/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje gzhu khyod la'o/ /rdo rje legs pa sems dpa'i mchog /rdo rje mgu ba
dga' ba che/ /rab dgyes rgyal po rdo rje mchog /phyag 'tshal rdo rje dgyes khyod la/ /rdo rje rin chen rdo rje don/ /rdo rje nam mkha' nor bu che/ /nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje phyug/ phyag
'tshal rdo rje snying khyod la/ /rdo rje gzi brjid cher 'bar ba/ /rdo rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje'i 'od zer gzi brjid che/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'od khyod la/ /sems can don rab rdo rje
dpal/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed/ /rdo rje chen po rin chen dpal/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje dpal khyod la/ /rdo rje bzhad mo bzhad pa che/ /rdo rje 'dzum pa ngo mtshar che/ /dga'
zhing rab dga' rdo rje ston/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje dga' ba la/ /rdo rje chos rab de nyid don/ /rdo rje pad+mo rab dga' byed/ /'jig rten dbang rab rdo rje'i spyan/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje
@#/ /spyan khyod la/ /rdo rje rno ba theg pa che/ /rdo rje ral gri mtshon chen po/ /'jam dpal rdo rje rab tu zab/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje blo khyod la/ /rdo rje rgyu dag
snying po che/ /rdo rje 'khor lo tshul chen po/ /rab bskor rdo rje las byung ba/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying po la/ /rdo rje gsung ba rang rig mchog /rdo rje zlos pa rab sgrub sbyin/ /mi
gsung rdo rje mchog grub pa/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje gsung khyod la/ /rdo rje las rab rdo rje'i bka'/ /las kyi rdo rje kun rab 'gro/ /rdo rje des ba rgya che bo/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje
kun khyod la/ /rdo rje srung ba brtan pa che/ /rdo rje go cha sra ba che/ /brtson 'grus mchog ni thub par dka'/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje brtson 'grus la/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs
chen po/ /rdo rje mche ba 'jigs pa che/ /bdud 'joms rdo rje mi bzad pa/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje drag po la/ /rdo rje mtshams sbyor rab sdud nyid/ /rdo rje 'ching ba grol
grol byed/ /rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig mchog /phyag 'tshal rdo rje khu tshur la/ /su zhig ming rnams 'chad pa ni/ /zhi ba brgya po rtsa brgyad 'di/ /rdo rje ming dbang bskur la
sogs| |mchog rnams kun gyis de dbang bskur/ /gang zhig yon tan ming rnams kyis/ /rdo rje 'chang ba chen po la/ /rtag tu dbyangs kyis bstod pa ni/ /de yang rdo
rje 'chang 'drar gyur/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis/ /bdag cag gis ni bstod pa yin/ /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i/ /tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod
mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yi/ /cho ga mchog ni bshad par gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
'dzin pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs
kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /
dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /rdo rje dbyings zhes bgyi bar grags/ /sems dpa' che ba'i phyag rgya cher/ /sgom zhing byin gyis rlob bgyid
cing | |dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du/ /ci rigs par ni mchis nas kyang / /phyag rgyal gnas de bzhin langs/ /kun tu rnam par bltas nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes
brjod nas/ /bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor/ /sar pa legs par bkal nas kyang / /tshad dang mthun la mdzes pa yi/ /thig gis mkhas pas ci nus kyi/ /dkyil
@#/ /'khor gyi ni thig gdab cing / /gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang / /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la/ /thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa/ /dar
dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen spras par ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo/ /
de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la/ /'khor lo 'dra bar rdo rje yi/ /thig gis yongs su bskor bar bya/ /ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis pa/ /rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su/ /zla
ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan la/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs gzhag cing / /sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun gyi/ /dkyil 'khor
rnams kyi dbus rnams su/ /rim bzhin du ni dam tshig mchog /bzhi po legs par bzhag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag tu/ /rdo rje gom pas song nas
ni| |mi g.yo ba la sogs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bzhi po thams cad gzhag /mi g.yo ba yi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje 'dzin sogs mnyam par gzhag /rin chen 'byung
ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje snying sogs rdzogs par gzhag /tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje spyan sogs dag par gzhag /gdon mi za grub dkyil
'khor du/ /rdo rje rgya gram la sogs gzhag /'khor lo yi ni grwa rnams su/ /rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang gzhag /dkyil 'khor phyi rim grwa rnams su/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa
rnams kyang gzhag /sgo rnams kun gyi nang du ni/ /sgo srung bzhi yang gzhag par bgyi/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim phyogs su ni/ /sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bzhag /
de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni/ /cho ga bzhin bcings bzhugs nas kyang / /g+haN+Da'i phyag rgyas dbab par bgyi/ /de la thams cad dbab
pa'i snying po ni 'di legs so/ /aH/ bdag la byin gyis brlabs la sogs/ /ji lta bar ni bka' nod do/ /de ltar bgyis na bdag ming brjod/ /de nas rdo rje bsgrub
bgyi ba/ /rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni/ /se gol mang po brdab bgyis la/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi/ /de tshe sangs rgyas
thams cad ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bcas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams/ /dkyil 'khor rnams su 'dus par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa'
yi/ /phyag rgya chen po sgom phyed cing / /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /cung zad rab tu brjod par bgyi/ /de nas 'dus pa dgyes pas na/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams brtan
@#/ /par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang grub pa/ /grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas/ /de nas sgo rnams thams cad du/ /lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis
nas| |las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis/ /dam tshig rnams ni gzhag par bgyi/ /dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang / /sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs pas/ /de ltar
sems dpa' chen po bsgrub/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod cing / /de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa/ /sems dpa' chen po kun bsdu bar/ /spyan drangs nas ni rab tu bcug /
bcings nas de yi dbang du gyur/ /de nas bdag nyid chen po rnams/ /gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la/ /thams cad don kun grub pa'i phyir/ /thams cad mdzod
ces gsol bar bgyi/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bzhin du las bgyi'o/ /de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir ni rdo rje slob ma
dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par mchis so/ /de la dang por ni gzhug pa lags te/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa
rnams yongs su skyabs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang / bde ba thams cad dngos grub mchog gi rgyu dang / 'bras bu nyid kyi slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir gzhug pa la snod du gyur pa dang / snod du ma gyur pa brtag mi 'tshal lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can kha cig ni sdig pa chen
po bgyid pa yang mchis te/ de dag gis rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po der zhugs te mthong na/ ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nor
dang | nor bu dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang / dam tshig la mi dga' ba dang / sngar spyad pa la sogs pa mi nus pa'i
sems can dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang der ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bgyid cing zhugs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ /sems can kha cig ni gar dang / glu dang / gad mo dang / rtsed mo dang / kha zas dang / spyod pa la dga' ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg
pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid khong du ma chud pa la gzhan gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil
'khor du re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ yang dag par bsdus par gyur pa/ bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa rnams 'byung bar byed pa de ni
@#/ /bslab pa'i gzhis 'jigs shing skrag nas/ mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/ de dag ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam du 'jug par kha bltas
shing gnas pa rnams kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba'i dam pa thams cad 'grub cing bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba dang / ngan song gi rgyud thams cad du 'jug
par kha bltas pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'jug tu rung ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ chos can gyi sems can de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi dngos grub dam pa'i thabs kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub tshol ba na bsam
gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / sa rnams kyis 'bad cing nyon mongs par gyur pa dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang rdo rje dbyings kyis dkyil 'khor chen po der zhugs
ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'grub par yang rnyed par dka' ba ma lags na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de la dang po kho nar re
zhig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bzhi bgyi'o/ /de ni 'di ltar lus thams cad kyis rdo rje thal mo brkyang ste phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM

sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta phU dzo pas+tha nA ya At+ma naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM zhes brjod do/ /de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo snying gar bzhag ste/

dpral bas phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dza a b+hi Sha kA ya At+ma naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM zhes brjod do/ /de nas

de bzhin du 'jug ste rdo rje thal mo spyi bor sbyar te khas phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra brta nA ya At+ma naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra
d+har+m+ma pra bar+t+ta ya mAM zhes brjod do/ /de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab ste snying gar bzhags nas spyi bos phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM sar+b+ba ta
thA ga ta pU dza karma Ne At+ma naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru mAM zhes brjod do/ /de nas stod g.yogs gos dmar po gyon gdong ras dmar pos dkris nas/
sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do/ /sa ma yas+t+waM/ de nas gung mo gnyis kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la drang zhing snying po 'di brjod do/
sa ma ya hUM/ de nas bcug ma thag tu 'di skad du bsgos shig /deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de
@#/ /bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub pa yang thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i rdo rje'i ye shes bskyed par bya yi/ /
khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra shig /dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya kha nang
du bstan pa dang / phyir bstan pa bcings la rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste/ 'di skad du brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyi/ /gal te 'ga'
zhig la smras na/ klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / mna'i chu'i snying pos sngags la slob ma de 'thung du gzhug go/ /de la
mna'i snying po 'di yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid ni deng / /khyod kyi snying la yang dag zhugs/ /gal te tshul de smra na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /oM badzro da
ka Tha/ de nas slob ma la 'di skad du bsgos shig /deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyi/ ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so/ /khyod
kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas na dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la/ 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi byin gyis rlobs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces smros shig par bsgo'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i
phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad du brjod du gzhug go /'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags/ /rdo rje ye shes bla med ni/ /de ring nyid du 'bab par shog /
oM badzra A pe sha aH/ de nas khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings la/ sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya mdud cing drangs la/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rdo rje'i tshig ci dga'
bar brjod du gzhug go/ /de nas babs te babs ma thag tu lha'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur te/ ye shes des pha rol gyi sems shes par 'gyur ro/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
dang | da ltar byung ba rnams kyi dgos pa thams cad shes par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thams cad la 'di'i sems brtan par 'gyur ro/ /de'i sdug bsngal
thams cad zad par 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa thams cad dang bral nas gnod pa med par 'gyur ro/ /sems dpa' thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
kyang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub thams cad ni 'di'i mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /rgyu med par sngon ma byung ba'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs par byed
@#/ /pa'i bde ba thams cad 'di la skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bde ba de dag kha cig gis ni ting nge 'dzin 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /kha cig gis ni gzungs/
kha cig gis ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa nas/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub ba'i bar du 'ang 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag rgya de bcings

la rang gi snying khar dgrol zhing snying po 'di'ang brjod du gzhug go/ /tiSh+Tha badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ shA shwa to me b+ha ba hr-i da ya me/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha hUM/ ha ha ha ha
ho/ de nas ma tog gi phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor zhing snying po 'di ched du brjod du gzhug go /pra tIts+tsha badzra hoH/ de nas gang la bab pa de 'dis 'grub bo/ /de
nas phreng ba 'di blangs te/ snying po 'dis de nyid kyi mgo bor bcings la 'di brjod du gzhug go /A+oM pra ti grih+Na swa mi mAM satwa ma hA ba la/ de bcings pas sems dpa'
chen po des bdag gir byas par gyur pas 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de ltar babs bzhin du gdong g.yogs bkrol te snying po 'di 'ang brjod du gzhug

go| oM badzra sa twa sa yan+te t+ya tsak+Shu ra ga ta na tad pa ra u Ta g+ha Ta/ ya ti sar+b+bA k+Sho badzra tsak+Shu a nut+ta raM he badzra pA sh+ya/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po rim bzhin du bstan to/ /
dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ma thag tu 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang 'di'i snying ga na gnas so/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir 'od zer sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba la sogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams kyang
mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid dam de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhig ston par 'gyur ro/ /de phyin chad don thams cad dang yid
kyi 'dod pa'i dgos pa thams cad dang / dngos grub thams cad nas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po
mthong ba'i 'og tu rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i nang gi dri'i chu dang / snying po 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mI/ de nas phyag rgya dang / phreng ba gang
yang rung ba zhig bcings lo/ /rang gi mtshan ma lag par bzhag la 'di skad du brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis rdo rje'i dbang / /de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /sangs

rgyas kun gyis rab grub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis longs/ /oM badzra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mI/ tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ /de nas snying po 'di rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang
@#/ /bskur bar bya'o/ /oM badzra satwa twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ kyai| rdo rje zhes gang gi ming gang brjod pa der kye zhes brjod par bya'o//
dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /de nas ci khyod don 'byung ba'i dngos grub kyi ye shes dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i ye shes dang
rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i ye shes nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog 'grub pa'i ye shes kyi bar du gang 'dod ces smras la/
de nas gang gis gang 'dod pa de de la brjod par bya'o/ /de nas don thams cad kyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje'i dbyings ni gter
gnas pa/ /snying gar yongs su bsgom par bya/ /bsgoms nas sa la gnas pa yi/ /gter ni de yis mthong bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i dbyibs shig bris nas kyang / /nam mkha'i
ngos su bsgom par bya/ /gang du ltung ba mthong ba der/ /gter yod par ni rnam par bshad/ /blo ldan mi yis rdo rje'i dbyibs/ /lce yi steng du bsgoms nas ni/ /'di ni yod
ces bdag nyid kyis/ /bden pa nyid kyis smra bar 'gyur/ /bdag gi lus ni thams cad la/ /rdo rje'i dbyibs su bsgoms nas ni/ /babs par gyur nas gar gnas

pa| |gter ni de na yod par bshad/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /oM badzra ni d+hI/ oM rat+na ni d+hI/ oM d+har+m+ma ni d+hI/ oM kar+m+ma ni d+hI/ de nas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub
pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni/ /chu la rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra bar/ /bsgoms nas chu yi steng na phar/ /'gro ba'i dngos grub myur du thob/ /de
ltar dbab pa byas nas kyang / /gang gi gzugs su bdag gi lus/ /bsgoms par gyur na bdag nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni skur yang 'gyur/ /de ltar bdag la phab nas kyang //
bdag nyid kyis ni nam mkhar ni/ /bsgoms par 'gyur na ji srid du/ /'dod pa de srid mi snang 'gyur/ /rdo rje dbab bar bdag 'gyur nas/ /rdo rje yin par bdag bsgoms na//
gnas nas ji srid lding 'dod pa/ /de srid mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /badzra dz+wa la/ badzra rU pa/ badzra A kA sha /badzra ma hAM/ de nas rdo rje
rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub par phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ zla ba'i dbyibs gcig bris nas ni/ /steng gi mkha' la 'phags byas te/ /lag par rdo rje bsgoms
nas ni/ /rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /zla ba'i dbyibs steng 'dug gnas ni/ /rdo rje rin chen rab bsgoms na/ /bdag nyid dag pa ji srid 'dod/ /de srid skad cig lding
@#/ /bar 'gyur/ /zla ba'i dbyibs kyi steng 'dug nas/ /rdo rje pad+mo lag gnas par/ /bsgoms nas rdo rje'i spyan gyis ni/ /rig 'dzin go 'phang
sbyin par byed/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas nas/ /las kyi rdo rje bsgom nas ni/ /rdo rje sna tshogs 'dzin pa las/ /rig 'dzin kun tu myur bar 'gyur/ /de dag
gi snying po 'di dag yin no/ /badzra d+ha ra/ rat+na d+ha ra/ d+har+m+ma d+ha ra/ kar+m+ma d+ha ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes
bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje kun gyi ting nge 'dzin/ /nam mkha'i dbyibs su bsams nas ni/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid ji srid 'dod/ /de srid bar du lding bar 'gyur/ /kun
la dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /bsgoms na bla med de bzhin du/ /ye shes bsgrubs pas myur du ni/ /mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar ni//
nam mkha' thams cad dran byas na/ /bdag nyid dran pa brtan ldan zhing / /rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dbyings ni thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas gzugs
su bsams nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin las/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /badzra badzra/ shud+d+ha shud+d+ha/
satwa satwa/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes 'grub pa rnams so/ /de nas gsang ba thub pa yin pas de la dang por mna'i snying po brjod par bya ste/ oM badzra satwa
sA yan+t+ye/ hraM da ye sa ma bsti ta ni bI d+yA ta tak+Sha NAM/ yA yA da ya ti bru yad i daM na yaM/ de nas/ 'di skad du/ khyod kyis mna'i snying po 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig /khyod kyis
gnod pa ma spangs pas dus ma yin par 'chi bar gyur ta re/ lus 'di nyid kyis dmyal bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo bar bya'o/ /de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab
par bya'o/ /rdo rje dbab par bskyed nas ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas rdo rje yi/ /thal mo'i ngos kyis dal brdabs na/ /ri bo yang ni dbang du 'gyur/ /rdo rje thal mo'i phyag
rgya'o/ /rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga yis/ /rdo rje bsdams pa'i ngos gnyis ni/ /dal gyi brdab par sbyor ba yis/ /ri bo yang ni kun nas 'gugs/ /de bzhin dbab pa'i cho ga yis/ /
rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang nas ni/ /sor mo'i rtse mo mnyam brdabs na/ /rigs brgya yud kyis brlag par 'gyur/ /phra mo dbab pa'i cho ga byas/ /sor mo thams cad mnyam
gzhag cing / /rdo rje bsdams pa bkrol ba ni/ /gnod pa kun las bsal ba'i mchog /des na de dag gi gsang ba sgrub pa yin te/ bud med dam ni skyes pa yi/ /bu ga'i
@#/ /nang du 'jug par bya/ /yid kyis de ltar zhugs nas kyang / /de yi lus kun khyab par bsam/ /de la rdo rje thal mo'i snying po ni 'di dag yin
no| |badzra bA sha /badzra A be sha /badzra ha na/ badzra ha ra/ de nas snying po byin la rang gi rigs kyi lha'i phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /cho ga 'di skad du bsgo bar
bya ste| khyod kyis phyag rgya la mi mkhas pa gzhan su'ang rung ba la phyag rgya gang yang rung ba bstan par ma byed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dkyil 'khor chen
po ma mthong bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis phyag rgya bcing ba byas na de'i tshe de dag de ltar 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas de dag the tshom du gyur te/ gnod pa
ma spangs pas myur ba nyid du dus byas nas dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa zhes bya bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /khyod nyid kyang ngan song du lhung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' sgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes gang yin pa de bshad do/ /sems rtogs pa nas brtsams nas ni/ /rdo rje dbyings zhes brjod
byed cing / /sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag bsgyur la/ /rdo rje nyi ma bsgoms par bya'o/ /grub ma thag tu 'di yis ni/ /ye shes tshe stobs na tshod dang / /kun tu 'gro ba nyid
rnams 'thob/ /sangs rgyas 'grub pa'ang dka' ba min/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' chen po
sgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba yin te/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /rdo rje bsgyings par sems bskyed do/ /bsgyings bcas rdo rje gsor byed na/ /rdo rje sems dpar bdag
nyid 'gyur/ /'dis ni kun tu 'gro ba dang / /'dod pa kun bdag bde chen dang / /rdzu 'phrul tshe stobs gzugs mchog rnams/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur/ /sku gsung
thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /ji ltar ri mo'i rjes mthun zhing / /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnam ldan par/ /sems dpa' chen por bsgrub par bya/ /de nas 'dir ni rtog kun gyi/ /sgrub pa
dang ni dngos grub dang / /grub pa rnams kyi las chen rnams/ /go rims bzhin du bshad par bya/ /dang po nyin re dus bzhin du/ /rang la byin gyis brlab la sogs/ /byas nas
thams cad bsgrub bya ste/ /de yi 'og tu ci dgar bya/ /de la phyag rgya chen por sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ /rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po cho ga bzhin/ /
bcings nas de yi mdun phyogs su/ /sems dpa' chen po de bsgom mo/ /ye shes sems dpa' de mthong nas/ /rang gi lus su bsgom par bya/ /bkug cing bcug la bcing
