@#/ /ba dang | |dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya'o/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /badzra satwa aH/ rdo rje dbab pa'i snying po'o/ /badzra satwa dr-i
sh+ya ho| |sems dpa' chen po rjes su dran par bya ba'i snying po'o/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHsems dpa' chen po spyan drang ba dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba
rnams kyi snying po'o/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod pas/ /rgyab tu zla ba grub nas ni/ /der bdag sems dpa'i lus su bsgom/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM brjod/ /sems dpa' gang gi
phyag rgya gang / /de ni bdag tu bsgoms nas ni/ /rdo rje'i bzlas pas bsgrub par bya/ /phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'o/ /gzhan yang sgrub pa chen po ni/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes
brjod la/ legs pa'i cho gas yid kyis ni/ /lus la sangs rgyas kun gzhug go /de nas bla med rdo rje'i las/ /de dag gi ni las bshad do/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran
grub na| |sangs rgyas nyid du myur du 'gyur/ /sems dpa'i rdo rje ma grub na/ /phyag rgya kun gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /rin chen rdo rje ma phyag rgyas/ /de ni rin chen kun dbang
'gyur/ /chos kyi rdo rje grub na ni/ /sangs rgyas chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /las kyi rdo rje ma phyag rgyas/ /rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur/ /sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings pa yis/ /
rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dren pa'i cho ga yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa spyan 'dren 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dod pa'i phyag rgya ches/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed/ /rdo
rje legs pa'i cho ga yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed/ /rin chen phyag rgya'i cho ga yis/ /sangs rgyas dbang bskur sbyin par byed/ /rdo rje gzi brjid cho ga yis/ /
rdo rje gzi brjid myur du 'grub/ /rdo rje dpal 'dzin bsten pa yis/ /re ba rnams ni yongs su skong / /rdo rje bzhad pa'i cho ga yi/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam du bzhad/ /rdo rje
chos kyi cho ga yis/ /rdo rje chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rdo rje rnon pe'i cho ga yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi shes rab mchog /rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin bsten pas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo
bskor bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsung ba'i cho ga yis/ /sangs rgyas gsung gi grub pa thob/ /rdo rje las mchog bsgrubs pas na/ /rdo rje'i las su myur du 'grub/ /rdo rje'i go cha
bskor nas ni/ /rdo rje'i sku ni thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin bsgrubs na ni/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam par 'gyur/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas na/ /phyag rgya thams cad
'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin ma grub pas ni/ /rdo rje chen po dga' ba thob/ /rdo rje phreng ba bcings pas na/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur 'gyur/ /rdo rje glu yi cho ga
@#/ /yis| |rdo rje glu ni len par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i gar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun la de mchod do/ /rdo rje bdug pa'i cho ga yis/ /'gro ba thams
cad tshim par byed/ /rdo rje'i me tog sbyor byed pas/ /des ni 'gro ba dbang du byed/ /rdo rje snang ba'i phyag rgya ches/ /rab mchog mig ni sbyin par byed/ /rdo rje dri yi cho gas ni//
sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed/ /rdo rje lcags kyus drangs pas na/ /'dren pa kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje zhags pa'i cho ga ni/ /thams cad rab tu 'jug par
'gyur| |rdo rje lcags sgrog sbyor bas ni/ /thams cad ba cing bar nus par 'gyur/ /rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga yis/ /thams cad dbab par rab tu 'grub/ /de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bshad de/ thal mo dam du sbyar ba las/ /sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni/ /rdo rje thal mor bka'
stsal te/ /rab tu bsdams phyir rdo rje bsdams/ /dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /rdo rje bsdams las byung bas na/ /de dag bsdams pa rdo rje yis/ /bsdams pa bla
med bshad par bya/ /rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ /gung mo myu gu ltar mnyam sgreng / /gung mo nang du gshibs pa ni/ /sangs rgyas gnyis pa'i yin par bshad/ /
gung mo rin chen 'dra ba dang / /gung mo pad+mo 'dra ba dgug /sangs rgyas lnga pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /de bzhin mdzub mo dgug pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /rigs kyi
dam tshig 'dzin pa yi/ /phyag rgya bcings dang dngos grub dang / /las rnams yang dag bshad par bya/ /zla ba lta bu'i lag gnyis kyis/ /gung mo btang bar gyur pa yi/ /mthe
bong mthe'u chung so sor sgreng / /sems dpa'i rdo rje sgreng rdo rje/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu mdzub mo sbyar/ /legs so sbyin pa 'dra ba ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po yi/ /phyag rgya
mang po'i dngos grub de'o/ /mthe bong gshibs la mdzub gnyis bcag /rtse sprad rdo rje rin chen yin/ /de nyid gung mo srin lag dang / /mthe'u chung rnams ni bsnol
brkyang ba'o/ /de las srin lag mthe'u chung gnyis/ /mnyam par gshibs pa rgyal mtshan no/ /de nyid las ni bskor nas kyang / /kha yi phyogs su bzhag pa'o/ /mthe
bong gnyis ka mnyam par gshibs/ /mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug pa dang / /gung mo sgreng ba'i rtse mo bkug /de nyid rdo rje ral gri'o/ /de las srin lag mthe'u chung
gshibs/ /'khor lo yin par bshad pa yin/ /bsdams pas mthe bong gnyis bkrol ba/ /bkan te kha phyogs bzhag pa'o/ /mthe bong mthe'u chung rtse sprad bkyed/ /
@#/ /las kyi rdo rje yin par bshad/ /de las mdzub mo gnyis gshibs pas/ /snying gar brkyang ste bzhag pa'o/ /mdzub mo rtse mo gnyis bkug la/ /mthe'u chung gshibs par
mche ba'o/ /mthe'u chung gnyis par mthe bong gnyis/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyis btsir ba'o/ /snying gar mthe bong mnyam nas bzhag/ rab tu brkyang ba phreng ba'o/ /thal mo sbyar te kha nas
dbyung / /gar las thal sbyar spyi bor bzhag /rdo rje bcings pa thur du blugs/ /rang gi thal sbyar gyen du gtor/ /mthe bong mnyam te rab tu bsdams/ /rab tu brkyang
nas byug pa'o/ /mdzub mo gcig pu bkug pa dang / /mthe bong gnyis ni mdud pa dor/ /mthe bong mdzub mo gdu bur bcing / /rdo rje bcing ba mdzub mo bsdams/ /de nas
'di rnams sgrub bshad de/ /rdo rje sgrub pa dam pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rang gi phyag rgya snying gar bzhag /de nas 'di rnams las bshad pa/ /rdo rje'i
las ni bla na med/ /rdo rje dbyings lnga'i phyag rgya ni/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams 'dus pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor slob dpon slob mar bcas/ /de ma thag tu byin gyis rlob/ /
sems dpa'i rdo rje bcings pa ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bcings pa yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kun nas 'gugs/ /'dod pa'i rdo rje'i sbyar
bas ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyang mnyes par byed/ /rdo rje dga' bas rgyal ba kun/ /legs so bas ni ba stod par byed/ /rin chen rdo rje bcings pas na/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis de
dbang bskur/ /rdo rje nyi ma bcings pas na/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'drar 'gyur/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'chang 'gyur bas/ /re ba kun yang rdzogs par byed/ /rdo rje bzhad pa'i tshul
gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig bzhad/ /chos kyi rdo rje bcings pas na/ /rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje ral gri thogs pas na/ /nyon mongs thams cad des
gcod do/ /rdo rje 'khor lo brtan byas pas/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbang por 'gyur/ /rdo rje smra ba'i sbyor bas ni/ /rdo rje'i ngag mchog 'grub par 'gyur/ /las kyi rdo rje bcings
pas ni| |rdo rje'i las dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje go cha brtan byas pas/ /lus ni rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje mche ba'i mchog phyag rgyas/ /ma rungs bdud ni des 'joms
so/ /rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings pas/ /phyag rgya kun yang dbang du 'gyur/ /'dzum pas lha yi dga' ba rnams/ /phreng ba yis ni rgyan gyi rnams/ /glu yis rtag tu skad gsal
ba| |gar gyis mchod pa brnyes par 'gyur/ /bdug pas 'jig rten tshim par byed/ /me tog gis ni mdzes pa'i gzugs/ /mar mes snang ba dag pa nyid/ /dri yis
@#/ /lha rdzas dri can du'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs pa ste/ /rdo rje zhags pas 'jug par byed/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog bcings pa ste/ /rdo rje dril bus
'bebs pa'o/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do/ /badzra dz+nyA na sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje dbyings ni brtan par byed/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /chos kyi
phyag rgya cho ga bzhin/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod na/ /phyag rgya kun gyi dbang por 'gyur/ /A na ya swa zhes brjod na/ /gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas 'gugs/ /a ho su kha
zhes brjod na/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang mnyes par 'gyur/ /sA d+hu sA d+hu zhes smras nas/ /legs pa'i tshig gis de dgar byed/ /su ma hat+t+waM zhes brjod na/ /sangs rgyas
rnams kyis dbang bskur thob/ /rU pa d+yo ta zhes smras na/ /chos kyi gzi brjid nyid du 'gyur/ /ar+tha prA p+ta zhes smras na/ /re ba rnams kyang rdzogs par byed/ /ha ha hUM he zhes
bgad na/ /sangs rgyas bzhad pa rnyed par 'gyur/ /sar+b+ba ka ri zhes smras na/ /mi bya ba yi rnams kyang spyod/ /duHkha ts+tshe da zhes smras na/ /des ni sdug bsngal thams cad
gcod| |bud+d+ha bo d+hi zhes smras na/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /pra ti shap+ta ces smras na/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang lhan cig smra/ /su b+hA Shi twaM zhes
smras na/ /kun gyi dbang dang ldan par 'gyur/ /nir+b+ha ya s+t+waM zhes smras na/ /de ma thag tu 'jigs med 'gyur/ /sha truM b+hak+Sha zhes smras na/ /dgra rnams thams cad za bar 'gyur/ /
sarba sid+d+hi zhes smras na/ /thams cad grub pa nyid du 'gyur/ /mahA ra ti lha yi dga'/ /ru pa sho b+hes gzugs bzang nyid/ /she tra sau khya bde ba sbyin/ /sar+b+ba pU dza mchod par
byed| |prah+lA da ni yid bder 'gyur/ /pha lA gA mi 'bras bu thob/ /su te dz+wA kri gzi brjid che/ /su gan+d+hA rgi dri mchod can/ /A ya ha dziH'gugs par byed/ /A yA hri hUM
'jug par byed/ /he spo Ta baM 'ching ba che/ /g+haN+Ta a aHrab bskyod pa'o/ /de nas de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa dge ba bshad do/ /lce la rdo rje dge bsgoms na/ /las
rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /de nas las kyi bcing ba bshad de/ /rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te/ /mnyam par bzhag pas gnyis su bya/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya
gnyis bcings te/ /de nas bcing ba rab tu bshad/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni/ /g.yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste/ /sangs rgyas
byang chub sbyin byed pa'o/ /mi g.yo ba yis sa reg pa/ /de bzhin rin chen sbyin pa'o/ /tshe dpag med pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /gdon mi za ba'i mi 'jigs sbyin//
@#/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams/ /mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya/ /rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams/ /rdo rje las rnams byed pa
ste| |bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yis/ /lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang / /mda' 'phang ba yi tshul gyis ni/ /legs so zhes pa snying gar gzhag
dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis/ /snying gar nyi ma brtan par bya/ /g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs/ /de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya/ /g.yas pa yis ni g.yon pa
dbye| |snying gar g.yon pa ral gri mdung / /mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung / /rdo rje gar bskor dkrol ba yis/ /thal mo 'gram
pa spyi bor bzhag /go cha mthe'u chung mche ba dang / /khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o/ /rdo rje 'gying ba'i tshul gyis su/ /bsam pa g.yon pas gdung par bya/ /phreng ba
bcing dang kha nas dbyung / /rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni/ /bdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyin/ /sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yi/ /phyag rgya'i
mchod pa byed pa'o/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba ni/ /mthe'u chung las te lcags kyu che/ /mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis gdub/ /rgyab gnyis kyang ni
bsnyams te mnan/ /de nas 'di rnams sgrub bshad pa/ /rdo rje las ni byed dang mnyam/ /rdo rje kun gyi rdo rje ni/ /rang gi snying gar goms par bya/ /de nas 'di rnams las phyag
rgya| |rdo rje'i las ni rnam pa mang / /ye shes khu tshur bcings pas ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur/ /mi g.yo ba yi bcings pas ni/ /yid ni g.yo ba med par 'gyur//
rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /gzhan la phan byed ldan par 'gyur/ /dam chos 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /mi 'jigs mchog
gis myur ba ni/ /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /rdo rje 'gying ba brtan byas la/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba rnyed/ /rdo rje lcags kyu skad cig tu/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa kun kyang 'gugs/ /rdo rje mda' yis rdo rje yi/ /lha mo mnyes par bdag nyid byed/ /rdo rje dga' bas rgyal ba kun/ /legs so zhes pas tshig kyang sbyin/ /rdo rje chen
po nor bu sbyin/ /ston pa rnams kyis de dbang bskur/ /rdo rje nyi ma bcings pas ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan sgreng bas ni/ /des ni rin chen char yang
'bebs/ /rdo rje 'dzum pa bcings pas ni/ /sangs rgyas 'dra ba myur bzhad 'gyur/ /rdo rje me tog bcings pas ni/ /rdo rje'i chos nyid de yis mthong / /rdo rje ral gri brtan
@#/ /bcings na/ /des ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod/ /rdo rje 'khor lo bcings pas ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas
kun gyi tshig rnams ni/ /rdo rje'i bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang du 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i go chas lus bcings pas//
rdo rje snying po thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i mche ba bcings pas ni/ /rdo rje nyid kyang bdag gis choms/ /rdo rje khu tshur kun 'phrog cing / /phyag rgya grub pa kun tu rnyed/ /rdo rje 'dzin
pas dga' ba sbyin/ /rdo rje phreng bas gzugs bzang ba/ /rdo rje glu yis glu snyan cing / /rdo rje gar gyis dbang du byed/ /bdug pa yis ni yid tshim pa/ /ma tog gis ni rgyan
rnams te/ /mar me yis ni gzi chen po/ /rdo rje'i dris ni dri rab ldan/ /rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs pa ste/ /rdo rje zhags pas 'jug pa'o/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog gis ni bcing //
rdo rje dril bu bskyod pa'o/ /de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad de/ /de la thog ma nyid du rdo rje bcing pa'i sor mo snying gar
brdab par bya ste/ snying po ni 'di brjod do/ /badzra ban+d+ha tra Ta/ de nas phyag rgya bcings pa kun rang gi lus dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rje'i dbang du 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje dbab
ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do/ /a/ de nas yang dag par babs nas grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag rgya'i dam
tshig gi sems dpa' chen rjes su dran par bya ste snying po 'di brjod do/ /mahA sa ma ya satwa haM/ des phyag rgya thams cad 'grub ste/ /phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i cho ga
rgyas pa'o/ /de nas spyi'i sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad/ de la thog mar rang gi phyag rgya bcings nas rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpar bdag gi snying po 'dis bsgom mo/ /sa ma
ya haM| de nas rang phyag rgya'i sems dpar bdag bsgoms nas/ sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab bo/ /sa ma ya satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ de nas bsgrub par bya'o/ /bsgrub pa'i cho ga
rgyas pa'o/ /de nas dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad de/ de la thog mar re zhig nor 'grub par 'dod na snying po 'di yin no/ /aR+tha sid+d+hi/ de'i phyag rgya grub na nor chen po skye
bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje grub par 'dod na snying po 'di yin no/ /badzra sid+d+hi/ 'dis ci 'dod pa bzhin du rdo rje grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig 'dzin gyi grub pa 'dod na snying
po 'di yin no/ /badzra bid+yA d+ha ra sid+hi/ des ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rig 'dzin 'grub bo/ /de bzhin du dam pa grub par 'dod na rang gi phyag rgya'i snying pos bsgrub bo/ /dngos
@#/ /grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi spyi'i rang gi lus dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rjer bya ba'i phyir cho ga rgyas pa bshad de/ nam phyag
rgya'i byin gyis brlabs lhod par gyur tam/ bdag rang gtong bar 'dod na de nas snying po 'di brtan par bya'o/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa

tiSh+Tha dr-i D+ho me b+ha wa/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ sar+b+ba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma su tsa me/ tsit+taM shri yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoHb+ha ga wA na/ sar+b+ba
ta thA ga ta badzra mA me muny+tsa badzri b+ha wa mahA sa ma ya satwa AH'dis ni mtshams med pa byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus pa dang / dam pa'i chos smod
pa dang / nyes pa thams cad byas pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa pos rdo rje sems dpa' brtan par gyur pas tshe 'di nyid la ji ltar 'dod pa'i
dngos grub thams cad dam/ dngos grub dam pa 'am/ rdo rje dngos grub bam/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub bam/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi dngos grub kyi bar du
myur du thob bo zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba'i spyi'i cho ga rgyas
pa bshad do/ /de la thog ma nyid du phyag rgya thams cad gang dang / gang nas byung ba de dang / de nyid nas snying po 'dis dgrol lo/ /oM badzra muHde nas snying ga nas byung ba rin
chen rdo rje'i phyag rgya rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na gnas pas dbang bskur te/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis bskor zhing bcings nas/ de bzhin du go cha'ang snying po 'dis bcing
ngo| |oM badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ sar+b+ba mu drA mai tri d+hI ku ru ba ra ka ba tse na baM/ de nas yang go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcings pa gtad la/ thal mo mnyam par brdabs te snying po
'dis mnyes par bya'o/ /badzra tu Sh+ya hoH/ cho ga 'dis phyag rgya rnams dgrol ba dang / bcings pa dang / mnyes par byas nas rdo rje lta bur 'gyur ro/ /yang na rdo rje sems
dpas kyang bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lan cig bzlas/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bdag bde bar/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin/ /
zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so/ /rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams/ /sgrub pa dang ni las kun la/ /'dir ni ci dgar bzlas na ni/ /rtog pa
kun las dngos grub thob/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /rtog pa las bshad rang byas pa'am/ /bsgrub pa 'dir ni thams cad
@#/ /do| |de nas gsang ba'i mchod brjod cing / /rdo rje'i bstod pas glu blangs te/ /gsang ba'i mchod ba bzhi bya'o/ /oM rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus
pas na/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas/ /rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur/ /de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje bstod pa'i glu 'di nyid kyis rdo rje'i gar
lag pa gnyis gshibs pas bsang ba bya'o/ /bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa bya ste/ de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa byas
la| mchod pa de dag rang rang gi gnas su gzhag go /de nas thams cad la ci nus par mchod cig ces bsgo nas de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la stsol ste/
ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa byed du bcug la/ ji ltar bzhugs pa rnams ci 'byor pa'i ro dang / kha zas la sogs pa thams cad dang /
dkyil 'khor chen por phul ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis mgu bar bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin no/ /'di de sangs
rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya/ tiSh+Tha
e Sha twAM d+hA ra yA mi/ badzra satwa hi hi hi hi hUM/ de nas thams cad du su la'ang ma bzla zhig ces bsgo la/ mna'i snying po'ang bstan to/ /de nas ji ltar zhugs pa rnams slar
bgye ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab cing sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas kha gyen du bstan te/ snying po 'di bzlas shing dkrol nas/ oM|
khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du bzhud par mdzod/ /slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol/ /badzra satwa muHde ltar
dkyil 'khor thams cad la'ang bya'o/ /dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya rnams kyang dgrol bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs
pa rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //bam po gsum pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gzungs dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu'ang de nyid kyi tshe de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid rdo rje 'dzin ba'i gzugs 'dzin pa kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig gi
@#/ /phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams su gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i
gzungs kyi ye shes bsgrubs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbyings
kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la 'khod de ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o gang phyir byang chub sems/ /sems
can kun la phan bzhed pa/ /'dul ba'i dbang gis dpa' bo gang / /bud med gzugs su'ang mdzad par gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i
mchog 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra d+hA twI shwa ri hUM badzri Ni/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dam
tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM badzra
badzri Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin
gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM rat+na badzri Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang
gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM d+har+m+ma badzri Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi
phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM kar+m+ma badzri Ni hUM/ de nas byang chub
sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do/ /oM badzrA satwa gu d+ya sa ma ye s+t+waM/ oM gu h+ya
rat+na aM ku she hUM/ oM gu h+ya rA gi rA gA ya hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya badzra sA d+h+wi shwa ri hUM/ kun tu bzang mo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu ma dang / dga' ba la chags ma
@#/ /dang | legs ldan ma ste/ rdo rje gzungs chen mo rnams so/ /oM badzra gu h+ya rat+na sa ma la hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya pra b+he hUM/ oM badzra d+h+wa dza a gra gu h+ya hUM/ oM badzra
hA sa badzri hUM/ rin po che'i gtso mo dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ma dang / bzhad pa dang ldan ma rnams te/ rin po che'i gzungs rnams

so| |oM badzra d+har+m+ma gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/ oM badzra ko Sha gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya maN+Da le hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya wa tsa sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje pad+mo dang / kun 'dzin ma dang / 'khor lo

thams cad ma dang / stong du zlos ma ste/ chos kyi gzungs ma rnams so/ /oM badzra gu h+ya kar+m+ma sa ma ye hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya ka brtse hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya daM Sh+TA d+hA ra NI hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya
muSh+Ti hUM/ dngos grub kun gyi gtso mo dang / thams cad srung ba ma dang / mdangs slar 'phrog ma dang / gzungs kyi phyag rgya ma ste/ thams cad kyi gzungs rnams so/ /de nas yang
phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po rnams bshad do/ /oM badzra gu h+ya satwa badzra

Ni hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya rat+na badzri Ni hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya d+har+m+ma badzri Ni hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya kar+m+ma badzri Ni hUM/ rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa de dag nyid la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams te/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dkyil 'khor chen por 'bar ba dang bcas pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug par gzhag
go /de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do/ /oM badzra gu h+ya ra ti pU dzA sa ma ye sar+b+ba pU dzA pra

bar+t+taM nA ya hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya a b+hi She ka pU dzA sa ma ye sarba pU dzA pra bar+t+ta nA ya hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya gI ti pU dzA sa ma ye sar+b+ba pU dzA pra bar+t+ta nA ya hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya nri t+ya pU dzA sa ma ye sar+b+ba
pU dzA pra bar+t+ta nA ya hUM/ rdo rje 'dzin ma la sogs pa de dag nyid de 'bar ba dang bcas pa rang gi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa rnams su dgod do/ /de
nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo
rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /rdo rje gsang ba zhes bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni/ /
sangs rgyas phyag rgya bri bar bya/ /mchod rten khri la legs 'dug pa/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad/ /khri yi steng du rdo rje brtsegs/ /rdo rje sems zhes bshad pa'o/ /
@#/ /rdo rje rin chen khri yi ste/ /rang gi dbang ni bskur bar bshad/ /rdo rje pad+ma khri yi steng / /mtshon cha zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /las kyi rdo rje khri yi steng / /rdo
rje kun zhes bya bar bshad/ /pad+mo'i steng du bri bar ni/ /'od kyi 'khor lo brten pa'o/ /khri yi steng du rdo rje bri/ /lcags kyu 'greng ba gnyis de bzhin/ /rdo rje rdo rje la snyes par/ /legs
par sbyin pa gnyis de bzhin/ /rin chan 'od zer 'bar bar bya/ /nyi ma'i phyag rgya'ang de bzhin no/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mo 'bar bar bcas/ /rdo rje gnyis par so yi phreng / /rdo
rje dbus su pad+ma bri/ /ral gri 'bar bcas de bzhin no/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rdo rje rtsibs/ /'bar ba'i 'od zer can gyi lce/ /rdo rje kun tu rtse mo dang / /go cha rdo rje yang dag ldan/ /rdo
rje mche ba yang dag bri/ /lag gnyis khu tshur phyag rgya bya/ /sems ma rdo rje la sogs ni/ /dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin du/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri bar ni/ /rdo rje
'dzin sogs dkyil 'khor du/ /phyi rol du yang ci rigs par/ /rang gi mtshan ma rnams kyang bri/ /byams pa la sogs rang gi mtshan/ /ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bri/ /
de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te/ de la thog mar rdo rje slob dpon gyi sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya rang gis bcings
te| 'jug par bya'o/ /zhugs nas lan gcig bskor te/ phyag rgya de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phul nas/ rang gi snying gar tshul bzhin du bkrol te/ sgo bzhir rdo rje
lcags kyu la sogs pas ji lta ba bzhin du las rnams byas te phyir byung ngo / /phyir byung nas kyang rdo rje slob ma rnams rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gzung ba'i tshul du gzud
do| |de nas btsud nas dngos grub gyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mtshan ma 'chang bas g.yogs la byin te/ rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /de la dang por re zhig rdo rje
gsang ba'i lus kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rkang lag thal mo sbyar nas kha/ /glal cing rdo rje bsgoms byas na/ /rdo rje ma yang chags bar
byed| |dpung pa bskum pa'i lcags kyu dang / mgo la rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /lag pa yis ni 'byed byed cing / /lcags kyu ma yang 'gugs par byed/ /mda' 'phen pa yi tshul
gyis ni/ /glal zhing snying gar 'phangs nas ni/ /nyid kyis rdo rje dga' ma yang / /bdud kyi tshul gyis mnyes par byed/ /bdag gi lus kyi snying gar ni/ /rdo rje go cha'i tshul gyis ni/ /
dpung pa bsnol bar bcings nas ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang srung bar byed/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /badzra rA ga ma ho/ /badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ badzra mA ra ya mA ra ya
@#/ /phaT/ badzra ban b+ha rak+Sha haM/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i blta ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /rdo rje blta bas chags pas ni/ /dga' bas mig ni rab tu
bgrad/ /de yis bud med bltas pas na/ /rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ba yin/ /rab tu myur bar mig bsgul zhing / /mig gi rdzi ma 'gags byed pa/ /lta ba gzi bcan yin par
bshad/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed pa'o/ /khro gnyer gnyer ma rab bsdus pa/ /khro bo'i mig ni btsums pa ste/ /khro bo'i blta ba byas nas ni/ /khams gsum yang
ni 'jigs par byed/ /ri rab ri yi brag 'dra ba/ /brtan par 'dzu mas ba med pa'i mig /byams pa'i blta ba yin par bshad/ /nad dang gdon dang dug sel to/ /de nas

'di rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /badzra dr-iSh+Ti ma Ta dI pa ta dr-iSh+Ti aM ku sha dzaHko d+ha dr-iSh+Ti hrIHdr-i D+ha tiSh+tha phaT/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes
bslab bo/ /ho ho ho ho zhes smras na/ /sgra dang bral bas de ma thag /sems can kun ni mgu bar byed/ /de ni rdo rje tshig gsal ba'o/ /dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza dz+dza zhes brjod na/ /khro bo'i tshig
ni gsal ba ste/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra ba yi/ /skye bo kun kyang 'gugs par byed/ /hUM hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod na/ /tshig tu brjod pa gsal ba yis/ /ri rab dang ni 'dra ba yi/ /sems
can kun la 'dud byed do/ /haM haM haM haM zhes smras na/ /phra ba'i tshig gi gsol ba ste/ /'jig rten 'di kun srung byed pa/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid rgyal ba'ang srung / /de la snying po 'di rnams

yin no/ /badzra hoHbadzra dzaHbadzra hUM/ badzra hUM/ badzra haM/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i/ /phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid la/ /
bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms byas na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du byed/ /rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa/ /rdo rje snying po bdag nyid la/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms byas
na| |phyag na rdo rje 'gugs par byed/ /rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje'i spyan ni bdag nyid la/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms byas na/ /chos rnams thams cad des
btud byed/ /rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje thams cad bdag nyid la/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms byas na/ /rdo rje thams cad nges srung ngo / /de la snying po ni 'di

rnams yin no/ /badzra pA Ni sar+b+ba sha mA na ya sarba bud+d+ha ho/ badzra gar+b+h+wa badzra gA Ni shI g+h+raM A kaR+Sha ya hUM dza| badzra ne tra sar+b+ba d+harma mA ra ya hUM phaT/ badzra bi shwa rak+Sha sar+b+bA na hUM/ de nas rdo
rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /bdag gi lus kyi snying gar ni/ /sems dpa'i rdo rje bcing byas la/ /rdo rje mig gis bltas na ni/ /'gro ba thams cad dbab par
@#/ /byed| |bdag gi lus kyi snying gar ni/ /rin chen rdo rje bcing byas la/ /'bar ba'i mig gis bltas na ni/ /thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur//
bdag gi lus kyi snying gar ni/ /chos kyi rdo rje bcing byas la/ /khro bo'i mig gis bltas na ni/ /'gro ba thams cad des sdud byed/ /bdag gi lus kyi snying gar ni/ /las kyi
rdo rje bcing byas la/ /byams pa'i mig gis bltas na ni/ /'gro ba thams cad srung bar byed/ /de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag
yin no/ /badzra gu h+ya sa ma ya hoH/ /badzra gu h+ya sa ma ya dza|/ badzra gu h+ya sa ma ya hUM/ badzra gu h+ya sa ma ya haM/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba la bslab bo/ /
rdo rje thal mo las byung ba/ /gsang ba chen po rab tu bshad/ /phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus pa/ /de dag gi ni bcing ba bshad/ /mthe bong gnyis ni bsnol byas la/ /
mdzub mo rtse mo bkug pas ni/ /gung mo bsnyams pa'i tshigs su sbyar/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad/ /de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya/ /gung mo gnyis ni nor bur
byas| |pad+ma srin lag mthe chung gung / /lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang / /mdzub mo rdo rje mdzub gnyis rtse/ /de nyid mthe bong gnyis kyis spras/ /legs pa sbyin dang
mdzub rin chen/ /mdzub mo rin chen can 'od bar/ /srin lag gshibs la mthe'u rin chen/ /de nyid kyang ni bskor ba'o/ /kun gyi rtse mo rab tu dbye/ /mthe bo mthe'u
chung rab tu gzhug /sor mo rab tu 'khor lo brkyang / /de nyid kyang ni kha nas dbyung / /mthe bong brkyang ste rdo rje dgab/ /mdzub mo bsnyams nas nang du gzhug /mthe'u
gnyis dbye ba de nyid las/ /de nas nang du rdo rjer bya/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i las rnams ni/ /rdo rje bcings las byung ba yin/ /chos kyi gsang ba'i mtshan rnams ni/ /thal mo
nang du bkug pas so/ /las kyi gsang ba nang gnas pa'i/ /mtshan mas las su bstan pa'o/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /chos kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa/ /a|
dz+dzaHhoHsaHoMHaMHtrAM|haHhrIHd+ha|maM/ raM|kaM|hUMHbaM|gsang ba'i phyag rgya gnyis byas nas/ /las kyi phyag rgya rnams su bya/ /dam tshig mchog ni ji snyed pa/ /gnyis
su phral nas de bzhin no/ /de nas 'di rnams sgrub pa bshad/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes smras zhing / /bdag gis bcings pas 'grub pa ni/ /'dod la chags pa bde ba'i bdag/
'di rnams lhag par gcig kyang ni/ /dus kun tu ni bcing mi bya/ /gsang ba lam ni don chen la/ /mkhas pa yis ni sbyar bar bya/ /'di rnams kun la bdag nyid gnas/ /
@#/ /rang byung rnams kyi lha mo brtan/ /sgrub pa rnams la rab chags na/ /rang gi bdag pe btang nga re/ /de nas phyag rgya 'di rnams thams cad bcing ba
la sogs pa'i las rnams yin no/ /bdag gam 'on te gzhan yang rung / /rdo rje dbab pa byas na ni/ /snying por bya ba 'di yis ni/ /bcing ngam 'ching du gzhug kyang rung / /
badzra hUM ban+d+ha/ de nas dgrol ba yin no/ /mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /snying por bya ba 'di nyid kyis/ /gang dang gang nas byung ba yi/ /de dang de nas dgrol bar bya/ /oM
badzra muHde nas brtan par bya ba yin te/ /rin chen rdo rje brtan byas te/ /snying ga nas ni sbyi bor dgrol/ /mdzub mo yis ni go cha bcing / /snying por bya ba 'di nyid do/ /oM
dr-i D+ha badzra ka ba tsa dr-i D+ha/ de nas bcing ba'i dam tshig yin no/ /ji ltar gnas pa rnams su dgrol/ /go cha yis ni brtan par byas/ /thal mo brdabs pas kun sbyar ba/ /
snying por bya ba 'di nyid do/ /oM gu h+ya sa ma ya tra/ rdo rje sems dpa' ci dgar bzlas/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni las kun la/ /dus 'di nyid du sbyar bar bya/ /thams cad
grub par byed pa'i mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil
'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dkyil
'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM badzra satwa sUk+Sh+ma badzra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad gyi rdo rje rin po che'i ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras
pa| oM rat+na sUk+Sh+ma badzra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil

'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM d+har+m+ma sUk+Sh+ma badzra dz+nyA badzra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
@#/ /pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM karma sUk+Sh+ma badzra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par
snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs
ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i 'od zer de rnams byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas
te| sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs pa brtan par byas te/ yang gcig tu gyur
nas ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i skur dmigs te gcig tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs
su zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi thugs su zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
phra mo'i dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje 'di smras pa/ sUk+Sh+ma badzra/ de nas de smras ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid byung
nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogs su
gnas nas chen du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma 'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje phra mo'i bdag ste che/ /gang phyir phra yang che ba'i phyir/ /khams gsum yang ni rgyas
par byed/ /de nas de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogs na
rab tu phra ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan ma rgyas par bya ba'i sbyor bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la khyab par byas nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par bya ba'i
tshul gyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du rab tu phra ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi mtshan ma rnams kyi khyab par byas so/ /nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad khyab par byas nas de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te 'dug go /de nas de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
@#/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbus su rdo rje'i chos nyid du dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye
shes phra mo'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje de las
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo / /badzra nA bI ta thA ga ta hUM/ de nas de phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes
ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur zhugs nas thugs kar rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur te gnas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje de las ye shes chen po 'di bzhi byung ngo / /badzra At+ma ka dr-i D+ha badzra aM ku sha tiSh+Tha ga badzra par pe sha hr-i da yaM/ a ho badzra duSh+Ti/ rdo rje sems
dpa' ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes
par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / dga' ba chen po ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po rnams so/ /de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po phyag na rdo rje ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i chul gyis rang gi thugs su zhugs te snying ga'i rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs

so| |de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs su de las snying po 'di bzhi phyung ngo / /badzra rat+na At+ma ka hr-i da ya/ badzra sUR+ya tiSh+Tha/ badzra d+h+wa dzA gra baM hr-i da ya/ badzra hU sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i rgyan ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi re ba rdzogs par
byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin
to| |de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rang gi snying ga rdo rje'i snying por zhugs nas rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs nas bzhugs so/ /

de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi phyung ngo / /badzra pad+ma at+ma ka hr-i da ya badzra ko Sha/ tiSh+Tha badzra tsakra hr-i da yaM pra be sha /badzra dzi hwA gra hr-i da ya/ chos thams cad mnyam pa
nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shes rab kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / 'khor lo chen por 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin
@#/ /gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshig gi spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ting nge 'dzin
to| |de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po thugs ka'i rdo rje las byung nas ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i thugs der zhugs nas yang rdo rje shin tu phra
mo'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs so/ /de nas rdo rje phra mo'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi phyung ngo / /sar+b+ba badzra At+ma ka hr-i da badzra ka ba tsa/ tiSh+Tha badzra
rak+Sha hr-i da ya/ badzra muSh+Ti hr-i da ya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las sna tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ye shes kyi
phyag rgya dang / bdud thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'ching ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rab tu phra ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan mas khyab pa'i tshul gyis de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje'i skur gyur nas/ de nas yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa
byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi skur gyur te/ rang rang gi mtshan ma nyid kyi thugs kar bzhag nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor la gnas nas rang rang gi snying bo'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste bzhugs so/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge
'dzin dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa'i phyir rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/ /de nas rab bshad bya ba/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa
ste| |rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /rdo rje phra mo zhes bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag /rdo rje dbus su sangs rgyas bri/ /
sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rnams su yang / /sems dpa' chen po rnams bri zhing / /de bzhin thugs kar nyid phyag rgya/ /ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pa dang / /phyag gnyis rdo rje bcing bar
bcings/ /de nas rdo rje phra mo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bzhugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas
par byas nas ye shes kyi mtshan ma lag tu byin nas rang gi sems las su rung bar bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab bo/ /lce ni rkan la sbyar bya zhing / /sna yi rtse mor
@#/ /bsam bya ba/ /rdo rje phra mo'i bde reg pas/ /sems ni mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur/ /rdo rje phra mo'i bde reg pa'i/ /mtshan ma gal te byung ba na/ /mchan ma de ni
khyab bya ba/ /sems de kun tu khyab par bya/ /ji tsam 'dod par sems khyab nas/ /khams gsum du yang khyab par 'gyur/ /de nas de yang bsdu ba ni/ /sna yi rtse mo'i bar du yang /
de dag shin tu mnyam par gzhag /gang yang rung ste bsgom bya ba/ /de dag thams cad brtan par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin ye shes brtag pa'o/ /de nas de rnams kyi snying po 'di yi
no| |sUk+Sh+ma badzra s+pha ra Na/ saM ha ra Na badzra/ badzra hr-i da tiSh+Tha/ /sems dpa' gang gi byams pa ni/ /mnyam 'gyur brtan pa chen po yis/ /sems kyis khyab par tshul gyis ni/ /sems
can kun la des khyab bya/ /byams pas khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /snying rje can ni gang yin pa/ /sems can kun don ldan pa yin/ /sgrub pa yis ni khyab par bya/ /kun kyang rang bzhin
'od gsal ba/ /gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /chos sam yang na chos ma yin/ /bsam pas khyab cing dga' bar 'gyur/ /gdul dka' ba dang mtshungs 'dra ba/ /sangs
rgyas byang chub snod ma yin/ /de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /btang snyoms chen po goms par bya/ /de'i snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /mahA mai tri s+pha ra Na/ mahA ka ru Na s+pha
ra Na/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ho phra mo da s+pha ra Na/ sar+b+ba sa twaM saM bo d+ha ya/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa'i ye shes bslab bo/ /nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /
rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /'greng dam yang na 'dug kyang rung / /rdo rje'i dbyibs ni goms par bya/ /de bzhin du yang gnas kun tu/ /rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /mnyam bar gzhag
pas snying gar ni/ /rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' bsgom/ /ji lta ba yi rim bzhin du/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /phyag na rdo rje dbyibs chen po/ /gnas rnams kun tu bsgoms par
bya| |rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas sku ni dus kun tu/ /ji lta ba yi go rims bzhin/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya/ /de la snying po ni 'di rnams

yin no/ /badzra mu khi b+ha ba/ mahA bo d+hi satwa A be sha /badzra pA Ni d+hA ra sha ya su ru baM/ bud+d+ha a nu smra ti a be sha /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /goms par bya ba bdag nyid kyis/ /zla
ba'i dbyibs su bdag nyid ni/ /byang chub sems kyis bsgom pa'o/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /bdag nyid rdo rje'i dbyibs gyur par/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya
pa| |sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgom pa'o/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la/ /bdag nyid snying gar rdo rje sems/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom pa'o/ /rnam
@#/ /pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag nyid ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bsgom pa'o/ /de la
snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /sa man+ta b+ha dra A be sha /badzra satwa badzra A be sha /badzra satwa sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na A be sha /ta thA ga to hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
nyid gsal ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /bdag ni de bzhin gshegs dang mnyam/ /rdo rje'i tshig tu lan gcig brjod/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas/ /
sems can thams cad chags par byed/ /bdag ni rdo rje chen por mnyam/ /rdo rje'i tshig tu lan gcig brjod/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas/ /gdon mi za bar
'jig rten 'gugs/ /bdag ni rdo rje chos dang mnyam/ /rdo rje'i tshig tu lan gcig brjod/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas/ /de yis 'jig rten thams cad 'jig /
bdag ni sna tshogs las dang mnyam/ /rdo rje'i tshig tu lan gcig brjod/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas/ /las rnams thams cad des bsgrub bo/ /de nas de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /
rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom bya ba/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku nyid du/ /des ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i
ye shes la bslab bo/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la/ /snying gar rdo rje la sogs 'khod/ /bsgoms nas rdo rje la sogs pas/ /rang gi dngos grub sbyin par byed/ /de nas de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /rdo rje bcings las legs byung bar/ /bcu drug rnams su bshad
pa ste| |ting nge 'dzin ni dam tshig mchog /de rnams kyis ni bcings pa bshad/ /dkyil mo krung 'dug gan rkyal du/ /g.yas gcus de bzhin slar gcus pa/ /snying
gar gnas pa bzhi pa ste/ /rdo rje sems sogs dkyil 'khor ro/ /dpral bar gzhag dang ltag pa dang / /phrag pa dang ni dgod par sbyar/ /khar bzhag snying gar ral gri
dang | |snying gar rgyas dang kha nas dbyung / /sbyi bo thong ka khar bzhag pa/ /mdzub mo gnyis bkug mdun de bzhin/ /de nas gzhan yang chos kyi phyag rgya la bslab
par bya'o/ /Tak+ki| gra gra| ma Ta| a graHtrAM trAM| aM aM|baM baM| tri Ta| hrIHTa/ b+h+r-i Ta/ kra sha/ ha ha| ba ba/ baM baM| phaT| gra sa/ de nas chos kyi las kyi mchog /phra mo 'i rdo rje
@#/ /can rnams bslab/ /ye shes khu tshur dam tshig las/ /gnyis su byas nas sbyar bar bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po
mngon par rtogs pa chen po'i rgyal po rdo rje ye shes kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi bla na med pa'i mchod pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ /rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra d+hA tu a nut+ta ra pU dza karma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin
gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ /rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa a nut+ta ra pU dzA kar+m+ma s+pha ra Na
sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rin po che'i mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab
pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra
rat+na a nut+ta ra pU dza kar+m+ma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje chos kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga
rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ /rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ /oM sar+b+ba
ta thA ga ta badzra d+har+m+ma a nut+ta ra pU dzA kar+m+ma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi
mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i
mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra kar+m+ma a nut+ta ra pU dzA kar+m+ma s+pha ra Na ma ye hUM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms
@#/ /par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu rgyas pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyi bkod
pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rab 'byams sprin gyi rgya mtsho'i lha mo rnams su gyur te byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams sprin gyi rgya mtsho rnams su de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi rigs mnyes par bya ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i sbyod pa bsgrub pa dang / byang chub chen po'i snying por nye bar 'gro ba dang / bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bskyed pa dang /
khams gsum thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med
pa rnams kyi don bya ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul thams cad bstan nas bzhugs so/ /mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho'i lha mo de dag kyang rang rang gi
phyag rgya lag pa gnyis kyis 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la cho ga bzhin du yang dag par mchod de/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla
pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas mchod pa bdag /mchod pa kun ni byed pa yi/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas byin
can du/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis grub par mdzad/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdo rje'i

bya ba zhes bya ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sar+b+ba At+mA ni r+yA ta na pU s+pha ra Na kar+m+ma badzri N-i hUM yA/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sar+b+ba At+mA ni r+yA ta na pU dzA

s+pha ra Na kar+m+ma gri dza|/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sar+b+ba At+ma ni r+yA ta na a nu rA ga pU dzA s+pha ra Na kar+m+ma bA Ne hUM ho/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sar+b+ba At+mA ni r+yA ta na sa d+hu gA ra pU dzA s+pha ra Na kar+m+ma
tuSh+Ti aHde bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' zhing bde ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
@#/ /thams cad mnyes par byed pa mo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par byed pa mo rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi mchod pa chen po rnams so/ /oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta kA ya a b+hi She ka rat+ne b+h+yo badzra ma Ni oM/ oM na maHsar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sU R+ye b+ho badzra te dzo ni dz+wA la hrIHoM na maHsar+b+ba

ta thA ga ta sha pa pa ri pU ra Ni/ tsin+ta ma Ni d+h+wa dza a gre b+h+yo badzra d+h+wa dza a gri trAM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta mahA prI ti pra mo d+ya ka re b+h+yo badzra hA s+ye ta/ dbang mo chen mo dang / snang
ba chen mo dang / rin po che chen po'i char 'bebs ma dang / rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i mchod pa'o/ /

oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma tA sa mA d+hi b+hi stu no mi mahA d+harmA gri hrIHoM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nir ha raiHstu no mi mahA gA+o ShA nu ge d+haM/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta tsakra

ak+Sha raM pa ri bar+t+tA di sarba su trAn+ta na yai stu no mi sarba maN+Dal hUM/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta san+d+hi b+hA Sha bud+d+ha saM gI ti b+hirga yaM/ stu no mi badzra bA tse baM/ ye shes chen mo'i glu ma dan/
dbyangs chen mo'i rjes su 'brang ma dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug ma dang / sngags kyi spyod pa mo rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mchod

pa'o| |oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hu pa me g+ha snga ra Na pU dzA karme ka ra ka ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pra sa ra s+pha ra Na pU dzA karme ki ri ki ri/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ke dz+wa la s+pha ra
Na pU dzA karme b+ha ra b+ha ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na pU dzA karme ku ru ku ru/ sems can ma dang / byang chub chen mo'i yan lag ldan ma dang / mig ldan
ma dang / dri ldan ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi mchod pa'o/ /de nas 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma lus shing lus pa med pa
thams cad la mchod pa byed pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje zhes bya ba bshad do/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang
'dra bas na/ /rdo rje bya ba zhes kyang grags/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /sangs rgyas sku rnams gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje sems sogs tshul du ni/ /lha mo phyag
rgya bcas pa bri/ /de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje bya ba 'dir gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di bshad do/ /de la dbang por rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du
'jug pa'i tshul gyis gzhug par bya ste/ bcug nas kyang 'di skad du/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig yin gyi/ mchod pa bcu
@#/ /drug po 'di rnams khyod kyis nyin re zhing ci nus su gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ /de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol te las kyi dkyil 'khor
bstan la thams cad kyi mtshan ma lag pa gnyis su sbyin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod na gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ /de
nas byang chub chen po'i sems bsgrub pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam
zhing | |dga' bas bdag ni mchod byed cing / /sangs rgyas kyi ni bde ba'ang 'thob/ /byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing / /
phreng ba la sogs rab mchod pas/ /mchod na de ni dbang yang bskur/ /byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing / /snyan pa'i
glu yis rab mchod pas/ /mchod na bdag de mgu bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas yin pas ma zhing / /gar gyi mchod
pas bdag mchod cing / /sangs rgyas kyis kyang de mchod 'gyur/ /de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /bud+d+ha At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ bud+d+ha stu ti ka ro mi/
bud+d+ha pU dzA ka ro ni/ de nas sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab par bya'o/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /mchog gi tshul gyis phyag 'tshal
zhing | |de bzhin sangs rgyas kun mchod na/ /rtag tu phyag byar 'os par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsod nams che/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje skyes/ /rjes su yi rang
bas mchod na/ /myur du sangs rgyas 'thob par 'gyur/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /lha rdzas kyi ni bdag dbul ba'i/ /mchod pa kun gyis sangs rgyas rnams/ /mchod
na de yang mchod par 'gyur/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /dge ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad ni/ /yongs su bsngo ba'i mchod pa yi/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par
'gyur/ /de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /pra tA ma mi a nu mo de bud+d+ha pU dzA pa ri nA ma/ de nas chos kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab par bya'o/ /chos rnams
rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /ngo bo nyid kyis gzod nas dag /chos 'di dag gis mchod pas ni/ /dga' ba'i bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /chos rnams kun ni 'dus pa yi/ /
a zhes bya ba sgo zhes brjod/ /chos kyi phyag rgya 'di yis ni/ /de yi sdug bsngal thams cad gcod/ /'dir ni chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /rgyu ni de bzhin gshegs pa
@#/ /ste| |dam chos 'khor lo'i mchod pa yis/ /mchod pas chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis/ /sgra snyan
dag dang 'drar bshad de/ /chos kyi mchod pa 'di dag gis/ /mchod na sangs rgyas gsung yang 'thob/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /sarba shud+d+ha
sa man+ta b+ha dra/ d+harma tsakra niSh+Tha pany+tsa/ de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab par bya'o/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /rang gi rdul ni phra mo
rnams/ /rdo rje dbyings su bsgoms na ni/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid myur du thob/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun tu bsgoms na
ni| |chos kyi skur ni myur du 'grub/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /rang gi lus ni phra mo rnams/ /rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms na ni/ /rdo rje sems dpar mnyam par
'gyur/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis/ /rang gi lus ni phra mo rnams/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni skur bsgoms na/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/ /de la de dag
gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /badzra kA ya/ d+har+m+ma kA ya/ satwa kA ya/ bud+d+ha kA ya/ de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab par bya ste/ rang byung
la ni lus kun gyis/ /'khyud pa'i bde ba'i mchod pa ni/ /phul na rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /'dra ba de ni myur du 'gyur/ /shin tu chags pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dam pa'i gzung
pa'i bde ba ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phul gyur na/ /rdo rje rin chen 'dra bar 'gyur/ /shin tu dga' zhing bde chags pas/ /brtan par gyur pa'i mchog bde ba/ /sangs
rgyas rnams la phul na ni/ /rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /kun tu sbyor ba'i bde ba ni/ /mchod pa'i phyir ni phul bas na/ /rdo rje
las dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de dag gi gsang ba'i snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /ra ti badzra/ rA ga badzra/ pra te badzra/ karma badzra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi mchod pa'i phrin las kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes la bslab par bya ste/ snying gar rtsib logs rgyab sbyor ba/ /dpral ba la sogs de bzhin du/ /kha dang rna ba
mgo ltag pa/ /spyi bo phrag pa rkeng par bzhag /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab par bya'o/ /phyag
rgya chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas la/ /snying ga la sogs gnas tshul tu/ /bzhag nas rgyal pa rnams mchod do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
@#/ /thams cad la mchod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab par bya'o/ /oM kra sa ya sA dr-i raM kraM khaM shaM hUM hUM sha no shI swAM/ /las kyi
phyag rgya'i mdor bsdus na/ /las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa las/ /rtog pa chen po'i
rgyal po rdo rje las zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rtog pa'i rgyal
po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu pa'i don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta
muSh+Ti baM/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs
bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rigs kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu pa'i phyir de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badzra s+t+wa muSh+Ti a/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i cho
ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badzra rat+na muSh+Ti trAM/ de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras
pa| oM badzra d+harma muSh+Ti khaM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i
@#/ /phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ /oM badzra karma muSh+Ti haM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po
phyag na rdo rje rang gi byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir rdo rje'i dngos grub ces bya ba phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil
'khor 'di bshad do/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /rdo rje dngos grub ces kyang grags/ /dkyil
'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /mkhas pas rab tu bri bar bya/ /thog mar sangs rgyas gzugs bzhag ste/ /de nas phyag rgya bzhi yang bri/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
dbus su ni/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya la sogs bri/ /de nas rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas de bzhin
du btsud de 'di skad du smra bar bya'o/ /khyod kyi gsang ba'i le'u 'di su la'ang ma bstan cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ log par lta ba dang / sdig pa'i las byed
pa'i sems can rnams kyang yod do/ /brtson 'grus chung ba dang / sbyor ba med pa dang / ri mo mi shes pa'i sems can rnams kyang yod de/ de dag rdo rje'i dbyings la
sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams su brtson 'grus chung bas mi 'jug ste/ de dag gi don du rdo rje dngos grub kyi phyag
rgya'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig du gyur pa 'di ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams
yongs su bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam pa'i dngos grub kyi
bar du byin gyis brlabs so/ /khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba 'di rnams la yid mi ches shing ma dad par
ma byed cig /sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dwags kyi khams su ltung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus ma yin par shi bar gyur
ta re zhes bsgo la gdong g.yogs bkrol te dkyil 'khor bstan to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig 'di smros shig /bdag nyid
@#/ /chen po gang gang gi /phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings pa/ /bzlas pa'i snying po'i don tu ni/ /der ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /ye shes 'di yi
tshul gyis ni/ /phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin/ /bdag nyid chen po phyag rgya kun/ /de dag kun gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba
brjod par bya'o/ /rang gi dbang po bshigs nas ni/ /rdo rje bcing bas gzung bar bya/ /de yis phyag rgya gang reg pa/ /de ma thag tu de dbang bskur/ /de nas phyag
rgya thams cad kyi chos nyid brjod par bya'o/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la/ /ye shes phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /ye shes phyag rgya dbang
du 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya kun gyi las brjod par bya'o/ /glu dang gar dang zas dang bro/ /spyod pa la sogs bde ba rnams/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phul na ni/ /las
kyi phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad du bsgrub pa'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab par bya'o/ /mtshan ma brtan par rang gyur
nas| |dkar por gyur ba'i ras la gnas/ /mtshan ma mchod rten byin brlabs te/ /bdag nyid rdo rje dbyings su bsgom/ /rdo rje bcings pa dam byas te/ /gung
mo myu gu bzhin du gshibs/ /mthe'u chung dang ni mdzub rtse bsgreng / /dam tshig mchog gi dam tshig go /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul du ni/ /rab tu mnyam par gzhag pas
bsgom/ /rdo rje phra mo'i dkyil 'khor de/ /ting 'dzin dbang du gyur pa'i tshul/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings la/ /de gnyis rdo rje dam du gzung / /mdzub mo mthe'u
chung bsnol ba ni/ /rdo rje dgos mchog dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i bcing ba bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du bslabs nas rdo rje
dbyibs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o/ /rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du mi g.yo ba'i dkyil
'khor la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad phyag rgya bzhi ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du rang rang gi phyag rgya rnams su bris na dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub bo/ /de
ltar ras dang / rtsig pa dang / nam mkha' dang / gnas thams cad du bris na dngos grub thams cad 'grub bo/ /dkyil 'khor brtag pa nas brtsams te la la ni
dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa nyid kyi tshe ji ltar tha dad pa bzhin du 'grub/ /la la ni de nas brtsams nas nyin zhag gcig gis/ /la la ni nyi ma bzhis/ /la la ni
@#/ /zhag bcu drug gis/ la la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'ang ji ltar 'dod pa bde blag tu don thams cad byed cing thams cad rjes su
dga' ba dang / ro dang / zas dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi bde ba rnams myong bar byed bzhin du'ang lo gcig gis mchog 'grub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsungs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /badzra s+t+wa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes sems can gyi khams
ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi dngos grub dam pa 'grub par bya ba'i bar du/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /sems
dpa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes kyang bshad/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor gyi rim thig
gdab bo/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag par bya/ /de nas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes rnams bskyed par bya'o/ /de la thog mar/ 'di skad du/ /khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba dang / khod du ma chud pa su la'ang
gsang pa 'di ma smra zhig /khyod ngan song thams cad du ltung ba'am/ mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus ma yin par shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje sems
dpa'i dngos grub dam pa bsgrub pa'i ye shes la bslab par bya'o/ /zla rgyas dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste/ /phyag rgya chen po yongs gzung bas/ /bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar
ni| |bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig gi ye shes la bslab par bya'o/ /'dod chags bral ba'i sdig
lta bu/ /khams gsum na yang gzhan med de/ /de bas 'dod la chags bral bar/ /khyod ni nam yang ma byed cig /mahA sa ma ya ha na phaT ces mna'i snying po 'di sbyin
@#/ /no| |de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rnams su dam tshig gi sdom pa sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje sems
dpa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bzhi bcing ba bslab par bya'o/ /dngos grub kyang de bzhin no/ /ri mo la sogs pa dang / lugs ma'i sku gzugs thams cad
la'ang ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho ga bzhin du byas na dngos grub thams cad de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas par
byas pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang bya'o/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi gtso bo byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje chen po la rdo rje dgyes pa'i snying po 'dis legs par gsol to/ /oM legs rdo rje sems
dpa' khyod/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi
gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan gyis kyang / /dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /
dag par byas nas bsgrubs na ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang bde bar 'grub/ /rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba ni/ /'dod pa kun gyi bde bas bde/ /tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub pas na/ /
bde ba mi zad med mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs
pa zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po dum bu dang po rdzogs so// //bam po bzhi pa/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyang gcig tu 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor lo chen po bskor ba la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis
gsol ba btab bo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che/ /rdo rje mgon po rab bsgrub mdzad/ /rdo rje dbang bskur rdo rje 'od/ /rdo rje dpal khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje bzhad pa chos/
chen po/ /rdo rje ral gri mchog chen po/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi rgyal po mchog /spros med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje las dang srung ba che/ /gnod sbyin gtum pa
gdon chen po/ /rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che/ /phyag rgya kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dang byang chub che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs/ /rdo rje ye
@#/ /shes ye shes che/ /theg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don kun gyi ni de nyid don/ /sems can don chen kun rig pa/ /kun mkhyen kun
byas thams cad de/ /kun gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje bdag rab rdo rje mchog /rdo rje brtson rab rdo rje 'chang / /dam tshig chen po de nyid don/ /sems
chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje lcags kyu 'dod pa che/ /rab tu dga' ba 'od chen po/ /rdo rje 'od dang 'od snang ba/ /sangs rgyas 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje
rgyal mchog rdo rje drag /rig mchog mchog dang mi yi mchog /rdo rje dam pa mchog chen mchog /rig mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje dbyings dang gsang
ba che/ /rdo rje gsang ba rab gsang 'chang / /rdo rje phra ba bsam gtan che/ /rdo rje dgos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mchog sangs rdo rje mchog /sangs rgyas
byang chub mkhas pa che/ /sangs rgyas ye shes sangs rgyas che/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa mchod pa che/ /sems dpa'
mchod pa rab mchod pa/ /thabs chen dang ni dngos grub che/ /rdo rje grub khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
dbyangs te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems chen po/ /rdo rje rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas gtso bo rgyal bka' nyan/ /sangs rgyas bshes gnyen rgyal mchog skyes//
rnam par snang mdzad che dang khyab/ /ston zhing khro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid che/ /yang dag mtha' ste che ba'i tshul/ /pha rol phyin pa kun mkhyen
ba/ /don dam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun tu bzang dang spyod pa mchog /bdud dang bdud ni rab 'dul ba/ /kun gyi mchog dang mnyam nyid mkhyen/ /kun tu 'gro
khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas hUM zhes hUM zhes pa/ /rdo rje hUM zhes 'dul ba po/ /rdo rje thams cad rdo rje mchog /phyag na rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /phyag byas mchod
cing brjod pa dang / /rim gror de bzhin gshegs pas byas/ /gang phyir rdo rje sems brtan pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes khyod bya/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag
lus| |kun gzigs yab ni khyod yin te/ /byung ba dang ni 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis bsgrubs/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /rab tu
mos pas bstod byed cing / /glu blangs gang zhig mchod byed pa/ /de ni rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun la mnga' mdzad pa'i/ /mgon po khyod la gsol
@#/ /ba ni| |sems can kun don mdzad pa'i phyir/ /rang gi rigs ni skyed par mdzod/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso
bo phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i tshig thos nas/ rdo rje de dag nyid kyi snying gar bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
thams cad bos nas 'di skad gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma 'tshal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
bka' stsal pa/ ci'i phyir/ rdo rje 'dzin pas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis
te| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhi bas gdul bar mi sbyod pa de dag la bdag gis ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo
dang mnyam par spros pa nyid kyi/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs par yang gcig tu 'dus te/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'i dpal gyi be'ur zhugs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje mnyam pa
nyid kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i dam pa thams cad 'grub pa dang / ma rungs pa thams
cad gdul ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes la dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
rje chen po'i thabs khro po chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi thugs ka nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo / /hUM| de nas de
@#/ /phyung ma thag tu phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka'i rdo rje las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po khro gnyer can/
smin ma bcu ma zhing dpral bar gnyer ba/ /mche ba lhag ger byung zhing so gtsigs pa/ /rdo rje dang / lcags kyu dang / ral gri dang / zhags pa la sogs ba rdo rje
me lce 'bar ba'i mtshon cha lag na thogs pa/ rnam pa du ma'i kha dog dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyi cha lugs can phyag na rdo rje'i sku byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad du shin tu ma rungs pa thams cad gdul bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs kun tu rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen
po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o thabs kyis 'dul ba yi/ /thabs chen ldan pa bdag yin te/
gang phyir sems can 'dul thabs phyir/ /dri ma med pa'i khro gnyen rab/ /de nas de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rig pa'i
mchog 'di smras pa/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha ni hUM/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+na hUM/ gr-ih+na pa ya gr-ih+na pa ya hUM/ A na ya hoH/ b+ha ga wAn badzra hUM phaT/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi thugs ka nas byung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjer gyur te byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad na/ de bzhin gshegs
pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs te/ spyan drangs nas rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug
ste ngam tshig gis bcings nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te rdo rje khro bo chen po'i lus su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar 'dug ste ched
du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o byang chub sems 'di ni/ /kun tu bzang zhing sdig med de/ /gang phyir sems can 'dul don du/ /khro bo yang ni yid 'ong
'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje khro bo chen po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas babs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
@#/ /gnas te yang bka' nod cing bzhugs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis dgug pa'i rdo
rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / hUM Ta k+ki dzaH/ de nas de phyung ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams sprin rgya mtsho thams cad na/ 'jig rten gsum gyi
dbang po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'jig rten thams cad na gnas pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i lcags kyus bkug nas ri rab ri'i gang na ba dang / rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i
khang bu brtsegs pa gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa thams cad du bskor
nas 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs ka nas rdo rje de blangs te/ gsor zhing thams cad dang ldan pa'i khams gsum ji snyed pa thams cad
kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo la bltas te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /grogs po rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la zhugs la nga'i bka'
yang nyon cig /de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas
chos dang dge 'dun la/ /skyabs su 'gro bar bsgrub par byos/ /kun mkhyen ye shes thob bya'i phyir/ /grogs po rnams kyis bsgrub par byos/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams
'di na 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po lha chen po 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pa dregs te cher khros par ston cing 'di skad ces
smras so/ /kye| gnod sbyin/ nga ni 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi gtso bo/ dbang phyug chen po/ byed pa po/ 'jig pa po/ 'byung po thams cad kyi dbang po/
lha'i yang lha chen po yin na/ gnod sbyin khyod kyi ngag ci'i phyir nyan/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje gsor zhing bka' stsal pa/ kye| sems can ma rungs pa/
dkyil 'khor du myur du zhugs la nga'i dam tshig la yang dag par gnas par gyis shig /de nas lha'i yang lha chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
@#/ /gsol to| /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta bu'i sems can dbang phyug chen po la de skad ces bka' stsol pa 'di su zhig /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa la bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /grogs po rnams/
dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dam tshig dang / sdom pa la bsgrub par gyis shig /phyag na rdo rje 'di gnod sbyin khro bo ma rungs pa gtum pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' chen po ste/ /rdo rje 'bar bas khyed khams gsum po 'di dag thams cad brlag par byas ta re/ de nas dbang phyug chen po 'jig rten gsum
po mtha' dag gi dbang por gyur pa dang / rang gi shes pa'i dbang gis 'khor mang po dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'jigs par bstan pa'i
phyir khro zhing gtum pa chen por rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs 'bar ba chen po gtong zhing / ma rungs pa chen pos rta skad du dgod pa rnams bstan nas 'di skad ces
smras so/ /kye| nga ni 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po bas na khyod kyis nga la ci'i phyir bka' stsal/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje de bsnyems pa dang bcas
pas gsor zhing 'dzum ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /kyai| lus srul po/ mi'i sha za ba/ zas su ro bsregs pa'i thal ba za zhing kha zas dang / mal dang / gos kyang de las
byed pa nga'i bka' bzhin du byos shig /de nas lha chen po dbang phyug chen pos 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag dang / nam mkha'i khams rnams khro ba khro ba chen pos
non par byin gyis brlabs te 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod kyang nga'i bka' nyon la dam tshig kyang longs shig /de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i rgyal pos bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lha chen po zhes bya ba'i lha 'di ni rang gis 'tshal ba'i stobs kyis dregs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po'i
dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la 'dud par mi btub na/ de la ji ltar bgyi ba'i rigs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas phyung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig dran par byas so/ /oM ni suM b+ha badzra hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
rdo rje'i snying po 'di brjod do/ /hUM| de nas de brjod ma thag tu khams gsum pa thams cad nas 'dus pa'i lha chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po'i dbang po
