@#/ /thams cad kha bub tu 'gyel te/ nyam thag pa'i tshig 'byin cing bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la skyabs su dong ngo / /lha chen po zhes bya
ba'i lha de ni sa la 'gyel te dran pa med par gyur nas shi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la de skad ces bka'
stsal to/ /phyag na rdo rje/ 'jig rten gsum po'i 'khor lo 'di thams cad la skyabs sbyin pa byos te ma bsad cig /de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i rgyal pos bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thos nas lha thams cad bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /gal te khyod rang gi srog 'dod nas sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun
la skyabs su dong la da'i bka' yang nyon cig /de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas
pa la skyabs su mchi'o/ /khyod kyi bstan pa'i bka' ni bdag cag gis ma 'tshal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas de dag
la bos nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye| lha rnams/ 'di ni nged dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po kun tu bzang po ste/ sems can thams cad gdul ba'i don bya ba'i phyir khro bo'i rgyal po chen por dbang bskur ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod kyi nang na'ang lha chen
po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can yod do/ /de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhi bar mdzad pas sdig pa las bzlog par mi spyod pa'i sdig pa'i
sems can de dag rnams tshar gcod pa'i phyir byin gyis brlabs so/ /de bas na khyed rnams 'di'i dam tshig la gnas par byos shig par bka' stsal to/ /de dag gis
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi srog yal ba las bskyab tu gsol/ bdag cag kyang bka' stsal pa bzhin du bgyid cing mchis/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye/ grogs po rnams/ 'di nyid la skyabs su dong dang / de nyid kyis kun tu skyob kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no/ /de nas khams gsum kun nas
'dus pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag po de rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de ga la ba de logs su bltas nas nyam thag pa chen po'i sgra mgrin gcig tu phyung nas 'di skad
@#/ /ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'di las kun tu bskyab par gsol/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ kun tu bskyab par gsol/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje lha la sogs pa de rnams la pos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye/ ma rungs pa rnams/ nga'i bstan pa
la zhugs shig /rdo rje 'bar ba 'dis gcig tu 'bar bar byas nas khyed thams cad kyang thal bar byas ta re/ de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /khyed ni bcom ldan
'das kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa/ zhi ba/ dul ba/ sems can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams cad
la mi 'jigs pa stsol ba lags na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag bsregs par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos de dag la 'di skad
ces bka' stsal to/ /kye| grogs po dag /gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa de'i phyir nga ni kun tu bzang po ste/ khyed lta bu'i sems can
ma rungs pa'i dang tshul can sdig pa'i sems rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir gal te nga'i dam tshig la mi gnas na chud gzan par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o//
de nas byag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs pa'i lha de dag gzhan dbugs dbyung zhing bslang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
po rdo rje bslang ba zhes bya ba 'di smras so/ /oM badzrod tiSh+Tha/ de nas de skad smras ma thag tu dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs par khams gsum pa 'dus pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag po
'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kun brgyal ba las sems dbugs phyung ste/ lha'i bde ba myong zhing 'jigs shing bag tsha ba dang / ba spu langs pa med par gyur nas
bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la lta zhing langs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po/ lha'i
dbang po lha chen po 'di ma bslang na/ 'di srog de chud gzan par gyur te ci rung / gsos na ni 'di 'ang skyes bu dam par 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin du bya'o
snyam nas shi ba gso ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /badzra A yuH/ de nas 'di smras ma thag tu lha chen po lha'i bdag po shi ba las sos te ldang 'dod na yang ldang ni ma nus so/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci bdag cag 'di lta bus 'dul lam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod skyes bu chen po 'di'i bka'
@#/ /nyan par mi 'jug na/ khyod la 'dul ba 'di nyid yin gyi nga ma yin no/ /dbang phyug chen pos gsol pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das/ khyod kyis ma rungs
pa'i sems can de las skyabs mdzad par mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas 'di las skyabs mi nus so/ /gsol pa/ ci'i slad du/ bka' stsal
pa| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis ma 'tshal
to| |ci'i slad du zhe na/ khams gsum gyi bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las gzhan pa'i bdag po mchis par ma 'tshal na 'di su lags/ de nas bcom
ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes yang lha chen po la bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /kye| ma rungs pa'i sems can/ nga'i bka' mi
nyan tam/ de nas lha chen pos rdo rje sems dpa'i tshig thos nas 'khrugs shing khros par gyur te/ de ltar bsgyel bzhin du yang 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs bstan te/
'di skad ces smras so/ /nga shi bar bzod kyi khyod kyi ngag mi nyan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rab tu khros par ston cing rang gi rkang pa'i mthil nas
rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pa 'di phyung ngo / /oM pa ta ka ri Sha na badzra hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil nas kun tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i snying po/ khro gnyer byas pa/ mche ba lhag
ger phyung ba/ gdong chen po rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pa byung nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar bka' nyan cing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes dbang phyug chen po
sbyang ba'i phyir 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /oM pa ta ka ri Sha Na badzra hUM/ oM pa ta ka ri sha /sarba badzra b+ha ra a nu tsa ra ka ta badzra hUM dzaH/ de nas de skad ces gsungs pa dang / lha chen
po dang / lha mo u mar bcas te rkang pa gyen kar bstan nas gcer bur phyung ste/ skye bo thams cad kyis gad mos btab cing rkang pas 'gugs pa rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pas de
bkug ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar zhabs kyi drung du gzhag go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can ma rungs pa mchis brang dang bcas pa 'di ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM badzra kra ma ho//
de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha chen po zhabs g.yon pas mnan/ zhabs g.yas pas lha mo u
@#/ /ma'i nu ma'i steng du mnan pas rang gi snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badzra A be sha ha na pa ti tra Ta/ de nas de smras ma thag tu lha chen po la babs nas
rang gi lag pa stong gis rang gi gdong stong la 'tshog go /de nas rdo rje'i nor bu rin po che'i rtse mo'i rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsigs
pa'i phyi rol na srid pa gsum po thams cad kyis nged kyi dbang po de bdag nyid chen po des btul lo zhes sgra chen po phyung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po
la thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byams pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM bud+d+ha mai tri badzra rak+Sha haM/ de nas de skad ces gsungs ma thag tu lha
chen po la babs pa'i sdug bsngal de kun zhi bar gyur to/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis reg pas bde ba bla na med pa 'grub pa'i dbang dang / ting
nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa rnams thob pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'grub pa'i bar du gyur to/ /
de nas lha chen po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs mthil gyis reg pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / rnam par thar
pa'i bde ba myong ste/ lha chen po'i lus phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phul nas/ 'og gi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
gyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na thal bas khebs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
par skyes so/ /de nas lha chen po'i lus de las ched du brjod pa 'di phyung ngo / /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ /yi ge'i tshogs kyis
mnan nas su/ /mya ngan las ni 'das par gzhag /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de las gzhan pa mthu chen po la sogs pa 'jig
rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /grogs po rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po
'dir zhugs shig /zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig srungs shig /de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag ji skad bka' stsal pa
de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes srid pa gsum 'dus pa de rnams bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /grogs po rnams/ yang gsum
@#/ /la skyabs su 'dong ba dang / bslab pa dang / dam tshig dang / sdom pa gzung la nga'i dam tshig la yang gnas par gyis shig /de dag gis gsol
pa| de bzhin du 'tshal na/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang dam tshig glo bar ma chud do/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi dam tshig 'di byin no/ /byang chub sems
ni rims bzhin du/ /bskyed nas de yi 'og tu ni/ /byang chub chen por ci nus par/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag 'bad par bya/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha la sogs pa de rnams 'jug ba'i dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya bcing ba la sogs pa byas nas dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya'i snying po 'dis 'ching du

gzhug go /oM badzra sa ma ya gr-ih+na s+t+waM ban+d+ha sa ma ya/ badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu sma ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dr-i D+ho ma b+ha ba/ s+thi ro me b+ha ba/ A hA R+yo me b+ha ba/ a pra ti hA
R+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba karma su tsa me tsit+taM shri yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoHde nas 'di smras ma thag tu khams gsum gyi srid pa gsum gyi skye bo 'das pa thams cad rdo rje khro bo ti
rin ti ri'i phyag rgyal ga tu babs nas dam du bcing bar gyur to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes tshul bzhin du btsud nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad go rims bzhin du
bstan te rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas rdo rje'i mtshan ma'ang lag tu byin te/ rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi sems can gyi don la bkod do/ /de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad kyi ming rnams yin te/ 'di lta ste/ dbang phyug chen po ni khro bo'i rdo rje'o/ /mthu bo che ni sgyu ma'i

rdo rje'o/ /kar+Ni ka sgra gzhon nu ni rdo rje dril bu'o/ /tshangs pa ni thub pa'i rdo rje'o/ /dbang po ni rdo rje'i mtshon cha ste/ de la sogs pa ni rig pa'i rgyal po rnams su zhes bya bar dbang bskur
to| |de nas bar snang la spyod pa'i bdag po rnams la rjes su byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ nyi ma ni rdo rje 'khyil ba'o/ /zla ba ni rdo rje'i 'od do/ /dbyig pa chen po'i gtso bo ni rdo rje
dbyig pa'o| |ser smug ni rdo rje ser smug ste/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje khro bo zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/ /de nas nam mkha' la spyod pa'i lha'i dbang po thams cad la byin pa

'di lta ste/ sbrang rtsis myos pa ni rdo rje'i glang po'i sna'o/ /sbrang rtsir byed pa ni rdo rje'i phreng ba'o/ /rgyal ba ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo / /rgyal bar byed po ni rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje ste/
de la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi gtso bo zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/ /de nas sa bla'i dbang po thams cad la byin pa/ 'di lta ste/ mdzod skyong ni rdo rje tho ba'o/ /me ni rdo rje'i
@#/ /me'o/ /rlung ni rdo rje'i rlung ngo / /ku be ra ni rdo rje 'jigs pa'o/ /de la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nya zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/ /de nas sa 'og gi dbang
po lha thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ phag ni rdo rje lcags kyu'o/ /gshin rje ni rdo rje dus so/ /gtsug phud sa ni rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso ba 'o/ /ba ru Na ni klu'i rdo rje
ste| |de la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/ /de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po'i lha mo thams cad rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang
bskur te/ rang gi mtshan ma rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur cing / de bzhin ga sheg pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi
don la rab tu bkod pa la 'di lta ste/ u ma ni khro bo rdo rje ma'o/ /rug mi n+ya ni rdo rje gser ro/ /Sha Sh+Ta ni rdo rje gzhon nu ma'o/ /tshangs ma ni rdo rje zhi ma'o/ /dbang mo
ni rdo rje khu tshur te/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje'i rgyal mor dbang bskur to/ /de nas nam mkha' la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'chi ba ni
rdo rje mi 'chi ma 'o/ /ro hi na ni rdo rje mdangs ma'o/ /dbyig pa 'dzin ma ni rdo rje dbyig mchog ma'o/ /skye ba 'phrog ma ni rdo rje sked 'chings ma ste/ de la sogs pa ni khro
mo zhes bya bar dbang bskur to/ /de nas bar snang la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ gsod ma ni rdo rje 'ju ma'o/ /za ba ma ni rdo rje za ba ma'o/ /bgo ba ni
rdo rje bgo ba ma'o/ /dga' ba ni rdo rje dga' ba ma'o/ /de la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi gtso mor dbang bskur to/ /de nas sa la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/
zhi ba ma ni rdo rje pho nya ma'o/ /rlung ni mgyogs ma'i rdo rje ma'o/ /me ni rdo rje 'bar ma'o/ /ku be ra ma ni rdo rje'i 'khor ma ste/ /de la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nya mor dbang bskur to/ /de nas
sa 'og na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ phag mo ni rdo rje kha'o/ /tsa muN+Ti ni rdo rje dus ma'o/ /snang chen ma ni rdo rje rul pa ma'o/ /ba ru na ma ni rdo rje chu srin
ma ste/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran mor dbang bskur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes zhugs pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnams
bskyed nas phyag rgya bcing ba thams cad la bslabs te/ rdo rje'i dam tshig mna'i snying po 'di byin no/ /rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /dam
tshig 'di las 'das na ni/ /rigs rnams myur du thal bar byed/ /oM ha na sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas snying po gzung bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di byin to/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis
@#/ /bcings te/ /mdzub mo lcags kyur bcings nas ni/ /gcu zhing phyir yang gcu bar bya/ /dgos pa'i don sems gang yin pa/ /de yi mdun
du khyed rnams ni/ /dgos par grub phyir 'dug par byos/ /khyod kyi srog ni ma rungs par/ /dam tshig 'dis ni gyur ta re/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/ /mdzub mo
bkug nas rab tu mnan/ /mthe bod gnyis ka mtshams sbyar bas/ /gung mo gnyis ka rab tu mnan/ /rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa yi/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa
las| |gal te 'ga' yis 'das gyur na/ /dam tshig 'dis ni khyod gsod do/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyi ga yi/ /mthe'u chung sor mo bcings nas ni/ /mdzub mo sor
mo'i rgyab nas mdud/ /bzlog ste mgo bor gzhag par bya/ /bdag nyid che ba'i dam tshig ste/ /rdo rje rig 'dzin bcings nas ni/ /khros te gang la bltas na ni/ /de
yi mdun du de bzhin 'dug /rdo rje bsdams pa'i rdo rje yis/ /bsrung ba dam bcings mnan pa ni/ /de ni srung ba'i dam tshig ste/ /sems can thams cad srung ba'o/ /
gang zhig gang la bskyab pa'i phyir/ /khro bor ldan pas bcings nas ni/ /sems can gang la bsrung ba yi/ /de yi rgyab tu 'dug par byos/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis
bcings te/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la/ /mthe'u chung gis ni bsdam byas te/ /gcu zhing slar gcu dra bkrol nas/ /sbyi bor mnyam zhugs gang yin pa'i/ /dam
tshig 'di yang sbyar byas na/ /khyed kyis de yi mdun du ni/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog phyir 'khod/ /rdo rje bcing ba sprel pa ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis ka dam por sbyar/ /mthe
bo gung mo'i rtse mo gnyis/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyar bcings nas kyang / /bzlog ste dpral bar gzhag par bya/ /gal te gsod par 'dod na ni/ /dgug par bya ba gang yin
pa/ /de yi mdun du rtag tu 'dug /de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi snying po 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dam tshig 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di yin te/ oM
ba li tod ba li ta badzra A gaR+Sha ya hUM dza dza/ rdo rje gcu ba'i phyag rgya lha dgug pa'i snying po'o/ /oM badzra a gra di pa ya sa ma ye hUM/ bar snang na sbyod pa rnams kyi'o/ /oM
badzra mA la a gra baM/ phreng ba can rnams gyi'o/ /oM badzra ban+d+ha haM/ sa la sbyod pa rnams kyi'o/ /oM badzra pA tA la b+hany+dza b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ sa'i 'og na gnas pa rnams kyi'o/ /oM
he ru ka badzra sa ma ya sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA b+hany+dza ka hUM phaT/ bud med thams cad kyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
@#/ /gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa 'dul ba por dbang bskur na/ bcings pa'i
dkyil 'khor ma rungs pa de dag thams cad ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba legs par bka' stsal bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsan nas 'di
skad ces bka' stsal to/ /oM badzra suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes sems can thams cad la bskyab pa'i
phyir dkyil 'khor thams cad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra sa ma ya A kaR+Sha ya sarba maN+Da la ma badzra d+ha ra sat+ya mA ti kra ma hUM phaT/ rdo rje lcags kyu
gnyis bcings te/ /snying gar yongs su bskor bar bya/ /mdzub gnyis lcags kyus phyi rol gyi/ /dkyil 'khor dgug pa mchog yin no/ /de nas 'di bshad ma
thag tu dkyil 'khor thams cad ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol kun tu bskor te 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams
cad la bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /kye| grogs po dag /srog gcod pa dag spangs shing dam tshig gzung ba la bsgrub par gyis shig /de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil
'khor gyi dam tshig gi sems can de dag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag sha 'tshal ba ma rungs pa'i sems
can lags pas mdangs 'phrog pa la srog ltos na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar 'tsho bar bgyi ba de bka' stsol cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po phyag na rdo rjes ma rungs pa'i rdo rje khro bo 'di gsungs so/ /oM duSh+Ta badzra kro d+ha ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+h+wa na sa ya bi ka ri/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA maN+Dal/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ mar+d+ha mar+d+ha/ khA da khA das/
pa ra man+ta badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje khro mdzub legs bar naM/ /sen mo sprad de dkris nas kyang / /rtse mo gnyis ni dam sbyar ba/ /phyag rgya 'di ni ma rungs 'joms/ /de nas
'di smras ma thag tu ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa rnam pa du mas gtse zhing dral ba dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa'ang dral to/ /
ma rungs pa'i dam tshig gi sems can de rnams yang bsreg cing shin tu gtsos pas 'o dod cher 'bod cing phongs pa'i sgra cher phyung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
pa chen po ga la ba der thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag srog dang mi 'bral bar skyabs mdzad du gsol/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes
@#/ /yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces to/ /bcom ldan 'das ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams ji ltar bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du
gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM ni suM b+ha ha na da ha ba tsa gr-ih+Na ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rjes khro bo mi bzad

pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM mahA badzra khu ra kro d+ha pa ta ya sarba duSh+Ta laM man+ta/ bi nA sha ya sarba duSh+Ta sa ma yaM b+hi ga ki ra bi d+h+wa na sa ya s+pho Ta ya b+hany+dza ya sarba duSh+ta sa ma ya mu drA ban+d+ha
gr-ih+Na ha na da ha pa tsa sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya sa twaM badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas gsungs ma thag tu ma rungs pa'i dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad
kyang gcig tu gyur nas rgya mtsho chen por ltung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bdag la ma rungs pa thams cad thul cig ces bka' stsal na/ phra men ma dang / gdon la sogs pa gnod pa de dag thams cad la bdag gis ji
ltar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /oM ha na ha na badzra hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
yang phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad 'gugs pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra A kaR+Sha ya shrI g+h+raM sarba duSh+Ta gra haM/ badzra d+ha ra sa twan hUM dza/ de nas de smras
ma thag tu phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad ri rab kyi rtse mo'i phyi rol bskor te 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes phra men ma
la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /kye bzod ldan rnams/ srog gcod pa spang ba'i bslab pa dang / dam tshig dang / sdom
pa gzung bar byos shig /rdo rje 'od 'phro ba dang / rab tu 'bar ba dang / gcig pu 'bar bas gyur pas khyod kyi rigs rnams ma lus par bsregs ta re/ de nas phra men ma la
sogs pa'i gdon ma rungs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
cag sha 'tshal ba na ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /phyag na rdo rje/ sems can
'di dag rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed la thabs sbyin bsgrub par gyis shig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs rje chen pos sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i mtshan ma
@#/ /shes pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra pra ti gr-ih+Na hr-i da ya mA kaR+Sha ya/ yad t+ya yaM ma to mA mang+hA ra d+he na mi ya te/ tad+ya s+ya
hr-i da ya ni skra mi du sa ma ya hUM dzaH/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /snying gar rdo rje lag ngar gnyis/ /shin tu dam par bcings nas ni/ /rdo rje mdzub mo'i rtse mo
yis /rang gi mchan khung brud par bya/ /khyed rnams kyis phyag rgya 'dis sems can thams cad kyi snying rus la zo zhig /de nas phra men ma la sogs pa ma rangs pa'i
gdon thams cad dga' ba'i sgra phyung nas mchongs rgal byas te rang gi gnas su dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa 'dul ba lags par bdag la bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das rims la
sogs pa'i nad de rnams la ji ltar bgyi/ bdag la bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen
po phyag na rdo rjes rims la sogs pa'i nad dgug pa'i phyag rgya dang / snying po 'di gsungs pa/ oM badzra sa ma ya A na ya sarba du Sh+Ta dz+wa ra d+ha ni nA sha ya hUM phaT/ de nas 'di
gsungs ma thag tu rims la sogs pa'i nad thams cad ri rab kyi ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol tu bskor te 'khod do/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes rims la sogs pa'i nad 'di rnams la bos te/
'di skad ces gsungs so/ /kye bzod ldan rnams/ /sems can gsod pa las ldog pa'i bslab pa gzung ba'i sdom pa longs shig/ de dag gis gsol ba/ bcom ldan
'das/ /bdag cag ni sems can gyi mdangs phrogs te 'tsho bar bgyid na/ de bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar bgyi/ legs par bka' stsol cig/ de nas byang chub
sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi las rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra kar+m+ma bi sho d+ha ya sarba A ba rA Na ni bud+d+ha sa
t+ye na sa ma ya hUM/ de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /rdo rje thal mo dam sbyar te/ /mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug nas kyang / /mthe bor mnyam te sbyar nas ni/ /mnan pa 'di ni
sdig 'phrog pa/ /phyag rgya 'di rims la sogs pa'i nad thams cad kyi gang la btab pa la/ las byas la bstan na de khyed rnams kyis thongs shig/ khyed cag srog dang bral
la re/ /de nas de rnams de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol te slar dong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad
@#/ /ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i slad du
nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung na de la/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song de rnams thams cad ji ltar bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM k+Sha pa ya badzra swAhA/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes du 'bod la sogs pa ngan song gi 'gro ba'i 'khor
lo thams cad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba a pa ya A kaR+Sha Na bi sho d+ha na badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu du 'bod chen po la sogs
pa ngan song na gnas pa rnams ri rab kyi ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol tu bskor te 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems chen po phyag na rdo rjes ngan song gi sar ltung ba'i sems can
de dag thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /kye bzod ldan rnams/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dam tshig dang / sdom pa dang / ngan
song thams cad las thar ba'i phyag rgya dang / /snying po zungs shig/ de nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag cag sdug
bsngal gyis gzir ba 'di las bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / khyod la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de nas phyag

na rdo rjes ngan song thams cad 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra pA Ni bi s+pho Ta ya sarba a pa ya ban+d+ha na ni pra mo k+Sha ya/ sarbA bA ya ga te b+h+yaHsarba satwaM sarba ta thA
ga ta badzra sa ma ya trAT/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcings pa bshad do/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam bcas te/ gung mo gnyis ka sbyar nas su/ /tha ma bzhi ni rtse mo sbyar/ /sdig pa 'joms
par grags pa yin/ /de nas ngan song gsum gyi 'khor lo na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'di mthong nas ngan song thams cad nas shi 'phos nas/
bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skyes so/ /ngan song de rnams kyang rgya mtsho chen por bor ro/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na
rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i skyabs dang / phan pa dang / bde ba
thams cad myong bar bgyi ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi grub pa dam pa'i 'bras bu'i thob par bya ba'i bar du 'tshol cig par bdag la
@#/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje stsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal na/ mi 'di rnams
ji ltar bgyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsol cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang gcig tu 'dus nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /oM

badzra pA Ni mahA maN+Da laM pra be sha ya sarba duSh+Ta ro tran+ni ba ra ya pra be bya pra ma sha ya tru ra dr-i Sh+Ta paR+ya baM maM/ bi sho d+ha ya nA sha ya bi nA sha ya/ ha ha ha ha hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa'i tshig de thos nas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba thams cad dang / dngos grub
dam pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i
dam tshig las byung ba 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po
dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba yi/ /dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya/ /rdo rje dam tshig las byung ba/ /sangs rgyas
byang chub 'byin byed pa'i/ /ma rungs thams cad rnam par 'jig/ de la sngags 'dis srad bu bre bar bya'o/ /oM badzra sa ma ya sU traM/ mA tri kra ma ho/ /gru bzhir bya zhing sgo bzhir dod//
rta babs bzhis kyang rab tu brgyan/ /srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ /dar dang phreng bas shin tu brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa rnams su/ /sgo khyud gyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje
rin chen brgyan par ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim srad bu bre/ /shes rab can gyis de nang du/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan te/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /ka ba brgyad dang rta babs bcas/
rdo rje ka ba'i gnas mchog tu/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan byas te/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor srad bu bre/ /srad bu bres par tshon rtsis dgang pa/ /de la tshon la bzlas pa ni 'di'o//
oM badzra ci twa sa ma ya hUM/ de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas/ /rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi po/ /yid kyis bu ni dbye bar bya/ /de la sgo rnams dbye ba'i
sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM badzrod g+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya hUM/ gser ram dngul las byas pa'am/ /sa yang rung ste legs bris pa'i/ /pha gu gru bzhir byas pa la/ /sangs rgyas
gzugs ni gzhag par bya/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM badzra dz+wa la ag+ni bra dIp+ta A kaR+Sha ya sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ mahA badzra
@#/ /sa ma ya hUM dzaH/ sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni/ /'bar bas bskor bas gzhag par bya/ /de bzhin rin chen 'od bskor ba/ /pad+ma rdo rje kun de bzhin//

de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dgod pa'i snying po 'di yin no/ /oM sa twa badzri dz+wA la mA lA hUM phaT/ oM rat+na badzra dz+wA la mA lA hUM trAM/ oM d+harma badzri dz+wA la mA lA hUM hrIHoM karma
badzri dz+wA la mA lA hUM aH/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar de bzhin du/ /shes pas cho ga bzhin bri ba/ /rdo rje hUM zhes dkyil 'khor ro/ /de la rdo rje
shugs kyi snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM badzra be gA kra ma hUM/ 'di bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la yang srad bu la brgal
te thams cad du 'gro bar bya'o/ /de nas de'i phyag rgya 'di bshad do/ /yid kyis ri mo bteg nas ni/ /rdo rje srad bu'am gzhan yang rung / /phyir phyung nang du zhugs kyang ni/ /
dam tshig 'gal bar de mi 'gyur/ /de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /phyag na rdo rje bri ba ni/ /ut+pal che sngo 'tsher ba'i mdog /rdo rje hUM zhes bya bar 'dus/ /mche ba
cung zad phyung ba'i zhal/ /khro dang bcas par 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /g.yon brkyang tshul du bzhugs pa ste/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas dkrigs pa'i 'od/ /g.yon pa'i zhabs
kyi mthil gyis ni/ /dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya/ /g.yas pa'i zhabs kyis u ma yi/ /nu ma'i steng du mnan par bri/ /de yi snying po ni 'di yi yin no/ /hUM/ de yi phyogs ni thams
cad du/ /rdo rje khro bo bzhag pa ni/ /khros bas mche ba phyung ba ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas dkrigs pa'i 'od/ /de nas de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM badzra satwa kro

d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha A be sha ya hUM phaT/ oM karma kro d+ha rA ga ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra duSh+Ti kro d+ha sA d+hU sA b+hu hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis par ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas

kyang / /der ni rdo rjer dbang bskur ba/ rdo rje khro bos bskor bar bri/ /de nas de rnams kyi snying po 'di bshad do/ /traM oM badzri b+h+ri ku TI kro d+ha ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ oM badzra sUR+ya mahA dz+wA la mA

lA kro d+ha dz+wa la ya sar+b+baM hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ke tu de hi hUM phaT/ oM badzra hA sa kro d+ha ha ha ha ha hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum par ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang /

rdo rje sde ni bri bar bya/ /khro bo bdag nyid chen por bskor/ /de nas de rnams kyi snying po 'di bshad do/ /hrIHoM badzra d+harma kro d+ha bi nA sha ya bi sho d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na kro d+ha ts+tshin+da

ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM badzra he tu kro d+ha pra pe sha ya maN+Ta le sarba hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha b+hA She ba ta ba ta hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhi par ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /rdo
@#/ /rje dbab pa bri bya ba/ /rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs kyis bskor/ /de nas de rnams kyi snying po 'di bshad do/ /AHhUM badzra karma hUM phaT/ oM badzra ka ba tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha

hUM phaT/ oM badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha khA da khA da hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha muSh+Ti sA d+ha ya sa ma ya hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni grwa rnams su/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul bzhin du/ /ji ltar go rims
bzhin du ni/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa kun bri'o/ /de nas de dag gi snying po'i phyag rgya 'di yin no/ /oM badzra lA s+ye rA ga ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM phaT/ oM badzra gI te
gA ta gA ta hUM phaT/ oM badzri nr-i t+ye ba shi ku ru hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa'i phyi rol tu/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /de yi grwa rnams nyid du ni/ /mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi

rnams bzhag/ de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM badzra d+hu pe pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badzra puSh+pe pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badzra A lo ke pU dzA s+pha ra Na
sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badzra gan+d+he pU dzA s+phar Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ sgo rnams bzhi yi dbus su ni/ /lcags kyu la sogs gzhag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol gnas rnams su/ /

phyi yi rdo rje'i rigs rnams so/ /de nas de dag gi snying po rnams bshad do/ /oM badzra ang+ku sha mahA kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya sarba sa ma yaM hUM dzaHoM badzra pA sha mahA kro d+ha pra be sha ya sarba

sa ma yaM hUM hUM/ oM badzra s+pho Ta mahA kro d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha sarba sa ma yaM hUM baM/ oM badzra A be sha mahA kro d+ha a be sha ya sarba sa ma yaM hUM aH/ de nas yang 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas par bshad do/ /de la dang po nyid du rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid kyis rdo rje khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgyas bcings te bzhugs shing zhugs
nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i dbang du mchis te tshar bcad par
rigs pa rnams ni tshar bcad do/ /bsdu bar rigs pa rnams ni bsdu ba na de ni ji ltar bgyi ba bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol zhes byas nas/
rdo rje khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gar ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag ste/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas nas yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad bcings shig
dang / des na thams cad byon par 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi byas nas bdug pa la sogs pa'ang de bzhin no/ /de nas cho ga 'dis rdo rje slob ma chug
cig/ rdo rje slob dpon de rang gis khro bo rdo rje ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te slob ma la'ang snying po 'di dag 'ching du chug cig /oM gr-ih+Na badzra sa ma ya hUM baM/ de nas gos sngon
@#/ /po bgos la gtsug tor sngon pos bcings te dar sngon pos gdong dkris la sngags 'dis chug cig/ oM badzra sa ma ya yaM pra be TA me/ de nas bcug
ste rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / snying po 'dis de la dbab par gyis shig /oM badzra A pe sha AH/ de nas babs nas de ltar babs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs so/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyang skad cig gis shes so/ /gnod pa'ang med par 'gyur ro/ /
sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /hUM zhes bya bas kyang sems can thams cad la tshar bcad pa dang / phan gdags pa byed nus par 'gyur ro/ /
lag na rdo rje yang rtag tu de'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub bo/ /de nas mna'i snying po byin cig/ de nas gdong g.yogs pa dkrol te dkyil 'khor chen po ji lta ba bzhin
du ston cig /dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag las rnam par rgyal bar
nus par 'gyur ro/ /hUM zhes byas pas lha chen po la sogs pa lha thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / mnan par nus
par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing rang gi dngos
grub sbyin par mdzad do/ /de nas de la rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur to/ /rang gi mtshan ma rdo rje rnon po ji lta ba bzhin du sngags 'dis lag pa gnyis su sbyin no/ /oM badzra pA

Ni badzra karma ka rod+b+ha ba/ de nas sngags 'dis rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur to/ /oM badzra kro d+ha twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta he badzra nA ma/ de nas gang la ming btags pa
de la kye zhes bya ba'i sgra dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas ye shes rnams bskyed de/ /rdo rje khro bo mnyam gzhag nas/ /'bar ba mang po'i 'od can gyi/ /rdo rje'i dbyibs ni snying gar bsam/ /
skye bo kun la 'bebs par byed/ /rdo rje khro bor mnyam gzhag nas/ /dpral bar rdo rje rin chen yang / /de bzhin du ni bsams byas na/ /sems can thams cad dbang du byed/ /
rdo rje khro bor mnyam gzhag nas/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po'i 'od/ /rdo rje pad+ma mgul du bsam/ /sems can thams cad brlag par byed/ /rdo rje khro bo mnyam gzhag nas//
'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po'i 'od/ /rdo rje thams cad spyi bor bzhag /skye bo 'di dag thams cad srung / /de nas ye shes kyi phyag rgya 'di rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /hUM sarba
@#/ /badzra kro d+ha a be sha aH/ ho rat+na badzra kro d+ha b+ha Sha ma nA ya traM hUM/ badzra d+harmA kro d+ha nA sha ya hUM phaT/ hUM karma badzra kro d+ha rak+Sha/ /de nas lha thams cad dgug
pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya bslab bo/ /hUM zhes bya ba bcings nas ni/ /lag pa rdo rje lcags kyur bsam/ /khros nas mdzub mo bskul nas ni/ lha rnams 'gug pa'i mchog
tu 'gyur/ /rang gi rkang mthil dbus su ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bris nas su/ /de nyid kyis ni rtag mnan na/ /lha rnams nges pa nyid du 'gug/ /rdo rje'i lcags kyu nyid phyag rgya//
legs par phyi ste bzhag nas su/ /bskul na u ma la sogs pa/ /bud med thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bzhag pa ni/ /mdzub mo nyid du de bzhin te//
des mnan lha yi gang yin pa/ /de ni 'gugs pa'i dam pa'o/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra karma aM ku sha kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM

phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha daN+Ta a gra A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha saM gats+tsha A kaR+Sha ya mi te badzra sa ma ya ma nusma ra hUM phaT/ de nas phyag rgya rnam bzhi'i ye shes bslab bo/ /brkyang
zhing bskum pas gnas nas su/ /rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /hUM tsam gyis kyang skad cig gis/ /skye bo thams cad 'bebs par byed/ /rdo rje dag ni legs par smras//
hUM zhes bya ba bzhi ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po yis/ /thams cad kyang ni nges par 'gug/ rdo rje khro bor mnyam gzhag nas/ rdo rje khro bo'i lha mchog gis/ /skye bo kun gyi gsos
byed de/ /rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor to/ /yid kyis lus la go bgo ba/ /bdag gam pha rol rnams la ste/ /go cha chen po'i sbyor bas ni/ /skye bo 'di dag thams cad srung / /de nas de

rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha kA yA be shA ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra bid+yot+ta ma mahA kro d+ha A na ya ho b+ha ga bAM badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha tiSh+Tha ha na da ha pa tsa bi nA shA ya

hUM| ka re Na pA ta ya badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ oM ma no dr-i T+ha badzra ka ba tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ de nas sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /rdo rje khro bor mnyam
gzhag nas/ /badzra hUM zhes bzlas pa'i phyag /gang dang gang la kun zhugs pa/ /phyag rgyas btab par de 'gyur ro/ /sgra chen du ni brjod bya ba/ /Tik+ka hUM phaT khros nas su/ /lan gcig
gang la smras pa ni/ /rdo rje 'bar bas de mngon bkug /rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin cing / /rdo rje lta bas bltas pa yi/ /sems can gang dang gang yin pa/ /de nas de ni dran nyams
'gyur/ /yid la bsad ces bsams nas su/ /snying gar rdo rje sgom par byed/ /hUM zhes bya ba nyid kyis kun/ /rang gi rgyas ni btab par dgongs/ /sems can gang dang gang dag
@#/ /la| |yid kyi rgyas ni 'debs pa gang / /phyag rgya 'dis ni shin tu yang / /las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de nas de dag gi snying po 'di dag go
Tak+ki hUM phaT/ Tak+ki a| Tak+ki dza/ Tak+ki haM/ phyag rgya re res kyang las bzhi rnams la phyag rgya'i snying po bzhis sbyar ro/ /de nas gsang ba khro bo'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i bslab bo//
yan lag kun gyis 'khyud nas ni/ /hUM zhes gang la sbyar bya ba/ /dbang po gnyis ni sprad byas na/ /de yi srog ni ma rungs 'gyur/ /hUM zhes bya bar ldan pa yis/ /mchu sprad
sos ni mchu bzung nas/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab sprad pa/ /gang yin de ni mngon sum 'gyur/ /hUM zhes sbyor ba gang yin pa/ /de ni bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ /dbang po gnyis ni
sprad gyur na/ /gang yin de ni sdug bsngal 'thob/ /hUM zhes bya ba rab sbyor zhing / /dbang po gnyis ni sprad nas kyang / /yan lag kun gyis btsir gyur na/ /de yi lus ni srungs
bar 'gyur/ /de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag go/ /hUM a/ hUM dza/ hUM ho/ hUM haM/ hUM te/ de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig gi de kho
na nyid phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ /gang gis sems can la phan phyir/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran byas na/ /de ni sangs rgyas thob par
'gyur/ /dbang phyug dang ni u ma yang / /sa la bris te de ltar mnan/ /ji ltar bris pa'i go rims bzhin/ /ut+pal ltar sngo 'tsher ba'i mdog/ sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /
'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /de ni 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba/ /rdo rje hUM dang 'dra ba yi/ /dngos grub rdzu 'phrul myur du 'grub/ /ji ltar ri mo bri bzhin/ /'bar bas bskor ba'i
dbus bzhugs pa/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis/ /sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /de nas de rnams las bshad de/ /rdo rje las ni bla na med/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran
sgrub pas/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob bo/ /'jig rten dag las rgyal bcings na/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal 'gyur/ /rdo rje che dang kun tu 'gro/ /rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba
'dra| |rdo rje dbang gi rgyal por 'gyur/ /chos bzang ldan pas 'jig rten dbang / /las kyi rdo rje khro bo che/ /rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur/ /sems dpa' khro bo rab tu brtan/ /khro
bo'i lcags kyu yang dag 'gugs/ /khro bo chags pas chags par byed/ /khro bo legs pas dga' ba ste/ /khro gnyer gyis kun ma rungs byed/ /khro bo nyi mas gzi brjid mchog /dpal
gyi khro bo don rnams sdud/ /ha ha rgod pas bdud du byed/ /chos kyi khro bos chos rnams sdud/ /rdo rje ral gris gcod par byed/ /rgyu yi khro bo sdug bsngal 'phrog /khro bo smra ba'i
@#/ /tshig 'phrog go/ las kyi khro bo las rab ste/ /srung ba yis ni srung bar byed/ /khro bo gnod sbyin dgra yang za/ /khro bo'i khu tshur dngos grub ster/ /de nas
rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /rdo rje gnyis su gyur pa ste/ /dam tshig mchog tu grags pa yin/ /de dag bcing ba bshad par bya/ /khro bo bcing ba bla na med/ /
lag par rdo rjer byas nas su/ /mthe'u chung lcags kyur bcing bar bya/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyis bsdigs pa ni/ /'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya/ /de bzhin mdzub mo
ngos sbyar te/ /nor bu 'dra bar rab tu dgug /gung mo mnyam bsgreng pad+mar bya/ /gung mo mdzub mo gnyis kas bsdigs/ /mdzub mo gnyis ka rdo rjer bya/ /g.yas pa lcags
kyus dgug par bya/ /de nyid hUM zhes bya bas mdud/ /legs pa sbyin par de yin te/ /mdzub gnyis dpral ba'i gnyer mar bzhag/ snying gar mdzub mos nyi mar bskor/ /
lag pa brkyang ste spyi bor bzhag/ mdzub mo kha nas dgod ltar bya/ /mdzub mo sen mo sbyar ba ste/ /g.yas pas ral gri bcings pa'o/ /gung mdzub mnyam sgreng 'khor lo
yi| |kha yi nang nas dbyung ba dang / /mdzub mo gung mo rdo rjer sbyar/ /mdzub mo yis ni mgul bar bskor/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni mche ba che/ /mdzub mo bkug pas rdo rjer
bcings/ /rdo rje lA s+ye la sogs pa/ /sems ma'i phyag rgya de nyid hUM/ /zhes bya chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ /hUM zhes bya bar lhan cig go/ de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad/

do| |hUM ni sangs rgyas rdo rje yi/ /traM ni rdo rje snying po yi/ /hrI ni rdo rje sde yi'o/ /a ni rdo rje thams cad kyi/ hUM he/ traM/ taM hi hi de ha/ d+hi ka d+hi hUM/ grwa/ kraM baM/ tri a/ rdo rje khro bo mang po yi/ /chos
kyi phyag rgya rab 'grub pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do/ /rdo rje rigs ni chen po yi/ /las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na/ /rdo rje 'gying la sogs tshul
gyis/ /khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis su bshad/ /gang dang gang gi phyag rgya rnams/ /las kyi phyogs ni gang du bya/ /de dang der ni bsgyur nas kyang / /phyag rgya de ni sbyar bar bya/ /phyag rgya thams
cad kyi cho ga'o/ /de nas 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po thun mong ba'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje
mdzub mo dam tshig gi/ rdo rje hUM zhes sngags kyi ste/ /dngos grub thams cad yud kyis 'thob/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ga lcags kyur bcing / /rdo rje gnyis ga steng 'og tu/ /rdo rje lcags
kyu'i phyag rgya ni/ /skad cig gis ni thams cad 'gugs/ /rig pa dam pa thams cad kyi/ /'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bshad/ /thams cad kyang ni gnod pa ste/ /de bzhin
@#/ /las rnams thams cad byed/ /rdo rje mdzub sor gnyis legs par/ /rab mnyam gzhag pas mnyam nas ni/ /shi ba thams cad slong ba ste/ /rdo rje slong
ba zhes bya'o/ /rdo rje mdzub gnyis legs par ni/ /rdo rje bcing pas bcings nas su/ /bsgyur te gtsug tu bzhag pa ni/ /tshe dang nad med 'phel ba'o/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas
te| |mthe bo mnyam nas nang du gzhug/ mdzub mo dam por bkug nas su/ /gcus pas zhabs su 'dug pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal bcings nas su/ /gang gi gzugs
la rkang g.yon pas/ /legs par mnan pa'i sems can de/ /zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ /gcig la gcig gis brdabs pas ni/ /
sems can gang gi lus la ni/ /babs nas de yang rdob par byed/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ /bdag gam pha rol go char bya/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyis bcings byas
na| |nges pa nyid du srung bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje mthil du bcings nas su/ /yid kyis khros nas dgab bya ba/ /mthe bo rdo rje dam pa ste/ /rdo rje rin chen 'grub par 'gyur/ /
sems dpa' rdo rje dam byas te/ /mthe bong gnyis kas gung mo mnan/ /mthe'u chung rdo rje rtse mo ni/ /rnon por dam tshig 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ /mdzub
mo gnyis bkug bcings nas su/ /gcu zhing phyir gcu byas pa ni/ /lha 'gugs pa yi dam pa yin/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/ /mdzub mo gnyis bkug rab tu mnan/ /mthe bong gnyis
ka sbyar ba yis/ /dbus su bcing ba bar snang gi'o/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ka las/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ka bcings nas kyang / /rgyab sbyor mdzub mo gnyis sprel to/ /bsgyur ba mkha'
la spyod pa'o/ /rdo rje bcings pa bsdams nas su/ /rdo rje srung bas bcing bar bya/ /'di ni sa yi dam tshig ste/ /thams cad byed pas 'da' bar dka'/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings
te| |g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la/ /mthe'u chung mdud cing drag tu gtogs/ /'di ni sa 'og 'gug pa'o/ /rdo rje bcings pas sbrel ba ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis ka dam por ste/ /gung
mo mthe bo rdo rjer ni/ /gdug pa'i phyag rgya 'joms pa'o/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ /mnyam gzhag ste ni snying gar bzhag/ khro bo khu tshur gtsir ba ni/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor
'jig pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la/ /g.yas pa'i mdzub mo bkug pas bzung / /rab tu khros nas drag gtogs na/ /ri rab kyang ni lhung bar byed/ /g.yon pa'i mdzub
mo rdo rje la/ /g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus gzung / /rab tu khro zhing bkug pa yis/ /gdon rnams kun la dbang du byed/ /rdo rje bcing ba byas nas su/ /lag ngar snying
@#/ /gar shin tu bsdams/ /rdo rje mdzub mo nyid mchan khung / /brud pa yis ni snying 'byin to/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yis/ /mthe bong gnyis ka'i drung du
ni| |yid kyis khros nas btsir bya ba/ /rims la sogs 'gugs dam pa'o/ /rdo rje thal mo dam sbyar te/ /mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug nas su/ /mthe bo rab tu mnyam sbyar bas/ /
mnan pa de ni sdig 'phrog pa'o/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis nang du/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni sbas nas kyang / /legs par gyen du 'phangs pa ni/ /lhung ba slong ba'i dam pa'o/ /rdo rje bcing
pa dam byas te/ /gung mo gnyis ka ngos sbyar nas/ /mtha' ma bzhi yi ngos sprad pa/ /skad cig tu ni sdig 'dral to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor
chen po sgrub pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bzung nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dang po srad bus bre/ /srad bus bres la phyi nas ni/ /srad bu ji bzhin bre bar bshad/
rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ka yi/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo rab sbyar ba/ /byas nas mtshon rnams thams cad la/ /'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya/ /rdo rje mdzub mo legs par
ni| |sbyar la bkan te bsdams nas su/ /rab tu khros nas dbye ba ni/ /sgo dbye ba yi mchog yin no/ /de nas rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa bshad do/ /
brkyang bskum gyis ni tshul byas te/ /khro bo yi ni skad 'byin cing / /khro zhing khro bo'i lta bas ni/ /las rnams thams cad bsgrub bar byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje
dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ 'jig rten na gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //bam po lnga pa/ de nas
yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi
rigs pa'i dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba badzra Ni/ badzra mA te A na ya sarba badzra sa t+ye na hUM dzaHde nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs

ka nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid phyag na rdo rje dra ba bdag gis lus kun nas 'bar bas bskor nas/ rdo rje khro bo gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams su gyur nas byung ste/
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don bsgrubs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' btsun mo gsang ba'i phyir sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil
@#/ /'khor la 'dug nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ gsang ba'i ye shes bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa bde ba'i phyir/ /btsun mo nyid du gyur pa yin/ /hrIHde nas yang phyag na rdo rje rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs
so| |de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /khro bo'i gsang ba zhes bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/
dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yi gnas rnams su/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya bshad par bya/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs
bzhag par bya/ /sangs rgyas khro bo'i dam tshig kyang / /ji bzhin par ni mkhas pas bri/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor der/ /dbus su
mdung rtse zhing bris la/ /rdo rje rab tu gnas bya zhing / /'od 'bar dbus su bri ba ni/ /de yi go rims ji bzhin te/ /rdo rje rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang / /mda' dang dga' ba de bzhin
no| |rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis pa yang / /'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa yi/ /rdo rje rin chen bri bar bya/ /khro gnyer dbus su rdo rje bri/ /
de bzhin rdo rje nyi rgyal mtshan/ /de bzhin so yi phreng ba de'i/ /ngos su rdo rje bri bar bya/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum pa yang / /pad+ma'i dbus su gnas pa
yi| |rdo rje pad+ma lha rdzas kyi/ /'bar ba'i dbus su pad+ma bri/ /ral gri 'khor lo de bzhin no/ /rdo rje lce yang tshul bzhin du/ /rtag tu de yi phyogs su gzhag/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas
ni| |dkyil 'khor bzhi pa dam par yang / /rdo rje bsnyal la rdo rje bri/ /rdo rje 'od ni chen pos bskor/ /de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /'bar ba kun gyis dkrigs pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje thams
cad go cha'i mchog/ rdo rje mche ba khu tshur mchog/ grwa dang phyi yi gnas rnams su/ /tshul bzhin du ni bri bar bya/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i rig pa mdor bsdus na/

dz+hiH/ oM badzra kro d+he sa ma ye dz+hiH/ oM badzra kro d+he ro Sha aM ku sha A na ya sar+b+ba na dz+hiH/ oM badzra ro She kA ma badzri Ni ba shaM m+me A na ya hi dz+hiH/ oM badzra duSh+Ta kro d+he to Sha ya sarba na dz+hiH/ rdo rje dz+hiH/ zhes

bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /dziH/ oM badzra b+h+ri ku TI kro d+he ha ra sarba ar+tha na dziH/ oM badzra dz+wA la mA lA pra be sha ma ha kro d+ha ag+ni dz+wA la ya sarba na ra bi ro She dziH/ oM badzra d+hA dza a gre ke yU ra

mahA kro d+he de hi me sarba ar+tha na dziH/ oM badzra aT+Ta hA sa ni hA sa hA sa aT+Ta T+Te hA se nA mA ra ya dziH/ rdo rje dziHzhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /diH/ oM badzra shud+ha kro d+he ha na ha na mA ra ya duSh+Ta

@#/ /na diH/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na kro d+he ts+tshin+da/ ko d+he She na/ sarba ni diH/ oM badzra he tu mahA kro d+he pra be sha tsa kra/ pra be sha ya sarba na diH/ oM badzra dzi hA mahA kro d+he ba she ba tsa muny+tsa

diH/ rdo rje diHzhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /hIH/ oM badzra sarba na mu khA+e karma badzra Ni mahA kro d+he ku ru ku ru sar+b+ba na hIH/ oM badzra ka ba tsa kro d+he rak+Sha ma ma hIH/ oM badzra tsaN+Da kro d+he mahA

yak+Shi ni badzra daMSh+Ta a kA ra la b+hi Sha ne ba ya hIH/ oM badzra kro d+he muSh+Ti ban+d+ha hIH/ rdo rje hIH/ zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi grwa rnams su rdo rje gar la sogs pa'i
gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rig pa'i snying po rnams gsungs pa/ oM badzra hUM khe/ badzra hUM g+huM/ badzra hUM te/ badzra hUM twAM/ phyi rol gyi grwa rnams su dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i snying po rnams
brjod par bya'o/ /oM badzra tri te/ badzra Da Da/ badzra d+hA tu/ badzra Dau mu d+ha/ de nas sgo bzhi'i mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po rnams gsungs pa/ badzra dzaHdzaH/ badzra hUM hUM/
badzra baM baM/ badzra aHaH/ de nas 'dir rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di bshad do/ /de nas de la thog ma nyid du re zhig 'jig
rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i cho ga bzhin du bcug ste/ rdo rje gsang ba'i rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang 'dra ba'i
phyag rgya dang / lan gyi phyag rgya dang / nye ba'i phyag rgya dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang ba mchod pa'i phyir gar gyis mchod par bya'o/ /de la gar dang / lan gyi
gar dang / nye ba'i gar dang / ye shes kyi gar rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi gar rnams ni 'di yin no/ /de la dang po nyid du rdo rje dbyings su bsdus pa'i snying pos
rdo rje glu len cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pas mchod pa byas nas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems ma rdo rje'i phyag rgya drug tu gtogs par bya'o/ /de nas ji snyed
zhugs pa rnams phyag rgya rnams kyis yang dag par dbab par bya'o/ /rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgyar ni/ /snying gar shin tu
bcing par bya/ /de nas gar gyi cho ga yi/ /rdo rje khro bo lcags kyu yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang ngo / /rdo rje mda' ni 'phang bar bya/ /rdo rje mda' ni 'phangs nas kyang / /rdo rje
dga' bas bsgrub par bya/ /phyag rgya cho ga bzhin bkrol te/ /thal mo brdab cing bcing bar bya/ /mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni/ /phyag na rdo rje mnyes par bya/ /mnyes nas dgos
pa thams cad ni/ /'dod bzhin skad cig nyid kyis 'grub/ /de la gar gyi phyag rgya'i snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /sid+h+ya badzra/ A nA ya badzra/ rA gA ya badzra/ sa d+hU badzra/ de'i 'og
@#/ /tu 'dra ba'i gar gyis mchod pa bya ste/ de bzhin gar gyi g.yon pa ni/ /khu tshur g.yas pas bzung nas ni/ /bsgyur zhing mdzub mo'i ngos kyis ni/ /dpral
ba nyid la bzhag par bya/ /de bzhin gar byed nyi ma yang / /bskor nas yang dag dgug par bya/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan bslang nas ni/ /rdo rje ha ha zhes dgod cing / /mchod pa 'di
yi cho ga yis/ /rgyal po la sogs mi kun kyang / /dbang dang rab kyi gzi brjid dang / /sbyin dang dgod pas mnyes par byed/ /de la 'di rnams ni 'dra ba'i phyag rgya'i snying po
ni 'di rnams yin no/ /a hi badzra/ dz+wA la ya badzra/ de hi badzra/ hA sa hA sa badzra/ de bzhin gar kyang bkrol nas ni/ /pad+ma kha 'bus sbyar ba yi/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo snying gar
bzhag /bsam pa g.yos pas 'dud par bya/ /de bzhin gar byed rdo rje yi/ /ral gris bgegs ni gcod ltar bya/ /mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba yis/ /'khor lo'i
dkyil 'khor tshul du bskor/ /rdo rje'i tshig tu glu len ltar/ /phyag na rdo rje mchod par bya/ /mchod pa 'di yi cho ga yis/ /thams cad mnyes pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de la
'di rnams ni nye ba'i/ /phyag rgya'i snying po rnams yin no/ /kA ma ya badzra/ ts+tshin+da ya badzra/ brah+mI ya badzra/ bru hi badzra/ rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub yang dag/ bkan nas rtse mo sbyar nas
kyang / /bsgyur te de nas gtsug tor tu/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis ni/ /lus kun mchog gi dkyil 'khor du/ /gar gyi cho gas brtan par bya/ /snying
gar rab tu gzhag par bya/ /de bzhin gar gyi cho ga bzhin/ /rdo rje srung ba bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje mche ba bcings nas ni/ /rdo rje bcing bas mnan par bya/ /mchod pa 'di yi cho ga
yis/ /las rnams kun kyang nus par 'gyur/ /mchod pa rnam bzhi byas nas ni/ /cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya dkrol/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /nri t+ya badzra/ rak+Sha badzra/ khA
da badzra/ ban+d+ha badzra/ de nas khro bo gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i lag gnyis kyis/ /khros pa'i yid kyis drag gtogs bya/ /skye bo gang gi ming
smos pa/ /de yi snying ni 'gas par 'gyur/ /ma mchu so yis bzung nas su/ /gang gi ming smos gzer pa ni/ /de yi mgo yang myur 'gas te/ /gang gi bka' las 'das pa'i 'o/ /
khro bo chen po 'di lta ba'i/ /mig kyang 'dzums par byed pa ni/ /gang gi ming ni smos bltas pa/ /de yi mig ni rdol bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje khro bor mnyam gzhag la/ /bdag rang gi
ni snying gar yang / /rdo rje bcing ba bcing na ni/ /de yi sems ni 'jig par byed/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /hUM badzra/ s+pho Ta thaH/ hUM badzrA mu ka badzra thaH/ hUM badzra
@#/ /ni trA thaH/ hUM badzra ma na thaH/ de nas rdo rje chen po'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /de la dang por re zhig phyag rgya chen po 'di
bcing bar bshad do/ /mthe'u chung lcags kyu bcings nas ni/ /rdo rje khro bor gzhag par bya/ /g.yon par rtse gsum rgyab tu ni/ /'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bshad/ /
g.yon ba mdzub mo thad kar brkyang / /de bzhin bkan pa pad+ma ni/ /de bzhin du yang bsgyur nas sra/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rjer gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje mthil du bcings byas te/ /khros
pa yid kyis dgab pa ni/ /mthe bo rdo rje dam pas so/ /khro bo ti rin ti rir bshad/ /mdzub mo lcags kyus dgug pa nyid/ /mdzub mo ngos ni sbyar ba'o/ /de bzhin mdzub
gnyis legs sbyar ba/ /mdzub mo sprad de dpral bar bzhag /snying gar nyi ma rab tu brtan/ /mdzub mo bsnyams nas spyi bor gzhag /bsgyur nas dgod par gzhag
par bya/ /mdzub bsnyams pad+ma kha 'bus bzhin/ /gnyis ka ral gri chad par 'dzin/ /mdzub mo 'khor lor bcings pa'o/ /mdzub mo bsnyams te kha nas dbyung / /mdzub
mo legs par brkyang ba dang / /mdzub mos mgul du bcing bar bya/ /de gnyis kha 'gram mche bar gzhag/ khu tshur dam du bcings pa ni/ /phyag rgya chen po yin
par bshad/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /gsang ba'i khu tshur las byung ba/ /dam tshig mchog tu rab tu grags/ /de rnams bcing ba
bshad par bya/ /rdo rje bcing ba bla na med/ /snying gar bzhag nas rtsib logs gcu/ /mda' drang ba ni g.yon pa nas/ /snying ga nas ni dbyung bar bya/ /khro gnyer du ni bsgyur nas ni/ /nyi
ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang / /spyi bor lag pa brkyang ba dang / /bsgyur nas dgod par bzhag par bya/ /kha yi dbus su rab bzhag pa/ /mdzub mo ral gris 'debs par bya/ /
'khor lo bskor bar ston pa dang / /kha nas rab tu 'byin pa ste/ /spyi bo lus mchog dkyil 'khor ro/ /dpung pa snying ga rtsi ba logs rnams/ /rdo rje bsrung ba de bzhin bya/ /mche
ba'i gnas su gzhag pa dang / /khu tshur dam du bsngams pa 'o/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor phyag rgya ni/ /mtshan ma'i go rims bzhin du bcing / /dam tshig rdo rje bcings pa las/ /de
bzhin rdo rje khu tshur gzhag /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do/ /phaTaHshaTaHmaTaHsaTaHraTaHhaTaHd+hiTaHtaTaHpaD+TaHtaD+TaHkaT+TaHd+haD+TaH
kuTiHriTaHkhaTaHbaTaH/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i las kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /mdor na las kyi phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas te/ /gnas
@#/ /gang yin par gzhag par bya/ /khro bo'i lta bu khro dang ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ khro
bo gsang pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje
rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta

sUk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+ha
kra ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM
sUk+Sh+ma badzra rat+na kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa
'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra sUk+Sh+ma badzra pad+ma kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra karma kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs bskyed

pa'i phyir rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du 'khod de/ de rnams kyi rang gi snying po gsungs so/ /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra satwa su dz+nyA na kro d+hA kra ma hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra aM ku sha A

kaR+Sha ya mahA kro d+hA ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra sU k+Sh+ma rA ga kro d+hA a nu rA ga ya ti bi kra ma hUM phaT/ oM badzra sUk+Sh+ma badzra puSh+TiM kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM sU k+Sh+ma badzra b+h+ra ku TI kro d+ha ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ oM sU k+Sh+ma badzra

dz+wA la maN+Da la kro d+ha sUR+ya dz+wA la hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra tsakra kro d+hA sarba ar+tha mA me pra yats+tsha shrI kra ma hUM phaT/ oM badzra sUk+Sh+ma hA sa kro d+hA mahA T+Ta T+Ta hA sa ha ha ha ha hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra d+harma badzra kro

d+hA ya hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra ts+tshe da kro d+hA ts+tshin+da b+hin+da hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+hA mahA tsakra ts+tshin+da pa tA ya shrI pra be sha ya hri da yaM b+hin+da hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra hUM kA ra ha na tA ya bAka ma tren+na hUM phaT

oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra karma kro d+hA sarba karma kA ro d+b+ha ba sarba kA ra ya sA d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra sUk+Sh+ma ka pa tsa kro d+hA rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra yak+Sha kro d+ha ha na b+ha ya sarba duSh+Ti ny+tsi t+ta mA tre badzra daSh+Ta

hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra muSh+Ti kro d+hA ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje r-igs kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gsungs pa/ de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /
@#/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /khro bo'i ye shes zhes kyang bshad/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor
thams cad srad bus bre/ /de yi dbus su sangs rgyas bri/ /ye shes rdo rje'i dbus na'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu/ /phyag rgya de nyid kun bris shig/ rdo rje shugs kyis
brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams su yang / /'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal sogs/ /rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya/ /de rnams kyi ni phyogs kun tu/ /rdo rje khro
bo'i cho ga bzhin/ /de nas 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi ye shes phra mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa rgyas par bshad do/ /de la dang po nyid du re zhig bcug nas bsgo ba ni/ /de ring
khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur gyis de la legs par nan tan gyis shig/ sems can gyi
khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir nyid du bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phan pa dang / bde ba dang / grub pa dam pa thob pa'i
'bras bu'i bar gyi phyir rdo rje khro bos sems can thams cad kyang yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir bdud byed na ma rungs pa thams cad lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos/ de skad bsgo
nas gdong g.yogs bkrol te de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad bstan nas rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin du lag pa gnyis byin no/ /de nas rdo rje khro bo'i ye shes phra mo rnams slobs
shig /rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdo rje phra mo'i bstan byas la/ /hUM zhes bya ba gang sbyar ba/ /de yi srog ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /rdo rje phra mo bstan byas te/ /cho ga bzhin du mched pa ni/ /
ji srid bar du mched pa des/ /de srid kyi ni dgra 'di 'jig /rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar byas/ /khro bor ldan pa ji srid mched/ /de snyed sems can ma rungs
byed/ /de ltar de bzhin gsol ba yang / /rnal 'byor can gyis 'dod na ni/ /ma lus pa ni thams cad kyang / /de dag phyir zhing 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag
yin no/ /hUM hUM nA sha ya badzra hUM bi nA sha ya sarba sUk+Sh+ma badzra pra t+ya nA sha ya shI g+h+raM hUM/ sems can gang gis dgra la ni/ /lhan cig gyur pa cher bstan pas/ /byams pa mched pa'i
rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdo rje 'phro bas 'jig par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'phro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /snying rje can gyi su gang la/ /snying rje rnal 'byor de yis ni/ /gdug pa thams cad nges
'jig go /chos sam yang na chos min pa/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba/ /de ltar bsgoms na sems can la/ /hUM zhes bya bas 'jig par byed/ /gdul bar dka' ba'i
@#/ /sems can gang / /sangs rgyas byang chub snod min pa/ /de rnams yang dag sbyang ba'i phyir/ /hUM zhes bya bas 'jig par byed/ /de la de rnams kyi snying po ni

'di dag yin no/ /b+hai ra badzre kro d+hA hUM phaT/ ga ru Na badzra kro d+hA hUM phaT/ hUM bi shud+d+ha badzra kro d+hA hUM phaT/ oM bi sho d+ha na badzra kro d+hA hUM phaT/ rdo rje'i dbyibs ni bris nas kyang / /yid kyis
kyang ni gang su yi/ /khyim gyi dbus su lhung bsams nas/ /de yi rigs de 'jig par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rdo rje phra tshul gyis/ /snying gar rdo rje bsgoms nas kyang / /byang chub
sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs/ /lhung na rigs ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs chen po/ /bsgoms nas gang du lhung ba de'i/ /snang srid nyes pa sna tshogs
kyis/ /btsun mor bcas pa 'jig par 'gyur/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgoms nas ni/ /snang ba gang la lhung ba ni/ /de yi snang srid nges

par 'jig /de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di dag yin no/ /hUM badzra pra ba ta/ hUM bo d+hi satwa pra ba ta/ hUM badzra d+ha ra pra ba ta/ hUM bu d+d+ha pra ba ta/ rdo rje rtse mor rab sbyor bas/ /zla ba'i
gzugs la bdag rang nyid/ /bsgoms nas su ni bdag rang kyang / /gang du lhung ba der ltung 'gyur/ /zla ba rdo rje bdag rang gis/ /bsgoms nas su ni bdag rang yang / /rab tu
tu khros nas gar lhung ba/ /de yi rigs ni mod la ltung / /bdag rang phyag na rdo rjer ni/ /bsgoms nas su ni bdag rang yang / /gang du ltung ba de yi yul/ /ring por mi thogs 'jig par
'gyur/ /bdag rang sangs rgyas gzugs nyid du/ /bsgoms nas su ni bdag nyid kyang / /gang du ltung ba de yi ni/ /snang srid ring po ma thogs 'jig /de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni

'di dag yin no/ /po d+hA gri pra ba ta ya hUM/ satwa badzra pra ba ta ya hUM/ badzra satwa pra ba ta ya hUM/ bud+d+ha pra ba ta ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /
rdo rje khro bor snyoms zhugs la/ /rang gi lus kyis yongs bskor ba/ /rdo rje hUM byas 'khyud nas ni/ /gang gi ming smos te 'chi'o/ /rdo rje phra mor snyoms par zhugs/ sna nas phra mo thang cig
tu/ /dbugs btang hUM zhes bya tshul gyis/ /'jig rten gsum yang lhung bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la/ /khros nas rdo rje lta ba yi/ /bltas pa yis ni ldongs par 'gyur/ /
yang na 'chi ba ru ni 'gyur/ /bu ga nas ni zhugs nas su/ /yid kyis gang yang rud ba yi/ /snying nas drangs pa de yis ni/ /rang ngam 'di yi dbang du 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po

rnams gsungs pa/ hUM badzra ba li ta kro d+hA mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra shwa sa bi shra ba tA ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra dr-i Sh+Ti bi sha bi sha bi nA sha ya hUM phaT/ hUM hri da yak+Sha na krod+hA pra bi shaka yaM hr-i
@#/ /da ya ts+tshin+da b+hin+da ka ta ka ta hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab po/ /de la re zhig phyag rgya chen po bcing nga bshad do/ /
rdo rje ye shes sbyor ba yis/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje khro bor bdag rang nyid/ /bsgoms na de ma thag tu 'grub/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi
phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab po/ /ting 'dzin ye shes dam tshig las/ /hUM zhes bya dang ldan gyur pa/ /ci rigs gnas su bzhag na ni/ /grub pa thams cad ster ba'i mchog /
de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /phaT/ shaT/ maT/ saT/ raT/ taT/ haT/ braT/ traT/ daT/ b+haT/ kr-iT/
riT/ khaT/ baT/ zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus bshad pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /chos kyi khu
tshur gnyis byas te/ /ji ltar rigs pa'i gnas su sbyar/ /las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na/ /cho ga bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa rdzogs so// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi
rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta tha ga ta karme shwa ra hUM/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /

oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na mahA pU dzA karma bi d+hi bis+t+wa ra sa ma ye trai lokya bi dza ya ki ra sarba duSh+TaM sa ma ya badzri Ni hUM/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
rdo rje snying pos rang gi rigs pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya sha du sa ma ya s+pha ra Na mahA pU dzA karma bi d+hi bsti ra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na mahA pU dzA karma bi d+hi bistA ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta tha ga ta sarba a ba lo ka d+hA tu ma bi mahA pU dzA karma bi d+hi bista ra sa ma ye hUM phaT/
de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'i lha mo rnams rang gi snying gnas bskyed de 'jig rten gyi khams thams
@#/ /cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / mnyes par bya ba dang / las thams cad grub pa'i dgos pa byed pa nyid
du yang dag pa'i sbyor ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul bar byas te/ slar yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje
dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi cho ga
rgyas pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /las kyi rdo rje zhes bshad
do| |dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre/ /dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gnas su ni/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzhag par bya/ /sangs rgyas
kun gyi phyogs kun tu/ /dam tshig mchog rnams gzhag par bya'o/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams su yang / /rdo rje gtso sogs bzhi po
rnams/ /ji ltar rim bzhin bzhag par bya/ /de rnams kyi ni phyogs kun tu/ /mchod pa chen po rnams bzhag go/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /rdo rje las kyi phyag

rgya bshad/ /oM badzra satwa sid d+hi dz+nyA na karma sa ma ye hUM dza/ oM badzra A ka R+ShaN karma dz+nyA na' sa ma ye hUM dza/ oM badzra ra ti rA ga karma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dza/ oM badzra sa d+hu karma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dza/

oM badzra b+h+r-i ku TI ba shiM ku ru hUM/ oM badzra sU R+ya maN+Da le ba shiM ku ru hUM/ oM badzra d+h+wa dzA gra kai yU re re ba shiM ku ru hUM/ oM badzra da ta hA sa ba shiM ku ru hUM/ oM badzra pad+ma rA ga rA ga ya hUM/ oM badzra

tIk+Sh+Na rA ge rA ga ya hUM/ oM badzra maN+Da le rA ge rA ga ya hUM/ oM badzra bA gA rA ge rA ga ya hUM/ oM badzra karma sa ma ya tsa ya hUM/ oM badzra ka pa tsa baM d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM/ oM badzra yak+Shi Ni mA ra ya badzra
daMSh+Ta ya b+hin+da bin+da ya mu ga s+ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra karma muSh+Ti sid+d+hi hUM phaT/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/ rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi ye
shes rnams bskyed do/ /de la dang po nyid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /yam shing mngar po rnams kyi me/ /rab sbar rdo rje khro bo yi/ mnyam par
gzhag pas snyoms zhugs la/ /til bsregs pas ni sdig bsregs shing / /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /byin za rab tu sbar nas kyang / /rtag tu 'bras ni sbyin bsregs
na| |gdon mi za bar khyim rgyas 'gyur/ /yam shing mngar bo rnams kyis kyang / /mkhas pas rab tu me sbar te/ /dUr ba'i yal ga mar bcas pa/ /bsreg pa byas na tshe 'phel
@#/ /lo| |ya ma shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /byin za rab tu spar byas la/ /ku sha'i yal ga 'bru mar gyis/ /bsreg par byas na nges par bsrung / /de la de dag
gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM sarba pA baM da ha na badzra ya swAhA/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swAhA/ /oM badzra A yu She swAhA/ /oM badzra A bra ti ha ta badzra ya swAhA/ /yam shing tsha bas
dang por ni/ /rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ me spar nas kyang se ba yi/ /tsher ma can gyis 'gugs par 'gyur/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /khro dang ldan pas me sbar na//
me tog dmar ram 'bras bu'ang rung / /sbyin sreg byas na skye bo rengs/ /rnal 'byor can gyis khros nas kyang / /yam shing des ni me sbar te/ /lcags kyi phye ma bsregs na ni//
rdo rje bcings pa nyid du 'gyur/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /mnyam par gzhag ste ma bus la/ /'bras bu kha ba khros bzhin bsreg /skad cig tu ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /
re te ba ru pa miM d+hi d+hu l+ya ga ni sa ma hri sa/ dzu he ta ri ga ta ya laM ku to me ti pU ta pa ta ye ta/ de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /hUM badzra A kaR+Sha ya swAhA/ /hUM badzra
rA gA ya swAhA/ /hUM badzra ban+d+ha ya swAhA/ /hUM badzra mA ra Na ya swAhA/ /mkhas pas yam shing skyur mo yis/ /khros nas byin za sbar nas ni/ /'bras bu lo ma skyur bsregs
na| |dbang du bya ba dam pa 'o/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis kyang / /mnyam par gzhag ste me sbar la/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu khros bsregs na/ /'dod pa bzhin gyi gzugs rnyed do/ /de
'dra ba yi yam shing gis/ /byin za rab tu sbar nas kyang / /mi snang me tog sdong bu yis/ /bsregs na 'dod bzhin mi snang 'gyur/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /mnyam par
gzhag pa me spar la/ /nam mkha'i lcug ma'i me tog gis/ /sbyin sreg byas na mkha' la 'gro/ de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /oM badzra ba shaM kA ra ya swAhA/ /oM badzra
karma rU pa badzrA ya swAhA/ /oM ad+ya sh+ya badzra ya swAhA/ /oM badzra kha ba tsa ri Ni swAhA/ /khro bor mnyam gzhag yam shing ni/ /shin tu kha bas me sbar la/ /badzri me tog bsregs byas na//
rdo rje bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /khro dang ldan la me sbar la/ /lha yi phreng ba gang bsregs pa/ /de yang bka' bzhin nyan par 'gyur/ /khro bo
nyid du mnyam bzhag pa/ /yam shing nges ni me sbar te/ /phyag na rdo rje'i phreng ba bsreg/ de yang bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /rab tu khros te me
sbar la/ /chos gos bsregs pas sangs rgyas kyang / /skad cig tu ni bka' bzhin mdzad/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /hUM badzra ba shaM ka rA ya swAhA/ /hUM so ri ba
@#/ /shaM ka rA badzra ya swAhA/ hUM badzra pA Ni ba shaM ka rA ya swAhA/ /hUM bud+d+ha ba shaM ka rA ya swAhA/ /de nas gsang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /yid
'od bud med dang lhan cig /gnas shing bu gar any+dza na/ /bcug nas bskul ba byas nas kyang / /de yis mig bskus dbang du 'gyur/ /ldong ros bu gar bcug nas ni/ /rdo rje
bsdams pas de g.yogs te/ /mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi yis ni/ /dngos grub rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro/ /go ro tsa na bu gar bcug /rdo rje khu tshur gyis btsir na/ /gzhag pa de ni
'bar 'gyur na/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /gur gum bu gar bcug nas ni/ /bu gar sems dpa' rdo rje yis/ /bkab nas 'bar bar gyur nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra

bar 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /oM gu h+ya ra ti badzra ba shaM ka raM sid+d+h+ya hUM/ oM badzra gu h+ya sid+d+h+ya hUM/ oM gu h+ya badzra sid+d+h+ya hUM/ oM badzra d+ha ra gu h+ya sid+d+h+ya hUM/ de nas
rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /rdo rje dgongs pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdu na/ /rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje khro bor mnyam
par bzhag /hUM zhes mdzub mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /dam tshig mchog ni 'dir de bzhin/ /oM zhes dang po yi gas as/ /chos kyi phyag rgya 'dir de bzhin/ /las yi phyag rgya mdor
bsdu na/ /las kyi phyag rgya gnyis byas nas/ /thams cad grub byed dag pa ste/ /rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen
po las/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam
tshig gi phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang
chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /hUM badzra ma tha/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rin po
che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /hUM b+h+r-i ku TI badzra ra ta/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /hUM
mahA pad+ma badzra dr-i D+ha/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra karma a gra kri te/ de nas yang byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//
@#/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /rdo rje khro bo zhes bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams
cad srad bus bre/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu/ /'jig rten gsum las rgyal la sogs bri/ 'jig rten gsum las rgyal la sogs/ /sangs rgyas phyogs kun tu bri'o/ /de
nas dkyil 'khor 'dir dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas te bcug nas phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i
ye shes la bslab po/ /rang gis phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor/ /bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la/ /bud med lhan cig gnas nas ni/ /grub pa yang ni thob par 'gyur//
rang gis phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor/ /bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la/ /chags pas bud med la bltas na/ /grub pa yang ni thob par 'gyur/ /rang gis phyag rgya
bzhi'i dkyil 'khor/ /bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la/ /bud med mdzes la spras pas 'grub/ /rang gis phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor/ /bris nas chos nyid dag brjod
la| |lhan cig 'khyud na grub kun 'thob/ /de la chos nyid dag pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di dag yin no/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bi shud+d+ha d+harma te ho/ /oM badzra bi shud+d+ha dr-iSh+Ti dza/ oM sarba

bi shud+d+ha mu tri hUM/ oM sarba bi shud+d+ha kA ya baM ma na karma badzri hUM/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba spas pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab po/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs
nas kyang / /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis ni/ /bud med mchog ni mgu byas nas/ /shin tu grub pa thob par 'gyur/ /de nas de'i snying po brjod do/ /ho badzra kA ma/ /de nas ji lta ba bzhin
du rdo rje mnan pa'i rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po rnams cho ga dang bcas par rgyas par bslab par bya ste/ phyag rgya bzhi pa'i tshul 'dis rdo rje sil

snyan dang / /rnga dang / brdung ba dang / /brdabs nas rdo rje sems dpa' yang bsdus pa'i snying po'i glu blangs te/ de phul nas phyag rgya dang / 'dra ba'i phyag rgya dang / nye ba'i phyag rgya dang /
ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / gar gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o/ /de la gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa ni 'di yin no/ /rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis//
rdo rje hUM gi phyag rgya ni/ /snying ga nyid du bcing bar bya/ /de bzhin gar byas g.yon pa ni/ /g.yas pa'i chang bas gzung bar bya/ /bsgyur nas dpral pa nyid du ni/ /mdzub mo'i ngos
kyis gzhag par bya/ /de bzhin gar yang bkrol nas ni/ /mnyam par pad+ma kha 'das sbyar/ /mdzub mo snying gar bzhag nas ni/ /bsam pa g.yos pas 'dud par bya'o/ /rdo rje
@#/ /khro bos mdzub bsnyams te/ /bkan nas rtse mo sprad bya zhing / /de las bsgyur cing gtsug tor du/ /mdzub mo'i rtse mo sbyar ba'o/ /de nas yang byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khro bo'i dam tshig 'di gsungs pa/ hUM/ de nas de'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa/ de nas rab tu bshad
bya ba/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya//
de yi dbus su legs bri ba/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje hUM gi phyag rgya che/ /lag na 'dzin pa rdo rjer bcas/ /brkyang bskum tshul du gnas pa dang / /kha dog gzugs
ni ji bzhin bya/ /de nas 'dir gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad byas te/ /rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba gsung ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /
