dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhugs nas kyang / /'jig rten gsum rgyal mdzub mo yis/ /bu gar bcu ga nas bsgrubs na ni/ /las kun rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas bsgrub
pa'i snying po 'di bshad do/ /hUM badzra sa ma ya kr-ita/ de nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /dkyil 'khor zhugs nas legs par ni/ /
phyag rgya chen po mchog gnas pa/ /gnas nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya/ /las rnams kun ni byed par 'gyur/ /de la 'di bsgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa/ /hUM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas phyag rgya
bzhi bcing ba ji lta ba bzhin du bslabs te/ de bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba bzhin du ras la sogs pa la bri ba dang / lugs ma la sogs pa'i gzugs
thams cad kyi dngos grub ni thun mong ngo / /phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gi rigs 'di la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ ci nas kyang sems can thams cad ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bgyis
kyang dngos grub thams cad thob bar 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ 'jig rten gsum
las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po la byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod kyang legs/ /rdo
rje chos kyang khyod legs so/ /rdo rje las khyod rab tu legs/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ste/ /theg pa chen po mngon
@#/ /'dus pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ rdo rje chen po'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs
so|| ||de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te mkhyen bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' nyon la dbang phyug chen po'i lus 'di khyod kyi rkang pa'i 'og nas
btang bar byos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rungs pa thams
cad 'dul ba'i khro bor dbang bskur nas de bdag gis bskum lags na/ ji ltar de bdag gis btang bar bgyi/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'jig
rten gsum po mtha' dag gis bdag po dbang phyug chen po'i lus kyi srog gso ba'i phyir shi ba'i rnam par shes pa dgug pa'i snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs las phyung ngo //
oM badzra satwa hUM dza/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /gsang ba'i lcags kyu bsdam bya ste/ /tha ma mnyam du brkyang nas kyang / /shi ba'i mgo bor bzhag na ni/ /
srog ni phyir yang thob par 'gyur/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs te/ thal bas khebs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
de nas slar phyin te dbang phyug gi lus der zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ /gang phyir shi
ba'i lus 'di yang / /'tsho ba'i khams su gyur ba yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rkang pa 'degs pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs
so| |oM badzra muH/de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /rdo rje khro bo mdzub legs par/ /zur sprad bsdams te bzhag pa ni/ /rdo rje de dag bsgyur byas shing / /'og nas de dag
'byin par byed/ /de nas de dag gsungs ma thag tu rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po zhabs kyi 'og nas lha chen po thar pa rang gis shes par gyur to/ /de nas dbang phyug chen po'i lus de/ de
bzhin gshegs pa des sos par byin gyis brlabs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyi don dang / ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir nyid kyi rgyal
tshab tu bcug go/ de nas phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil de nas zla ba'i zhabs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya byung ngo / /oM
@#/ /tsan+d+ro trA re sa man+ta b+ha dra ki ra Ni mahA badzri Ni hUM/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/ /mthe bo mthe'u chung mnyam par ni//
mnyam nas legs par brkyang na ni/ /rdo rje'i ri mo zhes kyang grags/ /de nas de byung ma thag tu zhabs kyi mthil de las zla ba'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa de byung nas dbang
phyug chen po de'i mgo bo la phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mnan pa'i rjes su zla ba phyed pa gnas par gyur te g.yon logs na 'dug go /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyis phyag na rdo rje'i grogs su lag tu rdo rje'i mdud rtse byin nas rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa/ rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa zhes rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rdo
rje'i rig pa dam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje mdung rtse des mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar bskor zhing gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa byas nas ched du
brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /zhabs mchog gis ni gar reg pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid du grub pa thob/ /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gi sug par rdo rje stsal te/ phyag na rdo rje nyid du dbang bskur bas lha la sogs te phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs de rnams 'jig rten gsum
las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di la gnas pa'i rim pa bgyis nas/ gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las sems can de rnams phyir mi
ldog par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi gtsug tor 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra satwa uSh+NI Sha hUM phaT/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnams las bcom ldan 'das phyag
na rdo rje'i kha dog du ma'i 'od zer du gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i gtsug gi mtshams su de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi tshul du 'phungs nas 'khod do/ /de nas gzi brjid kyi phung po de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor 'di phyung ngo / /oM sarba ta

thA ga toSh+NI Sha a na a ba lo ki te mUr+d+ha ni te dzo rA shi/ oM hUM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas byang chub sems
@#/ /dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM ni suM b+ha badzra hUM phaT/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyi thugs
las snying po 'di phyung ngo / /oM Tak+ki dzaH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra rat+na ut+ta ma

dz+wA la ya hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHbadzra pad+ma sho d+ha ya sarbaM bi d+yo ta ta ma hUM phaT/ de
nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra karma ut+ta mi badzra d+ha ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha A kaR+Sha ya/ pra
be sha ya/ A be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ sa ma yaM/ gra ha ya/ sarba karmA Ni me ku ru mahA satwa hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rig pa'i dam pas
rang gi snying po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir phul ba/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha badzra bid+yot+ta ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khro
bo'i rig pa'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra shU la/ de nas rdo rje sgyu ma'i rig pa'i rgyal
pos rang gi rig pa'i snying po dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra sa ma ya d+ha ri Sha ya sarbaM hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dril bu'i rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /

oM badzra g+haN+Da ra Na ra Na hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje thub pas rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badzra mo na mahA pradz+nyA hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje mtshon chas rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badzra s+phu d+ha dA
ma ka hUM phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal po rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje 'khyil pa rdo rje khro bos bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la rang gi snying po 'di zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phul lo/ /oM

badzra kuN+Da li mahA badzra kro d+ha gr-ih+Na/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ ba tsa bi d+h+wan sa ya badzre Na mu da naM pa la ya ti b+h+r-i ta sa hr-i da ya badzra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'od rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po

'di phul ba/ oM badzra pra b+ha ma ra ya s+yo ma kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dbyug pa rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po 'di phul lo/ /oM badzra daN+Da ya sarba duSh+TaM mahA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje

khro bo rdo rje ser pos rang gi snying po 'di phul lo/ /oM badzra ping+ga la bi sha ya sarbA duSh+TaM bi mahA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ rdo rje khro bo rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje glang sna tshogs kyi bdag pos

bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la snying po 'di phul lo/ /oM badzra sho d+ha mahA ga Na pa ti rak+Sha sarba duSh+Te b+h+yo/ badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya hUM phaT/ de nas yang rdo rje phreng bas rang gi snying
@#/ /po 'di phul lo/ /oM mA la ga Na pa ti mA la ya A kaR+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya ba shaM ku ru mA ra ya hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dbang gis rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM
badzra ba shi mahA ga Na pa ti ba shaM ku ru hUM phaT/ de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag pos rang gi snying po 'di phul lo/ /oM badzra bi dza ya bi dza ya mahA ga Na pa ti
hUM phaT/ tshogs kyi bdag po rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje tho ba rdo rje pho nyas rang gi snying po 'di phyag na rdo rje la phul lo/ /oM badzra mu sa la ku ru sarba duSh+TaM hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje

rlung gi pho nyas rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badzra nI la mahA be ga ga Na pa ti sarba duSh+TaM hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje me'i pho nyas rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badzra a na la mahA duSh+Ta

dz+wA la ya sarba b+hasmIM ku ru sarba duSh+TaM hUM phaT/ rdo rje 'jigs pa'i pho nya chen pos rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badzra b+hai ra ba badzre hUM da pa sha ya sarbA duSh+Ta na mahA yak+Sha hUM phaT/ pho
nya rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje bran gyis rang gi snying po 'di bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phul lo/ /oM badzra ang+ku sha A kaR+Sha ya/ sarba mahA tsit+ta hUM phaT/ de nas

rdo rje dus kyis rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badzra kA la mahA mr-i t+yu mud+hA da hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dan khrid kyis rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badzra bi nA ya ka s+ya big+h+nan ku ru hUM phaT/ de

nas rdo rje klu'i rdo rjes rang gi snying po 'di phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phul lo/ /oM badzra nA ga badzra A na ya sarba da na dra nre hi R+ya garna ne muk+ta a lang+kA ra b+hi ni sarbo pa kA ra Na

ni badzra d+ha ra sa ma ya ma nusma ra ka ta/ b+hin+da b+hin+da ha ra ha ra prA NAM mahA ts+tshe da hUM phaT/ bran rnams so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs
thams cad 'gugs pa'i dam tshig 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra ang+ku sha ya dza A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ de nas de gzhug pa'i dam tshig 'di gsungs pa/ oM badzra pA shA kaD+D+d+ya hUM/ de
nas thams cad bcing pa gsungs pa/ hUM badzra s+pho Ta baM/ de nas las kyi snying po gsungs pa/ oM badzra karma sa ma ya kri ta/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams
cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad
bus bre/ /de la 'di ni srad du bre ba'i snying po yin no/ /oM sarba badzra sU traM A traM A kaR+Sha ya sarba maN+Da la hUM/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus su yang / /seng ldeng phur bu ba tab nas
ni| |de nas srad bu nyis rim du/ /byas nas de yis srad bu bre/ /de la 'di ni phur bu'i snying po yin no/ /oM badzra kI la ya kI la ya/ /sarba big+h+naM ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ srad bu bzhi dang
@#/ /ldan pa dang / dkyil 'khor zlum po srad bu bre/ /de yi phyi rol byung nas ni/ /nyis 'gyur du ni de bzhin no/ /de yi rim pa gsum du ni/ /phyi rol dkyil
'khor srad bu bre/ /phyogs mtshams 'khor lo'i rtsibs tshul du/ /grwa yi ri mo srad bu bre/ /srang bu bre ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas srad bu bres pa der/ /dag pa'i tshon gyis dgang
bar bya/ /g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis/ /cho ga bzhin du gzung bar bya/ /dang po bris nas phyis ci bder/ /de la 'di ni tshon gyi snying po'o/ /oM badzra rang+ga sa ma ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje
slob dpon yang / /mnyam par bzhag la dbus 'dug nas/ /rdo rje yi ni sgo bzhi rnams/ /yid kyis kyang ni dbye bar bya/ /de la sko dbye ba'i snying po ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra ung+ga
Ta sa ma ya pra be sha ya shI g+h+raM sma ra badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ gser ram yang na dngul yang rung / /sa la rab tu bris pa'am/ /pha gu gru bzhi'i steng du ni/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs
gzhag par bya/ /de la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po ni 'di'o/ /oM sarba bid/ sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du/ /sems dpa' chen po bzhi bzhag go/ /mdun du phyag
na rdo rje ni/ /'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya/ /de la sems dpa' chen po snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya

hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga bA na badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra b+h+r-i ku TI kro d+ha A na ya sarbaM rat+na hrIHhUM phaT/ oM badzra dr-iSh+Ti kro d+ha dr-i Sh+Ta mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra bi shwa kro d+ha ku ru sarba bi shwa rU pa ta ya
sid+d+ha ye hUM phaT/ 'jug gam phyir ni byung ba ni/ /srad bu'i 'og 'dzul yid bsams nas/ /rdo rje shugs su brjod pa ste/ /de yis ri mo brgal bar bya/ /de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying
po ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra bai gA kra ma hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dang por de bzhin du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du/ /rdo rje sgyu ma la sogs bri/ /de la
dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM badzra tsakra hUM/ oM badzra g+haN+Ta hUM/ oM badzra daN+Da ka sha hUM/ oM badzra A yu d+ha hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor
gnyis pa de bzhin te/ /rdo rje 'khyil ba la sogs pa/ /rdo rje khro bo gzhag par bya/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM pra dz+wa li ta dIp+ta badzra hUM/ oM badzra sau me hUM/
oM badzra daN+Da hUM/ oM badzra bi kr-i ta hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /sgo ni bzhi po rnams su yang / /rdo rje glang sna la sogs pa/ /thams cad rim pa bzhin du bri/ /de dag
gi dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM badzra d+ha ma hUM/ oM badzra mA la hUM/ oM badzra ar+tha hUM/ oM badzra a si hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor
@#/ /gsum par bri ba ni/ /ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/ /rdo rje tho ba la sogs pa'o/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM badzra mu sa la hUM/ oM
badzra pA ta hUM/ oM badzra dz+wA la hUM/ oM badzra gra ha hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bar bri ba ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs bran/ /ltag 'og rim pa
bzhin du'o/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM badzra daMSh+Ta hUM/ oM badzra mA ra Na hUM/ oM badzra be ga hUM/ oM badzra ha ra Na hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /phyi
rol dkyil 'khor gzhag pa ni/ /ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/ /ma mo thams cad bri bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje sgo bzhir yang / /sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas rab tu
bshad pa ni/ /cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin pa'o/ /de nas 'jig rten gsum po'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i las kun byas te/ rdo rje
slob dpon nyid rdo rje khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te 'di skad bsgo zhig /ngas khyod la rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ de khyod kyis su la yang ma sma shig/
mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas te dmyal bar lhung nga re zhes bsgo ste/ mna'i snying po 'di sbyin no/ /rdo rje khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya yang ston cig /gal te dam
tshig las 'das na/ /rdo rje khro bo chen po yi/ /dam tshig khyod kyi rigs sreg pas/ /klad pa nas ni brtsams nas kyang / /lus rnams ma rungs par yang byed/ /dam tshig
bcing ba'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'dis bcing ngo / /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+hA ra/ gr-ih+Na ban d+ha sa ma ya hUM/ de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad
do| |lag gnyis zla 'og gnyis su btang / /mthe bo mthe'u chung sbrel ba dang / /las kyi phyag rgya dam tshig 'di/ /rdo rje bcing ba zhes kyang bshad/ /de nas rdo rje'i chus dbang bskur
te| |snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM badzra a b+hi She ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa badzra d+hA ra ta sa ma gra graM/ de nas g.yogs pas gdong g.yogs te/ snying po 'dis gzhug go/ /oM badzra pra be sha ya/
badzra A be sha ya/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha badzra hUM/ de nas bcug nas snying po 'dis me tog gtor ro/ /oM pra tIts+tsha a d+hi tiSh+Tha badzra hoH/ de nas de dag gang lhung ba de 'dis 'grub par 'gyur
ro| |de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol nas dkyil 'khor go rims bzhin du bstan te/ lha gang yin pa de ni de la mi bstan to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can log par lta
ba dag yod de/ gang dag ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan rnams kyi ye shes gdon mi za ba ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rigs su phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba de bzhin
@#/ /gshegs pa nyid dam zhes dad par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa ni dam tshig go/ /gzhan du na lha gang dag la dad pa de dag la mna'i snying po 'di byin nas
bstan par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i rin po che'i mtshan ma'i phreng bas dbang bskur nas las kyi rdo rje lag pa gnyis su byin la/ rdo rje'i ming btags te ji ltar rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor
chen po bzhin du bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba la bslab bo/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/ /mthe bong nang du sbyar nas ni/ /mdzub mo bkug nas gnyi gas bkab/ /sems
dpa'i gtsug tor zhes bya'o/ /rdo rje bcing ba byas nas ni/ /mthe bo gung mo mthe'u chung bsgreng / /gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ste/ /gzi brjid chen po'i btsun pa'o/ /rdo rje phyag rgya
gnyis bcings te/ /mthe bo mthe'u chung sbrel ba ni/ /dam du lcags kyu bcings pa ste/ /rig pa chen po dam pa'i 'o/ /rig pa chen po dam pa yi/ /phyag rgya bcings nas rab
bcing ba/ /snying gar mthe bo'i ngos kyis so/ /sems dpa' yi ni snying por bshad/ /de nyid las gung mo srin lag /sor mo rab tu bsdams nas ni/ /rdo rje rin chen tshul du
ni| |bsgyur nas gdong du gzhag par bya/ /de nyid bskyed de bzhag nas ni/ /snying gar yang ni bsgyur bar bya/ /me tog bzhi pa zhes bya ste/ /pad+ma'i rig pa dam pa'o/ /de nyid

spyi bo nas brtsams te/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'di/ /rdo rje las ni rab bsgrub pa'o/ /sems ma'i rdo rje dam byas te/ /mthe'u chung rdo rje bsgreng ba ni//
thams cad rig pa'i snying po 'di/ /phyag rgya 'di ni thams cad sgrub/ /mthe bo mthe'u chung bcings nas ni/ /g.yon pa'i sor mo dbus ma gsum/ /rtse gsum pa ni dbus ma'i rtse/ /rdo
rje phyag rgya gzung ba ste/ /rdo rje rig pa dam pa 'di/ /rdo rje mdung zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas rab tu bshad pa ni/ /sgyu ma rdo rje la sogs brtags/ /rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/ /g.yon
ba'i rdo rje bcang bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad de/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni kun gyi 'di'o/ /rdo rje de ni gnyis byas te/ /mtshan ma kun kyang des bzhag go/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni thams
cad kyi/ /phyag rgya rnams kyang 'byung ba ste/ /sor brkyang steng du gzhag pa dang / /mdzub mos mtheb bstan sbyar ba dang / /oM zhes bya ba spyir bzhag nas/ /rdo rje steng du bzhag pa'o/ /
rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs rnams so/ /rab tu brkyang nas lag gnas pa/ /lag pa'i rgyab tu de bzhin te/ /khu tshur bcangs bzhag lag ngar bskum/ /kha yi phyogs
su bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so/ /g.yon pa'i mthe bo steng du bzhag /phreng ba'i bcing ba'i thabs su sbyar/ /nor sbyin par ni g.yas pa ste/ /ral gri'i
@#/ /phyag rgya khu tshur mchog/ 'dus pa'i dbang po'i phyag rgya chen po 'dus pa'o/ /g.yas pa mdun tu gtun rings 'dzin/ /lag pa brkyang pa'ang de bzhin
te| g.yas pa'i 'od ni 'bar bar bstan/ /rdo rje khu tshur bskyod par bya/ /pho nya'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs so/ /bsgyings bcas mdzub mo'i khar mche ba/ /dbyug pa bsnun cing
gnas pa dang / /dpung pa bskum zhing dbyung ba dang / /g.yas pa g.yon gyis 'dren pa'o/ /bran gyi phyag rgya'i tshogs chen po'o/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu bstan pa ni/ /g.yon pa'i
rdo rje gzur nas so/ /de nas rab tu bshad pa ni/ /sgrub pa dang ni las nyid do/ /sems dpa' gang gi phyag rgya gang / /de ni bdag nyid nyid kyis kyang / /bdag nyid goms par
gyur na ni/ /phyag rgya dam par 'grub par 'gyur/ /gtsug tor chen po bsrung ba che/ /gzi brjid phung po rab grub ster/ /rdo rje hUM zhes bya kun byed/ /snying gar gzhag pa thams
cad 'gugs/ sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya rnams so/ /thams cad rig pa thams cad 'grub/ /rdo rje rig pa dam pa'o/ /rdo rje mdung ni phyag rgya che/ /grub pa chen po sbyin par byed/ /
sgyu ma'i rdo rje rab 'grub ster/ /dril bu yis ni yang dag 'bebs/ /dbyug pa'i shing gis mya ngan 'da'/ /rdo rje'i rdo rje gsong bar byed/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rnams so/ /'bar
ba'i mchog ni ma rungs 'dul/ /zhi ba'i mchog ni thams cad gsod/ /dbyug pa'i mchog ni gsod pa ste/ /'jigs pa'i mig ni skrag par byed/ /rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya rnams so/ /
myos pas rab tu myos par byed/ /phreng ba kun ni byed par bshad/ /'dod byed dga' bar byed pa ste/ /gsod pa thams cad gsod pa'o/ /tshogs kyi phyag rgya rnams so/ /tho ba gdug
ba 'joms pa ste/ /ras kyi rgyu ras de bzhin te/ /'bar ba'i mchog ni gdug pa sreg/ gnod sbyin ma ni gdon 'bod do/ /pho nya'i phyag rgya rnams so/ /rdo rje'i mche ba za ba ste/ /gsod
pa thams cad gsod ma'o/ /bgegs byed ma ni rab tu bgegs/ /'phrog ma yang ni thams cad 'phrog/ bran gyi phyag rgya rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i
dam tshig chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs
so| |oM badzra ba si tre swAhA/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra d+ha ri hUM/ badzra bi kra me hUM phaT/ yang byang chub
@#/ /sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra rat+na go tri swA hA/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'
chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra pad+ma ne tre swA hA/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di
gsungs so/ /oM badzra karma ka re swAhA/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra shU la gre
swAhA/ /de nas rdo rje sgyu ma rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra tsa kre hUM/ rdo rje dril bus smras pa/ oM badzra g+haN+Ta ke hUM/ thub pa'i rdo rjes smras pa/

oM badzra dan+ta kASh+The hUM/ rdo rje mtshon chas smras pa/ oM badzre hUM/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje 'khyil ba rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po'i dam tshig
gi phyag rgya 'di smras so/ /oM badzra le hUM/ de nas rdo rje 'od kyis smras pa/ oM badzra sau me hUM/ de nas rdo rje dbyig pas smras pa/ oM badzra daN+Da hUM/ rdo rje ser smug gis smras pa/ oM
badzra bi ShA Ni hUM/ rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje glang snas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya smras pa/ /oM badzra me de hUM/ rdo rje phreng bas smras pa/ oM

badzra mA le hUM/ rdo rje dbang gis smras pa/ oM badzra a b+hi She hUM/ rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rjes smras pa/ oM badzra a pa rA dzi ta hUM/ rdo rje tshogs kyis bdag po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams

so| |de nas rdo rje gtun rings kyis rang gi dam tshig phyag rgya rnams smras pa/ oM badzra mu sa la gra he hUM/ de nas rdo rje rlung gi smras pa/ oM badzra bA te hUM/ rdo rje mes smras pa/ oM badzra dz+wa

le hUM/ rdo rje 'jigs pas smras pa/ oM badzra gra he hUM/ rdo rje pho nya'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyus smras pa/ oM badzra daMSh+Te hUM/ rdo rje dus kyis smras pa/ oM

badzra ba she hUM/ rdo rje dan khrid kyis smras pa/ oM badzra big+h+na na hUM/ rdo rje klus smras pa/ oM badzra ha ri Ni hUM/ rdo rje bran gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so/ /de nas yang phyag ni rdo rjes rdo
rje'i rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /grwa bzhi pa la byang phyogs sgo/ /phyi rol dkyil
'khor srad bus bre/ /de yi nang du der yang ni/ /de bzhin sgo ni shar phyogs gdong / /de yi dbus su ci rigs par/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzhag par bya/ /'jig rten gsum
rgyal la sogs pa/ /bzhi po de yi phyogs kun bzhag /dkyil 'khor de bzhin gtso bo yang / /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bri bar bya/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rigs kyi phyag
@#/ /rgya bri bar bya/ /rdo rje glang sna la sogs pa/ /bzhi po rnams ni sgo srung ngo / /'jigs ma dpal dang sgra dbang dang / /dur ga g.yon pa'i grwa rnams nas/ phyi
yi grwa rnams phyag rgya ni/ /de rnams nyid ni bri bar bya/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor rnams su ni/ /lha mo rnams ni bri bar bya/ /de nas cho ga rgyas pa'i rnams/ /ji bzhin par ni bshad par
bya| |de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'dir ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byas te rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dam tshig gi las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i cho ga bzhin
du bcings la khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba su'i mdun du yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya de rnams ma smra zhig /gsang ba'i 'phel bar ma byed cig ces bsgo zhig /de nas
las kyi rdo rje de rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i steng du bzhag ste cho ga bzhin du tshug cig/ zhugs nas rdo rje de de bzhin du bor cig/ gang la bab pa de de'i dam tshig gi phyag
rgya'i dbang du 'gyur te/ des las thams cad byed do/ /de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol nas dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bstan te/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba smros
shig/ dam tshig phyag rgya 'di khyod kyi/ /rtag tu las kun byed pa ste/ /ma dang sring mo rnams dang ni/ /chung ma bu mo 'dra ba'o/ /de la de'i snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /
oM sarba ga ma ni sarba bAk+t+re sA d+ha ya gu h+ya badzri Ni hUM phaT/ 'di lan cig bzlas pas bud med thams cad dbang du byas te spyad na chos ma yin par mi 'gyur ro/ /ci dga' bar thams cad
spyad nas bsgrub par bya ste/ de nas sems can thams cad dag par phyag rgya thams cad yid kyis shes nas las dam pa thams cad kyang byed do/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
'chang pas gsungs so/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o/ /dam tshig khro bo mdzub btsug dang / /snying gar yang ni bsdam par bya/ /ngos kyi mdzod spu kha nas
drang / /spyi bor bzhag nas gnyis su bya/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo yis/ /mdung rtse rtse gsum mnan par bya'o/ /'di bcings pas ni yang dag par/ /rig pa dam pa'ang
'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad kyi/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje gtso bor 'dus/ /dam tshig cho ga ji bzhin par/ /phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya/ /thams cad
'khor lo mdzub rtse bcum/ /dril bu phyag rgya'ang de bzhin no/ /de bzhin oM gyi phyag rgya dang / /seng+ge'i rna par bya ba ste/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya rnams so/ /'bar ba
kun tu 'dzin pa dang / /'od ni yang dag 'dus pa nyid/ /dbyug pa'i khu tshur 'dzin pa dang / /kha 'gram phyag rgya bskor ba'o/ /khro bo'i dam tshig rnams so/ /gtum
@#/ /pa'i phyag rgya phreng ba dang / /rdo rje mnan nas mdud pa yin/ /spyi bor bzhag pa tshogs kyi ste/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni bsrung ba'o/ /tshogs rnams kyi
dam tshig go/ lag pa bskum pa khar bzhag ste/ /rgyab tu yang ni bskor par bya/ /'bar ba me stag gtong ba ste/ /phye nas khar yang gnas par bya/ /pho nya mo'i dam tshig
rnams so/ /mtha' ma gnyis ni khar bcug dang / /btsir cing rab tu gnon pa'o/ /dpung pas snol bas bsnol ba dang / myur du 'phrog pa'ang de bzhin no/ /bran mo rnams
kyi dam tshig go/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho
ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje dbyings kyi byin
gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra bid/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi chos kyi dam
tshig 'di gsungs so/ /oM ha na ha na badzra hUM phaT/ de nas yang rdo rje snying pos rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/ /oM ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ de nas yang rdo rje spyan
gyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/ /oM ma ra ma ra hUM phaT/ de nas yang rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/ /oM ku ru ku ru hUM phaT/ de nas
rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/ /oM hUM hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje sgyu mas smras pa/ oM ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM A bi sha A bi sha hUM phaT/ oM b+hur

b+hu ba swaHhUM phaT/ oM b+hin+da b+hin+da hUM phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi'o/ /oM da ma da ma hUM phaT/ oM mA ra ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya hUM phaT/ oM b+ha ya b+ha ya hUM phaT/

khro bo rnams kyi'o/ /oM d+ha ma d+ha ma hUM phaT/ oM ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ oM ba shAM b+ha ba hUM phaT/ oM dza ya dza ya hUM phaT/ tshogs rnams kyi'o/ /oM b+h+yo b+h+yo hUM phaT/ oM g+hu g+hu hUM phaT/

oM dz+wA la dz+wA la hUM phaT/ oM khA da khA da hUM phaT/ pho nya rnams kyi'o/ /oM kha na kha na hUM phaT/ oM ma ra ma ra hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ oM pi b+ha bi b+ha hUM phaT/ bran mo rnams kyi'o//
de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor de/ /
'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs/ /thams cad snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /chos kyi dkyil
@#/ /'khor tshul lta bu/ /snying gar mtshan ma yang dag bzhag/ de nas 'di'i chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga bzhin du las byas nas
rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu bcangs pa bcings te 'di skad smros shig/ khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba dang / lha'i rigs ma mthong ba su la yang ma smra zhig ces
bsgo la dril bu dkrol du chug cig/ 'di skad bsgos nas kyang mna'i snying po byin la/ ji ltar dril bu 'di dkrol ba'i/ /de'i sgra ji ltar mi rtag pa/ /de bzhin las kyi rdo rje
khyod/ /mi rtag par ni ma rungs byed/ /rdo rje slob dpon bsti stang med/ /rdo rje grogs dang mi mdza' dang / gdug la byams dang skyo bar ni/ /gal te khyod kyis byas na'o/ /
de nas gdong g.yogs dkrol la/ /dkyil 'khor bstan te/ chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes slobs shig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs/ /chos kyi dkyil
'khor ji bzhin no/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid bsam pa/ /rdo rje rig pa dam pa ste/ /'gro ba 'di dag sgyu ma bzhin/ /de bzhin sdug bsngal dril bu 'dra/ /sdug bsngal
thams cad mya ngan 'da'/ /rdo rje 'joms pa bla na med/ /rig pa'i rgyal po ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /sems can gdul phyir khro bo'i mchog/ zhi ba yis ni nges par
gsod/ /dbyug pa 'dra la 'chog par byed/ /log par lta ba 'jigs par byed/ /khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /ra ro 'dra bar dpa' ba med/ /phreng ba 'dra bar 'ching ba med/ /
bud med 'dod pas 'gro dbang byed/ /brtan pa tsam gyis gzhan pha ma mo/ /tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /'tshog pa'i chad pa'i mchog yin te/ /reg pa rnams ni rlung gi'o/ /
gzi brjid can ni byin za mchog/ zas rnams kyi nang khrag dam pa/ /pho nya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /mtshe ba dag par zhugs pa ste/ /'chi bdag thams cad gnas na 'dug /
'jigs las lhag pa'i bgegs gzhan med/ /chu las lhag pa'i ro gzhan med/ /bran gyi ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog
ba'i rgyal po chen po las/ rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig las 'byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs
so| |oM badzra karma pra brta ni sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra bi lA se pU dzA ya
@#/ /hUM/ de nas rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM a b+hi She ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ de nas rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/
oM badzra gI te gA hi hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi rig pa 'di gsungs pa/ oM badzra nr-i tra N+r-i t+ye hUM/ de nas rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi

las kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra bid+yo t+ta ma ne tra bi ku ra ba bi ku ra ba hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje khro bo rdo rje me'i lha mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras pa/ oM badzra kro d+ha

badzra ag+ne dz+wa la tri shU la n+bi na hr-i da ya badzri Ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje gser lha chen mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/ /oM badzra he ma ts+tshin+da tsa kre Na badzra Ni hUM phaT/ de nas
rdo rje gzhon nu mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/ /oM badzra ku mA ri shI g+h+raM A be sha ya gaN+TA shab+de na badzra pA Ni pri ye badzra sa ma ye ma nu sma ra Na hUM phaT/ de nas lha mo

chen mo rdo rje zhi bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/ /oM badzra shAn+ti dza pa dza pa a g+ha mA la ya sarbA na mA ra ya shAn+ta tri h+ye hUM phaT/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje khu tshur gyis

rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/ /oM badzra muSh+Ti ha na ha na badzra b+hi na d+ha b+hin d+ha pi Ta ya/ pi Ta ya/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta hr-i da yA ni oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal mo rnams

kyi'o/ /de nas rdo rje mi 'ching ba khro bos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/ /oM badzra a mr-i te sarba duSh+Ta g+h+r-ih+Na ban+d+ha ha na sarba bi d+haM sa ye/ bi nA sha ya ts+tshin+da ba bi ku ru mu t+ta ni/ ta ya badzre

Na ye ke tsit+ma ma mu ka ra bi na yA ka tan+ta ma dI p+ta kro d+ha badzri hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje mdangs can gyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/ /oM badzra kan+ti mAr ya sau me rU pa pra ti ba ta ra ge

na shI g+h+raM s+pho Ta ya badzra d+ha ra t+ye na mahA dz+yo sna kA ra le shI ta rasmi badzri Ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dbyug pa'i mchog mas rang gi las kyi snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badzra daN+Ta gr-i g+hA ta ya hUM phaT/ de

nas rdo rje tsong tsong khro bo chen mos rang gi las kyi da tshig 'di smras so/ /oM badzra mA le me kha le kha na kha na sha pa ba da ni ba shi ku ru traM daM Sh+Te mA ra ya bi sha ne hUM phaT/ khro bo'i rig pa

rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje 'ju mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badzra ba la ye me ts+tshin+da sin b+hin+da badzri Ni mA ra ya u mo da ya bi ba pi ba hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje zas kyis rang gi

las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badzra a sha ne pa kr-i ya sarba duSh+Ta badzra nga sha ne sha ga ti d+ha ra Ni ma nu sha ma nu sha ma na se a ha re Na ra ru ti sa shu ta tsi pra sa ya ma dza ba sA nu le pa na

bi le ba ta gra tre/ a na ya sarba dan+t+ya n+ya ya hi ra Na ya hi ra Na ya si bar+Na A di ni gra ma ya de ba rak+Sha Ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje bgo bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badzra bA sa ni A

@#/ /na ya sarba sra an+na ba Na di n+yu ba ka ra Na ni shI g+h+rAM ba shA ku ru dI pa de me pra yats+tsha A bi sha sa t+yaM ka ta ya badzra ko Sha d+ha ra Ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dbang gis rang gi

las kyi dam tshig smras so/ /oM badzra ba shi A na ya ba shI ku ru sarba pri ya sarba bu ru Sha na da si ku ru krud+daM pra se da ya sarba b+h+yaH ba ha re b+h+yo ha ra ya bi tsa ra ya ka ri badzra pa ta kad+hA ra

NI hUM phaT/ rdo rje tshogs kyi'o/ /de nas rdo rje pho nya mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras so/ /oM badzra du Sh+Ti A na ya sarba maN+Da la ma pra be sha ya A be sha ya ban+d+ha ya sarba karma Na me ku

ru shI g+h+raM shI g+h+raM la gu la gu tra sa ya mA ra ya/ da bya bar b+h+yo d+ha ra ya bi dza yaM ka ri badzra pa ta ka d+hA ra NI hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje shugs kyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM be

g+ha badzri Na g+hu g+hu g+hu g+hu sha ba de mA ra ya bi g+hi ra bi d+h+waM sa ya badzra pA sha d+hA ra NI hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'bar bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras pa/ oM badzra dz+wA la ya dz+wA la

ya sarba badzra dz+wA la ya dz+wA la ya da ha da ha b+hasmi ku ru hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'jigs mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badzra bi ga te pra be ka draM Sh+TA ka rA li bi sha na bA ka tra shI

g+h+raM shI g+h+raM A ba sha ya bak+Sha ya ru b+hi raM bi pa mahA yak+Shi Ni badzra pA sha d+ha ra Ni hUM phaT/ rdo rje pho nya mo rnams kyi'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i bzhin rdo rje bran mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras

so/ /oM badzra muSh+Ti A na ya badzra daMSh+Ti ba ya ni ke pa tA la ni ba se ni kha na kha na khA hi khA hi sarba mu khe pra be sha ya s+pho Ta ya mA ra mA ra Ni sarba duSh+Ta nAM badzri Ni shi ta si d+ha ri NI hUM phaT/ de nas

rdo rje dus mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badzra kA li ma hA pre ta ru ba ni ma nu Sha mAM sa ru d+hi ra pri ye e h+ye hi gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ b+hak+Sha ya badzra TA ki nI badzra shraM kha le sarba de ba ga Na mA tri

b+hu te ha ra ha ra pra NAM/ a mu ka s+ya ka pA la mA lA laM kr-i ta sarba ka ye kits+tshi ra ya si badzra kha T+wAM kha d+hA ri NI pre ta ma nu Sha sha rI ra shI g+h+raM A be sha ya pra be sha ya ban+d+ha ya ba shi ku ru mA ra ya

badzra rak+Sha si hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje bskul mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/ /oM badzra pU ta me ma nu Sha ya ma na sa sarba ru d+hi ra mu tra pu rI Sha sha li smA shI g+h+raM na re ka to

gar+b+ha hi ra N+ya yA hI shI g+h+raM i dam mu ka s+ya ku ru badzra sho d+ha ni ka d+hA ra Ni sar+b+ba kar+m+ma Ni me ku ru swAhA/ hUM/ de nas rdo rje ma ka ras rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badzra ma ka re gra sa

gra sa shI g+h+raM pra be sha ya pA tA laM b+hak+Sha ya badzra ma ka ra d+hA ra NI hUM phaT/ rdo rje bran mo rnams kyi'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di
gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/ /dkyil 'khor
@#/ /mchog ni thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas dbus na bzhugs par bya/ /de dag phyogs su rim par yang / /sems dpa' chen po rnams bzhag go/ de yi
dbus su chung mar bcas/ /rdo rje rig pa dam pa nyid/ /rdo rje lA s+ye la sogs gsang / /gar gyi mchod la sogs pas mchod/ /de la lha mo'i go rims bzhin/ /'khor lo'i
dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin du/ /rang gi phyag rgya phyag rgya 'dra/ /gar byed par yang bri bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje can mchod phyir/ /rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis so/ /grwa dang sgo yi phyogs
rnams su/ /bdug pa la sogs rim pa bzhin/ /de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji lta
ba bzhin bcings te/ 'di skad smros shig /khyod kyis lha'i rim pa ma mthong ba dang / las mi shes pa su la 'ang gsang ba'i las 'di ma smra zhig/ khyod dam tshig nyams
par gyur ta re zhes smros shig/ rdo rje slob dpon rang gi las kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing 'di skad brjod do/ /oM badzra satwa R+ya A
be sha ya pra be sha ya nr-i te ba ya sar+b+ba kar+m+ma sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha hUM/ AHhUM a la la la badzri/ de nas yang bdag la babs nas bdag nyid kyis 'jug ste/ phyag rgya dang 'dra
ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyi gar gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o/ /de phyin chang lus dang / ngag dang / lta ba dang / yid dang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyi las thams cad 'dod pa bzhin byed
pa'o| |de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te/ gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes slobs shig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyi/ /dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas te/ /rdo rje
rig pa dam pa la/ /rdo rje la s+ye la sogs mchod/ /rig pa 'di rnams thams cad kyang / ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du/ /gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor
mchod par bya/ /rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis ni/ /phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus so/ /dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas nas/ /las kyi phyag rgya dgrol bar bya/ /gar gyi mchod pa 'di yis
ni| |gtso bo thams cad mchod na ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa che sogs kyi/ /las grub par yang nges par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po
las/ rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs de dag thams
cad sems can thams cad kyi don du bskos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu bzhag ste/ mkhyen bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
@#/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gsang ba thams cad 'dzin par dbang bskur na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba de gang lags /
bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/ /ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba/ /de lta de ltar sems can don/ /'dod chags la sogs
gtsang bas bya/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /sems can thams cad phan phyir dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'i phyir/ /sems can
thams cad bsad kyang ni/ /sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi nor bu gsang ba'i 'di gsungs so/ /sems can thams cad phan
phyir dang / /sangs rgyas don du sbyor ba yis/ /pha rol nor rnams phrogs kyang ni/ /sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi pad+ma'i
gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /'dod chags 'dra ba'i bde ba med/ /rgyal ba la ni de phul la/ /gzhan gyi chung ma sems can phyir/ /bsten pas bsod nams thob par 'gyur/ /
de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /sems can thams cad phan phyir dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa yi/ /las rnams
thams cad byas pa yis/ /bsod nams shin tu mang po rnyed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rdo rje
'chang ba la legs so zhes bstod pa/ legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /mdo 'di
legs par smras ba ste/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus
pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// //bam po drug pa/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi bdag po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis
gsol ba btab pa/ /pad+mo'i sems dpa' pad+mo che/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dbang phyug che/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bstan pa'i mchog/ rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
@#/ /chos kyi rgyal po dag pa che/ /sems dpa'i rgyal po blo gros che/ /pad+ma'i bdag nyid pad+ma che/ /pad+ma'i mgon khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i
'od/ /pad+mo dag par rab dga' byed/ /rdo rje pad+ma pad mchog lus/ /pad+ma pad+ma khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sna tshogs chen po snang ba che/ /dgos pa chen po che dang mtshungs/ /brtan pa
chen po dpa' ba che/ /dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can bsam pa theg pa che/ /rnal 'byor chen po mes po che/ /bde za bde byed dag pa'i don/ /sangs rgyas
pad+ma khyod phyag 'tshal/ /chos de nyid don dam pa'i chos/ /dag pa'i chos ni chos rab 'dzin/ /chos chen shin tu chos mchog pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /
sangs rgyas sems dpa' sems mchog gtso/ /chos kyi sems dpa' chos mchog 'dzin/ /sems dpa' dam pa sems mchog 'dzin/ /sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod
phyag 'tshal/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang mtshon pa'i mchog/ mgon po chen po rnam gzigs gtso/ /'jig rten snang ba 'jig rten don/ /'jig rten mgon po khyod phyag
'tshal/ /'jig rten yi ge yi ge che/ /yi ge mchog ni yi ge 'dra/ /yi ge yi ge thams cad gzigs/ /'khor lo'i yi ge khyod phyag 'tshal/ /phyag na pad+ma pad chen po/ /
dbugs 'byin pa ni sbyin pa po/ /sangs rgyas chos ni sangs rgyas che/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzugs chen po/ /rdo rje'i gzugs ni gzugs
bzang ldan/ /chos kyi snang ba gzi brjid mchog/ 'jig rten snang khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+ma'i dpal ni mgon po gtso/ /chos dpal mgon po mgon ldan pa/ /tshangs pa'i
mgon po tshangs chen po/ /tshangs sras khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snang ba'i snang mchog snang ba'i gtso/ /snang gsal shin tu snang ba po/ /snang ba'i mgon po mgon po che/ /sangs
rgyas snang khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dbang bskur sangs rgyas mchog/ sangs rgyas sras po mkhas chen po/ /sangs rgyas dbang bskur gtsug gi mchog/ sangs rgyas
khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spyan ni spyan chen po/ /chos spyan gzigs pa chen po yis/ /ting 'dzin ye shes thams cad pa/ /rdo rje spyan khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag
nyid kun gyi yon tan 'di/ /khyod ni mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad rnams/ /bstod nas goms par byed pa na/ /'jig rten dbang po thob par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo khyod la gsol gdab
pa/ /rang gi rigs rnams bskyed nas kyang / /chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni/ /thub pa chen pos bshad par gsol/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan
@#/ /ras gzigs dbang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin
gshegs pa gal ba der mngon du phyogs te/ 'dug nas rdo rje pad+mo de rang gi thugs kar bzhag ste/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o rab tu dag pa ni/ /bdag gi
rdo rje pad+mo 'di/ /pha yin 'di ni bdag gi bu/ /rigs 'di byin gyis brlab par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos
kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i pad+mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /hrIHde nas de byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas pad+ma lta bu'i
'od zer kha dog dang / gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam dang / 'od rnam pa du ma byung ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par
dag pa dang / chos nyid kyi ye shes yang dag par sbyangs nas yang slar log ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i thugs kar zhugs so/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra pad+mo t+ta ma hrIH/ de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra bid+yA hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos
rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra rat+not+ta ma tri/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa dI gsungs so/ /
oM badzra bit+yot+ta ma hrIH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra bid+yot+ta ma aH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gzugs thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i dam tshig
ces bya ba'i rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra hUM hrIHho /de nas de smras ma thag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
'dzin pa de nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i gzugs 'dzin pa pad+ma la bzhugs te/ phyag rgya'i mtshan ma pad+mo 'dzin pa'i kha dog dang / gzugs dang / cha
@#/ /lugs dang / rgyan sna tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen
po'i lus su gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad ji ltar 'dul bar so so'i gzugs su bstan nas ma lus pa lus med pa'i
sems can gyi khams gdul bar byas te/ yang slar log nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i
phyogs thams cad kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la 'khod nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /thabs ni snying rje bdag nyid
de| |gang du thabs kyis 'dul mdzad na/ /lnga rnams su yang 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs kyi dbang pos rang gi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / don dang / grub pa
dam pa dang / rdo rje chos nyid dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir phul nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor
chen po 'di bshad do/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ /'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ste/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /
rta babs bzhis ni brgyan pa dang / /srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ /dar dang phreng bas brgyan pa dang / /dkyil 'khor grwa ni thams cad dang / /sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /
rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan par/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor srang bu bre/ /de yi nang du srad bu ni/ /gru bzhi par ni bre bar bya/ /gnyis pa'i grwa ni sgo gdod cing / /pad+ma 'dra bar bya ba yin//
ka ba brgyad kyi tshul du ni/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri/ /de yi ge sar dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gzugs bzhag/ de la sangs rgyas gzhag pa'i snying po ni 'di yin no/ /
bud+d+ha hUM/ sangs rgyas phyogs kun bri ba ni/ /pad+ma'i dbus su gnas pa yi/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang / /sna tshogs pad+ma'ang de bzhin no/ /de la de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no/ /
oM hUM hrIHkr-i/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /der ni spyan ras gzigs dbang bri/ /gzugs rnams thams cad 'byin pa ste/ /de yi
phyogs ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje 'gying la sogs tshul du sangs rgyas la sogs sems dpa' che/ /mtshan ma pad+ma 'chang ba bri/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ /A
@#/ /oM ta thA ga ta d+harma hUM/ oM badzra pad+ma aM ku sha ko Sha d+hA ra badzra satwa hUM phaT/ oM mA ra ya mA ra ya pad+ma ku su ma yA yu d+ha d+ha ra a mo g+ha sha ra ho/ oM pad+ma
saM b+ha pad+ma hasta sA d+hu hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de bzhin te/ /de yi dbus su bri ba ni/ /thor tshugs dbus na'ang de bzhin gshegs/ /de
yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /khro gnyer la sogs tshul du ni/ /mtshan mar pad+ma 'chang bre ba/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin bya/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin

no| |hUM/ oM pad+ma b+h+r-i ku Ti Ti Ti tra/ oM pad+ma sUR+ya dz+wA la hUM/ oM pad+ma ma Ni ke tu d+ha ra/ tsan+d+ra pra ha da la a ba lo ki te shwa ra de hi me sar+b+ba ar+t+ta na shI g+h+raM sa ma ya hUM/ oM pad+ma
aT+Ta hA sa e ka daR+sha mu ka ha ha ha ha hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor gsum pa'ang de bzhin te/ /sems dpa' chen po snyoms zhugs par/ /pad+ma'i
steng du bzhugs par bri/ /de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin bya/ /pad+ma la sogs tshul du ni/ /sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bzhag/
de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /hrIH/oM tA rA pad+ma a ba lo ka ya mA ma sa ma ya satwa hUM/ oM pad+ma ku mA ra pad+ma shak+ti d+ha ra kha Da ge na ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/

oM pad+ma nI la kaN+Tha sha ra ka tsa kra ga ta pad+ma pA Ni bya g+h+ra ha tsarma Ni ba sa ni kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta ya dz+nyo pa bA ti a dzi nar+m+ma pa tsa tsan+tod/ d+ha ri ya nA rA ya Na ru pa d+ha re tr-i ni mu kha aT+Ta T+Ta hA sa na pra be

sha ya sa ma ya na/ de hi me sid+d+hi a ba lo ki te shwa ra hUM/ oM brah+ma pad+ma saM b+ha ba dza pa dza pa pad+ma p+ta sha hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'ang de bzhin te/ /der
ni pad+ma zhal bzhi pa/ /pad+ma mdung rtse thogs par bri/ /de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje gar la sogs tshul du/ /mtshan ma pad+ma 'dzin bri ba/ /sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga bzhin/ /

de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /hriH/ oM pad+ma na rte shwa ra nA tha pU dza ya sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma sa ma ya A kaR+Sha ya pra pe sha ya ban+d+ha ya A be sha ya sarba karma sid+d+hi me pra ya ts+tsha a ba lo ki te

shwa raM hUM/ oM ba ya na d+ha ta da a ba lo ki te shwa ra rak+Sha ban+d+ha ya ka ba tsa sa ma ye hUM/ oM mahA pra tsaN+Di bi shwa rU pa tsi ka/ pad+ma daMSh+Ta A ka rA la bi shwa na badzra hri da ya sarba pad+ma yak+Sha khA da

khA da d+hik+d+hi k+d+hi k+d+hi ke/ oM pad+ma muSh+Ti sa ma ya s+t+waM ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /grwa rnams kun tu bri ba ni/ /rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs tshul/ /pad+ma sgeg mo la sogs
lha| |de dag gi ni phyag rgya 'di rnams so/ /oM pad+ma lA s+ye rA ga ya mahA de bi rA ga mahA pU dzA sa ma ya hUM/ oM pad+ma mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ a b+hi She ka pU dzA sa ma ye hUM/ oM pad+ma gI
@#/ /te gI te pU dzA sa ma ya hUM/ oM pad+ma nai wa d+ye sarba pU dza pra brta na sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor gra rnams su/ /pad+ma'i mchod
pa la sogs bzhi/ /mchod pa'i lha mo rnams bri'o/ /de la de dag gi mchod pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM pad+ma d+hU pe pU dzA sa ma ye pra hA da ya pad+ma ku la de yi te mahA

ga Ni pad+ma ra ti hUM/ oM pad+ma pUSh+pe pU dzA sa ma ye pad+ma bA si ni mahA shri ye pad+ma ku la pra ti ha ra sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ya hUM/ oM pad+ma dI pa pU dzA sa ma ye pad+ma ku la sun+da ri mahA du t+ya A lo ka

badzra pa tsi na ya pad+ma sa ra swa te hUM/ oM pad+ma gan+d+ha pU dzA sa ma ye mahA pad+ma ku la tsi te ku ru sarba karmA Ni me pad+ma sid+d+hi hUM/ de nas pad+ma'i sgo bzhi po/ /kun tu tshogs sogs ji bzhin du//
ji lta ba bzhin legs bri ba/ /de dag snying po'i don gyis ni/ /ji bzhin par ni bri bar bya/ /oM ha ya grI ba mahA pad+ma aM ku sha ya A kaR+Sha ya shI g+h+rAM sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma la

pad+ma aM ku sha d+hA ra hUM dzaH/ oM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya pra be sha ya mahA pa shu pa ti ya ma ba ru Na ku be ra pra h+ma sha d+hA ra pad+ma ku la sa ma yAM hUM hUM/ oM pad+ma s+pho Ta s+pho Ta

ban+d+ha sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma yAM shI g+h+raM hUM baM/ oM ShaM mu kha sa na d+ha ku mA ra be sha d+ha ra pad+ma g+haN+Te A be sha ya sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma yAM sarba mu draM ban+d+ha ya sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra ya ts+tsha pad+ma A
be sha aHaHaHaHde nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad do/ /de la dang po kho nar pad+ma'i slob dpon nyid
rdo rje pad+mo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs te| rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du snying po 'dis las rnams bya'o/ /oM mahA pad+ma
s+pho Ta s+pho Ta a d+hi tiSh+Tha a/ de nas de bzhin du bka' mnos nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur te/ pad+ma'i dbyibs bslabs nas rang gi pad+ma'i ming brjod
la pad+ma lcags kyu la sogs pas las rnams bya'o/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya de dag gis sems dpa' chen po rnams bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas dngos grub rnams kyang
de bzhin no/ /de nas pad+ma'i slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ste/ de las dang por pad+ma'i slob ma rnams mna'i snying po byin la 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o/ /deng ni khyod kyi
snying ga na/ /pad+ma sems dpa' nyid bzhugs te/ /ji ste tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /de nas yang 'di skad du bsgo bar bya ste/ gsang ba'i
cho ga rgyas pa 'di su la yang ma smra zhig /khyod kyis mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ de nas snying po 'dis dam tshig
@#/ /gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /oM badzra pad+ma sa ma ya staM/ de nas gos dkar po bgos la dar dkar pos gdong g.yogs nas gzhug par bya
ste| snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM pad+ma sa ma ya hUM/ de nas las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas pad+ma'i dbyibs lag tu sbyin no/ /oM pad+ma hasta badzra d+harma ha na pa la ya he
ne| des kyang 'di skad du pad+ma'i chos nyid ji lta bu lags zhes dri bar bya'o/ /de la yang 'di skad du brjod par bya'o/ /ji ltar pad+ma dkar po 'di/ /'dod pa'i nyes pas
mi chags bzhin/ /thams cad dag par bsgoms na ni/ /de bzhin sdig pas chags mi 'gyur/ /de la chos nyid ni 'di yin no/ /de nas pad+ma'i rigs kyis phyag rgya'i
ye shes la bslab par bya ste/ snying la pad+ma bris nas kyang / /pad+ma bsgoms na snying ga yi/ /pad+ma dpal yang dbang 'gyur na/ /bud med phal la smos ci dgos/ /dpral
par sangs rgyas dbyibs bris te/ /rtag tu bsgom pa byas na ni/ /bsgom pa des ni myur du yang / /dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur/ /kha yi nang du lce steng du/ /sangs
rgyas dbyibs ni rab bsgoms na/ /sgra dbang lha mo bdag nyid kyi/ /rtag tu kha na gnas par 'gyur/ /gtsug tor dbus su pad+ma ni/ /snyoms par zhugs te bzhag
nas kyang / /gtsug tor pad+ma bsgoms nas ni/ /mkha' la 'gro ba'ang de dbang 'gyur/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM pad+ma shre yaM b+ha Sha ya ho/ /oM pad+ma a b+hi She
ka pra yats+tsha baM/ oM pad+ma sa ra s+thi bi sho d+ha ya hUM/ oM pad+ma u d+ha graM ba shi ku ru dzaH/ rtsig pa'am yang na mkha' la'ang rung / /pad+ma dam pa bsgoms na ni/ /'di ni sems can
thams cad kyang / /dbang du byed pa dam pa'o/ /mkha' 'am yang na phyogs gzhan du/ /pad+ma dam pa bsgoms nas kyang / /gang tshe mthong ba de tshe blangs/ /ci dga' bar ni mi
snang 'gyur/ /rtsig pa'am yang na nam mkha' la/ pad+ma rgya gram bris nas ni/ /gang tshe mthong nas blangs pa yi/ /de tshe sna tshogs gzugs de 'gyur/ /mkha' 'am yang na phyogs
gzhan du/ /rdo rje pad+ma bsgoms nas kyang / /de blangs skad cig nyid kyis ni/ /pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM badzra dza gad ba shi

dz+nyA na pad+ma a be sha ya/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma tiSh+Tha a sha na ba ku ru baM/ oM sa mA d+hi bi shwa pad+ma tiSh+Tha rU paM ne d+ha ra sha ya b+ha ga bAM baM/ oM sa mA d+hi badzra pad+ma Sh+Tha a d+hi tiSh+Tha shI g+h+raM hri/ dkyil
'khor la sogs thams cad du/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bris nas ni/ /de yi mdun du rta mgrin gyi/ /phyag rgya mchog gis 'dren par bya/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs
@#/ /thams cad du/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bri bar bya/ /nges pa'i zhags pa phyag rgya yis/ /'gro ba thams cad des dbang byed/ /dkyil 'khor la
sogs thams cad du/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bri bar bya/ /de yi mdun du pad+ma yi/ /lcags sgrog mchog gi phyag rgya bcings/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad
du| |spyan ras gzigs dbang bri de yi/ /mdun du pad+ma dril bu yis/ /thams cad 'bebs pa'i dam pa'o/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM pad+ma
A kaR+Sha ya sarba mahA satwaM hUM dzaH/ oM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha hUM ho hi/ oM pad+ma s+pho Ta baM/ oM pad+ma g+haN+Da a be sha ya sarba AHbdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid nyid/ /pad+ma zhal bzhi
sems dpar yang / /bsgoms te de nas grub nas ni/ /skad cig gis ni gzugs ma 'gyur/ /de ltar bdag nyid bdag nyid kyis/ /rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gnas/ /pad+ma
pad+ma bsgoms na ni/ /zad mi shes pa'i go 'phang 'tho ba/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang gtsug tor dbus/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas gzugs su ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni
bsgoms gyur na/ /tshe dpag med pa'ang mnyam par 'gyur/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyis ting 'dzin gnas/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin du/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms
na ni/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di yin no/ /pad+mo bi shwa/ d+harma kA ya pad+ma/ bud+d+ha a b+hi She ka a ba lo ke shwa ra/ de nas dkyil
'khor chen po thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /de la re zhig dang por ni phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes yin te/ ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
gnas shing / /pad+ma la gnas sems dpar ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid bsgom/ /de nas de dag gi las ni 'di dag yin no/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya che bcings na/ /tshe dpag med dang
mnyam par 'gyur/ /rdo rje pad+ma bcings na ni/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dbang gis bcings na ni/ /bde bar gshegs pas de dbang bskur/ /pad+ma pad+ma'i ting
'dzin 'thob/ /sna tshogs kyis ni sna tshogs mchog /sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'dul ba dang / /sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur 'gyur/ /pad+ma sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /pad+ma khro bo
dbang phyug dpal/ /rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gis/ /pad+ma 'dod pa'i dngos grub mchog /sangs rgyas dbang gis sangs rgyas nyid/ /rdo rje pad+ma grub mchog sbyin/ /'dod pa'i pad+ma rab 'dod
ldan/ /dga' ba yis ni legs pa sbyin/ /khro gnyer gyis ni khro zhir 'gyur/ /pad+ma'i nyi ma gzi brjid mchog/ pad+ma zla bas mdzes pa che/ /bzhad pas rab bzhad grub pa 'thob/ /
@#/ /grol bas dngos grub mchog 'thob bo/ /pad+ma ral gris longs spyod 'thob/ /mgrin sngon gyis ni 'gugs pa che/ /gos dkar gyis ni dngos grub 'thog/ /
pad+ma gar dbang gis 'grub ste/ /mi 'jigs rtag tu 'jigs pa med/ /rab gtum gyis ni ma rungs 'dul/ /pad+ma'i khu tshur rab tu sgrub/ /sgeg mo dga' zhing phreng ba'i nor/ /glur
blangs gar bde bdug pas tshim/ /me tog mdzes shing mar me lta/ /dris ni mchog gis drir yang 'gyur/ /rta mgrin gyis ni yang dag 'gugs/ /gdon mi za bar dbang du byed/
pad+ma lcags sgrog bcing ba che/ /dril bus kun nas 'bebs byed do/ /de nas pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di yin te/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni/ /
mthe bo mthe'u chung mnyam par bsgreng / /phyag rgya 'di ni chos dam tshig/ sangs rgyas chos ni rab thob byed/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni/ /mdzub mo gung mo srin lag
mnyam/ /sangs rgyas rigs mchog phyag rgya de/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par byed/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni/ /gung mo rdo rje rab mnyam pa/ /'di ni rdo rje rigs dam
pa'i/ /phyag rgya yin te rdo rje 'grub/ /de las gung mo rin chen 'dra/ /rdo rje rin chen rab 'grub byed/ /gung mo pad+ma'i tshul du byas/ /pad+ma'i dngos grub thob par byed/ /rdo
rje thal mo bsdams nas ni/ /rdo rje'i las ni byed par 'gyur/ /chos kyi rdo rje bcings na ni/ /skad cig gis ni dam tshig 'grub/ /rdo rje bsdams las mdzub mnyam pas/ /sangs rgyas
dngos grub thob par byed/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /sems dpa'i phyag rgya khyad par du/ /rdo rje thal mo bsdams nas kyang / /gung mo mnyam par bsdams nas ni/ /mthe bo mthe'u chung
phye ba ni/ sna tshogs pad+mar bshad pa yin/ /de las mthe bo gnyis bsnol te/ /mdzub gnyis rtse mo sbrad la dgug /dbus kyi rdo rje spyi gtsug phud/ /gtsug phud sangs rgyas yin
par bshad/ /rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ /mthe bo mnyam nas btud nas ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse sprad dgug/ bkan nas ting nge 'dzin du bcug/ thal mo pad+mo mnyam sbyar
la| |mdzub mo rdo rjer mnyam nas ni/ /mthe bo ngos la sbyar ba 'di/ /nges pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdam pa bsngams nas ni/ /legs par bkan te bcings nas kyang //
mthe bong gnyis ni pad+mar bsgreng / /sangs rgyas pad+ma yin par bshad/ /mthe bo gnyis ni rdo rjer mnyam/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu ral grir bya/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni so sor dbye//
gung mo srin yag pad+mar bya/ /pad+ma mnyam par rab sbyar la/ /mthe bos mthe'u chung gzung dgug pas/ /g.yon pa'i mdzub mo gzung ba ni/ /pad+ma'i mdas ni 'gugs par byed//
@#/ /thal mo mnyam par sbyar nas ni/ /bkan legs phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /legs so zhes bya sbyin par byed/ /pad+mo'i legs pa yin par grags//
thal mo mnyam par rab sbyar la/ /mdzub mo rtse mo mnyam ste dgug /mthe'u chud phye nas mdzod spur bzhag /pad+ma khro gnyer zhes bya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ /sor mo
thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /snying gar rab tu brkyang ba ni/ /pad+mo'i nyi ma yin par bshad/ /thal mo rab tu dam sbyar la/ /mdzub gnyis rin chen 'dra bar bya/ /dpung pa'i spyi bor
rab brgyan pa/ /pad+ma rin chen rgyal mtshan rtse'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor bzhag /kha dang bcas par rab brkyang nas/ /nyid kyi kha nas rgod pa dang / /kha ni bcu gcig nyid du 'gyur//
ting 'dzin pad+mar bcings nas ni/ /mthe bo gnyis ni so sor 'byed/ /pad+ma sgrol ba'i phyag rgya las/ /mdzub gnyis pad+ma'i tshul du dgug /pad+ma sgrol ba'i phyag rgya de/ /dngos grub thams
cad grub par byed/ /ral gri'i tshul du byas pa ni/ /pad+ma'i ral gri'i phyag rgya yin/ /mthe'u chung pad+ma chen por bya/ /mthe bo gnyis ni dbyug ltar bsgreng / /mdzub mo rtse mo dud chen bya/ /
gung mo srin lag 'khor lor bya/ /rdo rje thal mor dam byas la/ /g.yas pa oM du nang du gzhug /g.yon pa'i mdzub mtheb bzlas par bya/ /sor kun chu skyes kha phye 'dra/ /rdo rje thal mo
mnyam sbyar la/ /g.yon dang g.yas nas de bzhin du/ /'gying bcas gar byed bskor nas ni/ /spyi bor bzhag pa pad+ma can/ /rdo rje thal mo dam byas la/ /rtse mo thams cad kha phye ba/ /bskor
te pad+ma'i snying gar ni/ /bzhag nas brtan par byed pa po/ /rdo rje thal mo dam byas la/ /gsang ba'i gnod sbyin tshul du ni/ /thal mo brkyang ste bskums nas ni/ /kha bzhag pad+ma'i gnod

sbyin mi| |rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas kyang / /gung mo gnyis ni phyir bkug ste/ /rang gi mthe bo'i rgyab mnan pa/ /pad+ma'i khu tshur zhes kyang bshad/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje thal
mo las byung ba/ /mchod pa'i lha mo thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig mchog rnams bcing ba'o/ /rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas la/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni phyir
bkug la/ /rta mgrin gyi ni yin par bshad/ /pad+ma'i thal mo mnyam sbyar la/ /mdzub gnyis mdud par 'dud pa ni/ /nges par zhags pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /mtheb mdzub lcags
sgro 'dra bar bya/ /rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /pad+ma'i thal mo mnyam sbyar la/ /srin lag mthe'u chung gnyis bar du/ /mthe bo gnyis bcug dam du bcing / /de nas pad+ma rigs kyi chos
kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ hrIHgr-i kri hi/ shri sh-i d+hi hi/ gr-i ti kr-i bi khi mi Sh+Ti a/ pad+ma'i khu tshur gnyis byas la/ /las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

@#/ /thams cad chos kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs
so| |oM badzra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM ma Ni rat+na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems
dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM pad+ma sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs
so| |oM karma sa ma ye hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil
'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/ /pad+ma'i gsang ba zhes bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i
tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/ /de dbus pad+ma'i steng du ni/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /dam tshig mchog rnams lhag ma

bzhin| |rang gi rig pa rnams ldan par/ /chos kyi rdo rje la sogs bri/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harme shwa ri hUM/ oM d+harma sa ma ye badzra pad+ma ni hUM/
oM bud+d+ha a b+hi She ka ra rat+na sa ma ye hUM/ oM tA rA sa ma ye hUM/ oM bi shwa mu khe hUM/ sna tshogs gzugs mchog dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma
yis| |bskor ba'i pad+ma'i bri bar bya/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya gnyis gnas pa/ /pad+ma'i mtshan ma bri bar bya/ /bde gshegs nyid kyi nyid phyag rgya/ /de la de dag

gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no/ /hrIHoM pad+ma ta thA ga to/ oM pad+ma sa man+ta b+ha dre/ pad+ma badzra aM ku sha ko Sha d+hA ri NI hUM/ oM pad+ma ra ti/ oM pad+ma du Sh+Ti/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis par yang / /
rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /gtsug phud chu skyes cha gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas dbang bskur bri bar bya/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/ /pad+ma'i mtshan

mar ldan pa yi/ /dam tshig mchog rnams bzhag par bya/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /shrIHoM b+h+ri ku TI be tA Di pad+me hUM/ oM pad+me dz+wA le/ oM sau me ni pad+me ni hUM/ oM pad+ma mahA si
@#/ /ni e ka da sha bAka tri di ri di ri i aT+Te/ baT+Te tsa le pra tsa le ku su ma d+ha re i le pra be sha sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha hUM/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor gsum par yang / /rdo
rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /de yi dbus su pad+ma mdzes/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya bzhag par bya/ /de bzhin phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin par/ /pad+ma'i mtshan

mar ldan pa yi/ /pad+ma la ni gnas par bri/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /d+hIHdz+hi/ oM tA re tut+tA re hUM/ oM d+hIHhUM/ oM pad+ma tsakra shaM kha d+hA ra Ni/ nI la kaN+Tha sid d+h+ya sid
d+h+ya hUM| oM pAN+Da ra bA se na pad+ma saM b+ha be ba d+ha ba d+ha hUM/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor bzhin par ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /pad+ma'i dbus su pad+ma ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas
bskor 'od bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin par/ /pad+ma'i dbus na gnas pa yi/ /pad+ma'i mtshan ma ldan par bri/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni

'di rnams yin no/ /sti/ oM pad+ma nr-i t+ye shwa ri pU dza ya sarba ta thA ga tA nAM na ta na ta hUM/ oM A be sha ya pad+ma ka ba tsa ban d+ha ra kra ma na hUM/ haM/ oM mahA pra tsaN+Di pad+ma ya k+Sha Ni bi shwa rU pa
d+hA ra Ni bi shwa pa ya sarba duSh+Ta khA da khA da hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma muSh+Ti a mu/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams bri ba/ /pad+ma lcags kyu la sogs rgyu/ /mdor na

pad+ma'i mtshan ma can/ /de nas de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so/ /oM pad+ma ra ti pU dze ho/ /oM pad+ma a b+hi She ke pU dze ra ti/ oM pad+ma gI te pU dze gi/ oM pad+ma nai wi d+ye pU dze ho/ /oM d+hU pe pad+ma ni hUM/

oM pad+ma puSh+pa hUM/ oM pad+ma ku la sun d+ha ri/ d+harma A lo ke pU dzA ya hUM/ oM pad+ma gan d+he hUM/ mchod pa rnams so/ /oM pad+ma aM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya mahA pad+ma ku la na/ ha ya grI ba sa ma ye hUM

dzaH/ oM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha sa ma ye pra be sha ya sarba sa twa sa ma yaM hUM/ oM pad+ma shAM ka le baM/ oM pad+ma gan+d+ha d+hA ri shrI g+haM A be sha ya/ sa ma yaM sha na mu ki a/ de nas phyag rgya 'di'i dkyil
'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgya par byas nas/ pad+ma'i slob ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin bcud do/ /'di skad du/ khyod kyis gsang ba 'di su la'ang ma smra zhig /khyod sems
can dmyal bar lhung ba re/ tshe gcig tu sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/ de nas phab nas 'di skad du khyod kyi mig lam du ci zhig snang zhes dris nas/ /des ji skad du smras pa de bzhin
du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /des gal te nam mkha'i dkar bar mthong na ni de'i tshe de'i dngos grub dam pa'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /yang na ser po mthong na ni de nor 'grub
pa'i ye shes bslab po/ /ci ste dmar po mthong na ni rjes su dga' bar 'gyur pa'i ye shes bslab bo/ /ci ste nag po mthong na ni mngon spyod kyi ye shes bslab bo/ /ji ste sna tshogs
@#/ /mthong na ni dngos grub thams cad kyi ye shes bslab par go bar shes nas ji lta ba bzhin du gdong g.yogs pa bkrol nas snod ji lta ba bzhin du ye
shes bskyed do/ phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ /de ltar rdo rje dbyangs la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang snod ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa ni 'di
bzhin du brtag par bya'o/ /de nas dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang sems dpa' che/ /sna tshogs gzugs su bdag nyid kyis/ /bsgoms
na phyag rgya chen po yi/ /mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dbang gis dam tshig ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas brtan byas te/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/ /mchog
gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /pad+ma pad+ma sems dpa' che/ /bdag nyid mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms/ /bdag nyid kyis ni dam pa yi/ /dngos grub thob pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rang
byung gdon mi za ba yi/ /dbang phyug las kyi phyag rgya ni/ /cho ga bzhin bsgrubs myur bar yang / /mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin

no| |oM pad+ma satwa haM sid d+h+ya ho/ /oM bud+d+ha a b+hi She ka kro d+ho haM sid d+h+ya ho/ /oM d+harma sa mA d+hi ra haM sid d+h+ya ho/ /oM a mo g+he shwa ro haM sid d+h+ya mi/ /de nas nor sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/
kha yi nang du dbyig bcu ga ste/ /sna tshogs dbang phyug phyag rgya che/ /bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni/ /gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur/ /gser srang brgyar cha blangs nas ni/ /dam tshig
mchog ni rab brtan par/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/ /gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur/ /mu tig 'brum bu khar bcug la/ /bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu/ /bdag nyid kyis
ni bsgoms na ni/ /gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur/ /las kyi phyag rgya lag gnyis kyis/ /rin chen thams cad blangs na ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na yang / /gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur

de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM pad+ma ma hA rat+na pra d+ha hUM dza/ oM pad+ma su bar+N+Na pra d+ha hUM dza/ oM pad+ma mu ku Ta pra d+ha hUM dza/ oM pad+ma sarba rat+na pra d+ha hUM dza/ de nas rjes su dga' ba'i ye shes
ni 'di yin te/ sna tshogs dbang phyug phyag rgya che/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/ /pad+ma blangs te mdun gnas pa/ /gang yin des ni de mgur byed/ /dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yis/ /
pad+mo dmar por dam bzung ste/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni/ /bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms nas kyang / /pad+ma blangs te ji lta ba/ /rdo rje
lta bas de ltar bltas/ /'jig rten thams cad des mgur 'gyur/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni/ /cho ga bzhin du pad+ma gzung / /lag pa gnyis kyis bskor na ni/ /bud med thams
@#/ /cad der mgur 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM bi shwe shwa ra mahA pad+ma ho/ /oM pad+ma sa ma ya pad+ma ho/ /oM yo ga pad+ma ho/ /oM pad+ma karma ho//
sna tshogs ye shes dbang phyug che/ /bdag nyid mdun du pad+ma gtsang / /phyag rgya pad+ma de nyid kyis/ /de yi 'chi ba skad cig go/ pad+ma bzung nas brtan bya ba/ /cho ga legs pa ji bzhin du//
dam tshig dam pa de nyid kyis/ /nan tan kho nar gzhig par byed/ /gang gis ming smos 'jig pa ni/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya sbyar nas su/ /ji ltar de ltar pad+ma thogs/ /las de nges par
'grub par 'gyur/ /gang gis gzhig par khros na ni/ /las kyi phyag rgya sbyar nas su/ /bskor zhing brdab par byas na ni/ /de yi 'tsho ba rdol bar 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di

yin no/ /oM mahA pad+ma ts+tshe da mA ra ya ho phaT/ oM sa ma ya pad+ma s+pho Ta nA sha ya ra ta phaT/ oM d+harmA pad+ma ts+tshe da bi nA sha ya pra ti ya phaT/ oM karma pad+ma s+pho Ta ya dzI bi ta ma s+ya kr-i ta phaT/ de
nas chos kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no/ /bud med du ni pad+ma bsam/ /da steng bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgyur/ /pad+ma pad mchog rtse byed cing / /mnyam par
gzhag na dngos grub thob/ /bud med du ni pad+ma bsam/ /de steng bdag nyid sangs rgyas bsgyur/ /rtse zhing dbu rgyan sangs rgyas ni/ /bsgoms na des ni de 'grub bo/ /bud med
du ni pad+ma bsam/ /de steng pad+mar bdag bsgyur te/ /rtse zhing pad+ma pad+ma mchog /dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /bud med du ni pad+ma bsam/ /de steng sna tshogs bdag/ bsgyur te/ /

rtsa zhing sna tshogs pad+ma mchog /sna tshogs dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM badzra pad+ma saM yo ga sA d+ha ya hriH/ oM bud+d+ha ma ku Ta saM yo ga sA d+ha ya shrIH/

oM pad+ma pad+ma saM yo ga sA d+ha ya d+h-i/ oM bi shwa pad+ma saM yo ga sA d+ha ya sti/ de nas pad+mo rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes ji lta ba bzhin du bslab bo/ /sor mo rtse sprad pad+mar bya/ /
rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub gnyis sprad/ /rtse gnyis nor bu'i pad+ma ltar/ /rdo rje bsdams pa'ang de bzhin te/ /rdo rje bcing ba bsdams nas kyang / /gung mo gnyis ni myu gur bsgreng / /mdzub mo srin
lag gnyis bkug pa'i/ /phyag rgya shAkya thub pa'i brtan/ /chos kyi rdo rje snying gar bzhag/ bsgyur te dpral bar bzhag pa dang / /ting nge 'dzin tshul pang du bzhag /bsgyur nas spyi bor bzhag
par bya/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang bcings la/ /mchod rten pad+ma'i tshul du ni/ /gung mo gnyis ni bcings gyur na/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma yin par bshad/ /da las mthe bo rdo rje dang / /mdzub gnyis
ral gri lcags kyur bya/ /pad+ma rdo rje 'dzin pa de/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /de las mthe bo bsnol nas kyang / /mdzub mos mdzub mo rab bzung la/ /drangs na rab dga' yin
@#/ /par bshad/ /legs so zhes pa'ang de bzhin te/ /rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas las/ /mthe bo gnyis mnyam bcug nas kyang / /mdzub gnyis rtse bkug rtse mo ni/ /
dpral bzhag gung mo pad+mar bya/ /de nyid las ni snying gar yang / /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang / /de nyid las ni rgyal mtshan bcing / /ltag par rab tu brkyang par bya/ /rdo rje bsdams
pa dam byas la/ /mdzub gnyis rtse mo pad+mar dgug /de bzhin pad+ma ral gri ste/ /mdzub mo pad+mar byas pas sbyar/ /rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas la/ /mthe bo g.yon pa nang du gzhug/
dung ste mthe bo mtho bar bsgreng / /sor mo bskum brkyang pad mthe'u chung / /de las thams cad bcum nas kyang / /mthe'u chung pad+ma lta bur bya/ /mthe bo g.yas la sbyar ba yi/ /
mdzub mor nor bu bgrang bar bya/ /rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas la/ /mthe'u chung pad+ma lta bur bya/ /mdzub mo bsgreng ste gar byed pa/ /pad+ma spyan gyi yin par bshad/ /rdo rje bsdam
pa dam byas la/ /mthe'u chung pad+ma lta bur bya/ /dam du mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste/ /mthe bo gnyis ni go char bya/ /de las mthe ba gnyis mche bar bya/ /mthe ba gnyis nang du gzhug
par bya/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dam tshig mchog ni bla med de/ /rdo rje nang du bsdams nas kyang / /mdzub gnyis pad+ma 'dra byas la/ /mthe bo phan tshun bsnol ba ni/ /
gsang ba'i sna tshogs dang nga du bshad/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /mthe'u chud gung mo mnyam bsgreng la/ /mthe ba mos rdo rje sbyar ba ni/ /gtsug phud dbus na de bzhin gshegs//
de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /mthe bo pad+ma 'drar byas la/ /kha nas dbyung ltar byas nas kyang / /pang du ting nge 'dzin ltar gzhag /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /sor mo kun gyi
ngos rnams ni/ /mnyam par dam du bsdams nas kyang / /mdzub gnyis rdo rjer mnyam pa'o/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /mdzub gnyis pad+ma 'drar byas la/ /mthe bo gnyis kyang bsnol
nas ni/ /gung mo gnyis ni rtse sbyar bkug /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /mtheb gnyis rdo rjer rab sbyar la/ /mdzub mo ral gri lcags kyur bya/ /mthe'u chung pad+ma 'drir byas la/ /de bzhin
du ni bsgyur nas kyang / /mdzub mo g.yon pa bsgreng ba la/ /mdzub mo mthe bo rtse sbyar ba/ /dam du bzung ste dgug ltar bya/ /de la mdzub mo gnyis bkug la/ /mthe bo gnyis kyis
mnan pa ni/ /pad+ma dgyes pa bdag nyid che/ /legs so zhes bya sbyin byed kyi/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /sor mo kun gyi ngos sbyar la/ /mthe bo gnyis kyis mnan nas ni/ /
mdzub mo mnyam par sbyar ba'o/ /de nyid snying gar nyi mar bya/ /spyi bor pad+ma rgyal mtshan bya/ /phab sta kha yi 'gram bzhag pa/ /pad+ma cher dgod dgod pa yin/ /rdo rje nang du bsdams
@#/ /byas la/ /chos kyi rdo rje tshul gyis ni/ /mthe'u chung mthe bo rab bsnyams pa/ /'di ni sgrol ma'i dam tshig yin/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /
mdzub gung pad+ma ral grir bya/ /de bzhin nang du 'khor lor bya/ /zlos pa sbyin pa de bzhin no/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /mthe ba mdzub sprad de gnyis su bya/ /de nas snying
gar sbyar ba ni/ /gsang ba'i srung ba yin par bshad/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/ /mthe'u chung pad+ma 'drar byas la/ /mdzub gnyis shin tu bkug nas kyang / /mtheb
gnyis phyir bskyed mche ba can/ /de las khu tshur tshul gyis ni/ /mtheb gnyis ngos kyis btsir ba yi/ /pad+ma gsang ba'i khu tshur che/ /dam tshig mchog tu rab brtag pa'o/ /
pad+ma lA s+ye la sogs pa/ /de dag gzhan rnams kun gyi ni/ /rdo rje nang du bsdams byas la/ /de 'dra bar ni bcing bar bya/ /de nas pad+ma gsang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin
te| hAHgrAHprAHhrAH/ shAHsAHd+hAHhrAHgAHd+hAHkrAHbAH/ dAHrAHSh+TAHsAH/ las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdu na khu tshur gnyis su bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi chos kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chan po las/ /chos gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan
'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa

dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM d+harmas mA d+hi dz+nyA nA ta thA ga ta hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs kyi chos 'byung ba'i rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra
d+harma hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rjed snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM rat+na d+harma hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis
rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM d+harma rma hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM karma d+harma hUM/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos nyid kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /ya shes
dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bar ni/ /chos kyi ye shes zhes brjod do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/ /de yi dbus su bri ba ni/ /ye
