shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /sems dpa' chen rnams cho ga bzhin/ /sna tshogs dbang phyug la sogs pa/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs bri/ /de la de dag

@#/ /gi snying po 'di rnams so/ /oM dz+nyA na bud+d+ha hUM/ oM dz+nyA na bi shwe shwa re hUM/ oM dz+nyA na bu d+d+ha mu ku Ta hUM/ oM dz+nyA na d+harme shwa re hUM/ oM dz+nyA na a mo g+he shwa re hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma bu d+d+ha

hUM| oM dz+nyA na pad+ma badzre d+ha ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma mA ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma du Sh+TiM hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma b+h+r-i ku Ti hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma su R+ya hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma tsan+d+ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma hAM sa hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma tA rA hUM/

oM dz+nyA na pad+ma ku mA ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma nA rA ye hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma hA su hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma nr-i t+ye shwa ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma rak+Sha hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma ya k+Sha hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma mu Sh+Ti hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma lA s+ye hUM/

oM dz+nyA na pad+ma mA le hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma kI t+ye hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma nr-i t+ye hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma d+hU pe hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma puSh+pe hUM/ oM dz+nya na pad+ma dI pe hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma gan+d+he hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma oM ku sha hUM/

oM dz+nyA na pad+ma a mo g+ha pA sha hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma s+pho Ta hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma A be sha hUM/ de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa cho ga rgyas par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du
bcug nas 'di skad du khyod kyis gzhan su la yang ma brjod cig /khyod sems can dmyal bar lhung nas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/ de nas de'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ 'jig rten
dbang phyug snyoms zhugs la/ /snying gar pad+ma bsgoms nas kyang / /pad+ma'i ting 'dzin thob na ni/ /de ma thag tu myur bar lding / /'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/ /dpral bar pad+ma bsgom
byas te/ /goms nas shin tu brtan gyur na/ /de ma thag tu mkha' la lding / /'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis/ /lce la pad+ma bsgoms nas kyang / /grub par gyur na myur bar yang / /
nam mkha' la ni de 'gro'o/ /'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis/ /gtsug tu pad+ma bsgoms nas kyang / /grub par gyur na myur du ni/ /skad cig gis ni steng du lding / /de dag gi snying po

ni 'di rnams so/ /oM pad+ma dz+nyA na hr-i da ya A pe sha/ oM pad+ma dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka A be sha /oM pad+ma dz+nyA na bi d+yo t+ta ma A be sha /oM pad+ma dz+nyA na uSh+NI Sha A be sha /nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan
du| |pad+ma'i dbyibs shig bsgoms nas kyang / /cho ga 'di ni grub 'gyur na/ /skad cig gis ni mi snang 'gyur/ /nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /pad+ma'i dbyibs shig bsgoms nas
kyang | |de yi steng du bdag 'dug par/ /sgoms par gyur na mi snang 'gyur/ /nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /pad+ma'i dbyibs shig bsgoms byas la/ /gang tshe mthong ba de tshe blangs/ /
mi snang bar ni myur du 'gyur/ /nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /pad+ma'i dbyibs ni bsgoms byas la/ /mthong ba'i pad+ma de zos na/ /de ma thag tu mi snang 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi

snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM pad+ma a ka R+Sha/ oM pad+mar tha/ oM pad+ma dz+nyA na gra hA na/ oM pad+ma ra sa ya na hUM phaT/ phyag rgya che bcings pad+ma ni/ /kha dog dbyibs rnams sna tshogs pa'i/ /
@#/ /dbyibs de lag pas bzung na ni/ /gzugs rnams thams cad 'chang bar 'gyur/ /pad+ma'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i dbyibs bris la
de nyid bsgom pa byas na ni/ /gzungs mang 'chang bar de 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /pad+ma'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni/ /sna tshogs dbyibs su bsgoms na yang / /
sgra yi gzugs su de 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni/ /sna tshogs dbyibs su byas nas kyang / /de la zhon nas mkha' 'gro zhing / /ci dga' gzugs su nges par 'gyur/ /de

la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM pad+ma d+ha ri bi shA rU pa pra brta ya A be sha /oM bi shwa pad+ma pra brta ya mAM/ oM sa mA d+hi bi shwa pad+ma A be sha /oM bi shwa pad+ma ma no ta k+Shi pa A kA sha bi shwa
rU paM a d+hi ti ShA mAM/ gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya che/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis legs bcings la/ /pad+ma blangs te rab byin na/ /gdon mi za bar dbang du 'gyur/ /gang yang rung ba'i dam tshig
gi |phyag rgya zhes bya bcings na ni/ /de ni pad+ma blangs nas kyang / /byin par gyur na dbang du 'gyur/ /ting nge 'dzin skyes dge ba yi/ /phyag rgya gang yang rung bcings la/ /ye shes pad+ma gang
byin pa/ /de ni de yis myur dbang 'gyur/ /gang yang rung ba'i dam tshig ldan/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /pad+ma byin pa gang yin pa/ /de ma thag tu de dbang 'gyur/ /de la de dag

gi snying po na'i di rnams so/ /o mahA dz+nyA na pad+ma ho/ /oM sa ma ya pad+ma ho/ /oM dz+nyA na pad+ma ho/ /oM karma pad+ma ho/ /de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes la bslab
po| |chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dam tshig mchog ni bsgrub bya ste/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/ /pad+ma'i
pad+ma bzhag par bya/ /chos kyi khu tshur brtan byas la/ /las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ ye
shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi las kyi dam tshig 'byung bar
byin gyis brlabs pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma kr-i hUM/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs
kyi las 'byung ba rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM hUM d+hi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM rat+na karmas ma ye hUM/ de nas
byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM pad+ma karme hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /
@#/ /oM bi shwa karme hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos nyid kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/ /de nas
rab tu bshad bya ba/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba ni/ /pad+ma'i las zhes bya ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad
bus bre/ /sangs rgyas phyogs kun pad+ma yi/ /mtshan ma 'dzin par thams cad bri/ /de la de dag gi rig pa'i snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM bu ri Ni hUM/ bi shwa karme shwa ri hUM/ oM ta thA ga te

shwa ra a bi She ka karma bi d+ya hUM/ oM d+harma karme shwa ra dz+nyA na pU dzA sa ma ye hUM/ oM a mo g+ha karme shwa ri hUM/ oM pad+ma karma bu d+d+he hUM/ oM pad+ma karma badzri Ni hUM/ oM pad+ma karmi Ni mA ra Na pU dza

karma sa ma ye hUM/ oM pad+ma karma du Sh+Ti hUM/ oM pad+ma karma b+h+r-i ku TI hUM tra/ oM pad+ma karma sU R+ye hUM/ oM pad+ma karma d+h+wa de hUM/ oM pad+ma karma hA sa hUM/ oM pad+ma karma tA re hUM/ oM pad+ma karma ku mA ri hUM/

oM pad+ma karma nA rA ya ni hUM/ oM pad+ma karma bra h+mi hUM/ oM pad+ma karma na te shwa re hUM/ oM pad+ma ra ka rak+Sha karma sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma hA pra tsaN+Da gI ti ni pad+ma daM Sh+TA karma ka ri hUM/ oM pad+ma karma mu Sh+Ti ga

tA ya hUM/ oM ra ti pU dze hUM dzaH/ oM a b+hi Sha ka pU dze hUM dza/ oM gI te pU dze hUM d+ha/ oM nai wi d+ye pU dza hUM baM/ oM d+hu pe pU dze hUM aH/ oM puSh+pa pU dze hUM traM/ oM A lo ke pU dze hUM d+hiH/ oM

gan+d+he pU dza hUM baM/ oM ha ya grI ba a na ya hUM dza/ oM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+ha pI DA ya hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma shA ka la ban d+he hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma gan+d+he A be sha ye hUM phaT/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor
'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste/ 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu /khyod kyis tshul 'di su la yang ma smra zhig /sems can dmyal bar ltung bar
gyur ta re zhes bsgos shig /de nas ye shes bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas sdig pa bshags pa'i ye shes la bslab par bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug phyag rgya cher/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag
bsgoms nas kyang / /sdig rnams bshags pas myur bar ni/ /sdig pa kun las de 'dag 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang gis ting 'dzin gyis/ /dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings te/ /sdig pa
thams cad bshad na ni/ /mtshams med lnga las 'byang bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang phyug cing 'dzin du/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhan bsgoms la/ /sdig pa thams cad bshags
na ni| |sdig pa kun yang rab tu 'joms/ /mdor na gang yang rung ba yi/ /las kyi phyag rgya legs bcings la/ /las rnams thams cad bshags na ni/ /las rnams kun las rnam par

'dag/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM sarba rba pA paM saM sho d+ha na mahA pad+ma/ oM sarba A nan t+ya shwa d+ha na sa ma ya pad+ma/ oM sarba pA paM pra Na sha Na d+harma pad+ma/ oM sarba pad+ma a
@#/ /ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka karma pad+ma/ de nas sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ba'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /'jig rten dbang gi phyag rgya cher/ /shin tu
mnyam gzhag bsgoms byas la/ /shud d+h+ya shud d+h+ya zhes brjod na/ /las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi dam tshig bcings na ni/ /bud
d+h+ya bud d+h+ya zhes brjod na/ /las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/ /chos kyi phyag rgyar bsgoms nas ni/ /d+hi d+hi d+hi d+hi zhes brjod na/ /las rnams
kun las dag par 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / /hI hI hI hI zhes brjod na/ /las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur/ /de
la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM pA paM k+Sha ya pad+ma/ oM A ba ra Na k+Sha ya pad+ma/ oM karma k+Sha ya pad+ma/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i ye shes la
bslab bo/ /'jig rten dbang gi phyag rgya cher/ /rab tu mnyam par gzhag bcings la/ /oM oM oM oM zhes brjod na/ /mchod pa thams cad rab tu byed/ /'jig rten dbang
po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang / /b+hu b+hu b+hu b+hu zhes brjod na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad de mchod 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang pos snyoms zhugs la/ /
chos kyi pad+ma bsgoms nas kyang / /he he he he zhes brjod na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad nges mchod 'gyur/ /pad+ma'i las kyi phyag rgya ni/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag bcings la/ /d+he d+he d+he d+he
zhes brjod na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM kA ra pad+ma/ oM b+hU kA ra pad+ma/ oM he ka ra pad+ma/ oM d+he kA ra pad+ma/ oM ni wa ra Na
k+Sha ya pad+ma/ de nas dngos grub kyi ye shes la bslab bo/ /'jig rten dbang po phyag rgya cher/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bcings nas kyang / /hrI hrI hrI hrI zhes brjod na/ /'jig rten dbang por
grub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dam tshig ces bya bcings nas kyang / /shrI shrI shrI shrI zhes brjod na/ /dngos grub dam pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang
po'i mnyam gzhag par/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / /d+hig d+hig d+hig d+hig zhes brjod na/ /pad+ma khro bor 'grub par 'gyur/ /pad+ma chen po dge ba yi/ /las kyi

phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / /s+si s+si s+si s+si zhes brjod na/ /dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM hrIHsid d+h+ya/ oM shrI sid d+h+ya/ oM d+h-Ika sid
d+h+ya| oM si sid d+h+ya/ de nas las gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/ /bud med kun dang rtse byed cing / /a ho su kha zhes brjod na//
@#/ /sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/ /bud med kun dang rtse byed cing / /pri ya pri ya zhes brjod na/ /sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das dgyes so/ /'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la/ /bud med kun dang rtse byed cing / /a ho ra ti zhes brjod na/ /de ni rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten dbang
por snyoms zhugs la/ /bud med kun dang rtse byed cing / /su kha su kha zhes brjod na/ /de yi bde ba nyams mi 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha pU dza pra

brta na pad+ma/ oM prI ti kA ra pad+ma/ oM ra ti pra brtan pad+ma/ oM mahA su kha pad+ma dr-i D+ha hUM/ de nas las kyi phyag rgya chen po ji lta ba bzhin du bslab par bya ste/ de nas pad+ma thal sbyar te//
dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje dgongs/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /gnas rnams kun tu bzhag par bya/ /de nas pad+ma rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya ni dra zhes bya ba brjod par bya//
las kyi phyag rgya des bsgrub bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //
de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag rgya'i snying po 'di gsungs so//

oM badzri d+harma pad+ma hUM/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra dz+hi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying bos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra rat+na mu ku Ti hUM/

de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM d+harma pad+ma d+hi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba mu
khe hUM| de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya
bzhi mchog dkyil 'khor ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba dang / /dkyil 'khor chen por 'dra bar bya/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni bzhag par bya/ /de yi
phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bri/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i chog rgyas par byas nas/ ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste/ 'di skad du/ 'di khyod kyis su la
yang ma brjod cig /khyod rtag tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur pa dang / mi bde ba ma sbangs bas dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar lhung nga re zhes bsgo zhig /de nas de yi ye shes bskyed par bya
ste| lag pas pad+ma bzung nas kyang / /bsgrims te legs par bsdams par bya/ /dri de sangs rgyas rnams mchod na/ /myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /mnyam par gzhag pas gtsug phud
@#/ /dbus/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab gzhag la/ /'gro zhing rdo rje 'gying bstan na/ /'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed/ /pad+ma pad+ma chen po'i gzugs//
ting nge 'dzin 'dug ji lta bzhin/ /yid kyis su ni de bsad do/ /gang du phog par de rgyas pa'i/ /sa sogs pa yi las byed do/ /pad+ma pad+ma chen po'i gzugs/ /pad+ma rgya gram nyid du ni/ /byas
te lag pas bzung nas kyang / /bskor nas dbab la sogs de byed/ /de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM badzra rat+na hUM/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta A sha pa ri pU ra Na mahA rat+na hUM/

oM badzra hUM tra/ oM gan+d+he pU dzA gri sA d+ha ya hrIHoM pad+ma mu ku Ta ta thA ga ta ba shaM ku ru sarbA na lo ke shwa ra a b+hi She ka sa ma ya ho/ /oM pad+ma pad+ma mA ra ya sarba pra t+ya r+thi ka na sa mA
d+hi dz+nyA na d+h+r-i ka /oM bi shwa pad+ma sarba karma kA ro b+hA ba la li lu la la li hUM phaT/ de nas phyag rgya gsang ba'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /chags nas dgos pa thams cad ni/ /
bsgrub par bya ste dam tshig 'di/ /bsgrub par dka' ba'i phyag rgya yang / /rnal 'byor gyis ni myur du 'grub/ /de la 'di'i dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM sA d+ha
ya pad+ma rA gas ma ya a/ de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya chen po thams cad bslab par bya'o/ /phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarbA dza ga

tI nA ya mahA satwa a/ A gats+tsha shI g+h+raM bi shwa rU paM san d+hA rA ya ma me tsa sarba sid d+hA ya pra yats+tsha hrIH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams
cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri
bar bya/ /de yi nang du pad+ma yang / /de bzhin du ni bri bar bya/ /der ni 'dab ma kun khyab pa'i/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni bri bar bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bcud
nas| de bzhin du bsgo te 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas kyang / /phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni/ /
sna tshogs 'chad dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin du/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms
nas kyang / /dbang po gnyis ni sbyar bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor de ni de grub bo/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa/ phyag rgya bcing ba rnams bslab par bya'o/ /dngos grub rnams kyang
@#/ /de bzhin no/ /de bzhin du ras la sogs ba la'ang bya'o/ /phyag rgya gzhan rnams dkyil 'khor gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du phyag rgya la sogs
pa'ang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig du 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la legs
so zhes bya ba byin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus ba/ /rdo rje theg pa bla med kyi/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod
legs so/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
chos kyi dam tshig las rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po dum bu gsum pa rdzogs so// //bam po bdun pa/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus
nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i rin po che rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa
'dis gsol ba btab bo/ /nam mkha'i snying po sems can don/ /sems dpa' chen po gzi chen po/ /rin chen che ba'i rin chen mchog /rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal/ /dbang
bskur rin chen chen po ni/ /dag pa che zhing dge ba che/ /sangs rgyas rin chen rnam dag sku/ /rin chen rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal/ /nam mkha' nam mkha' las byung ba/ /nam mkha'
kun gyi 'od che ba/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi phyogs kun gyi/ /re kun mchog ni khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen mdzod spu rin chen 'byung / /sangs rgyas mdzod spu de bzhin gshegs/ /
rin chen thams cad rab kun mchog /rin chen dgos pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen rin mchog gtso rin drag /de bzhin gshegs ba kun rin chen/ /rin chen dam pa nam mkha' che/ /
mkha' mnyam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyan yin pas ni mdzes pa che/ /mdzes par snang zhing rab mdzes mdzad/ /don kun dag cing dag pa'i don/ /sbyin spyod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos
rin chen ni rnam dag mchog /dge 'dun rin chen de bzhin gshegs/ /dbang bskur chen po 'jig rten don/ /don sbyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyin pa rab sbyin sbyin pa'i mchog /gtong
zhing gtong mchog sbyin mdzad pa/ /sems can kun don de nyid don/ /don chen don ni khyod phyag 'tshal/ /bsam pa'i rgyal po gzi brjid che/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa sems dpa' che/ /sangs rgyas kun te khyod phyag 'tshal/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen che/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od che ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal chen po/ /bzhad chen
@#/ /khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi mchog /dbang chen khyab pa chen po ste/ /'jig rten gtso bo 'jig rten mchog /'jig rten
nyid khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen phul te rab kyi mchog /rin chen rgyan te rin chen mdzod/ /rin chen snang bas snang ba che/ /rin chen grags pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen phung
po rin chen don/ /nor bu rdo rje nor yon tan/ /rin chen 'byung ba sku rab 'bar/ /rin chen sku ste khyod phyag 'tshal/ /che nyid shing ste rin chen dbang / /re ba thams cad skong mdzad pa/ /
bsam pa thams cad legs par mnyes/ /rin chen phung po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /srid rtse khyab par bdag nyid kun/ /mchog rab sbyin zhing mchog che ba/ /phun sum thams cad
'byor pa'o/ /rdo rje snying po bdag phyag 'tshal/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad zhi ba 'di/ /su yang rung ba 'chang byed na/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba/ /skad cig tu ni sdig med 'thob/ /
rin chen khyod la gsol ba ni/ /nor 'dus pa ni bshad par mdzod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang gi mchog /des pa'i rigs ni bskyed par mdzod/ /da nas byang chub sems dpa' nam
mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' 'di thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM
badzra rat+na hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta A
sha pa ri pU ra Na mahA rat+na hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra hUM tra/ de nas byang chub sems
dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM ma Ni hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /
oM pad+ma hrIH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM bi shwa rat+na hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam
mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje nor bu rin po che lta bu 'od zer rnams byung nas de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas yang gcig tu gyur te bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs kar zhugs so/ /de nas nam mkha'i
@#/ /snying po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kun nas 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi dbang
bskur la sogs pa'i bkod pa dang / rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku rdo rje'i nor bu'i rin po che'i phyag rgya'i mtshan ma phyag na bsnams pa'i byang chub sems dba' chen po'i sku rnams su
gyur te byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rin po che chen po'i char 'bab pa la sogs pa nor bskyed pa rnams kyis sems can rnams mgu bar byas nas yang slar byon nas/
bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs thams cad du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//
e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rin chen thams cad bsdus pa ni/ /rdo rje rin chen rigs nyid du/ /'gro ba'i don du 'di gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i
snying pos rang gi rigs bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di phul te don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil
'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/ /thams cad grub pa zhes bshad pa/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /

rta babs bzhis ni brgyan ba ste/ /srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa la/ /dar dang phreng ba lnga ldis brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor chen po grwa rnams dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen spras par ni/ /
phyi yi dkyil 'khor srad bus bre/ /de yi nang du rdo rje yi/ /rin chen las byung gnas bya zhing / /ka ba brgyad kyi tshul du ni/ /rin chen sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor lngar ni brgyan

gyur bar/ /der ni srad bu bre bar bya/ /rang gi phyag rgyas bskor ba yi/ /der ni sangs rgyas bzhag par bya/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM bud+d+ha rat+na hUM/ oM badzra ma Ni hUM/ oM badzra

rat+na aM ku ru hUM/ oM badzra rat+na pad+ma hUM/ oM badzra rat+na paR+Sha hUM/ re ba kun grub dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /rdo rje snying po der gnas shing / /rin chen mchog ni sbyin
par bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du/ /rin chen phyag rgyar ldan pa yi/ /sems dpa' chen po rnams bri 'o/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams

so| |oM sarba ar+tha sid+d+hi pra da hUM/ oM badzra ma Ni tsin+d+h+ya ha na A kA sha gar+b+ha b+ha ga bAn sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya hUM/ oM rat+na aM ku sha a kaR+Sha ya sarba ar+thA na sa ma ya shrI g+h+raM sarba ta thA ga ta satwa ma
nu sma ra hUM/ oM ti rA ga pa shaM ku ru sarba nak+Sha sha gar+b+ha hUM/ oM rat+na duSh+Ti hUM/ rin chen phreng ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /rin chen phreng ba 'dzin pa'i
@#/ /mchog /nges pa'i dbus su legs par bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin par/ /nor bu'i mtshan rnams lag thogs

pa'i| |sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o/ /de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM rat+na tiSh+Tha tra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka rat+na mA le hUM/ oM rat+na ma Ni sU R+ye hUM/ oM tsan+d+ra ma Ni
d+h+wa dza sarbA sha pa ri pU ra A kA sha gar+b+ha hUM/ oM rat+nAT+Ta hA sa hA sa hUM/ rin chen pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /rin chen pad+ma 'dzin khyab pa/ /de dbus
gnas par bri bar bya/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin par/ /nor bu mtshan ma 'chang ba yi/ /sems dpa' chen po rnams bri 'o/ /de la de dag

gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM rat+na pad+ma hUM/ oM he ga sa mA d+hi dz+nya na gar+b+ha hUM/ oM rat+na ko Sha gra hUM/ oM ma Ni tsakra pra bar+t+t+ya ya hUM/ oM rat+na ba shi hUM/ rin chen char 'bebs dkyil
'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /rin chen char ni rab 'bebs pa'i/ /sems dpa' chen po der yang bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /mdor na lag na phyag
rgya yang / /rin chen mtshan mar ldan pa yi/ /sems dpa' chen rnams cho ga bzhin/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM rat+na pr-iSh+Ti baR+Sha ya sarba brta saM b+ha d+ha b+ha bAn ma Ni

ha sta hUM/ oM ma Ni pU dzA sa ma ya hUM/ oM ma Ni ban d+ha ka ba tsa hUM/ oM ma Ni daMSh+Ta ka rA la mahA yak+Sha ha ra ha ra sarbA r+thA na ti sha ya hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na ban+d+ha sa ma ya hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal
nas ni/ /grwa yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin par/ /rin chen lA s+yai la sogs bri/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM rat+na ra ti hUM/ oM
rat+na mA le hUM/ oM rat+na gI t+ye hUM/ oM rat+na nr-i t+ye hUM/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su/ /bdug pa'i mchod pa la sogs
bri| |de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM rat+na d+hU pe rat+ne/ oM puSh+pe ma Ni/ oM rat+na A lo ke/ oM ma Ni gan+d+he/ sgo rnams bzhi yi dbus su ni/ /sgo ba rnams ni gzhag par bya/ /

de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM sarba rat+na A kaR+Sha a ru Na mahA satwa b+ha ga bAn twaM A kA sha gar+b+haM tso dA ya A kaR+Sha ya shI g+h+raM ho dza/ oM sarba rat+na pra be sha ya sa ma ya
pra be sha ya sa ma ya ma hA ma Ni rA dzA ku laM rat+na pA sha hUM/ oM ma Ni ban d+ha hUM baM/ oM ma Ni rat+na A be sha a/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir nor bu rin po che'i slob dpon
nyid ji lta ba bzhin zhugs te cho ga rgyas pa bdag nyid kyis byas la/ de nas rin po ches byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa gang ba'i chus nor bu'i slob ma dbang bskur ste/ rdo rje nor bu'i
@#/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do/ /oM badzra ma Ni rat+na sa ma ya baM/ de nas kha dog ji lta bu rnyed pa'i bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te
de dang 'dra bas mig g.yogs la snying po 'di brjod du bcug ste gzhug par bya'o/ /oM hUM ma Ni rA dza ku laM/ de nas de ltar bcug nas 'di skad du khyod kyis 'di su la'ang ma brjod cig/
khyod che rabs thams cad du dbul por gyur ta re/ sdug bsngal las mi thar bar gyur ta re/ sems can dmyal bar yun ring bor gnas par gyur ta re zhes bsgo la dam tshig
gnyis su bya'o/ /theg pa chen po mngon par 'dus pa'ang brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bsam pa dang / gter chen po gang na yod/ ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhes rdo rje'i tshig gis dri
bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos thams cad smrar stsol cig ces smras ma thag tu gdong g.yogs
pa dkrol te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dam tshig kyang bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la thug gi bar du dkyil 'khor chen po bstan
par bya'o/ /de nas ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas ye shes gyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya che/ /shin tu
mnyam par bzhag pas bcings/ /gter brkos nas ni gang dag na/ /gter yod pa ni de mthong 'gyur/ /dam tshig gis ni mchog bcings la/ /gang na gter rnams yod gyur pa/ /
der ni phyag rgya btsir na ni/ /de tshe bdag nyid 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin du/ /shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni/ /gang na gter rnams yod ba yang / /yid
kyis shes pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /gang du phyag rgya babs gyur na/ /de na gter yod shes par bya/ /de la de dag
gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM mahA ma Ni rat+na A bi sha hUM/ oM ma Ni piN+Da pa ri sha ya hUM/ oM rat+na sa mA d+hi brU hi/ oM rat+na A bi sha dar sha ya hUM/ phyag rgya chen por bsgoms na ni/ /
gang du lus ni khor gyur pa/ /de ni rin chen gter yod par/ /dam tshig nyid kyis shes par bya/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang / /gang du babs nas gnyis gyur pa/ /de na
rin chen chen po yi/ /gter yod par ni shes par bya/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /gang la babs pa bdag nyid kyis/ /rin chen chen po bdag nyid kyis/ /gter ni gang na yod
par smra/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / /gang tshe lag gnyis phan tshun du/ /babs nas dam tshig bcings gyur pa/ /de nas gter ni yod par bshad/ /de la de dag gi snying po
@#/ /ni 'di rnams so/ /oM mahA rat+na kA ya dar sha ya rat+na/ oM A kA sha gar+b+ha ma Ni rat+na/ oM s+phoT s+phoT ya tra ni d+h+ri/ oM ma Ni rat+na dz+nyA na swa yaM brU hi/ oM pu
na sa ma ya ban d+ha dar sha ya swAhA/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni/ /de bzhin gang du dwogs gyur pa/ /de nas rin chen 'byung ba yi/ /gtor mod ye shes shes par bya/ /gang du
dwogs yod der yang ni/ /dam tshig mchog ni mchog bcings la/ /gang tshe nyid ni grol gyur pa/ /de na gter ni yod par bshad/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /gang du nges
par dwogs gyur pa/ /de na nges par gter yod par/ /ye shes bskyed de shes par bya/ /gang na yang dang yang dwogs par/ /las kyi phyag rgya cho ga bzhin/ /der bcings de ni gnyis

gyur pa/ /gter yod par ni shes par bya/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM ni d+hi dz+nyA na A bi sha /oM rat+na na sa ma ya muny+tsa ni d+hi ban d+haM/ oM d+harma rat+na bru hi ni d+ha naM/
oM sarba karma Ni s+pho Ta ya dar sha ya ni d+hI ban d+ho dAk+Shi pa/ phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas ni/ /gter rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang / /gang na gnas pa der babs na/ /de na
yod par rnam par bshad/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang / /gter rnams kun tu btsal nas ni/ /gang na gnas pa brtag gyur pa/ /de na gter ni yod par bshad//
ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /gter rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang / /gang na yod par rtag tu shes/ /de na gter ni yod par bshad/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /gter
rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang / /gang na yod par las phyag rgya/ /bskor ba de na yod par bshad/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM rat+na ba rak+Shi A be sha /oM rat+na sa
ma ya hr-i da dar sha ya/ oM rat+na pa rak+Shi dz+nyA na A bi sha /oM ma Ni karma brah+ma ya/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab par bya'o/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor la/ /gter rnams
kun tu tshol byed cing / /phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni/ /babs par gyur na gter rnyed do/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang / /bud med dang ni rtse byed cing / /gang du phyag rgya dam
gyur pa/ /de na gter ni yod par bshad/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar na/ /gter rnams kun tu tshol byed cing / /ye shes phyag rgya bsgoms nas ni/ /gter gyi ye shes 'jug
par 'gyur/ /dbang po gnyis kyi ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /gang du phyag rgya gnyis gyur pa/ /de na gter ni yod par bshad/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni
'di rnams so/ /oM mahA ma Ni saM yo gA bi sha/ oM sa ma ya saM yo ga dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ oM di ni dz+nyA na A bi sha saM yo ga /oM sarba karma saM s+phoT si yo ga /de nas nor bu'i rigs chen po'i
@#/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes thams cad la bslab bo/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po 'di yin te/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ji lta ba yi go rims
bzhin/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni/ /don gyi mchog kun 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi las ni 'di rnams yin no/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya sangs rgyas
nyid| |rdo rje snying pos gnyis rab 'grub/ /rin chen lcags kyus kun spyan 'dren/ /nor bu dga' bas rjes dgar byed/ /nor bu mgu bas dgyes par byed/ /nor bu lta bas nor thob
bo| |nor bu phreng bas dbang bskur zhing / /nor bu nyi mas gzi brjid mchog /yid bzhin nor bus ji dgar sbyin/ /rin chen bzhad pas nor thob 'gyur/ /rin chen chos kyis chos kyang
theb| |gtong ba'i dpal gyis dam pa rnyed/ /rin chen ral gris mtshon chen po/ /rin chen 'khor los dbang por 'gyur/ /smra bas btsal ba'i dngos grub 'thob/ /rin chen char gyis
nor chen po/ /nor bu'i mchod pas rab mchod nyid/ /rin chen chos kyis brtan par byed/ /rin chen mche bas nor thob bo/ /khu tshur nor bus dngos grub 'thob/ /de nas dkyil
'khor chen po 'di'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no/ /rdo rje rin chen phyag rgyas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 'thob/ /rdo rje nor bu che bcings nas/ /rdo rje rin
chen grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gnyis las nor bur byas/ /rdo rje 'dzin las nor 'thob bo/ /de nyid mthe bo rdo rje yis/ /nor bu sbyar te snying gar gzhag /mdzub gnyis pad+ma'i nor bu ra bcings//
'jig rten dbang gis nor byin 'gyur/ /rdo rje las nor sna tshogs kyi/ /nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan sbyin/ /rdo rje dbyings mdzub nor bu yis/ /sangs rgyas rin chen nyid 'thob bo/ /mdzub mo
bsnyams te phyir bkug la/ /mthe bo rdo rjer bcings pa yi/ /rdo rje snying po'i phyag las byung / /'di ni rdo rje'i nor bur gsungs/ /'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang / /rdo rje'i nor bu chen po 'thob/ /
mdzub gnyis rin chen 'drar bcings la/ /gung mo myu gur bsgreng ba ste/ /'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang / /rang gi dbang bskur thob par 'gyur/ /de nas gung mo srin lag dang / /mthe'u chung
rnams ni pad+mar bya/ /'dis ni kun tu spyan ras gzigs/ /mtshan 'dzin pas ni nor sbyin 'gyur/ /mdzub mo mthe bo mthe'u chung rnams/ /rdo rje rin chen tshul du bya/ /gung mo gnyis kyi se na
mo sbyar/ /srin lag myu gu 'dra bar bsgreng / /rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas la/ /mdzub gnyis nor bur byas nas kyang / /mtheb gnyis brkyang ba'i ngos snying gi /don kun grub pa sbyin par byed/ /
rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams nas kyang / /gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya/ /nor bu mtshan gyi phyag rgya 'di/ /nor bu chen po rab sbyin no/ /de nyid las ni mdzub mo gnyis/ /lcags kyu'i tshul du byas pa ni/
@#/ /don kun dgug pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /nor bu rin chen lcags kyur bshad/ /de nyid las ni bsgyur nas kyang / /mdzub mos mdzub mo bzung nas ni/ /mda' 'phangs
pa yi tshul byas la/ /drangs nas 'gro ba dga' bar byed/ /de nyid las ni mdzub mtheb gnyis/ /sbyar ba legs so zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas mtheb gnyis sbyar ba yis/ /mdzub gnyis
rtse mo sbyar ba dang / /mthe bo gnyis ni dbus sbyar la/ /mdzub gnyis ngos dang sbyar ba ni/ /nor bu lta bar bshad pa ste/ /lta ba'i don rnams 'phrog byed pa 'o/ /don kun grub pa'i
phreng ba ni/ /rang gi dbang ni rab sbyin 'gyur/ /de nyid snying gar mthe bo gnyis/ /bsgreng ste ngos kyi sbyar ba ni/ /nor bu nyi ma'i snying gar gzhag /gzi brjid chen por rab sbyin 'gyur/ /
srin lag bsnyams te bsgreng nas ni/ /phye ste spyi bor gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje nor bu chen po gtso/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o/ /de nyid las ni 'gying byed cing / /kha 'gram rgod par
bskor ba ste/ /rin chen cher rgod zhes bya ba/ /bzhad pas don rnams thams cad 'grub/ /ting nge 'dzin du sor mo bsgom/ /nor bu pad+ma nor 'chang ba'i/ /de nas mtha' nas grol
ba ni| |sbyin pa chen po rab sbyin byed/ /mthe bo gnyis ni nang du dgug /mdzub gnyis nor bur byas pa ni/ /nor bu ral gri yin te mthus/ /'gro ba rnams kyi nor 'phrog pa'o/ /rdo rje
bsdams las 'khor lor bya/ /mtheb gnyis nang du bcug nas kyang / /mdzub gnyis nor bu 'drar byas pa/ /'khor los bsgyur ba thob par byed/ /de nyid thal mo'i tshul du byas/ /kha nas
'dren par byas pa ni/ /de bcings nas ni ngag gis kyang / /rang gi bkas ni nor 'phrog 'gyur/ /rdo rje nor bu che bcings la/ /rin chen char ni rab 'bebs te/ /sor mo thams cad bsgreng ba ni/ /
phyogs bzhi nas ni nor char 'bebs/ /rdo rje nor bu che bcings la/ /gar byas gtsug phud dbus bzhag nas/ /kun la cho ga bzhin mchod na/ /rin chen kun gyis de mchod 'gyur/ /don
kun grub pa'i phyag rgyas ni/ /mgrin pa'i phyogs su 'khyud par bya/ /nor bu bcings pa zhes bya ste/ /bsrung ba yi ni cho gar grags/ /don kun grub pa de nyid las/ /gnod sbyin tshul du
khar bzhag pa/ /nor bu mche ba zhes bya ste/ /'jigs byed don kun 'phrog pa yi/ /rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ /mdzub bkug mthe bo gnyis kyis ni/ /legs par mnan te btsir ba ni//
nor bu'i khu tshur dngos grub 'thob/ /dam tshig rnams kyi mchod mchog rnams/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul du ni/ /ji bzhin nor bu ldan pa la/ /'di ni dam tshig mchog tu brtags/ /gung mo nor
bu'i tshul du bya/ /de dag nyid la rnam par brtags/ /lcags kyu gcig sogs tshul gyis ni/ /las rnams thams cad rab 'grub byed/ /de nas nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi chos kyi
@#/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no/ /hraHgraHtriHhrIHshrIHiHriHd+h+riHdiHd+hIHgriHbiHriHDaHyaHaHrin chen phyag rgya gnyis byas la/ /
las kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa
rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyis
brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra rat+na d+hU pe hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi
rigs 'byung ba'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra a b+hi She ka mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di
gsungs so/ /oM rat+na a b+hi She ka hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra d+harma a b+hi She ka hUM/ de nas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka pU dzA sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /
rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/ /rin chen gsang ba zhes bshad de/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/ /de yi dbus su tshul bzhin du/ /sangs
rgyas phyag rgya bri bya ste/ /khri la gnas pa'i nor bu'i gtso/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi mdun du ni/ /nor bu'i phreng ba pad+ma'i nor/ /nor bus bskor ba'i nor bu'i rnams/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni
'di rnams so/ /oM traM/ oM ma Ni sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na a b+hi She ka mA le hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na pad+ma hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na pr-i ti sa ma ye hUM/ thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje
shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /rdo rje rin chen dbus su ni/ /rdo rje nor bu chen po bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin par/ /rang gi phyag rgya nor bur ldan/ /rin

chen slob dpon nyid kyis bri/ /de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so/ /oM sarba ar+tha sid+d+hi pra be sha mahA badzri rat+na sa ma ye ma Ni sarba ar+thA na me sA d+ha ya d+ha ra NI hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na A ka R+Sha
ye swA hA/ oM ma Ni rat+na sa ma ye aM ku sha ma Ni ku la dza/ oM ma Ni rA ga sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni sA d+hu hUM/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis par yang / /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /
@#/ /spyan gnyis dang ni ldan pa yin/ /nor bu de yi dbus su bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin par/ /nor bu'i mtshan

mar ldan pa yi/ /rang gi phyag rgya rnams bri 'o/ /de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di dag go/ /oM badzra ma Ni rat+na ne tra A na ya ba shaM ku ru sarba ar+tha saM b+ha dA na shI g+h+raM tiSh+Tha aM ku shi hUM/ oM ma

Ni rat+na rat+na mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na sU R+ya dz+wA la ya sarba mahA rA dzi ni hUM/ oM ma Ni tsan+d+ra d+h+wa dzA gri hUM/ oM ma Ni hA se hA sa hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /nor bu pad+ma bri bar
bya| |de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin bya/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM ma Ni sa mA d+hi pad+ma ni hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na d+ya gra sa ma ya hUM/
oM ma Ni sa ma ya ko She hUM/ oM ma Ni sa ma ya tsa kra hUM/ oM ma Ni b+hA ShA gri hUM/ dkyil 'khor bzhi ba dam par ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / /rdo rje rin chen ldan pa yi/ /
rin chen char 'bebs der gnas shing / /las kyi phyag rgya ji bzhin pas/ /yongs su bskor bar bri bar bya/ /nor bu'i mtshan mar ldan pa rnams/ /ltag 'og go rims ji
bzhin bya/ /de nas de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so/ /oM rat+na br-i Sh+Ti sA d+ha ya mahA ma Ni hUM/ oM mahA pU dzA sa ma ye ne tra A/ oM mahA pU dzA sa ma na sa me
ye rak+Sha /oM badzra ma Ni rat+na daMSh+TA kA rA le ha ra ha ra hUM/ oM ma Ni sa ma ya mu Sh+Ti hUM/ de nas nor bu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas
rang gi slob ma rnams btsud de 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis tshul 'di su la yang ma smra zhig /khyod rab tu dbul ba dang / dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar lhung ta re zhes bsgo
la rang gi nor bu'i dam tshig gi ye shes bskyed par bya'o/ /rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /mkha' la rdo rje rin chen bri/ /bdag nyid kyi ni dpral bar yang / /gzhag na rgyal por nges par
'gyur/ /rin chen rdo rje bcings nas ni/ /rdo rje rin chen mkha' la bri/ /dbang gi gnas su bzhag na ni/ /nges par rgyal po nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje rin chen mkha'
la bri/ /ye shes rdo rje de bzhag na/ /nyid kyis grub pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /mkha' la rdo rje rin chen bri/ /rang gi gnas su de bzhag na/ /nyid kyi grub pa'i

rgyal por 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /mahA badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ sa ma ya rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ d+harma rat+na a b+hi Shi ny+tsa mAM/ karma rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ phyag rgya
chen po'i snying gar ni/ /rdo rje rin chen bsgom par bya/ /bsgoms nas mngon par dbang du bskur/ /mchog tu rmad du byung ba 'thob/ mnyam par gzhag pas rdo rje yi/ /rin chen dpral
@#/ /bar bsgoms nas ni/ /rin chen rdo rje bcings gyur na/ /thams cad kyi ni rgyal por 'gyur/ /rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /lce la rdo rje rin chen bsgom/ /
chos kyi rgyal po nyid du ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas rdo rje yi/ /rin chen gtsug tor bsgoms nas kyang / /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /las legs

byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM badzra rat+na hr-i da ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa ho/ /oM badzra rat+na a b+hi She ka dra/ oM badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa baM/ oM badzra rat+na uSh+NI Sha
a d+hiSh+ThA na swa mA na/ phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid kyis/ /bsgoms na rdo rje rin chen yang / /ras la sogs par bris nas ni/ /rgyal po chen por de 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /
ras la sogs par bri nas kyang / /sems dpa' rdo rje bsgoms na ni/ /dam tshig rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /rin chen rdo rje bdag nyid kyis/ /ras la sogs la bris nas kyang / /bsam
gtan phyag rgya bsgoms na ni/ /nges par chos kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /ras la sogs par rdo rje yi/ /rin chen bris nas las rnams kyi/ /phyag rgya bsgoms par gyur na ni/ /bdag nyid las

kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /badzra rat+na biM b+ha a d+hi tiSh+Thi/ oM badzra rat+na bim b+ha pra ti tiSh+Tha/ oM badzra rat+na baM b+ha a b+hi She ka/ badzra rat+na bim b+ha ku ru/ /gser ram
yang na dngul yang rung / /rdo rje rin chen bcings gyur ta ma/ /yang na rin chen gzhan yang rung / /snying gar bsgoms nas dbang bskur 'gyur/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /gser ram rin chen
gzhan las byas/ /rtag tu dpral bar bzhag na ni/ /nor che ba yi rgyal por 'gyur/ /gser ram rin chen gzhan dag gi /rdo rje rin chen bsgoms nas kyang / /rang gi khar yang bcug na ni/ /
tshig la dbang bar de 'gyur ro/ /gser ram rin chen gzhan dag gi/ rdo rje rin chen bsgoms na ni/ /gtsug tor du ni yang bsgoms na/ /las rnams kun gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi

snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM badzra rat+na hr-i da ya A ba ra Na hUM/ oM badzra rat+na a b+hi She ka mahA ar+tha pA da/ oM badzra rat+na pA tsa prA de/ oM badzra rat+na mahA karma pA de/ de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam
tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas ni/ /rdo rje nor bu che bcings la/ /nor bu bud med bu gar bcug /de ltar dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /
dam tshig mchog gi nor bu ni/ /bud med bu gar bcug nas kyang / /dam tshig mchog bcings thams cad kyi/ /dbang bskur ba yi dngos grub 'gyur/ /rdo rje nor bu che bcings la/ /chos
kyi phyag rgya bsgoms nor bu/ /de ni bud med bu gar bcug /bla med pa yi dngos grub 'gyur/ /las kyi phyag rgya nor bu bcings/ /bud med bu gar las phyag rgya/ /bcings par 'gyur na
@#/ /las kun gyis/ /dngos grub bla na med par 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM mahA ma Ni sid+d+hi/ oM sa ma ya a b+hi She ka sid+d+hi/ oM d+harma sid+d+hi/
oM karma sid+d+hi/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i phyag rgya chen po bcings ba bshad de/ /rin chen rdo rje myu gur bcings/ /gung mo srin lag mthe'u chung rnams/ /sor mo brkyang ba byas nas ni//
spyi bor bzhag pa grub mchog 'thob/ /rdo rje bsdam pa byas nas kyang / /mdzub mo gnyis mdud mtheb gnyis dang / /srin lag rdo rje bsgyur nas ni/ /mdzod spur bzhag pa dbang thob bo/ /
rdo rje rin chen tshul byas la/ /mdzub gnyis ngos dang mtheb ngos sprad/ /de nyid bsgyur nas de dbang 'thob/ /de nyid mtheb gnyis mdzub gnyis ni/ /chos kyi rdo rje tshul du ni/ /bcings
nas dpral bar bzhag pa ni/ /chos chen gyi ni dbang bskur 'gyur/ /las kyi rdo rje bcings nas kyang / /dbang rnams kun gyi phreng ba ste/ /bsgyur nas dpral ba nyid du yang / /bzhag
na dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje dbyings skyes dam tshig kyang / /bcings nas rin chen dpral bar ni/ /bzhag na dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur/ /
mtheb gnyis phan tshun bsnol nas ni/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang / /nor bu 'dra bar bkug pa ni/ /rdo rje nor bu chen po 'thob/ /rdo rje bsam/ pa byas nas kyang / /rdo rje khu tshur
gung mo gnyis/ /nor bu 'dra bar byas nas ni/ /nor bu phreng ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur/ /rdo rje bsdam pa byas nas ni/ /gung mo nor bu 'dra na la/ /mdzub mo srin lag gnyis pad+ma/ /
kha bye 'dra bar byas pas 'grub/ /gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bcings/ /sor mo thams cad bsgreng ba rnams/ /nor bu nyid du bsgoms na ni/ /'khor rnams mchog dang ldan par 'gyur//
gung mo mthe bo rdo rje yi/ /rin chen tshul du byas nas kyang / /srin lag mthe'u chung bsnyams pa yi/ /khar bzhag lce steng nor bu sbyin/ /de la mdzub gnyis rdo rjer bya/ /de ltar de gnyis lcags
kyur bya/ /mdzub mos mdzub mo drang ba dang / /de nyid dga' bar rab sbyin pa'o/ /gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bcing / /mdzub gnyis ngos la dgug pa ste/ /srin lag ngos gnyis mdud pa la/ /
mtheb bo gnyis kyis bkab pa ste/ /de nyid rdo rje nyi mar bskor/ /dpung ba'i spyi bor brkyang bar bya/ /nor bu'i rgyal mtshan spyi bo'i rgyan/ /bzhad pa'i tshul du byas pa'o/ /rdo rje bsdam pa

byas na ni/ /mdzub mo srin lag gyen du bsgreng / /de dag pad+ma 'dra bar bya/ /gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya/ /de las mtha' mar rab sbyin bya/ /rdo rje ral gri sbyar ba dang / /rdo rje 'khor lo tshul du
bya| |de nyid kha nas dbyung bar bya/ /mdzub gnyis rin chen myu gur bya/ /sor mo thams cad brkyang ba dang / /de dag spyi bor bzhag pa ni/ /rin chen char gyis char 'bebs so/ /de nyid go cha'i
@#/ /tshul du ni/ /snying gar rin chen gnyis byas pa/ /mdzub gnyis nor bu 'dzin mche ba/ /dbus su bsnyams pa khu tshur ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i
ye shes la bslab po/ /phyag rgya chen po de dag nyid/ /snyim pa sbyar ba bcings na ni/ /mdor na gsang ba gsang ba yi/ /dngos grub bzhi 'gyur sbyin par byed/ /ji ltar rdo rje'i gsang
ba'i sbyin/ /dus rnams kun tu bcings mi bya/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i mdo bshad par bya'o/ /traiH| graiH| traiH| saiH|kraH| khaH| d+haiH| haiH| praiH| d+haiH| kraiH| baiH| kraH| raiH|yaH| maiH|
gsang ba gsang ba'i khu tshur mchog /gnyis su byas na las kun byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ /rin po che phyag
rgya'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba mkhyen
pa'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka
dz+nyA not+ta ma hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig ba dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka sa ma ya hUM/ de nas byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM ma Ni rat+na a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hUM/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM d+harma a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam
pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs
so| |de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/ /rin chen ye shes zhes bshad de/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil
'khor thams cad srad bus pre/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/ /snying ga'i mtshan ma bri bar bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i ye shes kyi snying po ni 'di rnams gsungs so/ /oM dz+nyA na

sarba sid+d+hi dz+nyA na hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na aM ku sha dza/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na rA ga /oM ma Ni dz+nyA na duSh+Te/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na duSh+Ti ma Ni hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka /oM ma Ni dz+nyA na sUR+ya/ oM ma

Ni dz+nyA na d+h+wa dza/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na aT+TAT+Ta hA sa/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na pad+ma hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na t+ye ga/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na ko Sha/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni tsa kra/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni b+ha Sha/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni rat+na baR+Sha hUM/ oM ma
@#/ /Ni dz+nyA na nr-i d+ye bU dzA sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na rak+Sha/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na yak+Sha/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na muSh+Ti/ de nas yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du
byas nas slob ma la 'di skad bsgo bar bya'o/ /khyod kyis chos ma mthong bsu la'ang ma brjod cig /khyod dngos grub ma thob par myur bar shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la nor bu'i rigs
kyi chos kyi ye shes bskyed par bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis ras sogs la/ /rdo rje snying po bris nas ni/ /bsgoms nas rin chen don 'byin ces/ /smra zhing gsol ba gdab par bya/ /
ting nge 'dzin gyis ras sogs la/ /rdo rje snying po bris nas ni/ /bsgoms nas rin chen byin cig ces/ /tshig tu smra zhing gsol ba gdab/ /rdo rje snying po ras sogs la/ /bris te
mnyam par bzhag nas kyang / /rnam par bsgoms te ye shes la/ /dam chos sbyin zhes gsol ba gdab/ /rdo rje snying po ras sogs la/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bris nas
kyang | |bsgoms nas dam pa'i las byin zhes/ /las la gsol ba gdab par bya/ /de nas de dag gi sgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM de hi sarba ar+tha b+ha ga bAn badzra

gar+b+ha/ oM de hi sarba rat+na b+ha ga bAn badzra gar+b+ha/ oM de hi sA d+ha d+harmA mi b+ha ga bAn badzra gar+b+ha satwa/ oM de hi sA d+ha karma b+ha ga bAn badzra gar+b+ha/ nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan
du| |nam mkha'i snying po legs sems pa/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas su/ /phun sum tshogs don gsol bar bya/ /nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du/ /nam
mkha'i snying po legs sems pa/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / /nor bsags pa ni gsol bar bya/ /nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du/ /nam mkha'i
snying po legs sems pa'i/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / /phun sum tshogs ni gsol ba gdab/ /nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du/ /nam mkha'i snying po legs
sems pa/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / /las sogs pa ni gsol ba gdab/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de hi sarba ar+tha na/ oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de

hi sarba rat+na/ oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de hi sarba d+harmaM/ oM dz+nyA na gar+b+ha de hi sarba karma mAM/ rdo rje snying po bris nas kyang / /snying gar yongs su bsgom byas la/ /gang gi tshe na snying 'phar ba/ /de tshe grub pas nor
ster ro/ /rdo rje snying po dpral bar ni/ /bris te rnam par bsgoms nas kyang / /gang tshe mgo bo 'dar gyur pa/ /des ni mngon par dbang thob bo/ /rdo rje snying po khar bcug la/ /de nyid du ni
bsgoms nas kyang / /gang tshe de ni byed gyur pa/ /de tshe des ni ngag 'grub po/ /rdo rje snying po bdag spyi bor/ /rab tu bzhag ste bsgoms nas kyang / /gang tshe de ni 'bar gyur pa/ /de tshe
@#/ /'phang du lding bar 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM hr-i da ya gar+b+he de hi d+ha naM/ oM rat+na a b+hi She ka gar+b+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ oM b+ha ga gar+b+ha
sid+d+h+ya/ oM rat+na gar+b+ho Sh+NI Sha A kA shA gats+tsha/ rdo rje snying po phyag rgya che/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni/ /bdag la grub stsol zhes gsol la/ /i li rat+na zhes brjod 'grub/
nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang / /dbang bskur ba ni gsol btab la/ /mi li rat+na zhes brjod 'thob/ /rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin du/ /
rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas ni/ /chos bdag stsol zhes gsol btab la/ /tsi li rat+na zhes brjod 'thob/ /nam mkha'i snying po las kyi mchog /rab mnyam bzhag pas
bcings nas ni/ /rin chen thams cad gsol btab la/ /ki li rat+na zhes brjod 'thob/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /oM i li/ oM mi li/ oM tsi li/ oM ki li/
de nas nor bu ye shes gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du/ /rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam
sprad na/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /gzhi la ri mo bris pa bzhin/ /rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/ /dbang bskur ba yang thob
par 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/ /sdug pa de dang gar rtses pa/ /'jig rten kun gyis de dgar byed/ /nam mkha' kun gyi rdul
dbyibs kyis/ /rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor la/ /thams cad 'grub par nges par 'gyur/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /A kA sha gu h+ya

dz+nyA na sa ma ya hUM/ bi tsi tra gu h+ya dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ pri yA nu smri ti dz+nyA gu h+ya sarba lo ke rA ga ya hUM/ sarba gu h+ya dz+nyA na sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha hUM/ de nas phyag rgya chen po 'di ji lta ba bzhin
bcing bar bya 'o/ /dngos grub kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /de nas chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab bo/ /rdo rje nor bu ni rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhag par
bya'o| |de nas chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin no/ /sA bA rA sA ra te ka ha daM ti he bA ka na ka ra ya ma/ de nas mdor na las kyi phyag rgya ni gnas ci bzhin par gzhag par bya'o/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang
bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
@#/ /zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /sarba ta thA ga ta karma a b+hi She ka hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
phyag na rdo rjes rang gi las 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra hUM kA ra a b+hi Sha ka /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang
gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta a b+hi She ka hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di
gsungs so/ /oM sarba d+harma a b+hi She ka rat+na/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM bi shwa a b+hi
She ka hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha' snying pos rang gi rig kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /las kyi
dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/ /rin chen dgos pa zhes bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/ /de yi dbus
su tshul bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzhag par bya/ /sems dpa' chen po tshul gyis ni/ /rin chen mchod pa rnams bri'o/ /de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so/ /

oM ma Ni rat+na pU dzA gra/ oM sarba ar+tha sid+d+hi badzra rat+na a b+hi She ka hUM/ oM badzra ma Ni d+harma sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na A kaR+Sha karma sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na rA ga ra ti karma pU dze pra bar+t+ta/ oM ma Ni

rat+ne sA d+hu ka ra pU dzA sa ma ye hUM/ oM mahA ma Ni rat+na dr-iSh+Ta A kaR+Sha/ oM ma Ni rat+na mA la pU dze/ oM ma Ni rat+na sUR+ya lo ka pU dze/ oM ma Ni rat+na d+h+wa dzi pA ta ke pU dze/ oM ma Ni rat+na at+tAt+ta

hA sa pU dze/ oM pad+ma ma Ni sa mA d+hi sa mA ye hUM/ oM sarba t+ya gA nu smr-i ti sa mA d+hi kar+m+ma ka ri hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na tik+Sh+Na sa mA ye tshin+da hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na tsakra sa mA ye hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na b+hA She b+ha da

b+ha da hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na baR+sha ni hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na karmi Ni hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na ka ba rtse rak+Sha mAM/ oM ma Ni rat+na daMSh+Ta khA da khA da hUM/ oM ma Ni kar+m+ma muSh+Ti hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na la s+ye pU dzA ya ho/ /

oM ma Ni rat+na mA le a b+hi She ka pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na gI te pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na nr-i t+ye pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na d+hU pe pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na puSh+pe pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na A lo

ke pU dza ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na gan+d+he pU dzA ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na aM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ oM ma Ni rat+na pA she hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na s+pho Ta/ oM ma Ni rat+na A be sha aH/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor
'dir cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par byas bcug ste 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o/ /'di khyod kyis su la yang ma smra zhig /khyod las kyi sgrib pas non nas shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo
@#/ /la/ las kyi ye shes la bslab par bya'o/ /rdo rje snying po phyag rgya che/ /rab mnyam bzhag las bsgoms nas kyang / /mchod pa kun gyis mchod na ni/ /sangs
rgyas thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig mchog /phyag rgya gang yang rung bcings la/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod na ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni des 'thob bo//
rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin tu/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod na/ /'gro ba'i dam pa 'dul bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying po'i
ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod gyur na/ /skad cig tu ni don kun 'thob/ /de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ /
oM rat+na pU dzA ba shiM ku ru/ oM rat+na pU dzA sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM rat+na pU dza ya d+harma nA sha ya bA di/ oM rat+na pU dzI karma sarba ar+thA na me sA d+ha/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag
rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod na ni/ /'jig rten thams cad des mgur
'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyis dngos grub dam pa 'grub bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes la bslab par bya'o/ /rdo rje rin chen bcings
nas ni/ /gnas rnams kun tu gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje dgos pa'i tshul du ni/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin bya/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ twa dza ga d+ha/ t+na dza
tu sa/ r+m+ma k+Sh+Na tu Sha/ r+m+ma k+Sha k+Sha d+hi/ rdo rje rin chen gnyis byas la/ /las kyi phyag rgya de bsgrub bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i
las| las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra rat+na trAM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi phyag
rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra mA le/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM ma Ni rten/ de nas byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra d+harma rat+na/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag
rgya 'di gsungs so/ /oM bi shwa dr-iSh+Ti/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di
@#/ /gsungs so/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /phyag rgya bzhi ba'i tshul du ni/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag par
bya| |de nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug nas bslab par bya ste/ khyod kyis 'di su la yang ma smra zhig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ /de nas ye shes bskyed bya ste/ /rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis//
rdo rje rin chen bcings nas ni/ dpral bar rab tu gzhag na ni/ /dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur/ /de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no/ /oM badzra rat+na sarba a b+hi She
ka sarba sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha ra la ra la hUM tra/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya bslab par bya ste/ khyo 'am yang na sdug pa 'am/ /bud med dang ni skyes pa'ang rung / /dpral ba gnyis ni sprad

nas kyang / /gtugs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de la de sgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM badzra rat+na sa khi bid+yA d+hA ra baM/ pra yats+tsha shI g+h+raM a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya hi ha ha ha twa/ de nas phyag
rgya bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du bcing ba dang / rnam pa bzhi de bzhin du bslab bo/ /dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i
snying pos don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra ma Ni d+hA ra sarba ar+tha sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha ho/ /b+ha ga bAn badzra rat+na hUM/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'di
yin te/ de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /dngos grub kyi ni dkyil 'khor ni/ /ji bzhin par ni bri bar bya/ /de nas 'dir ye shes gsang ba'i phyag
rgya'i ye shes la bslab par bya 'o/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa rnams/ /chags par gyur pa'i bde ba ni/ /sangs rgyas la yang phul gyur na/ /las kyi dngos grub thob par
'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes la bslab par bya'o/ /ras la sogs pa la yang sems dpa' 'am phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris te bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas yang de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa 'dis bstod do/ /legs
so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun
gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po dum bu bzhi pa rdzogs so// //bam po brgyad pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
@#/ /chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi de kho na nyid kyi cho ga rgyas ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la re zhig dang por
ni phyag rgya chen po dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rgya che/ /bcings nas mkha' dbyings thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas sku
gzugs byin brlabs la/ /rang gi snying du bcug nas ni/ /ci ste 'dod na tshe 'di la/ /zhi ba dam pa mchog gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid 'thob des 'di bsgrub/ /ci ste mi
'dod dngos grub bzhin/ /phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang / /de nyid chen po tshig re rer/ /brjod nas kun dang ldan par yang / /thams cad bdag ni yin bsgoms na/ /
ci ste 'dod na bdag nyid des/ /de bya gzi can dge ba yi/ /go 'phang tshe 'di nyid la 'thob/ /mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ /de nas dam tshig phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos
grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin 'grub pa/ /de ltar bdag ces bsgoms na ni/ /sangs rgyas dang ni gzi chen 'thob/ /mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ /de
nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ /chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis/ /dag ces brjod na nges par yang / /sangs rgyas dang ni gzi can
'gyur/ /mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ thams cad kyi ni kun dag par/ /las rnams
thams cad sbyangs na ni/ /sangs rgyas gzi can thob ci ste/ /mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub rnams so/ /
de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa'i dngos grub kun gyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /dngos grub kun sbyor sangs rgyas kyi/ /bkas ni sems can kun don
tu| |phyag rgya chen por bsgrub na ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ phyag rgya chen
po'i tshul du ni/ /ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin grub pa/ /de bzhin bdag ces bsgoms na ni/ /skad cig gis ni gzi chen thob/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya
dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ /yi ge med pa'i chos rnams la/ /rab tu spros pa yod min te/ /chos mchog 'di ni brjod byed cing / /
bsgoms na gzi can nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ dge ba'am yang na mi dge ba'i/ /gang gi las
@#/ /rnams byas pa ni/ /rgyal ba rnams la phul byas na/ /skad cig gis ni gzi can 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes pad+ma'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la dang por ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/
'dod chags ngo bo nyid kyis dag /mu stegs can gyis mi gyur la/ /de la chags pa'i chos 'di ni/ /theg pa che la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas dam
tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te/ /ting 'dzin brtan pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /byams pa chen po bsgoms nas kyang / /cho ga bzhin ldan khyab
byas na/ /skad cig gcig gis gzi can 'thob/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ 'dod chags ngo bo nyid dag ces/ /
smra bar gyur ba'i tshul 'di ni/ /'dod chags pha rol phyin rnyed de/ /skad cig gis ni gzi can 'thob/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos
grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ bdag gi lta dang reg pa dang / /mnyan pa dang ni dran pa'ang rung / /sems can rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /sdug bsngal kun
gyi mthar phyin 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes nor bu'i rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs
so| |de la phyag rgya chen po dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di yin te/ rdo rje snying po ji bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas kun dbang bdag gyur ces/ /bsgom par bya ba
rnams bsgoms nas/ /skad cig gis ni gzi can 'thob/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ nam mkha'i snying po 'dra bar
ni| |sems can kun gyi re ba kun/ /yongs su rdzogs par byed gyur cig /skad cig gis ni gzi can 'thob/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos
grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ bdag nyid las ni phyung nas kyang / /nor byin rab tu dga' byed cing / /chos byung phyag rgya smra na ni/ /gzi can tshe 'di nyid
la 'thob/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ dbul po rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /nor bsgrub pa la brtson ldan
na| |gzi can 'gyur ro ci ste yang / /mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ /rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi sangs rgyas dang / byang
@#/ /chub sems dpa' dam pa rnams kyi dngos grub thob ba'i cho ga rgyas ba'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na
rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub
kyi rgyud 'di yin te/ gang gis 'dod la snyoms zhugs pa/ /de la 'dod pas spyod par byed/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya chen po yi/ /ye shes dam tshig yin
par bshad/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ 'dod pa rnams la chags bral min/ /dam tshig
mdzes pa chen po 'di/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa/ /rgyal bas kyang ni 'da' mi mdzad/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni
'di yin te/ sems can don du khro min yang / /khro bo chen por rab tu ston/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni chen po yi/ /dam tshig 'di ni 'da' dka' 'o/ /de la
pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ rang bzhin dag par shes nas kyang / /de yi dgos pa de byed de/ /pad+ma'i rigs ni chen po yi/ /
dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba 'o/ /de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ nyung ngam yang na mang yang rung / /ci tsam nus pa nyid du
ni| |sbyin pas nyi ma stong par ni/ /bya min dam tshig 'di yin no/ /rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems
dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas chos zhes grags so zhes/ /brjod na chos nyid yi ge ni/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi
phyag rgya che/ /ye shes mchog gi tshul yin no/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /'dod chags las ni
dag pa'i chos/ /bde ba thams cad rab sbyin byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ni/ /dngos grub byed pa'i mchog 'di 'o/ /de la rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos/
grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /sangs rgyas bka' ni sbyang ba dang / /sems can drang bar bya ba'i phyir/ /de la khro bar ma gyur yang / /ma rungs
@#/ /bdud byas dngos grub 'thob/ /de la pad+ma'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /pad+ma chu yis ma chags pa/ /de bzhin 'dod pas mi
chags zhes/ /smra zhing dgos min byed kyang ni/ /sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de la nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /sbyin dang mnyam
pa'i chos med de/ /sgrub par byed cing smra ba ni/ /nor bu'i rigs ni chen po'i chos/ /mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ /rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga
rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /
de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ /sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' nyid rnams su/ /ji bzhin du
ni btul nas su/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i mchog 'grub sbyin/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /dus bzhi yi ni tshul dag tu/ /mchod
pa rnam pa bzhi yis ni/ /rtag tu ldan pa rnam bzhir yang / /byas nas las rnams bsgrub par bya/ /de la rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /ma rungs
sems can gnod bya'i phyir/ /dgos pa gang dang gang byed de/ /las kyi rdo rje rigs kyis 'di/ /dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin byed/ /de la pad+ma'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud
ni 'di yin no/ /'jigs pas gzir la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /ji bzhin par ni 'dul de bzhin/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi las/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub sbyin pa 'o/ /de la nor bu'i
rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /sangs rgyas dbang bskur de bzhin du/ /lus can rnams la sbyin pa dang / /re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i/ /las kyi don du
bsgrub pa'o/ /rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi chos nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no//
rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dgongs/ /'di ni sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid/ /gzhan las sangs rgyas 'gyur ba med/ /de la 'di ni
de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub gyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub bar bya/ /'di
@#/ /ni de bzhin gshegs rigs kyi/ /chos nyid dngos grub dam pa 'thob/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi
rgyud de/ phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang / /las rnams thams cad bsgrubs na ni/ /rdo rje'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de la
'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyi ni/ /chos kyi phyag rgya rjod byed cing / /rdo rje chos ni chos rnams
kyi| |chos nyid du ni 'dis bsgrubs pa'o/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni/ /las kyi
rdo rje snying gar gzhag /chos nyid 'di dag bsgoms na ni/ /las kyi chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ /rigs thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud
do| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /zla ba'i rdo rje tshul
gyis ni/ /ji ltar de gnyis kha dog shes/ /de ltar 'jig rten kun shes te/ /dag la dag dang dkar 'od gsal/ /chags pa dmar dang dmar ser khro/ /shes nas kha dog ji
bzhin pa'i/ /de yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas pa'i/ /phyag rgya chen
po bcings nas ni/ /rang gi lus la ji ltar shes/ /de ltar 'gro ba'i yid shes so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ nam mkha' ma ni phyogs
gzhan du/ /khros par gyur nas dkyil 'khor ni/ /ji lta bur yang mthong 'gyur ba/ /de lta bur ni yid shes so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/
nam mkha' ma sa phyogs phra mo 'am/ yi ge phreng ba mthong na/ /mdor na kha dog ci 'dra bar/ /shes pa de 'drar der sems shes/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi
ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /'jig rten kun la bltas nas kyang / /ji lta bur ni snang gyur cing / /mthong bar gyur na de 'dra bar/ /'gro ba'i sems ni shes par bya/ /de
gnyis snyoms par zhugs nas ni/ /'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba dang / /bod pa dang ni 'chag pa'ang rung / /ji ltar mthong ba de ltar rtogs/ /snyoms par zhugs nas bsams na
@#/ /ni| |sems can gang dang gang yin pa'i/ /de dang de ni de bzhin du/ /sems can thams cad rtogs par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs
so| |rigs thams cad kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub
kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/ sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs tshul gyis/ /
sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag bsgoms na/ /ye shes kyi ni tshul de yis/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub
kyi rgyud de/ nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni ser skya mthong / /sems dpa' nyid ni phyag rgya nyid/ /mngon sum du ni mthong 'gyur na'o/ /de la
'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud do/ de lta bu yi dbyibs gyur pa'i/ /dbus na sngo bsangs snang na ni/ /rdo rje rigs mchog dngos grub 'thob/ /de la 'di
ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/ de nyid la ni mkha' 'dra ba'i/ /pad+ma sngon po lta bur mthong / /pad+ma chen po'i rigs grub pa'i/ /dngos grub de ni legs
par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ /de nyid mkha' bzhin dri med las/ /'od zer dkyil 'khor
'phro bar ni/ /mthong na dngos grub myur du 'thob/ /rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa'i rnams/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas par/ /dngos grub dus su rang bzhin du/ /bdag
nyid kyi mdun mthong na 'o/ /rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mngon par
shes pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /lus kun de bzhin gshegs rnams dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsgoms
la/ /de bzhin lus las byung mthong na'o/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/ /
rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings na ni/ /sgrub pas cho ga 'di yis ni/ /mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni 'phrul gyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub yin no/ /phyag rgya
@#/ /chen por zhugs nas ni/ /mig gi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang / /gang yang rung ba des bsams na/ /shin tu ring ba'ang mthong 'gyur zhes/ /bcom
ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/ /phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni/ /rna ba'i rnam shes bskyed nas kyang / /des ni dgos pa gang bsams kyang / /shin tu ring na gnas thos
zhes/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/ /phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni/ /yid kyi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang / /sems can gang la des brtags na/ /de yi sems
ni nges shes 'gyur/ /phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni/ /bdag gam sems can gang yang rung / /yid kyis bltas nas gar skyes pa/ /gzugs ni de yis shes par 'gyur//
zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de nas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho ga shes pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin no/ /phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang / /rdzu 'phrul gang dang
gang 'dod pa/ /de nas gang yang rung bar ni/ /ting 'dzin gyis ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems chen pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i
rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khams gsum rnam rgyal mchog tu ni/ /rab mnyam gzhag pas bcings nas kyang / /cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa phos/ /
mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo/ /khros nas dgos pa thams cad ni/ /ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin bya/ /rdzu 'phrul mig la sogs tshul gyis/ /mngon shes kun bdag nyid du 'gyur//
zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud/ /'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog /rab mnyam
gzhag pas bcings na ni/ /cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos/ /mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du/ /cho ga bzhin du 'dod pas chags/ /'phrul gyi mig la
sogs tshul gyis/ /mngon shes thams cad thob 'gyur zhes/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi
rgyud de/ don kun grub pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni/ /cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos/ /mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo/ /ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/ /
'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams la mchod byas la/ /mngon shes lnga ni des 'thob bo/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs
thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs
@#/ /pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di
yin no/ /bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa yi/ /tshig gis mna' ni 'dor byed cing / /bden pa chen po bsrung na ni/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob bo/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i/ /dam tshig la ni
mna' bor la/ /rdo rje'i bden pa bsrungs na ni/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi bden pa'i
dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ci ste dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /shin tu 'di las 'da' bar dka'/ /rdo rje 'dzin la mna' 'dor cing / /bden pa 'di la bsrung bar bya/ /zhes sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ci ste dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /pad+ma chen po'i rigs
mchog gi /pad+ma'i chos la mna' 'dor zhing / /bden pa'i dam tshig bsrung bar bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi bden
ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'di las shin tu 'da' dka' bar/ /sangs rgyas chos la mna' 'dor zhing / /bden pa mchog 'di bsrungs na ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom
ldan 'das sangs rgyas mchod pas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi mna'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag
na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid
kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod nas/ /de yi 'og tu ma bsgrubs pas/ /rigs kun gyi ni phyag rgya rnams/ /nyid kyis bcings nas dam par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom
