ldan 'das dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ su ra tas+t+waM zhes brjod na/ /de nyid bskul
pa'i bdag nyid che/ /ma bsgrubs par yang phyag rgya kun/ /nyid kyis bcings na 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs

kyi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ hUM zhes bya ba gcig tsam gyis/ /mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung / /nyid bcings 'ching du bcug kyang rung / /de la 'di
@#/ /ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sarba shud+d+ha zhes brjod na/ bdag ga ma yang na gzhan dag gis/ /bud med chags
la sogs ldan na/ /thams cad du ni grol mi 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ oM zhes bya bas mdor bsdu na/ /phyag rgya thams
cad 'grub 'gyur te/ /'jig rten kun gyi mchog nyid kyi/ /rang 'byung nyid la mchod par 'gyur/ /rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud
do| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin
gshegs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dran byed cing / /sangs rgyas phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub brtan par yang / /bsgrubs na myur du 'grub par
'gyur/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/ /bcings nas de yi mdun du yang / /rdo rje sems dpa'
bsgoms na ni/ /shin tu myur bar dngos grub 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings na/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' bsgoms na ni/ /nyi rim du ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /chos kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang //
'jig rten mgon po bsgoms na ni/ /nyi rim du ni dngos grub thob/ /de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas
ni| |rdo rje snying po bsgoms na ni/ /nyi rim du ni dngos grub 'thob/ /rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos
grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni/ /bdag nyid dang ni mdun du yang / /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /de nas de ma thag tu 'grub/ /ces
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ rdo rje bzlas pa'i tshul gyis
ni| |'dod pa bdag ces bsgoms nas kyang / /phyag rgya thams cad bsgrubs na ni/ /grub pa'i mchog ni kun bsgrubs ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs
@#/ /so| |de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ bdag nyid nyid kyis rdo rje dbyibs/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas sgom byed
cing / /phyag rgya thams cad bcings na ni/ /de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i
rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ye shes kun 'byung dngos grub kyi/ /pad+ma chen po'i rigs la gnas/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid nyid/ /pad+ma'i dbyibs su
bsgom par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i rgyud
de| nor bu rin chen 'od zer 'bar/ /bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni/ /nor bu chen po'i rigs mchod na/ /kun las 'byung ba'i dngos grub 'thob/ /ces bcom ldan 'das nam
mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyis dngos grub dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje dbyings dbang
phyag rgya ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang / /snying ga mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor/ /bzhag na sangs rgyas byin rlob bo/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni
de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyud yin no/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sems dpa'i rdo rje dam byas la/ /snying ga mdzod spu mgrin pa dang / /spyi bor bzhag na
byin gyis rlob/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje hUM gi phyag rgya ni/ /rab mnyam
bzhag pas bcings nas kyang / /snying ga mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor/ /bzhag na nyid du byin gyis rlob/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtso bos gsungs/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi byin gyis
brlabs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje pad+ma dam byas la/ /snying ga mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor/ /byin gyis brlabs phyir gzhag par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan
'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyud do/ rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje nor bu che bcings la/ /snying ga mdzod
spu mgrin spyi bor/ /byin gyis brlab phyir gzhag par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying bos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de
@#/ /nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de
bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rin chen rdo rje bcings nas ni/ /dpral bar rab tu gzhag byas na/ /rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen gyis/ /dbang bskur bar ni de 'gyur
re/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje dbyings dbang la sogs
pa| |sangs rgyas phyag rgya mdun nas ni/ /brtsam pa byas nas ngos bzhir yang / /phreng ba nyid kyis dbang bskur 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi
rgyud de/ rdo rje dbang gi phreng ba ni/ /bcings nas dpral bar bzhag na yang / /phreng ba'i dbang ni de yin te/ /rdo rje rnams ni de dbang 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i
dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ chos kyi rdo rje bcings nas kyang / /mgo bor bzhag ste de dbang bskur/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni 'jig rten gyi/ /dbang phyug gis ni dbang bskur ro/ /zhes bcom
ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje rin chen myu gu bcings/ /dpral bar bzhag ste des dbang
bskur/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni mchod pa yi/ /dbang phyug tu ni dbang bskur 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub
gyi rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rgyal ba kun gyi rnam par ni/ /phyag rgya mnyam par bzhag par bcings/ /zlos shing sngags kyi rig pa ni/ /myur du dngos grub thob par
'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyu de/ sems dpa'i byin rlabs tshul gyis ni/ /ting
'dzin rdo rje chos kyis kyang / /snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams/ /zlos pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di
ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'dod chags las ni khyod phyung ste/ /bdag ni khro bo yin bsgoms nas/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams/ /myur du dngos
grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten dbang po'i rig zlos pas/ /byams
@#/ /pas 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /snying po la sogs bsgrubs na yang / /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs
dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ nam mkha' kun gyi ting 'dzin ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag par bsgoms na yang / /
snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams/ /bsgrubs na kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos
grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di
gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rab mnyam bzhag pas dang por ni/ /bdug pa la sogs mchod byas la/ /de nas dngos
grub 'dod pa yis/ /bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub
kyi rgyud de/ gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam bzhi yis/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa rjod byed cing / /bdag dbul ba la sogs pa yi/ /mchod pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan

'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khro bo rdo rje mchod chen po/ /khro bo gsang ba rjod byed cing / /khro bo'i khu tshur rab sbyar na/ /
myur du bdag gis rigs 'grub bo/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mdo sde zab cing rgya che ba'i/ /
tshul rnams legs par brjod nas kyang / /yid dang ngag gis phul na ni/ /dngos grub myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs
so| |de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ gdugs dang 'phan dang rgyal mtshan gyis/ /rgyal po'i mchod pas mchod byed cing / /sbyin pa thams cad byin na
ni| |nor bu'i rigs ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/ /nyid la byin gyis brlabs sogs ldan/ /rdo rje sems dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /cho 'phrul rnam
pa bzhi yis ni/ /rdo rje sna tshogs ting 'dzin gyi/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis
brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mchod pa rnams kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs
@#/ /pa thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos
grub kyi rgyud yin no/ /lus la sangs rgyas ting 'dzin ni/ /'di ni bde gshegs nyid mngon shes/ /de ni rab tu rtogs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub 'thob/ /ces sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'phrul gyi mig sogs mngon shes ni/ /rab
mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / /mngon shes lnga ni bdag gyur na/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di
ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khro bo mngon shes bskyed nas ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na yang / /mngon shes lnga ni bdag
gyur nas/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub
kyi rgyud de/ 'dod chags mngon shes bskyed nas kyang / /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni/ /mngon shes lnga ni bdag gyur nas/ /dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje spyan gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ /mchod pa'i mngon shes bskyed nas kyang / /rab mnyam
bzhag pas bsgoms na ni/ /mngon shes lnga yang bdag gyur nas/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi mngon
phar shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi
dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /bdag gis sangs
rgyas dran byed cing / /sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
pa'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /phyag rgya chen por sgom byed cing / /byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di/ /bsgoms
na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi
@#/ /rgyud de/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /lag pas dam tshig mchog bcings la/ /byang chub chen bo'i ye shes 'di/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob
par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten dbang phyug
ting 'dzin gnas/ /de bzhin chos kyi phyag rgya bzlas/ /byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs
kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ /rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /las kyi phyag rgya las legs
byed/ /byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di/ /bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi byang chub chen
po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par
bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ nyid kyi sangs rgyas byang chub phyir/ /
sems can don rnams rab byed cing / /sangs rgyas rjes su dran gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chags pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de
bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ji ltar yul dang ldan gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed ces/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sgom
byed cing / /de nyid bskur na myur bar ni/ /mnyes par 'gyur ba des 'grub bo/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mnyes par
byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /sangs rgyas bka' ni bsrung ba dang / /sems can don ni spyad pa'i phyir/ /rngam pas mngon spyod byas na ni/ /rdo rje rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom
ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ chags pas kun tu blta ba dang / /byams
dang snying rjes chos smra dang / /mi 'jigs kun sbyin byed pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mnyes par byed/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spyan gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs
mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ dbang bskur ba ni rab sbyin dang / /nor bsags rab tu sbyin byed cing / /de yang sangs rgyas don du sbyor/ /'di ni sangs rgyas mnyes par byed/ /
@#/ /ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
pa'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ de ltar rnam dag bde sbyin pa/ /'dod chags la ni brnyas mi bya/ /sems can kun gyi don du brtson/ /'di ni sangs rgyas dbang du
byed/ /ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'dod sten bde ba'i bdag nyid
kyis/ /su ra ta s+t+waM zhes smra zhing / /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrubs na ni/ /de nyid bskul na dbang du 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i
rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas bka' ni sems can rnams/ /dag bya lus can skyabs sbyin dang / /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ /bsad
na yang ni dbang du 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ pad+ma 'dab ma kha
'byed cing / /'dod chags dag la kun rtog la/ /gdul ba'i phyir ni chags byed cing / /'dod par byed pa dbang du 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi
dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur phyir/ /rdo rje rin chen nyin re rer/ /spyi bor bzhag ste dbang
bskur na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i
rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sems can kun don ma mthong zhing / /sangs rgyas de nyid ma sbyangs la/ /yid dang ngag dang lus kyis ni/ /bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ dngos grub thams cad ma thob la/ /rigs
rnams kyang ni mi brtson zhing / /rdo rje kun tu brtags nas ni/ /bsad na dngos grub myur du thob/ /ces bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi bsad pa'i
@#/ /dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ma rungs mi brtul khro med cing / /de bzhin sems can mi 'dul la/ /bdag nyid sdug bsngal 'thob byed na/ /hUM zhes bya bas bsad par bya//
zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ snying rje med cing byams med la/ /sems can ma rungs mi skyong zhing / /
bdag nyid kyi ni bslus na yang / /bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi
bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mi gtong bdag la nor med cing / /nor stor ba dang gnod byed la/ /dbul por gyur la sems can rnams/ /bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom
ldan 'das re ba thams cad yongs su skong bas gsungs so/ /kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /rnal 'byor ma thob gsod bcug na/ /de dag drang bar bya ba'i phyir/ /bdag gi dngos grub
sbyin par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu bzang pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems
dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i srung ba'i dngos grub kyi
rgyud de/ sems can thams cad mi gtong zhing / /rtag tu sangs rgyas chos bdag nyid/ /rtag par sangs rgyas yid la byed/ /'di ni srung ba rmad kyi mchog /ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan tsam zhig /lan gcig tsam yang brjod gyur na/ /'di ni srung ba
brtag chen po/ /skad cig dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rigs dang rgyud kyis chog

mi shes/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid kyis/ /rdo rje hUM la mos byed pa/ /'di ni bdag dang gzhan las srung / /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi srung ba'i

dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /'dod chags dag cing byams pa che/ /thams cad la ni mi 'jigs sbyin/ /'jig rten dbang gis mtshan zlos pa/ /srung ba 'di ni rmad du che/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs

so| |de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /sangs rgyas sems can gtong byed par/ /ci nus par ni sbyor byed cing / /nyi ma stongs par mi bya bar/ /srung ba 'di ni rmad kyi mchog /
ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje srung bas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das
@#/ /la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rgyud 'di ba zhes par gsol/ gang gis sems can thams cad
brtag pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu gyur nas rtogs par bgyi ste/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i slad du'o/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ phyag na rdo rje la legs par bshad pas nged kyis blangs shing byin gyis brlabs
kyis legs so legs so/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rdo
rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/ /mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so/ /rdo
rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ brtag pa thams
cad kyi thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos
grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la dang po 'dir ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ sangs rgyas byang chub ting nge 'dzin/ /rab mnyam
bzhag pas bsgoms na ni/ /byang chub bde bas thob par 'gyur/ /bsams nas de ni rtogs par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /de la
'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ sems dpa' rdo rje snying gar bcings/ /nga yi chung ma khyod sdug pa/ /brtan par gyur cig ces

smras nas/ /phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub bya ste/ /chog 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /rang gis las rnams ma grub kyang / /gsang ba'i chung ma zhes smras na/ /shin tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan
'das sems dpa' rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ji lta ba bzhin bsgrubs na yang / /dngos grub thob par ma gyur na/ /hUM gis phyag
rgyas bsad na ni/ /skrag ste dngos grub sbyin par byed/ /ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so/ /de bzhin 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi
dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud de/ ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / /rdo rje blta bas bltas nas kyang / /bdag gis chung ma'am gzhan chung ma/ /sdug pa'i
@#/ /dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'dod pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /
dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/ /bde ba'i mchog ces smra byed cing / /sangs rgyas kun la nyid dbang po/ /phul na myur du dngos grub 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das nor bu
bzhed pas gsungs so/ /rigs dam pa thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ sa ma
ya s+t+waM zhes brjod cing / /bud med kun la chags byas la/ /sems can don gyis mi skyo na/ /nges par sangs rgyas des mnyes so/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ 'dod chags la ni brnyas mi bya/ /bud med kun dang rtse byed
pa| |rdo rje rnams kyi gsang dam tshig /'di ni bsrung na 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam
tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ gsod pa 'jig rten thams cad gsod/ /lus dang ngag la dam dgyes pa/ /'jig rten rnam par sbyangs nas ni/ /dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin
pa'o| |zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ dag pa'i bdag
nyid 'dod chags dag /mu stegs rnal 'byor ma dag la/ /dag pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig ni/ /bsrung na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs
kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje nor bu sngar bcings la/ /ma rungs
rnams kyi nor phrogs na/ /dam tshig dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i
rgyud do/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la
'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ chos rnams rang bzhin dag par ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / /dgos pa thams cad
@#/ /byas nas kyang / /sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub 'thob/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos
kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ sems can kun la chags byed cing / /yul la skyo bar ma gyur la/ /bud med dga' ba'i dag pa ni/ /gsang chos dngos grub rab sbyin no/ /zhes bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rna ba'i rnal 'byor hUM zhes pa/ /phra ba'i rdo rje ting 'dzin gnas/ /mi 'grungs
rnal 'byor 'di bsad ces/ /rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rjes bsgyel/ /dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig dam pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+mo
rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis/ /bud med kun dang rtse byed cing / /chos kyi dngos grub thob par
'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ dbang po gnyis
ni mnyam sbyar la/ /re ba thams cad yongs bkang nas/ /bud med dam ni sdug pa yi/ /dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches
gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos
grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran
bsgoms la/ /bud med lus kyi bu gar blugs/ /bud med rnams ni dbang du 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /bu ga nas ni de bzhin zhugs/ /bud med lus su legs khyab byas/ /sems med pa
yang mgu bar 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dgyes pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje hUM gi phyag rgya ni/ /rab mnyam
bzhag pas bcings nas kyang / /khros nas bu gar zhugs na ni/ /yid kyis de ni dbab par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs
kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ chos kyi las kyi phyag rgya ni/ /bcings nas pad+ma'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /bu gar bcug na bud med rnams/ /thams cad kyang ni bsrung bar
@#/ /'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad+ma sa gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /rdo rje
rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /las kyi rdo rje nor bur bcings/ /bu gar bcug na bud med rnams/ /nyid du phab nas gar byed 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo
rje rin po ches gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag rdo rjes de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo dag pa'i dngos grub
gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bya zhing / /phyag rgya bud med rnams kyis bskor/ /des ni sangs rgyas gzhag
par bya/ /gsang ba der ni zhugs nas kyang / /sangs rgyas la ni nyid du smra/ /baR+ya he ta paSh+Ta sa ba bi bo da ta swa mAM sarba/ /rigs rnams kun gyi phyag rgya ni/ /tshul
rnams la yang de skad brjod/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyam med pa'i/ /gsang ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bar ni/ /dkyil 'khor
legs par bri bar bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams ni/ /thams cad kyi ni mchog 'tshal te/ /dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs nas kyang / /dngos grub
'dod pas myur bar ni/ /su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM ho/ badzra s+t+wa Ad+ya sid+d+h+ya mAM/ zhes brjod snying po 'di bzlas te/ /bsgrubs na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/
de nyid bskul ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /mgu nas myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil
'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dra bar ni/ /rdo rje rigs kun rnams kyi ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jug par
yang / /mkhas pas legs par bri bar bya/ /der zhugs nas ni myur ba yang / /dngos grub gsol ba 'debs byed cing / /rA ga twa si saM b+hA ta/ smra na kun
tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /pad+ma'i
@#/ /rigs ni thams cad kyis/ /'gro la 'dul ba'i tshul du ni/ /mkhas bas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /der zhugs nas ni brjod bya ba/ /rA
ga d+harma mahA pad+ma pra sid d+ha la ga me bi bo/ /de skad smras nas dkyil 'khor ni/ /kun gyi des ni dngos grub 'thob/ /ces bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang
pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /nor bu chen po'i rigs rnams ni/ /don kun 'grub
pa'i tshul du yang / /dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas ni/ /zhugs nas 'di skad smra bar bya/ /sarba pri ya sid+d+hi mAM/ rA ga shi sid+d+hi mAM/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi
mahA s+t+wa/ bcom ldan thams cad grub pa po/ /de skad smras nas dkyil 'khor kun/ /zhugs nas mchod gsang bla med pa'i/ /dngos grub chen po
thob par 'gyur/ /phyin chad dngos grub bdag nyid kyis/ /bsgrub na dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang tshe myur du mi 'grub na/ /de nyid bskul
na 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud
do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di
gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /ta thA ga ta mahA de bi bya/ pri ya sarba su khaM pra ta/ bden
las byung ba'i tshig bden pas/ /bsgrubs kyang de ni ma grub na'o/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du/ /phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni/ /'di ni de nyid gsang ba yi/ /
rdo rje tshul gyis 'di smros shig /badzra s+t+wa sa ma ya haM/ twa me baR+ya ti tiSh+Tha/ sarba kA ya mA ma ri shwa ra dza/ badzra gar+b+hes mu ta k+Shi pa/ rdo rje 'gying ba'i lha mo che/ /de
nyid bskul bas chags 'gyur bas/ /lus kun la ni brtan 'gyur nas/ /ji bzhin myur du dngos grub bo/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'gying ba'i bdag pos
gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /sid+d+hi sid+d+hi sa ma ye/ sa ma yo haM taM pri ya mAM/ zhes bskul myur du
@#/ /chags gyur na/ /rab tu yang ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni
pad+ma'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya mahA satwa/ baR+ya ta me a ti pri ya/ ces ni bskul na myur ba yang / /rjes
su chags nas 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
do/ /sarba karme ma da baR+ya wa ta/ ma me sid d+h+ya d+ha badzri Ni/ rdo rje can gyis bskul myur bar/ /rjes su chags nas 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom
ldan 'das nam mkha' snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /mu stegs can rnams phan gdags phyir/ /ri mo'i phyag rgya'i tshul
du ni/ /sangs rgyas btsun mo rab spa bar/ /shes na rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi dam tshig gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /sems can
kun gyi yid la khyab/ /sems can kun la bde spyin zhing / /sems can kun gyi yab nyid ni/ /dam tshig mchog gi 'dod pa'i mchog/
ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba'i mchog ste rmad che
bar/ /dang ldan shes nas dad byas nas/ /bsgrub dka' ba yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /
de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /chags pas dag pa'i chags bral gyi/ /sems can don gyi yid phyung nas/ /mu
stegs lta bar byas pa ste/ /lta ba ngan pa'i gcong rong ltung / /theg pa che la 'god pa'i phyir/ /gsod pa'i tha tshig mchog yin te/ /de ltar shes na 'grub par
@#/ /'gyur /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mu stegs can
rnams gzhom pa'i phyir/ /'byung ba che las thams cad 'byung / /mi gtsang zhes ni ci phyir brjod/ /nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
can gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ /bud med chags phyir rin chen rnams/ /rtag tu legs par bsag
par bya/ /bud med bla med rin chen zhes/ /bsams nas de ni 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du mdzad pas gsungs so/ /rigs thams
cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ bud med
chags rnams yongs bskor la/ /kun nas rtses pa'i bde ba ni/ /sangs rgyas mchod phyir phul na yang / /mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ zhes sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ yang dgas ngal te skyo ba na/ /rab gza' las byung
bde ba de/ /phyag bzhis pos ni mchod pa'i phyir/ /phul na myur du grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzi pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchod
pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ hUM gi dam tshig bcings nas ni/ /skye bo bud med 'khyud nas ni/ /'khyud par gyur ba'i bde ba de/ /phul na de ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes
bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ 'jig rten dbang por bdag bsgoms la/ /sdug pa'i
gdong du bltas nas ni/ /bltas par gyur pa'i bde ba de/ /phul na de yi 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i spyan gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs
kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ las kyi phyag rgya bcings gyur la/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas kyang / /bud med 'khyud pa'i longs spyod ni/ /mchod phyir
phul na 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen gyis gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas
@#/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la
'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdzogs sangs rgyas su bdag bsgoms la/ /ci nas sus kyang mi tshor bar/ /gzhan
gyi bud med rtse byed na/ /mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang
ba'i mchod pa'i rgyud de/ rdo rje 'jom byas nas kyang / /rdo rje phreng ba 'ching byed cing / /de nas rdo rje glu blangs la/ /rdo rje gar gyis mchod byas la/ /'dod pa'i dga' bas
dbang bskur mchog /glu dang gar gyi bde ba las/ /bde ba gzhan gyis myong min te/ /de phyir gsang mchog 'di bla med/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i
dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal bsgom/ /cho ga ji bzhin tshul du yang / /gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod na ni/ /mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par
'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgyar
gnas/ /gsang pa'i tshul ni ci bzhin par/ /las kyi phyag rgyas rab mchod na/ /mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras
gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ don kun grub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /gsang ba'i tshul ni
ji bzhin par/ /las kyi phyag rgyas rab mchod na/ /mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi gsang
ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed pa'i gsang
ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na nyid bskyed pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ mdor na ting 'dzin ye shes las//
sems can rnams la chags tshul gyis/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub 'gyur na/ /myur du bla med thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
so| |de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid chen po bskyed pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ sems can thog ma tha ma med/ /nam mkha' 'byung
@#/ /ba'i mtshan nyid de/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /'dod pa'i 'gro ba kun bdag po/ /sems can kun gyi sems gang ni/ /brtan phyir sems
dpa' zhes bya'o/ /rdo rje mnyam par mnyam gzhag na/ /nges par rdo rje nyid gyur pa/ /sems dpa'i byin rlabs tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur/ /bcom
ldan sems dpa' de nyid de/ /rdo rje bzhad pa de bzhin gshegs/ /nyid sems rab tu rtogs la sogs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub cho ga bzhin/ /de nyid bcom ldan de
bzhin gshegs/ /thams cad kyi ni rigs su 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang / tha ma med pa'i sems dpas gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
nyid de/ /de nyid rdo rje'i rigs chen po/ /de nyid pad+ma'i rigs dag pa/ /de nyid nor bu'i rigs kyi mchog/ ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
'khor los gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad bskyed pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag
na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
rigs kyi mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' thugs la gnas/ /mnyam par bzhag las ting
'dzin te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu bsgrub/ ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i mngon par brjod
pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ rab tu rtogs phyir rdo rje ste/ /gzung ba'i tshul gyis lcags kyu yin/ /phra mo rtogs phyir mda' yin la/ /mgu bar gyur phyir legs zhes bya/ /
spras pa'i phyir yang rin chen gsungs/ /gzi brjid tshul gyis nyi ma ste/ /rgyal mtshan legs par sgreng bar gsungs/ /'dzum phyir bzhad par grags pa la/ /'dod chags dag phyir
pad+ma yin/ /ral gris nyon mongs dgra gcod yin/ /dkyil 'khor tshul du 'khor lo ste/ /tshig gis brjod pas smra zhes bya/ /rgya gram tshul du kun rdo rje/ /mi tshugs tshul gyis go
cha yin/ /'jigs byed tshul gyis mche ba ste/ /phyag rgya'i tshul gyis bsdams pa'o/ /ji ltar bcom ldan sems rtag pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' kun 'gro ba/ /de bzhin rdo rje mtshan
la sogs/ /bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan mas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma
@#/ /mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi
phyag rgya bcing ba skye ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang
ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung bcings la/ /lag gnyis rdo rjer bsdams pa las/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur//
zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud
de| ji ltar rgyal po nyid phyag rgya/ /rgyal po khrims la 'debs pa ltar/ /bdag nyid chen po skye bo rnams/ /sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi/ /gzugs brnyan gyi ni tshul du
yang | |nyid kyi phyag rgya btab pa ni/ /bdag nyid che ba'i phyag rgya cher/ /shes nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya chen pos gsungs so/ /
de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ ji ltar dam tshig dam pa ni/ /skye bo 'gas ni bcings gyur na/ /shin
tu 'da' bar mi bya ba/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa yis/ /rdo rje bcing ba'i mchog bcings na/ /ma shi bar du mi 'da' bar/ /shes nas
dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing bskye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i
rgyud de/ mdor na rgyal bas rdo rje'i ngag/ 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/ /'di ni bcings par shes nas kyang / /des ni chos kyi dngos grub 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo
rje chos kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje las kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ rdo rje bka' dang las mang rnams/ /'da' bar
bya ba ma yin zhing / /bka' nyan pa yi las de ni/ /shes na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi phyag
rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas ba gsang ba'i rgyud do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di yang bdag gis yongs su gzung zhing byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/
@#/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/ /mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs
so| |rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa gsang
ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran tshul
gyis| |sangs rgyas chos kyi ting 'dzin ni/ /mnyam bar bzhag pas bsgoms na yang / /bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ chags pas rjes su dran tshul gyis/ /sems dpa' thams
cad ting 'dzin gnas/ /rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni/ /dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin
gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khams gsum rnam rgyal cha lugs su/ /bsgoms nas mdun dang de bzhin te/ /phyag na rdo rje'i
mthur gyur nas/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi
rgyud de/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i chos su ni/ /bsgoms nas mdun du de bzhin te/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan par/ /'dul bar de ni rab byed ces/ /bcom ldan rdo rje chos kyis
gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ don kun grub pa'i skur yang ni/ /bsgoms nas mdun du de bzhin te/ /rnam pa'i mchog
kun ldan pa yi/ /phun tshogs don ni des 'thob bo/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i
rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so//
@#/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran gyur la/ /rdo rje phra mo tshul gyis ni/ /badzra
badzra zhes brjod na/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin du/ /rdo rje phra mo sgom byed cing / /badzra satwa zhes brjod na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'grub po
zhes bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khams gsum rnam rgyal cha lugs su/ /
dran byed mdun du de bzhin te/ /hUM hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod na/ /dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i
rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs kyis ni/ /rdo rje phra mo sgom byed cing / /sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya zhes brjod na/ /dngos grub
dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ don kun
grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /rdo rje phra mo bsgoms nas kyang / /sid+d+h+ya sid+d+h+ya zhes brjod na/ /don gyi dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i chos kyis gsungs so//
rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam
pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ dam pa'i chos
ni yi ge med/ /ting 'dzin ye shes 'byung ba ste/ /a zhes bya bas chos rnams ni/ /skye ba med par dgongs pa ste/ /phyag rgya 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /shes pas bsgoms te de nas
kyang / |yi ge kun gyi ye shes ni/ /bde gshegs skad cig gis 'gyur zhes/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ de bzhin gshegs kun de nyid kyi/ /mdo sde 'di ni dad pa
yis| |dad nas bcangs sam bklags gyur na/ /dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs
@#/ /kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sdig pa'i sems can phan don du/ sdig can sdig spyod bzlog pa dang / /sangs rgyas
bka' ni srung ba'i phyir/ /bsad pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye
shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'dod chags rang bzhin dag par shes/ /dam pa'i don du dgongs nas kyang / /thog ma tha mar 'di bsgoms na/ /chos kyi dngos grub
thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos mkhyen pa'i dngos grub kyi
rgyud de/ sems can don phyir sbyin byed cing / /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed cing / /chos bsgoms 'di ni nor bu yi/ /rigs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur
zhes bcom ldan 'das chos rin chen gyis gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas kyi ni ting 'dzin las/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrubs pa/ /'di ni bsgom par byas nas kyang / /dngos grub dam
pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje
sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /bla med dang ni las mang rnams/ /sems dpa' kun 'gyur thams cad dang / /shes na yang ni grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das
rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sdig pa dag pa rgyu ba'i phyir/ /mtshams med byed las mi
zlogs na/ /gsod pa'i las la dad pa na/ /des ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi ting nge
'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sdig kun rnam par dag pa'i bdag /kun dag pas na dgos pa kun/ /des byed las 'di yin no bar/ /shes na yang ni 'grub
par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ srid ldan dbul po thams cad
@#/ /kyi| |rtag tu bsam pa kun bkang la/ /don kun grub pas kun bdag ni/ /grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rin po che rgyal mtshan
gyis gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud
de| rtag tu rdo rje phra mo'i tshul/ /'bad pa kun gyi sbyor na ni/ /rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa yi/ /mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ slob dpon ma yin gzhan dang ni/ /slob ma ma yin bu min
pa'i| |mdun du phyag rgya mi brjod de/ /de dag gsang bas phyag rgya 'grub/ ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi phra mo'i dngos
grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /sna nas hUM byung ldan gyur la/ /rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed/ /ces bcom
ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ pad+ma chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje lta bas bltas
na ni| |'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+ma bzhad pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo
rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /shin tu phra ba'i lta 'bar bas/ /don ni thams cad 'dren par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsungs
so| |nor bu'i rigs thams cad kyi phra mo'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mig
gi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ gang tshe phyag rgya'am ting nge 'dzin/ /sgrub phyir
stsol bar gyur pa na/ /gang tshe mkha' la skar ma 'dra/ /dkar po rgyug par des mthong na/ /de tshe blo ldan sangs rgyas kyi/ /spyan ni bdag gis thob 'gyur zhes/ /phyin chad sangs
rgyas rnams kyis ni/ /rtogs pa kun las bsgrub par bya/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes
@#/ /kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ gnas dang 'gro ba de bzhin te/ /ji snyed dngos po yod 'gyur pa/ /de snyed kyi ni gzugs brnyan rnams/ /mkha' rgyug 'gro ba'am
'ong yang rung / /mthong na rdo rje spyan dag par/ /shes pas mchod na dngos grub ni/ /bla na med pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /
de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ g.yas pa 'am ni g.yon phyogs kyi/ /mkha' la nam mkha'i dbyings nyid ni/ /sprin 'drar myur du 'khor bar
yang | |mig gis mthong bar gyur pas kyang / /rdo rje las byung phyag rgya de/ /mthong nas 'jigs par ma gyur la/ /phyag rgya de ni bzung na ni/ /rdo rje spyan ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /
zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ gang tshe skya 'am dmar ba dang / /dkar ba'am ser ba'am
sna tshogs kyi/ /dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /dgongs 'gyur 'khor lo'i sbyan 'grub 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad+mas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i
rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mkha' la rin chen 'dra ba dang / /gser la sogs ba 'dra bar ni/ /gang tshe mkha' mthong mkha' yi mig /de ni 'grub
par 'gyur ro zhes/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las
dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/ /'dod chags bde ba rnam smin phyir/ /gtso bo thams cad mchod byas pa/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub
thob par 'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'dod chags
bdag ces sgo ma byed cing / /gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas na/ /rdo rje 'dod pa'i gzi can mnyam/ /dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
bzhad pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khro ba bdag ces sgom byed cing / /gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas pa/ /khams
gsum rnam rgyal 'dra ba yi/ /dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi las
@#/ /dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ nang du song ba'i yid kyi ni/ 'dod pa dam par sgom byed cing / /dbyangs dang ldan pa'i yi ge yis/ /sangs rgyas
mngon par mchod na ni/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni
nor bu'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje snying por mnyam bzhag la/ /bsam pa g.yos pas btud nas ni/ /phyag la rtag tu brtson byas na/ /dbang
bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbang rin po ches gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas ba'i rgyud de/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la
'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'dod la sogs pa'i bde ba kun/ /rtag tu bdag gi snying la gnas/ /e ma'o
sems can don rnams la/ /skyob par gyur pa grang bshad rmad/ /'di ni las kyi dam tshig gyi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin du/ /bsgoms nas sangs
rgyas mchod na ni/ /dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi
dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /sems can kun la bde sbyin pa'i/ /kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te/ /mchod na
dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sems can kun la phan
byed pa'i/ /kun bzang khro bo bdag yin te/ /rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis/ /mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni
pad+ma'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa'i/ /kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te/ /bdag nyid 'gro 'dul skur
gnas la/ /mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+ma chags pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos
grub kyi rgyud de/ sems can kun la don chen sbyin/ /kun bzang rgyal po bdag yin te/ /don kun grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes
@#/ /bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/
de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs thams cad kyi las kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /
so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi grub kyi rgyud de/ rang gi ting nger 'dzin pa yis/ /g.yas pa'i mdzub mos mdud nas ni/ /go char bcings te
spyi bor bzhag /shin tu yang ni bsrungs par 'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi rigs
kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ rtsig pa la ni ldan 'dra ba/ /ri mor bris nas mtshan bsring ste/ /mnyes na bud med gang bsams pa/ /de ni 'di yi dbang du
'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ sa la gnod sbyin
gdong bris la/ /de yi mig gi phyogs su ni/ /mdzub mo'i sen mo btsugs na yang / /bud med mchog ni 'dren par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas
gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ lag pa gnyis su pad+ma blangs/ /'dod chags dag pa lta byed cing / /rdo rje lta bas bud
med de/ /bltas na yang ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+ma 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi
rgyud de/ rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gnas/ /lag pa gnyis kyi nor bu bzung / /hUM zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /bud med kun la 'dud byed do/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
hUM gis gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mchod pa'i
las kyi cho gar sbyar/ /gang dang gang gi dgos bsams pa/ /de dang de ni gsol btab ste/ /mkhas pas phyag rgya bsgrub par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings
kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs ba'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa
@#/ /cho gar sbyar/ /dgos pa gang zhig smras ba de/ /myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni
rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khro bo'i ting 'dzin zhugs nas kyang / /rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod chen byas/ /mkhas pas cung zad gang bsams
pa| |de ni myur du dngos grub 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khro bos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten
dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /yid kyi mchod pa byas nas kyang / /mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa/ /de yi dngos grub thams cad thob/ /ces bcom ldan 'das pad+ma
'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /bdug pa la sogs mchod byas la/ /
mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsam pa/ /de kun skad cig nyid 'grub 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i
dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs
so| |de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ /sangs
rgyas phyag rgya rab bsgrubs pas/ /dngos grub rnam pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
pa'i rigs kyi sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ kun gyi bdag nyid sems dpa' ni/ /bdag gi lus la gnas pa ste/ /sems dpa'
bdag ces byin brlabs la/ /bdag ces bya ba'i nga rgyal gyis/ /bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po
mngon par 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rdo rje'i byin gyi brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de/ sems dpa' ji bzhin phyag rgya bzhin/ /
phyag rgya ji bzhin bdag de bzhin/ /cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i
rigs kyi chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de/ chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje phra mo bsgoms byas la/ /ngag gi phyag rgyas de dag kun/ /sems
@#/ /dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin/ /ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs
kyi las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas kun la dbang bskur dang / /mchod dang dam tshig dngos grub rnams/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes bsgoms
nas kyang / /rdo rje las rnams bsgrub par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las kyis gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /de nas yang
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya bi byin no/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/ /
mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so/ /rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las brtag pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa// //bam po dgu pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa
'di gsungs so/ /lta ba ngan cing chags bral la/ /gsang ba 'di ni mi rigs te/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /de bzhin cho ga bshad par bya/ /de nas yang byang chub
sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de la 'di ni snying po'i yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud yin te/ dkyil 'khor chen po mthong nas/ bdug pa
dang | mar me dang / me tog dang / dri'i phyag rgya rnams kyis mchod pa byas te/ de nas rdo rje tshig gis bzlas pa brtsam par bya'o/ /de la 'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i
rgyud de/ zla ba bzhir gnas ji bzhin par 'dug ste/ dus bzhir bdug pa la sogs pas cho ga bzhin du mchod nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po
mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod de/ /phyag rgya bzhis phyag bya ba'i tshul gyis phyag byas la sngags 'di bzhis
@#/ /bdag gi lus dbul zhing mchod pa bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzo ba s+tha nA ya/ At+mA naM nir+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ oM sarba

ta thA ga ta pU dzA a b+hi She kA ya At+mA naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA pra brta nA ya At+ma naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra
d+harma pra brta ya mAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA karma ni At+mA naM ni r+yA ta ya mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru mAM/ de nas 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang ma
bral la kha zas kun dang 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod cing bdag nyid snying po'i don du sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan mdun du tshig tsam gyis kyang bsgoms la ci dga'
bar byed cing rdo rje tshig gis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na myur bar dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /ci ste bla na med pa'i
dngos grub 'dod na ni de nas ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbus na bzhugs/ de'i sems dpa' chen po bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du kha
dog dang | rgyan rnams ci dga' bar bya ste bri zhing / sems dpa' chen po rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs la rigs kyi lha mo rnams grwa rnams su gri'o/ /de
nas ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas la 'dzab bya ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas mthar mchod pa rgya cher byas la mtshan thog thag
bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
'dzin pas gsungs so/ /yang na phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na ni des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi phyag
rgya'i spyan sngar ci dga' ba bzhin du ji lta ba bzhin bcings shing dkrol te/ rdo rje'i tshig 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas mthar mtshan thog thag ngal mi gso bar cung zad tsam
zhig phyag rgya bkrol te/ ji lta ba bzhin bcings nas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya 'bar zhing 'bab la 'phar zhing nyung bar smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag rgya bcings bzhin du
nam mkha' la lding bar 'gyur ro/ /gzugs ci dga' ba dang / mi snang ba dang / las thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ /bcings ma thag tu phyag rgya thams cad kyis kyang las
thams cad ji lta ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /yang na ting nge 'dzin bsgrub par 'dod na ni des rdo rje phra mo nas brtsams
@#/ /te| ting nge 'dzin de gang la dga' ba'i snying po'i rnal 'byor gyi tshul du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bsgoms la/ de nas mthar mtshan thog thag skyil mi krung /
mi zhig par snyoms par zhugs te 'dug par bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro//
de nas ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /ci ste las sgrub par 'dod na'ang de bzhin du bzlas shing zla ba
gcig gi bar du bsgrubs la/ de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das
rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /ci ste las shig bya bar 'dod na yang lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis bdag dang / gzhan dang / grong dang / grong khyer rnams go cha bcing ba
la sogs pas bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /dbab pa'ang bya ste tsan+dan dri zhim pos gdon gyis zin pa dang / gdon gyi ma zin pa rnams rdo rje dang / lcags kyu dang / lag
pa dang / mda' thogs pa dang / rin po che dang / nyi ma dang / rgyal mtshan dang / so'i phreng ba dang / pad+ma dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / lce dang / rdo rje rgya gram dang /
go cha dang / mche ba dang / khu tshur dang / phyag rgyal sogs pa dngos po thams cad gcig brjod pas 'bebs par byed do/ /sgyu ma'i las kyang byed de/ rma bya'i mjug sgro'i nang
du rdo rje bcug ste bcings la/ de nas rma bya'i mjug sgro de sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas mnan la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya babs kyi
bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas rma bya'i mjug sgro las gzugs sna tshogs pa la sogs par snang bar 'gyur te/ de phyin chad rma bya'i mjug sgros rang gi lus la cho ga bzhin du
gzugs thams cad kyang ston te/ mjug sgro de nyid la lan gcig bzlas te bskor bas kyang / bdag nyid las gzugs thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mjug sgro de nyid
kyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu ma'i las rnams kyang ston/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs brnyan yang ston/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis bdud sde dang bcas pa rnams 'dul ba la sogs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rol pa
la sogs pa mdzad pa rnams kyang ston pa nas/ bdag nyid las rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyang ston pa'i bar du'o/ /ci ste dbang du
@#/ /byed par 'dod na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la phyag rgya de 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas
par bya'o/ /de nas de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed cing dbang du byed na sems dpa' gzhan lta smos kyang ci
dgos/ ci ste 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos bsgrub par 'dod na'ang des dang po kho nar de bzhin du zlo sa shing zla ba gcig tu brgyad stong bzlas la
de nas mthar phyag rgya bcings te/ de bzhin du mtshan thog thag phyag rgya 'bar gyi bar bzlas par bya'o/ /de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi dngos
grub dang rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub gang yang rung ba gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yo byad
dang cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas rdo rje'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang por ni sngar bsnyen pa bya ste/ de ltar ci 'dod
pa bzhin du yi ge 'bru 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ /de'i mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas ba byas la de phyin chad sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / chad pas
bcad par nus par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /don te sgrub par 'dod na'ang / des ji lta ba bzhin du ri mo'i sku gzugs bris la/ des de
bzhin du mchod pa byas nas zla ba gcig tu 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing ci dga' ba bzhin du byas nas brgya stong du bzlas bar rdus bzhir rdo rje'i tshig gis zlo sa shing zla ba'i
mthar phyin pa dang / ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings la phyag rgya bcings pa de las hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra byung gi bar du bzlas par
bya'o| |de nas nam langs pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mdun du gnas nas bka' nod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig
'dzin gyis 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o/ /gang gi tshe ngas khyod tshur shog 'di byos shig/ ces bsgo ba de'i tshe na khyod 'dir 'ongs la nga'i bka' bzhin byos shig/ de phyin chad
'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag por 'gyur te/ yud tsam gyis kyang sa gsum pa thams cad la ci dgar bka' stsol cing bskor te slar 'ongs nas kyang phan gdags
pa dang / chad pas bcad pa rnams byed cing lha rdzas kyi 'jig rten gsum longs spyod la nye bar spyad nas ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du byed cing lha thams cad kyi dbang po'i bud
@#/ /med la sogs pa bud med thams cad mgu bar byas nas/ nye bar spyod kyang de la su gang gis byas kyang gnod par byed nus pa med de/ hUM zhes bya bas lha
la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad gnon cing de nas bskal pa chung du'i stong gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /ci ste phyag
rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang ji lta ba bzhin du bzlas pa byas la bzlas pa'i mthar rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o//
de nas nam langs pa dang phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas hUM zhes bya ba dang ldan par ji lta ba'i cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya bcings na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / gzugs
rnams ston pa dang / mi snang par 'gyur ba dang / sgyu ma rnams ston pa dang / thams cad la dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / thams cad kyi dga' ba
bskyed par bya ba dang / rin po che thams cad bsdu ba dang / 'od zer 'bar ba chen po bstan pa dang / rin po che'i char 'bebs par bstan pa dang / gad mo cher bgad
pa dang / sems can thams cad spyad pa dang / bcad pa dang / dbye ba dang / dus kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin pa'i de kho na nyid brjod pa dang / las
thams cad la 'jug pa dang / bsrung ba dang / rmongs pa dang / gnon pa dang / dgag pa dang / bsngags pa dang / bsang ba dang / sems can thams cad phyag rgya gdab pa dang / 'dod
pa'i dga' ba la 'jug pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / dngos po thams cad glu len du gzhug pa dang / gang byed du gzhug ba dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang /
dbab pa la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /ci ste rdo rje phra mo bsgrub par 'dod na'ang des rdo rje hUM zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du bsgom zhing de bzhin du bzlas pa'i tshul gyis zla ba gcig tu bsgrub par bya ste/ de nas mthar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas
par bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang mngon par shes pa lngar gyur nas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / tshar gcad pa nus par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan
'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du zlo ba gcig tu bsgrub la de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de
nas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de nas las rnams byed par 'dod na yang lan gcig brjod de yid kyi
@#/ /bsam pas bsrung ba la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas pad+ma'i
rigs kyi yo byad dang / chog rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang por 'bum bzlas pa byas na bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bsgrub par bya ste ras la bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams
cad 'dul ba la sogs pa bris pa de'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du sems dpa' chen po bzhi bris la grwa rnams su lha mo rnams bri'o/ /de nas bzlas pa'i cho ga de
bzhin du rgyas par byas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byon te/ dus ji bzhin par dam pa'i skabs
'byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na'ang des de bzhin du pad+ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag brgyad
tshang bar brjod pa'i bar du dus bzhir bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu phyag rgya bcings te/ bzlas pa byas la nam langs pa dang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /
de nas phyag rgya bcings pas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byed do/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /ci ste ting nge 'dzin
gyi tshul du bsgrub bar 'dod na yang de bzhin du zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu ji ltar dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang ting nge 'dzin
thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/ /ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na'ang de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig
thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /pad+ma'i rigs kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa
rdzogs so// //de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag rnam bzhi
byas la 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin du ras la bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du bris la/ de nas de bzhin du mchod pa
byas te/ de bzhin du bsgrub la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang
bskur ba'i rin po che byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po byon nas dbang bskur ba sbyin pa mdzad do/ /dbang bskur ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
@#/ /der rig 'dzin gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin
du chos kyi rdo rje ma'i tshul rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrub na bsam pa thams cad kyi las byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas
gsungs so/ /ci ste nor bu ye shes bsgrub par 'dod na 'ang de bzhin du rin po che 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin rim pa bzhin tu bsgom par byas te/ dngos po med pa'i nam mkha'
las rin po che ji ltar 'byung ba rin po che las byang chub sems dpa'i sku ji ltar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dus bzhir bsgoms la ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin
du bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas zla ba'i mthar ting 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
byon nas ci dga' ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /de nas las sgrub pa bshad de/ de bzhin du bzlas
la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//

de nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /nor bu'i rigs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bsgrub pa'i yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang por snying po thams cad kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa bshad do/ /snying po bsgrub
par 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub par gyur cig ces brjod la snying po ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub pa'i cho ga bya'o/ /de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i yo byad dang / cho
ga ste/ phyag rgya thams cad bdag la dga' bar gyur cig ces smras la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te/ ci dga' bar ci nus kyis bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas ci lta ba bzhin du
dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa ste/ spros pa med pa'i tshig grub par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
ting nge 'dzin bdag la skye bar gyur cig ces smras la sngags ci dga' bar bzlas pa byas te 'di ni dngos grub bo/ /de la 'di ni rig pa'i yo byad dang / cho ga rgyas pa ste/ kye ma sems
can 'di dag thams cad ni mi rag pas ldongs par gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rig pa rtogs shing sdom par gyur to/ /zhes smras la rig pa ci dga' bar
@#/ /bzlas shing bsgrub par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de nas snying po dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya dang
rig pa thams cad ji ltar bsgom pa nyid du rdo rje bzlas pa'i chog rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa
rnams bzlas pa'i don du bsgrub par bya ba de ni bdag gam sems dpa' bsgoms na bsgrub par bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas
gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bzlas pa'i chog rgyas pa rdzogs so/ /de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di lta ste/ de la dang
po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste/ nor 'grub pa'i dngos grub dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub dang / rig 'dzin nyid du 'grub pa
dang | dngos grub chen po rnams so/ /de la nor 'grub pa ni 'di yin te/ gang na gter yod par dwogs pa der phyag rgya bcings la rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gter gyi gnas
der rdo rje blta bas lta ba na/ ci ste rdo rje lta bu yang bar mthong na don gter yod par shes par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje lcags sgrog gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te sa brkos
la ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du blangs na rtsod pa med par thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub
ba yin te/ phyag rgya gang sgrub par byed na badzra sid+d+hi zhes brjod par bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub ni rnam pa bzhi yod de/ de ni 'di ltar chu'i steng nas phar 'gro zhing 'dug pa
