la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi gzugs ston pa dang / ji srid du dga' ba de srid du mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang
dpag tshad stong gi steng du lding ba dang / 'og tu 'gro zhing 'ong ba dang / phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong du ci dga' bar song la bskor te slar 'ong pa dang / dpag tshad
stong khor ra khor yug gi sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa shes pa dang / dngos po thams cad mig gis mthong zhing rna bas thos pa dang / phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad
stong khor yug na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad ci dga' bar 'phang du blangs te 'dug pa dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig la sogs ba'i dbyig thams cad dang /
nor thams cad phrogs nas kyang sus kyang chung zad kyang brgal mi nus te/ bdag gi rdo rjes kyang mi thub par 'gyur na gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ skyes bu stong phrag
@#/ /bcu bsdoms pa'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu 'dod pa thams cad la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu
dar la bab cing lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rdo rje'i dngos grub bla na med pas mchod pa byed
cing lo stong phrag bcu bzhi'i bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dngos grub kyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje rig
'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te/ phyag rgya bsgrub pa na rdo rje rig 'dzin ces brjod la 'grub pa dang / rdo rje rig 'dzin gyis 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa thams
cad la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig gis bskor te/ slar 'ong zhing bde ba thams cad la yongs su spyad pa dang / lo bco brgyad
pa'i na tshod dang ldan pa dang / skra 'khyil ba dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje chen po'i rig 'dzin du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad
mthong zhing bskal ba chen po'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig 'dzin gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni
dngos grub chen po 'grub pa yin te/ bdag nyid phyag rgya'i snying po don du bdag nyid kyis phyag rgya bsgrubs na sems dpa'i gzugs su gyur nas skad cig gcig gis kyang phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gzugs sna tshogs kyis bya ba sna tshogs bye dpa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa thams cad mthong nas
rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas sems can ma lus zhing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don byas
nas slar 'ongs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa thams cad dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad la spyod
cing rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por gyur nas tshe'i tshad ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i bskal pa chen po'i tshad du 'gyur ro/ /
zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi dngos grub chen pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub ste/ de yang 'di ltar khams gsum
las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub dang / dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / dngos grub dam pa rnams so/ /de la 'di ni
@#/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub yin te/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la dbang phyug chen po rkang pa
g.yon pas mnan te bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas gzugs de skad 'byin pa dang / hUM zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o/ /hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig
rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams sgrub pa'i mdun du bka' nyan cing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /de phyin chad 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi
bdag po rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'jig rten gsum po 'khor lo thams cad kun tu bskor te/ slar 'ongs nas lha ma rungs pa la sogs
pa sems can thams cad hUM zhes bya bas 'dul bar byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i gzugs dang ldan pas 'jig rten gsum
po thams cad la bka' stsol cing rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong nas mnyes par byed cing lo stong du 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur
ro| |bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes byed pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub ste/ phyag rgya bsgrub ba na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dang por bdag nyid dbang bskur la bsgrub par bya ste/ de nas grub pa dang / dbang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbang dang / rin
po che'i dbang dang / chos kyi dbang dang / las kyi dbang rnams so/ /de la rdo rje'i dbang thob na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /rin po che'i dbang
thob na rin po che thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi dbang gis ni chos thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /las kyi dbang gis ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams
cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyi
dngos grub ste/ de yang 'di ltar rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba
dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /
de la 'di ni dngos grub dam pa ste/ de yang ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag mnyam mo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di dag ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi
@#/ /dngos grub rnams te/ de ni 'di ltar mnyes par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / pad+ma'i dngos grub rnams so/ /de la mnyes par bya
ba'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te/ ji ltar pad+ma 'dod pa bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams cad mnyes par byed nus par 'gyur
ro| |bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug rjes su dran par byas na sems can thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro/ /byams pas 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'gro
pa thams cad bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab nus par 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid pad+ma'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la pad+ma lag par blangs te bsgrubs na 'jig rten dbang phyug
gi gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing lo stong phrag bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi pad+mas gsungs so/ /de la 'di dag ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub rnams te/ de yang 'di ltar rigs thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub dang / gzi brjid chen po dang /
bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang rin po che'i dngos grub rnams so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste/ nyid kyis
dbang dbul ba dang / mar me dbul ba dang / ci nus kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rin po che bsgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad mchod na ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po ches gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi
thun mong pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das thog
ma dang / tha ma med pa'i sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la dang po kho nar ni snying po thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten 'dul ba ji lta bar/ /de 'dra bar ni dngos grub
'dod/ /de yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste/ /dngos grub chen po kun sbyin no/ /de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten 'dul ba chags bral min/ /phyag rgya'i
dngos grub chags las skyes/ /de yi thabs ni bsgom pa ste/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni sngags kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ bden las
'jig rten 'di nyams pas/ /sngags kyi dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/ /spros pa med pa'i thabs kyis ni/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni rig pa thams
@#/ /cad dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /ma rig mun chags 'di la ni/ /rig pa'i dngos grub yod min te/ /de yi thabs ni rgya che ba/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog
thob bo/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /de la dang po kho nar ni snying po thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mchod pa rnam bzhi byas nas
ni| |bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te/ /bsod nams med kyang sangs rgyas mchod/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i bsod nams kyi
dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ dam tshig gsang ba bsrungs na ni/ /bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te/ /bsod nams med kyang myur bar ni/ /dam tshig bsrungs na myur du
'grub/ /de la 'di ni sngags kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas mtshan la sogs brjod na/ /bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te/ /bsod nams
med kyang myur bar ni/ /chos sbyin pas ni dngos grub 'thob/ /de la 'di ni rig pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ bsod nams nang na sbyin pa mchog/
byin na bsod nams thob 'gyur te/ /spyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs na/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ /de nas
rtog pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /de la dang po kho nar
snying po shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ yi ge a la 'jug byed cing / /yi ge thams cad rnam bsgoms la/ /rang gi kha nas gzhan zhal du/ /bsgoms na bsod nams
thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dpal gyis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/
shes rab nges 'bigs zhes bya ba/ /ting nge 'dzin ces grags pa ste/ /des ni phyag rgya myur 'grub par/ /bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das
shes rab mchog gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di sngags kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ shes rab sgra yi rjes 'brang ba/ /ting 'dzin tshig ni rab spros pa/ /de
bsgoms na ni myur ba yang / /sngags kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje blos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rig pa'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi
@#/ /rgyud de/ rig dang sngags dang khyad par du/ /khyad par yod pa ma yin te/ /shes rab bsgoms na myur bar ni/ /nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /
zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes kyis gsungs so/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /
de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la dang po kho nar snying po thams cad
tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mchod pa thams cad rab byas na/ /dge ba yi ni chos rnams kyi/ /tshogs ni rnam phar 'phel 'gyur te/ /de nas tshogs ni 'grub par
'gyur/ /de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'khor lo mang por zhugs pa dang / /dkyil 'khor mang por bris pa'i phyir/ /tshogs rdzogs pas na
phyag rgya rnams/ /dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni sngags kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rjes su yi rang la sogs tshul/ /de bzhin dam pa'i
chos bklags dang / bzlas pa mang po byas nas ni/ /nges par sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni rig pa'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ma rig rab
tu slangs pa dang / /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin tshul las/ /tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs nas kyang / /myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas ba'i
rgyud rdzogs so// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma byung ba'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud
'di gsungs so/ /de la ji ltar rdo rje 'byung zhe na/ /de nyid bcom ldan sems dpa' ste/ /thams cad sems de nyid bdag po/ /sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje ni/ /sems dpa'
brtan pa rang byung gi /sems dpa' kun gyi mchog sems dpa'/ /rdo rje snying gar rab bsgoms na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes grags te/ /'di la rdo rje rab tu gnas/ /de nyid
sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/ /ye shes tshul te mnyam med 'od/ /snying las sna tshogs byung nas ni/ /sna tshogs pa yi gzugs gyur te/ /khams gsum kun gyi rdul snyed du/ /
de dag nyid ni rgyal ba yin/ /rdo rje'i sku ni de rnams las/ /rdo rje sems dpar yang dag 'gyur/ /sems dpa' dang po de nyid las/ /mtshan ma thams cad yang dag 'byung //
mtshan ma las ni sems dpa' che/ /de las tshul 'di thams cad 'byung / /gang gis 'di ni thos gyur la/ /dad cing 'dzin byed snying gar yang / /rtag tu dga' bas bsgoms
@#/ /na ni| |de ni myur du grub pa thob/ ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dang sa gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'byung ba'i ye
shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rtog pa thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /de la dang
po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtog med pa'i/ /ye shes rtag pa nyid gyur pa'i/ /mi rtog
pa yi ye shes las/ /brtags pas rtog pa zhes brjod do/ /de la 'di ni bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ mi rtog gang la rtog bdag
nyid| |brtags pas rtog pa byung ba ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rgyud de/ mi rtog gang la rtog bdag
de| cho ga bzhin du ri mor bris/ /rtog pa grub sbyin zhes brtags pa/ /rtog las bral ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ /de phyir rtog pa zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs
kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ rtog pa las ni 'dod chags 'byung / /pad+ma la ni de gnas te/ /de phyir rtog la gnas pa ni/ /grub pa nyid du de 'gyur ro/ /de la 'di
ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ rtog pa med pa'i nor bu ni/ /mthu yis shin tu mchog tu 'gyur/ /de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas/ /lha rdzas dngos grub
'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i rgyud do/ /de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po 'byung ba'i ye
shes kyi rgyud de/ yid kyis 'dod pa'i chog yis/ /yid kyis 'dod pa grub 'gyur te/ /ting 'dzin sgrub pa snying la gnas/ /de phyir snying po zhes brjod do/ /de nas rtog pa thams
cad kyi phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ ji ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog/ khrims ni 'da' ka mi phyed bzhin/ /bdag nyid chen po gzugs brnyan gyis/ /mtshan ma
phyag rgya zhes par grags/ /de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi spags 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing / /dbye ba dka' las gsang ba nyid/ /gsang
ba grub phyir brjod pas na/ /de yi phyir na sngags zhes brjod/ /de nas rig pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ ma rig pa ni gzhom pa dang / /dag gi rig mchog 'grub pa'i
phyir| |rtogs shing rig pa'i dngos grub ste/ /de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po la sogs
@#/ /pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do/ /de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud de/ de la dang po/ kho nar snying po'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud yin te
snying po bzlas te bdag gam ni/ /gzhan yang rung ste byung ba na/ /byung dang 'byung 'gyur gang gis ni/ /mthong zhing thos 'gyur shes par bya/ /de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i ye
shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te/ bdag gis cho ga ji bzhin du/ /gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya bcings/ /'jig rten pa la bltas na ni/ /gong ma bzhin du kun shes 'gyur//
de la 'di ni sngags kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te/ lan gcig tsam yang sngags brjod na/ /'das dang 'byung dang byung gang yin/ /rang gi lce la smra 'gyur ba/ /de
dag thams cad bde par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rig pa'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud de/
rig pa lan gcig brjod na ni/ /byung dang 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rnams/ /ji ltar rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du/ /yid kyis de ni shes par 'gyur/ /rtog pa thams cad
kyi ye shes skye ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong gi gsad pa'i sku dang / thugs rdo rje'i phyag
rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud yin no/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar de ltar 'dug nas kyang / /skyil mo krung bcas bsgrub bya ste/ /ji
ltar ri mo'i tshul byas nas/ /sems dpa' chen po grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems da pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i
phyag rgya sgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni/ /brkang bskum tshul du gnas byas te/ /shin tu khros nas sgrub byas na/ /the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi gsad pa'i sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud yin te/ rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas la/ /lag gnyis rdo
rje bcings nas kyang / /ting nge 'dzin gyi skur gyur la/ /pad+ma 'byung ba bsgrub par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs
kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar 'dug gam nyal ba'am/ /'chag kyang rung ste de ltar ni/ /rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur na/ /the tshom med par 'grub par
'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsungs gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ lce rtse shin tu
@#/ /mi bsgul zhing / /so dang mchu gnyis sbyar nas ni/ /rtog pa thams cad bsgrub bya zhing / /sgra bral rdo rje'i tshig yin no/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
gsung gis gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ /hUM zhes bya ba 'brug sgrar bsgrags/ /khro bo'i ngag ni zab cing bstan/
rdo rje chen po khro bo'i gsal/ /rdo rje khro bo'i gsung 'grub bo/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi
phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ dbugs mi 'byin ltar dbugs 'byin cing / /phra ba'i tshig ni shin tu gsal/ /ting 'dzin ye shes snying po yis/ /zlos pa po rnams grub
par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang
ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ shin tu yongs su gsal tshig gis/ /rtag tu 'dud la brtson byed cing / /tshul 'di bzlas par gyur na ni/ /myur du
thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ rtag tu 'dod pa bcom ldan 'das/ /sems can thams cad bde sbyin pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid du/ /bsgoms na
myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ /sems can kun la
phan pa dang / /ma rungs pa rnams gdul ba dang / /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ /khro bo dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ ji ltar pad+ma rab chags la/ /bgos pa'i
skyon gyis mi gos pa/ /de ltar bdag gis chags skyon yang / /srid na chags pa de 'grub 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+ma bzhad pas gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni
nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ nam zhig sems can thams cad kyi/ /dgos pa'i don ni kun sgrub cing / /rin chen char ni 'bebs
'gyur zhes/ /grub na myur bar de 'grub bo/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo
@#/ /rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ ji ltar langs sam 'dug pa'am/ /'chag kyang rung ste de ltar ni/ /lag pa g.yon pas phyag rgya mchog /thams
cad byed na 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba phyag rgya rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang
ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ de lta de ltar gnas nas kyang / /ji lta ji ltar byed kyang rung / /rdo rje khro bo mdzub mo bcings/ /gos kyis g.yogs na 'grub par 'gyur//
zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rgyal pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud
de| lag pa g.yon pas pad+ma yi/ /khu tshur bcings te sbas nas ni/ /ji dgar myur du pad+ma yi/ /dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu
spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ g.yon pa'i rin chen khu tshur ni//
bcings te dam pa'i lag g.yogs la/ /ci dga' par ni rim gror byed/ /rin chen dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos
gsungs so/ /de la 'di ni rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i thun mong gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ rang gi sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du ni/ /rdo rje
dag dang rdo rje'i lta/ /ring por mi thogs mchog 'grub bo/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rigs thams cad kyi
gsang ba'i sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ rtog pa 'di byin gyis brlab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ de nas yang de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas yang legs so zhes bya ba 'di byin no/ /rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang / /theg pa chen po
mngon 'dus pa'i/ /mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so/ /rdo rje las ni khyod
legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ rgyud thams cad kyi phyi ma'i phyi ma'i rgyud rdzogs so// //de nas byang chub sems dpa'
@#/ /sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po 'dis gsol ba btab bo/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi sems
dpa' che/ /sems can don mchog bdag nyid can/ /shAkya'i rgyal po ye shes che/ /rdo rje bdag nyid khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sems dpa' 'byung ba de nyid don/ /sems can rgyu
ste tshul chen po/ /sems can don chen dgos pa'i don/ /sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas chos ni chos chen po/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/
smra ba chen po rab rig mchog /sems dpa' chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /las chen bsrung ba chen po ste/ /las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub pa/ /bdag nyid chen po 'gro
spyod mchog /sems dpa' rgyu khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol phyin pa kun brnyes pa/ /kun mkhyen ye shes mkhyen pa po/ /sems dpa' kun te thabs chen po/ /shes rab
chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /thugs rje chen po mchog gi mchog /thugs rje thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/ /thams cad gtong ba byams pa che/ /kun mdzad khyod la phyag
'tshal lo/ /shAkya seng ge shAkya che/ /shAkya shAkya thub pa che/ /'dul ba chen po khyab pa po/ /'gro don 'dul mchog khyod phyag 'tshal/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam
brnyes pa/ /chos dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ /rdo rje mgon po mgon chen po/ /sems can tshogs ni khyod phyag 'tshal/ /'od chen snang ba chen po ste/ /brtson 'grus
chen po stobs chen po/ /dpa' bo chen po rab dpa' mchog /bde spyod dpa' bo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /tshangs pa rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das/ /shAkya dpa' bo thub pa che/ /kun
bdag thub pa dag pa yi/ /chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha'i sku ste sku yi mchog /sku gsum sku min sgom pa po/ /kun gyi sku ste sku che ba/ /rdo rje'i sku khyod phyag
'tshal lo/ /gsung min gsung ste gsung gi mchog /gsung gsum gsung min ston pa po/ /gsung kun shin tu gsung che ba/ /rdo rje'i gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems
min sems te sems kyi mchog /sems gsum sems min ston pa po/ /thams cad sems te sems che ba/ /rdo rje sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdor min rdo rje rdo rje'i mchog /rdo rje
gsum pa rdor min spyong / /rdo rje thams cad rdo rje che/ /rdo rje rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /kun khyab srid pa'i rtse mo mchog /bde gshegs bdag po rgyal ba ni/ /khams gsum pa yi rgyal
po che| |snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/ /gang gis skad cig nyan byed dam/ /klog gam yang na sgom pa'ang rung / /kun gyis sangs rgyas
@#/ /nyid thob 'gyur/ /mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /thugs rje chen po bskyed nas kyang / /chos kyi 'khor lo rab
tu bskor/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bka' stsal ba'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ yang gcig tu 'du bar mdzad par gsol/ de nas yang de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar
'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
sems can thams cad kyi mdun du rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas
chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur te/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /rtag par 'jig rten thams
cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul bar sna tshogs pa'i/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing
thams cad kyi rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyis rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor
lo thams cad rab tu bskor bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /rtag
par 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i/ /khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de
bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pas
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos
tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul bar sna tshogs pa'i/ /pad+ma'i 'khor lo rab tu
@#/ /bskor/ /de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal pos pad+ma'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying
pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /rtag par 'jig rten thams cad tu/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul bar sna tshogs pa'i/ /nor bu'i
'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can phra ba'am/ spom pa'ang rung / de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad ri rab ri'i rgyal po rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdan la
bzhugs nas rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu bskor bar phyogs kun nas mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /mi yi nang du babs nas kyang / /dgos phyir sems can kun gyi don/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo mchog bskor zhing / /mgon po
rab tu bsgrub par mdzod/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'du bar mdzad du gsol/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
kyi thugs su zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
rdo rjer bdag nyid du gyur par mkhyen nas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyang nga'i thugs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rigs
thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su zhugs shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gnang nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /mdor na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /zhugs nas sems
can thams cad la/ /phan pa'i phyir ni bsgrub par bya/ /de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham
@#/ /thams cad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams las/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i sku 'phro ba mdzad pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po
phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad dang / gsung thams cad 'jug pa'i gnas dang / sems
kyi rgyud 'byung ba thams cad dang / rdo rje'i tshul thams cad dang / yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang / gnas thams cad dang / mtshan thams cad dang / dpe
byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i khung bu thams cad dang / rdul shin tu phra mo snyed kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / thugs rnams su zhugs nas bzhugs
so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon pa zhig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
rdo rjer de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid gyur par mkhyen nas/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo nas snying po byang chub gang na ba der gshegs nas ched du bcom ldan
'das kyi byang chub kyi shing drung du 'jig rten pa dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir rtswa blangs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma'o sems can brtan pa yi/
/sems can don ni bdag don mchog /gang phyir gdul dbang brtan pa rnams/ /mu stegs lta la gnas par mdzad/ /mdor na mi 'dul 'jig rten pa/ /lta ba ngan pas ldongs ba rnams//
ye shes snang bas dag bya'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la de kho na nyid mi shes pas 'di skad
du| kye dge sbyong / ji byang chub kyi phyir 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal drag cing mi bzad pa la bzod par mdzad dam zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtswa de bting ste/
steng du bzhugs nas lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /grogs po rnams/ kho bos byang chub thob par sgrubs shig /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don ma rtogs nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gang na bder dong nas ched du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la de ltar gyur pa 'di
brjod do/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi tshogs kyis bskor te/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po la
@#/ /de ltar gyur pa 'di dag brjod do/ /de nas tshangs pa chen po 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gsum
po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po la de ltar gyur pa rnams brjod do/ /de nas 'jig rten gsum pa mtha' dag gi bdag po dbang phyug chen pos lha rnams kyi bdag
po mthu bo che la sogs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dang
mthun par mdzad cing / yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ston gyis/ 'di ltar 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no snyam du shes par
ma byed cig /lha nyid las de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur gyis/ lha de dag nyid du bsgrub par bya yi/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du ni ma yin no/ /de legs kyi nge
mchod pa la 'dong bar sgrub bo/ /de nas lha thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa snying po byang chub gang na ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa'i snying por byang chub bar bzhugs pa gang na ba der dong nas ched du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ ran gyi gdan 'di las bzhengs la/ lha rdzas kyi gdan la bzhugs te/ bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bdag po de dag la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to/ /grogs po rnams/ kho bo la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par sgrubs shig /de nas 'di dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das/ bdag cag gis byang chub rtsol bar mi nus so/ /ci ste bdag cag gis nus par gyur na bdag cag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid gsal bar mdzad cing yang tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /de ni gzugs min gzugs min min/ /bden min brdzun min gtsang ba
yi| |sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di/ /rtogs na rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas lha'i dbang po de dag gis cung zad cig cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das rtswa'i gdan las bzhengs te/ lha de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /grogs po rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di lta bu rtogs par bya ba sgrubs
@#/ /shig /de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rngo mi thog go /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du tshigs
su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /yid kyis rab tu rtogs pas na/ /byang chub sems ni brtan par byos/ /sems dpa' rdo rje brtan byas la/ /sangs rgyas su ni bdag sgoms
shig |de dag gis 'di skad du de lta bu legs so/ /zhes bya ba thams cad kyis smras nas dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo de'i tho rangs 'jig rten dang
mthun par bya ba'i phyir bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par sangs rgyas nas sems can gyi khams
ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad la phan par mdzad pa 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs la zhugs pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'das mngon par bstod do/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /theg pa chen po'i bdag nyid che/ /snang ba che zhing dag pa che/ /mgon chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje che/ /rdo rje de bzhin
gshegs pa kun/ /sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus che/ /thabs chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'dod pa dag pa che/ /kun gyi bde ba bde ba che/ /bde mchog thog
ma tha ma med/ /bzhad chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje legs pa dgyes pa che/ /legs zhes bya ba rab mnyes pa/ /mnyes pa tshe zhing dgyes pa che/ /rab dgyes khyod la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rin chen rgyal po che/ /dbang bskur bzang po bdag po che/ /rin chen thams cad mdzes pa che/ /rnam rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje gzi brjid
gzi brjid che/ /'od chen lham pa chen po ste/ /rgyal ba'i 'od de 'bar ba che/ /sangs rgyas 'od khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan dpal che ba/ /rgyal mtshan che bas nor
rab gtong / /nam mkha'i rgyal mtshan yu ba che/ /gtong ba'i mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje bzhad pa bzhad pa che/ /dgyes pa che zhing rab dgyes pa/ /dgyes pa'i shugs kyis
rol cing dgyes/ /chos dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje chos ni chos che ba/ /sems dpa'i chos ni rab sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas chos te chos rab mchog /'dod chos khyod
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rnon po ral gri che/ /shes rab ye shes blo gros che/ /sdig gcod ral gri chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas mtshon khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje rgyu ste 'khor
lo che| |sangs rgyas 'khor lo gter chen po/ /dkyil 'khor kun te chos kyi mchog /chos kyi dkyil 'khor khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje gsung ba gsung ba che/ /spros med yi
@#/ /ge chen po ste/ /yi ge med pa bzlas pa che/ /sangs rgyas gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje las te las rab mchog /las chen las rab byed pa ste
gsang ba'i mchod pa mchod pa che/ /sangs rgyas mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje srung ba go cha che/ /go cha'i mchog ste brtan pa che/ /srung ba che zhing snying po che/ /sangs
rgyas brtson 'grus phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin khro bo che/ /ma rungs thams cad skrag byed pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen te/ /bsrung ba mchog khyod phyag
'tshal lo/ /rdo rje bsdams pa phyag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig chen po bcing ba che/ /khu tshur chen po phyag rgya che/ /rdo rje khu tshur khyod phyag 'tshal/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bya
zhing | |brjod de mchod de bsti stang bya/ /gang phyir thog ma tha ma med/ /byang chub sems ni khyod yin te/ /khyod la brten na rgyal ba dang / /dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa'
kun| |byung zhing yang dag 'byung 'gyur bas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi rgyu/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje chos
khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje las ni khyod phyag 'tshal/ /yang dag par ni phyag 'tshal zhing / /mtshan mchog gis ni khyod bstod pa'i/ /bsod nams gang yin de kun
kyang | |sangs rgyas byang chub thob par shog /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /rab dad pas ni lan gcig tsam/ /gang gis legs par brjod pa ni/ /kun kyang sangs rgyas nyid du
'gyur/ /zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu
'dus te/ gsung gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba de byin no/ /rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/ /mdo 'di
legs par bshad pas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so/ /rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so/ /rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so/ /rdo rje las ni khyod kyang legs/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpar dam bcas pa rang gi thugs la zhugs pa thams cad dgyes
shing mnyes nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa la mngon par dgyes par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes
bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rgyud nye bar bsdus pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //rgyud 'di la 'gyur byang mi snang na'ang / paN+Di ta shrad+d+hA ka ra war+m+ma dang / bod kyi
@#/ /lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur bar grags so// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra shi kha ra mahA gu h+ya yo ga tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/
gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo/ oM| kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / /kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis/ /'khor lo de ni brtags byas nas/ /rnal 'byor can
ni mi gsung bzhugs/ /mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun/ /ma lus thub pa'i skyes mchog gis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug la gsol
'debs/ /rnal 'byor tshul chen sgrub byed cing / /cho ga sna tshogs yang dag 'byung / /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba'i/ /'khor lo mchog ni bshad du gsol//
mgon po khyod ni skal chen te/ /khyod ni bya ba don sems byed/ /gsang ba mkhyen cing dgongs bshad mkhyen/ /rnal 'byor rig pas mchog gyur gsungs/ /de
nyid rjes kyi de nyid ldan/ /rnal 'byor bdag nyid rnal 'byor che/ /rdo rje chen po byang chub sems/ /gsungs shig gsungs shig tshul chen po/ /rigs kyi dkyil
'khor 'khor lo ste/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor sna tshogs bdag /gsang ba'i snying po dkyil 'khor che/ /chos kyi tshul ni sgrub byed pa/ /rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi/ /chos kyi don 'di ci
yin brjod/ /'dir ni rtog pa ji lta bu/ /sgrub pa'i don ni ji ltar lags/ /ci phyir 'di ni rgyud phyi ma/ /rgyud don ci yin brjod par bgyi/ /ci phyir rgyud dang phyi ma lags/ /rgyud kyi don
ni ji ltar byung / /rdo rje 'chang drag 'di ci zhig /drag po'i don ni ji ltar byung / /rdo rje zhi ba 'di ci zhig /ci yi phyir na zhi bar brjod/ /phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir/ /rdo rje gtum po'ang
ci zhig lags/ /ci yi phyir ni gtum por brjod/ /ci yi phyir na khro bor brjod/ /rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa/ /ci phyir rdo rjer brjod par bgyi/ /rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ci/ /de
yi rdo rje ji lta bu/ /rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni du/ /rdo rje rigs kun gang gi lags/ /chen po gnas gang zhig na gnas/ /rigs ni rnam pa du yin brjod/ /ci yi phyir na rigs su brjod//
rigs bdag rang bzhin 'di ci zhig /ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du/ /ci phyir rdo rje sems dpa' lags/ /rdo rje rgyal po ci yin brjod/ /rdo
rje chags pa 'di don ci/ /rdo rje legs pa ci yin brjod/ /rdo rje rin chen ci yi phyir/ /rdo rje gzi brjid ci yin brjod/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan bzhad pa tshe/ /gsungs shig ci yi
@#/ /brjod pa gsungs/ /ci yi phyir na rdo rje chos/ /rdo rje rnon po ci yin brjod/ /rdo rje rgyu ni 'khor lo che/ /rdo rje smra ba ci yin brjod/ /rdo rje las dang gnad
sbyin che/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che/ /rdo rje srung ba khu tshur che/ /gsungs shig ci yin brjod par gsungs/ /sems dpa' 'di rnams gang las byung / /de bzhin pa dang ma
ni gang / /dang po gang zhig gleng gzhi gang / /dmigs pa'i rkyen ni gang zhig lags/ /gsang ba 'di ni gang las byung / /khyab bdag 'di rnams gang nas byung / /thog ma
tha ma med 'di ci/ /gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen pos gsungs/ /rab tu dga' nyid rab bzang nyid/ /rdo rje snying bdag ji lta bu/ /ci yi phyir na kun tu bzang / /de bzhin rdo rje
rdo rje 'chang / /dang po'i rigs ni ji ltar byung / /chos kun skye ba med pa dang / /'byung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod/ /ci phyir sangs
rgyas brjod par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod/ /bcom ldan 'das bcom ci yin brjod/ /de bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ci/ /ci yi phyir ni ye shes brjod/ /
shes rab ye shes ci yin brjod/ /ci phyir shes rab brjod par bya/ /de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin/ /tshul ni ci zhig ting 'dzin gang / /bsam gtan rnal 'byor
rnal 'byor ci/ /srid gsum 'jig rten gsum don ci/ /ci yi phyir yang khams gsum pa/ /'khor ba'i don ni ci zhig yin/ /mya ngan 'das pa'ang ci yin brjod/ /rtag dang 'jig
dang de bzhin dag /theg pa chen po ci yin brjod/ /nam mkha' yang ni ci yi phyir/ /sa nyid kyang ni ci yin brjod/ /'byung ba chen po gang las 'byung / /'gog pa ci zhig gang gis
byed| |ci yi phyir na phyag rgyar brjod/ /ci phyir sngags su brjod par bya/ /ci yi phyir na rig sngags brjod/ /de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags rnams/ /phyag rgya yi ni mtshan nyid
gsungs/ /sngags kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya/ /rig sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid gsungs/ /de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags rnams/ /phyag rgya yi ni mtshan nyid
ltar bcing ba thub chen po/ /phyag rgya dag ni 'ching ba na/ /ji ltar rdo rje can kun mnyes/ /rig sngags ji ltar bzlas par bgyi/ /thub pa chen po de gsungs shig /rig sngags
dag ni zlos pa ni/ /ji ltar yid kyi rdo rje bzlas/ /dri ba'i tshogs mdor bstan pa 'o/ /oM ni ci zhig yin par bshad/ /yi ge hUM ni ci yin brjod/ /ci yi phyir na yi ge phaT/ /
swAhA zhes pa ci yin brjod/ /mchod par ci phyir brjod par bya/ /de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang / /ci yi phyir na dkyil 'khor yin/ /dkyil 'khor dang por zhugs pa yi/ /
@#/ /skyes pa yang na bud med kyis/ /bya ba gang zhig bya ba ni/ /gsungs shig gsang ba'i dbang phyug che/ /thub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la/ /
sdom pa ji ltar sbyin par bgyi/ /de yis srog gi phyir yang ni/ /dor bar mi bya gang zhig lags/ /khrus kyi las ni ji ltar bya/ /de bzhin kho nar phyogs bcing ba/ /bgegs
rnams bcing ba dang bcas pa'i/ /log 'dren ji ltar bskrad par bgyi/ /dga' ba chen po ji lta bur/ /rab tu gus bcas phyag dag bgyi/ /spos dang me tog de bzhin
du| |mar me mchod sogs ji ltar lags/ /dkyil 'khor brtag pa ji lta bur/ /gzhug pa yang ni ji ltar lags/ /dam tshig ci zhig yin par bshad/ /rdo rje slob
ma'i cho ga gang / /sngon du bsnyen pa ji ltar bgyi/ /sgrub pa'i don ni ji ltar lags/ /gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ji lta bu/ /snyoms 'jug ji lta bu zhig lags/ /mdun
du dgug pa'i don ni ji ltar lags/ /'dir ni rjes su chags pa'ang ji lta bu/ /bcing bar bya ba'i las ni ji lta bu/ /'dren pa rnams ni mnyes par ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji
ltar 'dir ni gshegs su gsol ba lags/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni ji ltar gdeg par bgyi/ /'gro ba'i bya ba yang ni ji ltar bgyi/ /las kyi cho ga'i bya ba ji ltar
bgyi| |dge ba stug po gsang chen ji lta bu/ /las rnams tha dad bya ba ji lta bu/ /phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan ni ji ltar bgyi/ /mchod dang mchod pa'i lan ni ji ltar blang / /
dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lo ji ltar 'byung / /'khor lo'i rnam pa'i bye brag du zhig mchis/ /dngos dang dngos med ji ltar spang pa lags/ /bla ma gsang byung 'od zer gsang
ba ci| |sbyin sreg rnam pa du ru brjod/ /thab khung ji lta bu zhig lags/ /sbyin sreg mdor bsdus ji lta bu/ /las rnams ji ltar 'byung ba la/ /las rnams rnam pa du ru
brjod/ /gsang ba rnams ni rnam pa du/ /mchog tu gsang ba ji ltar brjod/ /de nyid ji lta bu zhig lags/ /phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya ci/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya ji ltar lags//
rigs kyi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /ji ltar bsgrub bya shin tu bsgrub/ /rdo rje phra mo ji ltar brjod/ /bgegs ni ji ltar bsal bar bgyi/ /mdor na rig pa 'dzin pa
dang | |slob dpon ji lta bu zhig lags/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i/ /'khor lo rnam pa du ru brjod/ /dngos grub mtshan nyid sgrub byed pa'i/ /sna tshogs
rtog pa ji lta bu/ /thig rnams brtag pa nyid dang ni/ /dngos grub ji ltar nye bar brjod/ /dngos grub tshogs ni ji lta bu/ /gsang ba kun nas btus pa gsungs/ /bdag
@#/ /nyid la ni dbang bskur bar/ /bya ba'i cho ga ji lta bu/ /yang na gzhan dag nyid la ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni ji ltar lags/ /ji ltar sems ni bskyed
par bgyi/ /ting 'dzin ji lta bu zhig lags/ /de nyid rig pa 'di rtag tu/ /rdo rje ye shes ji lta bu/ /gzhan yang dgongs pa ji lta bu/ /spyod pa ji lta bu zhig lags/ /gang yang
rung ba'i rtags las byung / /ming dang ming min shes pa'i mtshan/ /las 'bras med par byed po dang / /'byin par byed pa gang las bshad/ /lus ni nam mkha' bzhin
'byung ba/ /gang las 'byung bar brjod par bya/ /ci yi phyir na thar par brjod/ /rnal 'byor pa don ci yin brjod/ /rdo rje dbyings ni skyed byed pa'i/ /rdo rje phra mo'i rnal
'byor gang / /gzhan yang rang gi rigs dag las/ /rnal 'byor brtul zhugs ji ltar rtsom/ /mdor na dbang du bya ba dang / /de nyid gsang ba gang zhig lags/ /theg
pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i/ /gsang ba rtog chen las gsungs pa/ /dgongs pa rnam pa du ma yis/ /gsang ba gsungs shig blo gros che/ /rnal 'byor rnam pa du ru
brjod/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung du/ /ji ltar rtsa ba'i rgyud du brjod/ /gsang ba'i rigs byung ji lta bu/ /nga ni rang byung nyid yin te/ /khams gsum 'jig rten sa 'og
dang | |sa steng sa bla mya ngan 'das/ /ji skad bshad pa'i gsang ba gzhan/ /rdo rje can nyid khyab 'jug rang nyid yin/ /nyi ma zla ba gshin rje drag po nyid/ /rang nyid skye dgu'i bdag
ste pha ma yin/ /'gal ba'i tshig ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /dri ba'i tshogs gnyis pa mdor bstan pa'o// //tshangs pa 'jig rten gsum lus dbang phyug
che| |gdong drug tshogs bcas lha'i rigs dkyil 'khor rnams/ /gzhan yang bza' dang tshogs sogs gang yin pa/ /nga bdag nyid ces ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /nga ni 'dod pa
thar pa dang / /nga ni dmyal ba'i dmyal ba pa/ /nga ni yi dwags dud 'gro bdag /tshig de ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang 'dod la chags sems ldan/ /lta bcas tshig
ldan 'dzin pa'i lta la chags/ /mu stegs theg dman mngon dga' skye dgu'i rigs/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin don rnams rtog byed cing / /ji skad bshad pa'i sna tshogs rigs
dkyil 'khor/ /dag pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas dgongs mi shes/ /rang gi 'dod pas mu ngan rtog byed pa/ /de la skye dgu'i bdag chen brtse bas gsungs/ /mchod 'os chen
po mchog dang ldan pa'i gnas/ /gsang ba'i dbang mchog mngon bsdus dbye bar gsol/ /skye dgu'i bdag po'i dkyil 'khor gsang mdun du/ /dam tshig mchod
@#/ /pas ji ltar mchod par bya/ /'dod yon lngar bcas rol par byed pa yis/ /dngos grub tshogs mchog chen po thob par 'gyur/ /dman pa'i 'dod
las rigs kyi dngos grub 'byung / /'gal ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin b+ha ga ji ltar rtags ci 'dra/ /de yi 'jug pa yang ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /rdzas de
dag ni ji ltar rab tu bsgrub/ /'jig rten gsum na dman pa ji ltar 'gyur/ /de nas 'dod chags zhen las dngos grub thob/ /'dod chags dag phyir de ni ji ltar rung / /
chags bral sdig pas chags dang bral ba la/ /gsang pa bstan pas sdig dngos ji ltar 'gyur/ /gtor mas bsod nams mchog thob ji lta bu/ /skye dgu bsad pas
bsod nams ji lta bu/ /ma byin blang pas bsod nams 'gyur zhes pa'i/ /'gal ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /dga' ba chen po'i bud med bsten pa yis//
tshe 'di la ni sangs rgyas mchog 'grub pa/ /mi gtsang 'dod pa bsten pas sangs rgyas dang / /rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung bar ji ltar 'gyur/ /'dir ni brdzun dang mtshungs
pa'i bsod nams med/ /ji ltar brdzun ni bsod nams ldan par brjod/ /'dir ni sems can gzhan bsad bza' bar bya/ /'gal ba'i tshig ni ji ltar rung bar
'gyur/ /'khor ba spangs kyang chos min 'gyur ba dang / /mya ngan 'das la gzhol ba chos ma yin/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor gyi ni rjes 'jug pa/ /chos min 'gyur zhes ji ltar
rung bar 'gyur/ /dregs dang ser sna sdang ba'i sems ldan pa/ /chos min spyod cing brdzun pa'i tshig la chags/ /srid gsum mngon par chags pas rnal 'byor sgrub/ /'dod
pa'i 'dod chags bcas pas lhag par rgyal/ /rigs kyi rnal 'byor las byung ji ltar 'grub/ /bla med go 'phang dngos grub 'dod pa yi/ /dag cing ngo mtshar rnal 'byor lhur
blang bya/ /sbyor gcin 'thung dang bshad ba za ba yis/ /dag cing mchog gyur rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod/ /mi gtsang bshang gci zos shing 'thung ba yis/ /yid 'dod dngos
grub ji ltar dngos grub 'dod/ /bud med bcas par lhan cig chos spyod cing / /gnyis ka lhan cig gyur pas dag gtsang mchod/ /ji ltar bud med lhan cig dkyil 'khor
mchod/ /dngos grub dam pa mchog tu ji ltar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang rdo rje rigs 'byung kun ldan zhing / /mchog tu mi bzad drag po'i las can te/ /dag cing shin tu sdug la
mtho bar 'gro/ /'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang brdeg dang gsad pa lhur len cing / /bskrad dang drag po'i las can de dag ni/ /dag cing shin tu
@#/ /sdug la mtho bar 'gro /'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung ba yin/ /gzhan yang bza' dang btung ba lhur len cing / /snying 'byin pa yis dag par 'dod pa nyid//
de ni dag cing sdug la mtho bar 'gro /'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung ba yin/ /gzhan yang nor bu rin chen 'phrog pa yis/ /sdug cing bstan la dag cing mthor 'gro dang / /gzhan
yang nga rgyal ser sna lhur len pas/ /dag par 'gyur ba nyid ni 'gal ba yin/ /gzhan yang las kyi rig pa byung ba yis/ /mi dge ba yi las rnams thams cad bya/ /'khrig
sogs las kyi ze tshogs rnam mang po'i/ /las byed pa ni ji ltar skyon mi 'gyur/ /gzhan yang brdzun tshig de bzhin 'khrig pa yis/ /dag 'dod 'phags pa min pas
gsang ba yi/ /rgyal ba'i dbang chen 'dod pas bdud rtsi ltar/ /sdug cing mthor 'gro ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /kye mgon khyod ni dag pa'i chos kyi tshogs te khyod ni rtag tu
rnal 'byor 'gyur/ /kye mgon khyod ni dgyes chen bdud rtsi 'chad pa dam chos gsang ba'i 'byung gnas te/ /kye rgyal khyod ni dri med nyi ma bzhin du mi shes kun tu sbyong
mdzad pa/ /khyab byed rgyal ba'i ngang tshul 'jig rten gsum gyi 'dren chen byang sems dga' ston kye/ /mdor bsdus pa'o// //kun mchog thams cad rig
pa ste| |kun mkhyen dri ma gsum spangs pa/ /byang sems sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid ni/ /ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas kyang / /phyogs rnams
kun tu gzigs mdzad de/ /thub pas mgon rnams rab btud nas/ /sangs rgyas kun la 'di skad gsungs/ /kye ma'o rnam dag ye shes bdag /kye ma'o sangs rgyas nyer thob
pa| |kye ma'o gar mkhan 'khor lo 'di/ /rang gi ye shes 'dri bar byed/ /rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i/ /mchog tu gsang ba bshad par bya/ /shin tu rnyed dka' dam
pa yi| |rin chen sgrom gyi kha dbye bya/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi/ /rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgreng bar bya/ /rin chen sgrom gyi kha phye nas/ /shes rab kyis ni snang bar bya/ /de nas gsang
ba mchog gyur ba/ /dam pa yang dag bshad par bya/ /bya ba bsgrub pa'i thabs chen po/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /gsang ba'i bye brag 'byed byed cing / /rnal 'byor dgongs
pa rnam par dgrol/ /de nyid dam pa shes byed pa'i/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga dang / /'khor lo'i rnal 'byor cho ga ste/ /mchog tu gsang ba zhes
bya de'i/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /dus gsum khyab pa'i bya bar ldan/ /gsang ba rnal 'byor kun 'byung zhing / /bya ba kun gyi thabs chen gyi/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus
@#/ /pa dang / /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor cho gar ldan/ /rdo rje chos ni rab 'jug pa/ /sku gsum zhes bya gsang chen gyi/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /rdo
rje rnal 'byor cho gar ldan/ /ma rungs thams cad 'dul byed pa/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba'i/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /chos kyi rnal 'byor cho gar ldan/ /
pad+ma gar mkhan skyed byed pa/ /'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /sbyin pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /rin chen 'khor lo skyed byed cing / /byang chub
sems dpa' yid ches byed/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po/ /sna tshogs gar mkhan skyed byed pa/ /las kyi rnal 'byor cho ga yi/ /
rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / /de nyid shes shing dgongs pa shes/ /tshul chen mchog ni shes byed cing / /mchog gi dang po sangs rgyas mchog /rtog pa thams cad bsdus
pa ste| |go rims bzhin du 'jug byed pa'i/ /gcig par sems can bya ba byed/ /bya ba chen po mchog zhi ba/ /chos dang longs spyod mchog gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas gar
mkhan 'khor lo ni/ /mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur pa 'di/ /skal ba ji bzhin gsang ji bzhin/ /ji ltar sems can 'dul 'gyur bshad/ /sngon 'gyur 'das pa'i dus su ni/ /
byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing / /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ /spro ba chen pos ngo mtshar che'i/ /dka' ba dpag tu med pa spyad/ /go
rims bzhin du de yis ni/ /dbang bskur bar du legs thob 'gyur/ /shes rab chen pos sa mthar phyin/ /gos kyi dbang ni thob gyur nas/ /'og min stug po nyams dga'
bar| |blo gros chen po bzhugs par gyur/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas mchog 'gyur zhes/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bsams nas ni/ /bya ba mthar phyin bdag gis ni/ /sems can
don 'byung thob bya zhes/ /bya ba de la dgongs nas ni/ /sngon dang phyi mar bde chen med/ /chos kyi dga' ba rmad chen po'i/ /dka' ba spyad par bya snyam ste/ /byang chub shing drung
bzhugs gyur nas/ /bya dka'i bya ba kun ldan de/ /dbugs 'byung rdub pa 'gog pa dang / /sems dpa' med cing g.yo ba med/ /lus ni gang yang mi 'gul zhing / /yan
lag bskyod par mi byed de/ /de bas g.yo ba med chos la/ /yun ring du ni gnas par gyur/ /phyogs bcu yi ni thub dbang po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dgongs 'gyur ba/ /
'di ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub dus/ /sdug bsngal bya bar rigs pa min/ /de bas bdag cag kun lhan cig /bskul bar bya phyir 'gro snyam du/ /dgongs nas thams
@#/ /cad rab chas te/ /stug po ru ni byon par gyur/ /byon nas thub pa thams cad kyis/ /bskul ba mchog ni mdzad par 'gyur/ /oM badzra uta tiSh+Tha ces
pa yi| |rig pas se gol brdabs nas ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bslang / /phyogs rnams kun tu bltas pa na/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rgya mtsho mthong / /thub pas mgon
rnams la btud de/ /bka' stsol zhes ni gsol ba btab/ /mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /gsung gcig gis ni bka' stsal pa/ /sems kyi spyod yul ci 'dra
zhes| |rang gi sems ni so sor rtogs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas/ /rang gi sems la rtog bzhin du/ /yun ring du ni gnas pa na/ /sems kyi rnam pa ma
mthong ste/ /yan lag kun gyis rab btud nas/ /zhus pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /sems kyi rnam pa ma mthong ste/ /sems kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu/ /de nas
sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa/ /sems kyi spyod yul shes par dka'/ /khyod la snying po rab sbyin gyis/ /phra mo'i bzlas pa rab tu spyod/ /oM tsit+ta pra ti be d+haM ka ro mi/ /
snying po dag pa blangs na ni/ /rang gi sems la rtog bzhin du/ /thang cig de la gnas pa na/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du mthong / /de nas sems 'di ci zhig
yin| |nyon mongs sa bon can nam ci/ /dge ba'am mi dge ba yi sems/ /kun gzhi'i sa bon can sems sam/ /chos kyi rgyu mthun rtogs gyur nas/ /pha rol phyin pa drug
bsten pa/ /'di ni sems can dag pa ste/ /kun nas nyon mongs gnas ma yin/ /yun ring du ni bsod nams dang / /ye shes tshogs chen bsags pa ste/ /ji ltar zla ba
gang ba 'di/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog ma med/ /de bzhin tshogs ni rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /sems ni zla ba gang dang mtshungs/ /dngos po yod dang med min pa/ /ji ltar zla ba
mtshungs nyid yin/ /'on kyang bsod nams ye shes che/ /rdzogs pa zla ba dang mtshungs bstan/ /legs byas tshogs ldan rang sems kyi/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong
nas ni/ /dga' zhing mgu ba skyes nas kyang / /slar yang tshig tu rab smras pa/ /bcom ldan mgon po bdag gis ni/ /nyon mongs dri ma kun dag cing / /gzung dang 'dzin pa
dang bral ba'i/ /rang sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong / /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ /thog mar byung ba'i sems 'di bzang / /dang por glo bur nyon mongs
rnams/ /byang chub sems kyis dag par byed/ /dngos po thams cad rnams spangs pa'i/ /dag pa yi ni snying po 'dis/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /byang chub
@#/ /kyi ni sems la rtogs/ /oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA dA yA mi/ /snying po dag pa blangs nas ni/ /sems kyi dbus su rtog pa na/ /zla ba'i dbus su yang zla ba'i//
dkyil 'khor gnyis pa mthong ba ni/ /thub pa rnams la tshig smras pa/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa dag mthong ngo / /de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa/ /byang chub sems
kyi rang bzhin brtan/ /brtan par bya ba'i ched du ni/ /de ni legs par bsgrub par gyis/ /khyod la snying po sbyin bya ste/ /zlos shing de ni brtan par dgongs/ /oM tiSh+Tha
badzra| dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus gnas pa'i/ /rdo rje chen po sems byed cing / /thang cig so sor brtags pa na/ /shin tu brtag pa mthong gyur nas/ /smras pa rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su rdo rje mthong / /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa yi/ /dbus na rdo rje dang ldan mthong / /de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs
pa| |lha rnams kun gyi rdo rje che/ /rdo rje dbyings ni skyed pa yi/ /shin tu brtan pa 'di smros shig /oM badzra At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ /snying po dag pa blangs nas ni/ /rdo rje'i lus su
rnam bsgoms pa/ /de ni sra brtan khong stong med/ /rdo rje'i sku ni thob gyur nas/ /smras ba rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rang bdag rdo rje'i skur mthong ngo / /de
nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par bsgom/ /oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga tA sta thA a haM/ /snying po dag pa blangs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs
su rnam bsgoms pas/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /kun mkhyen ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun la rab btud nas/ /smras pa bcom ldan
de bzhin gshegs/ /mgon po bdag la byin rlob cing / /bdag gi byang chub brtan par mdzod/ /grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje dbyings
kyi tshig thos nas/ /mgon rnams thugs kar zhugs par gyur/ /rdo rje yi ni rnal 'byor gsungs/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi sam bo d+hi dr-i D+ha badzra ban d+ha/ /
grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /rig sngags chen por brjod pa na/ /rdo rje dbyings ni shin tu brtan/ /de nyid ye shes mngon sangs rgyas/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams
cad ni/ /rdo rje thugs ka nas byung ste/ /chos kyi dbang bskur bzhi bo yi/ /de tshe thub pa dbang bskur gyur/ /rdo rjes sems dpa' byas pa yi/ /byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ba/ /'bras bu byang chub
sems ldan gang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur yin/ /bskal ba grangs med gsum dag gi /sbyin dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bzang dang / /mkha' mtshungs rin chen thob byed pa/ /nor bu rin
@#/ /chen dbang bskur yin/ /bskal ba grangs med gsum du ni/ /gzhan gyis dka' ba spyad pa dang / /brtson 'grus kyis ni 'bras bsgrub pa/ /rdo rje las
kyi dbang bskur yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dag /chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul chen te/ /nyon mongs 'dam gyis ma gos pa/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang bskur yin//
byang chub sems rdzogs rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi/ /dbang bskur bzhi po de rnams chos kyi dbyings/ /de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba/ /sangs rgyas rang
bzhin yon tan dam pa'i tshogs/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas/ /ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru 'dod/ /rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur bas/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'dod//
rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur bas/ /de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che/ /mkha' mtshungs chos nyid snying po can/ /rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur
pas| |sprul pa yi ni skur 'dod do/ /gsang ba bzhi yi dbang bskur bas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob/ /de nas min gi dbang bskur bas/ /thub de rnams snang
mdzad chen gyur/ /chos nyid kyang ni yang dag rtogs/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par brtag /chos kun dngos po med pa ste/ /mtshan ma med cing gsal byed med/ /
mtshan nyid med cing mkha' dang mtshungs/ /dmigs pa rnam par spangs pa ste/ /rang bzhin med cing brjod du med/ /chos kun tshig gi spyod yul yin/ /gzhan yang
gsang bar brtags pa ste/ /de phyir 'dir ni rtogs par brjod/ /rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi/ /chos kyi don 'di ci yin brjod/ /bdag med dngos po yod pa min/ /chos rnams
med cing rtog pa med/ /'on kyang chos nyid yang dag rtogs/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par rtogs/ /rtogs pa nyams su myong bar brjod/ /'dir ni ngo mtshar nyid du rtogs/
chos kun gzugs can min pa dang / /gzugs can du yang 'di ru bstan/ /chos kun tshig gi spyod yul min/ /sgra ru yang na 'dir ba stan te/ /de bas ngo mtshar chos 'di ru/ /
rtog pa rtog pa yin par brjod/ /ci phyir 'di ni ngo mtshar chos/ /de nyid gsang ba bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /las rnams drug po nyid dang ni/ /gzugs can tshig gi mthu dag dang //
'bras phyir sdom pa'i ngo mtshar te/ /de phyir 'di ni ngo mtshar chos/ /de phyir 'di ni rtog par brjod/ /de bas ngo mtshar chos 'di ru/ /rtog pa 'ba' zhig rtog pa yin/ /yang
'dir rtog pa ji lta bu/ /sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas/ /pa rol phyin drug spyod pa dag /bsten pa rtog pa nyid yin no/ /sgrub pa'i don
@#/ /ni ji lta bu/ /gang zag chos la bdag med dang / /gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa yi/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa sgrub po/ /de tshe sgrub pa'i don yin
no| |ci phyir 'di ni rgyu phyi ma/ /rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste/ /'khor ba rgyud du 'dod pa yin/ /phyi ma zhes bya pha rol te/ /rgyud ni phyi mar brjod pa yin/ /rgyud ni rgyun chags
zhes bya ste/ /phyi ma snga ma las byung ba'i/ /de nyid gsang ba spas zhes pa/ /rgyud ni phyi mar brjod pa yin/ /ci phyir rgyud dang phyi ma la/ /sa mthar phyin pa'i rgyal ba mchog
srid pa'i btson ra las brgal yin/ /yang na gang zhig brgal gyur ba/ /rgyud ni phyi ma yin par bshad/ /rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar byung / /sems can kun la phan pa'i
phyir| |sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos longs spyod/ /sangs rgyas thugs rjes bskul ba ni/ /rgyud don yang dag byung ba yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs byung ba'i/ /
chos dang longs spyod byung ba ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni/ /rgyud don yang dag byung ba yin/ /rdo rje 'chang drag 'di ci zhig /sangs rgyas gzugs kyi mi
'dul ba'i/ /sems can gdug tshogs de yi phyir/ /rang gi ye shes byang chub sems/ /rdo rje drag por yang dag 'byung / /drag po'i don ni ji ltar 'byung / /drag po
drag po'i mig gis ni/ /drag po'i khro bo zhes su bstan/ /drag po'i las ni spyod byed rnams/ /'chos shing bzlog par bya ba yin/ /rdo rje zhi ba 'di ci zhig /'dug pa de kun btul
nas ni/ /slar yang zhi bar yang dag byung / /de nyid rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / /sems can don gyi thabs ston mdzad/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /khro bo'i dbang phyug
dag tu bstan/ /de nyid zhi dang drag po dang / /phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phul che/ /ci yi phyir na zhi bar brjod/ /sna tshogs gzugs can rnal 'byor che/ /sems can smin bya 'ba'
zhig phyir/ /nyon mongs gdug la brtser dgongs shing / /zhi ba'i don ni yang dag byung / /phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir/ /nyon mongs gdug pa nyid gzhom phyir/ /byang chub sems
kyi rang bzhin bzang / /rdo rje phyag na bsnams mdzad ba/ /de ni phyag na rdo rjer brjod/ /dus gsum bdud rnams de bzhin du/ /mi mthun phyogs kyi mi shigs pa/ /byang sems
rang bzhin rdo rje ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa'i tshogs/ /de nas sangs rgyas kun dang ldan/ /gsang chen rdo rje de lta bu/ /phyag na rtag tu bsnams pas na/ /de ni phyag na
rdo rjer brjod/ /rdo rje gtum pa'i don ci zhig /rdo rje gtum po gnod sbyin che/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin shin tu brtan/ /nga rgyal nyon mongs zhags pa za/ /byang chub sems dpa'
@#/ /rang byung ba/ /ci yi phyir na gtum por brjod/ /gtum gdug drag po chen po ni/ /rang byung nga nyid kho na ste/ /srid pa'i zhags pa gcod byed
cing | |drag po'i don ni gtum po yin/ /rdo rje khro bo ci yin brjod/ /gsod dang skrod pa drag po ste/ /de ni khro bo'i don du brjod/ /nga ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar/ /nyon mongs
phyogs rnams sreg byed yin/ /rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa/ /ci phyir rdo rjer brjod par bya/ /sra zhing snying po khong stong med/ /bcad dang gzhig par bya ba min/ /bsreg
par bya min 'jig med pas/ /stong nyid rdo rjer brjod par bya/ /'gro drug 'khor lo spong byed cing / /sdig pa bral bar byed pa yi/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /nyon
mongs thams cad sel bar byed/ /rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ci/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes dang / /byang sems brtan pa gang yin pa/ de ni rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//
de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag /de yi rdo rje ji lta bu/ /rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing / /chos su 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa/ /chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid/ /stong
pa nyid ni rdo rjer brjod/ /gzugs sogs chos kyi rang bzhin gang / /'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa gang / de lta bu ni 'di rdo rje/ /rdo rje rigs
kyi don 'di ci/ /bde na zhing don yod de bzhin nyid/ /'gyur ba med cing skye ba med/ /'gag med de kho na nyid gang / /de lta bu ni rdo rje yin/ /don yod 'gyur ba med pa
yi| |de lta bu yi rigs gyur pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su brjod/ /de ni rdo rje'i rigs zhes bya/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i chos/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes su
brjod/ /bden zhing bslu ba med pa yi/ /byang chub sems gang de rigs yin/ /rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni du/ /phyogs rnams thams cad kun khyab pa'i/ /byang chub sems
dpa' mkhas pa ni/ /chos dbyings dang mnyam thug pa med/ /rdo rje 'chang rnams de snyed do/ /rdo rje'i rigs kun gang gi yin/ /chos kyi bdag po bla med pa/ /rnam par snang
mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /mgon des yongs su gzung ba de'i/ /de yi dkyil 'khor yin gsungs pa/ /ston pa gang zhig 'di rnams su'i/ /rjes su ston par byed pa
gang | |de yi spyod lam bya ba ci/ /gsang ba kun tu bsdus pas gsungs/ /'di yi ston pa byang chub sems/ /rjes su ston byed shes rab thabs/ /phyag rgya rnams ni spyod
pa ste/ /sngags rnams de yi bya ba yin/ /rdo rje 'chang gi rigs gang yin/ /rdo rje 'chang ba de kun gyi/ /rigs ni byang chub sems yin te/ /byang chub sems dpa'
@#/ /brtul zhugs bzang / /sangs rgyas kyi yang de nyid yul/ /chen po gnas gang zhig na gnas/ /chos rnams kun la gnas med de/ /rtsa ba med sems
spyod yul lo/ /chos rnams thams cad gzugs can min/ /chos kyi dbyings te spyod yul med/ /rigs ni rnam pa du yin brjod/ /rtag dang mi 'khrugs rin chen dbang //
'od dpag med pa dngos grub rnams/ /rigs ni rnam pa brgyar gsungs te/ /mdo ru bsdu na rnam pa lnga/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang / /chos dang las dang rnam pa
lnga| |ci yi phyir na rigs su brjod/ /mchog dang dman pa'i bye brag gis/ /rigs zhes bya ba de rnam gnyis/ /sems can lam ngan zhugs pa yi/ /rigs ni dman pa
yin par brjod/ /lam ngan 'gro ba spangs nas ni/ /byang chub sems la 'jug pa chos/ /de bas rdo rje rigs brjod pa/ /rigs de yang ni lnga pa yin/ /rigs bdag
rang bzhin 'di ci zhig /byang chub sems ni rgyal po che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs pa med/ /mgon po chen po rigs kyi bdag/ /de ni rigs kyang lnga pa yin/ /ci yi
phyir na sems dpar brjod/ /sems dpa' zhes bya rnam gsum ste/ /byis pa de bzhin mkhas pa dang / /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dang / /rnam gsum
sems dpar brjod par bya/ /yang gsungs pa/ ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod/ /sems dpa' ci yin byis pa brjod/ /sems dpa' mkhas pa ci yi phyir/ /byang chub
sems dpa' ci yin brjod/ /gnas gang zhig tu brjod bya ba/ /de ni de yi sems dpar brjod/ /chos sam yang na chos min dang / /legs byas nyes par byas pa la//
mi shes mun pas bsgribs gyur cing / /chos la nyon mongs bdag nyid 'dzin/ /dman zhing gti mug rigs can gyur/ /de lta bu ni byis par brjod/ /nyon mongs kun
la chags pa dang / /de bzhin srid pa ngan song gsum/ /mi shes mun pa la chags pa/ /de 'dir byis par brjod par bya/ /sems dpa' mkhas pa gang zhig yin//
dri ma las 'das nyon mongs spong / /rnal 'byor ldan zhing brtul zhugs che/ /mi shes ling tog 'joms byed pa/ /de ni sems dpa' mkhas par brjod/ /'dir ni
byang chub sems dpa' gang / /chos kyi de nyid rtogs gyur cing / /'khor ba'i gnas nas sad 'gyur te/ /sems can rnams ni sad byed pa/ /de ni byang chub sems dpar brjod//
rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du/ /de la byang chub rnam gsum ste/ /dman dang mchog dang bar ma'o/ /dman pa nyan thos sems yin te/ /bar ma rang rgyal byang chub bo/ /
@#/ /mchog ni byang chub sems yin te/ /de ni mi 'gyur rdo rje yin/ /sku gsung thugs rnams gzhag pa gang / /byang chub mchog tu brjod bar bya/ /
ci phyir rdo rje sems dpa' yin/ /byang chub mchog gi ye shes gang / /de ni rdo rje nges par brjod/ /ye shes rdo rje las byung ba/ /de ni rdo rje sems dpar brjod/ /rdo rje 'chang
ba kun gyi rgyal/ /ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mgon po che/ /dga' chen de ni chags sam ci/ /sems can thams cad dgrol ba'i phyir//
sems can rnams la chags pa ste/ /de ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su bsgrags/ /byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu ste/ /sangs rgyas ye shes
bla med gang / /de ni rdo rje sems rang bzhin/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'o/ /rdo rje rgyal po ci yin brjod/ /rdo rje rigs kun rgyal po ste/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhes su
brjod/ /dgug dang dbab pa'i rdo rje ni/ /de ni rdo rje rgyal por brjod/ /bsdu ba yi ni dngos po bzhi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang spyad pa/ /sems can dgug pa'i
thabs zhes pa/ /rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung / /rdo rje chags pa 'di don ci/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed pa/ /rjes su chags pa zhes su brjod/ /rdo rje chags
pa bdud chen po/ /de ni rdo rje chags par brjod/ /sems can sman phyir bcom ldan gyi/ /gang tsho byang chub spyod pa spyad/ /byang chub spyod pa rjes chags pa/ /rdo rje chags par
yang dag 'byung / /rdo rje legs pa ci yin brjod/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing / /legs so zhes bya rab ster byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun mgu byed//
de mi rdo rje legs par brjod/ /sems can dag pa mgu byed cing / /rdo rje 'chang rnams sgrub par byed/ /sems can mkhas rnams dga' byed cing / /gsang ba 'dzin pa
rangs par byed/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sku'i phyir/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di chos rnam drug /gang gi tshe ni sngon bsgrubs ba/ /rdo rje legs par yang dag byung / /rdo
rje rin chen ci yi phyir/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa gang / /mkha' mnyam rin chen lta bu ste/ /rdo rje rin chen skal ba che/ /de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod/ /sems dpa' chen
po'i dbang bskur te/ /sems can kun gyi dbang bskur ba/ /byang chub snying po'i dbang bskur gyis/ /rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'dzin par byed/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin pa
gang | |mkha' mtshungs rdo rje yang dag byung / /de ni rin chen don yod de/ /de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod/ /ma rig ling tog 'khor ba yi/ /mi shes mun pa 'joms byed cing / /
@#/ /thar ba'i snang ba gzi brjid che/ /de ni rdo rje gzi brjid brjod/ /ci phyir rdo rje rgyal mtshan yin/ /rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /thar
pa'i lam 'gro rgyal mtshan te/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyal mtshan che/ /de ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan brjod/ /rdo rje bzhad pa ci yin brjod/ /rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje bzhad//
sangs rgyas thams cad bzhad byed cing / /byang chub sems dpa' kun dbugs 'byin/ /de ni rdo rje bzhad par brjod/ /ci yi phyir na rdo rje chos/ /rnal 'byor chen po
sangs rgyas chos/ /sangs rgyas sems can rtogs byed pa/ /dag pa de bzhin gshegs snying po/ /de ni rdo rje chos su brjod/ /rdo rje rnon bo ci yin brjod/ /shes rab
rnon po ye shes che/ /shin tu sdug pa'i nyon mongs gcod/ /shes bya'i sgrib pa'ang gcod pas na/ /de ni rdo rje rnon por brjod/ /rdo rje rgyu yi don ci zhig /'khor lo sangs
rgyas gar byed pas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu brtan/ /dam chos ro yi bcud las byung / /de ni rdo rje rgyu zhes bya/ /rdo rje smra ba ci yin brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi chos chen
po| |mkha' mtshungs tshig dang bral ba ste/ /tshig med tshig las yang dag byung / /de ni rdo rje smra bar brjod/ /ci yi phyir na rdo rje las/ /sems can smin dang grol ba
yi| |sangs rgyas kun gyi las gang dang / /sangs rgyas las ni bdag med pa/ /de ni rdo rje las zhes bya/ /rdo rje srung ba ci yin brjod/ /byang chub sems dpa'i srung ba ste//
theg pa dman pa spong byed cing / /rtse mo nas lhung srung byed pa/ /de ni rdo rje srung bar brjod/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin 'di don ci/ /sdig pa thams cad zad byed cing / /nyon mongs
thams cad nges par gcod/ /srid pa za byed gnod sbyin che/ /de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin brjod/ /rdo rje khu tshur ci yin brjod/ /bden zhing gzhan min de bzhin nyid/ /'gyur med de kho
na nyid gang / /sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid ye shes/ /de ni rdo rje khu tshur brjod/ /sngon du byang chub sems 'gyur gang / /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag byung / /sdu ba'i dngos po
bzhi po ni/ /rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung / /sems can smin byed chags pa'o/ /byang chub spyod pa legs pa ste/ /de nyid ces bya dam tshig che/ /byang chub sems las
yang dag byung / /sngon gyi sbyin pa'i spyod gyur gang / /de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod/ /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /de ni rdo rje gzi brjid brjod/ /'byung po kun la byams
pa ni/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan yang dag byung / /chos kyi sbyin pa bzhad pa ste/ /dbang bskur bzhi por bstan pa yin/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin gang / /rdo rje chos ni de
@#/ /las byung / /nyon mongs gcod byed rdo rje che/ /rdo rje rnon por yang dag byung / /mngon shes dang ni mthul sogs/ /de ni rdo rje rgyu ru brjod/ /gzungs
la sogs pa grub pa ni/ /rdo rje smra bar yang dag byung / /ye shes chen po chos chen po/ /dam tshig ces bya'i dga' chen po/ /ye shes mngon par rtogs te dag/ /rdo rje chos
las yang dag byung / /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rgyal po/ /rdo rje las su yang dag byung / /theg pa dman pa spong byed pa/ /de phyir rdo rje srung bar brjod/ /nyon mongs srid pa'i
gdon chen po/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin yang dag byung / /de nyid ye shes sngon byang chub/ /de nyid rdo rje khu tshur brjod/ /las kyi dam tshig bzhi po ste/ /las kyi sems dpa' bdag
nyid che/ /las kyi 'khor los las byung ba'i/ /rdo rje las ni de las byung / /gzhan yang / byang chub sems ni bskyed pa las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag byung / /rdo
rje rang bzhin sems de yang / /rnam pa bzhi ru byung ba ste/ /sgrol ba dang ni grol ba dang / /dbugs 'byin mya ngan 'das 'god byed/ /sems dpa' rgyal po chags pa
che| |rdo rje legs par yang dag byung / /bsod nams ye shes tshogs nyid las/ /rdo rje rin chen rab tu bsgrags/ /bsod nams rang bzhin rin chen de/ /rnam bzhi ji
skad bshad pa bzhin/ /ye shes kyi ni chogs brjod pa/ /de ni rdo rje chos zhes bya/ /ye shes rang bzhin chos de yang / /rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag byung / /brtson 'grus pha rol
phyin pa nyid/ /de ni rdo rje las su brjod/ /brtson 'grus rang bzhin las de yang / /rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag byung / /brtson dang sbyor ba zhes bya dang / /so sor rtog dang sgrub pa ste/ /
brtson 'grus de bzhin las bzhi po/ /de las mthar gyis byung ba yin/ /sems dpa' 'di rnams gang las byung / /rdo rje sems sogs de bzhin du/ /byang chub sems las
yang dag byung / /pha rol phyin drug spyod pa las/ /rdo rje can rnams byung bar 'dod/ /de bzhin pha dang ma ni gang / /ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /pha ni thabs la mkhas pa
ste| |pad+ma las ni sangs rgyas sras/ /rdo rje can rnams gang las byung / /rdo rje rgyal po de bzhin chags/ /rdo rje rin chen rgyal mtshan dang / /rdo rje chos dang de bzhin no/ /de
rnams shes rab gtso bor bstan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje legs/ /gzi brjid de bzhin bzhad pa nyid/ /rgyu dang smra ba sems dpa' che/ /de rnams thabs las byung ba
yin| |rdo rje las dang rdo rje srung / /gnod sbyin de bzhin khu tshur nyid/ /shes rab thabs su grags pa ste/ /brtan pa chen po tshogs su bshad/ /rdo rje'i rigs rnams kun gyi gtso//
@#/ /rdo rje lcags kyu ma ru bshad/ /rdo rje rin chen mchog gyur pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin pha/ /pha ni rdo rje rgyal po rgyu/ /ma ni rdo rje rnon po ste/ /pad+ma'i
rigs chen bzang po yi/ /pad 'dzin gang las byung ba'o/ /rdo rje gzi brjid rin chen pha/ /rgyal mtshan ma ni yin par bstan/ /nor bu rin chen bzang po yi/ /rin chen
gang las byung pa'o/ /pha ni rgyal po rdo rje las/ /ma ni gnod sbyin srung ba ste/ /las kyi rigs can bzang po yi/ /las rnams gang las byung ba'o/ /dang po gang zhig ci zhe
na| |dngos kun dang po sa bon te/ /rdo rje can kun dang po sems/ /'dun dang dran dang ting nge 'dzin/ /rigs rnams kun gyi dang por bshad/ /yang gleng gzhi ci yin zhe na/ /rigs
bzhi las ni yang dag byung / /tshangs pa'i gnas chen dang ldan pa'i/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams kyi/ /snying rje chen po gleng gzhi yin/ /dmigs pa gang zhig yin
zhe na| |rtog pa med cing dmigs pa med/ /dang por byang chub sems byung ba'i/ /pha rol phyin pa mchog drug ni/ /de yi dmigs pa yin par bshad/ /rkyen gang zhe na/
rtag tu srid gsum mngon dga' ba/ /sems can sdug bsngal gyur bltas nas/ /snying rje dang ni ldan pa yi/ /byang chub sems kyis bskul ba'o/ /gsang ba 'di ni gang
du byung / /'og min stug po nyams dga' zhing / /stug po'i zhing khams 'jig med pa/ /de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos/ /rdzogs par longs spyod tshul 'di byung / /khyab
bdag 'di rnams gang nas byung / /rdo rje rin chen mchog chen gyi/ /gzhal yas khang pa yid 'ong zhing / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos ldan pa/ /de nas khyab bdag 'di rnams
byung | |thog ma tha ma med 'di ci/ /gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen pos gsungs/ /sems can kun gyi shes pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / /chos dbyings rdo
rje chen po ste/ /thog ma tha ma med par bshad/ /rab tu dga' ba nyid 'di ci/ /bde chen rab tu grub bya'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po
che| |rab tu dga' ba nyid ces bshad/ /rab bzang nyid ni ji lta bu/ /dngos po kun mchog rdo rje ni/ /byang chub kyi ni sems zhes brjod/ /sangs rgyas skyed byed bzang po yi/ /
rdo rje rab bzang nyid ces bshad/ /rdo rje snying bdag ji lta bu/ /gdul bya 'phags pa'i skyes mchog nyid/ /de ni rdo rje snying por brjod/ /de rnams bdag po rgyal po ni/ /rdo rje
snying po'i bdag por bshad/ /ci yi phyir na kun tu bzang / /byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ldan pa'i/ /'gro ba srid pa'i skye gnas gang / /de kun rtag tu bzang bas na/ /kun
@#/ /tu bzang por brjod par bya/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'chang ba gang / /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /rdo rje gang de rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//
rdo rje rdo rje 'chang bar brjod/ /dang po'i rigs ni ji ltar byung / /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyis/ /grags chen rdzogs par byang chub pa/ /de ni dang po'i rigs byung ste//
de kho na nyid rigs las so/ /yang na rab tu mkhas pa rnams/ /bskal pa grangs med 'das nas ni/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob gang / /de ni dang po'i rigs byung
yin| |chos kun skye ba med pa dang / /'byung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /de nyid rtogs shing shes pa yis/ /chos rnams thams cad rtog pa med/ /chos dang gang
zag bdag med las/ /rigs de byung ba nyid du 'dod/ /chos rnams 'ga' yang skye ba med/ /chos rnams 'gag par 'gyur ba med/ /rnam par rtog pa nyer zhi gang //
de nyid sangs rgyas rigs chen yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod/ /chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa dang / /'khor ba'i gnas las sad gyur cing / /sems
can rnams kyis rtogs byed pa/ /de ni byang chub sems dpar brjod/ /ci phyir sangs rgyas brjod par bya/ /de bzhin nyid bden shin tu brtan/ /de kho na nyid gang rtogs/
nas| |chos kun rtogs pa zhes bya gang / /de ni rtogs pas sangs rgyas brjod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod/ /chos kyi de bzhin yang dag gnas/ /slar yang
gzhan du mi 'gyur zhing / /de nyid lam ni ston byed pa/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs zhes bya/ /bcom ldan 'das ni ci yin brjod/ /las dang nyon mongs de bzhin skye/ /de
bzhin nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib/ /mi mthun phyogs kyi chos rnams gang / /de bcom pas na bcom ldan brjod/ /de yi bcom pa ci yin brjod/ /bcom ldan de bzhin
bcom par brjod/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags gcod byed cing / /nyon mongs 'joms shing pham byed pa/ /de ni de yi bcom par brjod/ /de bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ci/ /nyon
mongs bdud sogs gcod byed cing / /skye dgu ma lus thabs chen gyis/ /ngan 'gro srid las skyob byed pa/ /ston pa'i ston par brjod pa yin/ /ci yi phyir na ye shes brjod//
de nyid shes pas ye shes te/ /slar yang chos su rtog pa min/ /rtag dang chad pa spong byed cing / /'chi med de bzhin ye shes ni/ /shes rab ye shes ci yin brjod/ /rnam
ba mang po shes byed cing / /rtogs pas sdug bsngal las grol byed/ /kun nas nyon mongs chos spong ba/ /shes rab ye shes zhes su brjod/ /ci phyir shes rab brjod
@#/ /par bya/ /rab sbyor sbyor ba shes 'gyur zhing / /khyad par du ni rtogs par byed/ /bden pa de bzhin nyid shes pa'i/ /shes rab shes rab zhes su bshad/
shes rab pha rol phyin don ci/ /nyan thos rang rgyal phyi rol gyi/ /shes rab las ni bla mar brjod/ /de bzhin nyid gzhol pha rol phyin/ /shes rab pha rol phyin zhes
bshad/ /tshul zhes bya don ci yin brjod/ /na ni dgag pa'i don chen te/ /dngos med dngos po med min pas/ /gang du dri ma med gyur pa/ /de ni de yi tshul du brjod//
