ting 'dzin don 'di ci yin brjod/ /chos kun dngos po med ces pa'i/ /mnyam pa nyid du rab gnas pa'i/ /shes rab can gyis lhag par bsten/ /sems la dmigs
par brjod par bya/ /ci yi phyir na bsam gtan brjod/ /sdug bsngal thams cad spong byed cing / /nyon mongs dra ba rab 'joms pa'i/ /shes rab bcas par sems
pa ni| |srid pa 'joms par byed pa'i mchog /rnal 'byor don ni ci yin brjod/ /chos rgya chen po dam pa dang / /zab mo'i mchog tu gyur pa des/ /kun shes kun rig
ldan 'byor pa'i/ /rnal 'byor du ni brjod par bya/ /rnal 'byor pa ni ci yin brjod/ /shes rab kyi ni nges sems pa/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor don sems shing //
sems can kun gyi don sems gang / /de ni rnal 'byor pa don brjod/ /nga ni kun gyi rgyal po che/ /thams cad rig cing thams cad ster/ /rdo rje 'chang chen dang po ste/ /bde
ba yi ni rgyu 'di yis/ /de bzhin nga ni 'jig rten gsum/ /khams gsum rnal 'byor rig pa'i mchog /de bzhin 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/ /bde 'gro dang ni ngan 'gro dang //
'dod pa lnga la longs spyod yin/ /srid gsum 'di yi don ci zhig /sems can kun gyi sems gang yin/ /srid pa gsum du brjod par bya/ /'dod dang gzugs dang
gzugs med las/ /'di ltar thams cad rig pa mchog /bdag med byed pa po yang med/ /chos kyang yod pa ma yin te/ /dge dang mi dger byed pa yi/ /bag chags
kyis ni kun tu bsgribs/ /chos ni thog med dus can te/ /byed pa po ni yod ma yin/ /rtog pas nyams pa'i sems ldan pas/ /rgyu dang 'bras bur mthong bar 'gyur//
kun gzhi sa bon thams cad pa/ /de ni chos kun skyed par byed/ /bsgos shing bag chags dang ldan pa/ /de ni srid pa gsum zhes bya/ /'dod pa'i las skyes khams
gsum gyi/ /rgyur ni kun gzhi de nyid snang / /gzugs dang gzugs med 'gro ba yi/ /chos rnams kun gyi gnas kyang yin/ /chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /nyes pa
@#/ /kun dang bral ba ste/ /thog ma med 'byung chos snying po/ /glo bur dri mas nyon mongs 'gyur/ /nga ni kho na chos chen po/ /nga ni chos kyi snying por bshad//
de bsang ni rgyal po che/ /nga ni srid pa gsum du bsgrags/ /'jig rten gsum ni ci yin brjod/ /'dod pa 'jig rten de bzhin gzugs/ /gzugs med pa yi skye dgu rnams//
'jig rten gsum po zhes pa de/ /rang byung nga nyid kho na yin/ /'dod pa zhes bya chos chen te/ /dag pa btsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ /gzung 'dzin chos rnams zhes bya ba'i/ /de
bzhin nyid las so sor rtog /chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med phyir/ /nga ni chos de dag par byed/ /de bas nga ni rgyal po che/ /'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por bstan/ /
ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin gzugs/ /de bzhin gzugs med rab tu bsgrags/ /stong pa nyid dang dbyer med pas/ /nga ni snying po'i bdag por bshad/ /khams gsum
pa yi don ci zhig /'dod khams de bzhin gzugs khams dang / /gzugs med pa ni nyid dag dang / /khams gsum bzang po 'di dag ni/ /rang byung nga nyid kho na
yin| |'di ni khams dang rgyu dang don/ /khams gsum gyi ni rgyu sems pa/ /stong dang mtshan ma med bshad cing / /smon pa med pa nga nyid bstan/ /'khor ba'i don ni
ci zhig yin/ /byis pa rnams ni kun tu 'byung / /de bzhin yang dang yang du 'khor/ /'khor ba dag pa'i bdag nyid de/ /rang byung nga nyid kho na yin/ /gang la 'khor ba yod pa
yi| |chos ni rdul tsam yod ma yin/ /yang dag ma yin kun brtags phyir/ /de ni thog mtha' med pa yin/ /med gang de ni stong pa ste/ /stong pa nyid gang nga nyid do/ /de
bas 'khor ba de nyid ni/ /rdo rje 'chang rgyal nga nyid bsgrags/ /mya ngan 'das pa ci yin brjod/ /gang zhig de bzhin nyid rtag stong / /bden bzhi rang bzhin bzang po nyid/ /mtshan
nyid dang ni dngos po gzugs/ /mtshan ma nyid kyang rnam par spangs/ /tshig dang sgra yis gzung bya min/ /rnam par rtog pa yod ma yin/ /de bas mya ngan 'das sgra ru/ /nga
nyid kho na rab shes bya/ /de yi rtag pa'i don ci zhig /rtag nyid rtag la 'byung gnas te/ /rnam par rtog pa dang bral gang / /rtag pa de nyid kho na ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra ru
bsgrags/ /'jig pa yang ni ci yin brjod/ /gang zhig 'khor bar mi 'jug cing / /thams cad mi rtag pa nyid dang / /sdug bsngal 'byung 'gog byed pa yi/ /'jig pa
mya ngan 'das sgra yin/ /dag pa yang ni ci yin brjod/ /yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang min/ /dngos po'ang ma yin dngos med min/ /brjod bya rjod byed ma yin min/ /
@#/ /dag pa mya ngan 'das nyid yin/ /theg pa chen po ci yin brjod/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs gyur cing / /theg pa kun las nges rgyal ba/ /
yang dag gyur pa'i sems can ni/ /theg pa chen po zhes su bstan/ /mthu dang las rnams 'jug pa dang / /tshogs rnams rnal 'byor ngo mtshar rnams/ /rgya che zhes pa theg
chen te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo mtshar mchog /nam mkha'i don ni ci zhig yin/ /sa nyid kyang ni ci yin brjod/ /'byung ba med cing rdzas kyang med/ /skye ba med cing 'chi ba med/ /
dus gsum dngos po dang bral mchog/ /nam mkha' zhes pa'i sgra ru bstan/ /yang dang yang du skye ba dang / /de bzhin nyon mongs kun bdag nyid/ /grangs med dpag
med dang bral ba/ /de ni sa nyid brjod par bya/ /'byung ba chen po gang las byung / /'gog pa ci yin gang gis byed/ /ma rig nyon mongs la sogs las/ /'byung ba chen
po yang dag 'byung / /sa bon kun ldan kun gzhi ni/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid 'dod/ /gnas ni yongs su gyur pa dang / /kun gzhi sa bon mi 'byung zhing / /rtog pa
thams cad dang bral ba/ /'byung ba chen po 'gog pa yin/ /rtog pa chen bo'i rgyal po mchog tu gsang zhing sbas pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo las/ shin tu
gsang ba stug po'i tshogs kyi las thams cad bsdus pa ste drug pa las/ sems dpa' bcu drug gi bshad pa zhes bya ba bshad pa'i dang po rdzogs so// //
ci yi phyir ni phyag rgyar brjod/ /gang gis phyag rgya bcings gyur pa/ /de ni srog chags gdug kun dang / /'gro ba sdig can thams cad dang / /rtag tu rgyas ni btab par 'gyur/ /
ci phyir sngags su brjod par bya/ /gsang sngags rnams ni 'bod byed cing / /gdug pa thams cad skrod par byed/ /nyon mongs sngags rnams 'joms byed cing / /sangs
rgyas chos ni spyan 'dren yin/ /ci phyir zhe na rig sngags brjod/ /'dod chags mun pa rnams 'dul zhing / /nyon mongs rnams kyang rnam par 'dul/ /ma rig pa ni zlog
byed pa/ /de ni rig sngags legs par brjod/ /gzungs sngags rnams ni ci yin brjod/ /chos rnams kyi ni rten byed cing / /srid pa'i phyogs ni rab 'joms byed/ /sangs
rgyas chos rnams thob byed cing / /dge ba la brten sbyin pa'ang yin/ /phyag rgya yi ni mtshan nyid brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun dang brtul zhugs ldan/ /byang chub sems
dpa' rnams dang ni/ /rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad dag /spyod lam phyag rgyas mtshon par byed/ /sngags rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid kyang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin
@#/ /te| |chos kyi snying po sgrub byed cing / /chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag ldan/ /sngags kyi mtshan nyid yin par brjod/ /rig sngags kyi ni mtshan
nyid gsungs/ /'khor bar myong ba'i sdug bsngal dang / /'dod chags la sogs nyes pa'i tshogs/ /rigs dang bcas pa zhi byed pa'i/ /rig sngags kyi ni mtshan
nyid brjod/ /de bzhin kho nar gzugs sngags kyi/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dzin byed cing / /chos rnams 'dzin par byed pa dang / /dge ba zhes bya ba 'dzin byed
pa| |gzungs sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod/ /rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i gnas ni gang / /ji ltar bcing bya thub chen po/ /phyag rgya dag ni 'ching ba ni/ /ji ltar rdo rje can kun
mnyes/ /dang po kho nar khrus bya zhing / /de bzhin phyogs dag bcing ba dang / log 'dren rnams kyang bcing bya ste/ /gos dag gtsang ma mgo bya zhing / /grong dang
yul 'khor dag dang ni/ /grong khyer dang ni grong rdal rnams/ /de yi dbus su phyag rgya dang /nam yang bcing bar mi bya ste/ /lha khang yang na dgon pa'am/ /ri bo yi
ni phug dag gam/ /rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dben zhing / /'du 'dzi med pa'i gnas gtsang ma/ /der ni skyil krung bca' bar bya/ /bkra shis skyil krung nyid bya ste/ /
ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /byang chub snying por bcings pa bzhin/ /der ni mig dag btsum bya zhing / /so la so ni bzhag par bya/ /mchu gnyis dag kyang
mnyam bya zhing / /dran pa rtse gcig byas nas kyang / /sbyor me sbyor ba'i sngags bzla zhing / /phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya/ /phyag rgya'i rnam pa de lta bu'i/ /bcings pas
rdo rje can kun mnyes/ /rig sngags ji ltar bzla bar bya/ /dbang phyug chen po gsang bas gsungs/ /rig sngags dag ni zlos pa na/ /ji ltar yid kyis rdo rje bzlas/ /skyil
krung ji lta ba bzhin bya/ /dran dang yid ni ma yongs pas/ /rig sngags dag ni bzla bya zhing / /sku nyid kyang ni bsam par bya/ /mchu yis ma yin lces kyang min/ /rkan
nyid kyis kyang ma yin te/ /lce dang lkog mas kyang ma yin/ /rtag tu snying gnas kyang min/ /shin tu phra ba'i yid kyis ni/ /sems ni chos nyid nang chud bya/ /de ltar bzlas
pa byas na ni/ /yid kyis rdo rje bzlas pa yin/ /oM ni ci zhig yin par bshad/ /mchog dang nor ster dpal dang g.yang / /skal bzang rnam pa dang ldan zhing / /dam bca' ba
dang bkra shis don/ /nor bu 'dzin pa'i snying po yin/ /yi ge hUM ni ci yin brjod/ /sdug bsngal 'chos shing 'joms par byed/ /srid pa'i zhags pa gcod byed cing / /
@#/ /gdug pa sngags shing gsod byed pa'i/ /hUM ni mchog tu dran par bya/ /yi ge phaT ni ci yin brjod/ /gdug dang sdug bsngal 'joms byed cing /
bde ba dag ni 'gugs par byed/ /phaT ni 'joms byed sgra yin te/ /grogs dang bcas pa 'joms par byed/ /swA hA zhes pa ci yin brjod/ /sdig pa thams cad zhi byed
cing | |dge ba'i tshogs ni 'phel bar byed/ /nyes par byas pa 'phrog byed cing / /sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog /mchod pa ci phyir brjod par bya/ /
mchod par byed pas mchod pa ste/ /gang du bsad bya mi 'jigs pa'i/ /de yi mchod pa rnam mang 'gyur/ /pha rol gyi ni mchod pa min/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun
gyis mchod/ /de bzhin du ni thar pa'i mchog /gsang ba'i mchod pa de rnams ni/ /'jigs med rgyal sras rnams kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin dang //
nyid kyi sras kyi mtshungs med pa'i/ /cho ga sgrub pa'i gsang ba ni/ /rtag tu rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog /de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang / /zhugs pa gang dang gang
yin pa/ /de ni dam tshig shes pa yin/ /dam tshig goms par byed pa yang / /dam tshig shes pa yin par brjod/ /bskal pa grangs med 'das pa yi/ /byang chub
sems dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig la zhugs pa/ /de yi dam tshig shes par brjod/ /ci yi phyir na dkyil 'khor yin/ /dam pa'i chos kyi bcud snying
po| |'byung bas de ni dkyil 'khor brjod/ /dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba che/ /chos chen shin tu bstan pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga ji lta bu/ /cho ga chos dang rnal 'byor
te| |gsang ba'i thar pa yang dag 'byung / /skye ba 'di nyid kho na la/ /rab dga' sgrub par byed pa'i mchog /dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs pa yi/ /skyes pa'am yang na bud med
kyis| |bya ba gang zhig bya ba ni/ /gsungs shig gsang ba'i dbang phyug che/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro dang / /byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang / /de bzhin
du ni sgrub pa'i mchog /shin tu bstan par bya ba yin/ /thub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la/ /sdom pa ji ltar sbyin par bya/ /khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya/ /
ma byin par yang blang mi ba/ /'dod pas log par g.yem mi bya/ /brdzun du yang ni smra mi bya/ /nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba yi/ /chang dag 'thung ba spang bar bya/ /bya ba ma yin
thams cad dor/ /mchog tu sems can gdul bar bya/ /dam pa rnams la rim gro dang / /rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya/ /rnal 'byor rig pa bsgrub pa'i
@#/ /phyir| |mkhas pa rnams la bsnyen par bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /ngag gi yang ni rnam pa bzhi/ /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag
kyang | |ci nus par ni bsrung bar bya/ /slob dpon brnyas par mi bya ste/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rnams la yang / /nam yang
brnyas par mi bya'o/ /'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma sogs/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gang yin pa/ /'gom pa nyid du mi bya zhing / /bza' bar yang ni mi bya'o/ /de bzhin dman
ma lha yi grib/ /rkang pa dag gis brdzi mi bya/ /de yi steng du 'dug mi bya/ /slar yang gzhag par mi bya'o/ /lha yi phyag mtshan bzang po dang / /lha yi bzhon pa'i
mtshan ma rnams/ /'gom zhing brnyas par mi bya ste/ /sems can la ni gnod mi bya/ /de yis srog gi phyir yang ni/ /'dor bar mi bya gang zhig yin/ /'tsho ba'i srog
gi phyir yang ni/ /byang chub sems ni dor mi bya/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya ni/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la dad pa yang / /rnam pa kun tu btang mi bya//
sdom pa btang bar mi bya zhing / /bdag nyid gdung bar mi bya'o/ /khrus kyi las ni ji ltar bya/ /mi dge bcu ni spongs nas su/ /dge ba bcu ni sten byed cing / /'byung
po rnams la phan 'dod pa/ /nang gi bdag nyid khrus su 'dod/ /bdag nyid rab tu dag bya'i phyir/ /bdag nyid phyag rgya rgyas gdab phyir/ /phyag rgya thams cad yang dag
bcings/ /rnal 'byor pa yi khrus su brjod/ /gsang ba'i mkhas ldan khas len pa'i/ /chu yi khrus ni bya ba ste/ /las 'di rnam par rtog pa'i khrus/ /rdo rje slob dpon dag
gis bya/ /yang na tshogs khrus bya ba/ /mchog tu ngo mtshar bshad bya ste/ /dang por bdag nyid go bgo zhing / /bdag nyid bkru ba'i phyir du ni/ /khro bo yang ni dran par bya/ /don
kun rab tu sgrub byed pa'i/ /yig gnyis go cha bzang po yin/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin drag chen dang / /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste/ /oM badzra kI li kI li badzra hUM phaT/ oM TuM
go cha'o/ /oM hUM AHrdo rje gnod sbyin gyi'o/ /oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i 'o/ /rdo rje'i gsang sngags 'di dang ni/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje 'bar
rab bzod dka' bas/ /bdag nyid dag ni 'bar par bya/ /oM d+hu pi d+hu pi kA ya d+hu pi pra dzA la ni swA hA/ chu yi nang du 'jug pa dang / /snyim pa gsum ni blugs pa dang / /
sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs dag la/ /rig sngags 'di ni 'dod pa yin/ /rig sngags mngon par bzlas pa yi/ /sa yi phung po gsum dag ni/ /bdag gi stod dang smad
@#/ /dang dbus/ /rab tu dag byed mchog yin no/ /oM b+hur dza la hUM/ sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran pas/ /rig sngags thams cad mngon bzlas
ba'i| |chu ni phyag rgya kun gyis blang / /rig sngags 'di ni gsang bar 'dod/ /phyogs ni ji ltar bcing ba yin/ /me lha rgyal chen shar phyogs su/ /lho yi phyogs su gshin
rje dang / /nub tu rlung lha nyid dang ni/ /byang du chu lha gzhom par 'dod/ /rnal 'byor pa yis gzugs bzhi ni/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu nges par bcing / /de nas steng
'og mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje nag mos nges par gcad/ /bgegs bcing ba ni ji ltar lags/ /rdo rje khu tshur rab 'bar dang / /rdo rje nyi ma ltar 'bar dang / /rdo
rje can gyi phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs bcing ba ni brtan par 'gyur/ /dga' ba chen po ji lta bu/ /rab tu gus bcas phyag dag bya/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis phyogs bzhi
ru| |lnga pa brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /steng dang 'og dang mtshams rnams su/ /bstod dang bcas pa'i phyag bya'o/ /rdo rje slob dpon skal chen gyi/ /mchog tu gsang
ba'i dam pa yis/ /brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du/ /de bzhin du ni bcing bar bya/ /mchod pa ji ltar yin zhe na/ /rig sngags mngon par bzlas mchod
dang | |phyag rgya bcing ba lhur len dang / /rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i mchod pa dang / /sgrub pa dag gi mchod pa'o/ /sbyin sreg las ni ji lta bu/ /lus kyi las ni rnam
gsum dang / /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang / /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag dang / /bsreg bya sbyin sreg mchog yin no/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung ba'o/ /de nas rdo rje rig
'dzin gyi/ /snying po gsang ba kun bsdus pa'i/ /shin tu sbas pa dam pa'i mchog /de kho na nyid bshad par bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon spyod chen ldan/ /dkyil 'khor gsang
bar rab tu zhugs/ /slob dpon las ni dbang bskur thob/ /gsang dang dgongs pa kun shes shing / /dpa' zhing brtan la brtson 'grus che/ /yid gzhungs 'dzin cing
gsal bar ldan/ /dul drang bshes gnyen can dag gis/ /rdo rje slob dpon nyid bya'o/ /dang por ji srid tshogs par bya/ zla ba'am yang na zla ba phyed/ /yang na lo yi bar
du ni/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs sbyang bar bya/ /gal te de ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /rig 'dzin grub pa rnam gsum mo/ /ji ste rdo rje can gyi yin/ /rnam ba gsum du nges pa yin/ /nor
bu rigs can bzang po la/ /rnal 'byor bzhi po nyid bya'o/ /ji ste pad+ma 'byung ba la/ /rnal 'byor bzhi ni rab tu bsgrub/ /ji ste las kyi rang bzhin bzang / /las rnams kun
@#/ /gyi rigs las ni/ /sbyor ba bzhi ni yang dag byung / /rnam pa bco brgyad dag tu 'gyur/ /snga dro phyi dro nyin phyed dang / /nam gyi stod smad gung la ni/ /
bya ba chen po kun bya ste/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rigs/ /dang por re zhig rnal 'byor che/ /chen pos phyogs kun phyag bya ste/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga yis/ /rdo rje slob
dpon nyid bya'o/ /shes rab chen pos sangs rgyas kun/ /yang dang yang du dran bya ste/ /bdag nyid chen pos sangs rgyas kun/ /rdo rje bsngags kyis bskul bar bya/ /oM
sarba ta thA ga ta pU dze pa s+thA nA ya/ At+mA nAM nI R+ya ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ shar gyi phyogs su song nas ni/ /yan lag kun gyis phyag byas
te| /rdo rje'i gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /bdag nyid dbul bar bya ba yin/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA a b+hi She kA ya/ /At+mA nAM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na a b+hi Shany+tsa
mAM| rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /lho phyogs su ni phyag byas te/ /sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad la/ /bdag ni dbul bar bya ba yin/ /de nas nub kyi phyogs su
ni| /sngags 'di yis hi phyag byas te/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA pra brta nA ya/ At+mA nAM nir+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma pra brta yA mi/ dag pa'i chos can
slob dpon ches/ /nub phyogs su ni phyag byas te/ /rdo rje'i sngags 'dis bskul bya zhing / /bdag nyid rab tu dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA karma Ne At+mA nAM nir+yA ta yA mi/
sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru mAM/ mchod dang dbang bskur las ldan zhing / /byang du chos la nges sbyor bas/ /byang phyogs su ni phyag byas te/ /bdag nyid rdo rje las su 'gyur/ /
shar du mchod pa'i las yin te/ /lho phyogs su ni dbang bskur ba/ /nub phyogs su ni chos chen po/ /byang du chos la nges par sbyor/ /thub pa kun gyi nyi ma'o/ /mgon po
chen po rab btud gnas/ /phyogs rnams kun tu sngags 'di yis/ /phyag ni rab tu btsal bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta pra Na me na badzra ban d+ha naM ka ro mi/ de nas/
ji skad bshad pa'i phyag bya ba/ /sangs rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni/ /rab tu gus bcas phyag rgya rnams/ /myur du bsnyen pa'i sgrub pa yin/ /phyag byas 'og tu langs
nas ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni las rnams bya/ /bdag nyid dbul ba bzang po yi/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya ste/ /ma lus phyogs bzhugs mchog gyur pa/ /sangs
rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /'di ltar nye bar zhi ba bdag /ci nas rdo rje nyid gyur mdzod/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchog gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad la/
@#/ /rtag tu rnam pa thams cad kyis/ /bdag nyid dag ni dbul bar bya/ /rdo rje'i gsang sngags de yis ni/ /bdag nyid dbul bar 'gyur ba yin/ /
sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad ni/ /yang dang yang du rjes dran te/ /sdig pa la sogs nyon mongs kun/ /mya ngan 'das par bshags par bya/ /skye ba 'di 'am
gzhan dag gi /sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad kyi/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs bskyed dang / /de bzhin sems can
kun gyi la/ /rjes su yi rang bya ba yin/ /byang chub mya ngan mi 'da' bar/ /sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba gdab/ /byang chub sems ni thabs chen gyis/ /sems
can sangs rgyas rjes dran bya/ /shin tu ngo mtshar mchod pa ni/ /ci nus par yang bsgrub par bya/ /yang na mya ngan 'da' sogs dang / /rnal 'byor dge ba sogs
pa la/ /ngo mtshar gyur pa'i mchod pa yis/ /mchod pa'i sprin dag dbul bar bya/ /gnas 'di 'am ni gzhan dag na/ /lha sogs bdag gir ma byas pa'i/ /me
tog chu skyes thang skyes rnams/ /thabs chen sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /thub pa'i dbang po rnams la dbul/ /rdo rje'i rnal
'byor 'di yis ni/ /me tog mchod pas rab mchod cing / /phyag rgya rnal 'byor bcas pa yis/ /phyogs rnams kun tu nges par spro/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pU dzA me g+ha sa
mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ gang dag spos kyi shing bzang po/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la dbul/ /lha yi spos sogs rmad byung ba/ /phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ /
oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ dri yi shing rnams bzang po ni/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la dbul/ /phyag rgyar bcas rab bskul nas
ni| |phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rin chen rang bzhin rgya mtsho dang / /rin chen ri bo la sogs
mchog /mchod pa'i sprin ni spro ba yis/ /phyogs rnams kun tu dbul bar bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bo d+h+yang+ga rat+na a laM kA ra pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rtsed
'jo bde ba dga' chen dang / /rgod dang sgeg la sogs pa'i tshogs/ /phyogs rnams kun tu thams cad nas/ /dga' ba'i mchog ni spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta hA s+ye
lA s+ye ra ti kri DA sau khya a nut+ta ra pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ gos dang rgyan sogs 'byung ba yi/ /de bzhin dpag bsam shing bzang po/ /de yi sngags ni brjod
@#/ /bya zhing / /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+tar bo d+hi a lang kA ra was+t+ra pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rin chen
bzang po cher 'bar dang / /snang ba'i shing las byung ba dang / /zla ba nyi ma la sogs 'od/ /phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a lo ka pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha
ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal che/ /yang dang yang du rjes dran nas/ /snying rje bskyed pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya/ /byang chub tu
ni sems bskyed nas/ /sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing / /phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra bo d+hi tsit+ta pU
dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sems can kun la bde legs dang / /'byung po kun la byams pa dang / /dud 'gro kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /ngan 'gro thams cad
zhi 'dod dang / /byams dang snying rje btang snyoms dang / /dga' ba tshangs pa'i rnal 'byor byung / /rdo rje'i sngags ni brjod bya zhing / /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ /
oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra mahA tsa tur brah+ma bi hA ra pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin spyod pas/ /sems can thams cad dpal dang ni/ /
nor dang ldan pa grub par shog /bde ba ma tshang med par shog /ces pas dbul zhing spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA badzrod+b+ha ba dA na pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na
sa ma ye hUM/ sems can thams cad byang chub dang / /sdom la rab tu gnas par shog /rgyags sogs nyes pa chen po rnams/ /shi 'gyur kun tu spro bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga
ta a nut+ta ra mahA bo d+hi ha ra shI la pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ 'jigs dang 'khon sogs sdug bsngal la/ /sogs pa'i 'jigs kun zhi gyur cig /
byams dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /chos la bdag med bsgrub par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra mahA d+harma a ba bo d+hi k+ShAn+ti pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma
ye hUM/ 'khor ba mthar thug bar du ni/ /bdag 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig /de bzhin sems can thams cad ni/ /de nyid sgrub pa byed par shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta san sA
ra pA ri t+yA ga a nut+ta ra biR+ya pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ srog chags kun gyi 'dod chags sogs/ /nyon mongs chen po zhi bar shog /sems can
thams cad g.yeng med cing / /bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan par shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra mahA sau khya bi hA ra d+h+ya na pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/
@#/ /sangs rgyas ye shes shes rab che/ /sdug bsngal gcod byed bla na med/ /shes rab sbyor bas dag byed pa'i/ /sangs rgyas sems can dag gyur

cig |oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra kle sha ts+tshe da sarba d+har+m+ma sa man+ta dz+nyA na mahA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ stong gsum gyi ni rdul snyed kyi/ /bdag
nyid kyis ni rnam bsam zhing / /mchod pa'i phyir ni rnam bsam nas/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya nir+yA ta na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na
sa ma ye hUM/ stong gsum gyi ni rdul snyed kyi/ /bdag nyid kyis ni rnam bsam zhing / /lce ni de nyid ldan dang bcas/ /sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA
ga ta bA ka ni r+yI ta na pU dzA me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas rnal 'byor de nyid kyis/ /lus dang ngag sems byung ba yi/ /mchod pa dag ni bsdus nas su/ /sangs
rgyas kun la dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta nir+yA ta na pU dza me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ grags chen ldan pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /ma lus kun la mchod
nas ni/ /dge ba dag ni bsdus byas nas/ /sems can don du bsngo bar bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran nas/ /sems dpa' skyil krung bca' bar bya/ /byams
sogs rnal 'byor chen po rnams/ /phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya/ /go cha mchog gi yig gnyis kyis/ /blo ldan bdag nyid go bgo zhing / /rig sngags gang zhig
mngon 'dod pa'i/ /rig sngags de ni bzla bar bya/ /rgyud chen gsang ba 'di ru ni/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i sngags bzlas pa/ /brgya rtsa bcu ru bshad pa yin/ /yang na nyi shu
rtsa gcig go /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'bring la ni/ /thun mong du ni rnam lngar bshad/ /gang gis sdig can 'grub 'gyur ba'i/ /gsang ba'i bzlas pa rnal 'byor che/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i rigs mchog la/ /bzlas pa 'di ni mchog yin no/ /bkra shis skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /sems kyis sangs rgyas la dmigs nas/ /blo dang
ldan pa bdag nyid ni/ /rtag tu kun mkhyen sangs rgyas bsam/ /gtsug tor la sogs mtshan bzang dang / /ldan par bdag gis lus bsams te/ /sangs rgyas
snying po nang 'dug cing / /nga nyid sangs rgyas zhes su bsam/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las byung ba'i/ /gang gis 'khor lo rnam sprul pa/ /mngon par byang chub chen po
yis| |chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya/ /gdul bya'i tshogs ni longs spyod pa'i/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'ang 'grub/ /gnas ni yongs su gyur pa yis/ /sems
@#/ /ni kun bzhi las byung min/ /bsod nams ye shes rab rdzogs phyir/ /zla ba gang bar rnam par brtags/ /zla ba gang ba dri med pa/ /snying ga ru ni
bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bsgom/ /de lta bu yi tshul mchog gis/ /zla ba phyed na 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtshams
med lnga po byed pa yang / /lo gcig na ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /ji srid skyo bar mi 'gyur ba'i/ /de srid rnal 'byor chen pos bzlas/ /lus ni ngal bar gyur pa na/ /phyag
rgya bcing ba brtsam par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas pa'i/ /de tshe byang chub mchog bcings bya/ /yang na chos 'byung zhes pa'am/ /shin tu rmad byung dpal
be'u'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i rigs bzlas pa/ /phyag na rdo rje rang bdag nyid/ /byang chub snying po la gnas bdag /bdag ni phyag na rdo rje bstan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
dbus su ni/ /rdo rje'i gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/ /gsang chen rdo rje'i dbus su ni/ /rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bsgom/ /de nas pad+ma'i rigs bzlas pa/ /pad+ma sems
dpa' rang bdag nyid/ /zla ba'i dbus su pad+ma che/ /pad+ma'i dbus su yi ge rnams/ /de bzhin rin chen rigs bzlas pa'i/ /rin chen rgyal po rang bdag nyid/ /zla
ba'i dbus su rin po che/ /rin chen dbus su'ang yi ge rnams/ /de nas las kyi rigs bzang po/ /rnal 'byor don kun sgrub byed la/ /sangs rgyas snying por rang bdag nyid/ /rdo
rje las su rnam par bsgom/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rin chen rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /rin chen rtse mo rdo rje che/ /de yi dbus su'ang yi ge rnams/ /rigs lnga yi
ni bzlas pa 'di/ /gsang ba'i bzlas pa brjod par bya/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /bzlas rgyud gsang ba mchog 'dzin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas
pa'i| |sangs rgyas bdag nyid bkra shis 'dzin/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par bsgom/ /sangs rgyas de yi thugs dbus su/ /rig
pa'i yi ge rnam par bsgom/ /rang gi lus ni bdag med cing / /chos dang gang zag stong pa nyid/ /sangs rgyas de dag gi gzugs ni/ /bdag med par ni rnam par bsam/ /
lus ni sangs rgyas zhes brjod pas/ /sangs rgyas de yang yod ma yin/ /phung po dang ni skye mched khams/ /chos zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas med/ /gang zag nyid kyis sangs
rgyas med/ /sangs rgyas med pa yang ma yin/ /pha rol phyin drug sa bon te/ /shes rab sa bon sbyong mdzad pa'i/ /gnas dang gnas min skal ldan pa/ /de nyid byang chub bdag
@#/ /med 'dzin/ /de lta bus ni gsang chen gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas na/ /myur bar slob dpon chen po yis/ /rab tu dga'
ba 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje'i rigs bzlas pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/ /rdo rje'i gzugs su rnam par bsgom/ /
rdo rje de yi lte dbus su/ /rig pa'i ye shes rnam par bsgom/ /dngos med zhes bya rdo rje de/ /byang chub 'bras bu gang yin pa'o/ /gang zhig rdo rje zhes su bshad/ /gang zhig
de nyid 'gyur med pa'i/ /lus kyi de nyid ces brjod la/ /gang zhig chos dang chos nyid stong / /gzugs la sogs pa'i chos chen po/ /'byung ba che sgra 'dzin pa med/ /lus
ni gzugs zhes bya bar brjod/ /gzugs zhes bya bar yod ma yin/ /gzugs de yang ni rnam phye la/ /phra mo'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom/ /cha shas su ni rnam phye na/ /cha
shas zhes bya yod ma yin/ /gzugs ni stong pa zhes bshad do/ /'di ni rdo rje zhes byar bstan/ /gzugs sogs chos rnams thams cad ni/ /stong pa nyid ni rnam
par bsgom/ /de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rab tu dga' ba bsgrub par bya/ /de nas rin chen rigs bzlas pa/ /rdo rje rin chen rigs bdag nyid/ /stong gsum
gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/ /stong nyid nam mkhar rnam par bsgom/ /de ni nam mkhar rnal 'byor chos/ /rtog pa dang bcas yi ger bsam/ /chos kun dngos med ces bya ba/ /
stong nyid de bzhin nyid ces brjod/ /dngos med ces bya'i gzugs med de/ /mkha' mtshungs sangs rgyas spyod yul lo/ /gang la gzugs ni yod min pa'i/ /mig ces bya ba
ci yin brjod/ /mig de yang ni gang zhig gi /mig ces bya ba yin par brjod/ /bdag po rgyal po 'di gang zhig /'di yi skye ba'ang ji lta bu'i/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi 'dus las/ /
mig gi dbang po yang dag byung / /mig de la yang gzugs med la/ /ci zhig byed de yod pa'ang min/ /mig ni ji lta ba bzhin du/ /thams cad gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs/ /
bzlas pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /chos chen po yi dbang bskur 'gyur/ /de nas pad+ma'i rigs bzlas pa/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten
'dir/ /pad+ma'i gzugs su rnam par bsgom/ /pad+ma shin tu dag de la/ /rig pa'i ye shes rnam par bsgom/ /shes rab chen pos pad+ma de/ /chos kyi snying por bsam par
bya| |pad+ma chu yis ma gos shing / /'dam gyi nyes pas gos mi 'gyur/ /sems can thams cad de bzhin dag /chos ni gzod las ma skyes pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs
@#/ /nyid 'di gang zhig /chos dang chos nyid stong gang yin/ /gzugs sogs chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /chos nyid de bzhin nyid du 'dod/ /de
nas las kyi rigs bzlas pa'i/ /las kyi rnal 'byor rnam par bsam/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'khor lo 'di/ /chos dang longs spyod thob byed yis/ /gang la chos
zhes bya ba med/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul snang / /e ma'o sangs rgyas de dag snang / /rang gi las kyang sgrub par mdzad/ /de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdo rje slob
dpon dka' thub che/ /tshe 'di nyid la dam pa yi/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni mchog thob 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i snying sogs phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje rigs la bdag por bshad/ /rin chen
la sogs dbang bskur zhing / /dag pa'i mchog ni pad mchog 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas sku ni chos chen la/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor nges bstan bya/ /byang chub mchog ni kun
'dul ba/ /'di ni bzlas pa dam par 'dod/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'dzin/ /phreng ba nges par bsten par bya/ /gang du bzlas pa bye ba byed/ /rnam gnyis rnam gsum
nyung ba'ang rung / /phreng ba sangs rgyas la mdzub bcas/ /gung mos rdo rje'i rnal 'byor skyes/ /srin lag steng du rin chen skyes/ /mthe'u chung gis ni pad kha phye/ /las
kyi phreng pas las byed pa/ /sor mo kun gyis bya bar bshad/ /rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa yi/ /'di ni gsang ba'i bzlas pa che/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor bo de tse/ /rdo rje can la ru
rAk+sha/ /phyi rol rdor rigs dbang po ste/ /mu tig nor bu'i rnal 'byor can/ /pad+ma'i snying po'i phreng ba ni/ /pad+ma'i rigs rnams kun la bsngags/ /yang na kun las mchog
gyur pa/ /bo de tse de srog 'dzin pa/ /lcags kyi bzlas pa nyis 'gyur te/ /zangs kyi yang ni bzhi 'gyur ro/ /ru rAk+sha yi bye ba gnyis/ /mu tig gi ni brgyar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po'i
stong 'gyur rnal 'byor te/ /dngul gyi 'bum du 'gyur ba yin/ /pad+ma'i bye ba brgya 'gyur brjod/ /bo de tse yi grangs med do/ /lag pa g.yon pas phyag rgya bcing / /g.yas pa
phreng ba dang ldan bya/ /ji ltar sngar bshad gsang ba sogs/ /rmad byung chen po'i bzlas par bya/ /ci yi phyir na bzlas pa brjod/ /dge ba la brtson rgyal 'gyur zhing / /rmad
byung rnams kyang mthong 'gyur la/ /byang chub spyod pa rgyal 'gyur zhing / /sangs rgyas rol pa mngon par 'gyur/ /bzlas pas skyon langs nas ni/ /phyag rgya dag ni bcing bar
bya| |sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/ /phyogs kun tu ni 'dud par bshad/ /byang chub sems tshul thob byed pa'i/ /mdo sogs gsang ba bklag par bya/ /bsod nams
@#/ /tshogs ni bskyed pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa yang dag bya/ /de nas zas kyi dus su ni/ /rnam pa kun tu chang bu sbyin/ /sangs rgyas
rig pas mngon bsrungs la/ /bza' ba dag pa dbul bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid bza' ba dbul/ /legs par bgos nas bza' ba dbul/ /snga dro sdom pa blang
bya ste/ /de nyid nyin phyed dang mtshams su/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje nor bu dang / /pad+ma byed pa'i rnal 'byor gang / /rnam pa bzhi po de
las sbyor/ /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs byang chub/ /nyin dang mtshan la rnam pa drug /rdo rje dril bu tshogs slob dpon/ /rdo rje can rnams de bzhin drug /zang zing mi
'jigs chos dang ni/ /byams pa nyin zhag kun la yang / /chos gsum tshangs pa bzhi zhes pa/ /rnam pa brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /'di yi chos chen gsum po la/ /
rtag tu snyoms par 'jug par bya/ /gsang mchog dkyil 'khor mchog dang ni/ /de bzhin las kun byed pa'o/ /gang du sdig par mi 'gyur ba'i/ /thams cad
bza' zhing thams cad len/ /lus nas lhag mar gyur pa spang / /de bzhin dri ma thams cad spang / /nyin re bzhin ni lan gsum du/ /khrus gsum bya zhing gsang
blang ba/ /gos kyang lan gsum brje bar bya/ /gtsang gos lan gsum yang ni sbyin/ /sha dang chang btsong la sogs pa/ /dri ngan kha yi sgregs pa dang / /'khrig pa 'dod
dang bsten pa dang / /sems can 'tshe la dga' mi bya/ /brtson zhing las mkhas spyod par ldan/ /sgrin zhing dul la dga' dang gtsang / /bya ba byed cing bla ma 'khur/ /dge
legs rgyan ni 'chang bar byed/ /kun rdzob don dam rnam pa gnyis/ /bslab pa'i sdom pa blang bar bya/ /chung ngu bza' zhing bsten par bya/ /kha ni nang du lta yid ches/ /sngags
dang phyag rgya rig sngags dang / /gzungs dang lha dang bla ma dang / /rdo rje la sogs mtshon cha bzang / /lha yi gnas dang yang dag ldan/ /'jigs min g.yo dang sgyu can min/ /mi
brtan pa yi blo can min/ /mya ngan 'das la dga' ba min/ /sems ni dbang pos phrogs pa min/ /blo ldan 'jig rten 'dir mi dga'/ /de bzhin pha rol dga' ba min/ /
lus srog btang snyoms mi bya zhing / /bslab pa las ni 'da' mi bya/ /skrag ldan nga rgyal ldan pa min/ /'jig rten bya ba 'dod mi bya/ /de lta'i ngo mtshar tshul la ni/ /rnal
'byor pa yis bsgrub par bya/ /smra ba spang zhing brjod chen ldan/ /rnyed pa spang zhing legs rnyed ldan/ /dpa' zhing brtan la bla ma gus/ /sdig pas 'jigs shing kun tu
@#/ /bsdams/ /ci nus ji ltar spro bar bya/ /zla ba'am yang na lo re'am/ /nyin zhag gcig la lan gnyis su/ /de bzhin bla ma blta bar bya/ /mtshams
med lnga po byed pa yang / /de lta bu yi tshul gnas shing / /phyag rgya rnam pa brgyad bcings nas/ /rtag tu 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /brtul zhugs tshangs par rdzogs
gyur nas/ /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje 'chang ba slob dpon la/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 'gyur/ /rig pa kun bdag rgyal po ste/ /
dkyil 'khor kun gyi de nyid rig /rnal 'byor cho ga de nyid shes/ /de bzhin lha yi rigs rnams mthong / /sdom pa blang zhing rnam par mkhas/ /rig pa'i slob dpon
dbang bskur 'gyur/ /lam rnams chen po byed rgyal po/ /rig pa ldan zhing de nyid shes/ /phan pa dang ni gnod par shes/ /lha la sogs pa kun dbang byed/ /gnod
sbyin 'byung po lha dbang sogs/ /rig pa'i rgyal po mngag gzhug pa/ /'di ni chos kyi gru la gnas/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa legs mchod byed/ /byang chub sems
dpa'i tshogs rgyal po/ /mdzod 'dzin rtag tu gsang ba 'dzin/ /'khor lo grong khyer chen por gnas/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin pa'i/ /dam chos bcud kyi
snying po skyes/ /snying po 'dzin cing dkyil 'khor mchod/ /dgongs pa de nyid tshul shes 'di/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul don shes/ /mchod sbyin lhag pa'i mchod dam pa'i/ /gsang
ba yi ni dkyil 'khor bya/ /rdo rje khro bo ting 'dzin gyis/ /gang zhig gi ni thog ma ru/ /bgegs kun nges par 'joms pa yi/ /gsang sngags drag po brjod par bya/ /bkra shis
sdig pa 'joms byed pa/ /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga yang / /nga ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar/ /drag po'i bzod dka' ye shes 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor mchod pa bya ba ni/ /yo byad
yongs su brtag par bya/ /yang na phyi nas byed pa yis/ /ci rigs par ni brtag par bya/ /dpag tshad las lhag mi bya zhing / /khru drug las ni chung ba min/ /sgrub pa bcu gnyis
zhes bya ste/ /gzhan yang byed pa bcu gnyis so/ /gal te de ni rgyal por 'gyur/ /dpag tshad kyi ni khyon tsam bya/ /yang na kun nas bzang po ste/ /ngos bzhi dag dang yang dag
ldan| |yang na sgrub pa blon po yin/ /khru stong yod pa mchog yin no/ /yang na kun nas bzang pa yi/ /khru drug pa las chud mi bya/ /yang na tshong dpon 'ga' zhig gam/ /
yang na ded dpon yin yang rung / /ngos bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan/ /lnga pa las ni chung mi bya/ /yang na gang zhig gzhan dag gam/ /sgrub pa po dag yin yang rung / /bcu
@#/ /pa las ni chung mi bya/ /zur bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan/ /rgya cher yang ni mi bya'o/ /yang na sgrub byed slob dpon yin/ /drug pa bas ni chung mi bya//
yang na dpag tshad dang ldan pa'o/ /yang na yo byad ldan par bya/ /gal te sgrub byed de rgyal po/ /rin chen phye ma rab tu bya/ /rin chen btags las legs bya zhing / /shin
tu khyad 'phags yid du 'ong / /in+d+ra ni la sngon po che/ /tshon rtsi sngon po rab tu bya/ /pad+ma rA ga rA ga che/ /tshon rtsi dmar po yang dag ldan/ /tshon rtsi ser po mdog bzang po//
dri ma med pa'i 'od zer ldan/ /tshon rtsi dkar po ldan pa yi/ /dkar po dag ni shel las bya/ /bai DUR+ya dang btsod mdog ste/ /tshon rtsi lnga zhes bya bar bshad/ /gal te de ni ma
'byor na/ /rin po che dang bsres pas bya/ /tshong dpon yang na ded dpon rung / /tshon rtsi dag la rab tu bya/ /yang na gzhan ni 'ga' zhig yin/ /tshon rtsi gzhan ni
dam par sbyar/ /bral ba yis kyang dus ci bzhin/ /'dir ni slob dpon dag gis bya/ /rin chen phye mar yang dag ldan/ /yang na yo byad dang ldan pa/ /gal te sgrub byed
de rgyal po/ /sna tshogs bya ba'i tshad du bya/ /yang na 'bum dang yang dag ldan/ /stong las nyung bar mi bya'o/ /spos dang mar me mchod bstod dang / /dri yi bum pa nyid dang ni//
de bzhin bum gang gtor ma dang / /bum pa rnams dang mar me dag /tshong dpon yang na ded dpon rung / /bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o/ /gzhan dga' zhig ni 'ongs kyang rung //
bca' ba dag ni stong phrag bcu/ /bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o/ /bza' ba dag ni brgya 'am stong / /bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o/ /g.yos kyi rnam pa kun dang ni/ /de bzhin dri
rnams thams cad kun/ /rol mo sgeg dang rtsed mo dang / /de bzhin phun sum tshogs pa kun/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /de tshe mchod pa byas nas su/ /ci nas
sang ni khyed cag rnams/ /grub par bya phyir brtul zhugs brtsam/ /rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byugs/ /dag cing gtsang ma'i gos gyon cing / /rnam par dben pa'i
gnas 'dug ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya/ /me tog spos snod lag thogs shing / /phyogs rnams kun tu phyag bya'o/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mchog ldan
pa'i| |sangs rgyas la sogs kun gshegs shing / /gsang ba'i spyan ni 'gugs pa yi/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /sangs rgyas
thams cad spyan drang bya/ /de nas gnas ni yang dag bsgrub/ /dben zhing kun tu g.yeng ba med/ /ri bo yang ni dgon pa'am/ /de bzhin phug gi nang dag gam/ /shing drung gi
@#/ /ni gnas dag gam/ /chu bo'i 'gram mam yang na ngogs/ /dngos grub gnas su 'dug nas ni/ /lha rnams myur du gshegs par 'gyur/ /
rdo dang gseg ma rus par ldan/ /thal ba ljan ljin mi gtsang bcas/ /rtsub cing rtsab khyab la sogs/ /de 'dra'i sa gzhi rnam par spang / /shin tu bzang zhing 'od bzang snum/ /tshad
dang ldan zhing gseg ma med/ /'od ma gang yang na khru gang tsam/ /dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyang bar bya/ /grong dang yul 'khor nyid dag dang / /grong khyer dag dang ljongs dang ni/ /
rgyal po'i pho brang tshong dus su/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bya ba min/ /de 'dra'i sa gzhi bsgrubs nas ni/ /steng gi char ni bsgrub par bya/ /'dom gang yang na khru gang tsam/ /skas
gdang bzhi dang ldan pa ru/ /sbyangs te de nas gnas kyi ni/ /dbus su phur pa gzugs par bya/ /rdo rje phur bu'i sngags dang ni/ /rdo rje phur bu'i phyag rgya yis/ /mchod pa'i
sa gzhi mdzes par bya/ /rig pa'i 'dzin pa byed pas bcag /bgegs bcing ba yi phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams kun tu bcing bar bya/ /me dang gshin rje chu dang ni/ /rlung dang
dbang po rdo rje phyogs/ /rdo rje bzod dka'i phyag rgya dang / /rdo rje sngags kyis sbyang bar bya/ /mchod gnas dpag tshad tshad tsam du/ /bco lnga nas ni yang dag brtsam/ /gnyis pa 'am
ni gsum pa yi/ /nya la nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /ci ste 'byor pa med na ni/ /zla ba gcig tsam rab tu sbyar/ /bco lnga nas ni yang dag brtsam/ /bco lnga la ni rdzogs par bya/ /ci ste zla ba
phyed tsam du/ /bco lnga la ni rnam par sbyang / /ci ste rings na tshes brgyad nas/ /bco lnga la ni rdzogs par bya/ /tshes dgu dang ni bcu dang ni/ /bcu gsum pa dang bcu bzhi pa/ /bdun
pa lnga pa nyid dang ni/ /nya la nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /ci ste nyin zhag de tsam nas/ /de nyid la ni yongs rdzogs bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po dag bya'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor sa gzhi rab tu
bsgrub/ /rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byugs/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gos bgo zhing / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu spras/ /rdo rje slob dpon rnam par brgyan/ /gtsang zhing gtsang
ma'i gos dang ldan/ /gtsang ma'i grogs dang lhan cig tu/ /sems can kun don yang dag ldan/ /byang chub sems ni yang dag gzung / /bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang / /ci
nas mngon par brtson byas kyang / /gang zag bzhi po 'jig rten tu/ /bsgrub kyang 'grub pa nyid mi 'gyur/ /sems ni bskyed par ma gyur dang / /dad med 'grub par mi 'gyur nyid/ /
the tshom 'dzin pa nyid dag dang / /bka' bsgo ba ni phyed pa'o/ /dri yi chu yis legs bskus pa'i/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gnas de ni/ /dri dang ldan pa'i chu dag gis/ /phyogs
@#/ /rnams kun tu chag chag btab/ /ba yi lci bas legs sbyang ste/ /dri dang bcas pas legs byugs te/ /de nas gur gum la sogs pa'i/ /dri dag
gtsang mar sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor phyag rgya yis/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyis brlab/ /rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya yis/ /pad+ma'i mig can dag gis blta/ /dkyil
'khor bar dang tha ma ru/ /sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ /sbyin sreg las ni rnam pa lnga/ /sbyin sreg las ni rnam par sbyar/ /rig pa'i dngos grub cho ga la/ /sbyin sreg
las ni yang dag brtsam/ /de bzhin sngags dang phyag rgya tshogs/ /de 'dra'i sngags dang phyag rgya'ang min/ /sngon la bgegs rnams gzhom par bya/ /de nas sbyin sreg yang
dag brtsam/ /de 'og gsang ba'i mchod chen gyi/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa lnga ru bshad/ /yang na bcu drug dag tu 'gyur/ /rang rang gi ni cho ga bzhin//
sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ /dgongs pa'i gang zhig bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /gang zhig mchod pa yang dag brtsam/ /gal te mi nus skal chen gyis/ /bza' ba dag ni rab
tu bya| |dri dang bcas pa dang sbyar ba'i/ /yang na dkar gsum bza' bar bya/ /'di ltar rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /byin gyi rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur/ /bgegs rnams nges 'joms
nga yi ni/ /slob dpon gyi ni las bzang po/ /bgegs rnams zlog par byed pa'i mchog /bcing ba dam pa bshad par bya/ /rtag tu rdo rje khro bo dang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag bya
zhing | |rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya/ /rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad drang bar bya/ /rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya
yis| |bgegs rnams thams cad kun tu dgug /sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig /sems can rnam par 'tshe ba'ang med/ /rang gi rnam rtog las byung bgegs/ /ma rig
las byung mi dge bzhin/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje ra ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin bya/ /rdo rje gnod
sbyin phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzir bar bya/ /rdo rje lug rgyud phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bkri bar bya/ /rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs
rnams thams cad kun tu dbab/ /rdo rje gdab pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad brdab par bya/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad sbar bar
bya| |rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bcad par bya/ /rdo rje cod pan phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad brdung bar bya/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag
@#/ /rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya/ /rdo rje 'phrul 'khor phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad btsir bar bya/ /rdo rje kha
T+wAM phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gtub par bya/ /rdo rje mdung thung phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya/ /rdo rje sregs byed phyag rgya
yis| |bgegs rnams thams cad bsreg par bya/ /rdo rje 'khor byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje srad bu'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs
rnams thams cad bskyod par bya/ /rdo rje zlog byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad rnam par brlag /rdo rje 'joms byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams
cad gzhom par bya/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'jig par byed/ /rdo rje za byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar
bya| |rdo rje bca' byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bca' bar bya/ /rdo rje dral ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dral bar bya/ /rdo rje sgyel
byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar bya/ /rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bslang bar bya/ /rdo rje gsod pa'i phyag rgya
yis| |bgegs rnams thams cad bsad par bya/ /rdo rje 'tsho byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'tsho bar bya/ /rdo rje sgrub pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams
thams cad yang dag bsgrub/ /rdo rje rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yis/ /gdug pa thams cad rgyas gdab bya/ /rdo rje rlung gi phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad rlung la bskur/ /
rdo rje chu yi phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad chu la g.yeng / /rdo rje me ni rab rno bas/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bsreg par bya/ /rdo rje brgyal byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs
rnams thams cad brgyal bar bya/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad sbyin sreg bya/ /rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzung
bar bya/ /rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad sos gdab bya/ /rdo rje 'big pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya/ /rdo rje 'jigs
byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya/ /rdo rje bka' bzhin byed pa yis/ /bkug nas bka' la dgod par bya/ /rdo rje sdigs mdzub phyag rgya yis/ /
bgegs rnams thams cad bsdigs par bya/ /rdo rje 'gas byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dgas par bya/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs kyi
@#/ /rigs kun gzhom par bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin bzod dka' dang / /rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba dang / /rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje rkang
pas bsnun par bya/ /bgegs 'joms pa yi phyag rgya yis/ /de nas steng gi bgegs gzhom bya/ /mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i mchog /rdo rje chen po'i gsang rgyud las/ /
rdo rje khro bo'i snyoms 'jug bya/ /brgya dang rtsa bcu lhag pa dang / /rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba ni/ /rgyas pa ru ni yongs su bstan/ /bgegs la sogs pa gdug pa kun/ /chad pa
bcad phyir btus pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ /rnam pa brgyad dang rtsa bcu lhag /rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba ni/ /
'di ni gsang ba'i rgyud chen po/ /rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad/ /gsang ba'i sbyin sreg cho gar bcas/ /gzhan yang dang por rab bshad bya/ /rnal 'byor chen po gsang
ba'i las/ /sbyin sreg las ni rgyun mi gcad/ /las rnams thams cad btus pa yi/ /gsang ba rgyud chen 'di ru ni/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa nyi shu yis/ /thams cad bsdus par
'gyur ba yin/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /mngon spyod kyi ni las dang ni/ /tshe spel ba dang dgug pa dang / /nor dang 'bru ni 'phel ba dang / /bsrung dang bsrung ba min dang
bgegs/ /sdig pa thams cad rab gzhom dang / /bcing dang bsad dang drag po dang / /chags dang rjes su bcom pa dang / /dbang du bya dang gzugs bzang nyid/ /'dod dga'i
gzugs su snang ba dang / /mkha' la 'gro dang dngos grub kyi/ /rdzas ni grub par bya ba la/ /sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor byed pa yi/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bya/ /de lta bu yi rnam pa yi/ /
sbyin sreg bzang po nyi shur bshad/ /ji ltar sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin/ /sngon du thab khung bya ba yin/ /gru bzhi la ni rgyas pa ste/ /zlum po la ni zhi ba'o/ /gang zhig 'gugs par byed
pa yi| |rdo rje'i rnam par yang dag bya/ /de bzhin pad+ma'i rnam pa bzhin/ /mngon spyod la ni gru gsum ste/ /sdig pa thams cad rab gzhom phyir/ /zlum po rta babs ldan pa
yin/ /rin chen rnam pa rigs rgyas la/ /tshe 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang / /shin tu dag phyir phyag rgya'i dbyibs/ /bsrung la go cha lta bu yin/ /bcing ba la ni 'obs kyis bskor//
bsad la mche ba dang ldan pa'i/ /ci 'dod gzugs la gang yang rung / /mi snang ba la gzhu dang ldan/ /phyogs dang mkha' 'phur la lcags kyu/ /bka' byed phyag rgya bsgrub pa
dang | |dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub pa la/ /'khor lo 'am ni gru bzhi'o/ /rdzas dang sman ni 'grub pa la/ /thab khung bud med yan lag mtshungs/ /yang na thun mong dngos grub gyi//
@#/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ji lta ba/ /sbyin sreg thab khung de mtshungs 'gyur/ /rig 'dzin dngos grub bzang ldan zhing
thams cad phun tshogs de ltar 'gyur/ /'khor lo sogs la cung zad mthar/ /sbyin sreg thab khung brko bar bya/ /thab khung nyi shu'o// //dkyil 'khor cho ga thams
cad la/ /thab khung gang zhig mthong tsam gyis/ /sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /thab khung bstan pa bshad par bya/ /sngon du thig ni gdab bya zhing / /tshon gyis sa phyogs
legs par bri/ /gru bzhir thig brgyad ces bya ba/ /dbus kyi 'khor lo dbyung bar bya/ /gru bzhi'i cha ni mnyam pa ste/ /legs par bgos shing legs bris pa/ /rta babs bzhi
dang yang dag ldan/ /sgo khyud rnams kyis legs par spras/ /sgo bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan/ /sgo ni cha brgyad ldan par bya/ /dra ba zla ba phyed pas spras/ /rdo rje sgo khyud rdo
rjer ldan/ /pad+ma'i nags kyi lcugs ma dang / /phreng ba rab tu 'khor ba dang / /spyi blugs phyag rgya chen po ni/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi cha ru bri/ /rtse gsum zla ba phyed pa dang / /ral
gri khyu mchog mdzes rgyal mtshan/ /'od bcas bde ba phyag rgya che/ /lho yi phyogs su bri bar bya/ /'khor lo dung dang dbyug to dang / /rta babs glang po dang ni phag /phyag rgya
nub tu bri bar bya/ /mdung thung dril bu ba dan dang / /rma bya de bzhin ra skyes dang / /khyim bya 'thab mo la phyogs pa/ /byang gi phyogs su bri bar bya/ /de yi dam tshig 'khor lo
la| |sangs rgyas phyag rgya yang dag bri/ /dbus kyi gnas su cod pan te/ /phyi rol rdo rjes nye bar spras/ /rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar ba yi/ /rdo rje shar gyi phyogs cha ru/ /lho ru nor bu sna
tshogs pa/ /nub tu pad+ma rdo rje'o/ /byang du rdo rje hUM mdzad de/ /gdug pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje thabs chen rnams/ /phyi rol phyag rgya bcu drug tu/ /
thab khung brkos pa gang yin pa/ /de yi bla re rnam par bsgom/ /me tog shing dang spos sogs kyis/ /ji bzhin du ni dkyil 'khor mchod/ /rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byugs/ /
sna tshogs gos dang rgyan ldan pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu spras/ /dri dag bzang pos dbang bskur 'gyur/ /nga ni pad 'dzin rgyal po ste/ /thor tshugs dbus na de bzhin
gshegs/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur ldan/ /bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu/ /dpung pa dam du bsdams byas te/ /mtshan ma 'greng
bar rab gyur nas/ /sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ /e ma'o bde ba bde chen po/ /'dod chags bde ba bla na med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dod chags che/ /'jig rten
@#/ /dbang phyug bdag grub mdzod/ /'dod chags bde ba rjes dran nas/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags brtag mi bya/ /bud med khams ni bkug nas su/ //
'khrig pa bdun ni spang bar bya/ /mtshan ma langs par rab gyur nas/ /dbang po nye bar zhi byas te/ /'dod chags rjes dran gyur nas ni/ /sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam/ /mtshan
ma phyag mtshan zhes brjod de/ /langs pa lhag par bya ba yin/ /rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya mtshan/ /mkhas pas lhag par bcang bar bya/ /rdo rje can dang byang sems kyi/ /byang chub sems
ni brtan pa dang / /pha rol phyin pa drug gis mtshan/ /brtse bas rjes chags dngos grub ster/ /shes rab thabs la dga' ba bstan/ /rtag tu bsten par bya ba yin/ /mtshan
ma langs par rab gyur nas/ /lhag par yang ni bsten par bya/ /mngon 'dod rig ma sdug gang yin/ /de la rnal 'byor pas 'o bya/ /lhag pas phyag rgya cher gyur nas/ /dpung pa
dam du bsdams par bya/ /rab tu dga' ba mang po gang / /de ni rab dga'i sa ru 'dod/ /gang la chags par rab brtags pa/ /yang dang yang du dran par bya/ /rtse dang byams
pas yang dag byugs/ /khrel yod pa yi gos kyis dgab/ /tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag byugs/ /byang chub gyi ni sems kyis brgyan/ /de 'dra'i brtul zhugs ldan pa yi//
tshon rtsi chen po bsten par bya/ /gzhan yang phyi yi yan lag dag /gang phyir rdo rje can gyis 'dzin/ /sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga bzhin/ /shar du kha bltas sbyin sreg bya/ /ji skad gzhung
las gsungs pa bzhin/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bya/ /zhi la sangs rgyas byang chub mchog /rgyas la rdo rje rin chen gyis/ /rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la/ /lcags kyu yis ni 'gugs
par bshad/ /bcud kyi len la rdo rje'i sman/ /tshe 'phel de bzhin mi g.yo ba'i/ /rdo rje sman gyi rgya chen dang / /rdo rje rtse mo nor 'phel la/ /bsrung la 'khor lo cho ga ste/ /bzlog
pa la ni rdo rje gzung / /g.yon pa lcags sgrog phyag rgya ches/ /sdig pa gzhom par bya bar bshad/ /bcing la rdo rje bcing ba ste/ /gsod la rdo rje gsod byed do/ /chags la rdo
rje chags pa yis/ /rjes su bstan pa la yang bshad/ /dbang la rdo rje dbang gis so/ /ci 'dod gzugs la sna tshogs te/ /mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la/ /rdo rje'i dngos grub
rnam 'phrul gyis/ /pad+ma'i sman gyi phyag rgya ches/ /rjes grub pa yi bde mchog yin/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i grub pa la/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor phyag rgya yis/ /rig pa kun bdag
rgyal po yi/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs de yongs su gzung / /dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa la/ /pad+ma chen po'i sman mchog gis/ /lag pa g.yon pas phyag rgya bcing / /g.yas pa
@#/ /yis ni sbyin sreg bya/ /rdo rje sna tshogs phyag rgya yis/ /sbyin sreg las la rgyas gdab bya/ /g.yon pa hUM ldan sdigs mdzub ste/ /g.yas pa mche
ba gtsigs pa ste/ /mngon spyod kyi ni phyag rgya yis/ /rus pa'i phye mas phyogs rnams bcing / /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hUM/ gr-i h+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hUM/ A na
ya ho b+ha ga ban bi d+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ g.yon pa chos 'chad dang ldan zhing / /g.yas pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya/ /sangs rgyas chos ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /til bsregs
pas ni sdig pa bsregs/ /oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzrA ya swAhA/ lag pa g.yon pa rin chen gyur/ /g.yas pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya/ /'bru bdun yang na rin chen nas/ /yo
byad kun gyis mnyes par bya/ /oM ma Ni rat+na kra ma kA ya swAhA/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas ni/ /mngar bas me ni rab sbar te/ /rnal 'byor pas ni 'bras bsregs
na| |khyim ni nges par rgyas par 'gyur/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swAhA/ shin tu mngar ba'i bud shing gis/ /me ni rab tu sbar byas te/ /ku sha'i myu gu til bcas pas/ /sbyin
sreg byas na bsrung don mchog /oM badzra a pra ti ha ta badzrA swAhA/ yam shing mngar po nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin dUr ba'i myu gu dag /mar byugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya yis/ /
bsregs na tshe 'phel byed pa'i mchog /oM badzra A yu She swAhA/ bud shing tsha ba rnams kyi ni/ /rdo rje khro bdag ting 'dzin gyis/ /thab khung du ni me sbar te/ /tshor ma rnams kyis
dgug par bya/ /oM badzra A kaR+Sha ya swAhA/ de bzhin sna tshogs thams cad kyis/ /mkhas pa yis ni me sbar te/ /rtag tu chu skyes sbyin sreg byas/ /rdo rje 'ching bar 'gyur
ba yin/ /oM badzra ban d+ha ya baM/ de bzhin sbyor ba'i cho ga yis/ /mkhas pas yam shing bsreg bya zhing / /'bras bu kha ba'i sbyin sreg byas/ /skad cig gis ni gsod par
'gyur/ /oM badzra mA ra na ye hUM/ de bzhin pa la k+Sha dmar po/ /bsregs na dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /oM badzra rA ga na ye hrIH/ sha pus pas ni sbyin sreg byas/ /de bzhin
chags par byed pa'i mchog /oM badzra shaM ka rA ya swAhA/ khros pas 'dod pa'i 'bras bsregs na/ /ci 'dod gzugs ni thob par 'gyur/ /oM badzra kA ma rU pa Ni swAhA/ oM badzra
kha ra tsi ri Ni swAhA/ bud shing ro ni kha ba yis/ /shin tu khros pas me sbar te/ /khros pas rdo rje me tog bsregs/ /rdo rje bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /hUM badzra shaM ka rA ya
swAhA/ oM b+hU ta ba shaM ka rA ya swAhA/ dngos grub kun gyi cho ga bzhin/ /mkhas pas yungs kar sbyin sreg bya/ /yungs kar shin tu bkra shis pas/ /dngos grub sbyin sreg
@#/ /mchog yin no/ /oM sarba sid d+ha ye swAhA/ /rig pa 'dzin pa grub bya'i phyir/ /mkhas pas swa sti ka bsreg bya/ /grub pa'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba
yis| |sbyin sreg rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du/ /oM sid d+ha sid d+ha ye swAhA/ /oM da la a ti pa ta ye swAhA/ /maN+Da la a d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ /oM b+huHswAhA/ /oM b+hu ba swAhA/ /oM swa

swAhA| |oM b+hur b+hu ba swaHswAhA/ /oM swasti swAhA/ /oM swAsti na maHswAhA/ /oM sid d+hi pra b+hA ta ye swAhA/ /oM sarba duHkha u pa sha ma ne swAhA/ /oM badzra sid d+ha ye swAhA/ /oM kAR+ya kA ra ne
puSh+Ta shan ti ke swAhA/ /yi ge phaT ni mngon spyod la/ /yi ge dzaHyis 'gugs par 'gyur/ /yi ge baM ni bcing la sbyar/ /dbang du bya la yi ge shrI/ /yi ge hUM ni bsdigs la sbyar/ /
bsad pa la yang yi ge hUM/ /ha ni bsrung ba bzang po la/ /yi ge hUM ni bzlog pa la/ /shrIs ni sna tshogs gzugs bsgrub bya/ /oM ni mi snang bstan pa la/ /ho ni chags dang dgug
pa la| |u ni gsang ba'i dag pa 'dzin/ /mngon spyod ldan la yi ge hUM/ /hUM ni rdzu 'phrul sgrub byed pa/ /lha mo chen po sgrub la AH/ /oM ni kun la nges par sbyar/ /yam shing ser
po rgyas pa la/ /zhi ba la ni dkar po'o/ /dbang du bya ba dmar po ste/ /nag po mngon spyod las la 'o/ /zhi la mar gyis byugs pa ste/ /rgyas pa la ni 'o ma bcas/ /dbang du bya la
lan tshar ldan/ /tsha ba dang bcas mngon spyod la/ /dbye ba rgya chen dag gis ni/ /sbyin sreg las rnams shes par bya/ /de nyid sbyin sreg nyi shu 'di/ /rdo rje 'chang gis gsang ba yin/ /
de kho na nyi shu pa zhes bya ba sbyin sreg gi gsang ba'o// //de nas dngos grub thabs chen po/ /thams cad 'grub 'dod dkyil 'khor du/ /sgrub pa'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis/ /
dngos grub tshogs kyi sbyor ldan zhing / /rdo rje yi ni slob dpon che/ /brtan bcas rigs su yang dag skyes/ /theg pa chen por yang dag gnas/ /bskal pa grangs med mthar thug par//
chos kyi shing rta che la zhon/ /shes rab thabs dang yang dag ldan/ /sems can kun gyi don la brtson/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs su bzung / /slob dpon chen po'i tshul la gnas//
mchog tu sa yi mthar phyin pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs su skyes/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bsal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor gnas su yang dag
ldan| |sbyin sreg cho ga byas nas kyang / /chos sbyin chen po yang dag brtsam/ /dam chos snying po bcud las byung / /sangs rgyas mchod pa bla med pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam
par 'phrul/ /shes rab thabs kyi tshul thob byed/ /rgyal chen shes rab chen po dang / /thabs kyis rmad byung chos nyid do/ /bram ze bzhin du rigs mchog skyes/ /byang chub sems
@#/ /dpa'i gsang chen 'dzin/ /gal te nus na skal chen gyis/ /gang tshe mchod pa rtsom pa nas/ /ji srid zin par gyur gyi bar/ /bza' ba dag ni mi bya'o/ /dri dang
bcas par legs sbyar ba'i/ /yang na dkar gsum bza' bar bya/ /gang phyir rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /byin gyis rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur/ /ci ste bzod ldan nyin mtshan du/ /
bza' ba dag ni mi bya ste/ /gang phyir chos kyi rang bzhin zas/ /tshim par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni dag byas shing / /dri rnams kun gyis mngon 'dus
byas| |sngags kyi bsangs pa'i chu yis ni/ /thams cad kun nas chag chag gdab/ /gang tshe mchod par byed pa na/ /phyogs rnams kun nas phyag bya zhing / /bshags
dang gsol ba gdab nyid dang / /mchod pa'i sprin dang rjes yi rang / /bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa'i/ /las rnams rim bzhin byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor chen po
mnyam dbus su/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung bca' bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus pa yi/ /skyil krung rnam pa bcu ru bshad/ /gsang chen de nyid mchog 'di ni/ /
dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa'o/ /dpal dang bkra shis sdigs mdzub byed/ /de bzhin g.yas kyi phyed krung nyid/ /phyi rol brkyang dang bzhugs pa'o/ /de bzhin rin chen
rang bzhin te/ /de dag bcu ru rang bzhin bshad/ /skyil krung brgya dang bcu lhag pa/ /gsang ba'i rgyud kyi gsang ba yi/ /rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo
krung bcas te/ /sangs rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum/ /byams pa chen po rjes dran nas/ /dang po sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin mchog /rnal 'byor
pas ni snyoms 'jug bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog /de nas yang ni las rgyal po/ /ting 'dzin lhag pa'i bzang po nas/ /bcu phrag gcig lhag brgya ru bshad/ /las
thams cad pa gsum du brjod/ /gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad/ /ting 'dzin sbyor ba med par ni/ /dkyil 'khor brtan par mi 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor sbyor ba med par ni/ /dngos
grub nyid ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de bas rtag tu 'bad pas ni/ /ting 'dzin dngos grub dkyil 'khor bya/ /gal te mchog tu gsang ba ni/ /bla med theg pa'i gsang 'dod na/ /ting 'dzin
gsum ni yang dag bya/ /dang po'i rgyud las bshad pa bzhin/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /de nas byang sems rnam 'phrul du/ /so so'i skye bos mi nus so/ /de rnams kyi ni
ting 'dzin mchog /sems nyid kyis ni yang dag bya/ /dang po'i rgyud las bshad ba bzhin/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul bshad/ /blo ldan byang sems ting 'dzin gyi/ /bdag
@#/ /nyid rdzu 'phrul chen por bsam/ /dka' thub sna tshogs drag po ni/ /bdag gis byas par bsam par bya/ /'og min zhes bya gnas yin pa/ /lha yi gnas ni
bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yi/ /dag pa'i 'dus pa rnam par bsam/ /dang por sangs rgyas phyag byas nas/ /de nas thub rnams la de bzhin/ /bka'
mnos ji skad bstan pa yi/ /slar yang skyil krung bca' ba bya/ /mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/ /kun tu dga' byed bsam par bya/ /mtshan nyid thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i/ /
bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku dang ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba/ /lnga ni bdag nyid la bsam bya/ /rdo rje'i gnas su 'dug bya zhing / /rtse mo mthon por bsam par bya/ /dang
por sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// //rdo rje shar du 'dug bya zhing / /sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang spro/ /'khor
lo'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul/ /rgyal po dang bcas rigs dkyil 'khor/ /sgo srung sgeg mo la sogs dang / /lha mo dang bcas phyag rgya yi/ /sbyor bas rdo rje can dbang bskur//
rdo rje las su yang dag bya'o/ /bdag nyid kyi ni mkha' dbyings su/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mos byas te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid/ /dbang bskur bar ni yang dag
bya| |rdo rje chos 'dzin rgyal po ru/ /dkyil 'khor bkod la brtag par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgug bya zhing / /rdo rje can rnams mchog gzhug bya/ /bsgrub pa dang ni dbang
du bya/ /bya ba 'di ni mchog yin no/ /rang gi rigs gang dkyil 'khor du/ /gnas de lhag par mos par bya/ /'khor lo ji bzhin bkod ji bzhin/ /phyag rgya ji bzhin dbang
byas pa'o/ /las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byugs/ /rgyan dang gos ni sna tshogs ldan/ /dpung rgyan gdu bu nyid dang ni/ /de
bzhin sor gdub dbu rgyan bcas/ /gser sku mu tig dang ldan pa'i/ /lag pa rkang pa de nas ske/ /lus kun rnam par brgyan 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin ko sha'i ras lhag pa'i/ /
gos dag bzang po bgos shing bsang / /yang na chos gos 'dzin pa ste/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya rgyal mtshan bzhin/ /gal te skra bregs dge slong de/ /ring zhing 'khyil la
mdog sngo ba'i/ /skra ni sngon bo bcing bar bya/ /yang na rang gi mgo la skyes/ /bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ /yang na rdo rje las su bya/ /rnal 'byor rang bzhin gsang
med par/ /dngos grub bzang po thob mi 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su mnyam pa ru/ /ci rigs par ni 'dug nas su/ /shar du kha bltas langs nas ni/ /khengs pa med
@#/ /cing ma 'khrul bar/ /rdo rje bsnyems par yongs su bskor/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /lan gcig tu ni brjod par bya/ /bstod pa byas nas rang
bdag nyid/ /dngos grub sbyor ba yang dag bya/ /snying rje chen po sbyor ba yis/ /bdag gis drang srong bskul bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /don yod dbang phyug
dam pa ste/ /theg pa che mchog skyes pa'i mchog /byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /sems dpa' chen po thabs chen po/ /rdo rje 'khor lo mchod pa che/ /dngos grub
chen po rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /rdo rje ming ni yang dag gzung / /phyogs rnams kun tu yang dag bskor/ /dkyil 'khor rdzogs par blta bya
zhing | |rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rjes dran bya/ /slar yang skyil mo krung bcas te/ /nga ni rang nyid 'khor los bsgyur/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs ni bcing ba la/ /stong las nyung bar mi
bya'o| |tha na rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /de nyid phyag rgya yongs su gzung / /langs nas tshig ni brjod par bya/ /bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /dkyil 'khor chen po rab sgrub
pa| |rdo rje la sogs kun gshegs shig /bdag ni rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje sems dpar bdag grub mdzod/ /tshon chen kha bsgyur dri ldan pa'i/ /srad bu lhag pa grims
par bsgril/ /rdo rje srad bu phyag rgya ches/ /dkyil 'khor chen po thig gdab bya/ /'khor lo ji bzhin bkod ji bzhin/ /ji bzhin gzhung gi rjes 'brangs nas/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo
ji bzhin bri/ /rdo rje'i thig ni yongs su gdab/ /de nas de yi rang rig gsang / /'khor lo chen po rab tu sgrub/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo ni/ /go rims bzhin du bshad par bya//
gru bzhi pa la sgro bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas pa'i/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad dang / /sgo yi
sgo khyud mtshams su ni/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /de yi nang gi rim pa ni/ /'khor lo lta bur bri bar bya/ /rdo rje phreng bas yongs su
bskor/ /ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/ /rdo rje ka ba'i mdun gnas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /ji ltar phyi dang nang gnas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor re re rnam par dbye//
dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du/ /dkyil 'khor lnga bris gang yin te/ /ka ba mchog ni brgyad kyis spras/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi pa yin par bshad/ /dbus kyi shin tu dbus song
nas| |chos 'dzin rgyal po chen po ste/ /rnam par snang mdzad khyab bdag che/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi
@#/ /dbus su ni/ /dam tshig mchog rnams bzhi po yang / /go rims bzhin du yang dag bri/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /mdun rgyab tu ni gnas pa
yin| |rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas phyogs su/ /nub kyi phyogs su bdud 'joms pa/ /rdo rje legs ba rgyal po che/ /chos 'dzin chen po dbang dang ldan/ /chos 'dzin pa ni byang du
ste| |mdun du rdo rje bsnyems tshul lo/ /de la de yi snying po gsang / /shin tu rtog par byed pa'i mchog /sdug bsngal kun las rab grol byed/ /byang chub sems ni rab bskul
ba| |hUM dzaHho sA/ shar phyogs cha yi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus de ru/ /mi bskyod pa ni dgod par bya/ /rdo rje shugs kyi snying po
ni| |the tshom gcod pa sngon 'gro can/ /tshogs sngon 'gro ba bzang po ste/ /sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms byed/ /oM be gA kra ma ho/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che/ /thub pa
skyes mchog mi bskyod pa/ /glang po phyag rgya la gnas shing / /zhi ba'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin/ /de la snying po 'di yin te/ /hUM| de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje
mchog rnams dgod pa ni/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras shing / /khros bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bstan pa che//
rdo rje 'dod chags bdud chen po/ /rdo rje legs pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje rin chen dgod bar bya/ /rdo rje chags pa gang bshad pa/ /rdo rje chos ni dgod bar bya/ /rdo rje legs par gang bshad
pa| |rdo rje las ni yongs su gzung / /dam tshig rnam pa bzhi po ni/ /'khor los bsgyur ba dgod par bya/ /thams cad sangs rgyas cod pan ldan/ /'khor los bsgyur bar
dbang bskur ba/ /rdo rje rin chen de bzhin las/ /pad+ma sna tshogs dga' chen po/ /bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ /byang chub mchog de yang dag gzung / /yan lag 'gyur
ba lhag ma rnams/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs dgod/ /de nas sangs rgyas rigs bzhag ste/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyi snying po la/ /phyag rgya dang ni snying po bshad/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs
su gzung / /hUM dzaHho swa/ yi ge dza sogs bshad pa la/ /yi ge oM ni yang dag dgod/ /ho d+hi chos dbyings yi ge a/ /yi ge swa ni yongs su bsgyur/ /rdo rje shugs kyis lhor song
nas| |rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor lo/ /bcom ldan mchog ni yongs su 'dzin/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje rin chen la sogs bri/ /rin chen gzi brjid rgyal
mtshan dang / /rin chen so yi rgyan bcas pa/ /de la de rnams kyi snying po ni/ oM aHtrA ha/ nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su/ /de yi dbus su rdo
@#/ /rje chos/ /'od dpag med ni dgod par bya'o/ /de yi snying po ni hrIHde yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bri/ /pad+ma rnon po de bzhin
rgyu| |smra ba pad+ma phyag rgya bcas/ /de la 'di rnams kyi snying po ni/ hrIHdaM maM raM/ rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /byang gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /bcom ldan 'das ni don
yod grub/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni dgod par bya/ /de yi snying po ni/ kaM/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje las la sogs pa bri/ /thams cad bsrung pa gnod sbyin che/ /

las dang khu tshur shin tu brtan/ /de la 'di rnams kyi snying po ni/ kaM haM hUM baM/ dbus kyi 'khor lo'i grwa bzhi ru/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /rdo rje rin chen de bzhin las/ /pad+ma lha mo bzhi ru

bshad/ /de la de rnams kyi snying po ni/ oM oM hrIHa/ thams cad kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po las/ cha dang po'i dkyil 'khor dbus ma rdzogs so// //dkyil 'khor dbus ma rdzogs nas ni/ /phyag rgya thams cad yongs su bri/ /phyag rgya de ni byin brlab pa/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung / /byang chub mchog tu dbus nas mchog /shis
pa shar gyi phyag rgya ste/ /lho yi phyogs su mchog sbyin no/ /nub tu chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin/ /byang du mi 'jigs sbyin zhes bya/ /don yod grub pas yongs su gzung / /phyag rgya lhag ma
phyag mtshan bcas/ /de nas rdo rje sems tshogs bri/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las/ /rdo rje 'khor lo chen po'i dbus kyi cha zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //
rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su/ /shar phyogs kyi ni dkyil 'khor la/ /rdo rje rigs chen nyams dga' ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor lnga ni yang dag bri/ /ka ba brgyad ni rdo rje che/ /dkyil 'khor
lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi dang ldan pa yi/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo yongs su dgod/ /de yi shar gyi dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs can yang dag bri/ /ut+pal
sngon po 'od chen ldan/ /khro bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i/ /drag po 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab/ /rdo rje ti rin ti ri 'dzin/ /khro bo rdo rje'i lta ba 'dzin/ /gtum pa thams cad rab 'dul
byed| |sangs rgyas mdun du rdo rje 'dzin/ /'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya/ /de bzhin 'bar dbus pad+ma dang / /de bzhin rin chen sna tshogs mtshan/ /de nyid shar gyi 'khor lo che/ /shar
gyi cha ru song nas ni/ /de yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad yang dag bri/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa/ /phyag rgya brgyad ni yongs su 'dzin/ /mche ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs/ /khro
bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i/ /lcags kyu rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / /zhags pa phyag rgya bzhi ru bshad/ /mda' dang gzhu ni gnyis su 'dzin/ /gnyis ni yi ge hUM gis bsdus/ /des ni
@#/ /rkang pa g.yon pa yis/ /dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya/ /g.yas pas lha mo u ma yi/ /nu ma'i bar du mnan pa ste/ /g.yon brkyang pa yis legs par
gnas/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab 'od ldan/ /sku mdog sngon po drag po ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byed pa/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje khro bo dgod par
bya| |thams cad khro bo'i 'bar bas khyab/ /mche ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs/ /khro bo sems dpa' khro rdo rje/ /de bzhin khro bo chags pa ste/ /khro bo legs pa drag pa ste/ /dbus kyi
dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /khro bo'i rgyal po g.yas phyogs su/ /khro bo'i bdag nyid chen pos bskor/ /dbus su khro bo khro gnyer can/ /de yi phyogs
rnams thams cad du/ /khro bo rdo rje'i dbang bskur ldan/ /thams cad bri zhing yang dag dgod/ /khro gnyer can gyi dkyil 'khor mchog /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rin chen khro
bo dgod par bya/ /khro gnyer nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / /khro bo bzhad pa shin tu byung / /dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum pa ru/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /khro bo'i bdag nyid chen
por bskor/ /rdo rje'i sde ni yang dag bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /pad+ma'i khro bo dgod par bya/ /chos dang rnon po de bzhin rgyu/ /bzhad pa khro bo rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje shugs
kyis song nas ni/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /las kyi rgyal po bdag nyid che/ /rdo rje dbab pa yang dag bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /las kyi khro bo la sogs bri/ /
las kyi gnod sbyin srin po dang / /bsdu ba'i rdzu 'phrul khu tshur che/ /dkyil 'khor lnga po kun tu bri/ /de ni rdo rje'i rigs su bshad/ /dkyil 'khor chen po ni zhes bya/ /gsang
ba de nyid tshogs kyi bdag /de nas kun gyi snying po ni/ /rdo rje rigs kun nyams dga' ba'i/ /yi ge hUM ni 'dir brjod do/ /drag po ha ha zhes sgrogs hUM/ /hUM hUM zhes sgrogs
'jig par byed/ /de yi dkyil 'khor rgyal po ni/ /rdo rje gsang ba legs 'dus bya/ /'khor lo dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /khro bo'i sems ma rin
chen dang / /pad+ma dang ni las zhes bya/ /kun nas mtshams rnams dag tu ni/ /phyag rgya dam bcas de dag bzung / /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po las/ cha gnyis pa rdzogs
so|| ||shar phyogs kyi cha'i dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so// //dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi/ /ka ba'i phyi rol dkyil 'khor du/ /sgeg mo
phreng ba de bzhin glu/ /gar ma lha mo phyag rgya bcas/ /shar gyi rdo rje rigs nyid la/ /phyi rol gnas su de bzhin nyid/ /nyi ma la bskyed bzhi po ni/ /rdo rje lha mos yongs su bzung / /rdo
@#/ /rje'i dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba/ /yi ge hUM ni kun tu dgod/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas rigs rgyal po/ /yi ge hUM ni 'dir brjod do/ /phyag rgya rang gi yan lag
'gyur/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung / /phyag rgya thams cad rab sbyor pas/ /de dag gsang zhing mchog gsang bshad/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen
po mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ rdo rje rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //lho yi rin chen dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /de ru phun
tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi/ /'khor lo lnga po dgod par bya/ /de yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/ /rin chen chen po rta la bcibs/ /sangs rgyas nyi
ma de bzhin gshegs/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa'i sku/ /'od zer phreng bas kun tu khyab/ /rin chen phreng ba mchog 'dzin pa'i/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ /so yi
phreng ba rab bzhad cing / /so yi phreng ba'i phyag rgyar ldan/ /mthe bo'i rtse mo rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ /nyi ma'i dbus na sangs rgyas che/ /zla ba lta bu'i bdud rtsi'i sku/ /rdo rje rin chen skal
ba che/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i rigs mchog go /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rin chen sems dpa' yang dag ldan/ /rin chen sems dpa' pad+ma dang / /de bzhin rdo rje las nyid
do| |rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/ /'khor los bsgyur bas rnam par brgyan/ /rin chen chen po rigs las byung / /nor bu'i rdo rje nyi ma 'dzin/ /de nas snying po ni/ trAM| lho yi shar
gyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /nor bu'i 'od can yang dag bri/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/ /sangs rgyas rdo
rje'i dbang bskur ldan/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rin chen de bzhin yang dag bri/ /rin chen sems pa de bzhin chags/ /rgyal po legs pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje
rin chen sogs phyag rgya/ /rang gi phyag rgya phyag mtshan phrag /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /lho yi gnas kyi steng 'dug nas/ /rin chen rigs chen bzang po la/ /rdo rje rin chen
bzang po bri/ /rin chen bzhi yi dbang bskur ldan/ /sangs rgyas spyi bo 'dzin pa'i mchog /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/ /rin chen phreng ba'i dbang bskur ldan/ /de yi phyogs
rnams thams cad du/ /sems dpa' bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /rin chen rgyal po rgyal mtshan dang / /bzhad dang rin chen rgyal po che/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /nub kyi rdo rje
dkyil 'khor la/ /pad+ma rin chen bdag nyid che/ /rin chen phreng bas dbang bskur 'di/ /rin chen pad+ma'i mchog 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas dbu rgyan sems dpa' che/ /rin chen zhi ba
@#/ /yongs su 'dzin/ /zur mig 'dod chags chags pa'i spyan/ /skyes bu 'dul ba la gzigs pa/ /pad+ma 'dzin pa'i rgyal po che/ /'jig rten dbang phyug tshe
dpag med/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rin chen pad+ma yang dag bri/ /rin chen pad+ma de bzhin no/ /de bzhin rgyu dang smra ba 'dzin/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /
byang gi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /rin chen las chen rgyal po ni/ /bdag nyid chen pos yang dag bri/ /bcom ldan thub pa'i dbang po don yod grub/ /las kun 'dzin pas sangs rgyas
rnams 'phrul pa'i/ /rdo rje las te rgyal po mdzod 'dzin pa/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i gtso bo mchog dam pa/ /sangs rgyas dbu rgyan las rnams bzhi dang ldan/ /rgyan rnams kun
gyis yan lag legs par brgyan/ /las kyi rin chen dam pas rgyas gdab cing / /rin chen dkyil 'khor tshogs chen mchog gyur pa'i/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /
las kyi rin chen yang dag bri/ /las kyi srin po gnod sbyin dang / /de yi bsdu ba'i khu tshur 'dzin/ /de nas kun gyi snying po ni/ trAM/ rin chen rigs chen rnal 'byor pa/ /yi ge trAM
ni brjod par bya/ /ci rigs par ni rang nyid kyi/ /phyag rgya phyag mtshan yang dag bri/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las/ rkang pa gsum pa rdzogs
so|| //lho phyogs cha'i dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so// //de nyid kyi ni grwa bzhi ru/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor mdun nas su/ /lha mo bzhi ni
yang dag bri/ /sems ma'i rin chen de bzhin chos/ /las ma 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du/ /sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/ /gar ma rnam par sgeg mo yi/ /nor bu rigs chen bzang po ni/ /
rin chen phyag rgyas kun khyab la/ /phyag mchog rang gi phyag rgyas mtshon/ /'od zer phreng bas khyab 'od ldan/ /rin chen rdo rjes dbang bskur ba/ /rang rang phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin/ /rin chen
mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs/ /rin chen las byung rin chen ldan/ /rin chen rang bzhin khang par gnas/ /spos dang rin chen me tog bcas/ /rin chen mchog chen la gnas shing / /lus
la rin chen gos gyon pa/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ /nor bu'i rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //
rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /nub kyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang po ni/ /dga' ba chen pos yang dag bri/ /de yi nub kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /dkyil 'khor lnga
ni yang dag bri/ /dbus kyi lte ba'i 'khor lo la/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/ /pad+ma bzang po 'dab ma brgyad/ /'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba/ /chos dbyings brtan
@#/ /pa'i rnal 'byor can/ /pad+ma'i phreng pas rnam par mdzes/ /de yi dbus su rgyal bo che/ /sna tshogs gzugs can rang bzhin mchog /sangs rgyas
shes rab thabs ldan pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin/ /pad+ma gcig po de gnas shing / /de yi dkyil 'khor la brten pa/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' bzhi po bri/ /'khor
los bsgyur ba 'jigs pa med/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma dbang bskur ldan/ /rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bri/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' 'jigs pa med//
kun kyang sangs rgyas cod pan ldan/ /chos kyi phreng bas dbang bskur bas/ /pad+ma'i phyag mtshan mtshon cha bsnams/ /sangs rgyas 'phrul bas rnam par rol/ /pad+ma'i sems dang
de bzhin rgyal/ /rin chen chos ni tshul chen po/ /dam tshig mchog rnams bzhi po ni/ /rim pa bzhin du yang dag bri/ /nub kyi shar gyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song
nas kyang / /de yi dbus su rgyal po che/ /sna tshogs 'khor lo dgod par bya/ /chos kyi snying po rab tu gnas/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la brten/ /pad+ma'i ge sar dbus su ni/ /sna tshogs
gzugs can dgod par bya/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/ /gzugs bzang ldan pa'i sku mnga' ba/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi dbang bskur ldan/ /spyan gsum phyag ni brgyad
pa ste/ /thor tshugs tshangs pa dpral bar dbang / /me tog mtshon cha smin mtshams su/ /mig la nyi ma zla ba dgod/ /tha skar gzhon nu rna ba la/ /khyab 'jug sna yi rtse mo ste/ /mche ba
nag po gsus po che/ /lce la dbyangs can ma yin te/ /gsung dbyangs la ni dbyangs chen ma/ /ku mu da dang pad phreng can/ /kha dang 'gram pa dag la gnas/ /spyan la shes
rab pha rol phyin/ /gdong gi phyed ni sprul par byed/ /phrag pa g.yas par seng ge ste/ /g.yon pa phag ni yang dag gnas/ /sna yi bu ga gnyis pa ni/ /rgya mtsho nye bar gdung
ba dang / /dga' bo nye dga' dpung pa la/ /lte ba la ni rgya mtsho gnas/ /brla gnyis po la dpung chen gnas/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug dpung pa la/ /lha chen dbang phyug chen po
ni| |mtshan ma'i steng gi sgo na gnas/ /dpal be'u snying ga la gnas te/ /lhag pa lha mo chen mo dpal/ /'og gi kha yi sgo ru ni/ /gshin rje'i rgyal po rnam par brten/ /rdzong
dang 'jigs byed lha mo che/ /pus mo la ni yang dag gnas/ /rkang pa'i sor mo bcu la ni/ /ma mo bcu ni kun tu gnas/ /drag po rje ngar gnas pa nyid/ /chu yi lha mo rgyab na gnas//
dbyid dang sogs ka dbyar dang ni/ /ston dang dgun dang dgun smad lha/ /g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa yi/ /rkang pa dag la yang dag gnas/ /'og gi 'khor lo rtsibs stong la/ /drag
@#/ /po'i phung po 'chang ba dang / /sgra gcan thags bzang ris snang byed/ /lha ma yin rnams kun tu gnas/ /lag pa bcu yi thal mo la/ /pha rol phyin pa
