bcu dag gnas/ /mngon par 'dod pa nyid dag gi/ /lha chen la sogs 'di dag bri/ /zhal bzhi phyag ni brgyad pa ste/ /zhal re zhing ni spyan gsum pa'i/ /gos dang gzugs
ni bzang por ldan/ /de 'dra'i rang bzhin thub pa dgod/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' yang dag bri/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' lcags kyu dang / /mda' dang
pad+ma legs par sbyin/ /nub kyi lho yi phyogs mchog tu/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /rin chen pad+ma yang dag bri/ /zhal ni bcu gnyis
ldan pa nyid/ /phyag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i mchog /rin chen pad+mar yang dag bzhugs/ /rin chen las ni 'byung bar 'dod/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /
pad+ma'i rin chen drag sogs bri/ /khro gnyer nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / /de bzhin zhal ni bcu gcig pa/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas
kyang | |de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /'od dpag med ni dgod par bya/ /pad+ma chen po rab ster ba/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gtso/ /sbyan dang phyag ni stong par ldan/ /
phyag rgya mtshon cha thams cad bcang / /zhal bcu gnyis pa bzang po ste/ /pad+ma'i lha mo yang dag ldan/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu dang ldan/ /tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par rol/ /yi
phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' yang dag bri/ /sgrol ma gzhon nu'i mthu can dang / /mgrin sngon tshangs pa'i mdog las byung / /nub kyi byang gi cha ru ni/ /rdo
rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /pad+ma la sogs dgod par bya/ /zhal drug phyag ni bcu gnyis pa'i/ /phyag rgya mtshon cha 'dzin pa'i mchog /chen
po sna tshogs rab ster ba/ /pad+ma las ni yang dag bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug rgyal/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun gnas pa/ /pad+ma'i srin po
gnod sbyin dang / /pad+ma'i khu tshur yang dag bri/ /g.yas dang g.yon dang rgyab dang ni/ /mdun nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas snying po ni ha/ /sangs rgyas kyi snying po hrIHste/
thams cad kyi snying po yin no/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ rkang pa bzhi pa rdzogs so// //
pad+ma'i rigs kyi tshogs dag gi /dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs nas ni/ /de yi 'khor lo'i grwa bzhi ru/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' rin chen dang / /las
@#/ /dang chos ma yang dag bri/ /sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu/ /gar ma 'di ni yang dag bri/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po
las| pad+ma'i rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //byang gi las kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /de yi dkyil 'khor rgyal po ni/ /
'khor lo lnga lnga dgod par bya/ /de yi dbus su las chen po/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/ /chos 'dzin pa yi rgyal po che/ /nam mkha' lding gi gdan la bzhugs//
de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /las kyi phyag rgya yang dag bri/ /las kyi sems dpa' rin chen dang / /de bzhin las dang chos nyid do/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /
byang gi shar gyi dkyil 'khor la/ /mi bskyod pa ni sangs rgyas che/ /rdo rje las ni dgod par bya/ /de yi mchod pa mtshon cha bcas/ /de yi phyag rgya bcas pa bzung / /las chen
'dzin pa bzang po ste/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa yang dag ldan/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /las kyi sems dpa' yang dag bri/ /sems dpa' chags pa'i rgyal po
che| |legs pa de bzhin las nyid do/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /byang gi lho yi cha ru ni/ /rin chen ting 'dzin rgyal po che/ /rin chen las ni yang dag bri/ /rin chen
char ni rab 'bebs shing / /sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rin chen las ni yang dag bri/ /sems dpa'i gzi brjid rgyal
mtshan dang / /las dang bzhad pa rnam sbyong ba/ /las kyi rin chen bzang po la/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /byang gi nub kyi
cha ru ni/ /pad+ma'i las kyi sems dpa' che/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su yang dag bri/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /pad+ma'i las ni yang dag bri/ /pad+ma rnon po de bzhin
sgyu| |de bzhin smra ba las yin no/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /byang gi byang phyogs dkyil 'khor la/ /las chen 'dzin pa dbang ldan pa/ /las kyi rgyal po yang dag
bri| |de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /las kyi sems dpa' dgod par bya/ /las kyi srin po gnod sbyin dang / /de bzhin bsdu ba'i khu tshur nyid/ /de nas snying po ni AH//
sangs rgyas kyi snying po ni AHste/ /thams cad kyi snying po yin no/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ /rkang pa lnga
pa rdzogs so// //byang gi cha'i dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so// //byang du ji ltar rigs byas te/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas ni/ /de yi 'khor
@#/ /lo'i grwa bzhi ru/ /lha mo bzhi ni dgod par bya/ /sngar gyi dam tshig bzhi po ni/ /thams cad sum cu rtsa gsum yin/ /dbus ma zhes bya sum cu gsum/ /
shar gyi phyogs na sum cu gsum/ /de bzhin nub kyi phyogs cha 'o/ /byang dang lho yang de bzhin no/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing
mchog tu gsang ba las/ /las kyi rigs zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad kyang rdzogs so// //brgya drug
cu rtsa lnga pa'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchog /thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che/ /'khor lo chen po'i grwa bzhi ru/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bri bar bya/ /'khor lo sbyor chen
shar lho ru/ /zla ba'i gzugs su dgod par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya/ /'dzum zhing zla ba'i mdog can te/ /'od zer dmar po
sna tshogs 'bar/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag bzhugs/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog /phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje bsnams/ /de bzhin g.yon na dril bu bsnams//
mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dpa' che/ /sems can kun gyi don sems pa/ /de yi pad+ma yang dag gnas/ /de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /gsang
ba lnga ni yang dag bstan/ /dang po dang ni gnyis pa ni/ /g.yas kyi phyogs na yang dag gnas/ /gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa ni/ /g.yon logs na ni rab tu gnas/ /lha mo rdo rje ca co sgrogs/ /pus
'khyud rang gi lha mo de/ /de yi glo na mgo sgyur zhing / /'dzum bcas kun tu lta ba ste/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag la 'jus/ /chu srin gyi ni rgyal mtshan bsgreng / /de yi glo na bzhad bcas

shing | |rdeg byed skye dgu'i bdag mo yi/ /rdo rje ca co'i sgra sgrogs dang / /de bzhin rdo rje don yod dga'/ /lha mo rdo rje 'dod dbang phyug /gzi brjid dga' ba'i rdo rje ma/ /lho dang nub kyi mtshams
su ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /de yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /pad+ma chen po dgod par bya/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' dgod par bya/ /zhal bzhi
phyag ni brgyad pa ste/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas pa/ /de yi pad+mar yang dag gnas/ /de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa/ /pad+ma'i rigs can las byung ba/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang
dag bri/ /kun nas gsang ba'i lha mo yi/ /de nas ming ni rab bshad bya/ /rdo rje dpal dang rdo rje dkar/ /rdo rje sgron ma rdo rje can/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /nub byang mtshams kyi
dkyil 'khor du/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma yang dag ldan/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rin chen sems dpa' dgod par bya/ /sngon dmar gyi ni 'od
@#/ /kyis khyab/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i/ /de yi pad+ma yang dag gnas/ /de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa/ /rin chen rigs chen las byung
ba'i| |lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /nam mkha' las byung mkha' rdo rje/ /nam mkha'i mdog can skye dgu'i bdag /rin chen dpal ldan lha mo che/ /rin chen dang bcas rigs
mdzes ma/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /byang shar mtshams kyi 'khor lo la/ /de bzhin ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya/ /ut+pal
sngon po de dbus su/ /las rnams 'dzin pa chen po'i mchog /sangs rgyas kun las sogs bshad pa/ /rdo rje'i las ni dgod par bya/ /de yi pad+mar yang dag gnas/ /
de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten cing / /las kyi rigs can las byung ba'i/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /las rgya rdo rje rin chen ma/ /las ma chos ma dpal ldan che/ /ji ltar
sngon du rdo rje'i rigs/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor thams cad la/ /de nyid pho nya mo ru gnas/ /de nyid lha mor yang dag gnas/ /de nyid sgeg mo rnam sgeg sogs/ /phyag rgya'i
rgya mtsho gzhan yang byed/ /ser mo dmar mo nyi ma mtshungs/ /ut+pal sngon po'i mdog 'drar 'gyur/ /bsnyems bcas zhi ba'i dbang bskur ldan/ /rang gi phyag rgya yongs su
'dzin/ /de nas snying po ni hUM hrIHoM aH/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ rkang pa drug pa rdzogs so//
mtshams rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so// //brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa lngar ldan/ /'khor lo yongs su rdzogs nas kyang / /de yi mtshams kyi logs rnams su
lha bzhi dag ni yang dag bri/ /shar du rdo rje chen po ste/ /rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o/ /rdo rje rigs chen mtshan ma ste/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba rab 'jigs pa'i/ /lho ru rin chen phun tshogs
pa| |chu lha rin chen chu srin rnams/ /rin chen rigs chen mtshan ma ste/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas brjod/ /nub tu sa lha bri bar bya/ /rtsal ldan skyes bu zhes bya yi/ /dkyil
'khor chen po 'dzin byed cing / /pad+ma'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'ang yin/ /byang du rlung gi skyes bu ni/ /rlung gi shugs kyis gos 'chang zhing / /de bzhin las kyi rigs 'dzin ma/ /g.yo
zhing rtsal ldan bri bar bya/ /brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa dgu ru/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bsgrub/ /chos kyi tshul gyi gru chen po/ /thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che/ /dkyil 'khor
thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las/ 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //thun mong mchog tu gsang ba yi/ /rdo rje
@#/ /rig pa 'dzin pa mchog /rang rigs 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /phyogs gcig tu ni bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni/ /thub pa'i
dbang phyug rnam snang mdzad/ /seng ge pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /de ni byang chub mchog 'dzin pa/ /mi bskyod pa ni glang chen bcibs/ /rin chen dbang ni rta la bcibs/ /bcom
ldan tshe dpag med pa ni/ /rma bya'i khri la yang dag bzhugs/ /don yod grub pa bla na med/ /mkha' lding dbang po yang dag bzhugs/ /'di rnams kyi ni bzhon par bshad/ /
rigs mchog kun gyi dbye ba'o/ /mi bskyod pa yis gnon te/ /de bzhin rin chen dbang mchog sbyin/ /tshe dpag med kyi ting 'dzin sbyin/ /don yod grub pa'i mi 'jigs sbyin//
sngon po ser po de bzhin dmar/ /kha dog ljang gu las 'dzin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yid 'ong / /sku mdog dkar po rab tu bsgrags/ /de bzhin rdo rje rin chen
la| |rdo rje phreng bas rdo rje mtshan/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba/ /rdo rje'i ri mo yang dag bri/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang po la/ /pad+ma'i phreng bas pad+ma mtshan/ /pad+ma'i dkyil
'khor sbyor byung ba/ /pad+ma'i srad bus thig gdab bya/ /rin chen rigs can bzang po la/ /rin chen phreng bas rin chen mtshan/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba/ /rin chen ri
mo rnam par mdzes/ /las kyi rigs la sna tshogs bshad/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas rigs mchog la/ /'on kyang rdo rje khyad par gyis/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba'i/ /rdo
rje shar gyi phyogs cha ru/ /lho ru rin chen dkyil 'khor te/ /nub tu pad+ma yang dag bshad/ /byang du las ni yang dag sbyor/ /rdo rje can kun khro gnyer can/ /rin chen tshogs ni
rab bshad pa/ /pad+ma chen po dul zhing zhi/ /drag po zhi tha las 'dzin pa/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo ru/ /'khor lo chen po yang dag bri/ /de nas phyi rol 'khor lo sogs /
cho ga 'di kun de dang 'dra/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las/ gsang ba zhes bya ba rkang pa bdun pa rdzogs
so|| //las kyi rnal 'byor las byung ba rdzogs so// //nang gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas ni/ /tshon rtsi lngas ni dgang bar bya'o/ /thig dang ri mo thams
cad ni/ /chon rtsi kun gyis rab tu dgang / /dang po nas ni tha ma ru/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu bri/ /mnyam zhing kun tu cha mnyam pas/ /gru bzhi ru ni rab tu brtag /zur bzhi pa
bsgo bzhi ba/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas pa/ /ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /yid du 'ong zhing legs par phye/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dar dang phreng bas rnam par
@#/ /brgyan/ /rdo rje rin chen srad bu yis/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor/ /rdo rje kha khyer mdzes byas la/ zla ba
phyed pa'i lcug mas khyab/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i tshogs dang ldan/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas sbras/ /zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes/ /g.yer ka'i dra bas yang dag ldan/ /kha dog sna tshogs
rnam par brgyan/ /de dang dbus kyis bar thig la/ /byang chub sems rnams yang dag bri/ /bskal ba bzang po stong dag ni/ /'das pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams/ /shar du thams
cad rdo rje mtshan/ /lho ru rin chen phyag mtshan bsnams/ /nub tu pad+ma rdo rje sogs/ /byang du las kyi rdo rje bsnams/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha gang dag /phyi rol thig la yang
dag bri/ /drag po la sogs lha chen rnams/ /snam bu las ni lus phyed phyung / /dbang phyug chen po tshangs pa che/ /khyab 'jug g.yung drung gzhon nu ni/ /rigs bcas dpung
dang bcas rgyal po/ /shar gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bri/ /'khyil ba'i 'od can gtum po dang / /ser skya rdo rje ser skya rnams/ /rigs bcas 'khor lo yang dag ldan/ lho yi
phyogs su yang dag bri/ /myos pa phreng ldan rgyal nyid pa/ /rnam par rgyal dang skyel byed rnams/ /rigs bcas dpung dang yang dag ldan/ /nub kyi cha ru yang dag bri/ /ko shi
gos can me dang rlung / /rdo rje 'jigs byed la sogs rnams/ /nub kyi cha las 'og tu ni/ /byang gi cha ru yang dag bri/ /de bzhin dpung dang bdag por bcas/ /ma mo 'jig
rten rab grags dang / /gtso bo 'khor lo rnam rol pa/ /lha min la sogs rdzu 'phrul che/ /phyi rol 'khor lo'i rigs su bshad/ /rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya las/ /
stong phrag bcu ru bshad pa rnams/ /ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas zur du/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bri bar bya/ /me tog spos la sogs ldan pa/
mchod pa'i lha mo yang dag bri/ /ji ltar nus shing bri ba dang / /ji ltar mdzes shing rjes su mthun/ /ji ltar rang gi rigs bshad pa/ /ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri/ /dkyil
'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor mchog tu mdzes pa zhes bya ba rkang pa
brgyad pa rdzogs so// //de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ma lus pa rdzogs so// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma lus par dgug pa 'di 'byung ngo / /'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug
@#/ /dgug pa nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la thabs mkhas pa chen po 'jug par byed pa nyid dang / don thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa dang / mya
ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa dang / byang chub chen po'i tshogs bsags pa dang / sems can gyi don la mi slu ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di las theg pa gzhan la
'dod pa mi skyed cing 'gyur ba med par 'ching ba nyid dang / thabs dang / shes rab dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa
sdud par byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po nyid la yang dag par byed pa nyid do/ /de la shar gyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu chen po zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin dgod par bya'o/ /lho
ru ni rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba dang / nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bya ba dang / byang du rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgod par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor thams
cad kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshul ched du brjod pa las/ rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor
chen po rdzogs so// //de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul thob byed/ /dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs nas ni/ /dam
tshig mchog chen sems dpa' yis/ /bskor ba dag ni lan gsum bya/ /ma lus gsang ba blta bya zhing / /kun tu tshogs nas dga' bar bya/ /gsang ba chad na dag bya zhing /
lhag pa rnam par sbyang bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /myur du phyag rgya che bsten bya/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /lan gcig tu ni brjod par bya/ /'khro lo zur ni
yang dag gnas/ /rdo rje lha mo sbyan drang bya/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas mchod rten spyan drang bya/ /sgo yi dbus na gang gnas pa/ /sgo srung rnams ni sbyan drang
bya| |phyi rol dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /sems dpa' chen po spyan drang bya/ /de nas sgo rnams thams cad du/ /lcags kyu la sogs las byas te/ /phyag rgya bzhi ni yang dag
bcing | |brgya dang rtsa brgyad dag bya ba/ /rdo rje lcags kyu kun du dgug /rdo rje zhags pas gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog kun tu bcing / /rdo rje dril bus dbab par bya/ /sgo'i
bya ba'o/ /de nas dbus su 'dug byas nas/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches/ /rdo rje dbye ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /sgo rnams thams cad dbye bar bya/ /sgo srung ba ru dmigs nas
ni| |sgo rnams dbye bar bya ba yin/ /rdo rje sdigs mdzub phyag rgya yis/ /gdug pa thams cad bsdigs par bya/ /gang tshe mchod pa yang dag rtsom/ /ji srid dus kyi rdzogs
@#/ /'gyur ba/ /grwa ni thams cad dag tu ni/ /bdug spos rnams ni gdul bar bya/ /sngon du sgo yi las byas te/ /de nas mchod pa yang dag bya/ /dang
por me tog shing la sogs/ /sbos dang mar me phyag rgyar bcas/ /mtshams kyi dus las sngon du ni/ /bum pa rdo rje spyan drang bya/ /rdo rje bum pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /ci nus par
ni spyan drang bya/ /bum pa shin tu bzang po gcig /rin chen sna bdun las byas mdzes/ /yang na rin chen dang bsres pa'i/ /rdo rje dri yi chu ldan bya/ /rdo rje chu yi sngags dang
ni| |rdo rje phyag rgya chu gtsang ma/ /stong dang rtsa brgyad bzlas byas na/ /rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i chu ru 'gyur/ /bum pa'i sngags ni/ oM badzra u da ka hUM/ me tog gi sngags ni/ oM badzra
puSh+pe hUM/ mar me'i sngags ni/ oM badzra A lo ke hUM/ dri'i sngags ni/ oM badzra gan+d+he hUM/ bdug spos kyi sngags ni/ oM badzra d+hu pe hUM/ spos dang me tog la sogs pa/ /thams
cad phyag rgya ldan par bya/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gzung byas nas/ /rdo rje'i sngags kyis rab tu sbyor/ /dgongs ka'i dus nas brtsams nas ni/ /khrus kyi cho ga yang dag bya/ /lus la dri
yis phyugs pa dang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan/ /rdo rje'i shugs kyi sngags dang ni/ /rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya yis/ /'byung ba dang ni 'jug pa yi/ /rdo rje'i rnal
'byor nyes mi 'gyur/ /smin ma rdo rje ri mo mtshan/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya la sogs tshogs/ /sems dpa' thams cad 'gom byas kyang / /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor nyes mi 'gyur/ /de la
ni 'gyod pa med par 'gyur/ /rdo rje dril bu dkrol ba yis/ /cho ga chad dam lhag kyang rung / /'grub 'gyur nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te 'di ni cho gar ldan/ /kun tu 'jigs
par mi bya'o/ /grub pa'i rnal 'byor go cha yis/ /sangs rgyas skyon du 'dzin mi mdzad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya ches/ /dkyil 'khor mchod phyir 'jug par bya'o/ /zhugs
nas dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje dag ni dgug par bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu kun bcings nas/ /sor mo yis ni dgug par bya/ /de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu yis/ /rgyud las
dgug pa nyid du gsungs/ /de bzhin rdo rje rigs chen la/ /rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bcing / /rin chen lcags kyu'i sbyor pa yis/ /rin po che ni dgug par bya/ /
pad+ma lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag la bshad/ /las kyi lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /las kyi rigs chen dgug par bya/ /rdo rje chen po'i lcags
kyu bcing / /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya/ /dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang bya/ /phyi rol rdo rje lcags kyu bcing / /
@#/ /phyi rol rdo rje rigs spyan drang / /bkra shis rdo rje'i lcags kyu yis/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan drang bya/ /byang phyogs lcags kyu'i
sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor pa rnams spyan drang bya/ /rin chen lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa spyan drang bya/ /snying po'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /phyag
na rdo rje spyan drang bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor pa yis/ /kun la nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ /bsnyems tshul sngags kyi phyag rgya yis/ /rnam snang yang dag spyan drang
bya| |sangs rgyas lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/ /de bzhin kho nar sangs rgyas rnams/ /dam tshig lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /dam tshig sems dpa' spyan drang
bya| |dgug pa'i sbyor ba byas nas ni/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad gdon par bya/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs nas ni/ /mchod pa'i sbrin rnams yang dag sgrub/ /bdag
nyid dbul ba la sogs pa'i/ /ji skad bshad pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/ /bshags dang gsol gdab mchod pa dang / /bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs rnams//
bdag gi bya ba rdzogs nas ni/ /phyag rgya bcing ba yang dag brtsam/ /brgya'am yang na stong dag gam/ /brgya phrag brgya ni bsdus pa yis/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs ni
bcing byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas dkyil 'khor las byas te/ /ji srid skya rengs shar gyur pa/ /de srid phyag rgya yang dag bcing / /nges
par dngos grub ster bar byed/ /de nas langs te phyag rgya bcas/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol byung nas ni/ /gdug pa la sogs kun bsdigs te/ /dkyil 'khor mchod phyir
'jug par bya/ /rang gi khrus byas lus dris byugs/ /ji ltar 'tsham pa'i rgyan gos ldan/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i gos gyon zhing / /phreng ldan kha ni dri zhim pas/ /rdo rje gar
gyi sbyor ba yis/ /me tog spyi bor gzhag byas te/ /rol pa'i rdo rje dga' ba yis/ /zhugs nas mgon la rab btud cing / /de nyid 'dod chags rjes chags dang / /
de nyid bskul ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba/ /sangs rgyas kun ni bskul bar bya/ /skyon dang bral zhing rtag pa ste/ /'dod chags kun la rjes
chags pa/ /mchod 'os chen po rgyal po che/ /bcom ldan de nyid bdag grub mdzod/ /de nas dam tshig mchog gi ni/ /phyag rgya cho ga bzhin bcings nas/ /rdo rje slob
dpon zhugs nas ni/ /lcags sgrog phyag rgya yang dag bcing / /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu bcing / /steng du se gol brdabs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas
@#/ /thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bsdu ba'i sngags ni dzaHjaHdzaH/ /shar gyi sgo ru yi ge dzaH/ /de bzhin lho ru yi ge hUM/ /nub tu lcags sgrogs
chen po baM/ /byang du kun tu dbab pa aH/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la/ /las 'di dag ni yang dag bshad/ /las ni kun tu rdzogs byas nas/ /de bzhin ngo mtshar
mthong 'gyur ba/ /cho 'phrul chen po rmad byung che/ /sna tshogs brgya dang rtsa bcu ste/ /cho 'phrul rmad byung chen po rnams/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis mthong 'gyur/ /dngos grub
bdag nyid chen po kun/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu 'ong bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje can dang byang chub sems/ /de bzhin rigs ni rnam lnga dang / /rdo rje dbyings ni bdag nyid
che| |bcom ldan mchog kyang gshegs par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems sogs sangs rgyas sras/ /ngo mtshar slob dpon gyis mthong 'gyur/ /mchod pa dang ni gtor ma
nyid| |ji bzhin cho ga bcas par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rdzu 'phrul dngos grub dag /mthong nas dkyil 'khor bya ba yin/ /ji ltar bkod pa 'khor lo dang / /ji ltar yo
byad zad pa dang / /ji ltar brtul zhugs spyad pa bzhin/ /de bzhin dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen dang / /sangs rgyas yang dag
mthong bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'khor lo chen po byon/ /'di ni ngo mtshar mchog yin no/ /ji ltar de rnams bzhugs pa bzhin/ /de bzhin 'khor lo yongs su bzung / /
ye shes bzang po khyab pa yi/ /rmad byung dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor rmad byung thams cad ni/ /sa dag brtol nas mthong bar 'gyur/ /yang na dkyil 'khor
bar snang gi /nam mkha' la gnas mthong bar 'gyur/ /yang na sangs rgyas kun gang ba'i/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur/ /yang na phyogs rnams thams cad du//
sangs rgyas sku ni rab mthong 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs bzhin du/ /rdo rje can gyis bdag nyid mthong / /yang na gsang ba lnga zhes pa'i/ /yang na sangs rgyas mkhas
pa'i mchog /yang na dkyil 'khor gnas de ni/ /stong phrag gsum ni yongs su gzung / /yang na rdo rje sems gcig po/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po zhes bshad do/ /de
yi mtshan mo nyin mo mthong / /nyi ma'i 'od kyis kun khyab pa'i/ /yang na nyi ma 'char ba ste/ /yang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /dag pa'i zhing ni mthong nas su/ /sangs
rgyas rol pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /'dus pa shin tu dag pa yi/ /dbang bskur ba ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /rmad byung sna tshogs zhes bya ba/ /rnam 'phrul ngo mtshar
@#/ /'di mthong 'gyur/ /rdo rje slob dpon skal chen gyis/ /dkyil 'khor mchod pa sna tshogs 'gyur/ /yo byad tshogs par gyur kyang ni/ /gang zhig
bsgribs par gyur pa yis/ /de bzhin ngo mtshar nyid mi mthong / /rnal 'byor gzhan ni yang dag rtsom/ /phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni/ /sdig pa dral ba yang dag
bya| |rmad byung sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ /la lar zhugs pa tsam gyis ni/ /'grub pa nyid du gdon mi za/ /dang po thun la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin la lar mtshan phyed
na| |gsum pa 'ang skya rengs 'char na 'grub/ /de bzhin la lar nyi shar na/ /de ma thag tu mngon 'dod pa'i/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog 'grub 'gyur/ /skal ldan
thar par 'dod 'gyur na/ /sa ni dang por 'dod pa ste/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob nas/ /gang gis gnas med 'gro ba'o/ /yang ni rig pa 'dzin nyid dam/ /de bzhin rdo rje
nyid du 'gyur/ /ji ltar mngon par 'dod par 'grub/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yongs su 'dzin/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang / /de bzhin sdig pa kun byed pas/ /
gang tshe lan bdun byas nas ni/ /sgrub pas rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur/ /'byung ba bzhi las gzugs can min/ /nam mkha'i gzugs su rtag tu 'gyur/ /chos kyi dbyibs
su 'gyur ba nyid/ /rdo rje bka' ni gzhan du min/ /gang gi lan bdun bsgrubs na ni/ /sdig pa dge ba nyid 'gyur zhing / /nyes par byas pa bsod nams tshogs/ /gzhan du
'grub par mi 'gyur te/ /dad pa med par gnas pa dang / /gang tshe the tshom za 'gyur ba/ /de ni rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni yongs ma bzung / /sngon du bsnyen
pa nyams 'gyur te/ /rtag tu brtul zhugs nyams par 'gyur/ /de 'dra la sogs bgegs mang dang / /nga rgyal 'di dag rnam par spangs/ /sdom pa yongs su ma bzung zhing //
rnal 'byor de nyid tshul shes min/ /rdo rje slob dpon mi brtan 'gyur/ /'grub pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyi/ /gal te rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur/ /mkhas
shing sdom pa blangs pa dang / /byang chub sems ni yongs su gzung / /gang tshe 'tsho ba don yod cing / /gal te skye ba 'bras bcas 'dod/ /'bad pas thams cad nyid kyis ni//
rnal 'byor chen po yang dag brtsam/ /byang chub sems dang ldan gyur nas/ /rig pa'i sdom pa 'dzin pa yi/ /de nas rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab
'grub 'gyur/ /yang zhus pa/ rig pa'i rgyud ni rab bsgrub phyir/ /sdom pa ji ltar blang bar bgyi/ /ji ltar dam tshig bsrung bar bgyi/ /dam tshig nyams pa ji lta bu/ /sems can
@#/ /kun gyi don bya'i phyir/ /byang sems yang dag bskyed nas ni/ /theg pa gzhan la 'dod mi bya/ /de nas rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam/ /dkyil 'khor gang na
gnas kyang rung / /slob dpon gyi ni mdun song ste/ /zhabs dag la ni btud nas brjod/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang
chub sems dpa'i tshul brtan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol/ /gtso bo bdag la sdom
pa stsol/ /slob dpon gyis ni nye bar brtag /rnam pa kun tu dri bar bya/ /dam tshig brjod bya gang zhig ni/ /snod du rung ba de gzhug bya/ /bu dang slob ma ma yin min/ /snod
dang ldan la sbyin par bya/ /gal te snod dang ldan par shes/ /srog dang bdog pa kun sbyin bya/ /sngon tu dkyil 'khor rab 'jug cing / /cho ga bzhin du bcug nas
ni| |de nas me tog bcas thal mo/ /lus btud dga' ba che rnams kyi/ /bshags pa dang ni gsol ba gdab/ /rjes su yi rang kun tu bya/ /rgyud dbang gsang ba
las gsung bzhin/ /mchod pa dang bcas yongs su bsngo/ /phyogs rnams kun tu phyag bya zhing / /sdom pa chen po blang bar bya/ /slob dpon la ni rab tu brjod/ /
gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol/ /thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa'i/ /sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ /slob dpon dbang du gnas
pa la| |sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba/ /mi ldog 'khor lo'i 'byor par ldan/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog /gsang ba chen po 'jug par bgyi/ /gsang ba'i
rigs mtho thams cad du/ /slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod/ /mi ldog pa yi dbang skur ba/ /skal ba chen po bdag la stsol/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas
btab cing / /dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ /dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung che/ /sems can kun
gyi don bgyid phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol/ /gsang ba'i rigs las byung ba yi/ /rdo rje'i rigs bcas 'khor lo ste//
rta babs bcas par yang dag ldan/ /slob dpon gyur par shes par bya/ /bdag nyid nye bar zhi ba nyid/ /byang chub sems ni yongs su gzung / /gsang ba yi ni 'khor
lo ru| |sdom pa dang bcas 'jug par bgyi/ /da nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ /gsang ba chen po rigs dag pa/ /gsang ba yongs su 'dzin
@#/ /par ni/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam/ /des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya/ /yang slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ /
sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ste/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song / /'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag
rgya yang / /blo chen gyis ni gzung bar bgyi/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bya/ /bla ma sangs rgyas
kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i/ /sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /zang
zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag
pa'i| |dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i
las kyang ci nus bya/ /de las gzhan pa bcu bzhi ni/ /phas pham par ni rab tu bshad/ /spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad do/ /nyin dang
mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /nyin re zhing ni bzla bar byed/ /gang tshe nyams gyur rnal 'byor pa/ /kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur/ /khyod kyi srog chags gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang
mi blang ngo / /'dod pa log par mi spyad cing / /brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba yi/ /chang ni rnam par spang bar bya/ /sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs pa//
bya ba ma yin thams cad spang / /dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing / /rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang / /
yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni/ /ci nus par ni rjes su skyongs/ /theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya/ /sems can don la rgyab phyogs min/ /'khor ba dag kyang spang mi bya/ /rtag
tu mya ngan 'das ma chags/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing / /phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang / /mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya'o/ /'di dag
dam tshig yin par bshad/ /khyod kyi rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /rjes mthun sdom pa rgya cher ni/ /gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad/ /de nyid kyis kyang brjod par bya/ /'dir
ni slob dpon bdag la gson/ /gtso bo ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de bzhin du ni bgyid par 'tshal/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad
@#/ /pa'i| |byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims gyi
ni bslab pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge
'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsam ste gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /yang dag nyid du
bzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re zhing ni dus drug bya/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi
rab tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs
mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med pa/ /
dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gi sdom pa ma lus gzung / /ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi/ /ma brgal ba ni bsgral
bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing / /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /cho ga ji bzhin dbang bskur bya/ /rdo rje slob
dpon dbang bskur ba/ /gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad/ /de lta bu yi cho ga yis/ /rtag pa nyid du spyod pa na/ /slob dpon rdo rje 'chang chen du/ /'di ni 'gyur ba the
tshom med/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyi las rdzogs so// //de nas slob ma gzhug pa'i las/ /yang dag nyid du bshad par bya/ /slob ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /ji
bzhin gsang ba chen por gzhug /snod dang snod min brtag pa nyid/ /bdag nyid chen pos mi bya'o/ /'di ni mthong ba tsam gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub par
'dod/ /gal te de ni snod min na/ /de la gzhug pa sbyin par bya/ /yang na gang zhig don gnyer 'gyur/ /de la ji ltar bde ba nyid/ /ci ste gang zhig 'dug par 'gyur/ /
mkhas pas gzhug pa sbyin par bya/ /gang phyir mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /thams cad 'grub par gdon mi za/ /'on kyang gang zhig 'dug par 'gyur/ /de la las ni bya ba
min| |gzhug pa tsam zhig sbyin bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad nyid mi bya/ /dga' zhing dad dang ldan 'gyur na/ /snod du rung ba brtag par bya/ /gsum la skyabs 'gro sngon song ba'i/ /de la
@#/ /gzhug pa sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/ /rdo rje slob ma la sbyin bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' ches/ /sbyor bzhin su yin brjod
par bya/ /dkar po dmar po dang ldan pa'i/ /gos kyis mig ni bkab gyur dang / /rdo rje 'jug byed phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya/ /de nas sgo yi las bya ste/
sngon la rdo rje lcags kyu yis/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dgug bya zhing / /yi ge dzaHni brjod par bya/ /badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ /rdo rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni/ /rdo rje zhags pas gzhug
par bya/ /lho yi sgor na sbyor bya zhing / /yi ge hUM ni brjod par bya/ /hUM badzra pA sha hUM/ /rdo rje zhags pas bcug nas ni/ /lcags sgrog ldan pas bcing bar bya/ /nub kyi sgo ru
bcings nas ni/ /yi ge paM ni brjod par bya/ /badzra s+pho Ta baM/ rdo rje lcags kyus yang dag dgug /rdo rje zhags pas gzhug bya zhing / /rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcing bya/ /rdo
rje dril bus yang dag dbab/ /badzra gaN+De aH/ rdo rje gzhug pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /dkyil 'khor mchod phyir gzhug par bya/ /dam tshig phyag rgya chen po yis/ /rdo rje'i ye
shes yang dag dbab/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM/ /dam tshig phyag rgya chen po yis/ /rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya/ /dam tshig bdag nyid chen po yis/ /sangs rgyas ye shes dbab
par bya/ /sa ma ya hUM/ /de nas mchod pa phyag rgyar bcas/ /spos dang me tog la sogs tshogs/ /phyag rgya dag ni thams cad bya/ /rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya/ /de nas cho
ga ji bzhin du/ /rdo rje slob ma mna' bsngags bya/ /badzra u da ka /rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas/ /ji ltar 'dod pas dbang bskur bya/ /badzra a b+hi She ka /rdo rje ye shes bla na
med| |de nas de la dbab pa sbyin/ /badzra A be sha a a/ /bcu/ nyi shu/ sum cu/ bzhi bcu/ lnga bcu/ drug cu/ bdun cu/ brgyad cu/ dgu bcu/ brgya/ rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di
yis| |thams cad du ni yang dag dbab/ /de nas gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla med pa/ /badzra ak+Shi/ rdo rje'i rigs ni skal ldan gyi/ /dkyil 'khor ltos
shig ces brjod bya/ /badzra pA sh+ya ho/ /de nas de la bum pa bzang / /rdo rje slob dpon gyis dbang bskur/ /gang mang gzung ba tsam gyis ni/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur//
oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ snod ni yang dag brtag bya zhing / /de yi ye shes yongs su spyad/ /gal te snod du rung shes na/ /rnam par dbye bar dga' bar bya/ /he badzra nA ma/ lnga/ cho
ga bcu/ nyi shu/ chu sum cu/ rdo rje bzhi bcu/ rin chen lnga bcu/ pheg rdo ba drug cu/ kha sbyar bdun cu/ bzhad pa brgyad cu/ dag pa dgu bcu/ sems pa brgya/
@#/ /sangs rgyas stong / las nyis stong / gzugs sum stong / rnal 'byor bzhi stong / 'dzin ba lnga steng / gzungs drug stong / kha dog bdun stong /
dbyibs brgyad stong / mtshan ma dgu stong / tshig 'bum/ a 'bum phrag gcig ni yongs rdzogs nas/ 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/ /gsang ba yi ni spyod
yul gzhan/ /de nas las ni rab bshad bya/ /slob ma'i cho ga dang / ming gi dam tshig rdzogs so// //ye shes dag pa bdag nyid che/ /de nas gsang ba
rab bshad bya/ /gang gi cho ga thams cad kyis/ /'khor lo chen po brtan 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas sems dpa' sems dpa' nyid/ /sa yi mtshan nyid yang dag
ldan| |gsang ba'i dam bcas yi rang bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dag pa/ /rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs/ /ye shes dag pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje'i
thugs 'dzin 'gyur nas ni/ /mtshan nyid dag ni yang dag brtag /rnal 'byor dpe byad don ldan pa/ /mtshan nyid rjes su brtag par bya/ /rdo rje'i thugs kyi rjes sbyor
bas| |ye shes dag pa yang dag gzung / /mchog tu gsang ba dam pa mchog /ye shes bzhugs pa kun tu bshad/ /de nas ye shes dam pa yis/ /'jig rten 'das
pa rab gzhug bya/ /mtshan nyid chen po dang ldan pa'i/ /rtogs pa'i sa la yang dag rten/ /rnal 'byor pa yi spyod yul mchog /rdo rje chos ni yid 'ong ba'o/ /thim dang
chos sku zhes bya dang / /bsdigs dang 'od zer lnga pa dang / /glog dang chu zla zhes bya bas/ /sangs rgyas ye shes yang dag 'thob/ /chu yi zla ba bzang po yis/ /zla ba'i dkyil
'khor spang bar bya/ /nyi ma lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /rigs chos skar ma zhes bya ba/ /nyon mongs gnod pa 'joms byed pa/ /e ma'o gsang ba chen por bshad/ /gsang
ba zhes bya rdor 'od 'byung / /gzhan yang zla ba phyed par 'dod/ /pho nya'i dkyil 'khor kha T+wAM ga/ /bcing ba rtse gsum sbyor las byung / /lcags kyu shin tu 'bar ba dang //
gtum po rdo rje can gyi tshogs/ /rtog pa'i gnas ni yongs 'gyur ba/ /thob byed rdo rje chen por 'dod/ /kun gyi gong ma'i 'og ma yis/ /nyi tshe ba de spang bar bya/ /mchog
tu gsang ba rdzogs so// //de nas mchog tu gsang ba/ /rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul can/ zab pa/ tshul rgya che ba/ mkhas pa/ bsam gyis mi
khyab pa'i yul las kyis tshogs ston pa/ dga' ba chen po'i bkod pas kun khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
@#/ /ba la sogs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzad 'byung ba rol ba'i 'khor lo chen bo 'di las phyag rgya chen po'i rgyud mchog ces bya ba 'byung
ste| gsang ba mchog tu rgya che ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab las rnams ston/ /rol pa'i 'khor lo chen po ru/ /chos kyi mdzod ni 'dzin par bya/ /re zhig dang por
las kyis tshogs bstan par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ hUM| 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gzung ba yi/ /sbyor thabs yi ge hUM brjod de/ /'di yis kyang ni rgyal po dang / /phyag
rgya'i rgyal mo brgya ru 'gyur/ /gnyis pa ni/ byang chub chen po'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul la 'jug pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/
hUM| 'dis ni phyag rgya zhes bya yi/ /yi ge hUM ni brtan par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya'i rgyal mo rnam pa stong / /gsum pa phyag rgya stong phrag
ni| |brgya yi tshogs su 'gyur ba yin/ /sangs rgyas 'khor lor 'jug pa yi/ /yi ge hUM gis brtan par 'gyur/ /hUM| rnal 'byor bzhi pa'i dbye ba ni/ /brgya
phrag khri ru 'dir 'gyur ro/ /rig pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ /phyag rgya'i rgyal mo kun hUM bcas/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgya ji snyed yod/ /mngag gzhug pa ni bye bar
'gyur/ /rtse gsum la sogs mtshon cha ni/ /rtag tu phyag rgya'i rgyal po yin/ /hUM| de nas sngags kyi tshogs 'byung ste/ /Tak+ki bcu/ maT nyi shu/ phaT sum cu/ raT bzhi
bcu| baT lnga bcu/ riT drug cu/ khaT bdun cu/ waT brgyad cu/ taT dgu bcu/ taT brgya/ kaT ni lan stong yin/ /ta dang wa zhes bya ba dang / /Da ni rnam pha bcu ru
'gyur/ /yi ge Da ni lan gsum sbyar/ /yi ge a yang rnam pa bzhi/ /yi ge ba ni rnam pa lnga/ /yi ge a ni lan drug sbyar/ /ka ni lan bdun yang dag sbyar/ /yi ge d+ha ni lan
brgyad sbyar/ /yi ge sha ni phyed du 'gyur/ /khiT ni stong phrag brgya ru 'gyur/ /stong phrag brgya las rnal 'byor gyis/ /phyag rgya'i rgyud ni btu bar bya/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus
pa gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i drug pa gsang ba'i tshogs chen po'i mchog de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po shin tu gsang ba
rnal 'byor rdo rje rtsa mo las/ byang chub pa'i tshul rgya chen pos 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so// //rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mchog tu
gsang ba yang rdzogs so// //de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rgya chen po 'di las dkyil 'khor chen po'i dang por phyag rgya dang / nye ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye
@#/ /shes 'byung ste/ gang tshe rdo rje slob dpon dang / /rdo rje slob mar gyur pa na/ /phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya bcing / /gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas
gang tshe rdo rje sems dpa' 'ching / /rdo rje khu tshur dam du 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje rgyal po 'ching / /rdo rje gnod sbyin rab tu 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje chags pa 'ching / /rdo rje srin
po rab tu 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje legs pa 'ching / /rdo rje las ni rab tu 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje rin chen 'ching / /rdo rje smra ba rab tu 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje gzi brjid 'ching
rdo rje rgyu ni rab tu 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'ching / /rdo rje rnon po rab tu 'ching / /gang tshe rdo rje bzhad pa 'ching / /rdo rje chos ni rab tu bcing / /de lta bu yi sbyor ba
yis| |phyag rgya'i lan ni yang dag sbyar/ /phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya brtan par 'gyur/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya ji ltar lags/ /rdo rje'i lcags kyus
bkug nas su/ /rdo rje'i mdas ni dgang bar bya/ /rdo rje'i mdas ni 'phangs nas su/ /rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis bsgrub bya/ /phyag rgya ji bzhin bkrol nas ni/ /de ni bcing bar
rab tu bya/ /mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchod par 'gyur/ /de bzhin g.yon pas gar bya zhing / /g.yas pas khu tshur bcings nas ni/ /dpral
bar yongs su bskor nas su/ /kha yi mdun du dgod par bya/ /rdo rje nyi ma bzhad pas bgad/ /mnyam zhing cung zad gdangs te gnas/ /ral gri dri ma med snang bas/ /rdo rje
glu ni blang bar bya/ /rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo ni/ /yang dag bsgreng ba legs par bsgrub/ /de nas spyi gtsug kha dag tu/ /las byas dkyil 'khor mchod pa na/ /rigs kyi lha yi
sbyor ba yis/ /legs par bsgrub pas gtam 'grub bya/ /dang por bdag nyid rdo rje sems/ /de bzhin lha nyid brtag par bya/ /brtul zhugs sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rigs
kyi lha nyid bsgrub par bya/ /'khor lo rnam pa du ru brjod/ /ji ltar rigs de bzhin 'khor lo/ /ji ltar dgod pa de bzhin 'gyur/ /ji skad gsungs pa dgongs pa bzhin//
mdor bsdu na ni rnam pa lnga/ /rdo rje rin chen de bzhin chos/ /pad+ma sna tshogs shin tu bstan/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas rnal 'byor gsang / /'khor lo rnam pa lnga ru bshad/ /gsang
ba rnam pa du ru 'gyur/ /gsang ba rnam pa lnga ru brjod/ /rgyas pa'i sgo nas rnam pa mang / /sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang / /chos dang las ni grags chen no/ /cho ga rnam pa du ru
brjod/ /mdor na rnam pa gsum du 'dod/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /mngon spyod kyi ni rtog pa la/ /rdo rje sbyor ba las byung du/ /rdo rje'i sbyor ba bla med pa/ /tshad med bgrang
@#/ /du med pa yis/ /ji ltar gdul bya rnams kyi khams/ /de bzhin rdo rje sbyor 'byung rnams/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud du ji ltar brjod/ /gsang ba lnga ldan
gang yin pa'i/ /de ni rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya/ /dbang bskur phyag rgya chen po dang / /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor 'byung / /ji ltar gsang ba'i rigs las byung / /gang
zhig sngon du chos nyid snang / /yid la byed pa dang ldan pa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi thabs chen po/ /de bzhin gsang ba rab tu brtag /'di yi rtag tu de nyid rig /rdo rje'i
ye shes ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar bsgoms pas rdo rje can/ /mngon par sbyor ba de nyid rig /de tshe ye shes rang bzhin sems/ /de nyid ye shes brtan par 'gyur/ /
mchog tu gsang ba ci 'drar brjod/ /phyag rgya rnam pa lnga ldan pa/ /de ni mchog tu gsang ba bsgrags/ /phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya bsdu/ /nye bar bzhad pa'i mchod pa'o/ /
de nyid kyang ni ji lta bu/ /rig pa'i bsgom pa bstan pa dang / /ting 'dzin sgo dang yang dag ldan/ /rig pa'i lha mo'i 'khor gyi mchog /de nyid du ni rtag tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje
phra mo ji ltar brjod/ /shes rab can gyis bdag bsam bya/ /nga ni su zhig bdag mi dmigs/ /'byung ba bzhi yi rang bzhin lus/ /'byung ba rnams las ji ltar
'byung | |de nas lus 'di thams cad ni/ /rnal 'byor spyi bo nas brtsams te/ /rkang pa yi ni mthil bar du/ /mi gtsang rdzas ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zla ba'i rdo rje dbus
gnas par/ /yang na bdag nyid bsam par bya/ /yang na snying ga'i dbus su ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /yang na zla gnyis yang dag ldan/ /dbus su rdo
rje rnam par bsgom/ /yang na rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa/ /lus kun brtan par spro bar bya/ /yang na rdo rje bdag nyid sku/ /rdo rje'i dngos po rnam spangs pa'i/ /yang na mkha' mtshungs
chos shes pa'i/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor yang dag gzung / /lce ni rkan la sbyar byas te/ /sna yi rtse mor blta bya zhing / /rdo rje phra mo bde reg pas/ /sems ni mnyam par bzhag par
'gyur/ /rdo rje phra mo'i bde reg la/ /rtag tu mtshan ma'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mtshan ma de ni spro byas te/ /phyogs kun du ni yongs su spro/ /s+phar Na badzra/ ci ste sems ni spro
bar 'dod/ /phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su spro/ /sna yi rtse mor phyin bar du/ /sems ni slar yang bsdu bar bya/ /saM ha ra Na badzra/ de nas brtsams te mnyam bzhag pas/ /
gang zhig cung zad ci bsgom pa'i/ /chos dang gang zag bdag med cing / /gzung dang 'dzin pa spang ba'o/ /badzra badzra tiSh+Tha badzra/ sems can gang la byams pa ni/ /rtag tu
@#/ /brtan par dmigs nas su/ /sems ni spro ba'i spyod pa yis/ /phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su spro/ /ma hA badzra mai tri s+pha ra Na/ /sdug bsngal
kun la yang dag gnas/ /sems can 'di rnams rab tu dka'/ /snying rje chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su ste/ /mahA kA ru Ni spa ra Na/ /mya ngan
'das la btang snyoms gzhag /sems can don ni yang dag brtsam/ /kye ma sems can 'di 'dul dka'/ /phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su spro/ /mahA u be k+ShaM s+pha ra
Na| |thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/ /gzod nas dag pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ /kun nas nyon mongs mi dmigs 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'das pa grol ba'ang
med| |sarba bud+d+ha pra mo da s+pha ra Na/ /mkha'am gzhan gyi phyogs dag tu/ /rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /snying ga'i rdo rje byang chub sems/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas
bsgom/ /rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /go rim ji lta ba bzhin du/ /phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs chen po/ /dam pa'i chos nyid bsgom par bya/ /rnam pa mchog rnams kun
ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yi/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya/ /bud+d+ha a nu smr-i t+yA bi sha /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
dbus su ni/ /rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya/ /rang gi snying ga'i dkyil 'khor du/ /zla bsgom rmad byung rnal 'byor che/ /sa man+ta b+ha dra A be sha/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
dbus su ni/ /rang bdag nyid ni rdo rje'i gzugs/ /rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i chog bzhin/ /badzra satwa/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan
pa'i| |rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/ /snying gar zla ba'i dbus su ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /badzra s+t+wa sa mA d+hi dz+nyA nA be sha /rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun
ldan pa'i/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su rang bdag nyid/ /bsgom zhing snying gar zla ba'i dkyil/ /dbus su sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /ta thA ga to haM/ rdo rje'i rnal 'byor
rnam bsgom pa/ /rnam pa brgya dang rtsa bcu ni/ /rgyas pa ru ni ci rigs par/ /gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad/ /rdo rje phra mo rdzogs so// //'jig rten pa ni ji
ltar 'dod/ /rdo rje'i gzugs ni gter gnas pa/ /snying gar yongs su bsgom par bya/ /sa yi gnas kyang bsgoms na ni/ /gter dag rab tu mthong bar 'gyur/ /badzra ni
d+hi| |rin chen chen po'i rdo rje gzugs/ /nam mkha' la ni yongs su bsgom/ /gang du lhung bar mthong ba ni/ /de nas gter yod shes par bya/ /rat+na ni d+hi/ /lce la pad+ma'i
@#/ /gzugs dag ni/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /de na yod ces bcas nas ni/ /rdo rje'i lce nyid rang nyid smra/ /d+harma ni d+hi/ /lus kun
rnal 'byor chen po yis/ /rdo rje'i gzugs su rnam par bsgom/ /kun tu babs nas gar lhung ba/ /de na gter yod bstan pa yin/ /karma ni d+hi/ /gter shes pa rdzogs
so|| ||rdo rje dbab pa 'byung ba yin/ /chu ni rdo rje'i gzugs rang bzhin/ /sgom zhing rdo rje'i shugs kyis ni/ /chu yi steng du 'gro bar bya/ /badzra dza la/ ji ltar
'dod pa'i gzugs su ni/ /rdo rje sems sogs 'dod pa rnams/ /rang bdag nyid ni bsgom bya ste/ /'dod pa'i gzugs nyid thob par 'gyur/ /badzra rU pa/ chos kun
/mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste/ /bdag nyid nam mkha' zhes rang nyid/ /de nyid dag pa bsgom bya ste/ /de ni mi snang ba nyid 'gyur/ /badzra A kA sha/ /rdo rje'i skas la 'dug
nas ni/ /'dzeg pa ru ni bsgom byas na/ /ji srid du ni 'dzeg pa'i gnas/ /de srid nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /badzra ma haM/ /mi snang ba dang / mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
chu'i steng du 'gro bar bya ba dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs nyid shes pa rdzogs so// //zla ba'i gzugs la 'dug nas su/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /
lag na rdo rje bsgoms na ni/ /rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /badzra d+ha ra/ zla ba'i gzugs la 'dug nas ni/ /rdo rje rin chen bdag rang nyid/ /rab tu rin chen bsgoms nas ni//
rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rat+na d+ha ra/ zla ba'i gzugs la 'dug nas su/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rang bdag nyid/ /lag pa pad+ma dag tu bsgom/ /pad+mo'i rig pa 'dzin par
'gyur/ /pad+ma d+ha ra/ zla ba'i gzugs la 'dug nas su/ /rdo rje'i las su yang dag brtan/ /lag tu las ni bsgom byas na/ /las kyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /karma d+ha ra/
rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid rdzogs so// //phyag rgya kun gyi ting nge 'dzin/ /nam mkha'i dbyings su kun bsams nas/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid ji srid
'dod/ /de srid skad cig gis 'phar 'gyur/ /badzra| dngos grub kyi ni ting 'dzin ni/ /nam mkha'i dbyings su kun bsams nas/ /mngon par shes pa lnga thob cing / /myur du
ye shes rang grub 'gyur/ /shud+d+ha/ shud+d+ha/ rin chen rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun/ /nam mkha'i dbyings su kun bsams nas/ /rjes su dran pa bstan pa yin/ /myur du rin chen
'dzin mtshungs 'gyur/ /badzra/ badzra/ thams cad sangs rgyas gzugs rang bzhin/ /nam mkha'i dbyings su mos byas nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin ni/ /sangs rgyas
@#/ /nyid kyi ched du 'gyur/ /bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ mchod gi dngos grub rdzogs so// //rang nyid rdo rje khu tshur ni/ /chags pa'i dga' bas mig
gdangs pa/ /de yis gang la bltas pa ni/ /des kyang rdo rje can du mthong / /oM badzra dr-iSh+Ti ma Ta/ /gsal zhing rab tu 'bar ba'i mig /mig 'bras kun tu 'dren byed
pa| |'bar ba'i lta ba zhes su brjod/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gug byed pa/ /dIp+ta dr-iSh+Ti aM ku sha dzaH/ /khro gnyer bsnyer ba rab 'dzoms pa/ /khros pas mig ni rab tu
g.yo| |khro ba'i lta ba la brten nas/ /'jig rten gsum yang gzhom par bya/ /kro d+ha dr-iSh+Ti hriH/ /ri rab ri bo man+dA ra/ /brten cing mi 'dzums pa yi mig /byams pa'i
lta ba zhes bshad de/ /gdon dang rims dang dug 'joms pa'o/ /dr-i D+hi dr-iSh+Ti tri/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang /
chad pas bcad pa dang / yongs su bskyab pa'i las rdzogs so// //bde ba gzhan ni yon nyid min/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub chos/ /'on kyang
dgug pa bde ba ste/ /de ni kun las khyad par 'phags/ /dus 'dir skal ba chen po ni/ /dkyil 'khor chen po byed pa las/ /dngos grub med kyang bde ba gang //
bde ba kun las khyad par 'phags/ /lha dang mi yi 'jig rten pa'i/ /bde ba bsdus par 'gyur ba yis/ /rdo rje slob dpon bde ba gang / /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /
yang na gang zhig dngos grub thob/ /sangs rgyas nyid du rab shes bya/ /rang gis rtogs pa gang yin pa/ /gzhan dang gang gis shes par 'gyur/ /sar chud rgyal ba'i
gnas dang ldan/ /gsang ba'i dngos grub ster mdzad pa/ /bde ba thob pa gang yin pa/ /de ni gsang ba 'dzin ji bzhin/ /gsang ba yi ni tshogs can chen po/ /'di la zhugs
pa gang yin pa/ /sa thob bar ni shes bya ste/ /mi ldog rgyal ba'i bdag nyid sras/ /rgyal ba'i gnas kyi sa thob kyang / /yid ches par ni mi 'gyur te/ /de yis sa brgyad
kyi bar du/ /theg pa dman pa spong mi 'gyur/ /gsang chen rtog pa 'di ru ni/ /zhugs pa bdag nyid rgyal ba sras/ /theg chen la ni gzhol ba rnams/ /yid ches par ni
'gyur ba ste/ /gsang ba yi ni phan yon ni/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni rab tu mkhyen/ /'dir ni phan yon mdor bsdus pa/ /sangs rgyas bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /yon tan gyi
dbang du byas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //byad pa po dang skyed byed med/ /las dang 'bras bu gang las bshad/ /nga zhes ji skad bshad pa la/ /nga ni byed po skyed
@#/ /byed dang / /nga ni skye dgu'i bdag po yin/ /nga ni sna tshogs bdag po ste/ /byed po skyed byed mes po yin/ /yang gsungs pa/ dag pa de bzhin
gshegs snying po/ /sems dpa'i snying po zhes byar bshad/ /da ni de bzhin gshegs snying po/ /sems can thams cad bdag dang mtshungs/ /mya ngan 'das bcas sa
'og steng / /sa bla 'jig rten 'di sems can/ /ma lus srid pa dag gi gnas/ /sems tsam du ni rab tu 'jug /sems can kun gyi sems gang yin/ /de ni byed po
'byin byed brjod/ /nga ni rgyal po sems dbang phyug /ci phyir nga ni byed por bshad/ /ji skad gsang ba gzhan las gsungs/ /nga nyid rang las byung ba ste/ /mya ngan
'das bcas sa 'og steng / /sa bla srid gsum 'jig rten gsum/ /gang zhig gnas zhes bya ba'i sems/ /gnas med las byung gang yin pa/ /snying po de bzhin
gshegs pa dag pa/ /de nyid rang byung nga nyid do /nga ni rdo rje can yang yin/ /sdug bsngal thams cad spangs pa dang / /nyes pa thams cad zad pas na/ /nga ni byang chub
sems rdo rje/ /nga nyid rang nyid byung ba 'o/ /nga nyid yang ni khyab 'jug ste/ /gzung ba la sogs kun spangs pa'i/ /dag pa de bzhin nyid rnam shes/ /bdag dang
nyon mongs med pa ste/ /de bas nga ni khyab 'jug bshad/ /nga ni de bzhin nyi ma ste/ /ci phyir de nyid ces bshad pa/ /zab mo'i chos ni ngas rtogs pa/ /de phyir rang byung
nga nyid ni/ /nyi ma zhes ni bya bar brjod/ /nga ni zla ba ru brjod de/ /nga ni chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /zhi ba ru ni rtogs par bshad/ /de bas zhi ba chen po yis/ /nga ni zla ba
blo gros che/ /nga ni de bzhin gshin rje ste/ /ji bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /ye shes chen po lhag par bshad/ /de nyid rtogs pa gang yin pa/ /gshin rje nga ste
gshin rje 'dzin/ /dbang po ste/ /dbang po mig 'phrul zhes bya ba/ /'khor ba las rgal pha rol phyin/ /ye shes nor ni bsgrubs pa yis/ /da ni dbang byed dbang po yin//
skye dgu yi ni bdag po ste/ /chos rnams kun gyi rnam pa ni/ /skye ba rtsa nas 'don byed pa/ /sdug bsngal chen po yongs su shes/ /de phyir nga ni skye dgu'i bdag /nga bdag nyid
ni mes po ste/ /nga yis bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs nas/ /thar pa'i grong khyer chen po ru/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bas/ /nga nyid kho na mes po yin/ /nga ni 'dod pa'i 'jig
nyen yin/ /ngo bo nyid dang longs spyod rdzogs/ /sprul pa'i sku ni rab 'jug byed/ /rol chen 'jig rten zhes bya ba/ /'jig rten lta ba ston byed yin/ /srid pa'i 'jigs
@#/ /pa las bsgral yin/ /nyon mongs chen bo rnam par spang / /srid par bshad de/ srid pa'i zhags ba gcod byed pa/ /nga ni srid ba'i rgyal po che/ /
khams gsum pa ni/ rgyud ni khams zhes rab tu brjod/ /byang chub sems zhes bya bar bshad/ /nga ni theg pa gsum 'dzin pas/ /nga ni khams gsum pa ru bshad//
sa 'og ni/ /yang dag de nyid rdo rje che/ /stong nyid de bzhin nyid ces bshad/ /ji ltar sa ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /de ni nga ni chos 'dzin pa/ /sa steng ni/ /sa steng nam mkha' zhes
su brjod/ /nga ni rang bzhin gyis mkha' mtshungs/ /chos dang gang zag bdag med pa/ /nga ni sa stong de nyid bshad/ /me ni/ nga ni gzod nas ma skyes 'byung ba med//
bdag min bdag med nga ni skye dgu'i bdag /srid pa'i 'khri shing gis bcings sems can gdungs/ /nga ni grol byed 'khri shing dag byed pa/ /rlung ni/ /mtshan ma
rnam par bsgoms nas ni/ /mtshan ma med pa 'dus ma byas/ /byang sems 'khri shing zhags pa dag /'thor byed de bzhin rlung yin no/ /nga ni dbang phyug chen po
ste| |rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag po chen po byed/ /nga ni sangs rgyas dbang phyug gzhan ci smros/ /bdud rtsi chen po thar pa'i grong khyer che/ /nga ni dbang bsgyur dbang phyug
che| |nga ni brtul zhugs zhes bshad de/ /nga ni nyon mongs 'dzoms par bshad/ /nga ni rga dang 'chi ba las/ /nges par 'grol bas tshangs par bshad/ /'jig rten gsum
gyi lus su ni/ /zhags pa zhes gang gti mug ni/ /khams gsum 'jig rten gsum yin no/ /nga ni srung ma bran du 'gyur/ /de rnams 'gyur bas khams gsum nga / /gdong
drug ni/ sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang / /chos dang las dang gsang 'dzin bcas/ /rnam pa drug ni 'khor lo che/ /nga ni gdong drug mchog chen po/ /gzhan yang / gza'
dang tshogs sogs gang yin pa/ /nga bdag nyid ces ji ltar rung bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig gdon la sogs pa kun/ /sems las kun tu byung ba'i rlabs/ /nga ni thugs 'dzin
rgyal po ste/ /des na nga ni srid pa'i gnas/ /nga ni 'dod pa ste/ thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che/ /dgongs pa mthar thug nga yis bshad/ /nga ni sems can kun la
'dod/ /de bas nga ni 'dod par bshad/ /thar pa nga ste/ nga nyid thar cing sems can kun/ /so sor yang ni grol bar byed/ /des na rang byung nga nyid ni/ /thar pa 'dzin
pa'i rgyal po yin/ /nga ni myal ba ste/ nga ni bdag dang chos rnams min/ /nga ni chags sdang kun tu bral/ /nga yis 'chi med lam bstan pas/ /nga ni dmyal ba'i dmyal
@#/ /ba pa| |nga ni yi dgas te/ mngon par 'dod pa nga yis 'thob/ /sems can sgom pa smin par byed/ /nga yis dka' ba'i gnas thob pas//
nga ni yi dwags yi dwags skyes/ /dud 'gro nga ste/ 'khor ba'i chu bo brgal dka' las/ /sems can dag ni thams cad gnas/ /ji ltar mi shes rmongs gyur pa/ /de bzhin
nga yis dgrol bar byed/ /gzhan yang nga ni chags pa ste/ /sems can grol ba rjes chags phyir/ /srid pa gcod phyir zhe sdang dang / /gsang mdzod 'dzin pas ser sna
can| |sems can 'dod pas 'dod pa dang / /sems can smin byed sems can nga / /gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rgyal po gang / /de ni nga yis 'jigs byed sras/ /des na
gsang ba chen po yi/ /nga ni chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub gsang 'dzin po/ /de bas nga ni gsang ba'i bdag /yang na byin gyis rlobs pa dang / /bsnyems
bcas sgeg pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ /tha ni de yi steng sbyar nas/ /gang du gsang bar brjod pa 'o/ /dar d+ha ma da ra gsang / /nga ni lnga lnga 'dzin pa yin/ /rma bya chen mo mdzod
ldan ma'i/ /nga ni gsang ba'i bdag por bshad/ /rtsa dang pags pa nu mar ldan/ /mdzod sogs gsus pa 'phyang ba dang / /zla ba'i steng na gar byed pa/ /de rnams
gsang ba'i rgyal po yin/ /sa la bsnyems pa'i gar byed pa/ /rdo rje gar byed skra dkar 'joms/ /dra ba spus len gsus pa can/ /mdzod ldan dang ni gos 'dzin ma/ /yi ge ta
'don zla ba dang / /mchog dang 'jigs byed bzhin ldan ma/ /sgra gcan rdo rje rjes mthun sgra/ /mche ba 'byin pa myos pas khyab/ /de bzhin spyod pa yang dag ldan/ /phreng ldan gti
mug 'joms byed ma/ /spyan 'dren 'dus byas thams cad ma/ /yun ring gar gyi chogs ldan ma/ /rigs kyi gar ni spyod ma dang / /'jigs byed rnam par 'jigs byed dang / /
gar gyi gnas byed ces bya dang / /gar byed rdo rje'i gar byed ma/ /phul byung thams cad 'thor byed ma/ /lnga phung skyabs dang 'dzin byed pa/ /rkang gdub kyis ni bdud kyi tshogs
'joms byed/ /'brug gi bdag po rkang gdub kyis 'dar byed/ /rkang gdub kyis ni yang yang bdag chen sgyel/ /bskyod pa'i 'dar 'dar brten pa sgyel byed pa/ /lag pa rked
pa ji bzhin bskyod pa 'o/ /gar gyi rol pa kun tu sdud byed ma/ /rdo rje sa ma ya yi gar/ /de bzhin ni da ki si ri/ /zas chen gar ma'i gsang ba ste/ /de bas nga ni gsang ba'i
bdag /hA hA hA thA pA tA pa kA ta sa ra mA ra hUM/ rnal 'byor chen po spyan 'dren ma/ /gus ldan ma dang sprul byed gzhan/ /'phrog ma 'joms byed gzhu ma dang / /snying po bdud
@#/ /ma sgra sgrogs ma/ /pheg rdob 'dzin dang drag po dang / /gzhan yang rdo rje ldan par bshad/ /rta sgra'i tshogs ni drug ldan ma/ /'od tshogs kyis
ni mtshan mo 'joms byed ma/ /seng ge yi ni nga ro sgra sgrogs pa/ /rta yi sgra sgrogs sgra gcan ma dang ni/ /gzhan yang gsang ba stug pos khrus byed ma/ /sna tshogs ha ha
sgra yis 'phrog bdag ma/ /spyan bzang yangs ma gsang ba ston byed ma/ /gzhan yang 'bad pas dga' ba nyid byed ma/ /gzhan yang spyan yangs ut+pal gyis brgyan
ma| |sprin 'joms byed cings rnams kun 'joms ma/ /seng ge'i bzhin rol gong nas go rims ldan/ /de 'dra'i 'khor ni dam pa dang ldan ma/ /gzhan yang gsang
ba'i yid la gtam sgrogs pa/ /de bzhin rim gyis dge legs nyid byed ma/ /Tu hUM Tu hUM d+ha ri d+ha da ri/ mahA shri ri sha yang na shri ya ri kaM ma ta sa ta kaM /de kho na nyid kyi
gsang ba rdzogs so// //de yi dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mchog gis/ /rnal 'byor pa ni rol byed na/ /des ni dngos grub thob
par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i mdo yi dbang bshad pa'i/ /sems can spyod pa ji lta bu/ /yang gsungs pa/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bshad pa/ /gsang ba yi ni rab bsgrub
pa| |dang por de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /sgrub pa yi ni rol par bya/ /b+ha ga ci yin brjod par bya/ /'joms bas b+ha ga zhes su brjod/ /gang du nyon mongs 'joms byed
pa| |shes rab lus 'joms nyon mongs pa/ /de bas shes rab b+ha gar brjod/ /de bas rtags ni ci yin brjod/ /rtags ni mtshan ma zhes byar bshad/ /blo ldan shes
rab brtags las byung / /byang chub sems ni thabs chen po/ /de ni rtags su rab tu bsgrags/ /b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su/ /'khor lo'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya/ /ting
nge 'dzin dang gzungs gang yin/ /mkhas pas sgo gnyis gzung bar bya/ /de ni bcug pa zhes bshad de/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por 'gyur/ /de nas dgongs pa bshad pa yin//
b+ha ga ru ni rdzas bsgrub pa/ /gsang rgyud dbang po las gsungs bzhin/ /bsgrub pa dag ni ji ltar bya/ /b+ha gar gur gum phyung nas ni/ /mtshan ma yang ni gzhug par bya/ /rdzas rnams
bzang po thob par 'gyur/ /rnam pa bzhi yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /b+ha ga pad+ma zhes byar brjod/ /mtshan ma rdo rje zhes bshad do/ /rdzas ni pad+ma'i steng bzhag nas/ /rdo rje srub mas
bsrub par bya/ /shin tu chags pas 'dod chags can/ /des ni gsang ba rab bsgrub 'gyur/ /'dod chags chags ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /dngos grub chen por ji ltar 'gyur//
@#/ /'dir ni chags can rab bsgrub 'gyur/ /bden ba nyid du yang dag bshad/ /'dod chags bral ba gsang ba med/ /des ni gsang ba 'grub
mi 'gyur/ /dang ba'i dad pa chen po yis/ /gsang ba'i sbyor ba las byung chags/ /bsgrub pa la ni 'jug 'gyur ba/ /de yis bsgrub pa gdon mi za/ /chags
dang bral ba'i sdig pa ni/ /gang zhig gsang ba chags bral 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub spyod byed ba/ /sdig chen kha na ma tho che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu smad/
chos la kha na ma tho med/ /de yis gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur/ /rnam pa thams cad nyon mongs kun/ /'joms pa 'dod chags mchog yin no/ /'dod chags zhe sdang
sogs nyon mongs/ /rtogs dang mtshungs pa'i chos med do/ /skye dgu kun bsad bsod nams ji lta bu/ /ji srid 'khor bar bcing bar du/ /srid pa zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /
'khor ba'i btson ra 'di ru ni/ /sems can kun gyis gzhom par bya/ /gang zhig gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa/ /des ni gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur/ /nor ni 'khor ba zhes bshad
de| |sems can de rnams nyon mongs 'gyur/ /gang zhig gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa/ /byang chub sems ni rab 'grub 'gyur/ /bud med rnams dang lhan cig rtse/ /des ni
gsang ba 'grub par 'gyur/ /rang gi rigs kyi lha mo gang / /rig pa'i lha mo bla med ngang / /lhan cig rnal 'byor rol pa yis/ /rol ba tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /gal te rigs
ni 'grub 'dod na/ /brdzun pa'i tshig kyang smra bar bya/ /chos kun dngos po med pa ste/ /brjod min tshig gi spyod yul min/ /med pa gang yin brdzun tshig ldan/ /rigs pa'i bzlas pa
bden pa yin/ /gal te dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub 'dod na/ /sems can bsad bya de bzhin bza' bar bya/ /sems can chags pa zhes bshad de/ /ming dang gzugs la kun tu
chags/ /bkug nas zos par gyur na ni/ /bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur/ /'khor ba spangs kyang chos min 'gyur ba ni/ /'khor ba spong ba gang yin pa/ /sems can don la
rgyab phyogs 'gyur/ /blo ldan theg pa dman dga' ba/ /de ni rtag tu nyes ldan yin/ /mya ngan 'das la mngon dga' na/ /sems can don la phyir phyogs 'gyur/ /blo ldan theg pa dman
dga' ba/ /de ni rtags nyes ldan yin/ /ser sna can ni rigs bsgrub 'gyur/ /tshul khrims rnam par dag 'gyur zhing / /srog gi phyir yang gtong mi byed/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs
ldan 'gyur ba/ /des ni gsang ba rab bsgrub 'gyur/ /drag dang ldan pa'i sems ldan pa/ /des ni 'grub par 'gyur bar 'dod/ /sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa'i phyir//
@#/ /rtag tu drag po nyid du 'gyur/ /sdig pa sdang ba rnams sbong na/ /des ni gsang pa rab 'grub 'gyur/ /chos min spyod pa rnal 'byor mchog grub yin/ /gzung
dang 'dzin pa chos shes pa/ /gang tshe spong bar gyur pa ni/ /rtag tu chos mchog spyod pa ste/ /des ni gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur/ /srid gsum mngon bar chags pa sa rnal 'byor
bsgrub/ /srid gsum la ni chags par 'gyur/ /sems tsam du ni rtogs pa'i phyir/ /de ni rnal 'byor bsgrub pa yin/ /rtag tu 'dod pa'i 'dod chags rgyal 'gyur gang /
gsang ba chen por brtan par bsgrub pa yin/ /'dod par bya ba 'dod pa ste/ /'dod ba'i 'dod chags zhes bshad do/ /rab tu dgas la chags pa ste/ /blo ldan blo gros de
la chags/ /gci ba khyor ba gang 'thungs nas/ /bshad ba cung zad bza' bar bya/ /thams cad dag pa'i brtul zhugs kyis/ /myur du dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/ /
gci ba rdo rje zhes bshad de/ /bshad ba pad+ma yang dag ldan/ /dga' ba'i chos la reg pas ni/ /de nas thar pa'i grong khyer 'gro /rnal 'byor chen po b+ha ga 'thungs/ /rnal
'byor rab tu bsgrub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes gang / /b+ha ga yi ni sgra ru bsgrags/ /gang zhig bdud rtsi btung ba btung / /rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur//
bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu/ /dkyil 'khor chen po brtag par bya/ /rigs kyi lha mo rnal 'byor byung / /rig pa sdug ba nyid yin te/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba brtag byas
na| |skad cig de la rang 'grub 'gyur/ /khro zhing gtum la drag po ste/ /rdo rje yi ni rigs su 'gyur/ /gang zhig sdug bsngal rnams la khro/ /'khor ba'i sbyor 'byung las sdang ba//
rdo rje rnal 'byor phun tshogs 'gyur/ /rigs ni nyams pa 'gyur ba yin/ /dge ba thams cad spangs nas ni/ /chos min pa ni yang dag spyad/ /bya min byed pa'i rnal 'byor
pas| |las kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnam par rtog pa kun spangs nas/ /dge ba la ni rab tu 'jug /chos la lta bar gyur pa nyid/ /chos min kun tu spyod mi bya//
bya min gang zhig dngos med de/ /de nyid brtan par byed par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po de lta bus/ /rtog pa chen pos rab 'grub 'gyur/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa'i
drug pa gsang ba'i tshogs chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po shin tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor rdo rje rtse mo las/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dgongs pa rnam
par 'grel pa zhes bya ba rnam par bshad pa ste le'u gsum ba rdzogs so// //rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba las/ de bzhi
@#/ /gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mchog gsang ba'i chos kyi gnas mchog tu gsang ba yang rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas dang
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum gshegs pa sras bcas la/ /yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas/ /mchog tu rmad byung rigs pa'i rgyud/

mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /hUM a dza ka ra/ /d+ha ra ho/ d+ha ra sa/ oM a dra na ha ha he wa ra d+hi d+ha d+ha/ d+hi d+hA ra Ni/ ma he to raMka kra NaM/ ka pa tse hUM baM/ de la gsang ba mchog tu
gsang / /ye shes dam pa'i rang bzhin te/ /rgyal po gsang ba'i mdo dbang po/ /theg pa chen po kun du bsdus/ /rigs 'byung blo ldan chen po dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad
'byung ba dang / /rdo rje kun dbang cho ga ni/ /shin tu rmad byung rab bshad bya/ /ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru ni/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje can kun 'byung / /rmad byung chos kyi rgyud chen po/ /thar pa mchog
tu stan pa ste/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug rnam snang mdzad/ /thugs ka nas ni rgyud 'di byung / /kun tu bzang po rdo rje'i bdag/ phyag na rdo rje 'od po che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems
dpa' che/ /don yod dbang phyug dam pa ste/ /theg pa chen po byang chub sems/ /bden pa dam tshig ces bya ba/ /thub ba chen po chos phung po/ /stong phrag dag ni grangs med
gsungs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog chen gyi/ /chos kyi mngon bar rtogs pa bshad/ /so sor rtogs ba'i mngon rtogs dang / /de bzhin mngon par byang chub dang / /dpe byad
mchog ni mngon du byung / /de bzhin ye shes thob pa nyid/ /ye shes chen po'i chos 'di ni/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni mngon rtogs pa shad/ /theg pa chen bo'i mngon rtogs
yin| |shin tu gsang ba'i tshul chen po/ /rang sems so sor rtogs pa ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul chen po/ /pha rol phyin drug spyod pa mchog /theg pa chen po
mngon par bsdus/ /mthar thug sa te sa chen po/ /sangs rgyas sa ni bla na med/ /theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs/ /ye shes thob par rtogs byed pa/ /spyod pa bcu yi
byang chub che/ /pha rol phyin pa dam pa bcu/ /sa bcu kun tu rtogs pa ste/ /theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/ /byang chub chen po rgya che ba/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
mchog |kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byang chub/ /theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/ /mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ /theg pa chen po
chos kyi mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /chos kyi gnas ni yongs su gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu dag
@#/ /mkha' mnyam dang ni mtshungs pa yin/ /gnas ngan len ni kun las grol/ /rnam par rtog pa kun las grol/ /nyon mongs dri ma kun dag pa/ /dang por
zla ba bzhin du mthong / /thugs rje'i brtse ba yang dag byung / /sems can yongs su 'dzin par byed/ /byang chub sems ni dag pa che/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni gos pa med/ /dge ba'i
chos kyis kun tu gang / /nyon mongs thams cad nges par 'joms/ /zla chen gang ba'i dbus su ni/ /byang chub zla ba gnyis pa ste/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum byang
chub| |yang dag blangs las byung ba nyid/ /dam pa'i chos mchog grangs med pa/ /sbyin pa'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan/ /sa dang sa ru rtogs byed pa/ /ye shes dag pa
zag pa med/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /de ni rdo rje shin tu brtan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin/ /snang ba med cing gnas med pa/ /ma skyes ma byas
dag pa ste/ /skye dang 'jig pa rnam par spangs/ /mi tshig mi chod mi phyed pa/ /lhag ma med pa'i chos kyi sku/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid yang dag byung / /rdo rje'i sku ni bla na med//
sku dang gsang ba de bzhin spyod/ /spyod yul kun tu rtogs ba dang / /lnga po de dag kun thun mong / /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid can/ /mngon par byang chub rnam pa
lnga| |chos kyi ye shes bla na med/ /lnga po de dag gsang zhes bya/ /snying por yang ni de dag gsungs/ /gang phyir de na kun grub pa'i phyir/ /sngon ni don kun grub par byed/ /bcom
ldan kun tu bzang po dang / /rdo rje'i las ni bla na med/ /rdo rje'i dbyings ni brtan pa'i bdag /rnam par snang mdzad bla na med/ /de dag gsang ba'i mtshan yin te/ /rnal 'byor

gyi ni gnas skabs thob/ /de nas snying po ni/ oM tsit+ta pra ti bo d+ha ka ro mi/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da lA mi/ oM taSh+Tha badzra/ oM badzra At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA sta thA a haM/
de nas sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /thub pa yi ni thugs kar bzhugs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsung / /rdo rje'i rig pa 'di brjod do/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi sa
bo d+hi Di D+ha badzra tiSh+Tha/ /sangs rgyas grags chen thams cad kyis/ /rig pa 'di ni brjod pas na/ /rnam par snang mdzad thub chen po/ /de nyid ye shes mngon sangs rgyas/ /de nas
sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /nyid kyi thugs las byung bar gyur/ /chos bzhi'i rnal 'byor chen po ni/ /byin nas lha mo dbang bskur 'gyur/ /sems can kun don yang
dag ldan/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed/ /mkha' mtshungs brjod las yang dag byung / /rin chen chen pos dbang bskur 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye
@#/ /shes gang / /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /rnam kun mkhyen nyid ye shes che/ /'jig rten dbang phyug chen po byin/ /bya ba kun la don
yod pa/ /dga' ldan la sogs rnam par 'phrul/ /gdul bar bya ba thabs kyi las/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlabs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba gang / /
byang chub sems ni tshul chen po/ /nyon mongs kun las rnam par grol/ /sangs rgyas gtso bo chen pos byin/ /dbang bskur tsam gyis mod la ni/ /gsang ba'i ming
ni yang dag byung / /sangs rgyas kun bdag rgyal po ste/ /kun mchog dbang bskur dam pa 'o/ /de nas snying po ni/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta e shwa dz+ya a b+hi She ka hUM/ de nas
sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /chos ni mngon sum gyur mdzad pa/ /stug po'i gnas nas gshegs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas lhan cig sna tshogs che/ /rnal 'byor dang
bcas bdag nyid che/ /rdo rje'i dbang po'i gnas su gshegs/ /de nas ngo bo nyid sku las/ /slar yang byung ba spros par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las chen
po| |ci bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /rdo rje'i dbus su bzhugs par 'gyur/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas mdzad pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni mdzad pa bstan/ /
gsang ba rol pa'i 'khor lo ru/ /sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchog /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid che/ /sna tshogs rnal 'byor bdag nyid che/ /'khor lo thams
cad bzhugs par 'gyur/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du/ /ci bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /sangs rgyas rol pa yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas ston pa
bzhugs par 'gyur/ /dus gsum ye shes rjes mthun ni/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rnal 'byor brjod/ /hUM badzra satwa/ oM badzra rat+na hrIHbadzra d+harma/ aHbadzra karma/ bskal pa
grangs med gsum sngon du/ /bcom ldan byang chub mdzad pa gang / /rnal 'byor sems dpa' bzhir bcas pa'i/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor snang bar bgyi/ /byang chub chen
po chos kyi mchog /byang chub sems ni tshul chen po/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyi/ /zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang / /pha rol phyin pa spyad pa ni/ /sngon du bcom ldan
spyad pa gang / /rdo rje rin chen sbyor ba yis/ /zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang / /theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs/ /chos kyi mchog ni rab rtogs pa/ /rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba
yis| |zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang / /sems can smin cing grol bar byed/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa rab tu 'jug /brtson 'grus dang ldan las chen po/ /zla ba yi ni dkyil
@#/ /'khor snang / /byang chub sems ni gsang chen po/ /bsod nams tshogs dang shes rab dang / /byang chub spyod pa rab sbyor ba/ /rgyal po bzhi ni rab
tu 'byung / /go cha'i sbyor ba gang yin dang / /spyod pa de bzhin mngon rtogs te/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub che/ /rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung / /byang chub snying po mngon
rtog dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur dang / /chos kyi 'khro los brtul ba dang / /rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung / /chos mchog mngon par rtogs pa dang / /ting
nge 'dzin sgo gzungs dang ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad thabs chen po/ /rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung / /rgyal chen rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / /de bzhin chos ni mngon
rdzogs dang / /chos mchog byang chub chen po dang / /rnam pa bzhi ni yongs su byung / /mgon po thugs ka nas spros nas/ /rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung / /phyogs rnams
thams cad kun nas ni/ /sa ni thams cad g.yos byas nas/ /phyogs rnams thams cad kun nas ni/ /'od kyi snang bas gsal bar byas/ /mgon chen sangs rgyas
thams cad kyis/ /ched du brjod pa ched brjod do/ /e ma'o gsang ba'i chos chen po/ /e ma'o ye shes bla na med/ /e ma'o rol pa'i 'khor lo'o/ /e ma'o
sangs rgyas rmad byung che/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thabs chen po/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar ldan pa nyid/ /mi snang rang bzhin chos rnams ni/ /'di ni snang ba bcas par dmigs/ /
rgyal po rnal 'byor che de rnams/ /phyogs rnams kun tu gsal byed cing / /chos kyi sku yi ting 'dzin brnyes/ /nam mkha' dang mtshungs rmad byung ba/ /gang zhig shar gyi
phyogs cha ru/ /sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /chos kyi dbyings su yang dag spros/ /chos kyi sku ru spros nas ni/ /chos kyi dbyings ni stug
por 'gyur/ /gang phyir shar du yang dag byung / /mi bskyod pa ni bdag nyid byas/ /lho ru rdo rje rin chen te/ /nub tu rdo rje chos yin no/ /byang du rdo rje las nyid de/ /
chos kyi sku ru ldan par 'gyur/ /ma lus mchog tu brtan pa yi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad phyogs bzhi ru/ /mi bskyod rdo rje rin chen dbang / /don yod grub pa bla na med//
rgyal po bzhi ni phyogs bzhi ru/ /rdo rje'i steng du bzhugs par 'gyur/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams bzhi dag tu/ /mnyam par dmigs nas bzhugs par 'gyur//
rdo rje rnal 'byor rgyal po che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag bsdus/ /chos dbyings brtan pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /gsang ba kun du khyab par bsdus/ /dbus su mgon
@#/ /po rnam snang mdzad/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur ba/ /phyogs dang mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kun/ /brtan par mdzad nas rab tu
bzhugs/ /gdug pa kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal/ /thub pa'i skyes mchog mi bskyod pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas/ /shar gyi phyogs su yang dag
bzhugs/ /dbang bskur ba ni rgyal po che/ /nam mkha' thub pa'i skyes mchog ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas/ /lho yi phyogs su bzhugs
par gyur/ /dag pa'i chos 'dzin rgyal po che/ /chos 'dzin gtso bo chen po ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas/ /nub kyi phyogs su bzhugs par
gyur| |sangs rgyas mdzad pa 'dzin rgyal po/ /don yod grub pa bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas/ /byang gi phyogs su bzhugs par
gyur| |mi bskyod rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /mkha' snying rin chen 'byung ldan yin/ /'jig rten dbang phyug 'od dpag med/ /rdo rje las ni don yod grub/ /gsang
zhing shin tu gsang ba mchog /chos dbyings brtan pa gang yin pa/ /de nyid mgon po rnam snang mdzad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag por bshad/ /sangs rgyas
thams cad phyogs bzhi ru/ /sbyin pa bzhi ni rab tu bshad/ /phyogs mtshams drug ni brtan mdzad nas/ /rnam par snang mdzad yang dag ldan/ /shar gyi sangs rgyas
dbang phyug rgyal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs mi mnga'/ /thub pa mi bskyod snang ba des/ /snying po bzhi ni gsungs par 'gyur/ /hUM badzra satwa/ dzaHbadzra rA dza/ ho badzra rA ga /
sa badzra sA d+hu/ dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya ba/ /de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' sogs/ /'jigs pa mi mnga' sems dpa' bzhi/ /mgon po yi ni thugs las byung / /
phyag na rdo rje bzang po mchog /rdo rje lcags kyu chen po bsnams/ /rdo rje chags pa bdud chen po/ /rdo rje legs pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje rgyal po bzhi thub pa/ /thub pa'i thugs
ka nas byung ba/ /grangs bzhi dang ni ldan pa dag /'khor lo'i rim gyis bzhugs par gyur/ /rdo rje rin chen skal ba che/ /rin chen 'byung ldan rab grags pa/ /lha yi
bdag po sangs rgyas chos/ /snying po bzhi ni gsungs par 'gyur/ /oM badzra rat+na/ oM badzra te dzaH/ trAM badzra ke tu/ hA badzra hA sa/ rdo rje rin chen stobs po che/ /grangs
bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /rin chen rgyal po las byung ba/ /thub pa'i thugs ka nas byung ba/ /rdo rje rin chen rin po che/ /rdo rje gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul che/ /rdo rje
@#/ /rgyal mtshan shin tu mthong / /rdo rje bzhad pa rdzu 'phrul che/ /de dag re re las kyang ni/ /rgyal po grangs med rab tu byung / /g.yas dang
g.yon dang rgyab dag dang / /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun du bzhugs/ /dag pa'i chos ni ye shes che/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med/ /shes
rab pha rol phyin dag pas/ /snying po bzhi ni gsungs par 'gyur/ /hrIHbadzra d+harma/ /d+h+rIHbadzra tIk+Sh+Na/ maM badzra he tu/ raM badzra b+hA Sha/ chos kyi rgyal po bzhi yang
ni| |mgon po'i thugs ka nas byung ba/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /'khor lo rim bzhin bzhugs par gyur/ /chos rnams kun la don yod pa/ /
spyod pa yi ni slob dpon mchog /don yod grub pa rgyal po ches/ /snying po bzhi ni gsungs par 'gyur/ /kaM badzra karma/ haM badzra ra k+Sha/ hUM badzra yak+Sha/ baM badzra
muSh+Ti| |kun kyang 'khor lo yang dag ldan/ /ye shes dag pa mchog gi rnams/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'khor lo ni/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
mchog /sngon gyi byang chub sems gang ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par byung / /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni/ /rdo rje rin chen nyid du 'gyur/ /shes rab
pha rol phyin dag pa/ /de ni rdo rje chos mchog ldan/ /thabs la mkhas pas 'khor lo ni/ /rdo rje las su rnam par 'phrul/ /de nas chos ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs
pa'i rten/ /byung gyur byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa bla na med/ /byang chub sems ni mchog tu 'dzin/ /dag pa'i chos kyi 'dul mdzad pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po che//
dbu ma'i chos las rnam par byung / /gzhan yang / rjes su brtse dang de bzhin sbyin/ /shes rab thabs dang yang dag ldan/ /chos kyi rgyal po bzhi po de/ /rnam par snang mdzad thugs las
byung | |'du shes 'du shes med pa min/ /btags pa ma yin gnas pa med/ /bdag dang chos nyid lta ba min/ /rnam rtog las ni byung ba min/ /ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru ni/ /so sor snang ba
yang dag byung / /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yis ni/ /chos kyi longs spyod 'di lta bu/ /thams cad brjod pa dang bral zhing / /zhi dang phra ba blta bar dka'/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni dgongs
mdzad cing / /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nyid theg pa che rang bzhin/ /mdzad chen po yi rang bzhin mchog /shes rab chen po thabs chen po/ /theg
pa chen po'i mngon par bsdus/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mngon par rtogs/ /sngon du bcom ldan mdzad gang yin/ /sems dpa' bzhi po de rnams te/ /theg chen mngon par rtogs
@#/ /par 'dod/ /byang chub kyi ni sems de las/ /thub pa mi bskyod rnam par byung / /sems de yang ni rnam pa bzhi/ /rnam pa bzhi ni yang dag byung / /byang chub sems
gang de rdo rje/ /rdo rje phyag na rdo rje yin/ /sgrol dang grol dang dbugs 'byin pa/ /lcags kyu 'dzin pa rab tu gnas/ /sems dpa' bstan pa don yod pa/ /ye shes de nyid shin tu
chags| |slar yang bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ /legs pa las ni yang dag byung / /gang zhig mgon po thub 'byin pa/ /sems can rjes su 'dzin mdzad pa/ /rin chen 'byung ldan
zhes bya ba/ /de ni slar yang rnam pa bzhi/ /chos kyi sbyin pa rin po che/ /mi 'jigs gzi brjid yang dag gnas/ /byams pa rgyal mtshan yang dag brjod/ /zang zing bzhad par yang
dag ldan/ /shes rab pha rol phyin rgyal po/ /tshe dpag med ni rnam pa bzhi/ /so sor rig pa mngon par rdzogs/ /ting nge 'dzin sgo pad+ma can/ /sdug bsngal gcod pa shin tu rno/ /
chos kyi 'khor lo cha dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul gzhan/ /brjod du med pa'i chos kyi mchog /don yod grub pa mdzad pa ste/ /thabs de yang ni rnam pa bzhi/ /sems
can la sogs 'dul ba las/ /rdo rje las ni mchod pa che/ /theg pa gzhan du mi 'jug pa/ /rdo rje bsrung bar rab tu brjod/ /gdug pa gdul zhing nges byed pa/ /phyir mi ldog pa khu tshur

yin| |de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i mtshan ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'/ rdo rje rgyal po/ rdo rje chags pa/ rdo rje legs pa/ rdo rje rin che/ rdo rje gzi brjid/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan/ rdo rje bzhad pa/ rdo rje
