chos| rdo rje rnon po/ rdo rje rgyu/ rdo rje smra ba/ rdo rje las/ rdo rje srung ba/ rdo rje gnod sbyin/ rdo rje khu tshur/ de la dang po ni rdo rje sems dpa'/ rdo rje chos/ rdo rje rin chen/ rdo rje las/ de nas rnam grangs mi
bskyod pa/ rin chen 'byung ldan/ 'od dpag tu med pa/ don yod par grub pa/ de nas 'di rnams gsang ba'i snying po ni/ hUM oM A ha/ rgyal po'i snying po ni/ oM hUM hrI hoH/ bcu drug gi snying po ni/ hUM

dzaHho sA/ oM AM twAM ha/ hI d+hi maM raM/ kaM haM hUM baM/ shin tu gsang ba'i rgyud chen po 'di'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa rnam pa bcu drug tu yang dag par byung ba gang yin pa de ni rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa
dam pa'o/ /byang chub spyod pa'i mthu yis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyi pha rol phyin/ /de bas pha rol phyin ldan pa/ /rdo rje sems mar brjod par bya/ /bsdu ba yi ni dngos po bzhi/ /so sor rtogs pa mngon

par rdzogs/ /chos bzhi gcig tu gyur pa ni/ /rdo rje rin chen ma ru brjod/ /gsang ba'i chos kyi ye shes ni/ /de nyid pha rol phyin pa mchog /pha rol phyin pa che las byung / /rdo rje chos mar brjod par

bya| |sbyor ba yang dag shes pa gang / /rdo rje las mar brjod par bya/ /rgyal po pha rol phyin bzhi ni/ /rdo rje pha rol phyin pa mchog /gang phyir rnam par rol pa mchog /sgeg mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin//
@#/ /brgyan pa'i lus can yid 'phrog pa/ /phreng ba tshul khrims pha rol phyin/ /ched du brjod pa ched du brjod/ /glu ma bzod pa'i pha rol phyin/ /myur du sangs rgyas ster byed pa/ /gang
ma brtson 'grus pha rol phyin/ /'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pa/ /me tog bsam gtan pha rol phyin/ /kun tu mtshungs par 'gro ba yi/ /bdug pa shes rab pha rol phyin/ /dri nga mi dge las
phyir phyogs/ /thabs ni dri dang yang dag ldan/ /phyogs rnams kun tu snang byed pa/ /smon lam snang ba chen mo yin/ /thob pa'i pha rol phyin zhes pa/ /stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa mchog /mi shes
mun pa 'joms byed pa/ /lha mo ye shes pha rol phyin/ /bdud rnams thams cad pham byed pa/ /lha mo mi thub pha rol phyin/ /byang chub rdzogs pa'i byang chub che/ /rdo rje'i pha rol phyin pa'i
tshul| |chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad ma/ /bdag med chos kyi rang bzhin mchog /rdo rje'i lha mo yang dag byung / /rdo rje pha rol phyin pa mchog /de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i ming ni/

rdo rje sems ma/ rdo rje rin chen ma/ rdo rje chos ma/ rdo rje las ma/ rdo rje sgeg mo/ rdo rje phreng ba ma/ rdo rje glu ma/ rdo rje gar ma/ rdo rje me tog ma/ rdo rje bdug pa ma/ rdo rje dri ma/ rdo rje mar me ma/
rdo rje tho ba ma/ rdo rje ye shes ma/ rdo rje mi thub ma/ rdo rje las ma/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen mo/ rnam pa bzhi ni rab tu 'jug /sems can dgug pa'i thabs chen po/ /rdo rje
lcags kyu zhes byar bshad/ /byang chub spyod pa la spyod la/ /rdo rje zhags par rab tu bsgrags/ /theg pa gzhan la 'dod med pa/ /de ni rdo rje lcags sgrog bshad/ /chos rnams thams cad skye
pa med/ /rab tu 'od gsal gzod nas zhi/ /rdo rje theg pa theg chen po/ /rdo rje dril bu zhes byar brjod/ /de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i ming dag ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu/ rdo rje zhags pa/ rdo rje

lcags sgrog /rdo rje dril bu/ de nas pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs kyi 'khor lo de dag thams cad kyi snying po ni/ hUM trAM hrIM ho/ /rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi'o/ /dzaHhUM baM hoH/ 'khor lo'i rol pa la
gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/ /chos kyi longs spyod rdo rje can/ /chos sku bla na med par 'gyur/ /dbus kyi sangs rgyas bzhi/ /'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje
rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun/ /rnal 'byor ting 'dzin 'thob mdzad pa/ /re re zhing yang rdo rje ni/ /grangs med pas kyang yongs su bskor/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung / /dag pa'i chos

kyi tshul chen po/ /de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni/ oM satwa badzrI/ oM rat+na badzrI/ oM d+harma badzri/ oM karma badzrI/ oM badzra lA s+ye/ oM badzra mA le/ oM badzra gI ti/ oM badzra n-ir t+ya/ oM badzra puSh+pe/ oM badzra d+hU pe/ oM

badzra gan+d+he/ oM badzra A lo ke /oM badzra aM ku sha /oM badzra pA sha/ oM badzra s+pho Ta/ oM badzra g+haN+De/ de nas 'di dag thams cad kyi thun mong gi snying po ni/ hUM| mgon po rnam par snang mdzad che/ /'khor
@#/ /los bsgyur ba chen po bzhi/ /sems dpa' chen po bcu drug dang / /gsang chen lha mo bcu gnyis dang / /sgo srung ba ni bzhi dag ste/ /sum cu rtsa bdun las mi nyung / /
gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi po ni/ /phyis kyi pha rol phyin pa mchog /gsang ba'i lha mo kun las ni/ /rjes thog nyid du yang dag byung / /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid ches/ /sum cu rtsa
bdun bgrang mi bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad thugs ka nas/ /chos kyi rigs mchog yang dag byung / /byang chub sems las kun tu byung / /mi bskyod la sogs tshogs chen po/ /nga yis
rdo rje rigs su brjod/ /phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che/ /sbyin pa'i spyod pa kun tu byung / /rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa/ /nga yis rin chen rigs su bshad/ /rin chen rdo rje bdag nyid che//
sbyin pa spyod pa kun tu byung / /dag pa'i chos la kun tu byung / /tshe dpag med pa la sogs pa/ /de ni pad+ma'i rigs su bshad/ /rdo rje chos ni bdag nyid che/ /grub pa'i las las kun
tu byung / /don yod grub pa la sogs las/ /de ni las kyi rigs su bshad/ /nam mkha'i mdzod ni las chen po/ /rdo rje ji bzhin lha mo yang / /lha mo ji bzhin bstan te 'dra/ /ji ltar
bstan pa de bzhin zhi/ /ji ltar zhi ba de bzhin byung / /rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod mtshungs/ /shar gyi phyogs su yang dag bzhugs/ /rdo rje rin chen rin chen mchog /lho yi phyogs su
yang dag bzhugs/ /rgyal po 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon/ /nub kyi phyogs su yang dag bzhugs/ /bya ba kun la don yod pa/ /byang phyogs su ni bzhugs par 'gyur/ /dbus su mgon po rnam

snang mdzad/ /kun mkhyen ye shes rnal 'byor che/ /zla ba gang ba bzhin du zhi/ /rdo rje 'khor lo bla na med/ /gang phyir kun tu sngon 'gro ba/ /rdo rje byang chub sems don ldan/ /de las spyod pa de las chos//
de las spyod pa spyad dka' ba/ /sems dpa' chen po bla med pa/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor bzhugs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gcig gis/ /mgon po la ni gsol ba btab/ /thub pa'i dbang
phyug rdo rje sems/ /mgon po la ni gsol ba 'debs/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag lus/ /khyod la brten nas de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun/ /khyod la brten nas
byung bar gyur/ /dang po'i thugs ni rnal 'byor che/ /byang sems shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /kye ma sems can 'di sdug bsngal/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi snod min pa/ /sems can kun gyi don ched
du| |'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dam pa gsungs/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug gis/ /mgon po'i gsung ni gsan nas su/ /'khor lo'i sbyor ba gsungs
par 'gyur/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /'khor lo chen po grong khyer che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs las byung / /snying po'i chos mchog rnal 'byor ldan/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i bstan pa
@#/ /yi| |sems can 'di dag gdul bya min/ /de rnams bde ba'i don ched du/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon cho ga'i tshul/ /bdag nyid ji
bzhin rnal 'byor byas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob 'gyur ba/ /de la dang por rab bshad bya/ /de ru sems can thams cad kun/ /shin tu brtan par rab 'jug na/ /sangs rgyas byang
chub rdo rje nyid/ /thob 'gyur de la the tshom med/ /theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/ /sangs rgyas byang chub shin tu gsang / /thar pa mchog tu bstan pa nyid/ /sngon du gzhung mchog
mnyan par bya/ /bskal pa brgya phrag dag tu ni/ /ji ste mngon par brtson byas kyang / /gang zag bzhi ni 'jig rten du/ /bsgrubs kyang 'grub pa nyid mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni ma
skyes dang / /the tshom ldan pa nyid dang ni/ /bka' bzhin du ni mi byed pa/ /dad pa med nyid 'grub mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar dus gsum gshegs de bzhin/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed
nas| |dkon mchog gsum la dad byas te/ /the tshom med par byed pa'i mchog/ khyim pa dang ni rab tu byung / /phyogs ni gnyis po 'dis bsgrub bya/ /ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham pa ru//
go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya/ /byang chub sems ni lhur blangs nas/ /lha gzhan 'dod pa brtson mi bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la dad bya ste/ /de gzhol ba la brtson par bya/ /
srog gcod rku dang 'khrig pa dang / /rdzun dang myos byed rnam par spang / /khyim pa'i sdom pa la gnas nas/ /de tshe rig pa'i rgyal po sgrub/ /gal te de ni rab byung gyur/ /sdom pa gsum la yang dag
gnas/ /so sor thar dang byang chub sems/ /rig 'dzin sdom pa mchog yin no/ /zla ba'am yang na lo re'o/ /de bzhin yang na lo gcig tu/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /sngon du
rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya/ /nyin re zhing ni ci nus par/ /thun gsum du ni cho ga bsgrub/ /rtog pa 'di ni thun bzhi ru/ /ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham par ni/ /sdig pa thams cad bshags
par bya/ /bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang / /sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba gdab/ /de yi bsod nams byang chub bsngo/ /de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi/ /sangs rgyas bla med thams
cad la/ /gsol ba gdab cing rab btud nas/ /zhabs la mnyam bzhag phyag bya 'o/ /ji skad gzhung rgya che las gsung / /phyag rgya bzhi ni sbyor ba yis/ /rgyud gzhan dag ni thams cad

kyi| |rdo rje'i sngags ni rab brjod bya/ /de la snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzo pa s+thA nA yA At+mA naM ni r+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta

pU dzA a b+hi She kA ya At+mA naM ni r+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA pra bar ta na ya At+mA naM ni r+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma pra bar ta ya
@#/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA karma Ne At+ma naM ni r+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru mAM/ phyag rgya dang bcas cho gar ldan/ /yang dag nyid du rab
bshad bya/ /sor mo thams cad sbyar ba ni/ /rdo rje thal mor rab tu brjod/ /sa phyogs gtsang mar 'dug nas ni/ /mkhas pas yan lag kun phyag bya/ /rdo rje thal mo brkyang
nas ni/ /rgyal ba rnams la dbul bar bya/ /mgo bos de bzhin byas nas ni/ /mkhas pas dpral bas phyag bya 'o/ /mgo bo nas ni phab byas nas/ /de bzhin kha yis phyag
bya'o| |de bzhin snying gar bzhag byas nas/ /spyi bo nas ni phyag bya 'o/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor pas phyag bya/ /slar yang cho ga la gnas te/ /mchod
pas cho ga dang ldan pa/ /spos dang me tog mar me dang / /dri dang phreng ba byug pa ni/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran byas nas/ /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /sbyin pa rnam
bzhi'i sbyor ba yis/ /ci nus par ni mkhas pas dbul/ /gtsang zhing gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan/ /gtsang ma'i grogs dang lhan cig tu/ /rdo rje'i sdom pa bla med pa/ /bslab pa'i
gnas ni blang bar bya/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi'i sbyor ba yi/ /dad cing de la rab gzhol bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /slob dpon yang ni phyi ma yin/ /nyin re zhing ni ci
nus par/ /khrus bzhi dag ni rab tu bya/ /rnal 'byor ji ltar khrus bya ba/ /go rims bzhin du rab tu bshad/ /sdom pa gsum la rab tu gnas/ /dang po khrus su brjod pa yin/ /gnyis
pa rgyud las gsungs pa yi/ /bshags dang gsol ba 'debs la sogs/ /phyag rgya bcing ba gsum pa ste/ /bzhi pa chu ste tha ma yin/ /khrus kyi cho ga 'di yis ni/ /mkhas pas
'dir ni khrus bya'o/ /gos ni lan gsum brje ba yi/ /sgrub pa pos ni cho ga bya/ /sdom pa la ni legs gnas pa/ /gos ni dang por brje ba dang / /gnyis pa cho ga bsgrub
pa dang / /gsum pa ngo tsha khrel yod pa/ /gtsang ma'i gos ni gsum po dag /lan gsum du ni brje bar bya/ /gang la kha na ma tho med/ /thams cad bza' zhing bsten
par bya/ /sha dang chang dang sgog pa sogs/ /bza' ba min pa rnam par spang / /dri nga ba dang mi gtsang nyid/ /bza' dang btung ba rnam par spang / /gzhan la gnod pa dang
ldan pa/ /lus kyi phyir yang bya ba min/ /'khrig pa bdun dang yang dag ldan/ /mi sdug sgom pas spang bar bya/ /yid gzhungs mkhas shing gsal ba dang / /theg
pa chen po'i don sems pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rgya che/ /shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs/ /klog pa dang ni bsam pa dang / /yang dag yang du gsol ba
@#/ /gdab/ /dgra dang grogs dang bar ma la/ /sems snyoms mi 'jigs rab tu byin/ /snyen cing bden par smra ba yis/ /zhe sdang 'joms byed byams
pa bsgom/ /chos dang gang zag bdag med cing / /'dus byas dang ni 'khrul pa tsam/ /blo ldan brtan pas brtag par bya/ /'dus byas kun la rmongs mi bya/ /'tsho ba'i srog
gi phyir yang ni/ /byang chub sems ni dor mi bya/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /shes rab dril bu zhes bya gzhan/ /
slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /sbyor ba lhod par mi bya zhing / /cho ga ston pa lhur blang bya/ /pha rol phyin drug spyod pa la/ /go rims bzhin du
bslab par bya/ /sems can gyi ni don ldan pas/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad/ /kha na ma tho chung du yang / /srog ni btang snyoms dor mi bya/ /khyim pa'am rab tu
byung ba'ang rung / /'dris pa thams cad rnam par spang / /bu dang chung ma dag la yang / /srid pa'i bcing ba las grol bya/ /brkam zhing chags la sdang ba dang / /rmongs shing
le lo ldan pa'ang min/ /bag yod shin tu brtson pa yis/ /rnal 'byor cho ga bsgrub par bya/ /lta ba kun las rnam par grol/ /de nyid las ni legs par mthong / /dge
zhing dgongs pa bshad pa yis/ /don shes don ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /rigs dang mi rigs cho ga shes/ /de nyid rnal 'byor shin tu mkhas/ /brtse ldan byang chub spyod par
ldan| |spyod pa rnams la rab tu mkhas/ /de 'dra'i tshul ni sna tshogs dang / /de lta bu yi bsgrub pa yis/ /dngos grub dang ni thar pa 'thob/ /dngos grub kun la the tshom med/ /gnas
dang gos dang bza' ba yi/ /lhag pa thams cad rnam par spang / /lha rnams brnyas par mi bya zhing / /bya ba ma yin thams cad spang / /le lo med par nyin re zhing / /bsrung ba
yi ni cho ga bya/ /bgegs med 'jigs par mi bya ste/ /rang sems 'di ni gdul bar dka'/ /pha dang ma ru 'dzin pa dang / /bram ze dge slong de dang 'dra/ /dag cing dul
la zhi ba dang / /bsdams shing thar bar shes pa dang / /rgyal srid mtho ris longs spyod min/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod 'phel phyir min/ /gzhan du sems can don
gyi phyir/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges pa/ /zas kyi tshod ni shes pa dang / /mtshan mo gnyid kyang sad par bya/ /'dod chags skyon la sogs pa gzhan/ /sems kyis rnam
par mi brtag go /sems ni rab tu dang byas nas/ /g.yo ba med cing des byas pa/ /legs par smra zhing rab tu 'byed/ /chos ni nges par don gnyer byed/ /mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba
@#/ /bzhin/ /sems can gnod dang 'tsho mi bya/ /nyes ldan gdug pa'i sems can rnams/ /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug mi bya/ /lha yi sku dang phyag
mtshan dang / /lha yi bzhon pa dag dang ni/ /dman ma lha yi grib ma dang / /lha yi mtshan ma thams cad dang / /bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs pa/ /mtshan ma gzugs su
byas pa dang / /'gom par mi bya bza' mi bya/ /nam yang ba rdzi bar mi bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum dang 'brel ba'i zas/ /nam yang nye bar longs mi spyod/ /tha na phul
dang dman ma yi/ /dri yang mnam par mi bya'o/ /ri bo 'am ni nags kyi nang / /gtsang zhing yid 'ong dben pa 'am/ /chu bo'i 'gram mam skyed mos tshal/ /ne'u sing shin tu yid
'ong ba'am/ /lha khang gtsang ma nyams dga'am/ /khang pa gtsang ma dben pa 'am/ /gang du tshogs pa med pa ru/ /sangs rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni/ /gtsang ma'i grogs
dang lhan cig tu/ /de 'dra'i gnas su 'dug nas ni/ /thar pa mchog tu bstan pa nyid/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag brtsam/ /thun bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis/ /mgon
po mchog la phyag bya zhing / /sangs rgyas rjes dran sgom pa pos/ /bshags pa la sogs de bya'o/ /mchod pa nyid kyang ci nus bya'o/ /gzhan yang phyag rgya yang dag
bcing / /mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad ni/ /phyogs kun du ni yang dag spro/ /sa gzhi dag ni ma lus nyid/ /kun nas rin chen shing ldan dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs mchog
ldan dang / /rgyal ba rnams la dbul bar bya/ /me tog shing dang bdug pa dang / /dri yi tshogs ni yid 'ong dang / /rin chen rang bzhin rgya mtsho ni/ /thub pa'i dbang
phyug rnams la 'bul/ /de nas phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /me tog bdug pa la sogs sprin/ /rol mo'i tshogs ni yid 'ong ba/ /mchod pa'i sprin ni rnam par
bsam/ /mchod pa thams cad rab byed pa/ /rig pa'i rgyal chen 'di rnams dang / /phyag rgya dag kyang yongs gsal ba'i/ /bsam pa yis ni gzung bar bya/ /oM sarba

ta thA ga ta bu Sh+pa pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta br-ik+Sha pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye
hUM| gang du rgyal chen me tog dang / /bdug pa dang ni dri yi tshogs/ /de bzhin kun tu yang dag sbyar/ /tha na rgyan spel rnams kyang ngo / /mchod pa'i phyag rgya tshul chen
dang | |phyag rgya chen po bslab par bya/ /theg pa chen po bsdus pa las/ /ji skad rgya chen gsungs de bzhin/ /sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang / /bde ba chen po'i rgyu
@#/ /dang ni/ /'gro ba gsum las dgrol pa'i phyir/ /de lta bu yi bsam pa bya/ /'dir ni lha rnams thams cad kyi/ /bag med nye bar zhi ba dang / /mi
rnams sdug bsngal sna tshogs pa/ /rab tu mthar phyin de bzhin nyid/ /theg pa dman par 'dod byed pa/ /'khor ba rnam par gzhol ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor bdag
nyid ches/ /'di de bsam par bya ba yin/ /bdag gi bsod nams stobs dag gis/ /bde ba thams cad tshogs kyi mchog /sems can thams cad bde chen ldan/ /ma lus
par ni grub gyur cig /sems can thams cad bde gyur cig /'byung po kun la byams par shog /dud 'gro thams cad 'jigs med shog /ngan song thams cad zhi gyur
cig |bde ba chen po 'di bsams nas/ /sdig pa dral ba bcing bar bya/ /sdig pa thams cad dral byas shing / /de bzhin ngan song thams cad do/ /phyogs rnams thams
cad sangs rgyas kun/ /yang dang yang du rjes dran nas/ /gsang ba'i mdo sde ma lus pa/ /yang dang yang du bklag par bya/ /mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' ru/ /gcig tu
'gyur 'dod sems kyis bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor bla na med/ /rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya/ /zla ba'am yang na zla ba drug /lo gcig gam ni de las gzhan/ /rig pa'i
brtul zhugs 'di 'drar bya/ /phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bcing / /sangs rgyas rnams la nyin re bzhin/ /nges par lha bshos dbul par bya/ /lha bshos snang ba ster
byed pa/ /de bzhin rig pa'i lha bshos la/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin khro bo che/ /thams cad du ni rjes dran bya/ /'ching ba'i sbyor ba'i cho ga ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur gyis brtan bya/ /rdo
rje go cha'i sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu bsrung bar bya/ /de lta bu yi cho ga yis/ /rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya/ /bsrung ba byas shing brtson 'grus brtsam/ /stobs
chen spro ba bskyed pa yis/ /nyin re zhing ni brtags nas su/ /rtog pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /sku mdog dkyil 'khor ji bzhin par/ /ji ltar 'os shing
'tsham pa ru/ /dgug pa la sogs las rnams ni/ /thams cad mnyam par gzhag par bya/ /ci nus par ni nyin re zhing / /rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /mtshams
med lnga po byed pa yang / /lo gcig na ni ra ba 'grub 'gyur/ /theg pa chen po'i tshogs nang na/ /mchog 'gyur rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/ /rgyud gzhan gyi ni cho ga dang //
mdo sde dang bcas ci bzhin du/ /de nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs blang / /sdom pa'ang dor bar mi bya zhing / /kha na ma tho rdul tsam yang / /'gyod pa ru ni bya ba yin/ /gnas ni yang dag
@#/ /brtag par bya/ /tsher ma la sogs dang bral ba/ /ri bo 'am ni dgon pa 'am/ /lha khang skyed mos tshal dang ni/ /chu yi 'gram dang 'brog dgen par/ /gang du
phyogs ni phyogs gtsang mar/ /gseg ma gyo mo bong ba dang / /rdo ba dag ni bsal bar bya/ /shin tu legs par dag bya ste/ /gang phyir lha rnams yongs su 'dzin/ /gal te de
ni sbyor lhong gyur/ /rnam pa kun tu 'jigs mi bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rgyal po che/ /chos kyi bdag po dgongs pa can/ /thugs rje snying por ldan gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas
nyes par 'dzin mi 'gyur/ /gnas ni kun tu dag bya zhing / /dkyil 'khor yang ni ci nus par/ /rgya ru dpag tshad tsam bya ste/ /khru drug las ni dma' ba min/ /
sngon la phur bu gdab bya ste/ /rdo rje lta la sogs pas bcing / /de nas yo byad thams cad ni/ /cho ga mchog gis blang bar bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid 'dir/ /
dkyil 'khor dag ni bsgrub par bya/ /thal ba la sogs dus ji bzhin/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/ /ji ltar nus shing spro ba dang / /ji ltar rdzas ni
'byor pa dang / /de bzhin rnal 'byor chen pos bya/ /yang na sems kyis brtag par bya/ /ci ste bsgrub pa rgyal por 'gyur/ /cho ga gzhan gyi blo ldan pas/ /gal
te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /dkyil 'khor ngag ni dag par bya/ /mtshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /khru ni stong dang ldan pa mchog /yang na rgyang grags tshad tsam du/ /sa
yi cha ni thig gdab bya/ /gal te 'byor pa ldan pa min/ /khru bzhi mdo ru bsdus par bya/ /yang na phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /khru brgyad dang ni yang dag ldan/ /in+d+ra
nI la shin tu sngo/ /tshon rtsi sngon po rab tu bya/ /pad+ma rA ga shin tu dmar/ /tshon rtsi dmar po zhes byar bshad/ /rdo rje chu dang chu chen po/ /ser po yang ni yang dag ldan/ /
dag cing dang ba'i gser dang ni/ /kha dog ser po ldan par bya/ /shin tu dag pa shel dang bas/ /tshon rtsi dkar po rab tu bya/ /gang phyir rgyal po nor chen ldan/ /tshon
rtsi 'di dag yang dag bshad/ /phyug cing nor dang yang dag ldan/ /gal te de ni khyim bdag gyur/ /khru rgya yongs su tshang bar bya/ /bcu drug las ni nyung mi bya/ /
tshon rtsi dri dang yang dag ldan/ /gur gum la sogs dang bsres pa/ /tshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /mkhas pa yis ni dkyil 'khor bya/ /phyug cing nor dang yang dag
ldan| |tshong dpon yang ni ded dpon nam/ /khyim pa 'byor pa dang ldan pa/ /gzhan dag dga' zhing 'ongs gyur na/ /rin chen phye ma dang bsres pa'i/ /tshon rtsi chen po rab tu bya/ /
@#/ /rams dang ba bla la sogs pa/ /tshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /bdag nyid chung ba'am che ba'ang rung / /de yi 'byor pa brtag bya ba/ /ji ltar
rig par nges par sbyar/ /rgyal po la ni tshad bshad pa/ /khyim bdag la yang de bzhin no/ /tshong dpon dang ni deng dpon gyi/ /khru ni lnga bcu nyid kyang ngo / /gzhan dag
dga' zhing 'ongs gyur na/ /khru ni nyi shur byas pa yin/ /gal te dngos grub bsgrub 'dod na/ /khru drug las ni chung mi bya/ /ming po de bzhin nyung ba yang / /dri dang kun tu
yang dag ldan/ /rtag tu sna tshogs dri yis ni/ /sngon du sa gzhi dag par bya/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor ngos dag gi /grwa ni bzhi po thams cad du/ /shes rab can gyis
bdug spos bsreg /gang phyir rdo rje can dag gshegs/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gnas de ni/ /sngags kyis bsangs ba'i dri chu yis/ /rtag tu legs par chag chag
gdab/ /gang phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gyur/ /nyin zhag drug gam bdun brgyad dang / /mar dang 'o mi 'bras chan nyid/ /slob dpon zas ni dkar gsum bza'/ /
yang na thun mong gyur pa'i zas/ /ci ste bzod ldan nyin mtshan du/ /mi bza' bar ni bsgrub par bya/ /gang phyir chos kyi rang bzhin zas/ /stobs ldan 'gyur bar the tshom
med| |dkyil 'khor mchog ni rgyal chen po/ /gang yin bsam pas bya ba'o/ /bco lnga la ni brtsams nas su/ /gnyis pa'i nya la rdzogs par bya/ /yang na mar gyi ngo la ni/ /bcu
bzhi la ni yang dag brtsam/ /bco lnga la ni thug par bya/ /legs pa ru ni rdzogs par bya/ /yang na tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ /tha ma nya la kun tu bri/ /yang na bcu bzhi la brtsams
te| |nyin zhag gnyis par yang dag bri/ /yang na bco lnga de yi ni/ /snga dro de yi yang dag brtsam/ /tshul chen po dang mtshungs pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis bri/ /gang
gi tshes nas brtsams nas su/ /ji srid rdzogs par ma gyur bar/ /gal te kun nas mi bza' bar/ /brtson 'grus chen po brtsam par bya/ /dri dang bcas shing legs byas pa/ /
yang na dkar gsum bza' bar bya/ /gang phyir rgyal ba'i rdo rje 'dzin/ /byin gyis brlab par mdzad par 'gyur/ /bsod nams che zhing bkra shis pa'i/ /nyin zhag dag pa gang
yin pa/ /de la rdo rje slob dpon ni/ /skal ba chen pos dkyil 'khor brtsam/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas/ /dbus kyi cha ru 'dug par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
la dmigs nas/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /sems ni yongs su 'dzin byed pa/ /lus ni drang por byas nas su/ /bshags la sogs pa'i las rnams ni/ /thams/
@#/ /cad sngon du bya ba yin/ /byang chub sems la brtson gyur cing / /rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad pa yis/ /phyogs bcu ru ni phyag byas nas/ /bdag nyid
kyang ni spro ba bskyed/ /deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /bdag gi 'tsho ba'ang 'bras bu yod/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang dam tshig gis/ /deng ni srid par mnyam par 'gyur//
byang chub sems dpa' rtse gcig pa'i/ /sems kyis phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i/ /bdag 'gyur bar ni the tshom med/ /deng
bdag nyi ma dam pa ste/ /deng ni bdag mchod bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas/ /deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no/ /de ltar dga' ba dang ldan
pas| /de nas dbus su 'dug gyur nas/ /spos kyi reng bu lag thogs pas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya/ /sems ni dga' zhing mgu ba yis/ /tshig ni 'di
skad brjod par bya/ /yan lag kun gyis rab btud de/ /sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba gdab/ /ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs
su gsol/ /rdo rje bdag ming 'di zhes bya/ /bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'bri bar 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas la sogs kun gshegs te/ /dngos grub 'di ni bdag la
gsol| |tshig ni de skad brjod nas su/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung bca' bar bya/ /chos chen po la snyoms zhugs nas/ /bdag nyid ting 'dzin dang ldan bya/ /gal te nus na skal
ba ches| |yang na sems kyi bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog /ting 'dzin zhes bya ci 'dra dang / /rdo rje'i gzugs dang ldan pa la/ /rnal 'byor pa yis snyoms
'jug bya/ /yang na rnal 'byor gang rung la/ /nus na snyoms par 'jug par bya/ /sems ni mnyam par gzhag 'gyur ba/ /go rims bzhin du bshad par bya/ /bcom ldan
sngon ni ci 'dra ba'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyid 'gyur ba'i/ /de 'dra bar ni bdag rang nyid/ /rnal 'byor don sems bsam pa bya/ /dka' thub sdom pa sna tshogs pa/ /bdag
gis bya bar bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po ni/ /stong gsum pa ni bsam par bya/ /sangs rgyas bskul ba bla na med/ /shes rab can gyis bskul ba bsam/ /sangs
rgyas kun la phyag byas shing / /ci 'dod pa ni bka' nod bya/ /nges par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rang sems so sor brtag par bya/ /byang sems yang dag bskyed nas ni/ /
dbus su zla ba brtag par bya/ /de nas rang gi ye shes brtag/ zla ba'i dbus su rdo rje bzhin/ /rang lus rdo rje'i gzugs su ste/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni rang bzhin nyid/ /de
@#/ /nas sangs rgyas mngon rtogs nas/ /rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur bya/ /rang bdag sangs rgyas thams cad du/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor blta bar bya/ /
ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru/ /stug po'i gnas las babs nas su/ /rdo rje'i gdan la 'jug nas su/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul bya/ /sems dpa' bzhi ni phyung nas su/ /
phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su spro/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan byas nas/ /phyogs bzhi ru ni dgod par bya/ /mtshams su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /bdag nyid
yang dag byin gyis brlabs/ /phyogs bzhi ru ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po byung / /'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bcas nyid/ /dkyil 'khor thams
cad blta bar bya/ /sems dpa' gsang ba'i lha mor bcas/ /sgo srung rnams ni bsam par bya/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dag pa ni/ /snying po chen po brtag par
bya| |rang gi 'khor lo yang dag bzhugs/ /'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /thabs chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /mtshan ni rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /ting nge
'dzin las langs nas kyang / /rdo rje'i lta bas blta bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis /slar yang snyoms par 'jug par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad thugs
dbus su/ /byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par ni/ /mgon po'i snying ga nas gzung bya/ /sems dpa' kun gyi spyan snga ru/ /bka' ni rim bzhin
nod par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur gyis/ /rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur bya/ /gsol ba btab pas gsan par bya/ /bdag ni rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor mchog /
chos kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /ting 'dzin shin tu bla na med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas kun/ /byin gyis rlab pa mdzad par 'gyur/ /ting nge 'dzin las langs nas kyang / /
bka' ni nye bar nod bya ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /skyil krung bshig ste langs nas ni/ /rang gis 'dran pa'i zhabs phyag bya/ /
sangs rgya mtsho gang ba ru/ /phyogs rnams bzhi ni blta bar bya/ /theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs/ /rdo rje'i tshig ni brjod par bya/ /bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' bdag rang nyid/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che/ /bdag ni stobs chen rdo rje can/ /bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal/ /bdag ni phyag na rdo rje mchog /
oM badzra satwa hUM/ rdo rje yi ni gsang sngags 'di/ /lan cig nyid ni brjod par bya/ /bdag ni gtso bo rdo rje che/ /byin gyis brlab pa mi 'dor ro/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtshos kun tu gang /
@#/ /'khor los lnga par yang dag gnas/ /bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul ldan par bya/ /slar yang bdag nyid go bgo zhing / /
bdag nyid dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bcad par bya/ /lag nyed pa yi phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams
cad rab tu mnye/ /rdo rje gtun shing nyid kyis ni/ /bgegs rnams thams cad brdung bar bya/ /rdo rje ral gri rab rno bas/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gtub par bya/ /rdo
rje che ba drag po yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya/ /rdo rje bzang po'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzhom par bya/ /rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya
yis| |bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya/ /rdo rje mche bar rab grags pas/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya/ /rdo rje lcags sgrogs phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs
rnams thams cad bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya/ /rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams
cad drang bar bya/ /rdo rje mdung thung phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar/
bya| |rgyas pa yis ni ci nus par/ /lus rnams thams cad dgug par bya/ /bgegs ni 'ga' yang yod min zhes/ /sems ni dag par gyur pa yin/ /rang sems bdud
ces bya bar bshad/ /bgegs nyid kyang ni rang gi sems/ /rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsal/ /rnam rtog las ni bgegs rnams 'byung / /gdul bar dka' ba'i sems gzung zhing //
'dod pa lnga ni spang bar bya/ /sngon du rjes dran nas brtsams te/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/ /bcom zhing nges par bcad nas ni/ /yi ge hUM gis bskrad par bya/ /rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya
yis| |rdo rje rab bcing bar bya/ /hUM mdzad rdo rje bsdam bya zhing / /de ni rdo rje rabs bskor/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya ches/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag byin brlabs nas/ /ci nus par ni rgyas
pa ru| |rab mchog gis ni bcing bar bya/ /rtog pa kun la nges sbyar nas/ /sems ni dag par 'gyur ba yin/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi mtshan nyid ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya/ /
grogs bdag dang ni thams cad la/ /g.yel ba med par bsrung bar bya/ /gsor zhing legs par bkal ba dang / /tshad dang ldan zhing mdzes pa dang / /dri zhim reg bya 'jam pa dang / /
legs par byas shing sru ba dang / /dri bsung dang ni yang dag ldan/ /sna tshogs tshon gyis kun tu khyab/ /dri bcas tshon du spang bya zhing / /chos kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /de nas
@#/ /de ni yang dag bshad/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi gsang ba che/ /sangs rgyas
brtan pa'i rdo rje can/ /sems can 'di rnams gdul bya min/ /bsod nams ye shes rgya mtsho che/ /tshogs ni kun tu ma bsags pas/ /bsod nams tshogs dang mi
ldan zhing / /sangs rgyas 'byung la chags dang bral/ /sems can de rnams mos bya'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bstan pa yin/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ /de
nas dkyil 'khor 'dzin du 'jug/ yang na bsod nams dag gi tshogs/ /de ni rang nyid kyis mthong 'gyur/ /gang phyir tshogs bcas longs spyod dang / /chos kyi sku ni
bla na med/ /rdo rje'i dam chos las byung ba'i/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'dzin du gzhug/ gal te de ni tshogs bsags gyur/ /sngon du sangs rgyas rjes su mthong / /dkyil
'khor sbyor ba la gnas te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad des mthong 'gyur/ /tshogs ni bsags pa med pa dang / /sangs rgyas mthong ba med pa ru/ /des ni thos pa rnyed mi
'gyur| |dang por 'dir 'jug smos ci dgos/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /'di ni gsang ba mtshungs med pa/ /'di ni theg chen snying po ste/ /chos kyi 'khor
lo bla na med/ /bskal pa grangs med pa ru byung / /sa yi pha rol phyin pa mchog/ gang phyir gsang ba mtho ba thob/ /rab tu dga' ba sgrub par 'gyur/ /gal te rnal 'byor pa de brtson
tshe 'di nyid la mya ngan 'das/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob cing / /rdo rje nyid ni the tshom med/ /yang na mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /skye ba bcu drug mya ngan 'da'/ /rab tu dga' ba thob pa dang /
yang na rdo rje nyid kyang ngo / /so la nyi zla ltung byed cing / /de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'gyur/ /so so'i skye bos sangs rgyas nyid/ /'grub par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /rnal 'byor
mchog ni bla med pa/ /de phyir rnal 'byor chen po sbyor/ /gal te sangs rgyas nyid 'dod na/ /brtson 'grus chen pos bsdang mi bya/ /tshad ni ji skad bshad pa ru/ /de bzhin gzhung
gi rjes 'brangs nas/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya/ /thig bzhi dang
ni yang dag ldan/ /cha mnyam pas ni mdzes par gyur/ /dar gyis chun pos brgyan gyur cing / /rin chen dra bas rnam par brgyan/ /g.yer ka'i dra bas yang dag ldan/ /kha
dog lnga pos rab tu mdzes/ /dril bu'i dra bas shin tu sbras/ /rnga yab sna tshogs kyis mdzes ba/ /phreng ba rnga yab zla re dang / /nyi zla dag gis nye bar mdzes/ /kun nas phyi rol
@#/ /gnas dag tu/ /rdo rje kha khyer yang dag rten/ /kun tu kha khyer dang ldan pa'i/ /sgo ni kha khyer med pa'o/ /rtse mo rdo rje sngo rang bzhin/ /gzhan ni gser gyi
mdog can dang / /dmar bo pad+ma lta bu dang / /gzhan yang shel ltar dkar ba dang / /rin chen rang bzhin mchog kun gyis/ /dkyil 'khor mdzes bar bri bar bya/ /sna
tshogs gzugs ni mdzes pa mchog /rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod/ /rim gnyis sgo dang yang dag ldan/ /rta babs sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ /dkar zhing gsal dang
rdo rje dang / /nyi zla dag gis rnam par spras/ /'dab ma bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /sgo bzhi dag ni mchog tu mdzes/ /mtho zhing yangs la mdzes pa ste/ /rdo rje rdo rjer yang
dag ldan/ /rdo rje sgo srung skal chen po/ /bdag nyid rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin/ /gtum po srung byed rnal 'byor pa/ /shar gyi sgo ru yang dag gnas/ /lho ru rdo rje zhags pa
ste| |nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog go /rdo rje dril bu skal chen po/ /byang gi sgo ru yang dag gnas/ /'jug pa dang ni 'byung ba'ang rung / /rdo rje shugs ni brjod par bya/ /ri
mo dman ma brdzis byas na/ /dam tshig de nyid mthong mi 'gyur/ /oM badzra be gA kra ma hUM/ /gang gi dus su thig 'debs pa/ /rdo rje'i thig ni brjod par bya/ /sa yi
cha ni ma lus pa/ /thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gyur/ /oM badzra sa ma ya sU tra mA ti kra ma hUM/ /sngon du tshon rtsi'i phye ma la/ /'bar ba'i blta bas yang dag blta/ /badzra rA ga zhes
brjod na/ /thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gyur/ /oM badzra rA ga hUM/ /mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /phyi
rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /logs dang cha ni mnyam pa dang / /kun nas cha ni rnam par phyed/ /dkyil 'khor cha ni rnam par gsal/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /de yi nang
gi rim pa ru/ /zhugs nas 'khor lo de mtshungs pa/ /kun tu cha ni mnyam par bri/ /ka ba brgyad gyis nye bar mdzes/ /rdo rje'i ka ba'i mdun gnas su/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni lnga yis
brgyan/ /gnas lnga dag ni thams cad du/ /'khor lo lnga ni dgod par bya/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /kun tu bri zhing dgod par bya/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul
gyis bltas nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gzung bar bya/ /oM badzra satwa hUM/ de la dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas rgyal po dgod par bya/ /gang gi thugs las nges
byung ba/ /gsang ba'i tshogs ni stug cing brtan/ /rnam par snang mdzad rnal 'byor che/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rnam par gsal/ /gang gi mtshan smos tsam gyis ni/ /sdig
@#/ /pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur/ /'khor los bsgyur ba tshogs chen po/ /sems dpa' bzhi bo rgyal po che/ /phyogs rnams dag ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje shugs
'chang dag gis dgod/ /shar du rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /lho ru rdo rje rin chen no/ /nub tu rdo rje chos zhes pa/ /rdo rje'i las ni byang du 'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lnga po ni/ /thams cad
sangs rgyas cod pan ldan/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/ /na bza' dkar po dag mnabs pa/ /de la 'di rnams kyi snying po ni/ /oM sarba yo gI shwa ra ya hrI hUM/ oM badzra satwa hUM/

oM badzra rat+na hUM/ oM badzra d+harma hUM/ oM badzra karma hUM/ rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che/ /rtse mo lnga pa dgod par bya/ /rdo rje rin chen rin po che/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i pad+ma ste/ rdo rje las kyi rdo rje ni/ /rdo
rje rnon po mtshon cha che/ /rnam snang rang gi phyag rgya ni/ /ye shes khu tshur yongs su 'dzin/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ /'od kyi dbus su yang dag gnas/ /bdag nyid chen po
bzhi po kun/ /bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung / /gang na 'khor lo med pa yi/ /dbus kyi 'khor lo'i grwa bzhi ru/ /btsun mo lha mo chen mo bzhi/ /dgod pa'i chos nyid bsam par
bya| |rdo rje sems ma rdo rje chos/ /de bzhin rdo rje rin chen ma/ /rdo rje las ma btsun mo che/ /dkyil 'khor grwa bzhir bri bar bya/ /rdo rje sems ma byang sems ma/ /pha rol phyin pa chen po
mchog/ lha mo chen mo rdo rje chos/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog/ dpal chen rdo rje rin chen ma/ /bsod nams kyi ni tshogs gter byed/ /mkha' mdzad ces bya rdo rje las/ /las kyi pha rol
phyin pa mchog/ de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i ming ni/ /dpal chen rdo rje dkar mo dang / /rdo rje sgrol ma mkha' rdo rje/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad las/ /de dag gsang mchog bla na
med| |thams cad zla ba gang 'od ldan/ /rked par bsnyems bcas rol par ldan/ /ji ltar rgyal ba'i rnam bzhi bzhin/ /rang gi phyag mtshan gyis brel phyag/ seng ge'i snyoms tshul rol
ldan pa/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su/ /shar gyi mi bskyod dkyil 'khor la/ /zla ba'i dbus su mi bskyod pa/ /ston pa'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin/ /mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod//
de yi phyogs rnams yongs su 'dzin/ /mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /dam tshig dag ni bzhi po bri/ /mdun du phyag na rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje lcags kyu
g.yas su 'o/ /rdo rje chags pa de bzhin g.yon/ /rgyab tu legs pa yang dag bri/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras shing / /rdo rje phyed pa'i dbang bskur ldan/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song
nas ni/ /lho yi rin chen dkyil 'khor du/ /zla ba'i dbus su rin chen 'byung / /mchog 'dzin pa yi phyag rgya 'dzin/ /mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams
@#/ /cad du/ /rin chen sems dpa' bzhi po ni/ /mdun du rdo rje rin chen te/ /g.yas su rdo rje gzi brjid do/ /g.yon du rdo rje rgyal mtshan te/ /rgyab tu bzhad pa
yang dag bri/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras shing / /rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur ldan/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /nub tu pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su
'dzin/ /dbus su 'dug pa 'od dpag med/ /sems dpa' chen po ye shes che/ /phyogs bzhi ru ni dgod par bya/ /rdo rje chos ni mdun du ste/ /g.yas su rdo rje rnon po'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje
'khor lo ste/ /rdo rje smra ba rgyab tu 'o/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /byang gi las kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /mchog sbyin phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin/ /thub pa don yod grub pa dgod/ /de
yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /las chen po dag yang dag bri/ /kun nas phyogs ni bzhi dag tu/ /phyag na rang gi phyag mtshan mtshon/ /mdun du rdo rje las yin te/ /g.yas
su rdo rje srung ba 'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin te/ /rdo rje khu tshur rgyab tu 'o/ /de nas phyag mtshan bcu drug dang / /dbus ma nyi shur rab bshad bya/ /bcu drug dbus ma nyi shu
ni| |go rim bzhin du rab bshad bya/ /ji ltar rigs shing 'tsham pa la/ /rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa/ /rdo rje rin chen rin po che/ /rdo rje pad+ma chen po dang / /rdo rje rnon po dbus

ma yin/ /phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje che/ /de bzhin rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin/ /rdo rje chags pa gzhu nyid do/ /rdo rje legs pa'i rdo rje gnyis/ /rdo rje rin chen rin po che/ /rdo rje gzi brjid nyi ma ste/ /

rdo rje rgyal mtshan rgyal mtshan bsgreng / /rdo rje bzhad pa chems chen po/ /rdo rje chos kyi pad+ma ches/ /rdo rje rnon po ral gri bcang / /rdo rje rgyu yi 'khor lo che/ /rdo rje'i smra ba'i yi ge ste/ /rdo rje
rnon po las chen po/ /rdo rje srung ba'i cho ga ste/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin mche ba che/ /rdo rje khu tshur bsdams pa ste/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /dril bu dag ni sgo ba bzhi/ /
rdo rje sems ma'i rdo rje che/ /de bzhin rdo rje rin chen nor/ /pad+ma rdo rje chos ma ste/ /rdo rje rnon po las ma yin/ /grwa bzhi ngag tu gsang ba yi/ /phyag mtshan de rnams dgod par bya//

'khor lo chen po'i phyi rol gyi/ /grwa bzhi dag ni thams cad du/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhi/ /rdo rje lha mo yang dag bri/ /rdo rje sgeg mo rdor phreng ma/ /de bzhin rdo rje glu ma nyid/ /bsnyems
bcas phreng ba pi wang dang / /glu gar gsang ba'i lha mo rnams/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su/ /mchod pa'i lha mo yang dag bri/ /me tog spos dang de bzhin dri/ /mar
me nub byang mtshams su 'o/ /mar me la sogs par nyid kyi/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad du/ /bskal ba bzang po'i sems dpa' che/ /stong ni nges par dgod par bya/ /
@#/ /mtshan ma ji bzhin ci rigs pas/ /byams pa la sogs ma lus pa/ /ji ltar mngon bar 'dod pa yi/ /sems dpa' chen po dgod par bya/ /cho ga'i sbyor
ba 'di yis ni/ /kun tu bri zhing dgod par bya/ /rang gi snying pos kun dbab phyir/ /rang rang gi ni snying po yin/ /de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM badzra pA Ni hUM/ badzra aM ku sha

dzaH/ badzra rA ga ho/ /badzra sA d+hu sa/ dam tshig mchog gi snying po'o/ /oM badzra ma Ni oM/ badzra te dza a/ badzra ke tu trAM/ badzra hA sa ha/ badzra pad+ma hrIH/ badzra tik+Sh+Na d+haM/ badzra he tu maM/
badzra b+hA ga raM/ dbang gi sems dpa' dang / ye shes kyi sems dpa' chen po'i snying po'o/ /badzra karma kaM/ badzra rak+Sha haM/ badzra yak+Sha hUM/ badzra muSh+Ti baM/ las kyi sems dpa' chen
po'i snying po'o/ /de rnams ni rab tu gnas pa'i snying po yin no/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi snying po ni/ badzra hUM/ rat+na trAM/ d+harma hrIHkarma A/ /lha mo rnams kyi sngar bshad zin to//
sgo srung rnams kyi yang de bzhin no/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad dgod par bya/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi las bshad par bya ste/ /kun nas
rdo rje rnal 'byor gyis/ /chos kyi blo can gyis bri bya/ /dpal mchog dang po las gsungs pa'i/ /sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /theg ba chen po mngon par rtogs//
lan bdun du ni brjod par bya/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la/ /lan bdun du ni bskor bar bya/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni/ /mkhas pa thams cad blta bar bya//
gal te chad dam lhag kyang rung / /rdo rje shugs kyis dag par bya/ /'khor lo chen po dag par byas/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor yang dag gzung / /rgyal ba rnams la bdag nyid ni/ /dbul
ba'i las ni kun tu bya/ /de nas yo byad thams cad kyis/ /dkyil 'khor la ni mchod par bya/ /ci 'byor pas ni bya ba ste/ /dman par gyur kyang nyes pa med/ /'byor ba ci snyed yod pa
kun| |go rim bzhin du rab tu dbul/ /bum pa gang ba 'bum phrag gam/ /stong ngam yang na brgya yang rung / /mar me 'bum phrag stong ngam ni/ /yang na stong ngam brgya yang rung / /
dri dang spos kyi snod 'bum mam/ /yang na stong ngam brgya yang rung / /ga bur a ga ru nyid dang / /du ru ka dang tsan+dan sogs/ /mang sbyar dri zhim dang ldan pa/ /spos rnams 'di dag
bsreg par bya/ /gser ram dngul gyi snod dag dang / /sa las byas kyang nyes pa med/ /yo byad ji snyed yod pa kun/ /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya/ /de la kong bu stong phrag
ga ma| |mar me sdong bu shin tu 'bar/ /tha na mar me snod gcig ste/ /ma tshang gyur kyang nyes ba med/ /dar ni phyar bar bye ba bre/ /rnga yab phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /dra ba dra ba
@#/ /phyed pas spras/ /zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes/ /sna tshogs bzhon pa brgya 'am ni/ /stong phrag gcig kyang nyes pa med/ /thams cad ma tshang gcig nyid
kyang / /bde bas rol mo mchog rnams bya/ /phan pa'i zas ni stong phrag dang / /bye ba phrag ni rgya mtsho tshogs/ /bca' ba sna tshogs pa yang ste/ /gal te ma tshang nyes pa med/ /dri
dang gos bzang thams cad dang / /dri zhim pa yi byug pa dang / /bya ba mchog ni nye bar mdzes/ /bla re rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /sna tshogs dri yi chus bkang ba/ /bum pa shin tu
yid 'ong dang / /me tog shing ni brgya nyid dang / /bzhi yang nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /dri dang me tog thams cad dang / /bdug pa yid du 'ong ba kun/ /gal te sbyor ba ldan gyur
na| |mchod pa rnam pa thams cad bya/ /mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid/ /ji bzhin sgrub pa pos de phul/ /de bzhin dngos grub rdzu 'phrul ni/ /mthong ba'i chos la thob par
'gyur| |sngar ni ji skad bsgrags pa bzhin/ /thams cad cho ga bzhin du dgod/ /sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing / /mchod pa nyid kyang rab tu bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor
'khor lo yi/ /dbus kyi 'khor lo phyag byas nas/ /pus mo btsugs te 'dug nas ni/ /yang dag par ni dgug par bya/ /sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu bcing / /rdo rje lcags
kyu brjod par bya/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams kun tu gshegs/ /de nas sgo srung bcings nas ni/ /yi ge dzaHni yongs su brjod/ /rdo rje can ni thams
cad dgug /the tshom med par gshegs par gyur/ /rdo rje zhags pa bcings nas ni/ /cho ga ji bzhin nges par gzhug/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog bcings nas ni/ /dbang du yang ni rtag tu
bya| |rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yis/ /de dag nyid kyang dbab par bya/ /rdo rje gnas pa'i phyag rgya yi/ /gnas rnams kun ni dgod par bya/ /ci nus par ni rab tu bsgrags/ /de nas
mchod pa rab tu bya/ /spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor kun la sbyar/ /bdag nyid dbul dang mchod pa dang / /bshags dang gsol ba btab la
sogs/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed nas kyang / /sdom pa yang dag spyad par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches/ /bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur bya/ /se gol dag ni brdab
bya zhing / /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun/ /bkug cing rab tu bcug nas ni/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog yang dag dbab/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i
phyag rgya ches/ /dral nas de ni yang dag dbab/ /rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ /ye shes dag pa skye bar 'gyur/ /sems dpa'i ye shes 'bab par 'gyur/ /rdo rje dbab pa yang dag
@#/ /brjod| |ji ste babs par ma gyur na/ /yi ge a yis dril bu dkrol/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang / /rdo rje slob dpon 'di lta bu/ /ye shes
dam pa skye 'gyur zhing / /rmad du byung ba'ang 'dis mthong 'gyur/ /brgya las rtsa bdun lhag po nyid/ /mtshan ma'ang de las lhag 'byung 'gyur/ /gzhan dag gang yang rung ba
nyid| |gal te bsod nams skal ba che/ /des ni sangs rgyas thams cad mthong / /yang na byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ /yang na rdo rje 'dzin gang nyid/ /yang na 'od zer 'phros
pa mthong / /hUM sgrogs 'brug gi sgra dang ni/ /spos dang me tog dag gi bar/ /ba spu langs pa la sogs byung / /de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol byung nas ni/ /
sems ma'i phyag rgya ldan gyur pas/ /sor mo gnyis kyis phreng ba gzung / /gar gyi tshul gyis zhugs nas ni/ /rdo rje gar ni rab bskor bas/ /dbus kyi 'khor lo rab zhugs
nas| |phreng ba nyid ni dor bar bya/ /phreng ba de ni gar babs pa/ /de dang de ni skad cig 'grub/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas/ /phyag rgya thams cad bcing byas na/ /
dngos grub thams cad nges pa ru/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /gzhan yang de la rdo rje 'chang / /byin gyis rlob ba mdzad par 'gyur/ /langs nas der ni bcom
ldan 'das/ /yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang rung / /'dar ba dang ni g.yo ba'ang rung / /de bzhin yan lag 'khum pa dang / /yang na tshig ni byung ba dang / /ci ste hUM ni brjod pa'ang rung / /nges par
legs so zhes bya ba/ /cho 'phrul bde ba chen po ni/ /rmad byung bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /rdo rje slob dpon skal ba ches/ /mthong 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
dam pa ni/ /de nas langs te brjod par bya/ /mgon po thub pa la btud nas/ /ci 'dod pa ni bka' nod bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /sems
can kun la phan bya'i phyir/ /slob ma rab tu gzhug par bgyi/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu khams gsum gyi/ /sems can kun gyi bde gang yin/ /des ni rdo rje slob dpon de'i/ /
bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyi las rdzogs so// //de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po der ni ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad 'jug tu rung ngo / /snod dang / /snod ma yin pa yongs su
brtag par mi bya ste/ gzhug pa la mngon par zhen pa yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong ba tsam gyi mod la phyir mi ldog pa nyid
@#/ /du 'gyur ro/ /dad pa med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags ba dang / /rgyud yongs su ma smin pa dang / mos pa med pa mang du zin kyang 'on kyang
mthong ba tsam gyis so/ /gang gi phyir gsang ba chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gsang bas 'dul ba'i thabs dang / 'khor lo'i tshul
dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul ba pa ston pa yin te/ de'i phyir mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ngan song thams cad rgyun chad par
'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba'i sras ni 'jigs pa med/ /ngan song sgo ni bcad pa dang / /thams cad thar pa la gzhol dang / /phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur/ /dkon mchog gsum la
skyabs song ste/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed du gzhug /sems can kun gyi don bsams nas/ /sdom pa yang ni sbyin par bya/ /srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang /
'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / bcos pa'i chang dang / myos par 'gyur pa dag de nas brtsams te spang bar bya'o/ /sngon la sdom
pa 'di dag ni/ /ji ltar 'dod cing mos pa ru/ /mkhas pa yis ni sbyin bya ste/ /rang dbang med par sbyin mi bya/ /gal te de ni dad gyur na/ /de la sdom pa sbyin par bya/ /sdom pa
gsum la bkong nas ni/ /de nas dkyil 'khor brtan par bya/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song ste/ /bslab pa lnga la rnam par gnas/ /byang chub
sems la mchog brtson bya/ /sems can shin tu gdul dka' gang / /sdom pa 'dzin par mi byed cing / /dad dang ldan pa med pa yang / /'jug pa nyid ni dgag mi bya/ /ji ltar sangs
rgyas thugs rje can/ /de dag gi ni sku ru 'gyur/ /mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ni/ /sdom pa dag par 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid ngan pa'i sems can gang / /khro zhing shin tu gshe ba
dang / /bzhad gad byed cing 'phyar yang rung / /de nyid rgyu ru 'gyur ba yin/ /gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ru/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham pa ru/ /rdo rje
slob ma gzhug par bya/ /sbyor ba bzhi yis phyag bya zhing / /rdo rje sngags kyang bsgom par bya/ /sngar bshad cho ga ji bzhin du/ /phyag bzhi dag kyang bya ba yin/ /stod g.yog gos ni
dmar po dang / /dmar pos mig kyang dgab par bya/ /gos ni dmar po bskon byas te/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas sku 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/ /shin tu gsal ba 'ching
du gzhug /snying po lan gcig brjod bya zhing / /sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes bya brjod/ /dga' zhing mgu la rings pa yi/ /sor mo gnyis kyis phreng ba blangs/ /snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni//
@#/ /slob dpon chen pos gzhug par bya/ /sa ma ya hUM/ shar gyi sgo yi nang du ni/ /yi ge dzaHni yang dag brjod/ /lho ru zhags pa'i mi ge hUM/ /nub tu lcags
sgrog baM lhan cig/ byang du dril bu byang chub par/ /yi ge a ni brjod par bya/ /dus phyis rol pa dang bcas par/ /bkug ste phyag kyang btsal bar bya/ /bshags dang gsol gdab
mchod pa dang / /yongs su bsngo dang rjes yi rang / /bdag nyid dbul ba nyid kyang ni/ /go rims bzhin du byed du gzhug /deng bdag ye shes rdo rje ni/ /the tshom med par bskyed par
bya| |khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya ste/ /khyod ni phung bar gyur ta re/ /brjod nas phreng ba dor du gzhug /rdo rje phreng ba sbyin par bya/ /phreng ba de ni grang du babs/ /'grub par 'gyur bar
the tshom med/ /oM badzra mA le/ rdo rje'i tshig ni rab brjod cing / /deng nas gdong g.yog dgrol bar bya/ /nges par yid ches sbyin bya zhing / /dkyil 'khor ltos zhes brjod par
bya| |oM/ nga ni rdo rje sems rang nyid/ /sangs rgyas snying po las byung ba/ /rdo rje mig ni dbye bar bya/ /kyai/ rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor ltos/ /dam chig nyid ni sbyin bya zhing / /sems
ma'i phyag rgya steng du bcing / /'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig 'joms/ /rdo rje tshig ni brjod par bya/ /oM u da ka Tha/ rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /phyag na rdo rjes srung bar
byed| |dam tshig nyid ni nyams 'gyur na/ /'bras bu 'di ni thob mi 'gyur/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam
tshig bsrungs pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /'thungs shig rdo rje bdud rtsi 'thung / /rdo rje sems dpa'i mna' yi ni/ /snying po 'dis ni mna' bsgag go/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag
nyid ni/ /de ring khyod kyi snying la zhugs/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /skad cig de la dral nas gshegs/ /gang zhig sdom pa mi len cing / /shin tu gdul dka' dad med
la| |gzhug pa tsam ni sbyin par bya/ /de la las ni mi bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la dad dang ldan/ /sdig la 'jigs shing rab tu bsdams/ /dad dang ldan pa phun sum tshogs/
de la dam tshig sbyin par bya/ /de la dam tshig gang zhe na/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /gtso bo de dag lhur blang bya/ /'tsho ba'i srog gi phyir yang ni/ /byang sems
nges par dor mi bya/ /lha rnams la ni smad mi bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgya nam yang min/ /rdo rje slob dpon brnyas mi bya/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs/ /bzhon pa
mtshon cha phyag mtshan dang / /dman ma lus kyi grib ma rnams/ /gya tshom du ni brdzi mi bya/ /nam yang bza' bar mi bya 'o/ /bdag gis sngon ni ji ltar mthong / /sems can
@#/ /gzhan la brjod mi bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgya bslab pa ni/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /sems can bsad par mi bya zhig/ /theg pa gzhan
la dga' mi bya/ /sems can don dang 'khor ba las/ /nam yang skyo bar mi bya'o/ /pha rol phyin drug spyod pa ni/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /bya ba ma yin rtag tu
spang / /khyod kyi dam tshig sdom pa yin/ /gal te snod ldan mchog yin na/ /'di 'dra'i dam tshig brjod par bya/ /ci ste min na btang snyoms gzhag/ ci ste 'dod
pa bde bar bya/ /sbyor ba 'di dag thams cad kyis/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus pa ru/ /rgyud rnams kun gyi dam tshig mchog/ thams cad du ni sbyar bar bya//
cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje chos ni bsgrub pa yis/ /dngos grub mchog kyang sbyin par bya/ /gal te rdo rje can rang grub/ /
mkhas pas gzhan la'ang bslab par bya/ /rang nyid ye shes yang dag skyes/ /de bzhin gzhan la bskyed par bya/ /dkyil 'khor mthong zhing cho ga shes/ /dam
tshig dngos grub dang ldan pa'i/ /dad dang ldan pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /'dir ni slob dpon 'gyur ba yin/ /de yis mchod pa byas nas ni/ /the tshom med
par 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang / /lan bdun gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje slob ma la brjod bya/ /'di las 'jig rten gzhan du min/ /sdug
bsngal kun las rnam par grol/ /khyod 'dir rdo rje can du 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod sprul zhing / /de bzhin gshegs ba'i rigs su skye/ /'khor pa'i gnas kyi
btson ra ru/ /slar yang sdug bsngal 'gyur ba med/ /deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs pa ru/ /de ring khyod ni gyur pa yin/ /nga la spyi
bos gus pas gtugs/ /lus ni theg gsum pha rol phyin/ /mi khom par ni skye mi 'gyur/ /byang chub spyod pas nyes pa med/ /rab tu dga' pa'i sa thob 'gyur/ /
rdo rje can khyod brtson par gyis/ /gzhan tshe bcu drug gis thob pa/ /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyi sa thob kyang / /dkyil 'khor gsang ba mthong
ma gyur| |ji ltar khyod ni deng byung ba/ /de bzhin theg pa yid ches min/ /skye dang skye ba thams cad du/ /rdo rje can ni mngon brtson 'gyur/ /skye ba bcu drug mthar thug
pas| |zhi bar sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i gnas kyi sa thob cing / /bskal pa grangs med gnyis dka' spyod/ /gsang ba'i theg par ma zhugs par/ /
@#/ /bcu drug gis ni 'gyur ba yin/ /'byung bo kun gyis mthong mi 'gyur/ /khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba/ /lha tshogs gdug pa
thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje can ni zil mi non/ /rims gdon dug dang phyag rgya dang / /mkha' 'gro la sogs 'jigs pa'i gdong / /nga rgyal dang bcas gzhan
dag gis/ /slar yang khyod ni zil non min/ /de ni bskal pa brgya ru yang / /rdo rje'i yon tan nyid brjod 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i snying po mchog mthong 'gyur/ /
nam yang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems dpa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya bcings/ /brtson 'grus chen pos brtan par bya/ /ji skad du ni brjod par bya/ /dbab pa
bla na med pa ste/ /'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar bshad/ /rdo rje ye shes bla med pa/ /de nyid kyis ni dbab par bya/ /badzra A be sha aH/
de nas dbab par gyur pa nyid/ /mngon par shes pa drug thob cing / /ye shes dam pa thang cig gis/ /sngon byung min ba'i dga' bde dang / /dga' ba mgu ba
mchog dag dang / /rig pa thams cad mngon du 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul dag ni rdzogs bar 'gyur/ /snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /rdo rje phyag rgya snying gar dgrol/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /rtag tu snying gar zhugs par 'gyur/ /oM tiSh+Tha badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ shA shwa to me b+ha ba/ hr-i da yaM me a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha hUM ha ha ha ha hoH/
de nas snying po 'di yis ni/ /phreng ba nyid ni dor bar bya/ /pra tI ts+tsha ho/ gnas gang du ni phreng ba babs/ /de yi lha ni rigs de yin/ /go rims bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi/ /gsang
ba chen po bstan par bya/ /dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas sa ni the tshom med/ /dri dang ldan zhing yid 'ong ba/ /bum pa'i chu ni blangs nas ni/ /snying po
'di yis dbang bskur bya/ /sdug bsngal rab tu 'khrud pa'i mchog/ oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ de nas phyag rgya gang rung bas/ /phreng ba byin nas dbang bskur bya/ /rdo rje'i
ming gi dbang bskur la/ /ming gi sgra ni rab sbyar bya/ /oM badzra satwa a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta he badzra nA ma/ slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// //
rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ /de la ye shes bslab par bya/ /bzhi las gnag yang rung ba ni/ /skal ba ji bzhin dri bar bya/ /gal te nor gyi dngos grub smra/ /de ni rnam bzhir
bshad par bya/ /nor gyi ye shes chen po bzhi/ /dngos grub rnams ni bslab par bya/ /gang na gter ni yod re ba/ /der ni skyil mo krung bcas te/ /snying gar rdo rje
@#/ /bsgoms na ni/ /gter gyi gnas ni rab mthong 'gyur/ /badzra ni d+hi/ nam mkhar rdo rje bsgom bya zhing / /me long la ni yang dag blta/ /gang du
lhung bar mthong 'gyur ba/ /de ni gter ni yod par bstan/ /rat+na ni d+hi/ rang gi lce la rdo rje bsgom/ /'di na yod ces rang nyid smra/ /d+harma ni d+hi/ rdo rje las ni yang dag
babs| |gang du babs pa der bstan to/ /karma ni d+hi/ gal te rdo rje'i dngos grub smra/ /rnam pa bzhi ni bslab par bya/ /chu ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin mthong / /shin tu mnyam
gzhag dga' bar 'gyur/ /chu ni stug po'i rang bzhin mthong / /chu yi steng du bcag par 'gyur/ /badzra dza la/ bdag nyid ting 'dzin dang ldan pas/ /yang dang yang du
dga' bar bya/ /bdag nyid dga' ba'i gzugs su ni/ /bsgom na de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /badzra rU pa/ bdag nyid nam mkha'i rang bzhin mtshungs/ /rang bzhin med pa
nyid bsgoms shing / /rdo rje dbab pa bskyed byas na/ /myur du mi snang ba nyid 'gyur/ /badzra A kA sha/ rdo rje'i skas ni nam mkha' la/ /bsgom zhing steng du 'dzeg byas
na| |ji srid du ni 'dzeg pa'i gnas/ /de srid mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ /badzra mahA/ rig pa 'dzin pa 'dod smra ba/ /ye shes rnam bzhi sbyin par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil
'khor dbus gnas shing / /nam mkha' la ni bdag nyid gnas/ /lag na rdo rje dang ldan par/ /bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /gal te
chos kyi phyag rgya 'dod/ /gnas sam yang na gzhan yang rung / /bdag nyid gnas par bsgom na ni/ /de ltar gnas shing lag pa ru/ /rdo rje pad+ma rab bsgom zhing / /bdag nyid
rdo rje chos su te/ /pad+ma rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /badzra d+ha ra/ pad+ma d+ha ra/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste/ /bdag nyid las dang yang dag ldan/ /nam mkha' la gnas
bdag nyid ni/ /las kyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid rdo rje rin chen dang / /de bzhin du ni bdag nyid gnas/ /lag tu rin chen rnams bsgoms na/ /rin chen rig
pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /karma d+ha ra/ rat+na d+ha ra/ gal te sangs rgyas dngos grub smra/ /ye shes rnam bzhi brjod par bya/ /rtag tu nam mkhar bsgoms nas ni/ /lus ni yang ba
nyid 'gyur zhing / /rdzu 'phrul gyi ni gnas thob 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid myur du 'phar/ /badzra r-id+d+hi/ stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin bstan//
rdo rje'i bdag nyid ji srid 'dod/ /de srid skad cig gis 'phar 'gyur/ /badzra badzra/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dag /yan lag pad+ma dang ldan zhing / /bdag nyid dag
@#/ /par rab bsgoms na/ /mngon par shes pa lnga thob 'gyur/ /shud+d+ha shud+d+ha/ nyin mtshan brtson 'grus dang bcas pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' yi//
dbyings su bzhugs par bsams na ni/ /rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/ /khams gsum 'di dag thams cad ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs su mos byas nas/ /brtan par rjes
su dran grub na/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /satwa satwa/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ gang tshe gsang ba'i lha mor 'gyur/ /de yi rigs kyi lha ru 'gyur/ /ye shes dag pa brjod
bya zhing / /de la mna' yang bsgrag par bya/ /ji skad gsang mdo dbang gsungs pa/ /de bzhin b+ha gar gzhug par bya/ /yid kyis thams cad bcug nas ni/ /de yi lus
ni mnyam du spro/ /mi bskyod thugs ka nas byung ste/ /rnam par snang mdzad thugs ka nas/ /de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun ni mnyam du spro/ /ting
'dzin sbyor ba la gnas te/ /mnyam par gzhag pas pheg rdob bya/ /rdo rje thal mo'i pheg brdabs pas/ /dngos grub thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /badzra pA sha /rin dbang
thugs ka nas byung te/ /rnam par snang mdzad thugs ka nas/ /sangs rgyas kun ni bcug nas kyang / /bdag nyid rdo rje'i lha mo ru/ /rdo rje thal mo byas nas ni/ /rdo rje bsdams
pa'i mthil brdab bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor bsgrub bya zhing / /rdo rje ye shes yang dag brdab/ /rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni/ /de bzhin du ni b+ha gar zhugs/ /rdo rje thal mo byas nas
ni| |sor mo'i rtse mos mnyam du brdab/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /rtag tu nyon mongs dang 'brel ba/ /nyon mongs zhes bya'i sgrib pa dag /skad cig gis ni rigs
brgya 'joms/ /badzra ha na/ de bzhin b+ha gar gnas nas ni/ /sangs rgyas sku ni mnyam du spro/ /rdo rje lha mor rang bdag nyid/ /rnam par snang mdzad thugs kar gnas/ /rdo rje
lha mo bcings nas ni/ /badzra badzra lan gnyis brjod/ /rdo rje bsdams pa nges bkrol na/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog /badzra ha ra/ de nas rnam par snang
mdzad bsgrub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni/ /sngar gyi ting 'dzin ji bzhin du/ /rdo rje dbyings ni rab tu bya/ /rnal 'byor lnga la'ang rab tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka'

min| |oM tsit+ta pra ti bo d+haM ka ro mi/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mi/ oM tiSh+Tha badzra/ oM badzra at+mA ko\u0f85haM/ oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga ta sta thA a haM/ rnal 'byor lnga po 'di yis ni/ /
phyag rgya lnga ni yang dag bsgrub/ /rnam par snang mdzad rang bdag nyid/ /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzogs pa'i byang
@#/ /chub kyi phyag rgya rnams so/ /sems pa'i skyil mo krung 'dug ste/ /rdo rje gsor la gzung bar bya/ /sku dang gsung thugs phyag rgya dag /rdo rje
sems dpa' rang nyid 'gyur/ /badzra satwA haM/ bsgrub pa dag gi mchog chen po/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /rang nyid rdo rje gsung gis bshad/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor
bsgrub par bya/ /bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul yang dag gzung / /rdo rje dbab par rang gyur nas/ /bdag nyid rdo rje zhes byar bsgom/ /badzra
satwA haM/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan zhing / /dkyil 'khor ma lus ston mdzad pa/ /phreng ba'i rnam pa 'od dang ldan/ /rgyan dang gos dang kha dog ldan/ /Da ba ta ni
brjod bya zhing / /sems dpa' chen po rjes dran bya/ /ye shes sems dpa' gos pa med/ /dga' dag ji srid mthong bar du/ /badzra satwa dr-i sh+ye/ sems dpa' mdun
du bltas nas ni/ /bdag nyid la ni yang dag dbab/ /oM badzra satwa aH/ /sdug cing che ba'i sku de ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyus yang dag dgug /dzaHhUM baM hoH/ rdo rje yi ni
sngags 'di yi/ /bdag nyid chen pos blta bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ka ru/ /slar yang de yi snying gar gzhug /sa ma ya aH/ zhes brjod nas ni rnal
'byor ba/ /zla ba dang ldan steng du gnas/ /ci 'dod pa yi bya ba byed/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'di ji bzhin/ /de nas sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rang gi
phyag rgya yongs 'dzin pa'i/ /rdo rje can kun bsgom par bya/ /gang dag gang la mos gyur pa/ /de bzhin snying po bzla bar bya/ /rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje can dang mtshungs
par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran rab grub nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor bya/ /rang gi phyag rgya yongs 'dzin pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs grub pas/ /'khor lo
sgyur ba nyid thob 'gyur/ /rgyal po bya ba sngon 'gro bas/ /mnyes pa dang ni dbang bskur bya/ /thun ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang / /chos kyi bzhad dang dga' bar gyur/ /ting
'dzin gzungs kyi 'khor lo dang / /gsang ba'i mdzod ni bla na med/ /smin pa dang ni grol ba nyid/ /sangs rgyas byang chub brtan pa'i mchog /rtog pa gsang chen 'di las
ni| |phyag rgya grangs med yang dag byung / /rigs kyi dbye ba yang dag ldan/ /rgya cher rab tu bsgrags pa yin/ /go cha ma bgos snod mi 'gyur/ /le lo khro dang g.yeng
bcas pas/ /ngas par 'dzin par mi nus te/ /de bas nyung bar rab tu bsgrags/ /mdo sde'i dbang po gsang rgyal po/ /de nas phyag rgya rab tu bshad/ /theg pa chen po mngon
@#/ /par rtogs/ /rin chen snod du blta bar bya/ /ye shes kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdzogs so// //rdo rje 'chang rnams kyi snying po/ /gang
las 'khor lo yang dag byung / /rnal 'byor thams cad kun 'byung ba/ /mchog tu gsang ba bshad par bya/ /dbus kyi 'khor lor yang dag bshad/ /rnam 'phrul
zhes ni rab tu bsgrags/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul te/ /'khor lo thabs ni rab ston pa/ /'khor lo lnga ru yang dag bshad/ /thabs ni rnam pa lnga yang yin//
gsang ba yi ni dbye ba gnas/ /'khor lo yi ni rnam 'phrul ston/ /dbus ma gang yin byang chub sems/ /shar gyi bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi/ /lho yi phyogs su bshad pa
ste| |bsod nams tshogs dang yang dag ldan/ /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs rnams dang / /chos su 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa/ /nub tu yang dag brjod pa yin/ /byang ni
sems can smin byas te/ /phyi rol grwa bzhi gang yin pa/ /tshad med ba ni bzhi dang bcas/ /byams pa snying rje btang snyoms dang / /dga' ba zhes ni bya bar bshad/ /
gang zhig thig skud yang dag bshad/ /chos kyi rgyun gyi lam las byung / /lta ba thams cad rnam dag 'di/ /theg pa gzhan ni rnam phar spangs/ /gang zhig kha
khyer zhes bya ba/ /ting 'dzin chos nyid dag pa ste/ /rdo rje lha mor yang dag bshad/ /gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya bar bshad/ /sgo ru yang dag bshad pa gang / /thar pa'i sgo ni bzhi po yin//
rta babs dang ni dra ba nyid/ /chos mdzod rang bzhin grong khyer yin/ /dra ba dra phyed bla re ni/ /rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rnam 'phrul ba/ /tshon rtsi yang dag bshad pa gang / /de 'dra ba yi byang

chub tshogs/ /gang zhig mar me yang dag bshad/ /de ni chos kyi snang ba mchog /dri ru yang dag bshad pa gang / /grags pa'i dri ni bla na med/ /rdzu 'phrul byug pa gang yin pa/ /tshul ni bla na med/ /rdzu 'phrul byug pa gang yin pa/ /tshul
khrims dri yis byugs pa yin/ /bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs pa/ /chos kyi zas ni bla na med/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bar bshad/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /grong
khyer du ni bshad pa gang / /de ni thar pa'i grong khyer mchog /gang zhig dkyil 'khor yang dag bshad/ /chos kyi snying po rang bzhin grong / /nad med ces ni bya bar brjod/ /de ni
dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ /dbus su rnam snang mdzad ces pa/ /chos kun gcig tu bsdus pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rgyal po gtso bo che/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rnam par gsal/ /rdo
rje sems dpa' yang dag bshad/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin mchog /de bas rgyal po byang chub sems/ /byang chub sems las yang dag byung / /rdo rje rgyal por yang dag
@#/ /byung | |sems ni rnam pa bzhi zhes bya/ /sgrol dang grol dang dbugs dbyung dang / /mya ngan 'da' bar lcags kyu'o/ /rdo rje chags par yang dag bshad/ /
byang chub spyod pa la sbyor ba/ /rdo rje legs par yang dag bshad/ /rab tu sbyor ba ston pa nyid/ /rdo rje rin chen yang dag bshad/ /sems can bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed/ /rdo rje
gzi brjid yang dag bshad/ /chos kyi sbyor ba 'od byed pa/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan yang dag bshad/ /sems can 'khor ba las grol byed/ /rdo rje bzhad par yang dag bshad/ /
sems can the tshom gcod par byed/ /rdo rje chos su yang dag bshad/ /chos kyi ye shes bla na med/ /rdo rje rnon por yang dag bshad/ /nyon mongs gcod cing 'joms byed pa//
rdo rje rgyu ru yang dag bshad/ /'khor lo rnam 'phrul ston byed pa/ /rdo rje smra bar yang dag bshad/ /rdo rje chos ni ston byed pa/ /rdo rje las su yang dag bshad/ /sems can
'dul bar byed pa'i mchog /rdo rje srung bar yang dag bshad/ /sems can grol bar byed pa'i mchog /rdo rje gnod sbyin yang dag bshad/ /'khor ba'i zhags pa zad byed
pa| |rdo rje khu tshur yang dag bshad/ /byang chub mchog ni brtan par byed/ /rdo rje sems ma rdo rje chos/ /rin chen las kyi rdo rje ma/ /rdo rje rin chen chos chen po/ /las kyi
gsang ba las byung ba/ /rdo rje lha mo lhag pa brgyad/ /pha rol phyin mchog lhag ma brgyad/ /chos ma shes rab pha rol phyin/ /las ma thabs kyi mchog yin no/ /pha rol phyin bcu dag
pa ni| |sa bcu dag tu yang dag bshad/ /dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer srung / /byang chub sems dpa' zhes byar bshad/ /e ma'o ye shes e ma'o chos/ /e ma'o thar pa'i grong khyer
mchog /e ma'o rnam 'phrul 'khor lo ni/ /thub pa'i dbang phyug dag gis bstan/ /chos kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /mgon pos thar par dgod par mdzad/ /gang du sangs rgyas
brgal gyur nas/ /sems can rnams kyang sgrol bar mdzod/ /'di ni chos kyi rang bzhin grub/ /'di chos rang bzhin shing rta ste/ /chos kyi rang bzhin snying po ste/ /'di chos rang
bzhin grong khyer yin/ /de kho na nyid mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje rtse mo las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang
ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa ste le'u dang po rdzogs so// //dngos grub thams cad bla na med/ /de nas gsang ba bshad par bya/ /rdo rje'i
rig pa 'dzin pa ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni sbyar bar bya/ /cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du/ /phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya/ /ci rigs par ni bcing bya yi/ /gzhan du myur du 'grub mi
@#/ /'gyur/ /thal mo mnyam pa bcing bya ste/ /sngon la thal mo mnyam par bya/ /de nas rdo rje thal mo bcings/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcing bar bya/ /sor mo
rdo rje bsdams bcing nas/ /snying po brjod cing dral bar bya/ /de nas phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /badzra ban+d+ha traT/ 'di ni sngon du brjod bya zhing /
de nas phyag rgya yang dag bcing / /gang gi drung du bcings pa ni/ /bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlabs/ /mahA sa ma ya satwa haM/ shes rab can gyi dbab pa bsam/ /
bdag la sems dpa' dbab par bya/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /snying po yang ni brjod par bya/ /a| phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi ni/ /yan lag kun la yongs
su gnas/ /snying po brjod par bya ba ste/ /snying po 'di dag nyid yin no/ /sa ma yo haM/ de nas bdag nyid byin rlabs nas/ /rang lha yang dag rjes su dran/ /snying po 'di dag
nyid kyis ni/ /snying po brjod par bya ba yin/ /sa ma ya satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa maM/ phyag rgya bsgrub pa lhur len pa/ /de nas shes rab can gyis bsgrub/ /dam tshig sems dpa'
chen po dag /rnam pa bzhi ni bsgrub par bya/ /de la 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i snying po ni/ /ar+tha sid+d+hi/ badzra sid+d+hi/ badzra bIR+ya/ bud+d+ha sid+d+hi/ de nas phyag rgya brtan par byed pa

ni| |oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha wa/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa
me/ tsit+taM shri yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoHb+ha ga wAn/ sarba ta thA ga to badzra mA me muny+tsa badzrI b+ha wa mahA sa ma ya satwa aH/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang / /rdo rje sems dpa'
dang 'drar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya thams cad 'grub 'gyur zhing / /thams cad 'gru par the tshom med/ /de nas phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba ni thun mong yin no/ /phyag rgya thams cad
bcings nas ni/ /tha mar bdag nyid dbang bskur bya/ /sor mo'i rtse mos phreng ba che/ /rnam bzhi yang na rnam pa gsum/ /oM badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ shes rab can gyis go cha
bcing / /ci nus par ni dbang bskur bya/ /snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /phyag rgya thams cad brtan par bya/ /badzra ka pa tse na bi/ /gang nas byung ba der grol te/ /snying po 'di dag
nyid kyis ni/ /gnas de ru ni dgrol bar bya/ /gzhan du bya ba mi byed do/ /oM badzra muH/ mgon po thal mo mnyes bya zhing / /rdo rje thal mo bcing bar bya/ /snying po 'di dag
nyid kyis ni/ /rdo rje can kun mnyes par bya/ /badzra tu Sh+ya ho/ /cho ga 'di yis dgrol bya ste/ /phyag rgya dgrol ba mchog yin no/ /phyag rgya thams cad brtan gyur na/ /rdo rje
@#/ /can ni mnyes par 'gyur/ /snga dro'i dus su nyin re zhing / /shin tu bsdams shing gsang gyur pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ci 'dod bzlas/ /bzlas pa
tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /badzra satwa/ gsang ba'i yi ge hUM bzlas pas/ /rnam pa lnga ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
'grub par 'gyur/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /zla ba gnyis pa yongs su bsgom/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas dang ldan pa/ /rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /mdor
na rdo rje'i dbus su ni/ /yi ge hUM ni sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /yi ge hUM ni bsgrub par bya/ /hUM/ de ltar rnam pa bcu drug ni/ /phyag mtshan thams cad rab
tu bsgom/ /zla ba'i dbus su rab sbyor bas/ /bdag nyid thams cad skad cig 'grub/ /yang na yi ge sbyor bas ni/ /dbus su sbyor bas bsgrub par bya/ /zla ba yi ni
sbyor ba yis/ /yi ge dza sogs 'grub mi 'gyur/ /yi ge ho dang sa dang ni/ /yi ge oM sogs rab sbyor pas/ /zla ba la ni oM a traM/ /yi ge haM ni rab tu bsgrub/ /hrI dang d+hiH
dang maM baM raM/ kaM haM hUM baM bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje'i tshig ni 'di dag gis/ /rdo rje bzlas pas 'grub par bya/ /bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ /bcu drug bdag nyid rab
sbyor bas/ /rnal 'byor rgyud du bsgrub bya zhing / /zla pa'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /de kho na bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ni/ /nyi ma shar ba nas brtsams te/ /bdag nyid
dbul ba la sogs pa/ /sangs rgyas kun la mchod par bya/ /rdo rje can rnams bzod par gsol/ /phyag rgya thams cad bcing bya zhing / /rdo rje thal mos mnyes par bya/ /mtshan
brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /thams cad byas nas gdon par bya/ /lan gsum ngang ni lan bdun du/ /bskor ba dag kyang rab tu bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/ /mkhas pa
yis ni dral bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/ /'khor lo'i dbus su steng du bcing / /gang gis sems ni dag gyur pa/ /phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bcing / /oM badzra muHsnying
po 'di ni brjod nas su/ /phyag rgya thams cad steng du bcing / /sgo dang phyi rol mchod pa la/ /rdo rje'i mu ni brjod par bya/ /gsang ba 'di ni gsang ba che/ /rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa ni/ /
shes rab can gyis kun mi bstan/ /sdom dang ldan pa mchog la sbyin/ /shin tu snod ldan pha rol la/ /de ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs te/ /lag pa g.yas su rdo rje ste/ /g.yon du
dril bu sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje'i brtul zhugs gsang chen po/ /snying po 'di ni sbyin par bya/ /de byin snying gar 'dzin du gzhug /thams cad sgrub pa'i mchog yin no/ /'di de
@#/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta

sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha s+t+waM d+ha ra yA mi badzra satwa/ /hi hi hi hi hUM/ de nas thams cad mtshungs pa ru/ /phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor dgrol bar bya/ /badzra satwa muH/ rdo rje slob dpon
gyi bya ba rdzogs so// //ji ltar cho gar rab ldan nyid/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che/ /de bzhin kun tu bsgrub par bya/ /rdo
rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che/ /kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yis/ /rnal 'byor gyi ni rgyud bsdus pa/ /mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par gyur/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas mgon po che/ /
spyod pa spyod phyir byung ba ste/ /chos kyi mgon po rnal 'byor che/ /rgyud rnams thams cad yang dag byung / /sangs rgyas med cing sems dpa' med/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor
sgrub pa med/ /sa dang gsang ba mchog med de/ /de bzhin 'dul ba'i don du byung / /sangs rgyas mchog dang dam tshig mchog /sems dpa' mchog gi bsgrub pa dang / /gsang
mchog sems dpa' spyod pa mchog /rdo rje rnal 'byor yang dag byung / /yon tan mchog dran dam tshig rnams kyi mchog /yon tan mchog dran dbu rgyan dam pa ste/ /grags
chen dang ldan spyod pa mchog 'dzin pa/ /yon tan mchog ldan rnams kyi spyod pa mchog /rdo rje chen po rab bsdams can/ /rnal 'byor chen po spyod pa chen po spyod/ /gsang ba chen po'i
yon tan 'dzin mdzad pa/ /bde ba chen po yang dag 'byung ba gsol/ /yon tan mchog dran ldan pa cod pan mchog /dam tshig tshogs mchog 'byung bas brgyan gyur pa/ /mi g.yo
rab mchog mchog ster dri ma med/ /spyod mchog spyod pa'i mchog ste dri ma med/ /tshogs kyis bskor ba shin tu bzhad mdzad pa/ /gnod byed 'joms pa tra Ta tra Ta sgrogs/ /g.yo
byed bskyed pa'i bzhad cing bzhad par mdzad/ /yon tan mchog drag tsa la tsa la ba/ /da ha da ha pa ya gnod mdzes 'joms/ /ha ra ha ra ha re ha re las mchog 'joms/ /gnas
chen po ni stobs kyi grub mdzad pa/ /rig mchog stobs kyis grol zhing sgrol mdzad pa/ /ha ha hA ha ha hA ha ha hA/ hi hi hI hi hi hI hi hi hI hi hi hI/ hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu/ rab

mchog bdag nyid mkhas pas 'dren gyur pa/ /Ta Ta TI Ta Ta TI Ta Ta TI Ta TI Ta Ta TI Ta Ta TI/ Tu Tu T+ya T+ya/ n+ya n+ya T+ya T+ya T+ya T+ya T+ya T+ya T+ya T+ya/ rgyan gyi spyod pa 'dar zhing 'dar bar mdzad/ /spyod
pa spyod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur/ /spyod pa spyod byed rab mchog bdag nyid can/ /dam tshig rgyan te rigs drug mchod gyur pa/ /bdag po chen po 'phrog byed 'joms par
@#/ /mdzad/ /'phrog byed bsgrub pa rnams ni grub mdzad pa/ /mchog gsol mchog gi bdag nyid yang dag byung / /ta te Ta te bstan pa'i spyan mnga' ga/
yi ge dza las rab byung mchog ni ster ba hUM ni dang po las sbyor ba/ /ho ho 'dod chags mchog ldan bud med bstan byed sa ni len pa rab ster ba/ /oM ni dang po bla med Ta
Ta Ta Tis a ni gzi brjid rab 'bar ba/ /traM traM rjes su chags pa'i rnal 'byor rdzogs byed ha ni bzhad pa yang dag sbyor/ /hrIHni chos can byed cing rab rno dri med hi ni rgyu
yi 'khor lo che/ /haM dang raM ni mkha' dgyes smra ba'i sbyor ba 'ching byed a ni sna tshogs byed/ /haM ni bsrung ba tra ta 'ges byed ta Ta ta Ti sa dang hUM ni za zhing 'cha'/ /baM ni
dga' byed dga' ste tsha ta tsha ti Ta ni rab dga' byed/ /haM ni rdo rje bstan pa dang bcas bde bstan 'dod chags bcas pa dga' byed do/ /ho ni mgon po skye ba mchog gi
rgyur gyur hri ni dga' ba bdag nyid can/ /hi ni spyod pa 'god byed dul spong mchog ste dus gsum mgon pos bskor gyur pa/ /gsang zhing gsang ba'i yon tan kun mchog
dri med ho ni byang chub spyod pa mchog /mchog gi mchog ste mchog gsol go 'phang mchog thob yi ge hUM ni stsol ba mchog /nyon mongs dri ma thams cad 'joms
shing rab 'phro hUM gi mche ba'i mtshon char ldan/ /sna tshogs dga' ba mchog gis rnam par brgyan mdzes yi ge oM dang yang dag spel/ /he ho haM ni yid 'ong hUM gis rnam 'joms
gnod mdzes des 'joms bdag nyid can/ /bde mchog glu dang rol mo dang bcas pa/ /gzugs bzang dang ldan lha mo rnams kyis mchod/ /zla ba ltar dkar 'phro ba'i zhal
mnga' ba/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i yon tan brtsegs pas mtshan/ /rin chen kun gyis rnam spras yid 'ong ba/ /rin chen dra ba'i bla res rnam par mdzes/ /rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs
kyis mchod cing mdzes/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ni 'jigs med pa/ /sa rnams kun gyi rnam sbyang dri med pa/ /byang chub spyod pa yongs rtogs bdag nyid can/ /chos
mdzad yongs su rtogs pa'i zas dang ldan/ /bsod nams de yis bskyed pa'i dga' ba che/ /tshangs pa'i rnal 'byor gru bzhir yang dag gnas/ /chos mchog go rims bzhin
du thig btab pas/ /'khor lo mu khyud rab tu mdzes bris pa/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni gtso bo bzhugs/ /ting 'dzin mchog rnams kha khyer gyis mdzes pa/ /gzungs kyi lha
yi tshogs kyis mchod pa'i tshogs/ /thar pa'i theg pas byams pa'i sgo yis brgyan/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'dren pa bzhugs/ /pha rol phyin pa btsun mo gar byed pa/ /sems
@#/ /can smin byed rnam par 'phrul la dga'/ /bsam gtan zas ldan mngon shes mchog gis brgyan/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'dren pa bzhugs/ /dkyil
'khor de ni gtso bo'i chos nyid can/ /chos nyid bstan pa'i snying po kun zhugs pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi tshogs 'dus mdzes pa yis/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i gsang ba zhes byar
bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug dam pa che/ /gsang ba kun 'byung ting 'dzin yang dag gnas/ /de ni rnam snang thub pa'i chos nyid gzigs/ /gzungs dang dam tshig
yang dag 'byung ba mchog /dga' ba'i chos bzhin rdo rje yang dag gnas/ /de ni rnam snang thub pa'i dbang phyug gtso/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po nges par phyung / /hUM/ shin
tu dag pa'i chos nyid lta bur byung / /sangs rgyas dbang phyug dam pa'i kun gyi mchog /rtse gcig dang bcas e ma'o dga' ba che/ /sangs rgyas sku yang bud med gzugs
can te/ /sems can khams ni gdul phyir yang dag gnas/ /bud med gzugs kyang chos nyid dag pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gdung rgyud gnas gyur pa/ /rang gi rigs

chen byung ba des byung mdzod/ /oM badzra d+hA twI shwa ri hUM/ oM badzra badzrI Ni hUM/ oM rat+na badzrI Ni hUM/ oM d+harmA badzrI Ni hUM/ oM karma badzrI Ni hUM/ mchog gi dang po rmad byung gsang ba
lnga| |sangs rgyas lngas byas bud med gzugs can ta/ /rmad byung dam bcas dbang phyug dam par gnas/ /rdo rje gsang chos nyid kyi gsang ba mchog /'khor lo'i sbyor bas kyang ni
bzhugs gyur pas/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis ni shar du bzhugs/ /de ni rigs kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor brjod/ /re re zhing yang rnal 'byor mchog dang ldan/ /rnal 'byor
'khor lor yongs su bshad pa mchog /de yis mi bskyod mchog tu byung ba yi/ /mchog tu gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor gsungs/ /oM badzra satwa gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/ oM gu h+ya badzra
