@#/ /ha la'i sgra chen po/ /nam mkha' bar snang la ni drag /rdo rje drag po tshogs chen po/ /lha rnams thams cad 'thab par byed/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje
'dzin| |gtum po drag po 'jig byed pas/ /lha yi len gyi phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje yi ni snying po gsungs/ /oM ma hA sa ha sra ha ra badzra tsa kre/ oM ma hA badzra shU le/ oM dIp+ta dz+wa la
ag+ni badzra/ oM badzra shak+ti/ oM mahA badzra ni d+hi/ de lta bu yi rnam pa ru/ /snying po dag ni stong phrag gcig /srid gsum zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje 'chang ni chen pos
phyung | |gtum po 'od zer 'bar bas khyab/ /rdo rje me dang yang dag ldan/ /drag po'i snying po las byung gyur/ /rdo rje 'chang ni dbus na bzhugs/ /lha tshogs phyag rgya de dag
ni| |rnam par gshig cing dum bur byas/ /bcom zhing bsdams te bsres nas ni/ /phyogs rnams kun tu thim par gyur/ /rdo rje me yis rab bsdams pas/ /lha yi
rgyal po 'bar bar gyur/ /'og nas sa ni rab tu 'bar/ /steng nas me ni shin tu gdungs/ /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches/ /dbang phyug chen po la gsungs pa/ /lus srul po
ni drag po che/ /nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon/ /dur khrod gnas la rab tu dga'/ /las la thal ba dag gis byugs/ /mi yi sha ni za bar byed/ /nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon/
khrag rlon gyis ni rab tu bskus/ /lpags pa rlon pa gos su gyon/ /lha rnams thams cad khyod kyi 'khor/ /nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon/ /gdug pa drag chen mtshan mo rgyu ba slong
mo ba/ /khrag la spangs pa'i lpags can lus la thal bas byugs/ /nga yi bka' nyon drag po'i sems ldan lus srul po/ /min na bskal pa'i me yis rtswa bzhin khyod
bsreg bya/ /ro bsregs thal ba'i phung po bzhin du thal bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa'i me chen dang mtshungs pas ni rab 'jigs 'gyur/ /rigs bcas dpung ldan dkyil 'khor
dang bcas gnod sbyin drag /rdo rje drag po yis ni rab gzhom ga zhig par bya/ /dbang phyug chen pos smras pa/ /nga ni ma lus dbang phyug chen po 'khor los bsgyur/ /'jig
rten gsum gyi lha tshogs ma lus pa yi 'khor/ /shin tu drag cing rnam gtsigs 'jig rten khyod yin yang / /khyod kyis nga yi bka' ni mnyan par gyis/ /gdug dang sangs
rgyas mang po'i 'khor ni sangs rgyas ches kyi 'byung gnas nga yis sprul/ /zhi zhing de la rnam 'dul gsang ba dri med nyon mongs med pa'i pha rol phyin de 'dra'i mgon po dga'
ba dus gsum bzhugs pa thams cad des dbang bskur/ /slar yang nga yi 'byung po'i tshig nyon zhes pa'i tshig ni 'di lta bu/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /'dul ba'i don
@#/ /la shin tu mkhas/ /khro bo gdug pa gtu ma chen po/ /rab 'bar khro bo'i rgyal po ni/ /rdo rje'i byin brlabs phyag rgya las/ /bya ba de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/ /
snyoms par zhugs nas sems dpa' ches/ /rang rigs khro bo las byung ba/ /gdug pa rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir/ /khro bo'i chos kyi tshul bzung nas/ /rkang pa nas brtsams
spyi bo'i bar/ /lus kun las ni rnam par phyung / /oM badzra kro d+ha uSh+tI Sha hUM/ /rdo rje'i gtsug tor khro bo che/ /'bar ba'i spyi bo nas phyung nas/ /sa rnams thams cad g.yo byed cing //
khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad 'joms/ /oM badzra b+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+ha hUM/ khro bo'i rgyal po khro gnyer can/ /mdzod spu las ni rab tu byung / /'jigs byed drag po yang dag ldan/ /lus
rnams thams cad 'bar 'gyur ba/ /oM ni sum+b+ha badzra hUM/ /rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po/ /kha las rab tu byung bar gyur/ /spyi bo nas brtsams rkang mthil bar/ /rdo rje 'bar ba
yang dag ldan/ /Tik+ka hUM dzaH/ thugs kyi khro bo rgyal po che/ /thugs ka nas ni rab tu byung / /'phar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa'i sku/ /'jigs su rung ba spu langs byed/ /oM badzra
aM ku shaM A kaR+Sha ya hUM/ /rdo rje lcags kyu khro bo che/ /phrag pa g.yas nas rab tu byung / /rdo rje lcags kyu gsor byed cing / /rdo rje 'bar ba yang dag ldan/ /oM badzra pA sha kro d+ha
A kaD+h+ya hUM phaT/ /rdo rje zhags pa khro bo che/ /phrag pa g.yon nas rab tu phyung / /rdo rje 'bar ba yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje zhags pas bskor bar byed/ /oM badzra kI li kro d+ha hUM phaT/ /
khro bo'i rgyal po lcags kyu thogs/ /lte ba'i dbus nas rab tu phyung / /kun nas 'bar ba yang dag ldan/ /blo mchog rdo rje gnod sbyin mtshungs/ /oM badzra me kha lA kro d+ha hUM/
khro bo chen po ska rags ni/ /rked pa'i rdo rje rab tu phyung / /kun nas 'bar bar yang dag ldan/ /phyag rgya dang ni lhan cig ldan/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ba la hUM/ /khro bo'i rgyal po chen
po stobs/ /dpung pa g.yas nas rab tu phyung / /rdo rje 'phar bas 'bar bar gyur/ /me yis shin tu nga rgyal gyur/ /oM badzra pa lA ya kro d+ha hUM/ /khro bo'i rgyal po gdu bu ni/ /
dpung pa g.yon las yang dag phyung / /gsang zhing rdo rje 'bar bas khyab/ /rdo rje khro bo rab tu khengs/ /oM sa ma ya badzra kro d+ha hUM hUM phaT/ /dam tshig khro bo'i rgyal po ni/ /de bzhin
khro bo'i gnod byed pa/ /khu tshur g.yas nas rab tu phyung / /kun nas 'bar ba yang dag ldan/ /oM badzra muSh+Ti kro d+ha hUM phaT/ /khro bo khu tshur drag po che/ /khu tshur g.yon las
rab tu byung / /rdo rje 'bar ba dag gis gsal/ /rdo rje me yis rab tu brgyan/ /oM badzra ba na d+ha kro d+ha hUM/ sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra a ny+dza li ban d+ha kro d+ha hUM/ sa ma ya hUM/
@#/ /rdo rje 'ching ba rgyal po che/ /de bzhin rdo rje sor mo nyid/ /khro bo lag pa g.yas g.yon gyi/ /sor mo dag las yang dag byung / /oM badzra na kha hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha a

ku li ma ha kro d+ha hUM/ rdo rje sder mo khro bo che/ /de bzhin rdo rje sder mo'i gdong / /phyag ni g.yon dang g.yas pa yi/ /sor mo dag las rab tu byung / /oM badzra ku mA ra kro d+ha ka Ti rA ga hUM/ oM badzra

ku mA ra kro d+ha mur+d+ha D+ha ka hUM phaT /khro bo'i rgyal po rked pa dang / /de bzhin khro bo spyi gtsug dag /rgyal po brla ni g.yon pa dang / /g.yas pa dag las rab tu byung / /oM shr-iM kha le mahA kro d+ha ban

d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha A sha ni ban d+ha hUM/ gnam lcags rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /rgyal po 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab/ /pus mo'i lha nga dag las byung / /oM

badzra ban+d+ha kro d+ha ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha aM ku sha hUM phaT/ rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo che/ /rdo rje yi ni yan lag drangs/ /'bar ba dang bcas gnod sbyin gnyis/ /rje ngar dag las rab tu

phyung / /oM nU bu ra kro d+ha hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha mo g+ha be ga A na ya hUM phaT/ de nas dka' thub khro bo che/ /de bzhin rdo rje don yod nyid/ /rgyal po shugs chen gnyis po ni/ /gdu bu'i rkang las rab

tu byung / /oM badzra ban+d+ha ha la kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra pA tA la mA ra ya kro d+ha hUM phaT/ rkang pa khro bo shugs chen po/ /de bzhin mthil gyi khro bo nyid/ /'bar ba 'phro ba lhur len pa/ /gnyis po
zhabs kyi mthil las byung / /de dag la sogs rgyal po ni/ /dpag tu med par rab tu phyung / /gang+ga'i bye snyed grangs med par/ /phra rab rdul gyi khams dag ni/ /ba spu'i gseb ni thams cad dang //
lus kyi gseb ni thams cad nas/ /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po che/ /rang gi snying po las byung 'gyur/ /rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /phyogs rnams kun tu yongs spros te/ /slar yang gcig tu gyur
nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar 'dus/ /ched du brjod pa yang dag brjod/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thabs chen po/ /e ma'o ye shes shin tu
bzang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin ni/ /theg pa chen po zhes byar bshad/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /dpag tu med pa zhes byar gyur/ /rdo rje'i rigs kyi khro bo 'di/ /thams cad
rdo rje'i rigs su bshad/ /sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir/ /de nyid sangs rgyas rigs chen po/ /de nas de yi gsang ba'i mtshan/ /thams cad rdo rje'i rigs su bshad/ /khro bo che
las yang dag byung / /rdo rje khro bo'i dbang phyug bshad/ /rdo rje gtsug tor rdor mdzad spu/ /gnod mdzes bdag cag stobs po che/ /thugs kyi khro bo rgyal po che/ /rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba dang //

rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje zhags/ /rked pa'i khro bo stobs po che/ /ske rags stobs ldan nyid dang ni/ /lag gdub de bzhin dam tshig dang / /rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje bsdams/ /rdo rje sor mo shin tu drag /rdo rje sen
@#/ /mo rdo rje gdong / /de bzhin rked pa khro rgyal po/ /khro bo spyi gtsug rgyal po dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po lu gu rgyud/ /rdo rje gnam lcags rdo rje dbyig /rdo rje khro bo yan lag
drag /rdo rje dka' thub rdor don yod/ /rdo rje zhabs dang de bzhin mthil/ /dam tshig rdo rje rgyal po 'di/ /rdo rje yi ni rigs su bshad/ /de dag la sogs rgyal po ni/ /rgyal po chen po rdzu
'phrul che/ /byang chub sems las yang dag byung / /rtag tu gzhan yang grangs med pa/ /khros pas rang gi sha za zhing / /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab par gnas/ /bskal pa yi ni me ltar
'bar/ /rdo rje khro bos dkyil 'khor ni/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni bskyed nas kyang / /rab tu drag 'dzin bka' bsgos pas/ /gdug pa rnams ni 'dul bar gyis/ /nga yi bka' yang mnyan par
gyis/ /rdo rje can kun rang nyid kyi/ /bka' thob nas ni gzung bya ste/ /lha rnams kun gyi gsung gcig gis/ /rig pa 'di ni brjod par gyur/ /oM ni sum+b+ha badzra hUM phaT/ rdo rje khro bo stobs
po che/ /gtsug tor la sogs kun gsungs pa/ /lha chen la sogs gdug pa rnams/ /'og tu kha bltas 'gyel bar gyur/ /rdo rje khro bo stobs po che/ /lha rnams rgyal bar gyur nas ni/ /rdo

rje 'bar ba 'bar zhes pas/ /snying po dag ni yang dag brjod/ /oM badzra a na la da ha pa tsa ma tha b+hany+dza ra Na hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po rdo rje'i mi/ /skad cig de las byung nas ni/ /lha rnams de
dag bsregs nas kyang / /de bzhin 'og tu bsgyel bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje mes ni rab tu sreg /rdo rje 'bar bas 'bar bar gyur/ /tshig cing btsos par gyur nas ni/ /lha la sogs pa 'o dod 'bod//
rdo rje khro chen de rnams de/ /de bzhin khro chen la sogs pas/ /thams cad gsung gcig byas nas ni/ /slar yang snying po gsungs par gyur/ /oM badzra A be sha a/ /rdo rje dbab pa'i
khro bo che/ /rdo rje can gyi thugs las byung / /lha rnams kun gyi gnas song nas/ /de bzhin lha chen la sogs pa/ /lha rnams kun la yang dag babs/ /rdo rje dbab par rab sdug bsngal//
byas nas rang gi yan lag dang / /gcig la gcig ni za bar byed/ /rdo rje can dang bcas pa kun/ /rdo rje zhags pa yang dag brjod/ /oM badzra dzra la ag+ni pra dI p+ta mahA badzra aM ku sha A
kaR+Sha ya hUM/ rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal song nas/ /skad cig gis ni yang dag 'gugs/ /lha rnams thams cad bkug nas ni/ /spyi bo ru ni ltung bar byed/ /rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag
'gugs/ /rdo rje zhags pas drangs par gyur/ /rdo rje 'bar bas rab bsregs nas/ /steng du rkang ba 'og tu mgo /ha ha zhes ni sgrogs byed cing / /'jigs pa'i skad cig sdug bsngal
gyur/ /rdo rje can la gsol ba 'debs/ /stobs chen gzhom par ma mdzad cig /de bzhin lha la sogs pa kun/ /dkyil 'khor du ni dgug par gyur/ /rdo rje can dang bcas kun
@#/ /gyis/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog yang dag brjod/ /oM badzra s+pho Ta ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ lha tshogs gdug pa de dag ni/ /'ching ba lnga yis bcings par gyur/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog khro bo che//
'ching ba brtan pa bcings par gyur/ /khro bo rdo rje rgyal po che/ /shin tu gtum pa stobs po che/ /slar yang snying po yang dag dran/ /rang gi snying po yang dag brjod/ /hUM| snying po dag po brjod
pa yis/ /gdug pa de rnams rab tu 'gyel/ /g.yo med shi ba bzhin du gyur/ /'chi ba'i sdug bsngal nye bar 'thob/ /de nas rgyal po rnam snang mdzad/ /chos kun dbang phyug dbang dang
ldan/ /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po che/ /rdo rje 'chang la bos bar gyur/ /sems dpa' chen po mnyan par gyis/ /'di rnams sems can rab 'jigs byed/ /'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo
'di/ /srog ni gzhom par ma byed cig /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje kun bdag dbang ldan pas/ /sangs rgyas gsung ni thos nas su/ /rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod/ /oM
badzra ut+tiSh+Tha/ /rdo rje slong ba rdzu 'phrul che/ /de ni brjod pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha la sogs pa thams cad ni/ /slar yang gson pa nyid du gyur kla /sdug bsngal kun dang rab tu phral/ /'chi
ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar gyur/ /rdo rje slong ba'i byams pa yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab bskul bas/ /de nas lha la sogs pa kun/ /sangs rgyas byams pas langs par gyur//
thal mo sbyar nas tshig gcig gis/ /bcom ldan 'das la zhus gyur pa/ /bcom ldan nyes pa gang gis ni/ /bdag cag 'di ltar 'dul bar mdzad/ /sangs rgyas thugs rje can kun gyis//
bdag cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /khyed cag yongs su bskyab pa dang / /phan gdags par ni ngas mi nus/ /'di ni drag po rdo rje 'dzin//
sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag por bshad/ /de rnams kyis gsol ba/ /khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi don/ /ji ltar rung lags mi 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas bdag por gyur//
sangs rgyas 'phags pa ji lta bu/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub gang / /de ni rdo rje can du gyur/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /rdo rje gang yin
drag po 'dzin/ /de rnams kyis gsol pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu zhi/ /de ni byang chub de dang mtshungs/ /brtse dang byang chub sems las byung / /de 'dra'i drag po ga las byung / /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /'di ni thabs kyis 'dul ba ste/ /gdug pa thams cad rab 'dul byed/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa 'di/ /byang chub sems las yang
dag byung / /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje khro bo bdag chen pos/ /lha tshogs kun la bos nas ni/ /dbang phyug chen po la gsungs pa/ /nga yis bstan pa'i bka' dag ni/ /kyai
@#/ /gdug pa dag mnyan par gyis/ /min na rdo rje 'bar ba yis/ /rigs dang bcas ba nga yis sreg/ /khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams kyis/ /tshig gcig
tu ni 'di skad zhus/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /rgyal po chen po de bzhin bgyi/ /de nas lha chen gyis smras pa/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin ngas mi shes/ /nga ni rang nyid rgyal po ste//
nga yis bka' ni mnyan par gyis/ /lha chen po yi tshig gsan nas/ /rdo rje khro bo rab 'bar bas/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin 'joms zhes pa/ /khro bo'i rgyal po yang dag brjod/ /oM badzra ni
sum+b+ha hUM/ shin tu gtum pa stobs chen po/ /khro bo 'di ni brjod pa yis/ /dbang phyug chen po brgyal gyur nas/ /de bzhin sa la 'gyel bar gyur/ /g.yo med 'chi ba'i dbang du
gyur/ /shing 'gyel bzhin du gnas par gyur/ /'gul ba med cing g.yo ba med/ /rdo rje khro bos gdungs par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rdo rje khro bo thams
cad mkhyen/ /bdag nyid chen po 'di yis ni/ /srog gi rgyu ni zad pa dang / /de nyid nyams par ci phyir byed/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas thugs rjes bskul ba yin//
rdo rje tsho yis bya ba ste/ /rdo rje'i rig pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra A yuH/rig pa 'di ni brjod pa yis/ /dbang phyug chen pos yang dag langs/ /rdo rje che yis gson byas nas//
bde ba chen po thob par gyur/ /rnam par snang mdzad thub chen la/ /zhabs dag la ni btud nas gsol/ /mgon po bcom ldan skyabs su gsol/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa de gdug min/ /
kun mkhyen bcom ldan bka' stsal pa/ /nga yis brtse bar bya mi nus/ /'di ni gdug pa shin tu drag /de nyid la ni skyabs su song / /rdo rje khro bos lha chen po/ /kun tu bos nas 'di
skad smras/ /nga yis bstan pa'i bka' dag ni/ /gdug pa chen po mnyan par gyis/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin bdag chen la/ /lha chen po yis slar smras pa/ /'chi ba chen po bzod nus
kyi| /khyod kyi bka' la gnas mi byed/ /rdo rje khro bo drag po che/ /khros pas gdug pa 'phel gyur nas/ /hUM ni shin tu 'jigs byed pa/ /snying po drag po brjod par gyur/ /hUM| yi ge

hUM ni brjod pa yis/ /dbang phyug chen po slar yang 'gyel/ /rdo rje khro bo drag po cha/ /rkang par bkug pa yang dag brjod/ /oM pA ta A kaR+Sha Na badzra hUM/ /de nas rdo rje dbang po 'di/ /brjod pas rdo rje

khro bo byung / /tshig ni 'di skad brjod par 'gyur/ /bka' stsal brjod cing 'od chen po/ /rdo rje khro bos bka' stsal pa/ /oM pA ta A kaR+Sha ya sarba badzra d+ha ra ka tsa ra phaT badzra hUM dzaH/ /khro bo chen pos
'di gsungs nas/ /dbang phyug chen po u mar bcas/ /rkang pas 'gug pa'i rdo rje yis/ /rdo rje rkang pa dag gis bkug /rdo rje khro bos de dag bkug /steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo /'jig rten
@#/ /thams cad dgod gyur cing / /rdo rje gdung bas gdungs par gyur/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /dbang phyug chen po u mar bcas/ /zhabs kyis mnan
nas rdo rje yis/ /dbang phyug chen po rdeg par byed/ /des ni rkang ba g.yon pa yis/ /dbang phyug chen pa mnan byas nas/ /g.yas pas lha mo u ma yi/ /nu ma dag gi bar du
btsir/ /rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /dbang phyug chen po rab tu mnan/ /oM badzra A kra ma hoH/ /slar yang dbab pa'i rig pa ni/ /rdo rje khro bos yang dag brjod/ /oM badzra A
bi sha ha na ha na tra Ta/ /dbang phyug chen po bcas gyur pas/ /rang gi lag pas lan stong du/ /rang gdong 'jigs su rung la brdeg /stong phrag gcig tu yang dag gyur/ /'jig
rten gsum gnas thams cad ni/ /'o dod chen po 'bod par gyur/ /bdag cag gi ni rgyal po 'di/ /'di lta bu yi bdag nyid gyur/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /brtse dang snying rje
skyes par 'gyur/ /snying rje steng du gzhug bya ste/ /sangs rgyas byams pa yang dag brjod/ /oM bud+d+ha mai tri rak+Sha/ dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin gtso bos/ /de nas sngags 'di gsungs
pa yis/ /dbang phyug chen po'i sdug bsngal de/ /skad cig de la nye bar zhi/ /phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs dag gis/ /reg pas dbang phyug chen pos ni/ /sa chen po ni yang dag 'thob//
ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs de bzhin/ /tha mal pa yi lus bor nas/ /rdo rje 'dzin la phul bar gyur/ /lha chen 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ /shi zhing lus ni bor nas su/ /gang+gA sum cu rtsa gnyis
gnyis kyi/ /bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing dang mnyam/ /thal bas g.yogs pa'i gnas zhes pa/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni yid 'ong ba/ /de ru song nas lha chen po/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang bstan
par gyur/ /thal ba'i dbang phyug sgra dbyangs can/ /de bzhin gshegs pa der gnas gyur/ /de nas shi ba'i lus de yis/ /ched du brjod pa yang dag brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yis
ni/ /tshigs bcad gcig ni mngon par brjod/ /e ma 'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ /bsad nas skad cig dag gis ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas dgod
mdzed/ /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches/ /dbang phyug chen po yang dag phyung / /khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams la/ /kun tu bos nas 'di gsungs pa/ /rab mchog dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /
gtso bo rab tu gzhugs par gyis/ /gal te de bzhin mi byed na/ /dbang phyug chen po bzhin du bya/ /de nas lha kun 'jigs gyur te/ /skrag nas thams cad kyis zhus pa/ /de bzhin du ni
bgyid par 'tshal/ /bdag cag khyed kyi bran du gyur/ /rgyal po khyed kyi dam tshig ni/ /ji ltar bsgrub par mi bgyid lags/ /bdag cag rnams ni khyod kyi 'khor/ /skal ba chen po bka'
@#/ /stsol cig /rdo rje khro bos bka' stsal pa/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /skyabs su rab tu 'gro bar gyis/ /byang sems yang dag bskyed nas
ni| |sems can kun la yang dag sbyor/ /srog gcod pa ni spang bar gyis/ /rku dang brdzun du smra ba dang / /gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin du/ /de ni dang por spang bar gyis/ /sems
can gnod dang ldan pa ni/ /ci nas kyang ni mi bya'o/ /byang chub spyod pa rab sbyor ba/ /de la lhod min brtson par bya/ /nga yi bstan ba'i bka' yi ni/ /'di dag dam tshig yang
dag brjod/ /nga yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis/ /min na khyod ni kun tu sreg /de nas 'jig rten gsum 'khor los/ /de yi tshig ni blangs nas kyang / /byang sems yang dag bskyed
nas ni/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song / /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches/ /kun tu phyag rgya byin nas kyang / /phyag rgya snying po 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje ti rin ti ri yi/ /dkyil 'khor

du ni bcug gyur pas/ /oM badzra sa ma ya gr-ih+Na bud+d+ha sa ma ye badzra sa twa sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya traM/ dr-i D+ho ma b+ha ba/ a pra ti ha ro me b+ha ba/ sarba karma su tsa me
tsit+taM shri yaH/ /ku ru ha ha ha ha hU/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis ni/ /phyag rgya kun tu babs par gyur/ /rdo rje ti rin ti ri yi/ /phyag rgya kun tu bstan par gyur/ /de dag rim bzhin
bcug nas ni/ /rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur gyur/ /rdo rje mtshan ma lag byin nas/ /rdo rje ming ni dbang bskur gyur/ /de la lha rnams thams cad ni/ /rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur 'gyur/
sngon la 'jig rten gsum bdag po/ /go rims bzhin du dbang bskur 'gyur/ /khyab 'jug ces byar gnas par ni/ /sgyu ma'i rdo rje zhes byar grags/ /gzhon nu rdo rje dril bu ste/ /
tshangs pa rdo rje thub pa nyid/ /dbang po rdo rje mtshon cha nyid/ /de dag rig pa'i bdag por bshad/ /rgyal po bzhi po gzi brjid che/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs chen pos/ /bar snang la ni rgyu
ba nyid/ /rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur gyur/ /nyi ma rdo rje 'khyil ba ste/ /de bzhin zla ba rdo rje 'od/ /dbyig chen rdo rje dbyig to ste/ /ser skya rdo rje ser skya yin/ /de la sogs pa khro rgyal
po| |rdo rje khro bor dbang bskur gyur/ /de nas mkha' spyod lha rnams ni/ /rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur gyur/ /myos chen rdo rje myos pa ste/ /rdo rje phreng ba sbrang rtsi byed/ /rnam par rgyal
dang rgyal byed dang / /rdo rje shis dang rgyal bar ldan/ /tshogs kyi rgyal po bdag po dag /ces bya la sogs dbang bskur gyur/ /de nas sal gnas pa rnams/ /rdo rje'i ming gis
dbang bskur gyur/ /gtun shing mdzod ni bsrung ba ste/ /me ni de bzhin rdo rje me/ /rdo rje rlung ni rlung chen po/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed ngan rdo rje/ /de 'dra la sogs pho nya rnams/ /rdo rje mchog
@#/ /gi dbang bskur gyur/ /de nas sa 'og gnas pa ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rkang za ba/ /de bzhin gshin rje rdo rje nag /sa yi gtsug ni bgegs rdo rje/ /chu lha mgon
po rdo rje 'dzin/ /de nas lha mo ji bzhin du/ /go rims bzhin du dbang bskur gyur/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur gyis/ /yum gyi mchog rnams dbang bskur gyur/ /khyab 'jug ma ni rdo
rje gser/ /drug ldan rdo rje gzhon nu ma/ /tshangs pa rdo rje brgyad cu ma/ /dbang po rdo rje khu tshur ma/ /gsod byed rdo rje gsod nyid ma/ /snar ma rdo rje 'od ldan ma/ /de las dbyig pa rdor
mchog ma/ /'phrog ma rdo rje ska rags te/ /gsod byed rdo rje 'jigs ma ste/ /gnam lcags rdo rje gnam lcags ma/ /nam gru rdo rje dbang ldan ma/ /gos can rdo rje gos can ma/ /
rdo rje pho nya zhi ba ma/ /rlung lha rdo rje shugs can ma/ /lus ngan ma ni rdo rje gdengs/ /me lha de bzhin rdo rje 'bar/ /phag mo rdo rje gdong can ma/ /rdo rje nag mo tsa muN+Ti/ /chu lha rdo rje
chu srin ma/ /sna chad ma ni sbrul mo ste/ /de 'dra la sogs grangs med pa/ /lha mo rnams ni dbang bskur gyur/ /rang rang rigs ni rtogs nas su/ /ji bzhin lha yi bdag por
bshad/ /de nas phyag rgya bcing ba byin/ /de bzhin dam tshig snying po 'o/ /lha rnams kun gyi bdag po kun/ /bkug nas de bzhin dbang du 'gyur/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings
nas/ /sdig mdzub dang ni lcags kyu bcings/ /'ching ba dang ni grol byed par/ /dngos po bya ba'i don sems dpa'/ /de yi mdun du khyed rnams ni/ /bya ba bsgrub phyir gnas
par gyis/ /khyod kyi srog ni nyams gyur pa'i/ /de bzhin dam tshig sbyin mi bya/ /rgya cher phyag rgya chen por ni/ /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor sbyor byed pa/ /
de nyid ces bya bstan pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor mchog rnams de dag dang / /de bzhin lha la sogs pa kun/ /bkug cing rab tu bcug par gyur/ /rdo rje can gyis dbang byas nas/ /
rdo rje thams cad dbang bskur gyur/ /rdo rje ming gis mtshan par byas/ /lha chen po ni gcig pu nyid/ /zhabs kyi 'og tu brdabs nas bzhag /'jig rten gdug pa cher gyur pa/ /gdug
pa'i snying po zhes byar grags/ /gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po yi/ /sems can 'ongs par the tshom med/ /thang cig tshes grangs re re ma/ /gang du zla gcig dkyil 'khor du/ /
sems can stong phrag brgya dag ni/ /skad cig de la sdug bsngal byed/ /yid ni nye bar 'jal bar byed/ /mdangs ni nye bar 'phrog pa'i nad/ /mi yi skye bo gsod pa dang / /tha na dug
chen nyid dang ni/ /grong khyer dang ni grong rdal dang / /grong dag 'joms par byed pa dag /sems can rnams ni gcod byed dang / /skye bo stong pa sbyor byed dang / /de ltar drag cing
@#/ /'jigs su rung / /brtse ba med cing sdig byed dang / /gsod pa dang ni 'joms par byed/ /shes rab 'phrog par byed pa dang / /drag po sna tshogs
gzugs 'dzin pa/ /dud 'gro'i 'gro ba'i bar dang ni/ /sems can rnams la gnod byed dang / /myur du mdangs ni 'phrog pa dang / /lo nyes thog dang char dang ni/ /char ni mi
'bab byed pa dang / /grang dang dro ba'i gdung ba dag /skad cig de la skyed pa dang / /gdon ni 'bab par byed pa dang / /de bzhin bdud mchog skyed pa dang / /sems ni rnam par
g.yeng byed dang / /de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mtha' yas dang / /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /dkon mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug ste/ /skye dgu sna tshogs nad kyis btab/ /ye shes
kyi ni spyan gyis gzigs/ /dam tshig sdang ba'i sems can dang / /yams dang de bzhin nye bar 'tshe/ /rims dang gdon dang dug drag po/ /skye dgu 'di rnams 'joms
par byed/ /sna tshogs sdug bsngal kun tu 'khrugs/ /'jigs pa sna tshogs dag gis khyab/ /thams cad nyams shing zil gyis non/ /sdug bsngal drag pos sdug bsngal
gyur/ /slar yang bde bar bya ba'i phyir/ /nag po'i sngags ni yongs su gzung / /mkha' 'gro ma mo rnal 'byor mas/ /'gro ba'i don ni kun tu khyab/ /rims dang gdon dang
'byung po dang / /mkha' 'gro ma mo 'byung po dang / /gdug pa rnams kyis kun tu khyab/ /'jig rten sdug bsngal snod 'di ni/ /gzigs nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /thugs rje dag ni
bskyed par gyur/ /kye ma'o sems can 'di sdug bsngal/ /de la rjes su brtse byed med/ /nga ni kho na rang byung ste/ /de bzhin sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog /nga la log par
rtog pa ste/ /skye dgu de la brtse pa med/ /dbang phyug chen po gang yin dang / /gdug pa thams cad rab 'dul byed/ /yang dag byang chub rang byung gyur/ /skye dgu ma lus bskyab/
par bya/ /thams cad dag ni dgug bya zhing / /de bzhin dam tshig bsrung bar bya/ /gnod dang phan pa byas nas ni/ /skye dgu 'di dag rnam par grol/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//
dkyil 'khor skyob dang phan 'dogs pa/ /zhes bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/ /sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs/ /mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun/ /'di ltar
bka' ni nod par byed/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /de bzhin snying po phyung bar gyur/ /oM badzri sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM phaT/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas bka'

ni bzung nas kyang / /phyi rol dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i phyir/ /lcags kyu'i snying po rab tu phyung / /oM badzra sa ma ya A kaR+Sha ya sarba maN+Da la badzra d+ha ra satwa mA ti kra ma hUM phaT/ rig pa brjod
@#/ /par gyur pa yis/ /rdo rje lcags kyu shin tu brtan/ /lcags kyu bdag nyid che mchog ni/ /brgya phrag grangs med byung bar gyur/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig
rten 'di/ /rim bzhin rab tu thim par gyur/ /gang zhig phyogs rnams bcu po ru/ /gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur/ /gdug pa de rnams bkug nas kyang / /de bzhin
gong bu gcig tu bya/ /rdo rje me yis kun tu gdungs/ /ri rab rtse mo pham nas ni/ /tshad med bgrang du med pa rnams/ /phyi rol gyi ni dkyil 'khor 'ongs/ /rdo rje dbang po'i gnas
kun tu/ /'khor nyid du ni yang dag gnas/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor bos nas ni/ /kye gdug skye dgu rnams la ni/ /rnam par 'tshe ba spang bar
gyis/ /khyed rnams kyis ni dam tshig longs/ /srog chags thams cad gsod pa spongs/ /min na khyod rnams g.yas 'bar bas/ /de bzhin nga yi thal bar bya/ /gdug pa'i
dam tshig dkyil 'khor gyis/ /tshig gcig tu ni zhus gyur pa/ /mgon po bdag cag sha za ste/ /ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig /de nas rdo rje 'jin drag pos/ /ma bsdams
pa yi tshig gsan nas/ /rdo rje khro bo rab brjid bka'/ /snying po drag po gsungs par gyur/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+h+waM sa ya bi kr-i ta sarba duSh+Tan sa ma ya mu drA maN+Da la

b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ mar d+ha mar d+ha/ khA da khA da/ pA ra maN+Da/ badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ khro bo chen pos 'di brjod pas/ /rab drag gdug pa de dag ni/ /tshig cing rab tu 'gyel gyur cing / /dam tshig
phyag rgya nyams par gyur/ /'o dod 'bod cing ngu bar gyur/ /gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/ /ji skad smra ba bzhin byas te/ /'on kyang bden par smra mi bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' drag po
che| |rang bzhin gyis ni sangs rgyas bdag /stobs chen gsang ba'i dbang po yis/ /bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs/ /oM ni sum+b+ha ha na da ha pa ca gr-ih+na ban d+ha hUM phaT/

de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas bka' la rab gnas pas/ /rdo rje khro bo rab za byed/ /snying po drag po brjod par gyur/ /oM ma hA badzra kro d+ha bA da sarba duSh+Ta maN+Da la b+hi nA sha ya//

sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya yan bi ki ra bi d+haM sa ya s+pho Ta ya/ b+hany+dza ya/ b+hany+dza ya/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drAM b+han+d+ha gr-ih+na/ ha na da ha pa ca sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya satwa sa ma ya hUM phaT/ /de nas 'di ni
brjod tsam gyis/ /rdo rje khro bo bdag nyid che/ /gtum po drag po shin tu 'jigs/ /rdo rje khro bo rab tu phyung / /rigs bcas dpung dang bcas ldan pa/ /dam chig sdang ba bzung nas
ni| |shin tu 'jigs pas skrag gyur cing / /rgya mtsho yang ni rab tu sgul/ /phyag rgya rab 'jigs de dag gis/ /rnam par bcom zhing zil gyis mnan/ /rdo rje me yis bsregs nas
@#/ /ni| |thams cad du ni thal bar byas/ /byang sems las byung rdo rje can/ /ji ltar sems can sreg bar byed/ /'di ni gzhug pa'i tshig yin te/ /phan pa'i
rigs can rgyal bdag skyes/ /'dod chags skyon la sogs lta ba/ /nyon mongs dri ma gang shes nas/ /rdo rje can gyis dri ma 'di/ /bzung nas ye shes me yis bsregs/ /sems
can shin tu 'jigs te skrag /byang chub spyod pas byang chub gnas/ /mi bskyod pa yi gnas skyes shing / /rdo rje can ni mchog tu gyur/ /phyag na rdo rje sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje
chen po phyag rgya 'gugs/ /zhes bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/ /'jigs pa med par snyoms par zhugs/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni rjes sbyang phyir/ /rgyal ba la ni bka' nod
gyur/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs chen la/ /de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa/ /oM ha na ha na badzra hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin drag pas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas//
'jigs pa 'gugs pa'i rdo rje ni/ /rang nyid kyi ni sngags 'di brjod/ /oM badzra A kaR+Sha ya shI g+h+raM/ sarba duSh+Ta gr-ih+Na badzra sa t+ye na hUM dzaH/ /de nas brjod pa tsam gyis ni/ /mkha'
'gro ma ni mdangs 'phrog pa/ /rnal 'byor sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas/ /ri rab tu ni kun tu 'dus/ /rdo rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni/ /'bar ba dang bcas 'bar bar gyur/ /
spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas tshig /smras pa rdo rje 'dzin pas skyobs/ /skal chen rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /kye/ gdug pa'i tshogs chen myur ba ru/ /gsod pa spongs la bka' nyan gyis//
de dag re re zhing smras pa/ /bdag cag 'di rnams sha za ste/ /gang zhig rtag tu gson gyur pa/ /bdag cag la ni thabs bstan gsol/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang / /de yi thabs
ni 'di gsungs so/ /zla gcig lon nas shi ba gang / /de ni bza' ba blang bar gyis/ /byang chub sems la chags bral nas/ /gsang ba smod pa lhur len pa/ /khyod dang lhan cig yang
dag sbyor/ /de bza' ba ni gnang bar gyis/ /phyag rgya yi ni snying po 'di/ /rtag tu bcang bar bya ba ste/ /phyi rol thams cad spangs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar gyis/ /

oM badzra pra ti gr-ih+Na hr-i da ya A kaR+Sha ya/ tsaR+ya yaM me sa d+ho d+he na mi ni ya te hA sa ri d+ha yaM niSh+ka ma du sa ma ya hUM dzaH/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan/ /
khro bo spyi gtsug rgyal po ni/ /rnal 'byor pa ni de las spros/ /gal te dam tshig las 'das na/ /khro bo bdag nyid chen po yis/ /rtag tu mgo bo 'gas byed cing / /rigs dang
bcas pa nges par sreg /bdud rtsi sman gyi rgyal po zhes/ /bya ba de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/ /sems dpa' chen po snyoms zhugs nas/ /nad kyi don du tshol bar gyur/ /bcom ldan
@#/ /'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /oM badzra hUM phaT/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /sems can thams cad 'jigs byed pas/ /nad rnams thams cad bkug
nas ni/ /'gugs pa yi ni snying po brjod/ /oM badzra sa ma ya A na ya sarba duSh+Ta dz+wA ra ni di nA sha ya hUM phaT/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis kyang / /nad dang gdon gyi tshogs kun
dang / /rims sogs kyis ni de thos nas/ /steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo /'bar pa'i me dang yang dag ldan/ /ha ha zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed/ /bdag cag rigs ni ma
gzhom par/ /khro bo chen po bka' stsol cig /rdo rje rnal 'byor chen pos gsungs/ /nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon/ /sems can nye bar 'joms pa spongs/ /mdangs kyang 'phrog
par ma byed cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ kye/ rgyal po rdo rje bdag cag gi /srog gi srung ba mdzad du gsol/ /bdag cag kun ni gzi brjid za/ /thabs ni cung zad brtsam du
gsol/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /de nas stobs chen gyis smras pa/ /nga yi sngags dang phyag rgya dag /gang zhig bsrung la gnod ma byed/ /oM badzra karma bi sho d+ha ya
sarba A ba ra Na ni bud d+ha satwe sa ma ye hUM/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po kun/ /theg pa chen por mngon bsdus pa/ /mdo sde gsang ba rgyal po las/ /yongs su bshad pa thams cad
kun/ /sngags dang phyag rgya gnas gang na/ /rtag par rab tu spyod byed pas/ /gnas de ru yang rtag pa ru/ /khyed rnams shin tu gnod ma byed/ /de skad gsungs pas gdon kun ni/ /hi
hi zhes ni sgrogs par gyur/ /spyi bo'i rnal 'byor pa la ni/ /gnod pa byed pa thams cad gtad/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug gis/ /sdig pa dral ba'i
phyag rgya che/ /blo gros chen po snyoms par zhugs/ /ngan song bcing bar bya ba'i phyir/ /mgon po dag la bka' nod byed/ /mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /kun nas snying
po brjod par gyur/ /oM k+She pa ya badzra swAhA/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i thabs chen po/ /rdo rje las na yang dag byung / /sems can rnams la brtse bya'i phyir/ /sdig pa thams cad bkug par
gyur/ /oM sarba pA paM a pA ya na bi sho d+ha na badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ /de skad brjod nas rnal 'byor ches/ /skad cig gis ni ngan song bkug /ri yi rgyal po nye ba ru/ /ngu 'bod la sogs
snang bar gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnal 'byor ches/ /ngan song sems can la smras pa/ /dkon mchog gsum dang nga bstan la/ /myur du bstan ba skyabs su song / /de dag thams cad
kyis smras pa/ /stob chen bdag cag bskyab tu gsol/ /gtso pos ji skad bka' stsal pa/ /de bzhin du ni bgyi bar 'tshal/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /sdig pa dral ba nges 'ching
@#/ /ba| |sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms pa/ /mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par gyur/ /oM badzra pA Ni bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba a pA ya ban+da nA ni pra mo k+Sha ya sarbA
pA ya ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba satwaM/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ya TA tha/ sems can ngan song rgyu can rnams/ /rig pa 'di yis dbang bskur bas/ /ngan song 'khor lo dral bar gyur/ /
rgya mtsho ru ni rab tu ltung / /de bzhin ngan song shi 'phos nas/ /de kun rab tu grol bar gyur/ /sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol/ /rdo rje dbang po'i gnas thob gyur/ /de bzhin thub
pa rnam snang gi /zhabs drung du ni skyes par gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/ /de bzhin mi khom zad par gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/ /de nas skad cig des
zhi thob/ /rmad byung sna tshogs gsang chen po/ /cho 'phrul dag ni skyes par 'gyur/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /rdo rje rin chen rang bzhin gnas/ /rin chen bdun gyis rab tu
sbras/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis rab mdzes/ /de yi rigs kyi ngan song kun/ /sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par sbyangs/ /sems can bde ba skyes par gyur/ /rdo rje bde ba yang dag ldan//
mchog chen po yi zhing 'di ni/ /dag pa'i zhing du rab tu grags/ /sems can dag pa kun tu khyab/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor rdor rang bzhin/ /slar yang shing gi nags la sogs/ /
rmad byung chen po snang ba med/ /rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin kun/ /nags dang rtsa las skyes par gyur/ /mtho dman dag dang rnam par bral/ /lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par snang / /ka
tsa li ltar reg na bde/ /stong gsum rab tu gnas par gyur/ /dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal kun/ /dang por ngan song nye bar zhi/ /bkres dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal dag/ kun tu 'gags
par mnyam par gnas/ /rgya mtsho kun tu thim par gyur/ /ri bo gzugs kyang kun tu khyab/ /gzhan 'phrul gyi ni lha rnams dang / /mtshungs pa ru ni mi rnams gyur/ /slar yang mu khyud
'khor lo med/ /ri rab man da ra dag med/ /lha yi 'jig rten gnas kyang med/ /rgya mtsho med cing lha min med/ /klu yi gnas gzhi dag kyang med/ /mi yi khyim dang khang pa med/ /
grong khyer ljongs dang yul 'khor dang / /phug dang bcas par rnam par bral/ /mi yi gnas kyang med pa nyid/ /chu bo phug dang lung pa med/ /mi dag gi ni lus kyang med/ /sems can
'ga' yang 'dir mi snang / /ngan song 'khor lo dag kyang med/ /mi khom med cing sdug bsngal med/ /bud med skyes pa la sogs med/ /rnga mo glang po lug kyang med/ /dpag bsam
shing dang spos kyi shing / /rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin mdzes/ /spos kyi chu yi rgya mtsho dang / /rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes/ /shing ni yid 'ong thams cad la/ /rol mo'i sgra ni
@#/ /mngon par phyung / /rol mos chos kyi sgra dag kyang / /stong gsum du ni yongs su byung / /ji ltar rdo rje dbang po'i gnas/ /ri rab ri yi rtse mo ltar/ /de bzhin
stong gsum gyi ni gnas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs 'od 'bar gyur/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /gru bzhir rab tu gnas par gyur/ /kun nas phyi rol gnas rnams ni/ /kha khyer
du yang snang bar gyur/ /slar yang nyi ma zla ba med/ /skar ma med cing lha yang med/ /rang gi khang pa'i nang du yang / /lha rnams nyid kyang mthong mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyis yongs
su gsal/ /'od zer sna tshogs yid 'phrog pa/ /gang gis zhing ni yang dag sbyangs/ /rdo rje rin chen yid 'ong ldan/ /rdo rje dbang po'i gnad nyid kyang / /slar yang snang bar mi 'gyur
ro| |gzhan du gzhi ni gcig pa'i gnas/ /gang du sangs rgyas rnams 'phrul ba/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /lha yi pad+ma yongs su gsal/ /rin chen sna bdun rab tu
mdzes/ /dri yi tshogs ni yid 'ong ldan/ /bskal pa chen po'i zhing gi dbus/ /dkyil 'khor shin tu sdug steng du/ /dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu yi/ /rdo rje seng+ge'i khri byung gyur//
kun nas phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu ldan/ /rdo rje rin chen rang bzhin mdzes/ /seng+ge'i khri ni bzhi byung gyur/ /rdo rje bla re rnam par bres/ /dar gyi
chun pos rnam par 'phyang / /dril bu'i dra ba rnam par 'phyang / /zhing ni kun tu rab tu spras/ /me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkram/ /sna tshogs sprin gyis rab tu g.yogs/ /sna tshogs dri yis
kun tu khyab/ /dpag bsam shing gis nye bar spras/ /dpag bsam shing ni yid 'ong ldan/ /rdo rje'i rol mo mdzes pa dang / /sgra ni mngon par 'byin par byed/ /'di nyid dang ni lhan cig zhing / /
sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin du/ /phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar gyur/ /slar yang 'jigs par 'gyur ba med/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ /gang gA'i bye snyed grangs med pa/ /shin tu
phra ba'i rdul snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su gsal/ /til gyi gang bu gang ba bzhin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su gsal/ /phyogs rnams kun nas ma lus par//
sangs rgyas thams cad 'dir gshegs 'gyur/ /dbus kyi seng ge'i gdan dag la/ /chos dbyings 'jigs pa med pa la/ /rnam par snang mdzad stobs chen po/ /ston pa bcom
ldan bzhugs par gyur/ /shar du yang ni mi bskyod pa/ /lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan te/ /nub tu 'od dpag med pa yin/ /byang du don yod grub pa ste/ /mgon po chen po phyogs bzhi ru//
rdo rje yi ni steng du bzhugs/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu ni/ /mnyam du dmigs nas rnam par gnas/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
@#/ /brtan par bzhugs/ /mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mdzad/ /sangs rgyas grangs med thams cad ni/ /rdo rje can ni lnga la bzhugs
phyogs ni re rer khyab gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas gcig gis yang dag bzhugs/ /mtshams dang steng dang 'og dag gi /rnam snang mdzad kyis brtan par mdzad/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan
gyur pa/ /dbus kyi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /de nas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ba/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs snying po/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul pa/ /sangs
rgyas thams cad rang nyid kyi/ /seng ge'i khri ni lnga la bzhugs/ /grangs med tshad ni med pa yi/ /sangs rgyas chos nyid ma lus pa/ /ri mo gsal ba dang mtshungs par/ /stong gsum
dag ni ma lus gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba che/ /pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs par gyur/ /dbus kyi 'khor lor yang dag ldan/ /bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/ /sangs rgyas
rol pa dang ldan par/ /rdo rje can ni thams cad bzhugs/ /shar gyi cha la yang dag bzhugs/ /bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/ /rdo rje rnam 'phrul ston byed pa/ /'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs
par gyur/ /lho yi phyogs na thams cad gnas/ /bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/ /rin chen rnam 'phrul yang dag ldan/ /'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur/ /bye ba dag ni grangs
med lnga/ /nub kyi phyogs na yang dag gnas/ /pad+ma'i rnam 'phrul ston byed pa/ /'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur/ /bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga/ /byang gi phyogs na rnam par
gnas/ /las kyi rnam 'phrul ston byed pa/ /'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur/ /gsang dang mchod pa gang yin dang / /lha mo rdo rje lha mo ni/ /grangs med tshad ni med pa
dag /bcu gnyis kyis ni dkyil 'khor gang / /sgo srung dag ni grangs med pa/ /rnal 'byor mchog dang ldan pa bzhi/ /rgyal po shar dang lho dag tu/ /nub dang byang ni yang
dag gnas/ /chos kyi sku las yang dag byung / /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gyur pa/ /sems dpa' chen po de dag kun/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung / /gang zhig
phyogs bcu dag gi yang / /byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid cha/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i sa thob pa/ /de dag kun kyang 'dir 'ongs pa/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni gang gA yi/ /bye ma dang
mnyam ji snyed pa/ /yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i tshogs/ /de dag thams cad yang dag gshegs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yis ni/ /zhing dag rgya ni chen por gyur/ /yul rnams
thams cad bya ba yang / /gnod pa med cing 'tshe ba'ang med/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten pa'i/ /ji ltar sngon ni bar med pa'i/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /bar med
@#/ /pa ni de bzhin gnas/ /gang nas sangs rgyas mi snang ba/ /phyogs ni rdul tsam yod ma yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor che/ /gang dag sa ni
bzhi bcu dang / /yang na chos las byung ba nyid/ /sangs rgyas sras ni grags pa che/ /rigs lnga byung ba la sogs pa/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston pa dang / /'dir gnas byang chub
sems dpa'i tshogs/ /mchog rnams phyogs dang phyogs mtshams mthong / /sangs rgyas dag ni grangs med kun/ /lha rnams yang dag gnas 'di ru/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni mthong bar gyur//
sangs rgyas dgra bcom ma gtogs par/ /zhing 'dir 'ga' yang mthong ma gyur/ /rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor lo min/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni tshogs kyang min/ /dbus dang phyogs ni yang
dag bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni mthong bar gyur/ /dbang phyug chen po gnod byed pa'i/ /rdo rje khro bo mthong bar gyur/ /sangs rgyas lnga dang de bzhin du/ /khro bo drug bdun rnam
par gnas/ /tshangs sogs lha rnams de dag kyang / /ngo mtshar dag ni skyes par gyur/ /'jigs shing skrag nas lha de dag /gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/ /gtso bo ji bzhin
mthong 'gyur zhing / /shin tu ngo mtshar ci zhig snang / /slar yang lha yi 'jig rten dag /srid pa nang du mthong mi 'gyur/ /'gro ba lnga yi sems can min/ /ri rab dang ni rgya
mtsho min/ /zla ba nyi ma ma mthong zhing / /ri dang khang pa dag kyang min/ /ci bdag cag ni rmongs gyur tam/ /yang na mig ni long bar gyur/ /yang na bdag cag sems g.yengs ba/ /
sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul 'di ci zhig /bdag cag gis ni sngar 'jigs mthong / /drag cing bkug nas thal bar byas/ /ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru/ /sdug bsngal chen pos gzir bar gyur/ /
slar yang ri rab yod ma yin/ /khro bo rdzu 'phrul chen po med/ /gzhan dang khro bo chen po gcig /dbang phyug chen po gnod par byed/ /gnas ni chung dur gyur pa yang / /rgya
chen po ru 'di ru snang / /stong gsum 'di yang mi snang ste/ /bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin/ /de ltar brjod pa sna tshogs pa/ /gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/ /mi smra bar ni
gnas gyur nas/ /rdo rje can la lta bar byed/ /gnod sbyin 'byung po sha za sogs/ /gdug pa kun dang gdon sogs kyis/ /mun par khyab pa bzhin du ni/ /stong gsum 'di ni mthong
bar gyur/ /gzhan ni cung zad ma mthong ste/ /gzhan du phyogs dag mun pas khyab/ /rdo rje khro bo 'khrul gyur cing / /sgyu ma yis ni rmongs gyur cing / /kun tu rmongs pa nyid gyur cing //
gcig la gcig ni rmongs par gyur/ /ha ha zhes bya'i sgra sgrogs shing / /bdag cag 'dir ni gang du phyin/ /chig ni rab tu rjod byed cing / /gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/ /
@#/ /'di ni su zhig bdag cag gang / /'di ni su yi gam du phyin/ /bdag cag rang gi gnas na ltung / /bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin/ /rdo rje khro bos bsad
par gyur/ /'o na 'di ni ci zhig yin/ /lha yi gnas kyang ma mthong bzhin/ /rdo rje can yang mthong ma gyur/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo min/ /bdag cag rnams ni
mun par gyur/ /rang gi gnas kyang ma mthong zhing / /ri rab nyid kyang mthong ma gyur/ /mtsho dang rgya mtsho dag kyang min/ /skar ma zla ba nyi ma min/ /bdag cag thams
cad gang nas 'ongs/ /yul gang zhig tu 'gro bar bya/ /'gro ba lnga yang yod ma yin/ /'jig rten med cing ma mo med/ /mi dang mi ma yin pa dag /rnam pa kun tu mthong
ma gyur/ /sngon ni ji ltar de bzhin phyis/ /rmad du byung ba nyid ma gyur/ /gzhan du sa ni g.yos par gyur/ /rlung dag gis ni rnam par bskyod/ /'brug gi sgra dang glog chen po//
sdug bsngal thams cad yang dag ldan/ /bkres skom la sogs sdug bsngal dang / /bral min kun tu sdug bsngal gyur/ /der ni lha chen rdzu 'phrul dag /cung zad kyang ni
mthong ma gyur/ /dmyal ba yi dwags dud 'gro dag /rnam par nyams shing bshig par gyur/ /sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /ngan song gsum ni nye bar zhi/ /lha gang 'du shes
med pa dang / /gzugs med pa na spyod par gnas/ /phung po lnga ru rang bdag nyid/ /ngo mtshar de bzhin mthong gyur nas/ /rang bdag nyid la'ang rtog par byed/ /gcig la gcig
kyang lta bar byed/ /de bzhin thams cad skrag cing 'jigs/ /ngo mtshar gyur pa 'di ci zhig /tshad med bskal ba chen po ru/ /bdag cag dag par gnas par gyur/ /bdag
mchog las ni bdag cag grol/ /slar yang bdag tu 'dzin par gyur/ /sngon gyi bag chags mngon 'dod la/ /srid gsum gnas ni mthong bar gyur/ /srid pa gsum yang
mthong ma yin/ /de bzhin 'gro ba lnga yang med/ /gzhan du shin tu dag par gcig /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa sprul/ /sangs rgyas lnga nyid mthong bar gyur/ /
srid gsum gnas ni gzhan dag min/ /tshogs la thams cad mnyes bar gyur/ /gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/ /'di ni su zhig bdag cag gang / /bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan
du phyin/ /sngon ni bdag gis 'jig rten 'di/ /'gro ba lnga bcas de bzhin du/ /ri rab dang ni rgya mtshor bcas/ /lha rnams drug ni 'khor bcas mthong / /srid pa gsum gyi lha
rnams ni/ /gang zhig 'di ni mthong ma gyur/ /gzhal yas khang dang sems can ni/ /gtso bo ji bzhin mthong bar gyur/ /de 'dra'i ngo mchar sna tshogs pa/ /gnas chen 'di ru
@#/ /mthong bar gyur/ /byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul 'di/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rol pa yin/ /gang zhig stong gsum 'di yi ni/ /rang rgyal bdag nyid mchog
gyur pa/ /de yang kun tu rmongs gyur nas/ /rnam par 'phrul pa'ang mthong ma gyur/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma yin/ /rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras kyang min/ /chos kyi dbyings ni
brtan zhi ba/ /gnas ni de ru mthong ma gyur/ /gzhan du stong ni gsum po 'di/ /rnam pa kun tu ma mthong nyid/ /sa dang me dang chu khams min/ /gser gyi dkyil 'khor dag
kyang min/ /'gro ba lnga yi sems can min/ /zla ba nyi ma dag kyang min/ /skar ma gza' dang rgyu skar min/ /sems can dag kyang khams gsum min/ /'di dag thams cad
stong par gyur/ /gzhan du nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor min/ /de dag thams cad 'jigs skrag nas/ /mya ngan 'das pa nye bar thob/ /gang yang phyogs rnams bcu po yi/ /
nyan thos 'jigs pa med pa rnams/ /byang sems can ni chen po yis/ /de dag kun ni skrag par gyur/ /rang rang gi ni zhing dag tu/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma gyur/ /
'dus pa chen po dag dang ni/ /chos rnams ston pa dag kyang min/ /zhing de yi ni sems can min/ /lha dang mi rnams dag kyang min/ /khang pa med cing zhing yang med/ /sa dang
me dang rlung yang med/ /rang gi zhing yang ma mthong zhing / /rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs par gyur/ /skad cig gis ni mi dgar gyur/ /thang cig du ni rmongs par gyur/ /de lta bu yi
rnam 'phrul du/ /byang chub sems ni rab tu snang / /sngon gyi bskal ba chen po la/ /'khor lo rnam par 'phrul pa bstan/ /bcom ldan rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas/ /de lta bu ni byin gyis
brlabs/ /sems can gang dag 'di na gnas/ /nyin dang mtshan mo mi shes gyur/ /de nas de nyid gsang ba che/ /chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa'i tshogs/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs
sangs rgyas/ /de lta bu yi rnam 'phrul byung / /stong gsum yongs su bsdus pa yi/ /lha yi gnas ni bkod par gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas gcig pu/ /chos dang longs
spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ /la lar sngon pos rab tu mdzes/ /sa yi phyogs ni rab tu spras/ /rdo rje sngon pos rab tu brgyan/ /la lar gser gyi mdog tu snang / /kha dog ser pos
rnam par brgyan/ /sa yi cha yang rab tu spras/ /rdo rje ser pos rab tu brgyan/ /la lar kha dog dmar po ni/ /byu ru lta bus ba tu mdzes/ /sa yi cha yang rab tu spras/ /rdo rje dmar
pos rab tu brgyan/ /la lar btsag gi mdog can gyi/ /bai DUR+ya mtshungs rab tu mdzes/ /sa yi cha yang rnam par spras/ /rdo rje btsod kyis rnam par mdzes/ /la lar shel gyi
@#/ /mdog can gyi/ /shin tu snang bas rab tu mdzes/ /sa yi char yang rnam par spras/ /rdo rje shel gyis rnam par brgyan/ /shar du sngon po chen
po ste/ /lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan/ /nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste/ /byang ni btsod dang yang dag ldan/ /dbus kyi sa yi cha dag ni/ /shel gyi mdog can bla na med/ /
rdo rje chen pos shin tu dag /tshon rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin bshad/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis rab tu mdzes/ /cha mnyam legs par bgos pa ste/ /
go rims dang ni yang dag ldan/ /kun nas phyi rol gnas dag na/ /rdo rje kha khyer yang dag ldan/ /kun nas kha khyer dang ldan zhing / /sgo yi kha khyer dag gis spras/ /ri
mo rdo rje sngo rang bzhin/ /gzhan yang gser gyi mdog can dang / /kha dog dmar po mchog dang ni/ /gzhan yang shel ni bzang po dag /rin chen kun gyi rang bzhin
mchog /dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdzes gyur pa/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras/ /zla
ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes/ /g.yer ka'i dra bas kun tu khebs/ /dril bu'i mchog ni kun tu 'phyang / /sna tshogs shing ni yid 'ong ldan/ /dpag bsam shing ni yid
'ong ldan/ /spos dang me tog de bzhin dri/ /snang ba'i shing mchog yang dag ldan/ /sna tshogs bkod pa nye bar ldan/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu/ /mtsho mchog chu
yis gang bar gyur/ /rdo rje rgya mtsho rgya chen ldan/ /me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkram/ /sna tshogs bdug pa dag gis bdugs/ /sna tshogs dri yi chu yis gtor/ /sna tshogs dri yis
kun tu khyab/ /drag po chen po sras bcu dag /de nas nyams dga' ba dag byung / /shing dang pad sogs thams cad las/ /chos rnams 'byung ba thos par gyur/ /
phyogs rnams kun tu rnam phyung nas/ /dag pa'i zhing du stong nyid bcas/ /rnam par sgra ni gang zhig grag /chos kyi bde ba 'byung bar gyur/ /yaM/ laM/ shaM/ baM/ oM

badzra satwa kro d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha A kaR+Sha yaM hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha rA ga ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra duSh+Ti kro d+ha ya sA d+hu sA d+hu hUM phaT/ khro bo rdo rje rin chen mchog/ /
'bar ba'i phreng ba bkod dka' bas/ /khro bo rdo rje bla na med/ /mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par gyur/ /oM badzra b+h+ri ku Ti kro d+ha ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzra sUR+ya mahA dz+wa la mA la

kro d+ha dz+wa lA ya sarba hUM phaT/ oM badzra ke tu mahA kro d+ha d+he na hUM phaT/ oM aT+Ta hA sa badzra maT+Ta hA sa kro d+ha ha ha ha ha hUM phaT/ /khro bo chen po rdo rje chos/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas
@#/ /khyab gyur pas/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rab bzod dka'/ /mchog tu 'jigs su rung ba smras/ /oM badzra d+harma bi shwa d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM tIk+Sh+Na kro
d+ha ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM badzra he tu kro d+ha pra be sha ya maN+Da laM sarba hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha b+hA Sha ta pA ta hUM phaT/ /rdo rje las ni rgyal po che/ /gsang ba thams cad kun bsdus
pas/ /'bar ba gsal bas khyab pa byung / /khro bo rgyal pos brjod par gyur/ /oM badzra karma kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra ka ba tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badzra yak+Sha
kro d+ha khA da khA da hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha muSh+Ti sA d+ha ya sa ma ya hUM phaT/ sems dpa' 'di rnams gsang ba che/ /zhi ba'i gzugs las rnam par gyur/ /rdo rje khro
bo drag po che/ /'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs gyur/ /de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /khro bo chen po stobs po che/ /gsang ba 'di rnams yongs su brjod/ /
mchod pa'i lha mos gsungs par gyur/ /oM badzra lA s+ye rA ga ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra mA lai a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra gI t+ye gA ta ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra N+r-i t+ye
ba shi ku ru hUM phaT/ oM badzra puSh+pa pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badzra gan+d+ha pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badzra d+hU pa pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/
oM badzra A lo kai pU dzA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /khro bo drag po shin tu gdug /rdo rje khro bo rab gtum pa/ /sgo srung dag ni kun tu byung
oM aM ku sha mahA kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya sarba sa ma ya hUM dzaHoM badzra pA sha ma hA kro d+ha pra be sha ya sarba sa ma hUM hUM/ oM badzra s+pho Ta mahA kro d+ha ban+d+ha ya sarba sa ma ya hUM baM/
oM badzra A be sha ma hA kro d+ha A be sha ya sarba sa ma ya hUM phaT hoH/'khor lo yongs su zlum por ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por gyur/ /khro bo chen po'i tshogs kyis
khyab/ /dkyil 'khor chen po yang dag ldan/ /gnas chen po dang yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor chen por kun bsdus pas/ /shin tu gsang ba chos chen po/ /chos dang
longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ /de nyid snying po gsang ba che/ /thar pa chen po grong khyer mchog /dkyil 'khor rgyal po chen po ste/ /sems can don kun yang dag ldan/ /
chos nyid rdzogs par byang chub pa/ /'di 'dra chos dang longs spyod rdzogs/ /rigs lnga'i gsang ba gang yin pa/ /gdon mi za bar byed pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i rigs zhi ba/ /gang phyir dag pa'i tshogs chen po/ /de bzhin rdo rje'i rigs drag po/ /gang phyir lha chen rab 'dul byed/ /lha chen la sogs sprul byed pa/ /de bzhin
@#/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog ste/ /gang phyir gdul bya'i sems can rnams/ /sprul pa sna tshogs yang dag byung / /sprul pa'i 'khor lo zhi ba ste/ /drag
po'i mchod pa rab bskor ba/ /sna tshogs rigs can 'khor lo ste/ /rigs bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mchog ni/ /shar gyi
'khor lo yang dag byung / /de nas rdo rje'i rigs drag po/ /sems can don du yang dag 'jigs/ /rdo rje'i rigs mchog chen po 'di/ /dkyil 'khor tshogs ni
kun bsdus pa/ /gsang ba'i dbang phyug rgyal po che/ /gang phyir gsang ba'i bdag por bshad/ /rdo rje thams cad kun bsdus pa/ /rang gi rigs mchog bshad
nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po ches/ /dkyil 'khor chen po kun du sprul/ /lha la sogs pa gdug pa kun/ /skad cig de la yang dag bkug /slar ni
bcug par byas nas kyang / /skad cig gis ni dam tshig phog /rdo rje mtshan ma'i dbang bskur ba/ /dam tshig ldan pa byin nas ni/ /bkug ste rab tu bcug
nas kyang / /de bzhin bcings te dbang du byas/ /dam tshig la ni brtson byas te/ /dam tshig sdom pa de bzhin no/ /mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir/ /dkyil
'khor mchog ni gsungs par gyur/ /'khor lo chen po grong khyer che/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po ste/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /
'jig rten gsum tshogs pham byas nas/ /lha la sogs pa rab bcug 'gyur/ /de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal gnas/ /'khor lo chen po grong khyer che/ /gang ming gzud
ba tsam nyid kyis/ /sems can rab tu bcom nas ni/ /gdon la sogs pa 'bros par byed/ /rims dang gdon dang dug dag dang / /drag po gdug pa dam tshig dang / /
mtshan bzung ba yi mod nyid la/ /skrag pa dang ni g.yo bar gyur/ /sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchog /mi gang dag ni gdul bya min/ /de bas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal
ni| |dkyil 'khor chen po sprul par gyur/ /rdo rje slob dpon skal ba che/ /shin tu byang zhing rab tu mkhas/ /dgongs pa yi ni cho ga shes/ /gzhung rnams thos
shing don la mkhas/ /rab tu dang zhing blo ldan brtan/ /rigs dang rigs min rab tu shes/ /byang chub sems la brtson par gyur/ /lha gzhan dag la 'dod
ldan min/ /gsang ba'i snying po mchog mthong ba/ /snying rje bdag nyid brtser ldan pa/ /dag cing des la rnam par dul/ /rang gi ngang gis rnam par gnas/ /zhen
@#/ /cing chags la gdug pa min/ /rmongs pa med cing le lo med/ /brtse ldan phan pa'i bsam pa can/ /rtag tu rnam par dgod la dga'//
gzugs sogs 'dod pa'i yon tan la/ /chags shing lhag par rgyal gyur nas/ /srid la sems ni skrag par byed/ /srid la mngon par chags pa med/ /theg
pa chen po'i tshul la brtson/ /theg pa gzhan la 'dod ldan min/ /sems can rnams kyi don la brtson/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi mchog byung ba/ /nyon mongs
kun tu chags pa spangs/ /gnyen po dag ni rab tu bsgom/ /'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs che/ /mi sdug pa la sogs pa bsgom/ /rigs dang rigs min cho ga
shes/ /sngags dang phyag rgya shin tu mkhas/ /dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang / /dbang du bya dang gshegs gsol dang / /ji skad rdo rje dbyings bshad bzhin/ /
sngon du rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya/ /kha na ma tho rdul tsam la/ /kun tu 'dzem par bya ba yin/ /tshad dang tshon rtsi srad bu dang / /yo byad cho g.yang dag ldan/ /bcing
dang phur bus gdab pa nyid/ /sngar bshad rdo rje dbyings bzhin du/ /bza' ba dang ni mi bza' ba/ /rdo rje snyems tshul ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil
'khor du/ /sngar ni ji ltar de bzhin bya/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ /rdo rje dbyings dang rab tu mtshungs/ /dngos grub thams
cad byed pa'i mchog /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dar gyi chun pos rnam par brgyan/ /rgya cher ji ltar rigs pa
ru| |ji bzhin rdo rje grong khyer che/ /rdo rje dbyings dang rab tu mtshungs/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i grong khyer bri/ /'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /de dbus
rang bzhin 'khor lo yi/ /dbus su sangs rgyas dgod par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad ston pa che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /sangs
rgyas longs spyod rdzogs dkyil 'khor/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni/ /'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya/ /rdo rje me ltar 'bar nyid ni/ /phyag rgya 'jig rten gsum 'joms pa/ /
g.yas su rin chen phyag rgya ni/ /'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya/ /g.yon du pad+ma'i phyag rgya bri/ /rgyab tu rdo rje rnon po ni/ /'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya/ /phyag
rgya yi ni rgyal po bzhi/ /'bar ba'i me dang rab tu ldan/ /rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor che/ /chos dbyings grong khyer chen po la/ /'khor los bsgyur ba bzhi
@#/ /po yi/ /phyag rgya dag kyang dgod par bya/ /gang dang gang gi thig gyur pa/ /dkyil 'khor shes rab can thig gdab/ /rdo rje yi ni sngags
'di yis/ /rdo rje'i thig ni yongs su gzung / /oM badzra sa ma ya sU traM mA ti kra ma hUM/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bsdus pa yi/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /rdo rje'i
phyag rgya yongs bsdus pa/ /rgyal po bri zhing dgod par bya/ /oM badzra be gA kra ma hUM/ /tshon rtsi thams cad yang dag ldan/ /'bar ba'i lta bas thams cad blta/ /rdor je
tshon rtsi bkye bya zhing / /rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul/ /oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ /phyag rgya gang zhig dgod bar du/ /snying po thams cad dgod par bya/ /
sngar ni dgod pa gang yin pa/ /rdo rje gzugs ni skor byed pa/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /rdo rje rig pa mchog
rgyal po/ /mi bskyod shin tu mnyam bzhag pa/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa/ /mche ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs/ /khro bo'i rgyal po 'bar bas khyab/ /
phyag na phyag rgya dang bcas mtshon/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya ni/ /steng du phyag gnyis yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin kho nar phyag gnyis dag /lcags kyu 'phyar
ba yang dag ldan/ /phyag gcig gis ni zhags pa bsnams/ /gcig gis rdo rje yang dag bsnams/ /mda' 'gengs pa yi phyag rgya dang / /phyag gnyis dag
ni shin tu ldan/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya ste/ /dbang phyug chen po kun tu mnan/ /g.yas pas lha mo u ma yi/ /nu ma'i bar du gnon par byed/ /de yi phyogs
rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje khro bo dgod par bya/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab cing 'bar/ /khro bo 'jigs par byed pa mchog /mdun du rdo rje sems dpa'
ste| |g.yas su rdo rje rgyal po'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje chags pa ste/ /rgyab tu rdo rje legs pa'o/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /lho ru khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /khro
bo'i rgyal po khro gnyer can/ /khro bos yongs su bskor ba bri/ /thams cad 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab/ /gdong ni khro bcas bzhad ldan pa/ /rdo rje dbang phyug phyag rgyar
ldan/ /khro gnyer can ni yongs su brjod/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje khro bo bdag nyid che/ /sngags dang phyag rgya yongs su bsdu/ /rang gi gnas su
yang dag bri/ /mdun du rdo rje rin chen te/ /g.yas su khro bo gzi brjid do/ /g.yon du rgyal mtshan drag po ste/ /rgyab tu khro bo bzhad pa'o/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas
@#/ /kyang / /nub kyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor ni/ /khro bo chen po rdo rje ste/ /khro bdag chen po rnams kyis bskor/ /rdo rje chos ni mdun
du ste/ /rdo rje rnon po g.yas su'o/ /de bzhin g.yon du rdo rje rgyu/ /rgyab tu rdo rje smra ba'o/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang / /dkyil 'khor dag ni mchog bzhi pa/ /
rdo rje dbab pa las chen po/ /khro bo chen pos yongs su bskor/ /rdo rje las ni mdun du ste/ /g.yas su rdo rje bsrung ba'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin te/ /rgyab tu rdo rje
khu tshur ro/ /dbus kyi 'khor lo'i mtshams bzhi ru/ /lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/ /mtshams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs bri/ /
phyi rol dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje me tog la sogs bri/ /rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du/ /ji skad sngar bshad cho ga bzhin/ /sgo
bzhi dag ni thams cad du/ /sgo srung rnams ni dgod par bya/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /dril bu dbab pa bla na med/ /rang gi phyag rgya snying
gar bzhag /rang rang gi ni snying po yis/ /rdo rje dril bu yid 'ong ldan/ /rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dgod/ /bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo ni/ /gtso bo rdo rje
rig pa mchog /rdo rje rgyal po mchog byin brlab/ /rang nyid rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog /de yis dkyil 'khor de bris nas/ /rdo rje te rin ti ri 'jug /yang
dag par ni brtag byas la/ /lan bdun du ni bskor bar bya/ /chad pa gang yin yongs su dag /mkhas pas lhag par dbri bar bya/ /rdo rje dril bu rtogs par
bya| |grub par gyur te nyes pa med/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs kun/ /mnyam par bzhag pas las rnams bya/ /'khor lo'i dbus su zhugs nas ni/ /mkhas
pas sgo ni dbye bar bya/ /yid kyis rdo rje ri mo ni/ /bteg cing kun tu phye nas kyang / /rdo rje sgo ni bzhi po dag /yid kyis dbye bar bya ba yin/ /de la snying po ni 'di
yin te/ oM badzra d+ha ra ud g+ha Ta ya pra be sha ya sa ma ya hUM/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol gnas rnams su/ /phyi yi rdo rje rigs dag bri/ /khyab 'jug la sogs
lha rnams ni/ /kha khyer gyi ni phyed la gnas/ /'khor lo dang bcas rigs bcas te/ /sems can gdug pa gdon la sogs/ /rims dang 'byung
po sha za dang / /mkha' 'gro 'byung po ma mo dang / /lha mo mtshon cha dang ldan kun/ /ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri/ /phyi rol kha khyer gnas su ni/ /rdo
@#/ /rje kha khyer mdzes pa rnams/ /de nas sngon la slob dpon ches/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su 'dug nas ni/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas te/ /ting nge
'dzin la snyoms 'jug bya/ /ji ltar rdo rje rigs byung ba/ /de bzhin bdag nyid rnam par bsam/ /rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po/ /bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlab/ /rdo rje
khro bo rgyal po mchog /ces bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /skal pa chen po snyoms zhugs nas/ /ji skad gong du grags pa bzhin/ /shes
rab can gyis thams cad bsam/ /ji ltar rdo rje rigs 'byung ba/ /ji ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni/ /rgya chen gsang ba chen po dang / /rdo rje slob dpon cho ga mchog /rgyud
chen gsang ba zhes bya ba/ /rtog pa 'di las rab tu bshad/ /de nas dbus su 'dug byas nas/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches/ /khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /phyag
rgya thams cad yongs su bcings/ /khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu bcings/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ /lan gcig tu ni brjod par bya/ /
rdo rje me tog sogs mchod pas/ /'dren pa thams cad mchod par bya/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa gang bya ba/ /phyag rgya thams cad yongs su bcing / /phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya ldan/ /
de bzhin du ni mchod pa nyid/ /phyag rgya'i lan la sogs pa kun/ /cho ga rab tu ldan pa dbul/ /rdo rje dril bu dkrol bya zhing / /gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor bsdigs par bya/ /gdug pa'i
sems ni gdul bya zhing / /nyon mongs mchog tu gsad par bya/ /dbab cing brjod pa nyid du bya/ /rdo rje mchod pas mchod par bya/ /glu dang mchod pa yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya/ /rdo

rje yi ni glu 'di dag /blang zhing mchog rnams mnyes par bya/ /btud cing dbul bar bya ba nyid/ /rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya/ /sha ta sha ta ma ta sa ta ti ri/ Ta ta Ta ta pri ti ha ta/ ma ta sha ta pra ta
ka ta/ ku Ta ta bi Ta bi Ta Ta Ta Ta/ ba Ta i ti ta Ta Ta Ta/ ka ra Ta ra Ta ra ra Ta/ /rdo rje ti rin ti ri yi/ /phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur bya/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bka' mnos nas/ /rdo rje'i
sngags ni rab tu bskul/ /sngon po gos kyis stod g.yogs bya/ /sngon po yis ni mig dgab bya/ /rdo rje ti rin ti yi ri/ /phyag rgya rdo rje slob ma bcing / /oM gr-ih+Na badzra sa ma ya hUM baM/ /ci rigs
bar ni gzhug bya zhing / /rdo rje'i sngags ni bskul bar bya/ /rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis/ /rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya/ /oM badzra sa ma ya pra be sha yA mi/ /rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil
'khor du/ /rgyas bar ji ltar snga ma bzhin/ /ye shes dbab pa'i las dag ni/ /mkhas pa dag gis bya nyid do/ /mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid/ /rdo rje can gyis sngar gsungs nyid/ /shes
@#/ /rab can gyis kun bslab cing / /bdag nyid dang bas rab tu bya/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya yi/ /shes rab can gyis hUM bsgrub bya/ /lha la sogs pa gdug pa
kun| |bkug cing de ru gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bslab bya zhing / /bdag nyid dam ni gzhan yang rung / /rdo rje phreng bas dbang bskur bya/ /rdo rje mna' yi phyag rgya yis/ /sngon

la mna' ni bsgrags par bya/ /rdo rje ye shes ye shes che/ /rdo rje ye shes rab bsgrub bya/ /lag pas rdo rje mtshan ma bzung / /rdo rje sngags ni rab bsgrub bya/ /rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis/ /rdo rje

mtshan ma rab tu sbyin/ /oM badzra pA Ni karma kA rdo b+hA ba/ /de nas ming gi dbang bskur zhing / /rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul/ /rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bya/ /oM badzra

kro d+ha s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ oM badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta he badzra nA ma/ /ye shes 'byung ba phun sum tshogs/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /shes rab mchog gis bslab bya zhing / /rdo rje
rnal 'byor rab tu bsgrub/ /snying gar rdo rje bris nas ni/ /sna tshogs las rnams yang dag ldan/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab cing 'bar/ /snying gar rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje rig pa
mchog rgyal po/ /bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya/ /rgyal po las rnams thams cad 'dzin/ /bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya/ /yang na khro bo'i nang nas gcig /bdag nyid yongs
su bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas/ /'gro ba thams cad dbab par bya/ /hUM satwa badzra kro d+ha A be sha aH/ /khro bo rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /rdo rje rin chen yang dag bris/ /
bdag nyid rdo rje rin chen te/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma mgrin bcings nas/ /lkog ma'i phyogs su yang dag bri/ /bdag nyid rdo rje chos bsgoms nas/ /de nas nyon
mongs thams cad 'joms/ /spyi bor rdo rje bri bya zhing / /rdo rje 'bar ba 'dzin pa dgod/ /bdag nyid rdo rje las bsgoms nas/ /gdug pa thams cad bsal bar bya/ /ho badzra rat+na kro d+ha ba sha

mA nA ya tra/ hrIHbadzra d+harma kro d+ha nA sha ya phaT/ /hUM karma badzra kro d+ha rak+Sha/ /lha tshogs sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /phyag rgya dang bcas dgug par bya/ /ye shes brlab cing de nas bzung / /de bzhin
kho nar yang dag brlab/ /lag par rdo rje lcags kyu bri/ /sdigs mdzub yi ge hUM ldan pa/ /khro bo yis ni sor mo bskyod/ /lha rnams 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog /oM badzra kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM
phaT| |de bzhin 'og tu rkang mthil la/ /rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bri/ /de yis lha ni gang zhig mnan/ /de ni dgug pa'i mchog yin no/ /oM badzra kro d+ha a kra aM ku sha A kaR+Sha ye hUM phaT/ /
dpung pa brkyang dang yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bris/ /lha ni gang dang gang la mnan/ /de dang de ni dgug pa'i mchog /oM badzra kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ /stan la rdo rje
@#/ /lcags kyu ni/ /yang dag bris pas de mnan zhing / /lha ni gang zhig kun tu mnan/ /de dang de ni 'gugs pa'i mchog /oM badzra kro d+ha A sa na A gats+tsha ya

A kaR+Sha ya mi te he badzra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM phaT/ phyag rgya dbab par yang dag dbab/ /mkhas pas ye shes bslab par bya/ /rdo rje sbyor ba thams cad kyi/ /sgrub pa dag kyang yang dag brtsam//
g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas rnams su/ /bdag nyid khro bor bsgom par bya/ /myur du sangs rgyas ye shes ni/ /ring por mi thogs yang dag dbab/ /oM badzra kro d+ha kA ya A be sha hUM
a| |rdo rje hUM mdzad yang dag sbyor/ /khro bo bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yang dag dgug /rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul/ /oM badzra bi d+yot+ta ma mahA kro d+ha A na ya
ho b+ha ga bAn badzra hUM phaT/ /bdag nyid khro bo bsgom bya zhing / /khro bo'i lta bas blta bar bya/ /'khor ba'i btson ra 'jigs rung bar/ /sems can thams cad bsad par bya/ /oM
dr-iSh+Tha mahA kro d+ha mA ra ya sarba satwa hUM/ /rtag tu rang nyid go bgos par/ /yid kyis bdag nyid bsgom bya zhing / /gzhan dag kyang ni bsgom byas nas/ /'gro ba 'di kun bsrung bar
'gyur/ /oM badzra rak+Sha rak+Sha sarba satwa hUM phaT/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor che/ /rnam pa bzhi ni bslab par bya/ /rdo rje ye shes de nyid che/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes
bsam/ /rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas/ /sems can gang phyir kun tu chags/ /yid kyis gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing / /yi ge hUM ni rab tu brjod/ /rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di dag ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i
phyag rgya yis/ /sems can gang la yongs su chags/ /de yi nyon mongs rnam par nyams/ /Tak+ki a sa la be/ /a la be ats+tsha Tak+ki hUM phaT/ /'di ni lan gcig brjod pas kyang / /kun nas nyon
mongs zhu zhing g.yo/ /Tak+ki dza/ sems can gang gi rgyud la ni/ /rdo rje yi ni lta bas bltas/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor spyan chen pos/ /de yi sdug bsngal nyams par gyur/ /Tak+ki hUM/ yi ge
hUM ni gyur pa las/ /nye ba'i sems can gang yin pa/ /de yi snying gar rdo rje yang / /shes rab can gyis yid kyis bsam/ /de nas 'jigs pa thams cad las/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i

phyag rgya yang / /rdo rje rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro dang / /rdo rje phyag rgyas gdab par bya/ /Tak+ki ho/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor rmad byung che/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor rdo rje gang / /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro dkyil
'khor ni/ /shes rab can gyis mchog gsang brlab/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas/ /yan lag kun la yongs su 'khyud/ /yi ge hUM ni sbyor byed pa/ /sdug bsngal rnam par
nyams par 'gyur/ /rdo rje khro bo rab drag 'dzin/ /rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /de yi khro bo'i sku gang yin/ /gcig tu mchog tu gsang ba bdag /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'ang rung / /
@#/ /bdag nyid dang ni mtshungs pa ru/ /lus ni yang dag sbyor ba ni/ /dbang po snyoms 'jug brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ /rdo rje
khro bo 'am/ sems dpa' gzhan de'i lus gang yin pa dang / bdag gi lus gang yin pa mtshungs par shes pa nyid 'di ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya'o//
yang na rnam par bsgom pa yis/ /ji skad bshang bzhin yan lag 'khyud/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /dpung pa dam por bsdam par bya/ /yan lag kun la yongs 'khyud
pas| |sangs rgyas byang chub rab grub 'gyur/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags brtag mi bya/ /'di yis mtshungs par bsgoms pa yis/ /
mtshungs pa nyid ni dbang po yin/ /haM traM hUM gi sbyor ba'i so dag gis/ /mchu bzung nas ni 'o bya zhing / /sems can gang zhig rnam bsgom pa/ /des ni bde ba don yod thob/ /hUM dza/
sems can thams cad bde byed pa/ /yi ge hUM de rab sbyor zhing / /bdag nyid khro bor rnams sbyangs nas/ /de nas bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /hUM/ gang gis hUM ni rab sbyor zhing / /
sems can dag ni gang dag gis/ /yan lag thams cad bsdus byas na/ /de yi nyon mongs bsrabs par 'gyur/ /hUM phaT/ ye shes chen pos thabs ldan pa/ /rdo rje'i
rigs ni thams cad nyid/ /de bzhin 'khor lo'i 'khor bcas pas/ /mkhas pa yis ni bslab par bya/ /sangs rgyas sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /rtag tu bdag ni bsgom par bya/ /rnam pa'i
mchog rnams kun ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun ni rnam par bsgom/ /bsgom pa'i sbyor ba de yis ni/ /skad cig sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /a/ rdo rje'i rig pa mchog rgyal po/ /bdag nyid

yongs su bsgom par bya/ /hUM/ rdo rje khro bo khro gnyer can/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /traM/ rdo rje sde ru rang bdag nyid/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya/ /hrIH/ rdo rje dbab pa khro bo che/ /
mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /a/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems la ni/ /rdo rje sems dpar rnam par bsgom/ /hUM badzra satwa/ rdo rje rgyal po bdag bsgom bya/ /dza badzra rA dza/ rdo rje chags par bsam par

bya| |ra badzra rA ga /khro bo legs par bsgom par bya/ /sa badzra sA d+hu/ de nas rdo rje rin chen po/ /oM badzra rat+na/ rdo rje gzi brjid de bzhin no/ /dz+wa la ya/ bdag nyid rdo rje rgyal mtshan bsgom/ /d+he hi/

rdo rje bzhad pa rnam par bsgom/ /hA sa badzra hA sa/ rdo rje chos ni bsgom par bya/ /sho d+ha ya/ rdo rje rnon po rnam par bsgom/ /ts+tshin da/ rdo rje rgyu ni 'khor lo che/ /bra be sha ya/ rdo rje smra ba rnam par bsgom//

b+hA Sha/ rdo rje las ni bsgom par bya/ /karma/ rdo rje go cha rnam par bsgom/ /rak+Sha/ rdo rje gnod sbyin bsgom par bya/ /khA da/ rdo rje khu tshur rnam par bsgom/ /baM/ gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid/ /
@#/ /rigs kyi lha ni ci 'dra bar/ /rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya/ /de ni 'di yis skad cig 'grub/ /hUM/ rdo rje phyag rgyas lan cig bcing / /mkhas pas rdo rje bzlas
ba brjod/ /ji skad bzlas pa'i rgyud du bshad/ /gzhan du khro bo gzung bar bya/ /yid kyis kyang ni brjod bya zhing / /lus kyi phyag rgyas bskul bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor gsum ni mnyam sbyor
bas| |skad cig de la mkhas pas bsgrub/ /de nas nyams dga' rdo rje'i rigs/ /phyag rgya chen po grangs med pa/ /lus kyi phyag rgya yang dag ldan/ /gang phyir sems can snod min pa//
de yi phyir na nyung bar gsungs/ /phyag rgya chen po yongs bsdu ba/ /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las/ /rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya ba/ /rgyud der rab tu bshad pa yin/ /gsang ba'i cho
ga 'di yis ni/ /rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis/ /skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'grub/ /'dir ni phan yon mang po dag /rang gi las la nges par sbyar//
gang zhig brtul zhing mngon par sbyor/ /skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'grub/ /mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang / /zhugs nas mngon par brtson 'gyur zhing / /rnal 'byor cho ga sgrub
byed na/ /'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /tshe 'di la ni rnal 'byor pas/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob 'gyur/ /gang gis rdo rje can sbyor bas/ /gdon mi za bar sa thob 'gyur/ /
bskal pa grangs med dka' ba ni/ /spyod pa'i bdag nyid med par min/ /rnal 'byor 'di la mngon par brtson/ /de bas sa ni rnyed dka' min/ /theg chen 'di ni gsang ba ste/ /sangs rgyas

chos kyi tshul bstan pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub snying po che/ /de las sa ni thob dka' min/ /g.yon brkyang cha lugs gnas nas ni/ /khro bo'i tshig ni rab tu brjod/ /khro bo'i lta bas yang dag khros/ /
las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdo sde'i dbang po gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gsang ba de kho na nyid dam pa mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje
rtse mo las/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba rnam par bshad pa ste le'u gsum pa rdzogs so// //rdo rje'i rigs las le'u dang po'o// //de nas//
gsang ba dag ni kun bsdus mchog /sems kyi dga' ba kun sbyor yang dag byung / /bya ba byas shing mchog tu rnam par mdzes/ /rdo rje dbang phyug thams cad rnam 'phrul tshogs/ /de nas
sangs rgyas kyi ni rigs chen mchog /rdo rje snying po'i thugs byung bde ldan pa/ /shin tu gsang ba'i yon tan mchog bsdus pa/ /rdo rje rgyal po bud med gzugs can gyur/ /e ma'o
bud med dga' ba mchog spyod pa/ /gsang ba kun tu bsdus pa las byung ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'jigs mi mnga'/ /de yis gsungs nas cang mi gsung bzhugs so//
@#/ /gzungs kyi dam tshig yang dag byung ba mchog /ting 'dzin gnas nas chos nyid gsang ba ni/ /spyi bo rkang mthil kun bsdus bstan pa las/ /de yi rigs
kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs dag phyung / /hrIHde nas dga' ba'i ming can dag kyang phyung / /rdo rje bud med thugs las byung ba mchog /gzugs khams mchog gi lha las shin tu 'das//
rdo rje'i mtshams rnams lha mo'i tshig dag grags/ /dga' bcas 'dzum pa dang ldan spyan mnga' ba/ /bzhad cing sgeg dang bcas pa'i zhal ldan pa/ /tshangs sogs rigs kyi lha yi lha mo
ste| |yid 'ong dga' ba chen pos rgyal 'gyur ba/ /lha mo rdo rje rnal 'byor ma de yang / /'khor lo'i dbus su gnas nas rtog byed pa/ /de yi rigs bsdus mdzes shing yid du 'ong / /rdo rje
chen mo rdo rje rmongs byed ma/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA rA ga mo ha na ya hi/ /snying po sangs rgyas rmongs par byed pas gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchog kyang rmongs par 'gyur/ /
sangs rgyas kun gyi dga' ba rmongs byed dga'/ /sangs rgyas gzugs dag yongs su bsgyur ba mchog /rnam snang thub pa'i dbang phyug mchog de ni/ /bud med gzugs kyi sprul pa nyid du gyur//
dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul mchog mnga' gang de ni/ /'khor gyi sring mo gang yin bzhi por gyur/ /oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ye s+thi/ de nas gsang ba brtan pa'i tshogs zhi ba/ /chos dang longs spyod
rdzogs skus kun khyab pa/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang phyug rmongs byed bdag /sangs rgyas btsun mo chos nyid la bzhugs pas/ /sa ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur/ /'od zer sna tshogs
phyogs bcu dag tu gsal/ /lha mo lha dang bcas pa'i lha mo rnams/ /zil gyis mnan cing shin tu rgyas par 'gyur/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs lha mo'i tshogs/ /de dag rang gi
gzhal yas khang na gnas/ /de nas sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ba yi/ /gsang ba'i dbang phyug dam pa 'dren pa ste/ /rdo rje dga' ba chen po rnam par dgod/ /gdug pa kun gyi dbang phyug yi
ge ni/ |snying po las byung chos nyid dag pa ste/ /rdo rje btsun mo bzhi dang dbus ma lnga/ /dkyil 'khor tshogs kyi shar phyogs cha la gnas/ /mi bskyod pa yi dbang phyug dam pa'i mchog /de nas
rdo rje'i rigs can las byung ba'i/ /shar gyi dkyil 'khor khro bcas dkyil 'khor bcas/ /mi bskyod dam pa'i dam tshig bdag nyid can/ /de yis snying po bskul ba gsungs par gyur/ /snying po

rab mchog 'byung ba gsungs par gyur/ /oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ye dzi/ oM badzra ro Sha aM ku sha A na ya sarba dzi/ /oM badzra ro Sha karma badzra ba shaM me A na ya di dzi/ oM badzra duSh+Ti kro d+ha tiSh+Tha ya sarba dzi/ /rin

chen 'byung ldan de ni bud med gzugs/ /rin chen mchog tu yid du 'ong ba des/ /'khor gyi snying po dgu ni bzhi po gsungs/ /oM badzra b+h+r-i ku TI kro d+ha ha ra ha ra sarba gar+b+ha dzi/ oM badzra dz+wa la mA la

@#/ /pra be sha mahA kro d+ha ag+ni dz+wA la ya sarba ra bi Sha dza dzi/ oM badzra d+h+wa dza a gra ke yu ri mahA kro d+hi de hi sarba dzi/ oM badzra aT+TaT+Ta ha si ni hA sa ma yAT+TaT+Ta ha ra ha ra dzi/
yi ge dzi ni shin tu brtan par gnas/ /snying po shin tu mchog tu gyur pa gsungs/ /rin chen dbang phyug dam pa de yis ni/ /snying po bskul bar byed pa'i mchog dag gsungs/ /snying po
mchog gsungs rmad byung gsungs par gyur/ /'od dpag med de bud med gzugs gyur pa/ /rdo rje btsun mo dam pa 'byung ba'i mchog /snying po bzhi po dag ni gsungs par gyur/ /oM badzra shud

d+hi ha na duSh+Ti d+hi/ oM tIk+Sh+Na kro d+ha tshin+da na sarba d+hi ri/ badzra he tu mahA kro d+ha pra be sha ya sar+b+ba d+hi/ oM badzra dzi hwA mahA kro d+ha b+hA Shi pa tsa uta ga ra ya d+hi/ snying po rigs mchog brtan pa gsungs par
gyur| |pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbang dang ldan pa mchog /'od dpag med pa'i gsang mchog bstan pa ste/ /snying po bskul ba'i mchog ni gsungs par gyur/ /Ni/ dga' ba chen pos
mtshan ma dag kyang phyung / /don yod grub pa bud med gzugs gyur pas/ /las la shin tu bskul ba dang ldan te/ /'khor gyi sring mo dag ni bzhi po gsungs/ /oM sarba mu khe karma badzri Ni

mahA kro d+ha ku ru sarba Ni/ oM badzra ka ba tsa kro d+hi rak+Sha ma Ni/ oM badzra kro d+hi mahA yak+Shi Ni badzre daMSh+Ta ka rA li bi lA sa sarba Ni/ oM badzra muSh+Ti badzra kro d+ha ni/ /de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs
dag /mchog tu gsang ba bsdus pa dga' chen po/ /dbus kyi gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor bskul byed pa/ /las kyi btsun mo'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs/ /hUM/ dbus kyi gsang ba sna tshogs 'byung
'gyur pa/ /gtso bo 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad gsungs/ /oM badzre shwa rI hUM/ oM rat+ne shwa rI hUM/ oM pad me shwa rI hUM/ oM karme shwa rI hUM/ rdo rje rgyal mo dang bcas bskul ba las byung gang
yin pa/ /rdo rje btsun mo rnal 'byor bzhi yis dbus kyi dbang phyug nyid du gnas/ /rdo rje rin chen chos ldan btsun mo yan lag mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ /'di ni gsang ba'i tshogs las
gzhan du rnal 'byor mchog ni 'ga' yang med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'jigs mi mnga'/ /de ni rang gi 'khor tshogs dbus na bzhugs/ /des ni brtse dang phan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /
rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog gsungs gyur/ /de nas 'khor lo'i grong khyer bstan byas nas/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i bdag nyid de/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug btsun
mo yi| |dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag bri/ /grong khyer rnam pa gnyis su yang dag bri/ /'khor lo rnam pa gnyis su sbyar bar bya/ /de bzhin grong khyer 'di ru yang dag
'ong ba dang / /yang na ji ltar 'dod bzhin yang dag bri/ /de yang phyag rgya dag gi tshogs dang bcas/ /bsgom par 'os pa rdo rje yang dag bri/ /yang na gsang ba'i chos kyis mchod gyur pa/ /de
@#/ /ni gzugs dang ldan pa yang dag bri/ /dbus kyi rim par rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs/ /zhags pa dang ldan 'khor gyi phyag rgya bcas/ /rdo rje 'bar ba nor bu pad+ma
las| |'bar ba dang bcas me dang ldan par gzhag /shar gyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo lnga yi bdag nyid che/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gang du mi bskyod gtso/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya che dang rol par
gyur| |dbang phyug chen po rtse gsum ldan non mchog /de nas phyogs bzhi'i gnas dag dang / /rdo rje lcags kyu mda' dang dga' ba dag /'bar ba'i me yi 'od zer yang dag ldan/ /'bar
ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i phyag rgya lnga/ /dre ni rin chen rigs ni yid 'ong ba/ /rdo rje'i dbus na rdo rje rin chen bzhugs/ /de nas phyogs bzhi'i gnas dag tu/ /rin chen gzi brjid rgyal mtshan
bzhad phyag rgya/ /de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs ni yid 'ong la/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i phyag rgya ste/ /de nas phyogs bzhi'i mtshams dag tu/ /pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo de bzhin smra/ /de bzhin las kyis byas
pa'i rigs de las/ /rdo rje rnon po me chen dang ldan pa/ /de yi phyogs bzhi'i mtshams ni brtan pa ru/ /las dang gnod sbyin bsrung ba'i khu tshur rnams/ /de las rgya cher gzugs kyi
