tshogs dag la/ /rdo rje btsun mo'i mchog drag mkha' 'gro ma/ /'bar ba'i mche ba chen po 'jigs rung ma/ /dbus na rdo rje nyi ma 'bar bar ldan/ /sa dag bsrung ba'i cho gar bcas/ /rgya
cher gzhung mchog rtag tu blta bar bya/ /sbyang dang dbab pa'i las rnams thams cad ni/ /yan lag mchog ldan dam pa las gzung bya/ /de nas phyag rgya phyag rgya'i yan lag brlab/ /mchod pa'i
phyag rgyas mchod pa'i phyag rgyar brjod/ /de nas sgo dang mtshams bcas dkyil 'khor du/ /btsun mo dag pas gnam lcags gnod sbyin mchog /de nas sgor 'jug pa yi tshogs la ni/ /badzra dzaHdzaH

dgug pa'i pheg rdob sprin ni rgya che ba/ /badzra hUM hUM/ de bzhin 'ching ba'i chos ni ster byed pa/ /badzra baM baM/ de nas ye shes chos nyid sna tshogs pa/ /badzra aHaH/ de nas gsang ba'i sgeg pa dang

bcas mchod/ /badzra hUM khaM/ de nas yan lag phreng ba sna tshogs ldan/ /badzra hUM g+huM/ de nas glu blang ba dang rol mo dag /badzra hUM taM/ de bzhin gzhan dag dkyil 'khor dbang phyug mchog /badzra hUM ste/ de

nas phyi rol me tog rgya chen po/ /badzra ti te/ de bzhin rol cha stong phrag dag brdungs pa/ /badzra TaM ta/ spos dang dri ldan rol mo dag bri ba/ /badzra d+hA tu/ de nas 'od zer snang ba rab tu spro/ /badzra kro d+ha/ de nas

rdo rje lcags kyu'i tshogs kyis dgug par bya/ /dga' bas mnyes bya rdo rje yang dag ldan/ /oM sid d+hi ya badzra/ A na ya badzra/ de nas chags pa'i sa ni 'dod chags pa/ /rA ga ya badzra/ a hi badzra/ de bzhin nyi ma

la lta ba/ /dz+wA la ya badzra/ rgyal mtshan gyi ni/ de hi badzra/ bzhad pa yi ni/ hA sa badzra/ de bzhin rjes su chags pa ni/ /kA ma ya badzra/ ral gri gzung bar bya ba ni/ /ts+tshe da ya badzra/ gzhan yang bskor ba yi ni/ /
@#/ /b+h+ra ma ya badzra/ de nas tshig gi tshogs dbyung ba/ brU hi badzra/ las kyi mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i tshogs ni/ t+yi badzra/ de nas go cha yi ni/ rak+Sha badzra/ de
bzhin du bza' ba'i ni/ khA hi badzra/ yid 'ong lus ni brtan par bcing bar bya/ ban d+ha ya badzra/ de nas ye shes kyi ni de bzhin brkyang / /de nas khros pa'i yid kyis bskul bar bya/ /so dag gis ni
ma mchu bsdam par bya/ /de bzhin mig dag kyang ni btsum par bya/ /de nas khro bo'i ting 'dzin bsgom/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya dag gis bdud bzhi bcom/ /da nas rdo rje'i tshig gis snying po
brjod/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs ni rnam pa sna tshogs bslab/ /lus kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs dag ni/ /theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' bzhin du/ /rgyas pa ru ni
yongs su brjod/ /gsang ba mchog rdzogs so// //de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug ni/ /rdo rje phra mo la bzhugs nas/ /rdo rje phra mo brjod par

gyur| |oM sarba ta thA ga ta sUk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas gzugs su ni/ /phan pa'i don du rnams bsam bya/ /rdo rje phra mo 'di yis ni/ /sems ni zhi ba nyid du gyur/ /oM
suk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po/ /bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje phra mo 'di yis ni/ /rang sems skad cig gis 'dul 'gyur/ /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra

rat+na kro d+ha kra ma ka hUM phaT/ rdo rje rin chen rang bdag nyid/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos ni myur thob cing / /rin chen kun mchog gtso bor 'gyur/ /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra d+harma kro d+ha kra

ma hUM phaT/ /bdag nyid dag ni rdo rje chos/ /gzod nas dag pa rnam par bsgom/ /gsung gi phyag rgya 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje chos dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /oM suk+Sh+ma badzra karma kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ /bdag nyid

rdo rje las su ni/ /yang dang yang du bsgom bya zhing / /rdo rje sngags kyis bskul nas ni/ /rdo rje las dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /dbang bskur ba yi sems dpa' che/ /'khor los bsgyur ba bzhi po ru/ /rtag

tu bdag nyid bsgom byas na/ /dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur/ /hUM oM sUk+Sh+ma dz+nyA na kro d+ha hUM phaT/ /rdo rje rgyal po rang bdag nyid/ /rnam par bsgoms na rengs par 'gyur/ /snying po 'di dag nyid kyis

ni| |sangs rgyas thams cad kun du dgug /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra aM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya mahA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ /mda' 'gengs pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje chags par bsgom par bya/ /snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas

thams cad rjes chags pa/ /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+ha aM nu rA ga ya hUM phaT/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byas shing / /bdag nyid kyang ni rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje dga' ba bdag nyid de/ /rdo rje dngos grub thob par 'gyur//

oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra duSh+Ti kro d+ha hUM phaT/ /rdo rje rin chen rgyal po de/ /dbang bskur ba ni brtan pa'i mchog /rdo rje sngags kyis bskul byas nas/ /rdo rje rin chen mtshungs par 'gyur/ /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra b+h+r-i ku TI kro d+ha ha
@#/ /ra ha ra hUM phaT/ /rdo rje gzi brjid ting 'dzin gyis/ /rtag tu bdag nyid 'bar bar bya/ /phyogs rnams kun tu yongs spros nas/ /rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul/ /oM sUk+Sh+ma dz+wA la maN+Da

la kro d+ha sUR+ya dz+wa la hUM phaT/ /sbyin pa rin chen rgyal mtshan du/ /rtag tu bdag nyid rnam par bsam/ /sems can thams cad dag bya zhing / /rdo rje sngags ni rab bskul zhing / /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra d+h+wa dza kro d+ha ya sho

d+ha sarba AHhUM me pra yats+tsha hUM phaT/ /chos chen po yi bzhad pa bzhad/ /rdo rje bzhad pa bdag brtan pa'i/ /rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bya zhing / /bdag nyid kho na chos kyi gsung / /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra hA sa kro d+ha

ha ha hUM phaT ha ha/ gzod nas zhi ba skye ba med/ /chos rnams thams cad rnam dag pa/ /bdag nyid rdo rje chos rgyal po/ /rdo rje tshig gis lan gcig brjod/ /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra kro d+ha ya sho d+ha hUM phaT/ /

shugs can ral gri dag gi tshogs/ /rdo rje rnon po shin tu brtan/ /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra ts+tshe da kro d+ha ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byas nas/ /rdo rje 'khor lo dang mtshungs 'gyur/ /oM badzra sUk+Sh+ma

badzra kro d+ha mahA tsakra ts+tshin+da pa hA i shra gi pra be shwa hr-i da yaM ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ /nga ni rjod byed brjod bya min/ /bdag ni rdo rje smra ba brtan/ /chos 'dod pa nyid brtan byas nas/ /rdo rje smra ba thob par gyur/ /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra hUM

kA rA kro d+hA ha ra pa tsa ye wa mu dre Na hUM phaT/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing / /rdo rje las ni brtan par brtag /rdo rje tshig gis chos bshad na/ /rdo rje las ni thob par gyur/ /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra karma sarba kaR+ya hr-i

da ya hUM phaT/ /bdag ni rgyal po byams pa che/ /rdo rje srung ba brtan pa'i bdag /rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom byas nas/ /ngan 'gro thams cad nyams par 'gyur/ /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra ka pa tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ /

sdig pa thams cad bza' bya zhing / /rdo rje srung ba bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sngags ni bskul byas na/ /rdo rje nyon mongs thams cad 'joms/ /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra yak+Sha ha ra b+hak+Sha sarba duSh+Ta badzra yak+Sha hUM phaT/ /rdo

rje khu tshur rgyal po bdag /byang chub sems ni rjes su dran/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bcing byas na/ /rdo rje khu tshur dang mtshungs 'gyur/ /oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra muSh+TI ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ /sna yi rtse mo'i
sems de ni/ /brtan par byas nas yang dag brtsam/ /yi ge hUM nyid sbyor byas na/ /nyon mongs thams cad rnams nyams 'gyur/ /hUM|dang po snying ga sna rtse ru/ /brtan par byas nas de rang bzhin/ /mtshan
ma de ni spro byas na/ /nad sogs dgra ni 'jigs par 'gyur/ /nA sha ya badzrI hUM/ /sems de brtan par byas nas kyang / /rnal 'byor 'dzin pas spro bya zhing / /shes rab can gyis khro bdag brtsam/ /
gnas ngan dag ni nges par 'jig /bi nA sha ya sarba badzra hUM/ /rnal 'byor rig pas ji srid 'dod/ /mtshan ma de ni bsdu byas na/ /ma lus sdig pa thams cad ni/ /nyams shing 'byung bar mi 'gyur

ro| |oM sUk+Sh+ma badzra pra t+ya shri g+h+raM hUM/ /gsal bar phyogs rnams ma lus par/ /sems can kun la byams pa spro/ /ji srid rdo rje spra byas pa/ /de srid sems can bde bar 'gyur/ /b+hai ra ba badzra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ /kye
@#/ /ma'o mgon med sems can 'di/ /'jigs pa las ni skyob pa dag /snying rje'i sems de spro bar bya/ /rdo rje ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /kA ru NA badzra kro d+ha hUM
phaT| |de bzhin gshegs pa kun snying po/ /sems can thams cad gzod nas dag /e ma'o bde ba e ma'o chos/ /phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su spro/ /hUM kaM ra bi shud+d+ha hUM phaT/ /
'khor ba'i sems can la dmigs nas/ /bde ba dang bcas btang snyoms bya/ /btang snyoms sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /sems can rnams la yongs su spro/ /oM bi sho d+ha ya badzra kro d+ha hUM/
phaT| |rdo rje'i gzugs ni yang dag bris/ /gang gi steng du nges bzhag pa/ /de nyid kyis ni dri ma'i tshogs/ /thams cad rnal 'byor pa yis 'joms/ /hUM badzra pra brta/ gang la
byang chub sems nyid ni/ /rjes su dran pas rab phab na/ /sems can de yis sangs rgyas kyi/ /byang chub nyid ni thob par 'gyur/ /hUM bo d+hi satwa pra brta/ phyag na rdo rje rjes dran nas//
dag pa'i chos nyid phab byas nas/ /sems can de yis bde ba ni/ /dam pa thob 'gyur the tshom med/ /hUM badzra d+ha ra pra brta/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas
gzugs ni rnam par bsgom/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams phab byas na/ /'jigs pa nges par 'byung mi 'gyur/ /hUM bud+d+ha pra brta/ zla ba rdo rje rang bzhin dngos/ /bskyed pa bzhin du bsgom
byas na/ /blo bzang zla ba rdo rje mtshungs/ /myur du mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bud+d+ha pra brta ya hUM/ zla ba'i dbus su rang bdag nyid/ /bsgom zhing gang la phab byas pa/ /sems can de
rnams mi ldog par/ /'gyur ba ru ni the tshom med/ /satwa pra brta ya hUM/ phyag na rdo rje rang bdag nyid/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom bya zhing / /gang du phab pa'i gnas de ni/ /dpal dang bde ba
'phel bar 'gyur/ /myur ba nyid du the tshom med/ /badzra satwa pra brta ya hUM/ sangs rgyas gzugs su rang bdag nyid/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom bya zhing / /rdo rje de ni gar phab pa/ /rdzu 'phrul
rgya ni chen por gyur/ /bud d+ha pra brta hUM/ rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas/ /rang gi lus ni rab bskor ba/ /gang gi ming gis byas pa de/ /the tshom med par byang chub thob/ /oM badzra pa li ta
kro d+ha mA ra ya hUM/ dbugs ni byung dang rdub pa la/ /yi ge hUM ni rab sbyor zhing / /rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas/ /'dod chags la sogs nyes pa gzhom/ /oM badzra shwA sa pi pA ta la hUM phaT/

rdo rje lta bas blta bya zhing / /rdo rje khro bo rab sbyor bas/ /sems can gang la blta byas na/ /de ni 'khor ba las grol 'gyur/ /oM badzra driSh+Ti bi nA sha ya hUM phaT/ lus ngag gi ni bdag nyid gnas//

rang sems 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / /byang chub sems ni rjes dran na/ /des kyang sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /hUM hri da ya A kaR+Sha ya badzra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ /rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal por/ /mkhas
@#/ /pa yis ni bdag nyid bsgom/ /'bar ba yis ni khyab pa'i sku/ /rdo rje bsgom pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /hUM| gsang ba'i bdag po kun gyi snying po'i sngags
ni gsungs par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i rnal 'byor dbang po rtog par mdzad/ /gdul bya min la shin tu 'phrog cing gdul bya la chags spro/ /sa 'dzin mchog gi
dbang po bslab pa rnam par rol pa'i sa/ /sUk+Sh+ma rdzogs so// //gsang ba skar ma nyi zla ste/ /rdo rje dam tshig brjod par bya/ /rnam rtog gis brtags mdzes
gyur pa/ /de nas mchod pa'i cho ga bshad/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas gzugs dang ni/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rab tu bsgom/ /dang po sbyor byung ji skad bshad/ /sangs rgyas
thams cad mchod bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karme shwa ri hUM/ rang gi snying gar byang chub sems/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi tshogs bsams nas/ /mchod pa yi ni mchog 'di yis//
'dren pa thams cad mchod par bya/ /hUM| dbang phyug chen po dang bcas pa/ /lha rnams thams cad dgug bya zhing / /bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo yis/ /khro ba'i mchod pas rab tu mchod/ /oM

sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA karma sa ma ya bisti bistA ra trai lokya bi dza ye shwa ra sarba duSh+TAn mahA sa ma ya/ badzrI hUM/ khro gnyer can kun nga bdag nyid/ /khro bo rin chen gyis bsgom bya/ /sangs rgyas

thams cad 'jigs bya zhing / /rin chen mchod pas rab tu mchod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka pA sha sa ma ya s+pha ra Na mahA pU dzA A kaR+Sha ya bid+hi bista ra sa ma ye hUM/ chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs

par snang / /rdo rje chos ni brtan pa bdag /chos kyi mchod pas rab mchod pas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na mahA pU dzA bi d+hi bistA ra sa ma ye hUM/ bdag nyid rdo

rje las nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing / /las kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta lo ka b+hA tu dzI bi ta ma hA karma pU dzA bista ra sa ma

ye hUM| phyag na rdo rje bdag rdo rje/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams dgug par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod pas/ /mchod pa ru ni bsgom par bya/ /oM badzra satwa sid+d+hi dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dzaHrdo rje lcags kyu

brtan pa'i mchog /rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /sgom pa bsgrub pa bya ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgug par bya/ /oM badzra A kaR+Sha dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dzaH rdo rje chags pa bdag nyid ste/ /

bkug pa rnams ni mnyes par bya/ /rdo rje chags pas rab mchod pas/ /bsgrub par bya zhes yang dag sbyar/ /oM badzra ra ti rA ga sa ma ye hUM dzaH rdo rje legs pa rang bdag nyid/ /bsgom zhing rgyal ba mnyes

par bya/ /rdo rje legs pas rab mchod pas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgug par bya/ /oM badzra sA d+hu karma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dzaH rdo rje rin chen rgyal po cha/ /rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin
@#/ /gshegs rnams dbang bya zhing / /rin chen char ni kun tu dbab/ /oM badzra b+h+ri ku TI pa shI gu ru hUM/ /rdo rje nyi mar rang bdag nyid/ /'od zer phreng ba dang ldan bsgom/ /
sangs rgyas rnams ni dbang bya zhing / /phyogs rnams su ni 'od zer spro/ /oM badzra sUR+ya maN+Da la ba shIM ku ru hUM/ de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang bya zhing / /bdag ni pad+ma'i rgyal po nyid/ /sems

can bsam kun rdzogs par bya/ /rin chen rgyal mtshan rab tu mchod/ /oM badzra d+h+wa dzA gra ke yU re ba shIM ku ru hUM/ ha ha zhes dgod bzhad bya zhing / /rdo rje bzhad pa bdag nyid de/ /sangs rgyas thams
cad dbang du bya/ /bzhad pa'i mchod pas rab tu mchod/ /oM badzra aT+Ta hA se na ba shIM ku ru hUM/ /bdag ni pad+ma'i rgyal po nyid/ /btsun mo brtan par rang byung ba/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas rjes chags
bya| |'dod la chags pas rab tu mchod/ /oM badzra pad+ma rA ga ya hUM/ bdag ni rang nyid rnon po ste/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa brtan/ /bdag gis nyon mongs bcad bya zhing / /de bzhin
gshegs rnams chags par bya/ /oM badzra twik+Sha rA ga ya hUM/ /lha mo rdo rje sgrol ma dag /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/ /bdag gis rdo rje can mnyes bya/ /'dod chags brtan pas rab
tu mchod/ /oM badzra maN+Da la rA ga rA ga ya hUM/ /nam mkha'i lha mo chos smra ba/ /brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid bstan/ /dag pa'i chos la dga' bya zhing / /de bzhin gshegs rnams
mnyes par bya/ /oM badzra bA ka rA ga rA ga ya hUM/ /bdag ni rang nyid las yin te/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rab tu grags/ /bdag ni nam mkha'i mdzod kyang yin/ /mchod pa'i char gyis rab tu
mchod/ /oM badzra karma sa ma ye pU dzA hUM/ /bdag ni rang nyid bsrung ba ste/ /sangs rgyas byams pa brtan pa bdag /bdag gis sangs rgyas mchod pa bya/ /chos kyi mchod pas kun tu mchod/ /oM
badzra ka ba tsa ba na d+ha rak+Sha hUM/ /bdag gis nyon mongs bza' bar bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin brtan pa bdag /bdag gis sangs rgyas mchod par bya/ /chos kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod/ /oM

badzra yak+Sha mA ra ya badzra daMSh+T+wa hUM phaT/ /nga ni sangs rgyas byang chub yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur rang bdag nyid/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ste/ /las kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod/ /oM badzra

karma muSh+Ti sid d+h+ya sid+d+h+ya hUM phaT/ /'di 'dra'i sna tshogs mchod pa kun/ /ye shes gsang sngags rab thob byed/ /ma lus lha mo sems dpa' kun/ /rgyal po ji bzhin rab snying hUM/ /sgeg mo phreng ba
de bzhin glu/ /gar ma me tog sogs sbyor bas/ /sems dpa' la sogs lha mo dag /shin tu bsrung ba'i mchod pa'i mchod pa'o// //de nas las ni thabs chen po/ /gang gis
myur du rab 'grub 'gyur/ /gang gi dga' ba la sbyor ba/ /sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga 'o/ /ji ltar sbyin sreg dngos grub kyis/ /las ni bla na med pa ltar/ /de bzhin rig pa'i las rnams kun/ /de lta bu ni
@#/ /byed pa min/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa mang ldan pa/ /mdo ru bsdu na rnam pa lnga/ /rgyas par rnal 'byor chen po yi/ /gsang ba'i mdo las rab tu bshad/ /rig pa
'dzin pa'i rnam 'phrul pa/ /ji ltar sbyin sreg rnam pa yis/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur pa/ /mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya/ /sbyin sreg las ni rnam pa lnga/ /re re zhing
yang rnam pa mang / /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa nyid/ /mngon spyod kyi ni gsum pa ste/ /dgug pa yang ni bzhi pa yin/ /lnga pa dbang dang yang dag ldan/ /sbyin sreg lnga pa de rnams ni/ /dbang du byed pa

mchog yin no/ /de nas thab khung rab bshad bya/ /sbyor ba ji bzhin sbyor bar bya/ /zhi la thab khung zlum po ste/ /kun nas yongs su zlum po yin/ /rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi ste/ /mngon spyod la ni gru gsum

yin| |thab khung rdo rje'i rnam pa can/ /kun tu dgug par byed pa'i mchog /de bzhin thab khung ring por bya/ /dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /de dag rnam pa lnga ru bshad/ /thab khung las ni bla na med/ /

srod kyi dus su zhi ba bya/ /snga dro'i dus su rgyas pa'i las/ /nyi ma phyed na mngon spyod kyi/ /drag po'i las ni nges par bya/ /dgug pa dus rnams thams cad du/ /mtshan mo dbang du bya ba yin/ /sbyor ba
lnga po 'di yis ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas las rnams bya/ /shar du kha bltas zhi don du/ /rgyas pa byang du yang dag gnas/ /lho ru kha bltas gyur pa yis/ /mngon spyod kyi ni las rnams so/ /
steng du kha bltas de bzhin dgug /phyogs rnams kun tu bltas dbang bya/ /phyogs mtshams thams cad mnyam sbyor bsam/ /yang na nub kyi phyogs su bshad/ /zhi la sangs rgyas phyag rgya
ste| |rgyas la nor bu'i mtshan mas so/ /rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la/ /dbang la pad+ma'i rigs kyis so/ /shin tu dgug pa dang ldan pa/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dgug pa la/ /sbyor ba lnga po 'di yis
ni| |sbyin sreg las ni rab tu bsgrub/ /zhi ba'i shing ni mngar ba ste/ /rgyas pa de bzhin 'bras bur bcas/ /tsha ba mngon spyod las dag la/ /dgug pa la ni tsher ma can/ /dbang la me tog bcas
par bshad/ /de rnams yam shing go rims bzhin/ /sngon la yam shing rnam pa lnga/ /rnal 'byor pa yis yang dag sbyar/ /de la 'dam gyis byugs pa yi/ /shing la zhi ba rab tu bsgrags/ /gang
du sdig pa rnams 'jig cing / /kun tu 'khrug par sreg 'gyur pa/ /bud shing mngar bdag gi me/ /mnyam par gzhag pas rab spar nas/ /til mar gyis ni sbyin sreg byas/ /sdig pa thams cad
sreg par 'gyur/ /oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzra ya swAhA/ /bud shing mngar bdag gis ni/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas spar/ /'bras kyi sbyin sreg byas nas ni/ /bsod nams tshogs ni
'phel bar 'gyur/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swAhA/ /bud shing mngar po dag gis ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas me sbar nas/ /mar smyugs dUr ba'i sbyin sreg gis/ /rdo rje tshe ni mngon 'phel
@#/ /'gyur/ /oM badzra A yu She swAhA/ /yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /dge ba 'byung bas me sbar nas/ /ku sha'i myu gu'i til mar gyis/ /'jig rten gsum
yang srung bar 'gyur/ /oM a pra ti ha ta badzra ya swAhA/ /sngon la zhi ba sbyar bar bya/ /dbus kyi gnyis la rgyas de bzhin/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa yi/ /sbyin sreg las ni dang por 'gyur/ /
shing ni tsha ba'i yam shing gis/ /mngon spyod kyi ni las dag la/ /mngon spyod dang ni bcas pa yi/ /dgug pa la yang de nyid kyi/ /rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sngon la tsha ba'i yam shing
gis| |khros pas me ni rab spar nas/ /mkhas pas tsher mas sbyin sreg bya/ /tsher ma dang bcas shing dag kyang / /tsher ma can gyis ngas par dgug/ /gang dang gang ni 'dod gyur pa/ /
sangs rgyas rnams ni nges par 'gugs/ /oM badzra A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ /bud shing me tog dmar sogs kyis/ /rab tu 'bar ba'i me spar nas/ /me tog 'bras bu dmar po yang / /sbyin sreg
byas na dbang byed mchog /hUM badzra pA shA ya dza/ /cha ba'i yam shing dag bya zhing / /rab tu drag po'i me spar nas/ /'bras bu kha bas bsreg byas na/ /mngon spyod kyi ni mchog yin no/ /hUM
hUM badzra mA ra ya phaT/ /gsang ba'i sbyin sreg thams cad ni/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/ /sbyin sreg 'khor lo cho ga yi/ /de nyid du ni de bzhin sbyar/ /yam shing che ba
gis ni/ /shin tu drag pas me spar nas/ /'jigs rung lcags kyus sbyin sreg bya/ /gdug pa thams cad rab 'jigs 'gyur/ /oM badzra ban+d+ha ya phaT/ /me tog dang bcas shing me la//
rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sngags sogs 'bras bu'i sbyin sreg ni/ /dbang du byed pa mchog yin no/ /oM badzra pa shaM ka rA ya swAhA/ /kha ba dang ni mngar ba nyid/ /yam shing mngar po
sbyar bya zhing / /'dod pa'i me tog 'bras bsregs na/ /'dod pa'i gzugs can mchog tu 'gyur/ /oM badzra karma rU pa Ne swAhA/ /de nas/ bud shing de dag nyid kyis ni/ /rab tu khros pas me
sbar nas/ /smyug ma'i 'bras bu phra mo bsregs/ /myur du mi snang nyid du 'gyur/ /oM badzra a tri Sha ya/ /shes rab bud shing de nyid kyis/ /drag po'i me ni rab sbar nas/ /nam mkha' stobs
kyi me tog dang / /bsreg na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ /oM badzra khe tsa re na swAhA/ /de nas mngag gzhug pa dang g.yog /bka' bzhin byed pa rab tu bskul/ /ci nas kyang ni myur 'grub
pa'i| |go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya/ /shing ni kha bos bud shing bya/ /thab khung rdo rje'i dbyibs su brko/ /khros pas rdo rje me tog sreg /yi ge dza ni yongs su brjod/ /sngags kyi sbyor
ba 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje'i sngags ni rab tu bskul/ /rdo rje me tog dag bsregs na/ /bka' byed mchog ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /oM badzra A dz+nyA ka rA ya dza/ /yam shing de dag nyid dang ni/ /thab khung de
@#/ /nyid brko bya zhing / /byang chub sems dpa'i sman ma gang / /bsreg can bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /oM badzra sau ri pa shaM ka rA ya dza/ /bud shing de dag
nyid kyis me/ /kun tu thab khung de kho na/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sman ma ni/ /bsregs na bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /hUM badzra pA Ni ba shaM ka rA ya dza/ /yang na sangs rgyas dman ma 'am/ /
yang na bdag dang mtshan ma dag /sgrub pa'i sbyor bas sbyin sreg bya/ /sangs rgyas bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /oM bud+d+ha shaM ka rA ya dza/ tshig gi sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /sbyin sreg
bya zhing myur du 'grub/ /rdo rje'i sbyor pas dngos grub kun/ /the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje rigs las sogs kun kyang / /de nas gsang ba phyag rgya che/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rab
sgrub phyir/ /rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya/ /rig pa gang zhig yid 'ong ba/ /sring mo'i rigs ni thob bya'i phyir/ /rig pa'i lha mo dang ldan par/ /shin tu rnal 'byor bsgrub par
bya| |bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu/ /mkhas pas 'dug pa bsten par bya/ /mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal bo las/ /de nyid du ni ji skad bshad/ /kun tu gur gum phye ma dang / /b+ha
gar mig sman bcug nas ni/ /de yi sems dpa' shes par bya/ /gang phyir dgongs pa rab tu bsgrags/ /sdug pa de yi rig pa ni/ /mngon par 'dod pa gang yin 'ong / /rang
gi rigs kyi lha mo gang / /de ni bud med ces byar grags/ /rig pa'i sbyor ba de yis ni/ /rang gi rigs kyi lha dag sgrub/ /mig sman las sogs gzhug pa ni/ /pad+ma'i steng du yang dag dgong / /b+ha ga
pad+ma zhes bshad te/ /gzhug pa dgod par bshad par bya/ /b+ha ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /mig sman dag ni bsgrub par bya/ /b+ha ga mig sman gzhug pa ni/ /pad+ma'i steng du yang dag dgod/ /pad+ma

dang ni lhan cig dgod/ /rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM gu h+ya ra ti badzra ba shaM ka rI sid+d+ha hUM/ /drod dang du ba 'bar dang rdul/ /rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM gu h+ya badzra sid+d+ha
hUM| |b+ha gar gi wang bzhag nas ni/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya gzhag par 'byar/ /mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi dag gis/ /dngos grub rnam pa bzhi ru bshad/ /oM gu h+ya badzra sid+d+ha hUM/ /rdo rje sems

dpa'i phyag rgya yis/ /b+ha gar gur gum bcug nas ni/ /dag bcing de ni 'bar 'gyur na/ /rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM badzra d+ha ra gu h+ya sid+d+ha hUM/ /rdo rje bya ba'i sbyor ba dang / /rdo rje

phyag rgya bsdus pa dang / /rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug dang / /rdo rje khu tshur sbyar ba dang / /dam tshig mchog ni 'di dag dang / /hUM gi sor mo'i sbyor ba dang / /chos kyi phyag rgya de bzhin 'dir/ /oM la
sogs pa'i yi ge dang / /sbyin sreg cho ga 'di yis ni/ /ye shes phyag rgya rab bsgrub bya/ /rgyas pa ru ni thams cad dag /gsang ba'i rgyud du rab tu bshad/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje
@#/ /slob dpon dka' thub ches/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas ni/ /mchog nyid bsgrub par 'gyur ba yin/ /rdo rje rigs chen yid 'ong ba/ /rgyud chen kun las btus
pa la| |gang zhig mngon par brtson 'gyur ba/ /don yod pa yi dngos grub 'gyur/ /tshogs ni bsags pa med pa dang / /sangs rgyas mthong ba med pa ru/ /gsang ba'i snying po chen po
'di| |thos pa tsam du'ang mi 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// //de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhi/ /dkyil 'khor mkhas pas bslab par bya/ /
ye shes de nyid gsang ba yang / /yongs su bsgrub par rab tu bskor/ /shin tu gsang ba chen po ni/ /dngos po thams cad khyab la dgod/ /'di ni rdo rje drag po bzhi/ /rang nyid
lnga pa dang bcas pa/ /gsang ba brjod du med pa mchog /ye shes mchog gi tshul thob byed/ /bde ba chen po rab grub don/ /dga' ba chen po shin tu brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta

badzra sa ma ye hUM/ hUM badzra ma Ta/ oM badzra pra ti b+h+r-i ku TI badzra ra ta/ oM badzra pad ma badzra tita/ oM badzra karma a tri kro d+ha/ /shar dang lho yi phyogs cha dang / /nub dang byang gi phyogs cha dang / /
dbus dang phyogs bzhi dag tu ni/ /sbyor ba'i phyag rgya dgod par bya/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /thams cad bri zhing dgod par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal bo che/ /mthong
'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /ji skad bshad pa'i rnal 'byor bzhin/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor rjes sbyor skyes/ /rnal 'byor dag ni lhag ma dag /de dag thams cad brtan par bya/ /shin tu bsang ba
de nyid che/ /mchog tu gsang ba de nyid mchog /gsang ba chen po gsang ba 'dzin/ /rdo rje gsang ba brtan pa che/ /rig pa mngon par 'dod 'gyur ba/ /rang gi lag gis yang dag bri/ /rgyal
mo chen mo brjod byas na/ /dkyil 'khor du ni skad cig 'grub/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bi shud+d+ha d+harma hoH/ /rang gis dkyil 'khor che bris nas/ /rig pa brjod pa la brtson bya/ /byams pas
dgug pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'khor ba snying rje spyad par bya/ /oM bi shud+d+ha d+hiSh+Ta dzaH/ rang gis gsang sngags bris nas ni/ /bu mo'i mchu la 'o byas te/ /'jig rten dbang phyug btsun mo che/ /
shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo/ /oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+haH/ mu khe hUM/ /pha rol phyin drug spyod pa yis/ /byang chub spyod pa rab rnyed dka'/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor brtan gyur na/ /'grub 'gyur
'di la the tshom med/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni 'jug bya zhing / /'dod pa'i yon tan mchog lnga yis/ /rol cing dga' ba nyid du bya/ /mdo sde gsang dbang las bshad pa/ /gsang
ba lnga ni rab sgrub pa/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ru bshad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las sogs/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ru brjod/ /'dod pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /skal pa
@#/ /can gyis dngos grub thob/ /gsang ba de nyid chen po ste/ /rigs lnga dag ni rab bsgrub pa/ /'dod chags chen po rab bsgrub phyir/ /rol cing rab tu dga' bar
bya| |bde ba chen po grub don du/ /spyod pa chen po tshul chen po/ /de nyid rnal 'byor kun bsdus pa/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad rnal 'byor gyis/ /rnal 'byor
bya ba bsgrub par bya/ /ji ltar yi ge hUM las byung / /gsang ba rgyal po chen po byed/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad sbyor ba yis/ /rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya/ /de ltar min na phyag rgya che/ /dam
tshig ces bya gtan mi 'grub/ /phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus nas/ /rdo rje phyag rgya yongs su gzung / /de nas grub pa'i phyag rgya che/ /grub pa cho ga yang dag gis/ /myur du rab tu 'grub
'gyur ba/ /rmad byung chen po rab bshad bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sa ma ye hUM/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang bar bzhugs/ /phyag rgya chen po yongs su gzung / /rdo rje sngags
kyis bskul bya zhing / /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu bsgrub/ /hUM badzra ma Ta/ rdo rje'i rig pa mchog rgyal po/ /bdag nyid yongs su bsgom bya zhing / /sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byas

na| |'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /oM b+h+r-i ku TI ba ra tha/ rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur ba/ /rin chen phyag rgya yongs su gzung / /rin chen char ni rab phab nas/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom

med| |oM pad ma badzri hrIHtha/ /shes rab spyan du rang bdag nyid/ /rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bya zhing / /pad+ma'i rigs chen bskul bar bya/ /hUM karma badzra kri ti ta/ sna tshogs rdo rje rgyal po che/ /bya
ba sna tshogs bdag nyid cha/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod byas na/ /dngos grub las ni thob par 'gyur/ /bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni yang dag bya/ /mdo sde gsang
dbang rgyal po las/ /rnam pa bzhi ni rab tu byung / /de nas mtshan nyid sna tshogs yongs bsdus pa/ /rab tu spyan yangs dga' ba chen po mchog /da bzhin tshogs dang rdo rje spyan ldan ma/ /

shes rab spyan gyis btsun mo mchog chen ldan/ /oM badzra karma ho/ badzra hUM hUM/ ka Ta ma Ta/ ra Ta ba Ta/ ka ra Na badzrI gri/ badzra gu ru/ badzra phaT/ ka ra ra gri/ shud d+hi g+hi/ shud d+hi/ shud d+haM gri

bud d+ha/ s+t+wa rA dza/ rA ga/ duSh+Ti/ rat+na/ te dza/ ke tu/ hA sa/ d+harma/ tIk+Sh+Na/ he tu/ g+ho Sha/ karma/ rak+Sha/ yak+Sha/ sin+d+hi sin+d+hi/ yo ga /gu h+ya/ bi Sha ka /tsaR+ya/ tsa ri/ dz+nyA na/ ra twa/ su b+ha

ta ka gruM /hUM phaT/ hUM baM/ hUM tsa/ hUM maM/ hUM sa/ hUM ha/ hUM hUM/ hUM dza/ hUM ho/ hUM sa/ hUM aM/ hUM a/ hUM traM/ hUM taM/ hUM haM/ hUM d+haM/ hUM d+hi/ hUM maM/ hUM raM/ hUM kaM /hUM haM/ hUM baM/ oM sarba ta thA ga

ta a b+hi dz+nyA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsa kre sa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bi shA tsa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsa kre d+haM/ oM a nrad pa na ne a/ oM a nu ru he A/ oM a na le i/ oM nI li I/ oM rat+ne u/
@#/ /oM rat+ta U/ oM sa u ra/ oM la e r-I/ oM a ta l-i/ oM A hA re ra l-i/ /oM A sha ne e/ oM b+he he g+he ai/ oM sarba shA pa ri pUr+Ne o/ oM b+ha ra de

au| |oM s+pha ra Ne aM/ oM bi shwa aH oM ma ho tse pre ka /oM tiSh+Tha kha/ oM a mu kha ga /oM a b+hi She g+ha/ oM dz+nyA na nga / oM ts+tshe da tsa/ oM bA rA hiR+ya tsha/ oM b+ha she dza/ oM b+ha d+he dz+ha/
oM pra sha me nya/ oM kro d+hi Ta/ oM ha ra Ne Tha/ oM b+hi g+ha Da/ oM k+Sha pe D+ha/ oM a Nu Na/ oM Tak+ki le ta/ oM bi su le tha/ oM d+hAM ra NI da/ oM pa ta ke d+ha/ oM ba lo ke na/ oM tra ta pa/
oM sarba ha ra Ni pha/ oM b+hu sha ni ba/ oM b+hi ba sha ni b+ha/ oM A ra te ma/ oM a li ni ya/ oM tra ha ra/ oM bi sha la/ oM bud d+he wa/ oM d+ha me sha/ oM ya ma b+he Sha/ oM sarbe sa/ oM d+ha

li ni ha/ ho tha/ hUM dzaH/ hA sa/ oM a/ ba haM/ a ro/ ni bi/ da sha /tra ra d+hi/ b+hu ba/ sa ya/ a hi/ kro d+ha/ d+ha ma sha/ b+ha ra ya/ yu g+ti/ dar sha na/ hA sa ya/ he mahA ne/ d+ha ra Na/ oM sarba ta
thA ga ta sa bi dz+nyA mahA mu Ne rA dzA gar+b+ho rA dzA kra ya hi hUM hUM hUM hUM ha// //de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di/ /mdo sde gsang dbang las gsungs pas/ /chos
dbyings brtan pa'i rang bzhin te/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung / /bde legs bsgom pa byas dang mtshungs pa med/ /e ma'o gsang ba chen po gsang ba kun bsdus pa/ /
rnal 'byor rgya cher bsdus pa'ang mtshungs pa med/ /bde ba chen po 'di ni brtan pa'i dngos por gyur/ /dga' ba chen po'i slob dpon dga' chen nyi ma ste/ /mchod 'os gsang ba'i kun
bsdus pa/ /kun mkhyen gsung las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa/ /tshogs rgyas rab tu 'phel bar gyur pa gsungs pa yin/ /rdo rje chen po skal ba ches/ /gsang ba thams
cad rjes su bslab/ /de nyid chos ni rnal 'byor che/ /stug po bsdus par 'jug par bya/ /brgya dang sum cu rtsa drug lhag /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa/ /bri dang rdor tshig yi ge
yis| |dkyil 'khor gsang ba bslab par bya/ /rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di ru ni/ /de nyid yi ge rnam dag pa'i/ /rnal 'byor chen po 'jug par bya/ /
gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dar gyi chun pos rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yi/ /stug po gsang
ba shin tu brtan/ /de nyid gsang ba bslab bya'i phyir/ /shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bslab/ /e ma'o dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor kun bsdus
pa| |rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod/ /gru bzhi mnyam pa'i rim pa ni/ /de nyid kyi ni nang du bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus kyi char/ /sangs
@#/ /rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya/ /de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /ci rigs par ni yang dag bri/ /ngos bzhi'i rang bzhin dkyil 'khor la/ /yi ge sum
cu rtsa drug dgod/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du/ /yi ge bcu drug yang dag bri/ /yi ge bcu drug rgyal po ni/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs dang 'od bcas pa/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i logs
bzhi ru/ /yi ge rnams ni yang dag bri/ /yi ge sum cu sum cu ni/ /phyogs rnams kun du dgod par bya/ /sangs rgyas thugs ka'i dbus su ni/ /yi ge hUM ni sbyar bar bya/ /gang
zhig sbyor ba'i ming can gyi/ /sangs rgyas dbus su dgod par bya/ /rdo rje yi ge rab sbyor byed/ /shes rab can gyis yi ge rnams/ /rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa yis/ /dbus su rdo rje
rdo rje bzhi/ /shar du yi ge sum cu bri/ /yi ge sum cu de bzhin lhor/ /sum cu byang gi phyogs cha ru/ /nub tu sum cu sbyar bar bya/ /yi ge bcu drug yang dag sbyor/ /dbus su
sangs rgyas bzhi ldan bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug dbang phyug che/ /dpal ldan 'jig rten rnal 'byor ldan/ /dbab pa brtan pa'i tshogs gyur
pa| |smra ba las byung rgyal ba che/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor 'jug par bya/ /u ro ti ko ta mahA R+ya yo d+haR+ya bi ra te nA ma ne/ /de nas sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje 'khor lo gzhug par bya//
ha ha ho ho gsang chen po/ /rtse gsum ral pa gsum 'dzin pa/ /rgyal chen gzi brjid chen po'i don/ /rdo rje thig gis yongs su bskor/ /slob dpon chen pos blta byas nas/ /yi ge rab tu
brjod par bya/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor lo yis/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor lo kun du spro/ /a A'i rnal 'byor yang dag gzung / /i pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i 'od/ /u U rnon po 'chang ba
ste| |e ai sgra dbyangs rab bskul ba/ /o au skyabs byad rtsibs chen po/ /aM aHshes rab spyan bzang ba/ /rdo rje lcags kyu 'di yis kyang / /rdo rje 'chang ni bskul bar bya/ /ji ltar
'khor lo ji ltar rigs/ /ci 'os ji ltar rdo rje'i rigs/ /de bzhin 'khor lo yongs su dgod/ /rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che/ /skal pa chen po gsang ba 'di/ /rdo rje 'khor lo
yang dag sbyor/ /rnam 'phrul de ni rab tu bskor/ /'khor lo dbab dang gzhug pa dang / /cho ga ji bzhin 'jug par bya/ /rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du/ /rgyas par ji skad
bstan pa bzhin/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang / /'khor lo dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ /'khor lo'i gnas ni dbang du 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje
'gugs dang skal ldan dang / /nges byed rin chen gzi brjid dang / /rgyal mtshan bzhad pa yang dag ldan/ /chos dang rnon po gtso bo mchog /rgyu dang gtum po drag po che/ /las dang bsrung
@#/ /ba gnod sbyin grub/ /sna tshogs sbyor ba yang dag ldan/ /'khor lo'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'byung / /de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje 'khor lo kun tu bri/ /rdo rje
'dzin kun slob dpon gyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug par bya/ /bu dang slob ma min pa la/ /gsang ba'i tshogs chen sbyin mi bya/ /gzhan du skal pa dang ldan pa/ /gzhung
'di khyed kyis ci bder byin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po shin tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog tu gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po
chen po rdo rje rtse mo las/ rdo rje rigs kyi de kho na nyid shin tu gsang ba'i bshad pa ste le'u bzhi pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab

par gyur to/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad rdo rje mchog /rdo rje mchog 'dzin rdo rje'i mda'/ /rdo rje khro gnyer rdo rje'i lus/ /rdo rje 'bar ba rgyal mtshan che/ /rdo rje gad rgyangs rdo rje'i bdag/ /rdo rje sde
ste chos mchog 'dzin/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan shin tu rno/ /rdo rje 'khor lo bzlas pa che/ /las kyi rdo rje rdo rje che/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin 'jigs chen po/ /rdo rje phyag rgya sgra chen po/ /rdo rje

khu tshur brtan pa che/ /rdo rje 'bar ba rdo rje che/ /las chen po ste mda' chen po/ /rdo rje legs pa dga' ba che/ /rdo rje rgyan ni 'phrog byed pa/ /rdo rje 'od de rgyal mtshan che/ /rdo rje'i tshems ni

rab dga' ba/ /rdo rje pad+ma shin tu gcod/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor rdo rje rig /rdo rje ljags te sna tshogs che/ /sna tshogs mtshon chen skye dgu mda'/ /go cha chen po rdo rje sku/ /rdo rje mche ba 'jigs
byed pa/ /rdo rje bsdams pa rdo rje che/ /rdo rje khro bo gzhu chen po/ /rdo rje lcags kyu mdzod chen po/ /zhags pa chen po dbang chen po/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog 'bebs pa che/ /rdo rje dbab pa
'jigs byed pa/ /yi ge dza ste yi ge hUM/ /yi ge hUM ni dam du 'ching / /yi ge hoHste yi ge haH/ /rdo rje phyag rgya dregs pa mchog/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo che/ /lcags kyu bsdigs med rdo
rje khro| |rdo rje bdud de bdud kyi mchog /bdud kyi bdud ni rab 'joms pa/ /rdo rje dga' ba zhi ba che/ /rdo rje dka' thub shis mdzad pa/ /rdo rje drag po shin tu gdug /rdo rje rang dbang
rdo rje mdzad/ /rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo che/ /rdo rje sgra ste sgra chen po/ /sangs rgyas hUM mdzad yi ge hUM/ /yi ge phaT sogs dang mnyam pa/ /yi ge phaT ni 'bar ba'i bka'/ /yi ge swAhA rang bdag
med| |gtso bo gsod dang slong mdzad pa/ /dri med skrag dang dbugs 'byin mdzad/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khro bo che/ /khro bo rdo rje de bzhin gshegs/ /'dod chags las byung de bzhin nyid//
@#/ /rdo rje khro bo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ /nyin re bzhin du lan gcig ni/ /gang zhig 'don par byed pa de/ /dngos grub mchog ni
thob par 'gyur/ /de dag la ni 'jigs pa med/ /phongs dang bran dag nyid mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bstan pa/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo khyod
la gsol ba 'debs/ /gdug pa rnams ni gdul ba dang / /de bzhin sems can don bya'i phyir/ /tshul chen bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ /gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo
rje rtse mo zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon chen po karma badzra'i zhal snga nas dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims
kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o/ /bam po bcu gnyis pa///
